GSP28msbh1-7u:2: loke yeṣv artheṣu prasiddhāni padāni, tāni, sati sambhave, tadarthāny eva sūtreṣv ity avagantavyam. nādhyāhārādibhir eṣāṃ parikalpanīyo 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3: paribhāṣitavyo vā. evaṃ hi{*1/1*} vedavākyāny evaibhir vyākhyāyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4: itarathā vedavākyāni vyākhyeyāni svapadārthāś ca vyākhyeyāḥ. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:6: tatra loke 'yam athaśabdo vṛttād anantarasya prakriyārtho dṛṣṭaḥ. na ceha kiñcid vṛttam upalabhyate. bhavitavyaṃ tu tena, yasmin saty anantaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7: dharmajijñāsāvakalpate. tathā hi prasiddhapadārthakaḥ sa kalpito bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8: tat tu vedādhyayanam. tasmin hi sati sāvakalpate. naitad evam. anyasyāpi karmaṇo 'nantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā yuktā, prāg api ca vedādhyayanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9: ucyate - tādṛśīṃ{*1/3*} tu dharmajijñāsām adhikṛtyāthaśabdaṃ prayuktavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10: ācāryaḥ, yā vedādhyayanam antareṇa na saṃbhavati. katham? vedavākyānām anekavidho vicāra iha vartiṣyate. api ca naiva vayam iha [2]{*1/4*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11: vedādhyayanāt pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ pratiṣedhaṃ śiṣmaḥ{*1/5*}. na hy etad ekaṃ vākyaṃ purastāc ca vedādhyayanād dharmajijñāsāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12: pratiṣedhiṣyati{*1/6*}, parastāc cānantaryaṃ prakariṣyati. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. anyā hi vacanavyaktir asya purastād vedādhyāyanād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13: dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhataḥ, anyā ca parastād ānantaryam
GSP28msbh1-7u:14: upadiśataḥ{*1/7*}. vedān adhītya ity{*1/8*} ekasyāṃ vidhīyate 'nūdyānantaryam, viparītam anyasyām. arthaikatvāc caikavākyatāṃ vakṣyati{*1/9*}. kiṃ tv{*1/10*} adhīte vede dvayam āpatati, gurukulāc ca samāvartitavyaṃ vedavākyāni ca vicārayitavyāni. tatra gurukulān mā
GSP28msbh1-7u:15: samāvartiṣṭa; kathaṃ nu vedavākyāni vicārayed ity evamartho 'yam upadeśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16: yady evam, na tarhi vedādhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ{*1/11*}. evaṃ hi samāmananti - vedam adhītya snāyād iti{*1/12*}. iha ca vedam adhītya snāsyan dharmaṃ jijñāsamāna imam āmnāyam atikrāmet. na cāmnāyo nāmātikramitavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17: tad ucyate - atikramiṣyāma imam āmnāyam. anatikrāmanto vedam arthavantaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:18: santam anarthakaṃ kalpayema{*1/13*}. dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:19: nāma. na ca tasyādhyayanamātrāt{*1/14*} tatrabhavanto yājñikāḥ phalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:20: samāmananti. yad api ca samāmanantīva, tatrāpi - dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syād ity{*1/15*} arthavādatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:21: vakṣyati. na cādhītavedasya snānānantaryam etad vidhīyate. na hy atrānataryasya vaktā kaścic chabdo 'sti. pūrvakālatāyāṃ hi{*1/16*} ktvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:23: dṛṣṭārthatā cādhyayanasyānantarye vyāhanyeta. lakṣaṇayā tv eṣo 'rthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:24: syāt. na cedaṃ snānam adṛṣṭārthaṃ vidhīyate. kiṃ tu lakṣaṇayāsnānādiniyamasya paryavasānaṃ vedādhyayanasamakālam āhuḥ vedam adhītya snāyād, gurukulān mā samāvartiṣṭety adṛṣṭārthatāparihārāyaiva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25: [3]{*1/17*} tasmād vedādhyayanam eva pūrvam abhinirvartyānanataraṃ dharmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:26: jijñāsitavya ity athaśabdasya sāmarthyam. na brūmo 'nyasyāpi karmaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:27: 'nantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā na kartavyā iti, kiṃ tu vedam adhītya tvaritena na
GSP28msbh1-7u:28: snātavyam, anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavya ity athaśabdasyārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:30: deśaḥ, ato 'ham asmin deśe prativasāmīti. evam adhīto vedo
GSP28msbh1-7u:31: dharmajijñāsāyāṃ hetur jñātaḥ, anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ ity ataḥśabdasya sāmarthyam. dharmāya hi vedavākyāni vicārayitum anadhītavedo na śaknuyāt. ataḥ, etasmāt kāraṇāt, anantaraṃ dharmaṃ jijñāsitum icched ity ataḥśabdasyārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:32: dharmāya jijñāsā dharmajijñāsā. sā hi tasya jñātum icchā. sa punaḥ{*1/19*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:33: kathaṃ jijñāsitavyaḥ? ko dharmaḥ, kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ, kāny asya sādhanāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:34: kāni sādhanābhāsāni, kiṃparaś ceti. tatra ko dharmaḥ, kathaṃlakṣaṇa ity ekenaiva sūtreṇa vyākhyātaṃ codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti{*1/20*}. kāny asya sādhanāni, kāni sādhanābhāsāni, kiṃparaś ceti śeṣalakṣaṇena{*1/21*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:35: vyākhyātam{*1/22*}. kva puruṣaparatvaṃ kva vā puruṣo guṇabhūta ity etāsāṃ pratijñānāṃ piṇḍasya etat sūtram athāto dharmajijñāseti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:36: dharmaḥ prasiddho vā syād aprasiddho vā. sa cet prasiddhaḥ, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:37: jijñāsyaḥ{*1/23*}. athāprasiddhaḥ, natarām. tad etad{*1/24*} anarthakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:39: athavārthavat. dharmaṃ prati hi vipratipannā bahuvidaḥ. kecid anyaṃ dharmam āhuḥ, kecid anyam. so 'yam avicārya pravartamānaḥ kaṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:40: evopādadāno vihanyetānarthaṃ carcchet. tasmād dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ{*1/25*}. sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣaṃ saṃyunaktīti pratijānīmahe.

GSP28msbh1-7u:71: codaneti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam āhuḥ. ācārya[4]{*1/26*}coditaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:72: karomīti hi dṛśyate. lakṣyate yena, tal lakṣaṇam. dhūmo lakṣaṇam agner iti hi vadanti. tayā yo lakṣyate, so 'rthaḥ puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasena saṃyunaktīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:73: pratijānīmahe. codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam arthaṃ śaknoty avagamayitum, nānyat
GSP28msbh1-7u:75: nanv atathābhūtam apy arthaṃ brūyāc codanā, yathā yatkiṃcana laukikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:76: vacanaṃ nadyās tīre phalāni santīti. tat tathyam api bhavati, vitatham api bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:77: ucyate - vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate{*1/27*} bravīti ca vitathaṃ ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:78: bravītīti ucyate 'vabodhayati, budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti. yasmiṃś ca nimittabhūte saty avabudhyate, so 'vabodhayati. yadi ca codanāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:79: satyām agnihotrāt svargo bhavatīty avagamyate{*1/28*}, katham ucyate na
GSP28msbh1-7u:80: tathā bhavatīti. atha na tathā bhavati{*1/29*}, katham avabudhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:82: na ca svargakāmo yajetety{*1/30*} ato vacanāt saṃdigdham avagamyate bhavati vā svargo na vā bhavatīti. na ca niścitam avagamyamānam idaṃ mithyā syāt. yo hi janitvā pradhvaṃsate naitad evam iti, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:83: mithyāpratyayaḥ. na caiṣa kālāntare puruṣāntare 'vasthāntare deśāntare vā viparyeti. tasmād avitathaḥ. tasmād avitathaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:84: yat tu laukikaṃ vacanam, tac cet pratyayitāt puruṣād indriyaviṣayaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:85: avitatham eva tat. athāpratyayitāt puruṣād anindriyaviṣayaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:86: tat{*1/31*} puruṣabuddhiprabhavam apramāṇam. aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt. aparasmāt pauruṣeyād vacanād avagatam iti cet, tad api tenaiva tulyam. naivaṃjātīyakeṣv artheṣu puruṣavacanaṃ prāmāṇyam upaiti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:88: nanv aviduṣām{*1/32*} upadeśo nāvakalpate. upadiṣṭavantaś ca manvādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:89: tasmāt puruṣāḥ{*1/33*} santo viditavantaś{*1/34*} ca. yathā cakṣuṣā rūpam
GSP28msbh1-7u:91: ucyate - upadeśo{*1/35*} hi vyāmohād api bhavati. asati vyāmohe vedād api
GSP28msbh1-7u:92: bhavati. api ca pauruṣeyād vacanād evam ayaṃ puruṣaḥ vedeti bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:93: pratyayaḥ, na evam ayam artha iti. viplavate khalv api kaścit puruṣakṛtād vacanāt pratyayaḥ. na tu vedavacanasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:94: nanu sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati{*1/36*}. pauruṣeyaṃ vacanaṃ vitatham
GSP28msbh1-7u:96: na, anyatvāt. na hy anyasya vitathabhāve{*1/39*} 'nyasya vaitathyaṃ bhavitum arhati{*1/40*}, anyatvād eva. na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasyāpi śyāmatvaṃ bhavitum arhati. api ca puruṣavacanasādharmyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:97: vedavacanaṃ vitatham{*1/41*} ity anumānam{*1/42*}. pratyakṣas tu vedavacane{*1/43*} pratyayaḥ. na cānumānaṃ pratyakṣavirodhi{*1/44*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:99: evaṃ tarhi śreyaskaro jijñāsitavyaḥ. kiṃ dharmajijñāsayā? ucyate - ya eva śreyaskaraḥ, sa eva dharmaśabdenocyate. katham avagamyate{*1/47*}? yo hi yāgam anutiṣṭhati, taṃ dhārmika iti samācakṣate. yaś ca yasya kartā, sa tena vyapadiśyate{*1/48*}, yathā pācako lāvaka iti. tena yaḥ puruṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:100: niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti, sa eva{*1/49*} dharmaśabdenocyate. na kevalaṃ loke, vede 'pi -
GSP28msbh1-7u:104: ubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate, artho 'narthaś ca. ko 'rthaḥ? yo niḥśreyasāya jyotiṣṭomādiḥ. ko 'narthaḥ? yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyeno vajra iṣur ity evamādiḥ. tatrānartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity arthagrahaṇam{*1/53*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:105: kathaṃ punar asāv anarthaḥ? hiṃsā hi sā, sā ca{*1/54*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:108: vijñāyante. yo hi hiṃsitum icchet, tasyāyam abhyupāya iti hi teṣām upadeśaḥ. śyenenābhicaran yajeteti{*1/57*} hi samāmananti, nābhicaritavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:110: nanv aśaktam idaṃ sūtram imāv arthāv abhivaditum, codanā[6]{*1/58*}lakṣaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:111: dharmo nendriyādilakṣaṇaḥ, arthaś ca dharmo nānartha iti. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyam. tad evaṃ sati
GSP28msbh1-7u:112: ucyate - yatra vākyād evārtho{*1/59*} 'vagamyate, tatraivam. tat tu vaidikeṣu, na sūtreṣu. anyato 'vagate 'rthe sūtram evamartham{*1/60*} ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:113: avagamyate, tena caikadeśaḥ sūtryata iti{*1/61*} sūtram. tatra bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv ity avagantavyam. athavā arthasya sataś
GSP28msbh1-7u:114: codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ucyata{*1/62*} ity ekārtham{*1/63*} eveti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:168: satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:170: idaṃ parīkṣyate - pratyakṣaṃ tāvad animittam. kiṃ kāraṇam? evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ hi tat - satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:171: satīndriyārthasaṃbandhe yā puruṣasya buddhir jāyate, tat pratyakṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:172: bhaviṣyaṃś caiṣo 'rtho na jñānakāle 'sti{*1/65*}. sataś caitad upalambhanam, nāsataḥ. ataḥ pratyakṣam animittam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:173: buddhir vā janma vā saṃnikarṣo veti naiṣāṃ kasyacid avadhāraṇārtham etat
GSP28msbh1-7u:174: sūtram. satīndriyārthasaṃprayoge, nāsatīty etāvad avadhāryate. anekasminn avadhāryamāṇe bhidyeta vākyam. pratyakṣapūrvakatvāc cānumānopamānārthāpattīnām apy akāraṇatvam{*1/66*}. abhāvo 'pi nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:179: autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya jñānam upadeśo 'vyatirekaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:180: cārthe 'nupalabdhe, tat pramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasya, anapekṣatvāt // MS_1,1.5
GSP28msbh1-7u:181: autpattika iti nityaṃ brūmaḥ. utpattir hi{*1/67*} bhāva ucyate lakṣaṇayā.

GSP28msbh1-7u:208: hetuḥ. duṣṭeṣu hi jñānaṃ mithyā bhavati. katham avagamyate? doṣāpagame
GSP28msbh1-7u:210: prayatnenānvicchanto na ced doṣam upalabhemahi{*1/89*}, pramāṇābhāvād aduṣṭam iti manyemahi. tasmād yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ, sa evāsamīcīnaḥ pratyayo nānya iti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:213: viparyasiṣyati{*1/92*}? svapne 'py evam eva supariniścitāsīt prāk{*1/93*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:214: prabodhanāt{*1/94*}. na tatra kaścid viśeṣa iti cet{*1/95*}, na, svapne viparyayadarśanād aviparya[9]{*1/96*}yāc cetarasmin. tatsāmānyād itaratrāpi bhaviṣyatīti cet. yadi pratyayatvāt svapnapratyayasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:215: mithyābhāvaḥ, jāgratpratyayasyāpi bhavitum{*1/97*} arhati. atha pratītis tathābhāvasya hetuḥ{*1/98*}, na śakyate pratyayād ayaṃ{*1/99*} anya iti vaditum{*1/100*}. anyatas tu{*1/101*} svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvo viparyayād avagataḥ. kuta iti cet. sanidrasya manaso daurbalyān nidrā mithyābhāvasya hetuḥ svapnādau svapnānte ca. suṣuptasya pratyayābhāva eva{*1/102*}. acetayan eva hi suṣupta ity ucyate. tasmāj jāgrataḥ pratyayo

GSP28msbh1-7u:217: avagamyeta. svapnadarśanakāle 'pi nāvagamyata iti cet. tan na{*1/104*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:218: prabuddho hy avagacchati - nidrākrāntaṃ me mana āsīd iti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:220: syād{*1/105*} etad evam, yady arthākārā buddhiḥ syāt. nirākārā tu no
GSP28msbh1-7u:222: sa hi{*1/106*} bahirdeśasaṃbaddhaḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyate. arthaviṣayā hi pratyakṣabuddhir na buddhyantaraviṣayā. kṣaṇikā hi sā na buddhyantarakālam avasthāsyata iti{*1/107*}. utpadyamānaivāsau jñāyate jñāpayati

GSP28msbh1-7u:227: buddhāv artho jñāta ity ucyate nānutpannāyām. ataḥ pūrvaṃ buddhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:228: utpadyate, paścāj jñāto 'rthaḥ. satyam. pūrvaṃ buddhir utpadyate, na

GSP28msbh1-7u:236: buddhiḥ. tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣatodṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ ca. tatra{*1/121*} pratyakṣatodṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ yathā dhūmākṛtidarśanād agnyākṛtivijñānam. sāmānyatoḍṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ ca yathā devadattasya gatipūrvikaṃ deśāntaraprāptim upalabhyāditye 'pi{*1/122*} gatismaraṇam.

GSP28msbh1-7u:301: śabdakalpanā ca. tasmād akṣarāṇy eva padam.

GSP28msbh1-7u:305: asaty apy{*1/182*} arthāntara evaṃjātīyake{*1/183*} bhavati pratyayaḥ praṅktiḥ, yūtham, vanam iti yatheti cet, na. asaṃbaddham idaṃ vacanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:306: upanyastam. kim asati vane vanapratyayo bhavatīti pratyakṣam eva ākṣipyate vṛkṣā api na santīti? yady evam, pratyuktaḥ sa [15]{*1/184*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:307: mahāyānikaḥ{*1/185*} pakṣaḥ. atha kim ākṛtisadbhāvavādy upālabhyate siddhāntāntaraṃ te duṣyati{*1/186*}. vane 'pi te 'sati{*1/187*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:308: vanapratyayaḥ prāpnotīti. evam api prakṛtaṃ dūṣayitum aśaknuvantas te
GSP28msbh1-7u:310: asādhakatvāt. sa hi vakṣyati duṣyatu, yadi duṣyati. kiṃ tena duṣṭena
GSP28msbh1-7u:311: aduṣṭena vā prakṛtaṃ tvayā sādhitaṃ bhavati madīyo vā pakṣo dūṣito
GSP28msbh1-7u:312: bhavatīti. na ca vṛkṣavyatiriktaṃ vanaṃ yasmān nopalabhyate, tato{*1/190*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:313: vanaṃ nāstīty avagamyate{*1/191*}. yadi vane 'nyena hetunā sadbhāvaviparītaḥ pratyaya utpadyate, mithyaiṣa{*1/192*} vanapratyaya ity ato{*1/193*} vanaṃ nāstīty avagacchāmaḥ. na ca gavādiṣu pratyayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:314: viparyeti. ato vaiṣamyam. atha vanādiṣu naiva pratyayaviparyāsaḥ{*1/194*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:315: na te na santīti. tasmād asaṃbaddhaḥ paṅktivanopanyāsaḥ, na te na santīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:317: ata upapannaṃ jaiminivacanam ākṛtiḥ padārtha iti{*1/195*}. yathā ca ākṛtiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:319: atha saṃbandhaḥ ka iti? yat śabde vijñāte 'rtho vijñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:320: sa tu kṛtaka{*1/196*} iti pūrvam upapāditam. tasmān manyāmahe kenāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:321: puruṣeṇa śabdānām arthaiḥ saha saṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā saṃvyavahartuṃ{*1/197*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:323: tad idānīm ucyate - apauruṣeyatvāt saṃbandhasya siddham{*1/198*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:324: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate 'pauruṣeya eṣa saṃbandha iti? puruṣasya saṃbandhur abhāvāt. kathaṃ saṃbandhā nāsti? pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya abhāvāt tatpūrvakatvāc cetareṣām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:325: nanu ciravṛttatvāt pratyakṣasya aviṣayo bhaved idānīntanānām. na hi ciravṛttaḥ san na smaryeta. na ca himavadādiṣu kūpārāmādivad asmaraṇaṃ bhavitum arhati. puruṣaviyogo [16]{*1/199*} hi teṣu bhavati deśotsādena kulotsādena vā. na tu{*1/200*} śabdārthavyavahāraviyogaḥ puruṣānām asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:328: na. yadi hi puruṣaḥ kṛtvā saṃbandhaṃ vyavahārayet, vyavahārakāle 'vaśyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:329: smartavyo bhavet{*1/201*}. saṃpratipattau hi kartṛvyavahartror arthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:330: sidhyati, na vipratipattau. na hi vṛddhiśabdena apāṇiner vyavahārata ādaicaḥ pratiyeran pāṇinikṛtim ananumanyamānasya vā. tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:331: makāreṇāpy{*1/202*} apiṅgalasya na sarvagurus trikaḥ pratīyeta piṅgalakṛtim ananumanyamānasya vā. tena kartṛvyavahartārau saṃpratipadyete. tena vedair{*1/203*} vyavaharadbhir avaśyaṃ smaraṇīyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:332: saṃbandhasya kartā syād vyavahārasya ca. na hi vismṛte vṛddhir ādaij ity{*1/204*} asya sūtrasya kartari vṛddhir yasyācām ādis, tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:334: asmaraṇād{*1/208*} avagacchāmaḥ na kṛtvā saṃbandhaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ kenacid
GSP28msbh1-7u:336: yady api ca vismaraṇam upapadyeta, tathāpi na pramāṇam antareṇa saṃbandhāraṃ pratipadyemahi, yathā vidyamānasyāpy anupalambhanaṃ bhavatīti naitāvatā vinā pramāṇena śaśaviṣāṇaṃ pratipadyemahi{*1/209*}. tasmād apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasyārthena saṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:337: nanv arthāpattyā saṃbandhāraṃ pratipadyemahi. na hi akṛtasaṃbandhāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:338: chabdād arthaṃ pratipadyamānam upalabhāmahe. pratipadyeraṃs cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:340: saṃbandhreti manyāmaha iti{*1/210*} cet, na. siddhavad, upadeśāt{*1/211*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:341: yadi saṃbandhur abhāvān niyogato nārthā upalabhyeran{*1/212*}, tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:343: prakāraḥ. vṛddhānāṃ svārthena vyavaharamāṇānām{*1/214*} upaśṛṇvanto bālāḥ pratyakṣam arthaṃ pratipadyamānā dṛśyante. te 'pi vṛddhā yadā bālā āsaṃs,
GSP28msbh1-7u:344: tadānyebhyo vṛddhebhyaḥ, te 'py anyebhya iti nāsty ādir ity evaṃ vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:345: bhavet. athavā na kaścid eko 'pi śabdo 'rthena saṃbaddha āsīt, atha kenacit saṃbandhāḥ pravartitā iti. atra vṛddhavyavahāre sati nārthād āpadyeta saṃbandhasya kārtā. api ca vṛddhavyavahāravādinaḥ pratyakṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:346: upadiśanti, kalpayantītare saṃbandhāram. na ca pratyakṣe pratyarthini kalpanā sādhvī. tasmāt saṃbandhur abhāvaḥ. avyatirekaś ca{*1/215*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:347: yathā asmin deśe sāsnādimati gośabdaḥ, evaṃ sarveṣu durgameṣv api. bahavaḥ saṃbandhāraḥ kathaṃ saṃgamsyante. eko 'pi{*1/216*} na śaknuyāt{*1/217*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:350: na hi saṃbandhavyatiriktaḥ kaścit kālo 'sti, yasmin na kaścid api śabdaḥ kenacid arthena saṃbaddha āsīt. katham? saṃbandhakriyaiva hi{*1/220*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:351: nopapadyate. avaśyam anena saṃbandhaṃ kurvatā kenacic chabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:352: kartavyaḥ{*1/221*}. yena kriyeta, tasya kena kṛtaḥ? athānyena kenacit kṛtaḥ, tasya keneti, tasya keneti{*1/222*} naivāvatiṣṭhate. tasmād avaśyam anena saṃbandhaṃ kurvatā akṛtasaṃbandhāḥ kecana śabdā
GSP28msbh1-7u:353: vṛddhavyavahārasiddhā abhyupagantavyāḥ. asti ced vyavahārasiddhiḥ, na niyogataḥ saṃbandhrā bhavitavyam ity arthāpattir api nāsti. syād etat -
GSP28msbh1-7u:354: aprasiddhasaṃbandhā bālāḥ kathaṃ vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyanta iti. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:355: hi{*1/223*} dṛṣṭe 'nupapannaṃ nāma. dṛṣṭā hi{*1/224*} bālā
GSP28msbh1-7u:360: saṃjñākaraṇam aśakyaṃ ca. viśeṣān pratipattuṃ hi{*1/230*} saṃjñāḥ kriyante viśeṣāṃś coddiśya. tad viśeṣeṣv ajñāyamāneṣūbhayam{*1/231*} apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:361: anavakḷptam. tasmād apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:363: na hy evaṃ{*1/233*} sati puruṣāntaraṃ pratyayāntaraṃ vā{*1/234*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:364: apekṣate{*1/235*}. tasmāc codanālakṣaṇa eva dharmo nānyalakṣaṇaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:366: atha yad uktam animittaṃ śabdaḥ. karmakāle phalādarśanāt kālāntare ca karmābhāvāt pramāṇaṃ nāstīti, tad ucyate - na syāt pramāṇam, yadi pañcaiva pramāṇāny abhaviṣyan. yena yena hi{*1/236*} pramīyate, tat tat pramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:367: śabdenāpi pramīyate, tataḥ{*1/237*} śabdo 'pi pramāṇam, yathaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:368: pratyakṣam. na ca pramāṇena avagatam, pramāṇāntareṇa anavagatam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:369: etāvatānavagataṃ bhavati. na caivaṃ śrūyate kṛte karmaṇi tāvaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:370: eva{*1/238*} phalaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tu karmaṇā{*1/239*} phalaṃ prāpyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:371: yac ca kālāntare phalasya anyat pratyakṣaṃ kāraṇam astīti, naiṣa doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:374: yat tu pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ vacanam upanyastam - sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno
GSP28msbh1-7u:375: 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātīti pratyakṣaṃ śarīraṃ vyapadiśatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:376: tad ucyate - śarīrasaṃbandhāt, yasya tac charīram, so 'pi tair yajñāyudhair yajñāyudhīty ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:378: nanu{*1/241*} prāṇādibhir enam upalabhāmahe. yo 'sau prāṇity apānity ucchvasiti nimiṣatītyādi ceṣṭitavān, so 'tra śarīre yajñāyudhīti. nanu śarīram eva prāṇity apāniti ca? na prāṇādayaḥ śarīraguṇavidharmāṇo hi te{*1/243*}, ayāvaccharīrabhāvitvāt. yāvaccharīraṃ tāvad asya guṇā rūpādayaḥ. prāṇādayas tu saty api śarīre na bhavanti. ato na śarīraguṇāḥ prāṇādayaḥ{*1/244*}. sukhādayaś ca svayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:379: upa[19]{*1/245*}labhyante, na rūpādaya iva śarīraguṇāḥ pareṇāpi. tasmāc charīraguṇavaidharmyād anyaḥ śarīrād yajñāyudhīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:380: āha - kuta eṣaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ sukhādibhyo 'nyas tadvān astīti. na hi sukhādipratyākhyānena tasya svarūpam upalabhāmahe. tasmāc chaśaviṣāṇavad asau nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:381: athocyate - tena vinā kasya sukhādaya iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:382: na kasyacid apīti vakṣyāmaḥ{*1/246*}. na hi yo ya upalabhyate, tasya tasya saṃbandhinā bhavitavyam. yasya saṃbandho 'py upalabhyate saṃbandhī ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:383: tasyāyaṃ saṃbandhīti gamyate. na hi candramasam ādityaṃ vopalabhya saṃbandhyantarānveṣaṇā{*1/247*} bhavati: kasyāyam iti. na kasyacid apīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:384: avadhāryate. tasmān na sukhādibhyo 'nyas tadvān astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:385: athopalabdhasyāvaśyaṃ kalpayitavyaḥ saṃbandhī bhavet{*1/248*}, tata ātmānam apy anena prakāreṇopalabhya kasyāyam iti saṃbandhyantaram anviṣyema 1/249*}. tam api kalpayitvānyam api kalpayitvānyam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:386: anavasthaiva 1/250*} syāt. atha kaṃcit kalpayitvā, na saṃbandhyantaram api
GSP28msbh1-7u:387: kalpayiṣyasi, tāvaty eva viraṃsyasi tāvatā ca paritokṣyasi 1/251*}, tato vijñāna eva parituṣya tāvaty eva virantum arhasi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:388: atrocyate - yadi vijñānād anyo vijñātā{*1/252*} nāsti, kas tarhi jānātīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:390: śabdenopapadyate{*1/255*}. tad eṣa śabdo 'rthavān kartavya iti jñānād
GSP28msbh1-7u:392: āha - devā{*1/256*} enaṃ śabdam arthavantaṃ kalpayiṣyanti, yadi kalpayitavyaṃ maṃsyante{*1/257*}. bahavaḥ khalv iha janā asty ātmā, asty ātmety ātmasattāvādina eva śabdasya pratyakṣavaktāro{*1/258*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:393: [20]{*1/259*} bhavanti, tathāpi nātmasattāṃ kalpayituṃ ghaṭante, kim aṅga punar jānātīti parokṣaśabdadarśanāt. tasmād asad etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:394: ucyate - icchayātmānam{*1/260*} upalabhāmahe. katham? upalabdhapūrve hy abhiprete bhavatīcchā, nānupalabdhapūrve{*1/261*}. yathā merum uttareṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:395: yāny asmajjātīyair anupalabdhapūrvāṇi svādūni vṛkṣaphalāni, na tāni praty
GSP28msbh1-7u:396: asmākam icchā bhavati. no khalv anyena puruṣeṇopalabdhe 'pi viṣaye
GSP28msbh1-7u:398: 'paredyur{*1/263*} icchā. atas{*1/264*} tenopalambhanena samānakartṛkā sety{*1/265*} avagacchāmaḥ. yadi vijñānamātram evedam upalambhakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:400: atha{*1/267*} vijñānād anyo vijñātā nityaḥ, tata ekasmin ahani ya{*1/268*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:401: upalabdhā, aparedyur api sa evaiṣiṣyati. itarathecchānupapannā{*1/269*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:403: atrāha{*1/270*} - anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ? yan na pramāṇenāvagatam. vijñānāt tāvad anyan{*1/271*} nopalabhāmahe. yac
GSP28msbh1-7u:404: ca{*1/272*} nopalabhāmahe, tac chaśaviṣāṇavad eva{*1/273*} nāstīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:405: avagacchāmaḥ. na ca tasmin asati vijñānasadbhāvo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:406: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. kṣaṇikatvaṃ cāsya pratyakṣapūrvakam eva. na ca jñātari vijñānād anyasmin asati jñāne cānitye aparedyur icchānupapannā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:407: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. no khalv apy{*1/274*} etad dṛṣṭaṃ ya evānyedyur
GSP28msbh1-7u:408: upalabdhā, sa evāparedyur{*1/275*} eṣiteti. idaṃ tu dṛṣṭaṃ yat kvacid anyena dṛṣṭam anya icchati, kvacin na. samānāyāṃ santatāv anya icchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:410: atrocyate - na hy asmartāra icchantīty upapadyate. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:414: pūrvavijñānaviṣayaṃ vā smṛtir ity ucyate. tac ca, draṣṭari vinaṣṭe 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:415: aparedyur utpadyamānaṃ nānupapannam, pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. anyasmin skandhaghane 'nyena skandhaghanena yaj jñānam, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:416: tatsantatijenānyenopalabhyate{*1/279*} nātatsantatijena. tasmāc chūnyāḥ skandhaghanā iti. athāsminn arthe{*1/280*} brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:417: vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya, tāny evānuvinaśyati, na pretya saṃjñāstīti{*1/281*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:418: atrocyate{*1/282*} - naitad evam. anyedyur dṛṣṭe 'paredyuḥ - aham idam adarśam iti bhavati pratyayaḥ. pratyagātmani caitad bhavati, na paratra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:419: paro{*1/283*} hy asau yo{*1/284*} 'nyedyur dṛṣṭavān. tasmāt tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti, yatrāyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:420: āha - paratrāpy ahaṃśabdo bhaktyā dṛśyate, tad yathāham{*1/285*} eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:421: putraḥ, aham eva devadattaḥ, aham eva gacchāmīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:422: atrocyate - na vayam “aham” itīmaṃ śabdam, prayujyamānam anyasminn arthe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:423: hetutvena vyapadiśāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi śabdād vyatiriktaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:424: pratyabhijñāpratyayam{*1/286*}. pratīmo hi{*1/287*} vayam - imam arthaṃ vayam evānyedyur upalabhāmahe, vayam evādya smarāma iti. tasmāt - vayam imam artham avagacchāmo vayam eva hyo, vayam evādyeti{*1/288*}. ye
GSP28msbh1-7u:425: cāmī{*1/289*} hyo 'dya ca, na te vinaṣṭāḥ. athāpy asminn arthe brāhmaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:426: bhavati. sa vā ayam ātmeti prakṛtyāmananty aśīryo na hi śīryata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:427: tathāvināśī vā are 'yam ātmā, anucchittidharmā iti{*1/290*}. vinaśvaraṃ ca vijñānam. tasmād vinaśvarād anyaḥ sa{*1/291*} ity [22]{*1/292*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:428: avagacchāmaḥ. na ca śakyam evam avagantum, yathopalabhyante 'rthā na tathā bhavanti, yathā, na khalu, nopalabhyante tathā bhavantīti. tathā hi sati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:429: śaśo nāsti, śaśasya viṣāṇam astīty avagamyeta{*1/293*}. na cāhampratyayo vyāmoha iti śakyate vaktum, bādhakapratyayābhāvāt. tasmāt sukhādibhyo vyatirikto 'sti. evaṃ cet, sa eva yajñāyudhīti vyapadiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:430: āha - yadi vijñānād anyad asti vijñātṛ, vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām -
GSP28msbh1-7u:431: idam tad īdṛśam ceti. na ca tan nidarśyate. tasmān na tato 'nyad astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:432: atrocyate - svasaṃvedyaḥ sa bhavati. nāsāv anyena śakyate draṣṭum. katham asau nidarśyeteti{*1/294*}. yathā ca{*1/295*} kaścic cakṣuṣmān svayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:433: rūpaṃ paśyati na ca śaknoty anyasmai jātyandhāya tan nidarśayitum, na ca tan na śakyate nidarśayitum ity etāvatā nāstīty avagamyate, evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na cānyasmai śaknoti darśayitum, anyasya draṣṭus taṃ puruṣaṃ prati darśanaśaktyabhāvāt. so 'py anyaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:434: ātmānam upalabhate, na parātmānam{*1/296*}. tena sarve svena svenātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santy eva, yady api parapuruṣair
GSP28msbh1-7u:435: nopalabhyanta{*1/297*} iti. athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ? ātmajyotiḥ, saṃrāḍ iti hovāceti{*1/298*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:436: pareṇa nopalabhyata ity atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - agṛhyo na hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:437: gṛhyateti{*1/299*}. pareṇa na gṛhyata ity etadabhiprāyam etat. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:438: svayaṃjyotiṣṭvavacanāt. atrāpi{*1/300*} brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃjyotir bhavatīti{*1/301*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:439: kena punar upāyenāyam (ayam){*1/302*} anyasmai kathyata iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:440: atrāpy{*1/303*} upāye [23]{*1/304*}brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - sa eṣa neti nety ātmeti hovāceti{*1/305*}. asāv ayam{*1/306*} evaṃrūpa iti na śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:441: nidarśayitum. yac ca paraḥ paśyati, tatpratiṣedhas tasyopadeśopāyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:442: śarīraṃ paraḥ paśyati. tenātmopadiśyate. śarīraṃ nātmā. asti śarīrād anyaḥ{*1/307*} sa cātmeti śarīrapratiṣedhenātmopadiśyate{*1/308*}. tathā prāṇādayo nātmāna iti{*1/309*} tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:443: tathā parasthāḥ sukhādayaḥ pareṇa liṅgair upalabhyante. te 'pi nātmāna iti tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo{*1/310*} 'nya upadiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:444: yaḥ svayaṃ paśyati, na tato 'nyaḥ puruṣa ity etad api
GSP28msbh1-7u:445: puruṣapravṛttyānumīyate, yadāsau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca yatate, ataḥ{*1/311*} pravṛttyāvagamyate nūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchatīti{*1/312*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:446: upamānāc copadiśyate yādṛśaṃ bhavān svayam ātmānaṃ paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:447: anenopamānenāvagaccha - aham api tādṛṣam eva paśyāmīti, yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣīta - dahyamānasyeva me bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:448: yātyamānasyeva me bhavati, rudhyamānasyeva{*1/313*} me bhavatīti. ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:449: yad apy{*1/314*} ucyate - vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām iti, yady upāyam eva niśedhasi, na śakyam upāyam antareṇopeyam upetum. ayam evābhyupāyo jñātavyānām arthānāṃ yo yathā jñāyate, sa tatheti. tad yathā - kaḥ śuklo nāma? yatra śuklatvam asti. kiṃ śuklatvaṃ nāma? yatra śuklaśabdapravṛttiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:450: kva tasya pravṛttiḥ? yac chuklaśabda uccarite pratīyate. tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:451: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati. apratīte
GSP28msbh1-7u:452: 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva. na hi vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:453: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣa ity etat pūrvam evoktam. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:454: avaśyakarta[24]{*1/315*}vye 'pahnave kāmaṃ vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy{*1/316*} uktam eva. tasmād asti sukhādibhyo 'nyo nityaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:455: atha yad uktaṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati, na pretya saṃjñāstīti, atrocyate - atraiva mā bhagavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:457: mohāntābhiprāyam{*1/318*} asya vacanasya{*1/319*} varṇitavān na vā are
GSP28msbh1-7u:458: 'haṃ{*1/320*} mohaṃ bravīmi, avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchittidharmā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:459: mātrāsaṃsargas tv asya bhavatīti{*1/321*}. tasmān na vijñānamātram. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:461: yad uktam - na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda iti, mā bhūd vidhiśabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:462: svargakāmo yajeteti vacanāntareṇāvagatam anuvadiṣyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ.

GSP28msbh1-7u:731: uktam - nityaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandha iti. tad anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:732: śabdasyānityatvāt. vinaṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ, punar asya kriyamāṇasyārthenākṛtakaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:733: saṃbandho nopapadyate. na hi prathamaśrutāc chabdāt kaścid arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:734: pratyeti. kathaṃ punar anityaḥ śabdaḥ. prayatnād uttarakālaṃ dṛśyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:735: yataḥ. ataḥ prayatnānantaryāt tena kriyata iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:736: nanv abhivyañjyāt sa enam. neti brūmaḥ. na hy asya prāg abhivyañjanāt sadbhāve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti. saṃś cābhivyajyate nāsan.
GSP28msbh1-7u:738: no{*1/322*} khalv apy uccaritaṃ muhūrtam apy upalabhāmahe. ato vinaṣṭa ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:739: avagacchāmaḥ. na ca san nopalabhyate. anupalaṃbhakāraṇānāṃ vyavadhānādīnām abhāve 'py anupalambhanāt. na cāsau viṣayam aprāptaḥ, ākāśāviṣayatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:742: *{1/322: E1 gibt als v.l.: na cainam uccaritaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:744: api ca śabdaṃ kuru, mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate, na te nūnam avagacchanti sa evāyaṃ śabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:746: nānādeśeṣu ca yugapac chabdam upalabhāmahe, tad ekasya nityasyānupapannam
GSP28msbh1-7u:747: iti. asati viśeṣe nityasya nānekatvam. kāryāṇāṃ tu bahūnāṃ nānādeśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate 'nekadeśasaṃbandhaḥ. tasmād apy anityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:749: api ca dadhyatrety atrekāraḥ prakṛtiḥ, yakāro vikṛtir ity upapadiśanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:750: yad vikriyate, tad anityam. ikārasādṛśyaṃ ca yakārasyopalabhyate, tenāpi tayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvo
GSP28msbh1-7u:752: api ca bahubhir uccārayadbhir mahān śabdaḥ śrūyate. sa yady abhivyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:753: bahubhir alpaiś coccāryamāṇas tāvān evopalabhyeta. ato manyāmahe nūnam
GSP28msbh1-7u:754: asyaikaikena kaścid avayavaḥ kriyate, yat pracayād ayaṃ mahān upalabhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:757: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. yad{*1/324*} uktam - prayatnād uttarakāle darśanāt kṛtako 'yam iti{*1/325*}. yadi vispaṣṭena hetunā śabdasya nityatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakṣyāmaḥ, tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt prayatnenābhivyajyata iti bhaviṣyati. yadi prāg uccāraṇād anabhivyaktaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:758: prayatnenābhivyajyate. tasmād ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:763: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - uccaritapradhvasta iti{*1/326*}. atrāpi yadi śakṣyāmo nityatām asya vispaṣṭaṃ vaktum, tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt kadācid upalambhaṃ kadācid anupalambhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid upalambhasya nimittaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ. tac ca saṃyogavibhāgasadbhāve sati bhavatīti saṃyogavibhāgāv evābhivyañjakāv iti vakṣyāmaḥ. uparatayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ śrūyata iti cet. naitad evam. na nūnam uparamanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:764: saṃyogavibhāgāḥ, yata upalabhyate śabda iti. na hi te pratyakṣā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:765: yadi śabdaṃ saṃyogavibhāgā evābhivyañjanti na kurvanti, ākāśaviṣayatvāc chabdasyākāśasyaikatvād ya evāyam atra śrotrākāśaḥ, sa eva deśāntareṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:768: yasya punaḥ kurvanti, tasya vāyavīyāḥ saṃyogavibhāgā vāyvāśritatvād vāyuṣv eva kariṣyanti, yathā tantavas tantuṣv eva paṭam. tasya pāṭaliputreṣv anupalambho yuktaḥ, śrughnasthatvāt teṣām. yasyāpy abhivyañjanti, tasyāpy eṣa na doṣaḥ, dūre satyāḥ karṇaśaṣkulyā anupakārakāḥ saṃyogavibhāgāḥ, tena dūre yac chrotraṃ tena nopalabhyata iti. naitad evam. aprāptāś cet [28]{*1/328*}saṃyogavibhāgāḥ śrotrasyopakuryuḥ. saṃnikṛṣṭavikṛṣṭadeśasthau yugapac chabdam upalabheyātām. na ca yugapad upalabhete. tasmān nāprāptā upakurvanti. na ced upakurvanti{*1/329*}, tasmād animittaṃ śabdopalambhane
GSP28msbh1-7u:770: naitad evam. abhighātena hi preritā vāyavas timitāni{*1/330*} vāyvantarāṇi pratibādhamānāḥ sarvatodikkān saṃyogavibhāgān utpādayanti. yāvad vegam abhipratiṣṭhante. te ca vāyor apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogavibhāgā nopalabhyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:771: anuparateṣv eva teṣu śabda upalabhyate noparateṣu. ato na doṣaḥ. ata eva cānuvātaṃ dūrād upalabhyate śabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:778: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - śabdaṃ kuru mā kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:779: prayuñjate{*1/331*}. yady asaṃśayaṃ nityaḥ śabdaḥ, śabdaprayogaṃ kurv iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:780: bhaviṣyati, yathā gomayāt{*1/332*} kurv iti saṃhāre{*1/333*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:784: *{1/333: E1,5; E2,6: saṃvāhe (E1 gibt saṃvāhe als Fn.)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:786: yat tv ekadeśasya{*1/334*} sato nānādeśeṣu yugapad darśanam anupapannam iti{*1/335*}. ādityaṃ paśya devānāṃpriya. ekaḥ sann anekadeśāv asthita iva lakṣyate. kathaṃ punar avagamyata eka āditya iti. ucyate - prāṅmukho devadattaḥ pūrvāhne saṃprati purastād ādityaṃ paśyati. tasya dakṣiṇato 'vasthito na dvau paśyati, ātmanaś ca saṃprati na tiraścīnaṃ{*1/336*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:787: devadattasyārjave. [28]{*1/337*} tasmād eka āditya iti. dūratvād asya deśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:788: nāvadhāryate. ato vyāmohaḥ. evaṃ śabde 'pi vyāmohād anavadhāraṇaṃ deśasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:789: yadi śrotraṃ saṃyogavibhāgadeśam āgatya śabdaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, tathāpi tāvad anekadeśatā kadācid avagamyeta. na ca tatsaṃyogadeśam āgacchati. pratyakṣā hi karṇaśaṣkulī taddeśā
GSP28msbh1-7u:790: gṛhyate. vāyavīyāḥ punaḥ saṃyogavibhāgā apratyakṣasya vāyoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:791: karṇaśaṣkulīpradeśe prādurbhavanto nopalabhyanta iti nānupapannam. ata eva vyāmoho yan nānādeśeṣu śabda iti. ākāśadeśaś ca śabda iti. ekaṃ ca punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:793: api caikarūpye sati deśabhedena kāmaṃ deśā eva bhinnāḥ, na tu śabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:798: *{1/336: E2: saṃprati sthitaṃ tiraścīnaṃ (E1 gibt: saṃpratisthite tiraścīnaṃ als Fn.)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:800: na ca dadhyatrety{*1/338*} atra prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. śabdāntaram ikārād yakāraḥ. na hi yakāraṃ prayuñjānā ikāram upādadate, yathā kaṭaṃ cikrīrṣanto vīraṇāni. na ca sādṛśyamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prakṛtir vikṛtir vocyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:801: na hi dādhipiṭakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kundapiṭakaṃ ca prakṛtivikārabhāvo 'vagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:806: yac caitad bahubhir bherīm ādhmanadbhiḥ{*1/340*} śabdam{*1/341*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:807: uccārayadbhir mahāñ śabda upalabhyate, tena pratipuruṣaṃ śabdāvayavapracaya iti gamyate{*1/342*}. naivam. niravayavo hi śabdaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:808: avayavabhedānavagamān niravayavatvāc ca mahattvānupapattiḥ. ato na vardhate śabdaḥ. mṛdur ekena [29]{*1/343*} bahubhiś coccāryamāṇe tāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:809: evākṣarāṇi karṇaśaṣkulīmaṇḍalasya sarvāṃ nemiṃ vyāpnuvadbhiḥ saṃyogavibhāgair nairantaryeṇānekaśo grahaṇān mahān ivāvayavavān ivopalabhyante. saṃyogavibhāgā nairantaryeṇa kriyamāṇāḥ śabdam abhivyañjanto nādaśabdavācyāḥ. tena nādasyaiṣā vṛddhiḥ, na śabdasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:815: nityas tu syād darśanasya parārthatvāt // MS_1,1.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:816: nityaḥ śabdo bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ? darśanasya parārthatvāt. darśanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:817: uccāraṇam, tat parārthaṃ param arthaṃ pratyāyayitum. uccaritamātre hi vinaṣṭe śabde na cānyo 'nyān arthaṃ pratyāyayituṃ śaknuyāt. ato na parārtham uccāryeta. atha na vinaṣṭaḥ, tato bahuśa upalabdhatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:818: arthāvagama iti yuktam. arthavat sādṛśyād arthāvagama iti cet. na kaścid arthavān, sarveṣāṃ navatvāt. kasyacit pūrvasya kṛtrimaḥ saṃbandho{*1/344*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:819: bhaviṣyatīti cet. tad uktaṃ sadṛśa iti cāvagate vyāmohāt pratyayo vyāvarteta mālāśabdān mālāpratyaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:820: yathā gāvīśabdāt sāsnādim iti pratyayasyānivṛttiḥ, tadvad bhaviṣyatīti cet. na hi gośabdaṃ tatroccārayitum icchā. nehānyaśabdoccicārayiṣā. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:822: śakyate{*1/347*} kartum. tasmād darśanasya parārthatvāt, nityaḥ śabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:825: *{1/345: E1,6; E2 (richtig): śālāśabdān mālāpratyaya iva, E5: śālāśabdān
GSP28msbh1-7u:830: gośabda uccarite sarvagavīṣu yugapat pratyayo bhavati. ata ākṛtivacano 'yam. na cākṛtyā śabdasya saṃbandhaḥ śakyate kartum. nirdiśya hy ākṛtiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:831: kartā saṃbadhnīyāt. gopiṇḍe ca bahūnām ākṛtīnāṃ sadbhāvāc chabdam antareṇa gośabdavācyāṃ vibhaktām ākṛtiṃ kena prakāreṇopadekṣyati? nitye tu sati
GSP28msbh1-7u:832: gośabde bahukṛtva [30]{*1/348*} uccaritaḥ śrutapūrvaś cānyāsu govyaktiṣv anvayavyatirekābhyām ākṛtivacanam avagamiṣyati. tasmād api nityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:835: aṣṭakṛtvo gośabda uccarita iti vadanti, nāṣṭau gośabdā iti. kim ato, yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:836: evam. anena vacanenāvagamyate, pratyabhijānantīti{*1/349*}. vayaṃ tāvat pratyabhijānīmo na naḥ karaṇadaurbalyam. evam anye 'pi pratyabhijānanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:837: sa evāyam iti. pratyabhijānānā{*1/350*} vayam ivānye 'pi nānya iti vaktum
GSP28msbh1-7u:839: atha matam anyatve sati sādṛśyena vyāmūḍhāḥ sa iti vakṣyanti. tan na. na hi te sadṛśa iti pratiyanti, kiṃ tarhi sa evāyam iti. vidite ca sphuṭe
GSP28msbh1-7u:840: 'nyatve vyāmoha iti gamyate. na cāyam anya iti praty-akṣam anyad vā pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:841: syād etat - buddhikarmaṇī api te pratyabhijñāyete. te 'pi nitye prāpnutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:842: naiṣa doṣaḥ. na hi te pratyakṣe. atha pratyakṣe nitye eva{*1/351*}. hy astanasya śabdasya vināśād anyo 'dyatana iti cet. naiṣa vinaṣṭaḥ, yata enaṃ punar upalabhāmahe. na hi pratyakṣadṛṣṭaṃ muhūrtam adṛṣṭvā punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:843: upalabhyamānaṃ pratyabhijānanto vinaṣṭaṃ parikalpayanti. parikalpayanto dvitīyasaṃdarśane mātari, jāyāyāṃ pitari vā nāśvasyuḥ. na hy anupalambhamātreṇa nāstīty avagamya naṣṭa ity eva kalpayanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:844: apramāṇatāyāṃ viditāyāṃ nāstīty avagacchāmaḥ. na hi pramāṇe pratyakṣe saty apramāṇatā syāt. astīti punar avyāmohenāvagamyamāne na kvacid apy abhāvaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:845: na cāsiddhe 'bhāve vyāmohaḥ, na ca siddho 'bhāvaḥ. tasmād asati vyāmohe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:846: nābhāvaḥ{*1/352*}. tad e[31]{*1/353*}tad ānupūrvyā siddham. tasmāt purastād anuccāritam anupalabhamānā api na vinaṣṭa ity avagantum arhanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:847: yathā{*1/354*} gṛhān nirgatāḥ sarvagṛhajanam apaśyantaḥ punaḥ praviśyopalabhamānā api na prāk praveśād vinaṣṭa ity avagacchanti. tadvad enam api nānya iti vaktum arhanti. ye 'pi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:848: vināśam abhyupagacchanti, te 'pi na śaknuvanti śabdasya vaditum. ante hi kṣayadarśanāt te manyante. na ca śabdasyānto na ca kṣayo lakṣyate. sa iti pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ sadṛśa ity ānumānikaḥ. na ca pratyakṣaviruddham
GSP28msbh1-7u:849: anumānam udeti. svakāryaṃ vā sādhayati. tasmān nityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:852: *{1/350: E1,5; E2, E1 (Fn.), E6: pratyabhijānānāḥ pratyabhijānanti ced
GSP28msbh1-7u:855: *{1/352: E5: tasmād avyāmohaḥ. sati cāvyāmohe nābhāvāḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:858: yeṣām anavagatotpattīnāṃ dravyāṇāṃ bhāva eva lakṣyate, teṣām api keṣāṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:859: anityatā gamyate, yeṣāṃ vināśakāraṇam upalabhyate. yathābhinavaṃ paṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā, na caivaṃ kriyamāṇam upalabdhavān, athavānityatvam avagacchati rūpam eva dṛṣṭvā, tantuvyatiṣaṅgajanito 'yaṃ tantuvyatiṣaṅgavināśāt tantuvināśād vā vinaśyatīty avagacchati. naivaṃ śabdasya kiṃcit kāraṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:862: idaṃ padebhyaḥ kebhyaścid uttaraṃ sūtram. nanu vāyukāraṇakaḥ syād iti vāyur udgataḥ saṃyogavibhāgaiḥ śabdo bhavatīti. tathā ca śikṣākārā āhuḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:863: vāyur āpadyate śabdatām iti{*1/355*}. naitad evam. vāyavīyaś cec chabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:864: bhaved, vāyoḥ saṃniveśaviśeṣaḥ syāt. na ca vāyavīyān avayavāñ śabde sataḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:865: pratyabhijānīmo yathā paṭasya tantumayān. na caivaṃ bhavati. syāc ced evam, sparśa-ne[32]{*1/356*}nopalabhemahi. na ca vāyavīyān avayavāñ śabdagatān spṛśāmaḥ. tasmān na vāyukāraṇakaḥ. ato nityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:867: *{1/355: Quelle nicht nachweisbar. Vgl. aber Nāradaśikṣā 1.5.8-10}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:869: liṅgaṃ caiva bhavati, vācā virūpanityayeti{*1/357*}. anyaparaṃ hīdaṃ vākyaṃ vāco nityatām anuvadati. tasmān nityaḥ śabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:873: yady apy autpattiko nityaḥ śabdo arthasaṃbandhaś ca{*1/359*}, tathāpi na codanālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ. codanā hi vākyam. na hy agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity ato vākyād anyatamāt{*1/360*} padād agnihotrāt svargo
GSP28msbh1-7u:874: bhavatīti gamyate. gamyate tu padatraya uccarite. na cātra caturthaḥ śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:875: 'sty anyad ataḥ padatrayasamudāyāt. na cāyaṃ samudāyo 'sti loke, yato 'sya
GSP28msbh1-7u:876: vyavahārād artho 'vagamyate. padāny amūni prayuktāni, teṣāṃ nityo 'rthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:877: aprayuktaś ca samudāyaḥ. tasmāt samudāyasyārthaḥ kṛtrimo vyāmoho vā. na ca padārthā eva vākyārthaḥ. sāmānye hi padaṃ pravartate, viśeṣe vākyam. anyac ca sāmānyam, anyo viśeṣaḥ. na ca padārthād vākyārthāvagatiḥ, asaṃbandhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:878: asati cet saṃbandhe kasmiṃścit padārthe 'vagate 'rthāntaram avagamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:879: ekasminn avagate sarvam avagataṃ syāt. na caitad evaṃ bhavati. tasmād anyo vākyārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:880: syād etat - aprayuktād api vākyād asati saṃbandhe svabhāvād arthāvagama
GSP28msbh1-7u:881: iti. yadi kalpyeta - śabdo dharmam ātmīyaṃ vyutkrāmet. na caiṣa śabdadharmo yad aprayuktād api śabdārthaḥ pratīyate. na hi [33]{*1/361*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:882: prathamaśrutāt kutaścic chabdāt kecid arthaṃ pratiyanti. tad abhidhīyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:883: padadharmo 'yaṃ na vākyadharmaḥ. vākyād dhi prathamāvagatād api pratiyanto 'rthaṃ dṛśyante. naitad evam. yadi prathamaśrutād avagaccheyuḥ, api tarhi sarve 'vagaccheyuḥ padārthavido 'nye ca. na tv apadārthavido 'vagacchanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:884: tasmān naitad evam. nanu padārthavadbhir apy avagacchadbhir akṛta eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:885: vākyārthasaṃbandho bhaviṣyati. padārthavedanena hi saṃskṛtā avagamiśyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:886: yathā tam eva padārthaṃ dvitīyādiśravaṇeneti. neti brūmaḥ. yadi vākye 'ntyo varṇaḥ pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārasahitaḥ padārthebhyo 'rthāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:887: pratyāyayati, upakāras tu tadānīṃ{*1/362*} padārthajñānād avakalpate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:888: tasmāt kṛtrimo vākyārthapratyayo vyāmoho vā. na padārthadvāreṇa saṃbhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:889: vākyārthajñānam iti. nanv evaṃ bhaviṣyati sāmānyavācinaḥ padasya gaur{*1/363*} iti vāśva iti vā, viśeṣakaṃ śukla iti vā kṛṣṇa iti vā padam antikād upanipatati yadā, tadā vākyārtho 'vagamyate. tan na. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:890: hi{*1/364*} katham iva gaur iti vāśva iti vā sāmānyavācinaḥ padāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:891: sarvagavīṣu sarvāśveṣu ca buddhir upasarpantī śrutijanitā, vākyānurodhena kutaścid viśeṣād apavarteta. na ca śukla ityāder viśeṣavacanasya kṛṣṇādi-nivṛttir bhavati śabdārthaḥ. na cānarthako mā bhūd ity arthaparikalpanā śakyā. ato na padārthajanito vākyārthaḥ. tasmāt kṛtrimaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:892: padasaṃghātāḥ khalv ete saṃghātāś ca puruṣakṛtā dṛśyante, yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:899: *{1/360: E1; E2 (besser): anyatamāt, E5: ekasmāt, E6: anyatamasmāt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:905: tad bhūtānaṃ kriyārthena samāmnāyo 'rthasya tannimittatvāt // MS_1,1.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:908: vākyam arthāntaraprasiddham. kutaḥ. pramāṇābhāvāt. na kiṃcana pramāṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:909: asti yena pramimīmahe. na hy anapekṣitapadārthasya vākyāntyavarṇasya pūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārarahitasya śaktir asti padārthebhyo 'rthāntare
GSP28msbh1-7u:911: nanv arthāpattir asti, yat padārthavyatiriktam artham avagacchāmaḥ. na ca śaktim antareṇa tad avakalpyata iti. tan na. arthasya tannimittatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:912: bhaved arthāpattiḥ, yady asatyām api śaktau nānyan nimittam avakalpyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:913: avagamyate tu nimittam. kim? padārthāḥ. padāni hi svaṃ svaṃ padārtham abhidhāya nivṛttavyāpārāṇi. athedānīṃ padārthā avagatāḥ santo vākyārthaṃ gamayanti. katham. yatra hi śukla iti vā kṛṣṇa iti vā guṇaḥ pratīte
GSP28msbh1-7u:914: bhavati. bhavati khalv asāvalaṃ guṇavati pratyayam ādhātum. tena guṇavati pratyayam icchantaḥ kevalaṃ guṇavacanam uccārayanti. saṃpatsyata eṣāṃ yathāsaṃkalpito 'bhiprāyaḥ. bhaviṣyati viśiṣṭārthasaṃpratyayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:915: viśiṣṭārthasaṃpratyayaś ca vākyārthaḥ. evaṃ ced avagamyate 'nyata eva vākyārthaḥ ko jātucid adṛṣṭā padasamudāyasya śaktir arthād avagamyata iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:916: vadiṣyati. api cānvayavyatirekābhyām etad avagamyate, bhavati hi kadācid
GSP28msbh1-7u:917: iyam avasthā, mānasād apy ādhātāt{*1/371*}. yad uccaritebhyaḥ{*1/372*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:918: padebhyo na padārthā avadhāryante. tadānīṃ{*1/373*} niyogato vākyārthaṃ nāvagaccheyuḥ. yady asya [35]{*1/374*} apārthagarthyam{*1/375*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:919: abhaviṣyat. niyogatas tu nāvagacchanti. api cāntareṇāpi padoccāraṇaṃ yaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:920: śauktyam{*1/376*} avagacchati, avagacchaty evāsau śuklaguṇakam. tasmāt padārthapratyaya eva vākyārthaḥ. nāsya padasamudāyena saṃbandhaḥ. yat tu -
GSP28msbh1-7u:921: śrautaḥ padārtho na vākyānurodhena kutaścid viśeṣād apavartitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:922: arhatīti{*1/377*}. satyam, evam etat{*1/378*}. yatra kevalaḥ padārthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:923: prayujyamānaḥ prayojanābhāvād anarthakaḥ saṃjāyata ity avagataṃ bhavati tatra vākyārtho 'pi tāvad bhavatv iti viśiṣṭārthatāvagamyate, na sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:924: evaṃ ca sati, guṇāntarapratiṣedho na śabdārtha ity{*1/379*} etad api parihṛtaṃ bhavati. api ca prātipadikād uccarantī dvitīyādivibhaktiḥ prātipadikārtho viśeṣaka ity āha. sā ca viśeṣaśrutiḥ sāmānyaśrutiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:925: bādheta. yac caite padasaṃghātāḥ puruṣakṛtā dṛśyanta iti{*1/380*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:926: parihṛtaṃ tad asmaraṇādibhiḥ{*1/381*}. api caivaṃjātīyake 'rthe vākyāni saṃhartuṃ na kiṃcana puruṣāṇaṃ bījam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:928: *{1/368: E2 om. padānāṃ, E1 gibt es geklammert, E5,6 ungeklammert}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:942: laukikeṣu punar artheṣu pratyakṣeṇārtham upalabhya sanniyamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:943: sannibandhanaṃ śakyaṃ tatra saṃhartum, evaṃjātīyakāni vākyāni nīlotpalavaneṣv adya iti{*1/382*}. tasmād agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity etebhya eva padebhyo ye 'rthā avagatāḥ, tebhyo evaitad avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:944: agnihotrāt svargo bhavatīti. padebhya eva padārthapratyayaḥ, padārthebhyo vākyārtha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:947: uktam - codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti{*1/384*}, yato na puruṣakṛtaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:948: śabdasyārthena saṃbandhaḥ. tatra padavākyāśraya ākṣepaḥ parihṛtaḥ. idānīm
GSP28msbh1-7u:949: anyathākṣepsyāmaḥ. pauruṣeyāś codanā iti vadāmaḥ, saṃnikṛṣṭakālāḥ kṛtakā vedā idānīṃ tanāḥ, te ca codanānāṃ samūhāḥ, tatra pauruṣeyāś ced vedāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:950: asaṃśayaṃ pauruṣeyāś codanāḥ. kathaṃ punaḥ kṛtakā vedā iti kecin manyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:951: yataḥ puruṣākhyāḥ puruṣeṇa hi samākhyāyante vedāḥ - kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:952: paippalādakaṃ mauhulam{*1/385*} iti. na hi saṃbandhād ṛte samākhyānam, na ca puruṣasya śabdenāsti{*1/386*} saṃbandhaḥ, anyataḥ{*1/387*} kartā puruṣaḥ kāryaḥ śabda iti. nanu pravacanalakṣaṇā samākhyā syāt. neti
GSP28msbh1-7u:953: brūmaḥ. asādhāraṇaṃ hi viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, eka eva hi kartā bahavo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:954: prabrūyuḥ. ato 'smaryamāṇo 'pi codanāyāḥ kartā syāt. tasmān na pramāṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:958: *{1/385: E1,6; E2 om. mauhulam, E5: maudgalam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:960: *{1/387: E1,6, E6: saṃbandho 'nyataḥ; E2: saṃbandho yad ataḥ. E5:
GSP28msbh1-7u:963: jananamaraṇavantaś ca vedārthāḥ śrūyante. babaraḥ prāvāhaṇir akāmayata{*1/388*}, kusuruvinda auddālakir akāmayata{*1/389*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:964: ityevamādyaḥ. uddālakasyāpatyaṃ gamyata auddālakiḥ, yady evam, prāg
GSP28msbh1-7u:965: auddālakijanmanaḥ, nāyaṃ grantho bhūtapūrvaḥ. evam apy anityatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:970: uktam asmābhiḥ śabdapūrvatvam adhyetṝṇām{*1/391*}. kevalam ākṣepaparihāro vaktavyaḥ, so
GSP28msbh1-7u:974: yad uktam - kartṛlakṣaṇā samākhyā kāṭhakādyeti. tad ucyate - neyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:975: arthāpattiḥ, akartṛbhir api hy enām ācakṣīran, prakarṣeṇa vacanam (ananyasādhāraṇaṃ){*1/392*} kaṭhādibhir anuṣṭhitaṃ syāt, tathāpi hi samākhyātāro bhavanti. smaryate ca vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ sarvaśākhādhyāyī, kaṭhaḥ punar imāṃ kevalāṃ śākhām adhyāpayāṃ babhūveti. sa bahuśākhādhyāyināṃ saṃnidhāv ekaśākhādhyāyy anyāṃ śākhām anadhīyānaḥ, tasyāṃ prakṛṣṭatvād asādhāraṇam upapadyate viśeṣaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:977: *{1/392: E2,6, in E2 geklammert; E5 om}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:979: yac ca prāvāhaṇir iti. tan na, pravāhaṇasya puruṣasyāsiddhatvān na
GSP28msbh1-7u:980: pravāhaṇasyāpatyaṃ prāvāhāniḥ. praśabdaḥ prakarṣe siddhaḥ, vahatiś ca prāpaṇe. (na tv asya samudāyaḥ kvacit siddhaḥ.){*1/393*} ikāras tu yathaivāpatye siddhas tathā kriyāyām api kartari. tasmād yaḥ pravāhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:981: sa prāvāhaṇiḥ. babara iti śabdānukṛtiḥ. tena yo nityārthas tam evaitau śabdau vadiṣyataḥ. ata uktam - paraṃ tu śrutisāmānyamātram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:984: kṛte vā viniyogaḥ syāt karmaṇaḥ saṃbandhāt // MS_1,1.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:985: atha katham avagamyate nāyam unmattabālavākyasadṛśa iti. tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:986: [38]{*1/394*} hi paśyāmaḥ - vanaspatayaḥ satram āsata, sarpāḥ satram āsata
GSP28msbh1-7u:987: iti. yathā - jarad gavo gāyati mattakāni, kathaṃ nāma jarad gavo gāyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:988: kathaṃ vā vanaspatayaḥ sarpā vā satram āsīrann iti. ucyate - viniyuktaṃ hi dṛśyate, paraspareṇa saṃbandhārtham. katham. jyotiṣṭoma ity abhidhāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:989: kartavya ity ucyate. kenety ākāṅkṣite someneti. kim artham iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:990: svargāyeti. katham iti. ittham, (anayeti kartavyatayā){*1/395*} iti. evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:991: avagacchantaḥ, padārthair ebhiḥ saṃskṛtaṃ piṇḍitaṃ vākyārthaṃ katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:993: nanv anupapannam idaṃ dṛśyate - vanaspatayaḥ satram āsata ityevamādi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:994: nānupapannam. na, anena agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity evamādayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:995: 'nupapannāḥ syuḥ. api ca vanaspatayaḥ satram āsata ityevamādayo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:996: nānupapannāḥ, stutayo hy etāḥ satrasya, vanaspatayo nāmācetanā idaṃ satram
GSP28msbh1-7u:997: upāsitavantaḥ, kiṃ punar vṛddhāṃso brāhmaṇāḥ. tad yathā loke - sandhyāyāṃ mṛgā api na caranti, kiṃ punar vidvāṃso brāhmaṇā iti. api cāvigītaḥ suhṛdupadeśaḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ katham ivāśaṅketonmattabālavākyasadṛśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1001: āmnāyasya kriyārthatvād ānarthakyam atadarthānāṃ tasmād anityam ucyate //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1002: so 'rodīd yad arodīt, tad rudrasya rudratvam{*1/397*}; prajāpatir ātmano vapām udakhidat{*1/398*}. devā vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1003: prājānan{*1/399*} ityevamādīni samāmnātāraḥ samāmananti vākyāni. tāni kiṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ pramimate uta neti bhavati vicāraṇā. tad abhidhīyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1004: kriyā katham anuṣṭheyeti tāṃ vadituṃ{*1/400*} samāmnātāro vākyāni samāmananti. tad yāni vākyāni kriyāṃ nāvagamayanti kriyāsaṃbaddhaṃ vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1005: kiṃcit, evam eva bhūtam artham anvācakṣate - ruditavān rudraḥ; vapām uccikheda prajāpatiḥ; devā vai diśo na prajajñira ityevaṃjātīyakāni, tāni kaṃ dharmaṃ pramimīran. athocyeta - adhyāhāreṇa vā vipariṇāmena vā vyavahitakalpanayā vā vyavadhāraṇakalpanayā vā guṇakalpanayā vā kaścid arthaḥ kalpāyiṣyata iti. sa kalpyamānaḥ kaḥ kalpyeta - rudraḥ kila ruroda,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1007: 'py utkhided ātmano vapām. devā vai devayajanakāle diśo na prajñātavantaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1008: ato 'nyo 'pi diśo na prajānīyād iti, tac cāśakyam, iṣṭaviyogenābhighātena vā yad bāṣpanirmocanam, tad rodanam ity ucyate, na ca, tad icchāto bhavati. na ca kaści[40]{*1/402*}d ātmano vapām utkhidya tām agnau prahṛtya tata utthitena tūpareṇa paśuṇā yaṣṭuṃ śaknuyāt. na ca{*1/403*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1009: devayajanādhyavasānakāle kecid diśo muhyeyuḥ. ata eṣām ānarthakyam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakāni vākyāny anityānīty ucyante, (yady api ca nityāni, tathāpi na nityam arthaṃ kurvanti){*1/404*} iti. sa eṣa vākyaikadeśasyākṣepaḥ, na kṛtsnasya vākyasya. nanv ekadeśād vinā sākāṅkṣaḥ padasamūho na paryāptaḥ svasmai prayojanāya, ata ākṣipta eveti. naivam, bhavati hi kaścit
GSP28msbh1-7u:1010: padasamūhaḥ, yo 'rthavādebhyo vināpi vidadhāti kaṃcid artham, yāni punas taiḥ saha saṃyujyārthāntare vartante, tāny ekadeśākṣepeṇākṣipyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1020: stenaṃ manaḥ. anṛtavādinī vāg ityevaṃjātīyakānāṃ dharmaṃ praty aprāmāṇyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1021: bhūtānuvādāt. vipariṇāmādibhir api kalpyamāne steyaṃ mṛṣodyaṃ ca kartavyam ity āpatati. tac cāśakyaṃ steyānṛtavādapratiṣedham abādhamānenānuṣṭhātum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1022: na ca vikalpaḥ, vaiṣamyāt. ekaḥ kalpyo vidhiḥ, ekaḥ pratyakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1023: atha dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ. tasmād dhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nārciḥ. tasmād arcir evāgner naktaṃ dadṛśe na dhūma iti{*1/405*}. asmāl lokād utkramyāgnir
GSP28msbh1-7u:1024: ādityaṃ gataḥ, rātrāv ādityastam ity etad upapādayitum idam, ubhayam api dṛṣṭaviruddham ucyate. tasmān naiṣāvadhāraṇā sidhyatīti. aparo dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ - na caitad vidmo vayaṃ [41]{*1/406*} brāhmaṇā vā smaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1025: abrāhmaṇā vety{*1/407*}{*1/408*} akriyārthatvād anarthakam. athāyam arthaḥ - naivaitaj jñāyate kiṃ vā brāhmaṇā vayam utābrāhmaṇā eveti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1026: pratyakṣaviruddham apramāṇam. aparaḥ śāstradṛṣṭena virodhaḥ - ko hi tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:1027: veda, yad amuṣmiṃl loke 'sti vā, na veti{*1/409*}. yadi praśno 'yam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1028: akriyārthatvād anarthakaḥ. athānavakḷptiḥ, śāstradṛṣṭena virodhaḥ. ataḥ pratyakṣaviruddham
GSP28msbh1-7u:1030: *{1/405: Tait.Br. 2.1.2.10, vgl dazu ŚBh ad MS 1.2.12}*

GSP28msbh1-7u:1049: abhijayati. tarati mṛtyum, tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate, ya u cainam evaṃ vedeti{*1/414*}. yadi bhūtānuvādamātram anarthakam. atha
GSP28msbh1-7u:1050: phalavidhiḥ, itareṣām ānarthakyam. na hi, akṛtvā pūrṇāhutim agnihotrādayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1051: kriyante. na [42]{*1/415*} cāniṣṭvāgnīṣomīyeṇa somena yajante. na cādhītyāśvamedhena yajante. tad yathā, pathi jāte 'rke madhūtsṛjya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1052: tenaiva pathā madhvarthinaḥ parvataṃ na gaccheyuḥ, tādṛśaṃ hi tat. api cāhuḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1053: arke cen madhu vindeta, kim arthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1054: iṣṭasyārthasya saṃsiddhau ko vidvān yatnam ācaret// iti{*1/416*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1060: na pṛthivyām agniś cetavyo nāntarikṣe na divīty{*1/417*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:1061: apratiṣedhabhāginam arthaṃ pratiṣedhanti. vijñāyata evaitat, antarikṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1062: divi cāgnir na cīyata iti. pṛthivīcayanapratiṣedhārthaṃ ca yad vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1063: bhavec cayanapratiṣedhārtham eva tat. athāpramāṇam, naiṣa virodho bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1064: kathaṃ tat pramāṇam, yad vidhyantaram ākulayet, svayaṃ cākulaṃ syāt. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1069: anityasaṃyogaś ca (vedaprāmāṇye sati){*1/418*} paraṃ tu śrutisāmānyamātram
GSP28msbh1-7u:1070: iti{*1/419*} parihṛtaḥ. idānīṃ vedaikadeśānām ākṣiptānāṃ punar upodbalaka uttiṣṭhati, babaraḥ prāvāhaṇir akāmayateti{*1/420*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1075: vidhinā tv ekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ // MS_1,2.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1076: idaṃ samāmnāyate - vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ, vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā, vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati, sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1077: gamayatīti{*1/421*}. vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatety ato yady api kriyā nāvagamyate, kriyāsaṃbaddhaṃ vā kiṃcit. tathāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1078: vidhyuddeśe[43]{*1/422*}naikavākyatvāt pramāṇam. bhūtikāma ity evam anto
GSP28msbh1-7u:1079: vidhyuddeśaḥ, tenaikavākyabhūto vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatetyevamādiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1080: katham ekavākyabhāvaḥ. padānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvād vidheḥ stuteś caikavākyatvaṃ bhavati. bhūtikāma ālabheta. (kasmāt?){*1/423*} yato vāyuḥ kṣepiṣṭheti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1081: nāyam abhisaṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ, bhūtikāmenālabdhavyam iti. kathaṃ tarhi ālabheta? yatas tato bhūtir iti bhinnāv imāv arthau, ubhayābhidhāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1082: kim arthā stutir iti cet. kathaṃ roceta, nonuṣṭhīyeteti. nanu prāk stutivacanād anuṣṭhānaṃ bhūtikāmāntāt siddham, stutivacanam anarthakam. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1083: hi, yadā stutipadāsaṃnidhānaṃ tadā pūrveṇaiva vidhiḥ. yadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1084: stutipadasaṃbandhaḥ, na tadā bhūtikāmasyālambho vidhīyate. yathā paṭo bhavatīti paṭa utpadyata ity arthaḥ. nirākāṅkṣaṃ ca padadvayam. yadā ca tasminn eva rakta ity aparaṃ śrūyate, tadā rāgasaṃbandho bhavatīty arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1085: bhavati ca raktaṃ pratyākāṅkṣā. evaṃ yadā na stutipadāni, vidhiśabdenaiva tadā prarocanā, yadā stutivacanam, tadā stavanena. nanv evaṃ sati kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1086: stuti-vacanena, yasmin saty avidhāyakam, mā bhūt tat. tadabhāve 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1087: pūrvavidhinaiva prarocayiṣyata iti. satyam, vināpi tena sidhyet
GSP28msbh1-7u:1088: prarocanam. asti tu tat, tasmin vidyamāne yo 'rtho vākyasya, so
GSP28msbh1-7u:1091: nanu satsv api stutipadeṣu pūrvasya vidhisvarūpatvād vidhir abhipretaḥ syāt, na vivakṣyeta stutipada-saṃbandhaḥ. āha - stutipadāni hy anarthakāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:1092: abhaviṣyan sākāṅkṣāṇi. bhavantv anarthakānīti cet. na, gamyamāne 'rthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:1093: 'vivakṣitārthāni bhavitum arhanti. [44]{*1/425*} yo 'sau vidhyuddeśaḥ, sa śaknoti nirapekṣo 'rthaṃ vidhātum, śaknoti ca stutipadānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1094: vākyaśeṣībhavitum, pratyakṣaś ca vākyaśeṣabhāvaḥ. ato 'smād vidheḥ stutim avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1095: nanu nirapekṣād api vidhim avagamiṣyām. bhavatv evam, naivaṃ sati kaścid
GSP28msbh1-7u:1096: virodhaḥ. kiṃ tv aśakyaḥ stutipadasaṃbandhe sati vidhyartho vivakṣitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1097: vākyaṃ hi saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam, dvau cet saṃbandhau vidadhyāt -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1098: bhūtikāma ālabheta; ālambhena caiṣa guṇo bhaviṣyatīti, bhidyeta tarhy evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1099: sati vākyam. atha yad uktam - na kriyā gamyate na tatsaṃbaddhaṃ vā kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:1100: iti{*1/426*}. stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ, stutiśabdāḥ stuvantaḥ kriyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1101: prarocayamāṇā anuṣṭhātṝṇām upakariṣyanti kriyāyāḥ. evam imāni sarvāṇy eva padāni kaṃcid arthaṃ stuvanti vidadhati. ataḥ pramāṇam evaṃjātīyakāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1111: vidhisvarūpatvāt, stutipadāni tu pramādapāṭha iti. tan na evam{*1/428*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:1113: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sarve te vidhipadānām arthavādapadānāṃ ca tulyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1114: adhyāyānadhyāyate{*1/430*}, gurumukhāt pratipattiḥ, śiṣyopādhyāyatā ca sarvasminn evaṃjātīyake, avighnārthe tulyam ādriyante. smaraṇaṃ ca dṛḍham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1117: *{1/428: E2,4,5,6 setzen Daṇḍa oder Komma vor evam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1119: *{1/430: E1,2,5,6; E4: adhyāyānadhyayane (auch in E1 als Fn., dort noch:
GSP28msbh1-7u:1121: aprāptā cānupapattiḥ, prayoge hi virodhaḥ syāt, śabdārtas tv aprayogabhūtaḥ, tasmād upapadyeta api ca yaiṣānupapattir uktā śāstradṛṣṭavirodhād ityevamādyā{*1/432*}, sā so 'rodīd ityevamādiṣu na prāpnoti. kutaḥ? prayoge hi steyādīnām ucyamāne virodhaḥ syāt, śabdārthas tv aprayogabhūtaḥ, tasmād upapadyeta - stenaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1126: yad uktam - vidheyasya prarocanārthā stutir iti{*1/433*}. tad iha katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:1127: avakalpyeta yatrānyad vidheyam, anyac ca stūyate. yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1129: āpaś ca stūyante - āpo vai śāntā iti{*1/435*}. tad ucyate - guṇavādas tu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1130: gauṇa eṣa vādo bhavati, yat saṃbandhini stotavye saṃbandhyantaraṃ stūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1131: abhijano hy eṣa vetasāvakayoḥ. tatas te jāte. abhijanasaṃstavena cābhijātaḥ stuto bhavati. yathā - aśmakābhijano devadatto 'śmākeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:1132: stūyamāneṣu stutam{*1/436*} ātmānaṃ manyate. evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1133: atha so 'rodīd iti kasya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. tasmād barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam ity{*1/437*} asya. kutaḥ? sākāṅkṣatvāt padānām. so 'rodīt, yad arodīt, tad rudrasya rudratvam ity{*1/438*} atra sa iti prakṛtāpekṣaḥ, tatpratyayāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1134: tasya yad aśrv aśīryateti tasyeti pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa eva. upapattiś coparitanasya yo barhiṣi rajataṃ dadyāt purāsya saṃvatsarād gṛhe rodanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1135: bhavatīti{*1/439*}. asya hetutvenāyaṃ pratinirdiśyate - tasmād barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam iti. evaṃ sarvāṇi sākāṅkṣāṇi. kathaṃ vidher{*1/440*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:1137: dadato rodanam āpadyate. tat pratiṣedhasya guṇaḥ, yad arodanam iti. kathaṃ punar arudaty arodīd iti bhavati? kathaṃ vānaśruprabhave rajate
GSP28msbh1-7u:1138: 'śruprabhavam iti vacanam? purāsya saṃvatsarād asati rodane, kathaṃ rodanaṃ bhavatīti? tad ucyate - guṇavādas tu. gauṇā ete śabdāḥ. rudra iti rodananimittasya śabdasya darśanād yad arodīd ity ucyate. varṇasārūpyān nindann anaśruprabhavam apy aśruprabhavam ity āha. nindann eva ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:1139: dhanatyāge dukhadarśanāt purāsya saṃvatsarād gṛhe rodanaṃ bhavatīty āha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1140: tathā - yaḥ prajākāmaḥ paśukāmo vā syāt, sa etaṃ prājāpatyaṃ tūpuram ālabheta iti{*1/442*}, ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣo 'yam - sa ātmano vapām udakhidad iti{*1/443*}. kathaṃ guṇavādaḥ? itthaṃ nāma - nāsan
GSP28msbh1-7u:1141: paśavaḥ, yad ātmano vapām udakhidad iti. etac ca karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyaṃ yad agnau prahṛtamātrāyāṃ vapāyām ajas tūpura udagāt, itthaṃ bahavaḥ paśavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1142: bhavantīti. kathaṃ punar anutkhinnāyāṃ vapāyāṃ prajāpatir ātmano vapām udakhidad ity āha. ucyate - asad vṛttāntānvākhyānaṃ stutyarthena
GSP28msbh1-7u:1144: niṣpadyate{*1/444*} - yac ca vṛttāntajñānam, yac ca kasmiṃścit prarocanā dveṣo vā. tatra vṛttāntānvākhyānaṃ na pravartakaṃ na nivartakaṃ ceti prayojanābhāvād anarthakam ity avivakṣitam. prarocanayā tu pravartate
GSP28msbh1-7u:1145: dveṣān nivartata iti tayor vivakṣā. vṛttāntānvākhyāne 'pi vidhīyamāne ādimatā doṣo vedasya prasajeta. kathaṃ punar idaṃ nirālambanam anvākhyāyata iti. ucyate - nityaḥ kaścid arthaḥ prajāpatiḥ syād vāyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1146: ākāśaḥ, ādityo vā. sa ātmano vapām udakhidad iti vṛṣṭim, vāyum, raśmiṃ vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1147: tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt, vaidyute, ārcīse, laukike vā. tato 'ja ity annam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1148: bījam, virud vā. tam ālabhya tam upayujya prajāḥ paśūn prāpnotīti gauṇāḥ śabdāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1149: ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaś carur āditya udapanīyaś carur ity{*1/445*} asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ - devā vai devayajanam adhyavasāya diśo na prājānann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1150: ākāṅkṣitatvāt. sarvavyāmohānām ādityaś carur nāśayitā, api diṅmohasyeti stutiḥ. katham asati diṅmohe diṅmohaśabda iti. ucyate - aprākṛtasya bahoḥ karmasamūhasyopasthitatvād gauṇo mohaśabdo 'vadhāraṇāvakāśadānādibhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:1155: *{1/436: E1: stūtam, lies mit E2,4,5,6: stutam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1159: *{1/440: E1: vidhar, lies mit E2,4,5,6: vidher}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1162: *{1/444: E1: niṣyadyate, lies mit E2,4,5,6: niṣpadyate; E1 (Fn.):
GSP28msbh1-7u:1166: hiraṇyaṃ haste bhavati, atha gṛhṇātīti{*1/446*} sākāṅkṣatvād asya vidheḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1167: śeṣaḥ - stenaṃ mano 'nṛtavādinī vāg iti. nindāvacanaṃ hiraṇyastutyarthena yathā - kim ṛṣiṇā, devadatta eva bhojayitavyaḥ. kathaṃ punar astenaṃ mano ninditum api stenaśabdenocyate, vācaṃ cānanṛtavādinīm apy anṛtavādinīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1168: brūyat. guṇavādas tu rūpāt. yathā - stenāḥ pracchannarūpāḥ, evaṃ ca mana
GSP28msbh1-7u:1169: iti gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ. prāyāc cānṛtavādinī vāg iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1173: dṛṣṭavirodha{*1/448*} udāharaṇam - tasmād bhūma evāgner divā dadṛśe nārciḥ{*1/449*}. tasmād arcir evāgner naktaṃ dadṛśe, na dhūma iti agnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāheti sāyaṃ juhoti, sūryo jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1175: cheṣaḥ. ubhayor devatayoḥ saṃnidhāne homa iti stuter upapattiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1178: *{1/448: E1: iṣṭavirodhe, lies mit E2,4,5,6 (und E1, S.40/17, zu MS 1.2.2): dṛṣṭavirodha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1182: dṛṣṭavirodha evodāharaṇam - na caitad vidma iti{*1/452*}. tat pravare pravriyamāṇe devāḥ pitara iti brūyād ity{*1/453*} ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. abrāhmaṇo 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ pravarānumantraṇena syād iti stutiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1183: durjñānatvād ajñānavacanaṃ gauṇam. stryaparādhena kartuś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:1184: putradarśanena. apramatā rakṣata tantum enam ityādinā durjñānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1186: *{1/451: E1,6; E2,4,5 (besser): stryaparādhāt; auch E1 hat diese Lesart im
GSP28msbh1-7u:1191: śāstradṛṣṭavirodhe udāharaṇam - ko hi tad vedeti{*1/454*}, dikṣvatī kāśān karotīti{*1/455*} sākāṅkṣatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. pratyakṣaphalatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:1197: tathā phalābhāvād ity{*1/456*} atrodāhṛtam - śobhate 'sya mukham
GSP28msbh1-7u:1199: vedānumantraṇasya cāsya prajāyāṃ vājī jāyata iti śeṣaḥ. mukhaśobhā vājimattvaṃ ca guṇavacanatvād gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ. śobhata iva śiṣyair
GSP28msbh1-7u:1200: udīkṣyamāṇam. kule saṃtatādhyayanaśravaṇān medhāvī jāyata iti sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:1207: avāpnotīti{*1/459*}, pūrṇāhutiṃ juhotīty ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1208: ya u cainam evaṃ vedeti, tarati mṛtyum ity{*1/460*} asyākāṅkṣitvāc cheṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1209: phalavacanaṃ stutiḥ. sarvakāmaphalasya nimitte sarvakāmāv āptivacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1214: phalasya karmaniṣpattes teṣāṃ lokavat parimāṇataḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ syāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1215: anvāruhya vacanam idaṃ{*1/461*} yady api vidhiḥ, tathāpy arthavattā parimāṇataḥ sārato vā phalaviśeṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1217: *{1/461: E1, S.49/6: pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnotīti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1219: abhāgipratiṣedhād ityādāv udāhṛtam - na pṛthivyām agniś cetavyo nāntarikṣe na divīti{*1/462*}, hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya cetavyam ity{*1/463*} ākāṅkṣitatvād asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ. pṛthivyādīnāṃ nindā hiraṇyastutyarthā. asati prasaṅge pratiṣedho nityānuvādaḥ. yac cānityadarśanaṃ babaraḥ prāvāhaṇir akāmayata iti{*1/464*}. tatparihṛtam. arthavādākṣepeṇa punar utthitam idānīm arthavādaprāmāṇye tenaiva parihāreṇa parihariṣyata iti//
GSP28msbh1-7u:1221: *{1/462: Tait.S. 5.2.7.1, zitiert in ŚBh ad MS 1.2.5}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1224: vidhir vā syād apūrvatvāt, vādamātraṃ hy anarthakam // MS_1,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1225: iha ye vidhivan nigadā arthavādās te arthavādās te udāharaṇam - audumbaro yūpo bhavaty ūrg vā uduṃbara ūrk paśava ūrjair vāsmā ūrjaṃ paśūn nāpnoti ūrjo 'varuddhyā iti{*1/466*}. kim asya vidhiḥ kāryam utāsyāpi stutir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1226: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? vidhir vā syād apūrvatvāt, vādamātraṃ hy anarthakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1227: vidhivan nigadeṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣu phalavidhiḥ syāt, phalaṃ hy avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1228: tathā hy apūrvam arthaṃ vidhāsyati. itarathā stutivādamātram anarthakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1229: syāt. stutaś cāstutaś ca tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ. api ca ūrjo 'varuddhyā iti prayojanaṃ śrūyate. na ca - praśasto 'yam artha iti kaścic chabdo 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1230: lakṣaṇayā tu stutir gamyate. śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā jyāyasīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1234: iti cet paśyasi - stutir anarthikā, na ca śabdenāvagamyata iti. laukikāni vākyāni bhavanto vidāṃ kurvantu. tad yathā - iyaṃ gauḥ kretavyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1235: devadattīyā, eṣā hi bahukṣīrā, stryapatyā, anaṣṭaprajā ceti. kretavyety apy ukte guṇābhidhānāt pravartantetarāṃ kretāraḥ. bahukṣīreti ca guṇābhidhānam avagamyate. tadvad vede 'pi bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1237: naitad evam. loke viditapūrvā arthā ucyante bahukṣīrādayaḥ. teṣāṃ vijñānam eva na prayojanam. ataḥ praśaṃsā gamyate. aviditavāde na śraddadhīran
GSP28msbh1-7u:1238: pūrvavacanād iva. viditatvād eva ca prarocayante. vaidikeṣu punar yadi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1239: vidhiśabdena na prarocayante na tarām arthavādena. jātāśaṅko hi vidhiśabde
GSP28msbh1-7u:1240: sa tadānīm. atha vidhiśabdena prarocitaḥ, kim arthavādaśabdena. api ca vede vyaktam asaṃvādaḥ. ūrjo 'varuddhyai ity aprasiddhaṃ vacanam. ūrgvā udumbara iti hetutvaṃ cāprasiddham. yasmād ūrg udumbaraḥ, tasmāt tanmayo yūpaḥ kartavya iti. ūrg udumbara ity anṛtavacanād anyad asyānṛtam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1243: uktam asmābhir vākyaśeṣatvam - vidhinā tv ekavākyatvād iti{*1/467*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1244: nanūktam - phalavacanam iha gamyate na stutir iti. yad iha phalavacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1245: tad audumbarasya yūpasya. na ca, avihita audumbaro yūpo 'sti. tatra phalavacanam evānarthakam. stutivacanaḥ śabdo nāstīti cet. iha phalavacanena phalavattā pratīyate phalavāṃś ca praśasta iti, tatra phalavattāyām ānarthakyam iti yo dvitīyo 'rthaḥ praśaṃsā nāma sa gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1246: lakṣaṇeti cet, na, lakṣaṇāyām apy arthavattā bhavaty eva. lakṣaṇāpi hi laukikī. nanūktam asaṃvādo vede, na hy ūrg udumbara iti. guṇa vādena prarocanārthatāṃ brūmahe - gauṇatvāt saṃvādaḥ. kiṃ? sādṛśyam - yathānnaṃ prīteḥ sādhanam, evam idam api prītisādhanaśaktiyuktaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1247: praśaṃsituṃ{*1/468*} praśaṃsāvācinā śabdenocyate{*1/469*}, śakyate hi tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:1253: vidhiś cānarthakaḥ kvacit, tasmāt stutiḥ pratīyeta, tatsāmānyād itareṣu tathātvam // MS_1,2.23
GSP28msbh1-7u:1254: apsuyonir vā aśvaḥ, apsujo vetasa iti{*1/471*} apsuyonir aśvaḥ kartavya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1255: iti vidher aśakyatvād ānarthakyam. tatrāvaśyaṃ stutiḥ kalpayitavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1256: śamayitrībhir adbhir aśvasyāvakānāṃ ca saṃbandho yajamānasya kaṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1257: śamayatīti. tatsāmānyād itareṣu tathātvam - tatheti yāvat, tāvat tathātvam iti. kiṃ tat sāmānyam. vidhyasaṃbhavaḥ stutisaṃbhavaś ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1260: prakaraṇe saṃbhavann apakarṣo na kalpyeta, vidhyānarthakyaṃ hi taṃ prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:1261: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ stutir iti. kutaḥ? idaṃ samāmananti - yo vidagdhaḥ, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:1262: nairṛtaḥ; yo 'śṛtaḥ, sa raudraḥ. yaḥ śṛtaḥ, sa daivataḥ. tasmād avidahatā śrapayitavyaḥ, sa daivatatvāyeti{*1/472*}. yadi stutir darśapūrṇamāsayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:1263: eva śṛtaḥ stāviṣyate. tathā saṃbhavann apakarṣo na kalpyeta. apakṛṣyate ity apakarṣaḥ. vidhipakṣe tu yatra nairṛtaḥ, tatra vidagdhatā nīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1264: tathā sati prakaraṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhaved. darśapūrṇamāsakarma prati nairṛtābhāvād vidagdhānam anarthakaṃ syāt. tasmāt stutir eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1268: audumbaro yūpo bhavatīti vidhāv etasminn āśrīyamāṇe ūrjo 'varuddhyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1269: ity{*1/473*} etasmiṃś ca vākyaṃ bhidyeta. ittham audumbaro yūpaḥ

GSP28msbh1-7u:1274: atha ye hetuvan nigadāḥ - sūrpeṇa{*1/475*} juhoti, tena hy annaṃ kriyata

GSP28msbh1-7u:1276: iti. kiṃ prāptam. hetuḥ syād annakaraṇaṃ homasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1277: nanv aprasiddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve na hetūpadeśaḥ{*1/477*}. satyam evaṃ loke, vidhāyiṣyate tu vacanena vede. sūrpeṇa{*1/478*} home kartavye 'nnakaraṇaṃ hetur ity upadiśyate. kiṃ prayojanam. anyad api darvipīṭharādy{*1/479*} annakaraṇaṃ yat, tenāpi nāma kathaṃ homaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1278: kriyeteti. kutaḥ. tasyāpy annakriyāyām arthavattā, śakyate ca tenāpy annaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1279: kartum. etād dhi kriyata ity ucyate. na hi vartamānakālaḥ kaścid asti yasyāyaṃ pratinirdeśaḥ. hetau ca śrutiḥ śabdaḥ{*1/480*}, stutau lakṣaṇā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1280: yadi ca darvipīṭharādi{*1/481*} na sākṣād annaṃ karotīti, nānnakaraṇam ity ucyate. vyarthe tasmin sūrpastutir{*1/482*} anarthikā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1281: sūrpam{*1/483*} api hi na sākṣād annaṃ karotīti, tena vinārthena sūrpasya{*1/484*} stutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:1287: *{1/479: E2,4: darvipiṭharādi; E5: darvīpīṭharādi; E6: darvīpiṭharādi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1293: stutis tu, śabdapūrvatvād acodanā ca tasya // MS_1,2.27 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1294: na tv etad asti, śabdapūrvako 'yam arthaḥ/ annakaraṇaṃ hetur iti, śabdaś cānnakaraṇaṃ sūrpahome hetur ity āha. na ca darvipīṭharahome, tena śabdapūrvaṃ sūrpam, na ca darvipiṭharādeś{*1/485*} codanā.

GSP28msbh1-7u:1300: arthas tu vidhiśeṣatvāt, yathā loke // MS_1,2.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1301: asmatpakṣe 'rtho 'sti. vākyaśeṣo hi sa vidhes tadā bhavati. saṃvādaś ca stutivacanatvena, yathā vayaṃ sūrpeṇānnaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ jānīmaḥ, tathā sūrpeṇānnaṃ kriyata ity eva gamyate. tadā cāvartamānaṃ stautuṃ{*1/487*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:1302: vartamānam ity upadiśati. tvatpakṣa eṣa doṣaḥ, yasya te hetuvidhiḥ. vidhau hi na paraḥ śabdārthaḥ pratīyate. na ca vartamānam upadiśan vedaḥ śakyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:1303: arthaṃ vidadhyāt. āsmatpakṣe tu eṣa paraśabdaḥ paratra vartate. yathā loke balavān devadatto yajñadattādīn prasahata iti. prakṛṣṭabale 'pi balavac chabdo vartamāno na siṃhaṃ śārdūlaṃ vāpekṣya prayujyate, ye devadattāt tu
GSP28msbh1-7u:1304: nikṛṣṭabalāḥ, tānapekṣya bhavati. evaṃ tena hy annaṃ kriyata iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1305: prakṛṣṭānnakaraṇena saṃstavaḥ sūrpasya{*1/488*}, nikṛṣṭāny anyāny annākaraṇāny apekṣya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1309: yadi ca hetur avatiṣṭheta nirdeśāt, sāmānyād iti ced avyavasthā vidhīnāṃ syāt // MS_1,2.30
GSP28msbh1-7u:1310: yady api ca bhaved annakaraṇaṃ hetur darvipiṭharaprakārāṇām, tathāpi sūrpa etāvatiṣṭheta. śabdād annakaraṇaṃ hetur iti vijñāyate. śadaś ca sūrpasyāha, na darvīpiṭharādīnām. tad dhi nirdiśyate, yasmāt sūrpeṇānnaṃ kriyate, tasmāt sūrpeṇa juhotīti. yathā yasmād balavad upadhmāto 'gniḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1311: tena me gṛhaṃ dagdham iti, nānagnir api balavad upadhmāto dahatīti gamyate. atha matam - yena yenānnaṃ kriyate praṇāḍyā sūrpād anyenāpi, tena tenāpi homaḥ kriyata iti. avyavasthā vidhīnāṃ syāt, na kenacit praṇāḍyānnaṃ kriyate. tatra yāvad uktaṃ syāj juhotīti, tāvad evānnakaraṇena juhotīti. asmatpakṣe punaḥ sūrpaṃ stūyate - tena hy annaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1312: kriyata iti vṛttāntānvākhyānaṃ na ca vṛttāntajñāpanāya, kiṃ tarhi prarocanāyaiva. tasmād dhetuvan nigadasyāpi stutir eva kāryam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1314: athedānīṃ kim vivakṣitavacanā mantrāḥ, utāvivakṣitavacanāḥ. kim arthaprakāśanena yāgasyopakurvanti, utoccāraṇamātreṇeti. yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:1315: uccāraṇamātreṇa, tadā na niyogato{*1/490*} barhir devasadanaṃ dāmīty{*1/491*} eṣa barhirlavane viniyujyeta. abhidhānena cet, prakaraṇena

GSP28msbh1-7u:1318: -uccāraṇamātreṇaivopakurvantīti. kutaḥ? tadarthaśāstrāt. yad abhidhānasamartho mantraḥ, tatraivainaṃ śāstraṃ nibadhnāti. uruprathā uru prathasveti{*1/493*} puroḍāśaṃ prathayatīti{*1/494*} vacanam idam anarthakam, yady arthābhidhānenopakurvanti. athoccāraṇamātreṇa, tato vaktavyo viniyogaḥ, uktaś ca. ato nārthābhidhānena. yathā sākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1319: pareṇa cen nīyate, nūnam akṣibhyāṃ na paśyatīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1320: nanv arthavādārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet. na hi, yena vidhīyate tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1321: vākyaśeṣo 'rthavāda ity uktam. na ca nirapekṣeṇa vihite 'rthavādena kiṃcid api prayojanaṃ kriyate. ato nārthavādārthaṃ vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1322: tathābhyādānasamarthā mantrā{*1/495*} udāharaṇam. liṅgād evādāne prāptā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1323: vacanena vidhīyante, tāṃ caturbhir ādatta{*1/496*} iti. catuḥsaṃkhyārtham iti cet, na, samuccayaśabdābhāvāt. [56]{*1/497*} tathā, imām agṛbhṇan rasanāmṛtasyety{*1/498*} aśvābhidhānīm ādatta ity{*1/499*} udāharaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1324: rasanādāne{*1/500*} prāptasya{*1/501*} rasanādāna{*1/502*} eva śāstraṃ viniyojakam. tad vivakṣitārthatve na ghaṭeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1325: nanu gardabharasanāṃ{*1/503*} parisaṃkhyāsyati. na śaknoti parisaṃkhyātam{*1/504*}. parisaṃcakṣāṇo hi svārthaṃ ca{*1/505*} juhyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1326: parārthaṃ ca kalpeta, prāptaṃ ca bādheta. tasmān na vivakṣitavacanā

GSP28msbh1-7u:1409: aviśiṣṭas tu loke prayujyamānānāṃ vede ca padānām arthaḥ. sa yathaiva loke

GSP28msbh1-7u:1415: tad ucyate - arthapratyāyanārtham eva yajñe mantroccāraṇam. yad uktam - na devatābhir yajñāṅgaiś ca saṃlape prayojanam astīti, yajñe yajñāṅgaprakāśanam eva prayojanam. katham? na hy aprakāśite yajñe yajñāṅge ca yāgaḥ śakyo 'bhinirvartayitum. tasmāt tannirvṛttyartham arthaprakāśanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1416: mahānupakāraḥ karmaṇaḥ, tac ca karotīty avagamyate. tasmād asatyasya prayojanam. tac ca dṛṣṭaṃ na śakyam apavaditum - nārthābhidhānaṃ prayojanam iti. nanv arthābhidhānenopakurvatsu - tāṃ caturbhir ādatta
