GSP28msbh1-7u:1441: punaḥśrutiḥ, yajñapatim eva tat prathayatīti. nanu nāyaṃ mantrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1442: vākyaśeṣaḥ, na ca prāptasya stutyā prayojanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1443: satyam{*1/539*}, nāyaṃ mantrasya vidhiḥ, na saṃstavaḥ. prathanam eva tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:1444: stūyate. mantraḥ punā rūpād eva prāpta ihānūdyate prathanaṃ stotum -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1445: itthaṃ prathanaṃ praśastam, yat kriyamāṇam evaṃrūpeṇa mantreṇa kriyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1446: kas tadā bhavati guṇaḥ. yajñapatim eva tat prajayā paśubhiḥ prathayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1447: kim etad evāsya phalaṃ bhavati. neti brūmaḥ. stutiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:1449: katham asati prathane prathayatīti śabdaḥ. mantrābhidhānāt - mantreṇa puroḍāśam adhvaryuḥ prathasveti brūte. yaś caivaṃ prathasveti brūte, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:1450: prathayati, yathā - yaḥ kurv iti brūte, sa kārayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1455: yad uktam{*1/540*} - padaniyamasyārthavattvād{*1/541*} avivakṣitārthā mantrā iti. kāmam anarthako niyamaḥ, na dṛṣṭam apramāṇam. niyatoccāraṇam adṛṣṭāyeti cet, aviruddhā adṛṣṭakalpanāsmatpakṣe 'pi. evaṃ pratyāyamānam abhyudayakāri bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1460: atha yad uktam{*1/543*} - prokṣaṇīr āsādayeti buddhabodhanam aśakyam, ata uccāraṇād adṛṣṭam iti. tan na. kartavyam ity api vijñāte 'nuṣṭhānakāle
GSP28msbh1-7u:1461: smṛtyā prayojanam. upāyāntareṇāpi sā prāpnoti, ato 'nenopāyena kartavyeti niyamārtham āmnānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1465: catvāri śṛṅgā ity{*1/544*} asad abhidhāne gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ. gauṇī kalpanā pramāṇavattvāt. uccāraṇād adṛṣṭam apramāṇam. catasro hotrāḥ śṛṅgāṇīvāsya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1466: trayo 'sya pādā iti savanābhiprāyam. dve śīrṣa iti patnīyajamānau. sapta hastāsa iti chandāṃsy abhipretya. tridhā baddha iti tribhir vedair baddhaḥ. vṛṣabhaḥ kāmān varṣatīti. roravīti śabdakarmā. maho devo martyān
GSP28msbh1-7u:1467: āviveśeti, manuṣyādhikārābhiprāyam. tad yathā - cakravākastanī haṃsadantāvalī kāśavastrā śaivālakeśī nadīti nadyāḥ stutiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1468: yajñasamṛddhaye sādhanānāṃ cetanasādṛśyam upapādayitukāma āmantraṇaśabdena lakṣayati{*1/545*} - oṣadhe trāyasvainam iti{*1/546*}. śṛṇota grāvāṇa iti{*1/547*}, ataḥ paraṃ prātaranuvākānuvacanaṃ bhaviṣyati, yatrācetanāḥ santo grāvāṇo 'pi śṛṇuyuḥ, kiṃ punar vidvāṃso 'pi brāhmaṇā iti. itthaṃ cācetanā api grāvāṇa āmantryante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1475: aditir dyaur iti{*1/548*} gauṇa eṣa śabdaḥ, ato na [62]{*1/549*}vipratiṣedhaḥ/ yathā - tvam eva mātā, tvam eva{*1/550*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:1476: piteti. tathaikarudradaivatya eko rudraḥ, śatarudradaivatye śataṃ rudrā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1482: yat tu{*1/551*} - akarmakāle 'vahanti mantreṇa māṇavako na pūrṇikāvahantiṃ prakāśayitum iccatīti. ayajñasaṃyogāt, na yajñopakārāyaitat prakāśayitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:1483: icchati. nanu prakāśanānabhyāso 'kṣarābhyāsaś ca paricoditaḥ. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1489: nigamaniruktavyākaraṇavaśena dhātuto 'rthaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ. yathā - sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītv ityevamādīny{*1/553*} aśvinor abhidhānāni dvivacanāntāni lakṣyante. anenāśvinoḥ kāmam aprā ity{*1/554*} āśvinaṃ sūktam avagamyate. devatābhidhānāni ca ghaṭante jarbharītyevamādīni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1490: avayavaprasiddhyā ca laukikenārthena viśeṣyante. evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1500: *{1/557: E2 nimmt den Kommentar irrtümlicherweise als eigenes Sūtra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1502: āgneyāgnīdhram upatiṣṭhata iti{*1/559*} vidhānād vivakṣitārthānām eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:1503: mantrāṇāṃ bhavati liṅgeṇopadeśaḥ. yadi te 'gniprayojanāḥ, tatas ta āgneyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1508: ūhadarśanaṃ ca vivakṣitārthānām eva bhavati. kim ūhadarśanam. na pitā vardhate, na māteti{*1/560*}. anye vardhanta iti gamyate. pratyakṣaṃ kaumārayauvanasthāvirair vardhante mātrādayaḥ. śabdo na vardhata iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1509: brūte. kā punaḥ śabdasya vṛddhiḥ. yad dvivacanabahuvacanasaṃyogaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1513: vidhiśabdāś ca vivakṣitārthān eva mantrān anuvadanti - śataṃ himāḥ śataṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1517: dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syāt // MS_1,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1518: evaṃ tāvat kṛtsnasya vedasya prāmāṇyam uktam. athedānīṃ yatra na vaidikaṃ śabdam upalabhemahi, atha ca smaranti - evam ayam artho 'nuṣṭhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1519: etasmai ca prayojanāyeti. kim asau tathaiva syān na veti. yathā - aṣṭakāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1520: kartavyāḥ; gurur anugantavyaḥ; taḍāgaṃ khanitavyam; prabhā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1521: pravartayitavyā; śikhākarma kartavyam ityevamādayaḥ. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1522: dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syād iti. śabdalakṣaṇo dharma ity uktam{*1/563*} - codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharmaḥ iti. ato nirmūlatvān nāpekṣitavyam iti. nanu ye vidur ittham asau padārthaḥ kartavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1523: katham iva te vadiṣyanty akartavya evāyam iti. smaraṇānupapattyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1524: na{*1/564*} hy ananubhūto 'śruto vārthaḥ smaryate. na cāsyāvaidikasyālaukikasya ca smaraṇam upapadyate, pūrvavijñānakāraṇābhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:1525: iti. yā hi bandhyā smareta - idaṃ me dauhitrakṛtam iti, na me duhitāstīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1526: matvā, na jātucid asau pratīyāt - samyag etaj jñānam iti. evam api yathaiva pāramparyeṇāvicchedād ayaṃ veda iti pramāṇam eṣāṃ smṛtiḥ, evam iyam api pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. naitad evam. pratyakṣeṇopalabdhatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:1527: granthasya, nānupapannaṃ pūrvavijñānam. aṣṭakādiṣu tv adṛṣṭārtheṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:1528: pūrvavijñānakāraṇābhāvād vyāmohasmṛtir eva gamyate. tad yathā kaścij
GSP28msbh1-7u:1529: jātyandho vadet - smarāmy aham asya rūpaviśeṣasyeti. kutas te pūrvavijñānam iti ca paryanuyukto jātyandham evāparaṃ vinirdiśeta. tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1531: satyāṃ naiva jātucit saṃpratīyur vidvāṃsaḥ samyagdarśanam etad iti. ato nādartavyam evaṃjātīyakam anapekṣaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1535: api vā kartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃ syāt // MS_1,3.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1536: api veti pakṣo vyāvartyate. pramāṇaṃ smṛtiḥ, vijñānaṃ hi tat. kim ity anyathā bhaviṣyati. pūrvavijñānam asya nāsti, kāraṇābhāvād iti cet. asyā eva smṛter draḍhimnaḥ kāraṇam anumāsyāmahe. tat tu nānubhavanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1537: anupapattyā. na hi manuṣyā ihaiva janmany evaṃjātīyakam artham anubhavituṃ śaknuvanti. janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryate. granthas tv anumīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1539: nanu nopalabhanta evaṃjātīyakaṃ grantham. anupalabhamānā apy anumimīran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1540: vismaraṇam apy upapadyata iti. tad upapannatvāt pūrvavijñānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1543: aṣṭakāliṅgāś ca mantrā vede dṛśyante - yāñ janāḥ pratinandantītyevamādayaḥ{*1/566*}. tathā pratyupasthitaniyamānām ācārāṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1544: dṛṣṭārthatvād eva prāmāṇyam - guror anugamāt prīto gurur adhyāpayiṣyati granthagranthibhedinaś ca nyāyān parituṣṭo vakṣyatīti. tathā ca darśayati
GSP28msbh1-7u:1545: - tasmāc chreyāṃsaṃ pūrvaṃ yantaṃ pāpīyān paścād anvetīti{*1/567*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1546: prapāstaḍāgāni ca paropakārāya, na dharmāyety evāvagamyate. tathā ca darśanam - dhanvann iva prapā [66]{*1/568*} asīti{*1/569*}. tathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1547: sthalayodakaṃ parigṛhṇantīti ca. gotracihnaṃ śikhākarma, darśanaṃ ca -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1548: yatra bāṇāḥ saṃpatanti kumārā viśikhā iveti{*1/570*}. tena ye dṛṣṭārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1549: te tata eva pramāṇam. ye tv adṛṣṭārthāḥ, teṣu vaidikaśabdānumānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1555: virodhe tv anapekṣaṃ syāt, asati hy anumānam // MS_1,3.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1556: atha yatra śrutivirodhaḥ, tatra katham. yathaudumbaryāḥ sarvaveṣṭanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1557: audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyed iti śrutyā viruddham. aṣṭācatvāriṃśad vaṛṣāṇi vedabrahmacaraṇam, jātaputraḥ kṛṣṇakeśo 'gnīn ādadhītety anena viruddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1558: krītarājako bhojyān na iti, tasmād agnīṣomīye saṃsthite yajamānasya gṛhe 'śitavyam ity anena viruddham. tat pramāṇam, kartṛsāmānyād ityevaṃ prāpte
GSP28msbh1-7u:1559: brūmaḥ - aśakyatvād vyamoha ity avagamyate. katham aśakyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1560: sparśavidhānān na sarvā śakyā veṣṭayitum udgāyatā spraṣṭuṃ ca. tām udgāyatā spraṣṭavyām avagacchantaḥ kenemaṃ saṃpratyayaṃ bādhemahi sarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇeneti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1561: nanu nirmūlatvād vyāmohas tat smaraṇam iti vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ mūlaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1562: bhaviṣyatīti. bhaved vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ mūlam, yadi sparśanaṃ vyāmohaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1563: avyāmohe tv aśakyatvād anupapannam. yathānubhavanam anupapannam iti na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1564: kalpyate, tathā vaidikam api vacanam. kathaṃ tarhi sarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1565: vyāmohaḥ. kathaṃ vyāmohakalpanā. śrautavijñānavirodhāt. atha kim arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1566: nemau vidhī vikalpye[67]{*1/571*}te vrīhiyavavad bṛhadrathantaravad vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1567: nāsati vyāmohavijñāne vikalpo bhavati. yadi sarvaveṣṭanavijñānaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1568: sparśanaṃ vyāmohaḥ. yadi sparśanaṃ pramāṇam, smṛtir vyāmohaḥ. vikalpaṃ tu vadan sparśanasya pakṣe tāvat prāmāṇyam anumanyate. tasya ca mūlaṃ śrutiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1569: sā cet pramāṇam anumatā, na pākṣikī. pākṣikaṃ ca sarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1570: pakṣe tāvan na śaknoti śrutiṃ parikalpayitum, sparśavijñānena bādhitatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1571: tataś cāvyāmohe ca tasminn aśakyā śrutiḥ kalpayitum. na cāsāv avyāmohaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1572: pakṣe, pakṣe vyāmoho bhaviṣyatīti. yad eva hi tasyaikasmin pakṣe mūlam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1573: tad evetarasminn api. ekasmiṃś cet pakṣe na vyāmohaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1574: śrutiprāmāṇyatulyatvād itaratrāpy avyāmohaḥ. na cāsāv ekasmin pakṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:1575: śrutiḥ, nibaddhākṣarā hi sā na pramādapāṭha iti śakyā gaditum. tena naitat pakṣe vijñānaṃ vyāmohāt pakṣāntaraṃ saṃkrāntam ity avagamyate. tatra duḥśrutasvapnādivijñānamūlatvaṃ ta sarvaveṣṭanasyeti virodhāt kalpyate. na hi tasya sati virodhe prāmāṇyam abhyupagantavyam iti kiṃcid asti pramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1576: tasmād yathaivaikasmin pakṣe na śakyā śrutiḥ kalpayitum, evam aparasmin pakṣe, tulyakāraṇatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1578: pramāṇāyāṃ smṛtau sparśanaṃ vyāmohaḥ, sparśane pramāṇe smṛtir vyāmohaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1579: tad etad itaretrāśrayaṃ bhavati. tatra sparśanasya kḷptaṃ mūlaṃ kalpyaṃ smṛteḥ, so 'sāv anyataḥ paricchedaḥ. kalpyamūlatvāt smṛtiprāmāṇyam anavakḷptaṃ. tad aprāmāṇyāt sparśanaṃ na vyāmohaḥ. tad avyāmohāt smārtaśrutikalpanānupapannā pramāṇābhāvāt. nanv evaṃ sati
GSP28msbh1-7u:1581: nopapadyate, yady apratyakṣā syāt. pratyakṣā tv eṣā. na hi pratyakṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:1582: anupapannaṃ nāmāsti. dvayos tu śrutyor bhāvāt. dve hy ete vākye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1584: kevalavrīhisādhanatā. na ca vākyenāvagato 'rtho 'pahnūyate. tasmād vrīhiyavayor upapanno vikalpo bṛhadrathantarayoś ca. tasmād uktaṃ śrutiviruddhā smṛtir apramāṇam iti. ataś ca sarvaveṣṭanādi nādaraṇīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1587: lobhād vāsa āditsamānā audumbarīṃ kṛtsnāṃ veṣṭitavantaḥ kecit. tat smṛter bījam. bubhukṣamāṇāḥ kecit krītarājakasya bhojanam ācaritavantaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1588: apuṃstvaṃ pracchādayantaś cāṣṭācatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi vedabrahmacaryaṃ caritavantaḥ. tata eṣā smṛtir ity avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1590: yūpahastino dānam ācarantīti. tatkartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1591: prāpte{*1/573*}. apramāṇaṃ smṛtiḥ. atrānyan mūlam. lobhād ācaritavantaḥ kecit, tata eṣā smṛtiḥ. upapannataraṃ caitad vaidikavacanakalpanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1595: ācāntena kartavyam; yajñopavītinā kartavyam; dakṣiṇācāreṇa kartavyam ityevaṃlakṣaṇāny udāharaṇāni. kim etāni śrutiviruddhāni na kartavyāni utāviruddhāni kāryāṇīti. [69]{*1/574*} iti{*1/575*} cet paśyasi, tair apy anuṣṭhīyamānair vaidīkaṃ kiṃcin na kupyati, tasmād aviruddhānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1599: naitad evam. śāstraparicchinnaṃ hi kramaṃ bādheran. katham. vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ kurvītetīmāṃ śrutim uparundhyād antarā vedaṃ vediṃ cānuṣṭḥīyamānam ācamanādi. dakṣiṇena caikahastenānuṣṭhīyamāneṣu padārtheṣu kadācit pradhānaṃ svakālam atikrāmeta. ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ anutiṣṭhan
GSP28msbh1-7u:1601: api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran // MS_1,3.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1602: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. agṛhyamāṇakāraṇā evaṃjātīyakāḥ pramāṇam. nanu kramakālau virundhanti{*1/576*}. virudhnantu{*1/577*}. naiṣa doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1603: ācamanaṃ padārthaḥ padārthānāṃ ca guṇaḥ kramaḥ. na ca guṇānurodhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:1604: padārtho na kartavyo bhavati. api ca prāptānāṃ padārthānām uttarakālaṃ krama āpatati. yadā padārthaḥ prāpnoti, tadā krama eva nāsti, kena saha virodho bhaviṣyatīti. tathā yadi dakṣiṇena nācaryate, kālo mā virodhīd
GSP28msbh1-7u:1605: iti, tatra kālānurodhena padārtho nānyathātvam abhyupagacchet. prayogāṅgaṃ hi kālaḥ padārthānām upakārakaḥ. ato na kālānurodhena vyathayitavyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1606: padārthaḥ. api ca śaucaṃ dakṣiṇācāratā yajñopavītitvaṃ caivaṃjātīyakā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1612: teṣv adarśanād virodhasya samā vipratipattiḥ syāt // MS_1,3.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1613: yavamayaś caruḥ; vārāhī upānahau{*1/579*}; vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān
GSP28msbh1-7u:1614: saṃcinotīti yavavarāhavetasaśabdān samāmananti. tatra kecid dīrghaśūkeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:1615: yavaśabdaṃ prayuñjante, kecit priyaṅguṣu. varāhaśabdaṃ kecit śūkare{*1/580*}, kecit kṛṣṇaśakunau. vetasaśabdaṃ kecid vañjulake, kecij
GSP28msbh1-7u:1621: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. yavaśabdo yadi dīrghaśūkeṣu sādṛśyāt priyaṅguṣu bhaviṣyati. yadi priyaṅguṣu, sādṛśyād yaveṣu. kiṃ sādṛśyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1622: pūrvasaśye{*1/581*} kṣīṇe bhavanti dīrghaśūkāḥ priyaṅgavaś caitat tayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1623: sādṛśyam. kaḥ punar atra niścayaḥ. ya śāstrasthānāṃ sa śabdārthaḥ. ke
GSP28msbh1-7u:1624: śāstrasthāḥ. śiṣṭāḥ. teṣām avicchinnā smṛtiḥ śabdeṣu vedeṣu ca. tena śiṣṭā nimittaṃ śrutismṛtyavadhāraṇe. te hy evaṃ samāmananti yavamayeṣu karambhapātreṣu vihiteṣu vākyaśeṣam - yatrānyā oṣadhayo mlāyante, athaite modamānā ivottiṣṭhantīti{*1/582*} dīrghaśūkān yavān darśayati vedaḥ. vede darśanād avicchinnapāramparyo dīrghaśūkeṣu yavaśabda iti gamyate. tasmāt priyaṅguṣu gauṇaḥ. tasmād dīrghaśūkānāṃ puroḍāśaḥ kartavyaḥ. tasmād varāhaṃ gāvo 'nudhāvantīti{*1/583*} śūkare{*1/584*} varāhaśabdaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1625: darśayati. apsujo vetasa iti{*1/585*} vañjule vetasaśabdam. [71]{*1/586*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:1626: śūkaraṃ{*1/587*} hi gāvo 'nudhāvanti. vañjulo 'psu jāyate. jambūvṛkṣa sthale girinadīṣu vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1635: atha yāñ chabdān āryā na kasmiṃścid arthe ācaranti, mlecchās tu kasmiṃścit
GSP28msbh1-7u:1637: kiṃ nigamaniruktavyākaraṇavaśena dhātuto 'rthaḥ kalpayitavya uta yatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:1638: mlecchā ācaranti, sa śabdārtha iti. śiṣṭācārasya prāmāṇyam uktaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1639: nāśiṣṭasmṛteḥ. tasmān nigamādivaśenārthakalpanā. nigamādīnāṃ caivam arthavattā bhaviṣyati. anabhiyogaś ca śabdārtheṣv aśiṣṭānām abhiyogaś cetareṣām. tasmād dhātuto 'rthaḥ kalpayitavya ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1640: coditam aśiṣṭair api śiṣṭānavagataṃ pratīyeta, yat pramāṇenāviruddham, tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:1641: avagamyamānam, na nyāyyaṃ tyaktum. yat tu śiṣṭācāraḥ pramāṇam iti, tat pratyakṣānavagate 'rthe. yat tv abhiyuktāḥ śabdārtheṣu śiṣṭā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1642: tatrocyate - abhiyuktatarāḥ pakṣiṇāṃ poṣaṇe bandhane ca mlecchāḥ. yat tu nigamaniruktavyākaraṇānām arthavatteti, tatraiṣām arthavattā bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1643: na yatra mlecchair apy avagataḥ śabdārthaḥ. api ca - nigamādibhir arthe kalpayamāne 'vyavasthitaḥ śabdārtho bhavet, tatrāniścayaḥ syāt. tasmāt pika iti kokilo grāhyaḥ, nemo 'rdham, tāmarasaṃ padmam, sata iti dārumayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1648: iha kalpasūtrāṇy udāharaṇam - māśakam, hāstikam, kauṇḍinyakam ityevaṃlakṣaṇakāni kiṃ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ veti saṃdigdhāni. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1649: prayogasya śāstraṃ pramāṇam evaṃjātīyakam iti brūmaḥ. satyavācām etāni vacanāni. katham avagamyate. vaidikair eṣāṃ saṃvādo bhavati. ya eva hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1650: vede grahāḥ, ta eveha, yā eva vede iṣṭakāḥ{*1/590*}, tā eveha. tasmāt satyavāca ācāryāḥ. ācāryavacaḥ pramāṇam iti ca śrutiḥ. pratyakṣataḥ prāmāṇyam anavagatam iti yady ucyeta, pramāṇāntareṇa vacanenāvagatam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1651: na doṣaḥ. vedavākyaiś caiṣāṃ tulya ādaraḥ. tasmāt pramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1655: naitad evam, asanniyamāt. naitat samyaṅnibandhanam, svarābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1660: tasmād{*1/594*} apramāṇam. yaś cādara uktaḥ, sa nāntarīyakatvād vedavākyamiśrasamāmnānāt. yat tu śrutir iti naitat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1661: arthavādatvāt{*1/595*}. katham arthavādaḥ. vidhyantaraṃ hy asti - āgneyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1662: 'ṣṭākapāla iti. atrācāryo vedo 'bhipretaḥ, ācinoty asya buddhim iti. yad vācāryavacanaṃ [73]{*1/596*} pramāṇaṃ tadapekṣam. kataratat. yat
GSP28msbh1-7u:1664: yac coktam - satyavācām etāni vacanānīti, tan na -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1671: sarvatra ca prayogāt saṃnidhānaśāstrāc ca // MS_1,3.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1672: ācāryavacanaṃ hi bhavati pūrvapakṣe - sarvāsu tithiṣv amāvāsyeti{*1/597*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1673: saṃnihitaṃ ca śāstram - paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta, amāvāsyāyām amāvasyayā yajed iti{*1/598*}. tena śrutiviruddhavacanān na satyavācaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1679: anumānāt smṛter ācārāṇāṃ ca prāmāṇyam iṣyate. yenaiva hetunā te pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1682: dākṣiṇātyair{*1/601*} eva; udvṛṣabhayajñādaya udīcyair eva. yathā śikhākalpo vyavatiṣṭhate kecit triśikhāḥ, kecit pañcaśikhā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1685: *{1/600: E1,5,6; E2,4: holākādiḥ, E4 (Fn.) tasmād holākādayaḥ; tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:1688: api vā sarvadharmaḥ syāt, tannyāyatvād vidhānasya // MS_1,3.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1689: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. evaṃjātīyakaḥ sarvadharmaḥ syāt. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1690: tannyāyatvād vidhānasya. vidhīyate 'neneti vidhānaṃ śabdaḥ. so 'numīyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:1691: smṛtyāḥ. na ca tasyākṛtivacanatā nyāyyā. na ca vyaktivacanatā, na sarveṣām anuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ yad ekaṃ [74]{*1/602*} sāmānyaṃ, tasya vācakaḥ kaścit śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1692: 'sti, yo 'numīyeta. tasmāt sarvadharmatā vidher nyāyyā. kutaḥ. padārthāḥ kartavyā iti pramāṇam asti, vyavasthāyāṃ tu na kiñcit pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1693: atha yad uktam, yathā śikhākalpo vyavatiṣṭhata iti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:1699: idaṃ padebhyaḥ kebhyaścid uttaraṃ sūtram. kāni tāni padāni. atha kim arthaṃ na liṅgād vyavasthā. yathā - śuklo hotā iti. nāsti tan nityam eṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1700: liṅgam, yad yathādarśanam anuvartate. ye 'pi śyāmā bṛhanto lohitākṣāḥ, te
GSP28msbh1-7u:1701: 'pi na sarva ārhnīnaibukādīn kurvate. anevaṃliṅgā api cānutiṣṭhanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1702: tasmān na vyavasthā. śuklo hoteti pratyakṣā śrutiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1704: atha kasmān na samākhyayā niyamaḥ. ye dākṣiṇātyā iti samākhyātāḥ, ta āhnīnaibukādīn kariṣyanti. ya udīcyā iti samākhyātāḥ, ta
GSP28msbh1-7u:1705: udvṛṣabhayajñādīn. ye prācyā iti, te holākādīn. yathā - rājā rājasūyeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1706: naitad evam. deśasaṃyogād ākhyā bhavati. dākṣiṇadeśān nirgataḥ prākṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:1707: vodakṣu vāvasthita āhnīnaibukādīn karoty eva. udīcyāś ca deśāntara
GSP28msbh1-7u:1708: udvṛṣabhayajñādīn{*1/603*}, prācyāś ca holākādīn. anyadeśaś ca deśāntaragato na niyogataḥ parapadārthān{*1/604*} karoti. tasmān na vyavasthā{*1/605*}. rājā rājasūyeneti tu niyatā jātiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1713: na syād deśāntareṣv iti cet // MS_1,3.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1714: iti cet paśyasi - yadi deśasaṃyogād ākhyā bhavet, deśāntarasthasya na bhavet. bhavati ca deśānatarasthasya māthura ity asaṃbaddhasyāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1717: deśasaṃyoganimittāyām apy ākhyāyāṃ deśān nirgatasya tadākhyā na viruddhā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1719: bhūtavartamānabhaviṣyatsaṃbandhāpekṣā. yato dṛśyate - mathurām abhiprasthito māthura iti, mathurāyāṃ vasan mathurāyā nirgataś ca. yasya tv ato 'nyatamaḥ saṃbandho nāsti, na sa māthuraḥ. tasmān na samākhyayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1722: atha kasmān na karmāṅgaṃ deśaḥ. yaḥ kṛṣṇamṛtikāprāyaḥ, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:1727: yathā kartary avyavasthitaṃ liṅgaṃ śyāmādi{*1/608*} na padārthaiḥ saṃvādam
GSP28msbh1-7u:1729: anye na kurvanti, tathānyaliṅge 'pi kurvanti. tasmān na deśato vyavasthā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1734: prayogotpattyaśāstratvāc chabdeṣu na vyavasthā syāt // MS_1,3.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1735: gaur gāvī goṇī gopotalikā ityevamādayaḥ{*1/611*} śabdā udāharaṇam. gośabdo yathā sāsnādim iti pramāṇam, kiṃ tathā gāvyādayo 'py uta neti saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1737: uta sarve 'nādayaḥ. sarva iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ. pratyayāt. pratīyate hi gāvyādibhyaḥ sāsnādimān arthaḥ. tasmād ito varṣaśate 'py asyārthasya saṃbandha āsīd eva, tataḥ pareṇa, tataś ca paratareṇety anāditā. kartā cāsya saṃbandhasya nāstīti vyavasthitam eva. tasmāt sarve sādhavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1738: sarvair bhāṣitavyam. sarve hi sādhayanty artham. yathā - hastaḥ, karaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1739: pāṇir iti. arthāya hy eta uccāryante, nādṛṣṭāya. na hy eṣām uccāraṇe śāstram asti. tasmān na vyavatiṣṭheta kaścid eka eva sādhur itare 'sādhava
GSP28msbh1-7u:1742: *{1/611: Vgl. Mahābhāṣya, Einltg., E1 (4th ed., 1985), Bd.1, S.5/21-22}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1744: mahatā prayatnena śabdam uccaranti - vāyur nābher utthitaḥ, urasi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1745: vistīrṇaḥ, kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ, mūrdhānam āhatya parāvṛttaḥ, vaktre vicaran vividhān śabdān abhivyanakti. tatrāparādhyetāpy uccārayitā, yathā - śuṣke patiṣyāmīti kardame patati, sakṛd upasprakṣyāmīti dvir upaspṛśati. tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:1750: na caiṣa nyāyaḥ yat sadṛśāḥ śabdā ekam artham abhiniviśamānāḥ, sarve
GSP28msbh1-7u:1751: 'vichinnapāramparyā eveti. pratyayamātradarśanād abhyupagamyate, sādṛśyāt sādhuśabde 'py avagate pratyayo 'vakalpyate. tasmād amīṣām eko 'nādir anye
GSP28msbh1-7u:1752: 'pabhraṃśāḥ. hastaḥ, karaḥ, pāṇir ityevamādiṣu tv abhiyuktopadeśād anādir amīṣām arthena saṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1754: kathaṃ punas tatra{*1/613*} tattvaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātum. śakyam ity āha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1755: arthino hy abhiyuktā bhavanti. dṛśyate cābhiyuktānāṃ guṇayatām avismaraṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:1756: upapannam. pratyakṣaṃ caitad guṇyamānaṃ na bhraśyata iti. tasmād yam abhiyuktā upadiśanti, eṣa eva sādhur ity avagantavyaḥ{*1/614*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1761: atha yad uktam - artho 'vagamyate gāvyādibhyaḥ, ata eṣām apy anādiarthena saṃbandha iti. tadaśaktir eṣāṃ gamyate. gośabdam uccārayitukāmena kenacid
GSP28msbh1-7u:1762: aśaktyā gāvīty uccāritam. apareṇa jñātaṃ sāsnādimān asya vivakṣitaḥ, tad arthaṃ gaur ity uccārayitukāmo gāvīty uccārayati. [78]{*1/615*} tataḥ śikṣitvāpare 'pi sāsnādim iti vivakṣite gāvīty uccārayanti. tena gāvyādibhyaḥ sāsnādimān avagamyate. anurūpo hi gāvyādigośabdasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1765: ata eva hi vibhaktivyatyaye 'pi pratyayo bhavati. aśmakair āgacchāmīty aśmakaśabdaikadeśa upalabdhe, aśmakebhya ity eva śabdaḥ smaryate. tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:1766: 'śmakebhya ity eṣo 'rtha upalabhyata iti. evaṃ gāvyādidarśanād gośabdasmaraṇam, tataḥ sāsnādimān
GSP28msbh1-7u:1768: atha gaur ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ kim ākṛteḥ pramāṇam uta vyakter iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1769: saṃdehaḥ. ucyate. idaṃ tāvat parīkṣyatām - kiṃ ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ, ta eva vaidikā utānya iti. yadā ta eva, tadāpi kiṃ ta evaiṣām arthāḥ, ye
GSP28msbh1-7u:1770: loke, utānya iti saṃśayaḥ. tatrānye laukikāḥ śabdāḥ, anye vaidikā anye
GSP28msbh1-7u:1771: caiṣām arthā iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ. vyapadeśabhedād rūpabhedāc ca. ime
GSP28msbh1-7u:1772: laukikāḥ, ime vaidikā iti vyapadeśabhedaḥ. agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad
GSP28msbh1-7u:1773: ity{*1/616*} anyad idaṃ rūpaṃ laukikād agniśabdāt. śabdānyatvāc ca na ta
GSP28msbh1-7u:1774: evārthāḥ. api ca samāmananti - uttānā vai devagavā vahantīti{*1/617*}. ye devānāṃ gāvaḥ, ta uttānā vahantīty ukte gamyata eva - ya uttānā vahanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1776: tathā - devebhyo vanaspate havīṃṣi hiraṇyaparṇa pradivaste artham
GSP28msbh1-7u:1777: iti{*1/619*}, hiraṇyaparṇo vai devo{*1/620*} vanaspatir vede. etad vai daivyaṃ madhu, yad ghṛtam iti{*1/621*} veda ghṛte madhuśabdaḥ. tasmād amīṣām anye 'rthā iti prāpte brūmaḥ - ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ, ta eva vaidikāḥ, ta evaiṣām arthā iti. kutaḥ. prayogacodanābhāvāt. evaṃ prayogacodanā saṃbhavati, yadi ta eva śabdāḥ, ta evārthāḥ. itarathā śabdānyatve 'rtho na pratīyeta. tasmād ekaśabdatvam iti. ucyate prayojanam idam, hetur vyapadiśyatām iti. tato hetur ucyate - avibhāgād iti. na teṣām eṣāṃ ca vibhāgam upalabhāmahe. ata evaikaśabdatvam. tāṃś ca tāṃś cārthān
GSP28msbh1-7u:1778: avagacchāmaḥ. ato nānyatvaṃ ca vadāmaḥ. yac coktam - ya uttānā vadanti, te
GSP28msbh1-7u:1779: devagāvāḥ; yad ghṛtam, tan madhu; yo hiraṇya-parṇaḥ, sa vanaspatir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1780: nāsti vacanaṃ yad uttānānāṃ vahatāṃ gotvaṃ brūyāt. ye gāvaḥ, ta uttānā vahantīty evaṃ tat. yadi cānena vacanena gotvaṃ vidhīyate, uttānā vahantīty anuvādaḥ syāt. na cottānā vahantaḥ prasiddhāḥ kecit. te niyogato vidhātavyāḥ, teṣu vidhīyamāneṣu na śakyaṃ gotvaṃ vidhātum. bhidyate hi tathā vākyam. yadi cānye vaidikāḥ, tata uttānādīnām artho na gamyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1781: tatra natarāṃ śakyetāvijñātalakṣaṇaṃ gotvaṃ vijñātum. na cottānavahanavacanam apy anarthakam, stutyarthenārthavad bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1782: evaṃ ghṛtasya madhutvam, hiraṇyaparṇatā ca vanaspateḥ. tasmāt ta eva śabdā arthāś ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1783: yadi laukikās ta evārthāḥ, tadā saṃdehaḥ - kim ākṛtiḥ śabdārtho 'tha
GSP28msbh1-7u:1784: vyaktir iti. kā punar ākṛtiḥ, kā vyaktir iti. dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sāmānyamātram ākṛtiḥ, asādhāraṇaviśeṣā [80]{*1/622*} vyaktiḥ. kutaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1785: saṃśayaḥ? gaur ity ukte sāmānyapratyayād, vyaktau ca kriyāsaṃbandhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1786: tad ucyate - vyaktiḥ śabdārtha iti. kutaḥ? prayogacodanābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1788: yatroccāraṇānarthakyam, tatra vyaktyarthaḥ. ato 'nyatrākṛtivacana iti cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1789: uktam{*1/623*} - anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. kathaṃ sāmānyāvagatir iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1790: cet. vyaktipadārthasyākṛtiś cihnabhūtā bhaviṣyati, ya evam ākṛtikaḥ, sa gaur iti. yathā yasya daṇḍo 'sti, sa daṇḍīti, na ca daṇḍavacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:1796: *{1/620: E4: hiraṇyaparṇo vai devo; E2: hiraṇyaparṇo vai devavanaspatir;
GSP28msbh1-7u:1797: E4 (Fn.): hiraṇyaparṇo devavanaspatiḥ; E5,6: hiraṇyaparṇo devo}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1801: dravyāśrayasya śabdo dravyaśabdaḥ, na tatra dravyāśrayavacanaḥ śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1802: bhavet, yady ākṛtiḥ śabdārtho bhavet. ṣaḍ deyā dvādaśa deyā{*1/624*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:1803: caturviṃśatir deyā iti. na hy ākṛtiḥ ṣaḍādibhiḥ saṃkhyābhir yujyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1808: yadi paśur upākṛtaḥ palāyeta, anyaṃ tadvarṇaṃ tadvayasam ālabheta
GSP28msbh1-7u:1809: iti{*1/625*}. yady ākṛtivacanaḥ śabdo bhavet, anyasyālambho nopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1810: anyasvāpi paśudravyasya saivākṛtiḥ. tasmād vyaktivacana iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1814: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. ākṛti śabdārthaḥ. kutaḥ? kriyārthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1815: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta iti{*1/626*} vacanam ākṛtau saṃbhavati, yady ākṛtyarthaḥ śyenaśabdaḥ. vyaktivacane tu na cayanena
GSP28msbh1-7u:1818: nanu śyenavyaktibhiś cayanam anuṣṭhāsyate. na sādhakatamaḥ śyenaśabdārthaḥ, īpsitatamo hy asau śyenaśabdena nirdiśyate. ataś cayanena śyeno nivartayitavyaḥ, sa ākṛtivacanatve 'vakalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1819: nanūbhayatra kriyāyā asaṃbhava eva vyapadiśyate. nākṛtiḥ śabdārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1820: kutaḥ. kriyā na saṃbhaved ākṛtau śabdārthe, vrīhīn prokṣatīti{*1/628*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1821: tathā na vyaktiḥ śabdārthaḥ, kriyaiva na saṃbhaved vyakteḥ

GSP28msbh1-7u:1967: karmanāmadheye tu saṃbhavataḥ. yasminn agnaye hotraṃ [90]{*1/664*} homo
GSP28msbh1-7u:1968: bhavati, tad agnihotram. dīrghadhārā kṣaraṇakriyā prasiddha evāghāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1969: tasmāt karmanāmadheye. prasiddhyādayaś coktottarāḥ. prajāpatinivṛttyartham agnividhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cen. naitad evam. agniṃ hy eṣa vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1970: na parjāpatiṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ. pratiṣidhyamānasya ca prajāpater vidhānam anarthakaṃ syāt, prajāpatir devateti gamyate. gamyamānaṃ ca na śakyaṃ mithyeti kalpayitum. ato 'yam asamādhiḥ. ucyate - āghāram āghārayatīti dravyaparā codanā. yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyata iti{*1/665*}, dravyaṃ hy anayā kriyayā kṣāryate. kṣāritaṃ ca yāgaṃ sādhayati. tat kasya pradhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:1971: karmaṇo nāmadheyam iti. ucyate - etad evāghāraṇaṃ pradhānakarma. nanv asya dravyadevataṇ nāsti. astīti brūmaḥ. tasyāghāram āghāryety ājyaṃ dravyam;
GSP28msbh1-7u:1972: māntravarṇikī devatā - indra ūrdhvoddhara ity āghāram
GSP28msbh1-7u:1973: āghārayatīti{*1/666*} mantro hy abhidadhat karma, tatsādhanaṃ vā karmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:1974: samavaiti. eṣa ca mantra indram abhidhātuṃ śaknoti. sa yadīndras tatsādhanaṃ bhavet, evam anena mantreṇāghāraḥ śakyate kartum. tasmād indro devatā, dravyadevatāsaṃyuktam āghāraṇam. tasmād yajatiḥ, tasya yajater nāmadheyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1983: athaiṣa śyenenābhicaran yajeta{*1/667*}; athaiṣa saṃdaṃśenābhicaran yajeta{*1/668*}; athaiṣa gavābhicaran yajeteti{*1/669*} samāmnāyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1984: tatra guṇavidhiḥ karmanāmadheyam iti saṃdehaḥ. prasiddhyādibhiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1985: pūrvapakṣaḥ, udbhidādīnām iva. te tūdbhidādayaḥ kriyānimittāḥ śaknuvanti yāgaṃ vaditum. ime punar jātinimittā na śaknuvanti, [91]{*1/670*} tena guṇavidhaya ity evaṃ prāptam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tadvyapadeśaṃ ca. tena śyenādīnā prasiddhena yasya vyapadeśaḥ, tac ca karmanāmadheyam. śrutir hi nāmadheyatve, lakṣaṇā guṇavidhau. yat tu jātiśabdāḥ, ime na yāgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:1986: abhivadantīti. sādṛśyavyapadeśād abhivadiṣyanti. evaṃ hi vyapadeśo bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:1987: - yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte, evam ayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1988: nipatyādatte, yam abhicaranti śyeneneti{*1/671*}. nipatyādatta ity anena
GSP28msbh1-7u:1989: sādṛśyena śyenaśabdo yāge, yathā siṃho devadatta iti. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:1990: karmanāmadheyam. saṃdaṃśe, saṃdaṃśena yathā durādānam ādatta iti. gavi yathā gāvo gopāyantīti. tasmāt saṃdaṃśaśabdo 'pi karmanāmadheyaṃ gośabdo 'pi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1996: nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ syād vidhānam iti cet // MS_1,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:1997: vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti{*1/672*} śrūyate. tatra kiṃ guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1998: karmanāmadheyam iti saṃdehaḥ. evaṃ cet saṃdehaḥ, dṛśyate guṇavidhiḥ. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:1999: saṃdehaḥ, śrūyate hi guṇaḥ. so 'vagamyamāno na śakyo nāstīti vaditum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2004: naitad evam, tulye hīme kriye syātām. yā ca vājypeyakriyā, yā ca darśapurṇamāsakriyā, ubhayatra dārśapaurṇamāsiko vidhyantaḥ syāt. tathā ca dīkṣāṇām upasadāṃ ca darśanaṃ nāvakalpyeta, saptadaśadīkṣo vājapeya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2005: saptadaśopasatko vājapeya iti. atha vā tulyatvāt kriyayor neti. yadi na guṇavidhiḥ, tatas tulyaiṣā vājapeyakriyā jyotiṣṭomakriyayā. tatra{*1/673*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2006: dīkṣāṇā[92]{*1/674*}m upasadāṃ ca darśanam upapannam. tasmāt karmanāmadheyam iti. liṅgaṃ tv etat, prāptiḥ punar uttarasūtreṇa.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2010: yadi guṇavidhiḥ syāt, svārthavat parārthavac cābhidhānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2011: vipratiṣidhyeta{*1/675*} yajetety asya śabdasya. yadi svārājyakāmo yajeteti svārājyakāmasya yāgaṃ vidhātuṃ svārtham ucyate, na tarhi vājapeyena guṇena saṃbaddhuṃ parārtham anūdyeta yāgena vājapeyaguṇakeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2012: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. nanu dve evaite vākye pratyakṣam upalabhāmahe -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2013: svārājyakāmo{*1/676*} yajetety{*1/677*} etad ekaṃ pratyakṣaṃ padadvayam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2014: yajeta vājapeyenety etad api pratyakṣam eva. naitad evam. evaṃ sati catvāri padāny upalabhemahi, trīṇi caitāny upalabhyante. ucyate - yajetety etad ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhantsyate. kathaṃ sakṛd uccāritaṃ saṃbandham ubhābhyām eṣyatīti. rūpābhedāt. īdṛśam evāsya rūpaṃ svārājyakāmena saṃbadhyamānasyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2015: īdṛśam eva vājapeyena. atas tantreṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbhantsyata iti. naitad astīdṛśenaiva rūpeṇeti. yady ajñātaḥ, tato{*1/678*} vidhiḥ. yadi jñātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2016: tato 'nuvādaḥ. na ca jñāto 'jñātaś ca yugapat saṃbhavatīti. āha - yad idam uktam, guṇavidhipakṣe 'nuvādo yajeteti. yady ayam anuvādaḥ, kenedānīṃ guṇo vidhīyate. vājapeyaśabdeneti mā vocaḥ. na hy ākhyātam antareṇa kṛtyaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2017: nāmaśabdārthasya vyāpāro{*1/679*} vidhīyate. yaś cātrākhyātaśabdo yajeteti, so 'nuvāda ity uktam. kenedānīṃ tasya vyāpāro vidhīyate. ataḥ svārājyakāmaṃ guṇaṃ ca prati yajeteti vidhiḥ. tasmād ubhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:2018: iti. yady ubhayatra vidhiḥ, vājapeyo na svārājyakāmasya yāgena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2019: saṃbadhyeta. dve hy ete tadā vākye, na svārājyakāmasya yāgena saha guṇavidher ekavākyatā.[93]{*1/680*} prakaraṇāt saṃbandhaḥ svārājyakāmasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2020: yāgeneti cet, na, vākyena yāgamātre vidhānāt. astu yāgamātreṇa saṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:2021: iti cet, na, svārājyakāmasya yāgena sahaikavākyatāyā gamyamānatvāt. tad evaṃ prakaraṇasya vākyasya ca bādho{*1/681*} yujyate, yadi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2022: karmanāmadheyam. guṇavidhipakṣe hi sarva ime vākyabhedādayo doṣāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2023: prādurbhaveyuḥ. tasmāt karmanāmadheyaṃ vājapeyaśabda iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2030: *{1/681: E1,6; E2,4 (besser): prakaraṇasya cābādho; E5: prakaraṇasya vākyasya cābādho}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2031: tadguṇās tu vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhānārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2032: yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatītyevamādayaḥ{*1/682*} śrūyante. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim āgneyo 'gnīṣomīya ityevamādayo guṇavidhayaḥ, karmanāmadheyānīti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. guṇavidhau saty aneko guṇo vidhīyeta - agnipuroḍāśāṣṭākapālā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2034: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tac ca karmaṃ guṇāś cāsya vidhīyeran. avibhaktā hi te
GSP28msbh1-7u:2035: karmaṇo vidhānārthe tad dhitānte śabde. tatra hy aṣṭākapālasyāgneyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2036: vidhīyate. sa eṣa evam āgneyo bhavati, yady agnaye saṃkalpya dīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2037: tenāyam anena prakāreṇa yāgo vihito bhavati. sa evaṃ vidhīyamāno na śakyo 'gnim aṣṭākapālaṃ cāvidhāya vidhātum, saṃbandho hi vidhīyamāno na śakyate saṃbandhināv avidhāya vihita iti vaktum. tasmād guṇavidhayaḥ. aṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskriyamāṇo vrīhimayo yavamayo vā puroḍāśa eva bhavati. so
GSP28msbh1-7u:2039: vaca[94]{*1/684*}nād nānyena śrapitaṃ gṛhṇanti. tenāsmin pakṣe na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2040: vākyabhedo bhavati. na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ. yatra punar anyena vacanena śiṣṭā guṇā bhavanti, bhavati tatra nāmadheyam. yathā - agnihotraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2046: barhirājyayoḥ puroḍāśe ca saṃdehaḥ - kim ete saṃskāraśabdā uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:2047: jātiśabdā{*1/685*} iti. saṃskāraśabdā iti brūmaḥ. saṃskṛteṣu tṛṇeṣu barhiḥśabdam upacaranti sarvatra, nāsaṃskṛteṣu. saṃskṛte ca ghṛte
GSP28msbh1-7u:2048: ājyaśabdam. tathā saṃskṛte piṣṭe puroḍāśaśabdam. nanv asaṃskṛte 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2049: kasmiṃścid deśa upacaryate. yathā barhir ādāya gāvo gatā iti bhavanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2050: vaktāraḥ. tathā - ājyaṃ krayam iti. puroḍāśena me mātā prahelakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2051: dadātīti. sādṛśyāt teṣu prayogaḥ. yathopaśaye yūpaśabdaḥ. kuta etat? yata ekadeśe hi śabdaprayogaḥ, tasmāt saṃskāraśabdā ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2052: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - barhirādiṣv asaṃskṛteṣv api śabdalābhān na saṃskāraśabdāḥ. nanūktaṃ sādṛśyād ekadeśe bhaviṣyanti. tan na, prasiddhe hi saṃskāraśabdatve, sādṛśyād iti śakyate vaktum. tac cāprasiddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2053: katham? barhirādiśabdair uddiśya saṃskārā vidhīyante. tena satsu śabdeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:2054: saṃskārair bhavitavyam, sati ca saṃskāre śabdalābha itītaretarāśrayaṃ bhavati. na cāvihitāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti, yān ālocya lokaḥ prayuñjīta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2055: tasmān na lokāḥ saṃskṛteṣu barhirādīn prayuñjate. tata ekadeśe 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2056: jāti[95]{*1/686*}nimittā dṛṣṭāḥ, sarvatra jātinimittā bhavitum arhanti. na cālaukikānāṃ satāṃ vedād eva pūrvottarapadasaṃbandham anapekṣya śakyate 'rtho 'dhyavasātum. pūrvottarapade anarthake mā bhūtām ity evaṃ sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:2057: parikalpyeta. aśakyas tv anavagamyamānaḥ parikalpayitum, arthavatī ca te
GSP28msbh1-7u:2058: pade pūrvottare laukikenāsaṃskṛtaprayogeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ. tasmāj jātiśabdā evaṃjātīyakāḥ. prayojanam - barhiṣā yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇātīti saṃskṛtair eva staritavyam, yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, viparītaṃ siddhānte.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2062: prokṣaṇīr āsādaya iti{*1/687*} śrūyate. tatra prokṣaṇīśabdaṃ prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:2063: saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saṃskāranimitta uta jātinimitta uta yaugika iti. tatra saṃskāreṣu satsu darśanāt saṃskāraśabdatāyām avagamyamānāyām asaṃskṛte śabdalābhāj jātiśabdaḥ. asaṃskṛtāsv evāpsu prokṣaṇībhir udvejitāḥ sma iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2064: kasmiṃścid deśe bhavanti vaktāraḥ. tena jātiśabda iti prāpte. yaugika ity ucyate. kutaḥ? arthasaṃyogāt. prokṣaṇya ity upasargadhātupratyayasamudāyasya jātinimittatā prayogād anumīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2065: secanasaṃyogāt tūpasargadhātukaraṇapratyayasahito 'psu pravatata iti prasiddhir anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati. yadānyad api secanaṃ prokṣaṇaśabdenocyate tadā tatsaṃyogād evāpsu bhaviṣyatīti na samudāyārthaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2066: tasmād yaugikaḥ. prayojanaṃ ghṛtaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti, yadi saṃskāraśabdāḥ prokṣaṇīrāsādayeti praiṣaḥ. yadi jātiśabdaḥ, ghṛtam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2071: nirmanthyeneṣṭakāḥ pacantīti. saṃskṛte darśanāt saṃskāraśabdo nirmanthya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2072: iti. asaṃskāre 'pi dṛśyate. nirmanthyamānayādainaṃ pakṣyāma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2073: nirmanthanayogāt pūrvavad yaugika iti saṃsthitam. prayojanaṃ saṃskāranimitte saṃskṛteneṣṭakāḥ paktavyāḥ. jātiśabde yathopapannena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2074: yaugike 'ciranirmathite yathā nāvanītena bhuṅkta ity aciranirdagdheneti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2076: cāturmāsyeṣu prathame parvaṇi vaiśvadeve saṃdehaḥ - vaiśvadevena yajeta iti{*1/689*}. kiṃ vaiśvadevaśabdo guṇavidhir uta karmanāmadheyam iti. yadi saṃdeho na saṃdehaḥ. vaiśvadeve vikalpaḥ. guṇavidhir vaiśvadevaśabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2077: gamyate hi guṇavidhānam. viśvedevā vidhīyanta āgneyādiṣu yāgeṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2078: tatrāgnyādīnāṃ viśvair devair vikalpaḥ. evaṃ prasiddhir arthavatī
GSP28msbh1-7u:2082: na vā prakaraṇāt pratyakṣavidhānāc ca na hi prakaraṇaṃ dravyasya //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2083: naitad evam. pratyakṣaśrutivihitā agnyādayas teṣāṃ yāgānām, viśvedevā vākyena prakaraṇāt tenaiva nānyeneti gamyate. na cāyaṃ viṣamaśiṣṭho
GSP28msbh1-7u:2084: vikalpo bhavitum arhati. na hi prakaraṇaṃ śrutasya dravyasya bādhane
GSP28msbh1-7u:2088: athocyate vaiśvadeva ity anena śabdena pratyakṣam agnyādiguṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaguṇo lakṣyate. vaiśvadevī hi tatrāmikṣā samavaiti. yadi vaiśvadevaśabdena yāgaguṇo lakṣyate na tarhi viśvedevā vidhīyante kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2089: sakṛd uccarito vaiśvadevaśabdo yāgaguṇaṃ lakṣayiṣyati viśvāṃś ca devān vidhāsyatīti nāyaṃ vaiśvadevaśabdasya viśvair devair mithaḥ saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:2090: ghaṭate. tasmāt karmanāmadheyam eva guṇavidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2092: parārthāś ca guṇāḥ. te na śaknuvanti pradhānam āvartayitum. tena sakṛd yāga kartavyo na guṇānurodhenāvartitum arhati. saṃpratipannadevatatvāc ca na virodhaḥ. tatraikasyāṃ pradhānāhutau triṃśadāhutayo hūyanta iti triṃśatsaṃkhyāsaṃpattir āhavanīyāhutīnāṃ nāvakalpate. tasmāt karmanāmadheyam iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2094: vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāta iti{*1/691*} śrūyate. tatra yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati gāyatryaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punātītyevamādayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2095: kapālavikalpāḥ śrūyante teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim aṣṭatvādayo guṇavidhaya utārthavādā iti. tatra guṇavidhaya ity evaṃ brūmaḥ - katham? ye hi pūrvavanto (viditapūrvam{*1/692*} artha[98]{*1/693*}m
GSP28msbh1-7u:2096: abhivadanti){*1/694*} te 'vidhānārthāḥ tad etad asya vākyasya samāmnāye sāmarthyaṃ yadavihitapūrvakābhidhānam. kiṃ tat, vidhānasāmarthyam. evam avihitam arthaṃ vidhāsyati. itarathārthavādāḥ santo 'narthakāḥ syuḥ. na ca dvadaśakapālasya śeṣabhāvam upagantum arhati. pratyakṣā hy aṣṭānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2097: kapālānāṃ stutiḥ parokṣā dvādaśānām. pratyakṣābhāve ca parokṣā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2103: guṇasya tu vidhānārthe tadguṇāḥ prayoge syur anarthakā na hi taṃ pratyarthavatāsti // MS_1,4.18
GSP28msbh1-7u:2104: naitad asti guṇavidhaya iti. guṇasya vidhānārthā ete santaḥ puroḍāśasya kapāleṣu saṃkhyā vidadhyuḥ. na śaknuvanti yāgaprayogasya vidhātum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2105: dvādaśakapālatā hi yāgasya vākyena, aṣṭākapālādayaḥ prakareṇa. tena te yāge na bhaviṣyanti. api cāṣṭatvādayaḥ puroḍāśenaikavākyabhūtāḥ prakaraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2106: bādhitvā, na yāgasya bhaviṣyanti. yāgāsaṃbandhe cānarthakāḥ puroḍāśasaṃbandhe phalābhāvāt. arthavādatvena tu vaiśvānarayāgasya stutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:2109: iti yad uktaṃ tat parihartavyam ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2111: yadā tv aṣṭākapālādiprarocanārthā anarthakā ity avagataṃ tadā lakṣaṇayā dvādaśakapālasya stutir vaiśvānarayāgaprarocanārthā bhaviṣyati. santi hi dvādaśasaṃkhyāyām aṣṭatvādayaḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣā [99]{*1/695*} avibhaktāḥ. ato dvādaśakapālasya stutyarthatvenāvayavastutir upapadyate. yathā śobhanam asya cakrasya nemitumbāram, śobhanam asyāḥ senāyā hastyaśvarathapādātam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2115: iti ced bhavān paśyaty arthavādā iti, kāraṇam aṣṭatvādīnāṃ brahmavarcasādi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2116: kasmān na bhavati. brahmavarcasakāmasyāṣṭākapālaḥ. evam uttareṣu yathākāmam. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati. puroḍāśasya guṇavidhāne 'py ānarthakyaṃ na bhaviṣyati na ca lakṣaṇayā dvādaśakapālasya stutiḥ kalpitā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2118: ānarthakyād akāraṇaṃ kartur hi kāraṇāni guṇārtho hi vidhīyate // MS_1,4.22
GSP28msbh1-7u:2119: yadi kāmāya vidhayaḥ, bhinnāni vākyāni bhaveyuḥ. ekaṃ cedaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2120: vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśa-kapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāta ity edamapakrāntaṃ yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:2121: dvādaśakapālo bhavati jagatyaivāsmin paśūn dadhāti yasmiñ jāta etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati pūta eva sa tejasv yan nāda indriyāvī paśumān bhavatīty{*1/696*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2122: evam antam. tasya madhye 'ṣṭatvādayaḥ śrūyamāṇā yadi na saṃbadhyeraṃs tato vākyāntarāṇi bhaveyuḥ. [100]{*1/697*} kartur hi kāraṇāni pūtatvādīni
GSP28msbh1-7u:2123: bhaveyuḥ. sa eṣa guṇārtho 'tra vidhīyate vaiśvānarayāge pūta eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:2124: ityevamādiḥ. tena caite 'ṣṭatvādayaḥ sākṣād dhetutvena saṃbadhyante yasmād gāyatryaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti tena pūta eva saḥ, yasmāt trivṛtaivāsmiṃs tejo dadhāti tena tejasvī. yasmād virājaivāsminn annādyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2125: dadhāti tenānnādaḥ. yasmāt triṣṭubhaivāsminn indriyaṃ dadhāti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2126: tenendriyāvī. yasmāj jagaty aivāsmin paśūna dadhāti tena paśumān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2127: tataḥ kāmāya vidhayo 'saṃbhavanto yady arthavādā api na bhaveyur ānarthakyam evaiṣāṃ syāt. tasmād akāraṇaṃ brahmavarcastvād yo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2133: samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yajamānaḥ prastara ity eṣa guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2134: kim arthavāda iti. tathā yajamāna ekakapāla iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2135: guṇavidhir iti. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati evam apūrvam arthaṃ vidhāsyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2136: itarathārthavādo 'narthakaḥ syāt. arthavattvaṃ ca nyāyyam. tasmād vidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2137: naitad evam, yadi vidhiḥ syāt, tataḥ prastarakārye{*1/700*} yajamāno
GSP28msbh1-7u:2138: niyamyeta. yajamānakārye vā prastaraḥ. prastare juhūm āsādayati, sarvā vā sruva{*1/701*} iti yajamāne juhūr āsādyeta. sarvā vā sruva{*1/702*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2139: tathāsati{*1/703*} na yājamānaṃ śakyate kartum, dīkṣaṇato brahmayajamānāv āsāte karmaṇa kriyamāṇasya iti{*1/704*}. na ca prastaro yājamānaṃ śaknoti kartum. tathā yadi yajamāna ekakapālakārye viniyujyeta sarvahutaḥ kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2140: tatra sarvatantraparilopaḥ [101]{*1/705*} syāt. na caikakapālo yājamānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2141: śaknoti kartum. tasmān na vidhiḥ. vidhyantaraṃ cāsti prastaram uttaraṃ barhiṣaḥ sādayati, ekakapālaṃ sarvahataṃ karoti, iti. tasmād api na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2142: vidhiḥ. kiṃ hi arthavādaḥ. yajamāno jñāyata eva prastara ekakapāla iti ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2143: kathaṃ punar anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ jñāyate. na hi prastara ekakapālo vā yajamānaḥ. na ca yajamāna ekasmin kapāle saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśaḥ prathamo vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2144: kaśam ṣṭir lūnaḥ. kathaṃ paraśabdaḥ paratra vartate, kim arthaṃ vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2145: jñāyamānasva saṃkīrtanam iti. ucyate - jñāyamānaḥ saṃkīrtyate stotum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2146: prastara uttaro barhiṣaḥ sādayitavyo yajamānatvāt. tathā yajamāna ekakapālaḥ sarvahutaḥ kartavyaḥ svarga āhavanīyas tatra pratiṣṭhāpito
GSP28msbh1-7u:2148: kathaṃ paratra vartate paraśabda iti. guṇavādas tu. guṇād eṣa vādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2149: katham aguṇavacano guṇaṃ brūyāt. svārthābhidhānaneti brūmaḥ. sarva evaite gauṇāḥ śabdā na svārthaṃ hitvā guṇeṣu vartante. prasiddhahānir hi tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2150: syād aprasiddhakalpanā ca. na ca sarve guṇasamudāyavacanāḥ. guṇahīne 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2151: darśanāt. aprasahyakāry api hi kadācid rogeṇopahataḥ siṃhyāḥ putraḥ siṃha eva. samudāyavācī ca nāvayave pravartitum arhati. sarvasiṃhavyāktiṣu yat sāmānyaṃ tad vacanaḥ śabda iti sthito nyāyaḥ pratyuddhriyeta. na cāsati siṃho parikalpanayā pravarteta. kalpanāyā aśakyatvāt. kathaṃ nu svārthābhidhānena pratyayavyavastheti cet. arthasaṃbandhāt. siṃha iti nirjñāyate prasahyakāritā tatra prāyeṇeti prasahyakārīti gamyate, arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2152: pratyayasāmarthyāt. yo hi manyate prasahyakāriṇaṃ pratyāyayeyam iti sa yadi siṃhaśabdam uccārayati sidhyaty asyābhipretam. siṃhārthaḥ pratītaḥ prasahya[102]{*1/706*}kārīti saṃbandhād itaram arthaṃ pratyāyayati. evaṃ svārthābhidhānena tadguṇasaṃbandhaḥ pratīyate. iha tu yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ yajamāna ekakapāla iti kīdṛśo guṇa saṃbandhaḥ pratīyate. tatsiddhikara
GSP28msbh1-7u:2153: iti. sarvo hy ātmanah kāryasiddhiṃ karoti. anyo 'pi yas tasya kāryasiddhiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2154: karoti sa tasminn uccarite hṛdayam āgacchati. yathā rājā pattigaṇaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2155: pattigaṇako rājñaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayati. sa rājaśabda uccarite pratīyate. evam ihāpi yajamānakāryaṃ prastaraikakapālau sādhayataḥ, tau yajamāne pratīte
GSP28msbh1-7u:2156: pratīyete. tasmāt tau yajamānaśabdena pratyāyete. kathaṃ? stutau syātāṃ barhiṣa uparisādane sarvahome ceti. tasmād evaṃjātīyakā arthavādā na vidhaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2160: *{1/700: E1,5; E2,4,6: syāt prastarakārye, E4 (Fn.): syāt, tataḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2167: āgneyo vai brāhmaṇaḥ{*1/707*}; aindro rājanyaḥ{*1/708*}; vaiśyo vaiśvadeva ityevamādayaḥ{*1/709*} śrūyante. tatra guṇavidhayaḥ ārthavādā iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2168: saṃdehaḥ. guṇavidhaya iti brūmaḥ. evam apūrvam arthaṃ vidhāsyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2169: itarathārthavādāḥ santo 'narthakāḥ syuḥ. na vidhir vidhyantarasya bhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2170: tasmāt saṃvādaḥ. tasya saṃkīrtanaṃ vidhistutyartham. anāgneyādiṣv āgneyādiśabdāḥ kena prakāreṇa. guṇavādena. ko guṇavādaḥ. agnisaṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2171: katham? ekajātīyakatvāt. kim ekajātīyakatvam. prajāpatir akāmayata, prajāḥ sṛjeyam iti. sa mukhatas trivṛtaṃ nirabhimīta, tam agnir devatānvasṛjyata,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2172: gāyatrī chandaḥ, rathantaraṃ sāma, brāhmaṇo manuṣyāṇām ajaḥ paśūnām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2173: tasmāt te mukhyāḥ, mukhato hy asṛjyanta. uraso [103]{*1/710*} bāhubhyāṃ pañcadaśaṃ nirmimīta, tam indro devatānasṛjyata, triṣṭup chandaḥ, bṛhat
GSP28msbh1-7u:2174: sāma, rājanyo manuṣyāṇām, aviḥ paśūnām. tasmāt te vīryavantaḥ, vīryād dhi asṛjyanta. ūrubhyāṃ madhyataḥ saptadaśaṃ niramimīta, taṃ viśvedevā devatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2175: anvasṛjyanta, jagatī chandaḥ, vairūpaṃ sāma, vaiśyo manuṣyāṇām, gāvaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2176: paśūnām{*1/711*}. evam ukte saty ekasminn evaṃjātīyake vijñāte 'nyo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2185: yajamāno yūpaḥ; āditye yūpa ityādi{*1/713*} śrūyate. tatra guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2186: arthavādaḥ, iti saṃdehaḥ. arthavattvād guṇavidhi. aśakyatvād yūpakāryasādhane yajamānasya, yajamānakāryasādhane vā yūpasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2187: vidhyantarabhāvāc ca na vidhiḥ. vidhistutyarthaṃ saṃvādaḥ. guṇavādāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:2188: sāmānādhikaraṇyam. ko guṇaḥ? sārūpyam. kiṃ sārūpyam? ūrdhvatā tejasvitā ca. tasmād evaṃjātīyakā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2192: apaśavo vā anye go 'śvebhyaḥ, paśavo go 'śvāḥ{*1/714*}. ayajño vā eṣa yo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2193: 'sāmā{*1/715*}. asatraṃ vā etad yad achandomam iti{*1/716*} śrūyate. tatra vidhyartha vādasaṃdehe, arthavattvād vidhaya iti prāpte. abhidhīyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2194: yadi vidhayo bhaveyuḥ, go 'śvā eva paśavaḥ syuḥ, sāmavān eva yajñaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2195: chandomavad eva satram. anyeṣāṃ paśūnām, yajñānām, [104]{*1/717*} satrāṇāṃ cotpattir anarthikā syāt. vidhyantaraṃ ca nāvakalpeta. ataḥ stutyarthaṃ saṃvādaḥ. go 'śvān praśaṃsitum anyeṣāṃ paśūnāṃ nindā. sāmavataḥ praśaṃsitum asāmnāṃ nindā. chandomavanti praśaṃsitum acchandomakāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:2196: nidyante. yathā - yad aghṛtam, abhojanaṃ tat. yan malinam, avāsas tad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2202: sṛṣṭīr upadadhātīti{*1/718*} śrūyate. tatra guṇavidhir arthavāda iti saṃdehe apūrvatvād vidhir iti prāpte. ucyate - yadi vidhiḥ, sṛṣṭimantrakā upadadhātīṣṭakā ity arthaḥ. tatra neṣṭakānāṃ viśeṣaḥ kaścid āśrīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2203: evaṃrūpāḥ sṛṣṭimantrakā naivaṃrūpā iti. tatra sarvāsāṃ sṛṣṭiliṅgā mantrāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2204: prāpnuyuḥ. anyeṣām asaṃyuktānāṃ mantrāṇām ānarthakyaṃ syāt. tasmād anuvādo mantrasamāmnānāt prāptānām upadhāne mantrāṇām. sṛṣṭīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2205: saṃkīrtanaṃ{*1/719*} sarjanārthavādārtham. api ca vidhitve lakṣaṇā, ekayā stuvata ity{*1/720*} atra yā asṛṣṭayas tā lakṣayet. nanv anuvāde 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2206: lakṣaṇā{*1/721*}. nānuvādapakṣe lakṣaṇāyāṃ doṣaḥ. kathaṃ tv asṛṣṭiṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:2207: sṛṣṭiṣu ca sṛṣṭiśabda iti. bhūmnā. bahavas tatra sṛṣṭiliṅgā mantrāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2213: *{1/721: E4 om. ekayā stuvata ity atra yā asṛṣṭayas tā lakṣayet/ nanv anuvāde 'pi lakṣaṇā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2215: prāṇabhṛta upadadhāti{*1/724*}; ājyānīr upadadhātīti{*1/725*} vidhitve prāṇabhṛn mantrakāsūpadhīyamānāsu viliṅgānāṃ mantrāṇām ānarthakyam/ tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2216: anuvādaḥ/ liṅgasamavāyāt paraśabdaḥ paratra vartate. yathā - chatriṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2217: gacchantīty, ekena chatriṇā sarve lakṣyante. na cāyaṃ prāṇabhṛc chaśabdaḥ sṛṣṭiśabdaś ca jahatsvārthaṃ mantragaṇaṃ lakṣayet. yad gaṇe ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:2218: sṛṣṭiprāṇabhṛc chabdau samavetau, tāv api parigṛhyete. yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2219: chatriśabdena svārthalakṣaṇārthena so 'pi chatrī gṛhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2221: *{1/723: E2 hat hier MS 1.4.23, da sie ab MS 1.4.22: ānarthakyād akāraṇaṃ kartur hi kāraṇāni guṇārtho hi vidhīyate// nicht mehr weiterzählt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2225: aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti{*1/726*}; tejo vai ghṛtam iti{*1/727*} śrūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2226: tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ ghṛtatailavasānām anyatamena dravyeṇāñjanīyāḥ śarkarā uta ghṛtenaiveti. kathaṃ saṃdehaḥ. añjanasāmānyena vākyasyopakramo ghṛtena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2227: viśeṣeṇa nigamanam. yathopakramaṃ nigamayitavyam ekasmin vākye. tatra yad vā sāmānyam ādau viśeṣopalakṣaṇārthaṃ vivakṣyate. yad vā nigamane viśeṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2228: sāmānyalakṣaṇārthaḥ. tadārambhanigamanayoḥ kiṃ samañjasam iti saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2229: evaṃ saṃdigdheṣūpakrame sāmānyavacane virodhābhāvān na viśeṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2230: parikalpyaḥ. nigamane tūpajātaḥ sāmānyapratyaya iti virodhāl lakṣaṇārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2231: ghṛtavacanam. yathā sṛṣṭiṣv asṛṣṭiṣu ca sṛṣṭiśabdaḥ, evaṃ ghṛtam aghṛtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2233: [106]{*1/728*} saṃdigdheṣv evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sāmānyavacanena viśeṣāpekṣiṇopakramo vākyasya viśeṣe nigamanavaśena. kutaḥ? na hi sāmānyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2234: vihitam. yena virodho nigamanasya. katham avihitam. saṃdigdheṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:2235: vidhānaśabdābhāvāt. na hi vidhānaśabdo 'sti. aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhātīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2236: vartamānakālanirdeśāt. nāpi sāmānyasya sākṣāt stutiḥ, pratyakṣaṃ tu ghṛtasya stavanam. śrutyā ghṛtasya stutiḥ, lakṣaṇayā sāmānyasya. śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā jyāyasī. tasmād ghṛtavidhānam. evam vāsaḥ paridhatte, etad vai sarvadevatyaṃ vāso yat kṣaumam iti tathā imāṃ spṛṣṭvodnāyet, imāṃ hy audumbarīṃ viśvābhūtāny upajīvanīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2241: sruveṇāvadyati; svadhitināvadyati; hastenāvadyatīti{*1/729*} śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ sruveṇāvadātavyaṃ sarvasya dravasya saṃhatasya māṃsasya ca tathā svadhitinā, hastena ca, uta sarveṣām arthato vyavasthā dravāṇāṃ sruveṇa, māṃsānāṃ svadhitinā, sahatānāṃ hasteneti. aviśeṣābhidhānād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2243: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - arthād vā kalpanā, sāmarthyāt kalpaneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2244: sruveṇāvadyed yathā śaknuyāt. tathā yasya śaknuyā. tasya ceti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2245: ākhyātaśabdānām arthaṃ bruvatāṃ śaktiḥ sahakāriṇī, [107]{*1/730*} eva ced yathāśakti vyavasthā bhavitum arhati. tathā - añjalinā saktūn pradāvye
GSP28msbh1-7u:2247: tathā hi śakyate homo nirvartayitum. tad yathā - kaṭe bhuṅkte kāṃsyapātryāṃ bhuṅkta ity{*1/732*} arthāt kalpyate - kaṭe samāsīnaḥ kāṃsyapātryāmodanaṃ nidhāya bhuṅkta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2253: bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdās tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyetaiṣa hy artho vidhīyate //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2254: prathame 'dhyāye pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam, tatra vidhyarthavādamantrasmṛtayas tattvato nirṇītāḥ, guṇavidhir nāmadheyaṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:2255: parīkṣitam, sandigdhānām arthānāṃ vākyaśeṣād arthādhyavasānam uktam. tan na prasmartavyam. anantaraṃ pradhānāpradhānāni{*2/1*} parīkṣiṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2256: bhinnāny abhinnāni ceti, eṣa evārtho varṇanīyo nānyaḥ, eṣa eva cādhyāyasaṃbandhaḥ. tad iha ṣaḍvidhaḥ karmabhedo vakṣyate - śabdāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2257: abhyāsaḥ, saṃkhyā, guṇaḥ, prakriyā, nāmadheyam iti vakṣyamānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2258: anusaṃkīrtyate. pradarśitam ucyamānaṃ sukhaṃ grāhayiṣyata iti śrotuś ca buddhiḥ samādhīyate, tad etan nānākarmalakṣaṇam ity adhyāyam ācakṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2260: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cintyate - prathame 'dhyāya idam uktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2261: codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma iti {*2/3*}, codanā ca kriyāyā abhidhāyakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2262: vākyam, vākye ca padānām arthāḥ, tatra kiṃ padena padena dharma ucyate{*2/4*}, uta sarvair eka eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? prati padaṃ dharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2263: evaṃ prāpta ucyate - yadaikasmād apūrvam, tadānyat tadarthaṃ [109]{*2/5*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2264: bhaviṣyati, evam alpīyasy adṛṣṭānumānaprasaṇgakalpanā bhaviṣyati. tasmād ekam apūrvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2265: yadaikam, tadā sandehaḥ - kim, bhāvaśabdebhyaḥ, uta dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti?. kaḥ punar bhāvaḥ? ke te punar bhāvaśabdā iti? yajati dadāti juhotītyevamādayaḥ. nanu yāgadānahomaśabdā ete, na bhāvaśabdāḥ. naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:2266: evam. yāgādiśabdāś caite bhāvaśabdāś ca, yajyādyarthaś cāto 'vagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2267: bhāvayed iti ca. tathā yateta, yathā kiṃcid bhavatīti. tenaite
GSP28msbh1-7u:2268: bhāvaśabdāḥ, dravyaguṇaśabdebhyo dravyaguṇapratyayo na bhāvanāyāḥ. atas te na bhāvaśabdā iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? aviśeṣeṇeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2269: tata ucyate - bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāḥ, tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2270: yajetetyevamādibhyaḥ. kutaḥ? bhāvārthatvād eva. ya āhuḥ - kim api bhāvayed
GSP28msbh1-7u:2271: iti, te svargakāmapadasaṃbandhāt svargaṃ bhāvayed iti brūyuḥ. tasmāt tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta, phalasya kriyā karaṇaṃ niṣpattir iti. te ca yāgadānahomasaṃbaddhāḥ svargasyotpattiṃ vadanti. kutaḥ? eṣa hy artho
GSP28msbh1-7u:2272: vidhīyate, yathā - yāgādinā svargakāmaḥ kena bhāvayet svargam? yāgādineti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2273: yasya ca śabdasyārthena phalaṃ sādhyate, tenāpūrvaṃ kṛtvā, nānyatheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2274: tato 'pūrvaṃ gamyate, ato yaḥ tasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, tato 'pūrvaṃ pratīyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:2275: iti. tena bhāvaśabdā apūrvasya codakā iti brūmaḥ. na tu kaścic chabdaḥ sākṣād apūrvasya vācako 'sti. bhāvārthaiḥ kim api bhāvayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2276: svargakāmasya ca kenāpi bhāvyateti, tayor naṣṭāśvadagdha-rathavat
GSP28msbh1-7u:2277: saṃprayogaḥ, yajetetyevamādayaḥ sākāṅkṣāḥ, yajeta kiṃ kena katham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2278: svargakāma ity anena prayojanena nirākāṅkṣāḥ. naivaṃ dravyaguṇaśabdāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2279: tasmād bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdā apūrvaṃ codayantīti. atha kasmād ubhayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2281: bhavanti kecit karmaśabdā na bhāvārthāḥ, yathā śyenaikatrikādayaḥ{*2/8*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2282: kecid bhāvārthā na karmaśabdāḥ, yathā bhavanaṃ bhāvo bhūtir iti. kiṃ punar ihodāharaṇam? śyenenābhicaran yajeta{*2/9*}, citrayā yajeta paśukāma
GSP28msbh1-7u:2283: iti{*2/10*}. kiṃ śyenenābhicarann uta yajetābhicarann iti? tathā citrayā paśukāmaḥ, uta paśukāmo yajeteti sthite etasminn adhikaraṇe guṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2284: nāmadheyam iti vicāro bhaviṣyati. tathā darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2285: yajeteti, darśaḥ kālaḥ, pūrṇamāsa iti ca, kiṃ tābhyāṃ svargakāmaḥ, uta svargakāmo yajeteti, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti ca śyeneneti ca citrayeti ca naite bhāvavacanāḥ. na ca eṣām arthinā kaścit saṃbandho 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2286: vivibhaktikatvāt. tasmān na dravyaguṇaśabdā apūrvasya vidhāyakā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2293: *{2/8: Jhā, Ü, Bd.1, S.170 konj. śyenacitrādayaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2297: evaṃ ced bhāvan paśyati, abhāvaśabdatvān na dravyaguṇaśabdā apūrvasya vidhāyakā iti, sarveṣāṃ bhāvo 'rthaḥ, svargakāmo darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:2298: etayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ yajeteti vakṣyati, śyenenābhicarann ity etayoś ca, tathā citrayā paśukāma iti. tasmād ete 'pi sākāṅkṣatvād bhāvavacanāḥ. sarveṣu bhāvavacaneṣu nāsti vinigamanāyāṃ hetuḥ, karmaśabdā evāpūrvasya vidhāyakāḥ, na dravyaguṇaśabdā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2299: yeṣām utpattau sve prayoge rūpopalabdhis tāni nāmāni, tasmāt tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā bhūtatvāt sve prayoge // MS_2,1.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2301: rūpa[111]{*2/11*}m upalabhyate, yat sakṛd utpannaṃ kālāntaran tiṣṭhati, na kriyevotpannamātraṃ vinaśyatīty arthaḥ, tāni nāmāni, te dravyaguṇaśabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2302: īdṛśo dravyaguṇaśabdānām arthaḥ. te dravyaguṇaśabdā iti vaktavye tāni nāmānīti sūtritam, ato nāmānīti eṣāṃ paryāyaśabdaḥ. kathaṃ gamyate? yata eṣāṃ vibhaktayo nāmikya ucyante. katamāstāḥ? vṛkṣaḥ{*2/12*} vṛkṣau vṛkṣāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2303: śuklaḥ śuklau śuklā ityevamādayaḥ. tasmāt samyak sūtritam. yata eṣāṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2304: kṣaṇiko 'rthaḥ, tataḥ tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā pradhānākāṅkṣā na vidyata - iti naiṣām utpattiḥ kartavyā, bhūtatvāt sve prayoge svaprayogakāle vidyamānatvād ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2307: yeṣāṃ tūtpattāv arthe sve prayogo na vidyate, tāny ākhyātāni. tasmāt tebhyaḥ pratīyetāśritatvāt prayogasya // MS_2,1.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2308: yeṣāṃ tu śabdānām uccāraṇotpattau sve 'rthe prayogo na vidyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2309: prayogakāle yeṣām artho nopalabhyata ity arthaḥ, tany ākhyātānīti bhāvaśabdān paryāyaśabdenopadiśati. kathaṃ paryāyaśabdatā bhāvaśabdānām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2310: yata eṣāṃ vibhaktaya ākhyātikya ity ucyante. katamāstāḥ? pacati pacataḥ pacantītyevamādyaḥ. tasmāt tebhyo 'pūrvaṃ pratīyeta. bhavyārthās te bhūtārthaiḥ samuccaritāḥ. bhūtasya bhavyārthatāyāṃ dṛṣṭārthatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2311: bhavyārthasya prayojanayata utpattir arthavatī, sā ca bhūtena kriyata iti dṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ. bhavyasya punar bhūtārthatāyāṃ na kiñcid dṛśyate, kalpyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:2313: kiṃ ca - āśritatvāt prayogasyaiteṣāṃ prayogaḥ puruṣeṇāśrito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2314: puruṣasaṃbaddhā bhāvanocyate, puruṣaṃ hi vadati, bhāvayed iti, tena svargakāmo yajeteti puruṣo 'pi pratīyate[112]{*2/13*}, yāgo 'pi saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:2315: 'pi. svargakāmo dravyeṇeti dravye{*2/14*} pratīyate puruṣaś ca, na tu saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2316: nanu etad uktaṃ bhavati, arthinaś ca dravyasya ca saṃbandhaṃ yajeteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2317: vakṣyati, dravyeṇa bhāvayed iti. ato dravyeṇārthasya bhāvanā gamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2318: ākāṅkṣā ceti. satyaṃ gamyate, dravyeṇa bhāvayed iti tu vākyena, yāgena bhāvayed iti tu śrutyā. yadā tu, yāgena bhāvāyed iti yāgasaṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:2319: vidhīyate, na tadā dravyeṇa bhāvayed iti dravyasaṃbandhaḥ. na ca dravyasaṃbandhe vidhīyamāne yajetety anena saṃbandhaḥ. anūdyamāne tu saṃbhavati, na ca, yaugapādyena vidhyanuvādau saṃbhavataḥ. tasmāc chrutivākyayor virodhaḥ, virodhe ca śrutibalīyasī, tenārthinā na dravyasaṃbandhaḥ. tatra dravyam asati svargakāmasaṃbandhe svargārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīty anupapannam, eṣa vinigamanāyāṃ hetuḥ, yena bhāvaśabdā evāpūrvasya codakāḥ, na dravyaguṇaśabdā iti, yadā yāgena kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2320: tadā{*2/15*} yāgavacanam eva bhavati. darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti lakṣaṇayā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2321: darśe ca pūrṇamāse ca yāgo vihita iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2322: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate, asti tad apūrvam iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2327: codanety apūrvaṃ brūmaḥ, apūrvaṃ punar asti, yata ārambhaḥ śiṣyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2328: svargakāmo yajeteti, itarathā hi vidhānam anarthakaṃ syāt, bhaṅgitvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2329: yāgasya, yady anyad anutpādya yāgo vinaśyet[113]{*2/16*}, phalam asati nimitte na syāt. tasmād utpādayatīti. yadi punaḥ phalavacanasāmarthyāt tad eva na viniśyatīti kalpyate. naivaṃ śakyam. na hi karmaṇo 'nyad rūpam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2330: upalabhāmahe, yad āśrayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayati, tat{*2/17*} karmety
GSP28msbh1-7u:2331: ucyate, na tad ātmani samavetam, sarvagatatvād ātmanaḥ, sarvatra kāryopalambhaḥ sarvatra bhāve liṅgam, na tu{*2/18*} tad eva deśāntarād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2332: āgamanasya, na hy asaty āgamane kiṃcid viruddhaṃ dṛśyate. yatra samavetam āsīt, tad vinaṣṭaṃ dravyam, tasya vināśāt tad api vinaṣṭam ity avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2333: āśrayo 'py avinaṣṭa iti cet. na, bhasmopalambhanāt. saty api basmany
GSP28msbh1-7u:2334: astīti cet. na vidyamānopalambhane 'py adarśanāt. phalakriyā liṅgam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2335: cet. evaṃ saty adarśane samādhir vaktavyaḥ. saukṣmādīnām anyatamad bhaviṣyatīti yadi cintyate, kalpitam evaṃ sati kiṃcid bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2336: tatrāpūrvaṃ vā kalpyeta tad veti. aviśeṣakalpanāyām asti hetuḥ, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2337: viśiṣṭakalpanāyām. anāśritaṃ karma bhaviṣyatīti cet. tad api tādṛśam eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2338: svabhāvāntarakalpanena deśāntaraṃ na prāpayiṣyatīti. tādṛśam eva. tasmād bhaṅgī yajiḥ, tasya bhaṅgitvād apūrvam astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2339: kiṃ cintāyāḥ prayojanam? yadi dravyaguṇaśabdā apy apūrvaṃ codayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2340: dravyaguṇāpacāre na pratinidhir upādātavyaḥ, yathā tarhi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2341: yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ, dravyaṃ guṇaṃ vā pratinidhāya prayogo 'nuṣṭhātavya iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2347: avagatam etat, bhāvaśabdāḥ karmaṇo vācakā iti, bahuprakārāś ca bhāvaśabdāḥ, yajati, juhoti, dadātīti, eva[114]{*2/19*}ṃprakārāḥ, dogdhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2348: pinaṣṭi, vilāpayatītyevamādayaś ca. teṣu sandehaḥ - kiṃ sarve pradhānakarmaṇo vidhāyakāḥ, uta kecit saṃskārakarmaṇa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2349: bhāvārthatvāviśeṣāt sarve pradhānakarmaṇo vācakā iti prāptam. tato brūmaḥ - tāni dvaidhaṃ bhavitum arhantīti dviprakārāṇi, kānicit pradhānakarmaṇo vācakāni, kānicit saṃskārakarmaṇaḥ. evam api sarvāṇy arthavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2350: arthavattve sati sarvebhyaḥ na śakyam apūrvaṃ kalpayitum. ato na sarvāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2353: yair dravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate, tāni pradhānabhūtāni, dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_2,1.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2354: evaṃ saty alpīyasy aḍṛṣṭakalpanā nyāyyā, na tu{*2/20*} vinigamanāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2355: hetur{*2/21*} avagacchāmaḥ, kuto{*2/22*} 'pūrvam, kuto neti. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2356: yair bhāvakarmabhir na dravyaṃ saṃskartum iṣyate, utpādayituṃ vā, tāni pradhānabhūtāni pradhānakarmaṇo vācakāni, dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt. dravyaṃ hi guṇabhūtam, karmanirvṛtter īpsitatamatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2361: yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇas tatra pratīyeta, tasya dravyapradhānatvāt // MS_2,1.8
GSP28msbh1-7u:2362: yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate, guṇas tatra pratīyeta karma. kutaḥ? tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2363: dravyapradhānatvāt. pratyakṣaṃ yajetetyevamādibhir dravyaṃ na cikīrṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2365: guṇabhūtatvāt. pinaṣṭi - ityevamādibhir dravyaṃ saṃskriyate, tasmāt tāni guṇakarmavacanāni. eṣa eva vinigamanāyāṃ hetuḥ. prayojanaṃ tu pūrvasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:2366: pakṣe praiyaṅgave 'pi carau vrīhaya utpādyā avadhātārthatvena. siddhānte
GSP28msbh1-7u:2369: dharmamātre tu karma syād anirvṛtteḥ prayājavat // MS_2,1.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2370: srucaḥ{*2/24*} saṃmārṣṭi, agniṃ saṃmārṣṭi, paridhiṃ saṃmārṣṭi, puroṅāśaṃ paryagni karotīti{*2/25*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2371: tatra sandehaḥ - kiṃ paryagnikaraṇam, saṃārjanaṃ ca pradhānakarma, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:2372: guṇakarmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. tata{*2/26*} ucyate - karmamātram evaṃjātīyakam aparyāptaṃ yat prayojanasya dṛṣṭasya, tad dharmamātram iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2373: brūmaḥ, tatra pradhānakarmatvaṃ syāt. kasmāt? anirvṛtter upakārasya, na hy evaṃjātīyakaṃ dravyasyopakārakam, dravyaṃ tv evaṃjātīyakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2382: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. itarair guṇakarmabhiḥ sadharmaḥ syād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2383: evaṃjātīyakaḥ, yathā vrīhīn avahanti, tathā. kutaḥ? tulyaśrutitvāt, tulyā hi dvitīyā śrutir eṣāṃ dravyeṣu, yathā vrīhīn avahantīti{*2/28*}, evam agniṃ saṃmārṣṭi, puroṅāśaṃ paryagni karotīti. kiṃ guṇakarmaṇi dravye
GSP28msbh1-7u:2384: dvitīyā dṛṣṭeti yato dvitīyādarśanād ihāpi sāmānyato dṛṣṭena guṇakarmatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2385: neti brūmaḥ - dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ kartur īpsitatame smaryate, sā ceha dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ, tata eva tadīpsitatamam iti gamyate, tac ced īpsitatamam, karma guṇabhūtam. yady api pratyakṣādibhir guṇabhāvo na gamyate, [116]{*2/29*} pramāṇāntareṇa śabdena gamyate, tasmād guṇabhūtam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2389: iti cet paśyasi - dvitīyādarśanāt pradhānabhūtam atra dravyam iti. naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:2390: evam, guṇabhūte 'pi dvitīyā bhavati, tathā hi dṛśyate - saktūñ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2394: na, tadarthatvāl lokavat tasya ca śeṣabhūtatvāt // MS_2,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2395: na guṇabhūte 'pi dvitīyā, evaṃ hy abhiyuktā upadiśanti - karmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2396: dvitīyā{*2/31*}, kartur īpsitatamaṃ karmeti{*2/32*}, na ca loke guṇabhūte kvacid dvitīyāṃ paśyāmaḥ. yad api ca taṇḍulān odanaṃ paceti, odanārthaṃ taṇḍulān saṃskurv itīpsitā eva taṇḍulāḥ. balvajān śikhaṇḍakān kurv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2397: balvjā eva tenā-kāreṇa saṃbaddhā īpsitā iti tatrābhiprāyaḥ. laukikaś ca prayogaḥ śabdārthaparicchede hetur na vaidikaḥ. yat tu laukike{*2/33*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2398: juhotīti prayoge dvitīyā, śakyate tatra vaktum īpsitatama eva sa prayoga
GSP28msbh1-7u:2399: iti, taṇḍulān adya juhudhi, taṇḍulān adya homena saṃbandhayeti loke bhavati hi bahuprakārā vivakṣā. anyāyaś cānekārthatvam, tena pradhānabhāvena siddhā satī dvitīyā guṇabhāvena kalpyeta. vede tu kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2400: dvitīyānirdiṣṭe guṇabhāva iti. dvitīyānirdeśāt pradhānyam evāvagacchāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2401: evam avagate pradhānye balīyasā hetunā nāsti prādhānyam ity avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2402: kutaḥ? na homasya kecit prakāreṇa saktvarthatāvakalpyate kutaḥ? saktūnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2403: [117]{*2/34*} niṣprayojanatvāt, na saktūnām anyat prayojanaṃ dṛśyate śrūyate{*2/35*} vā, yadi vā homas tadartho homo 'pi niṣprayojanaḥ, athārād upakārako homaḥ, tataḥ prayojanavān, jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe pāṭhād gamyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:2404: prayojanavattā, nāprayojana iti śakyate vaktum, prayogavacanena hi sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:2405: ākāṅkṣyate. nanu saktūnām api prakaraṇapāṭhāt prayojanavattvaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2406: ko vā brūte - neti, prayojanavattaiva, prayojanavattvan tu homam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2408: prayogavacanenākāṅkṣyante. tad ucyate - na dravyaṃ tenākāṅkṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2409: itikartavyatāṃ hi sa ākāṅkṣati, homaś cetikartavyatā, na dravyam. nanu home kṛte saktubhyo 'dṛṣṭaṃ niṣpatsyate. nāsty atra pramāṇam. nanu dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ pramāṇam. na hi dvitīyā vibhaktir homasya saktvarthatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2410: jñāpayati. na saktavaḥ prayojanavanta iti bhaved dhomaḥ saktvarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2411: homasaṃbaddhāḥ saktavaḥ syur iti, bhavanti home kṛte saktavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2412: homasaṃbaddhāḥ. na homasya saktvarthatā niṣprayojaneṣu saktuṣu ghaṭate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2413: saktv-arthatāvacanaṃ tu na puruṣasyopakārakaṃ na kratoḥ, tadanarthakam eva syāt. yato na{*2/36*} tadvacanāc chakyam anyatarat{*2/37*} kalpayitum. sa eṣa dvitīyāntaḥ saktūnāṃ homasya ca saṃbandhaṃ karoti, saṃbandhe ca sati
GSP28msbh1-7u:2414: dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandha iti bhūtatvāt, guṇabhāve ca tṛtīyā, tenocyate - tṛtīyāyāḥ sthāne dvitīyeti, tena tadarthatvād dhomārthatvāt saktūnāṃ na pradhānyaṃ dvitīyāsaṃyoge 'pi. evam saty arthavad vacanam, na cārthavattve saty ānārthakyam ity ucyate. tasya ca puroḍāśāder yāgādiṣu śeṣabhāvaḥ, tena prayojanavantaḥ, tatra saṃskāro nānarthakaḥ. na sa dṛṣṭopakārāyeti cet. adṛṣṭārtho bhaviṣyati, adṛṣṭo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2415: saṃskāro 'stīty avagamyate loke, yathā grāmāntarād āgatānāṃ puruṣānāṃ paryagnikareṇādṛṣṭa upakāraḥ kriyata ity ucyate. loke ca nānupapattiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2416: [118]{*2/38*} prayojanaṃ ca varuṇapraghāseṣu śrūyate, śamīmayaḥ sruco bhavanti hiraṇmayo{*2/39*} veti, prakṛtau nānāvṛkṣasruksaṃmārgasādhyam apūrvam iti, nānāvṛkṣasruca utpādayitavyāḥ saṃmārgārthatvena yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2417: pūrvapakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ, śamīmaya eva hi hiraṇmayo vā saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ. tathā yatra bāṇavantaḥ paridhayas tatrāpi pālāśā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2418: utpādayitavyāḥ pūrvapakṣe. siddhānte bāṇavanta eva saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2419: avabhṛthe ca pūrvapakṣa utpādayitavyo 'gniḥ saṃmārgāya, siddhānte cāpaḥ saṃmārjanīyāḥ. tathā{*2/40*} ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsaretarasamayāḥ puroḍāśāḥ savanīyā{*2/41*} iti śrūyate. tatrāpi piṣṭamayaḥ puroḍāśa utpādayitavayaḥ paryagnikaraṇārthatvena pūrvapakṣe, siddhānte māṃsamayā eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:2424: *{2/33: E1,6; E2,4: yā laukike, E5: yā tu}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2431: stutaśastrayos tu saṃskāro yājyāvad devatābhidhānatvāt // MS_2,1.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2432: praugaṃ śaṃsati, niṣkevalyaṃ śaṃsati, ājyaiḥ stuvate, pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2433: iti guṇavacanaṃ stavanaṃ śaṃsanaṃ ca, yathā - indrasya tu vīryāṇi pravocam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2434: iti{*2/42*}, yad etad guṇavacanaṃ śrūyate, kim etad guṇabhūtaṃ devatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2435: prati, uta pradhānam iti. tatrocyate - stutaśastre saṃskārakarmaṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2436: kutaḥ? devatābhidhānatvāt, guṇavacane nirvartyamāne guṇinī devatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2437: saṃkīrtyate, nānyathā tadguṇavacanaṃ bhavati, tatra pratyakṣaṃ devatābhidhānaṃ gamyate, devatāprakāśanena ca pratyakṣa [119]{*2/43*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2438: upakāro yāgasiddhiḥ. tasmāt saṃskārakarmaṇī yājyāvat, yathā yājyām anāha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2439: puro 'nuvākyām anvāheti stutivacanaṃ devatāprakāśanenārthavat, tadvad etad apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2442: arthena tv apakṛṣyeta devatānām acodanārthasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_2,1.14
GSP28msbh1-7u:2443: yadi saṃskārakarmaṇī eva{*2/44*} stotraśastre, arthenāpakṛṣyeta devatānām naś codanārthasya guṇabhūtatvāt, devatārthasya guṇabhūto mantra iti tatpradhānabhāve yatra pradhānaṃ tatra nīyeta, tatra kramasannidhī uparudhyeyātām. tasmād eṣa duṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ - iti paryudasitavyaḥ. katamaḥ punar asau mantraḥ. abhi tvā śūrety{*2/45*} aindraḥ pragātho māhendrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2449: na paryudasiṣyāma imaṃ pakṣam, saṃskārakarmaṇī eva stotraśastre,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2450: devatābhidhānatvād eva, yad uktam{*2/46*} - pragāthasyotkarṣa iti, tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2451: indraśabdena mahendro 'bhidhāyiṣyate, sa evendro mahattvena guṇena mahendra ity ucyate, pratyakṣaṃ hīndraśabdaṃ devatāvacanam upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2452: mahattvavacanaṃ ca mahacchabdam, yathā rājā mahārājaḥ, brāhmaṇo mahābrāhmaṇa iti, vaśāvat, yathā sā vā eṣā sarvadevatyā yad ajā vaśā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2453: vāyavyām ālabhetety{*2/47*} ajāvaśāśabdena codite karmaṇi chāgaśabdena nigamā bhavanti, tadvat saguṇe codite nirguṇenābhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati. tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2458: *{2/48: E2 om. tena, E4: te na}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2460: naitad evam, indro 'sya grahasya devateti taddhitasaṃyogena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2461: vijñāyeta{*2/49*}, [120]{*2/50*} na cāsya mahattvam apekṣamāṇasya taddhitasaṃyoga upapadyate, taddhitasaṃyogāpekṣasya vā mahattvasaṃbandhāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:2462: samāsakalpanā. na ca taddhitārthe vṛttasya mahattvasaṃbandhaḥ, na ca samāsārthe vṛttasya taddhitasaṃbandhaḥ. na cāsminn eva prayoge samāsārthe vṛttir iṣyate, etasminn eva taddhitārthe. na cāyam indraśabdo 'vihitavat
GSP28msbh1-7u:2463: svārthaṃ taddhitārthena saṃbadhyeta, vihitavac ca parārthaṃ mahattvena saṃbaddham anūdyeta. vispaṣṭaś cāyam anyo 'rtho mahendro bhavati, mahān indro bhavatīti mahendraḥ, anyaś cendro haviṣo devatā bhavatīti sakṛd
GSP28msbh1-7u:2464: uccāraṇe ca nobhayaṃ śakyeta. tasmān nendro devatā mahattvaviśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2465: mahendraśabdāt tu taddhita utpannaḥ, tasmāt tadprātipadikam arthavad iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2466: gamyate, na tv avayavasaṃbandhena. tasmād devatāntaram indrān mahendraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2467: tenaindrasya pragāthasyotkarṣaḥ prāpnoti, ataḥ paryudastitavyaḥ eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:2468: pakṣaḥ. yad apy ucyate - indrasya vṛtravadhottarakālaṃ mahendratvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2469: darśayati, mahān vāyam abhūd yo vṛtram avadhīd iti{*2/51*}, tathā vedasyādimattādoṣaḥ prasajyeta, ato 'nya indro mahendrāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2474: vyapadeśabhedaś ca bhavati, bahu dugdhīndrāya devebhyo havir iti{*2/52*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2475: bahu dugdhi mahendrāya devebhyo havir iti{*2/53*}, ato 'pi devatāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2481: yadā vidhiśabdād avagatam etad bhavati - indro devateti, tadāsya guṇānvākhyāne kiṃ prayojanam, mahattvaṃ nāmendrasya guṇo bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2482: devatābhidhānam. kathaṃ tasyai devatāyai dīyata iti. [121]{*2/54*} guṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:2483: 'pi hi vihite sati tasyā eva devatāyai dīyate, avihite 'pi. tasmād guṇavidhānam anarthakam. athocyate - yo 'smin grahe indraḥ sa mahān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2485: guṇasaṃbandhasya cāprasiddhatvād guṇena viśeṣaṇam anavakḷptam. tasmād api devatāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2488: evaṃ sati yājyāpuronuvākyayor bhedena darśanam upapadyate, endra{*2/55*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2489: sānasiṃ rayim ity{*2/56*} aindrayājyāpuronuvākyād vayam, mahān indro ya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2490: ojasā - iti{*2/57*} bhedena māhendraṃ darśayati, tadekatve vikalpyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2497: yad uktam - ajāvaśāśabdena codite karmaṇi chāgaśabdena nigamā bhavantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2498: tad yuktam, vaśāyām arthasamavāyitvaṃ vayaṃ pratyakṣam avagacchāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2499: chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nubrūhīti{*2/58*} yaiva vaśā saiva chāgeti. tasmāt pragāthasyotkarṣaḥ saṃskārapakṣe, ataḥ pradhānakarmaṇī iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2503: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, saṃskārakarmaṇī eva stotraśastre, yac
GSP28msbh1-7u:2504: caitat, praghāthasyotkarṣa iti, utkṛṣyatāṃ yatrendras tatra praghāthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2507: apareṣāṃ mantrāṇām utkṛṣṭānām anyatrārthavattā nāsti, teṣām ānarthakyaṃ syāt, yathā yām yāḥ śaṃsanti{*2/59*}, śipiviṣṭavatīṃ{*2/60*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2516: tad ucyate - sarveṣām arthavattāsti, maṇḍūkasūktasyāgnau, akṣasūktasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2517: rājasūye, mūṣikāsūktasyaikādaśinyām, sarveṣāṃ vācastome, sarvā ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi sarvāṇi sāmāni vācastome, pāriplavam aśvamedhe{*2/64*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2518: śaṃsatīti, tathā yasyāśvine śasyamāne sūryo nodiyād api sarvā dāśatayīr anubrūyād iti, tasmād asty arthavattotkṛṣṭānām. ataḥ saṃskārakarmaṇī stotraśastre iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2520: *{2/64: Mit E6; E2,4 om. aśvamedhe, E5 hat es geklammert}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2521: api vā śrutisaṃyogāt prakāraṇe stautiśaṃsatī kriyotpattiṃ vidadhyātām //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2522: api vā pradhānakarmaṇī stotraśastre syātām. kutaḥ? śrutisaṃyogāt, saptamī śrutisaṃyogo hi bhavati, kavatīṣu stuvate, śipiviṣṭavatīṣu stuvate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2523: iti{*2/65*}, yadi stutiḥ, tataḥ kavatyakṣareṣv āhitā. yadi prakāśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2524: tato devatāyām, tatra karaṇaṃ kavatyas{*2/66*} tṛtīyayāśroṣyam{*2/67*}, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2526: api ca - śrutisaṃyogo bhavati, praugaṃ śaṃsati, niṣkevalyaṃ śaṃsatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2527: ataḥ stutir abhinirvartayitavyā tena mantreṇa, guṇavacanaḥ śabdaḥ stutinirvartanārtho 'dṛṣṭam{*2/68*} arthaṃ kariṣyati. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:2530: yathendrasya tu vīryāṇi pravocam iti{*2/70*}. tena devatāśabdaḥ stutisaṃbandhārtha ity ucyate, devatābhidhānārthe prātipadikārthatvāt prathamā syāt. atha yat prathamāntam, tad devatārthaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2531: yathā - indro yāto vasitasya{*2/71*} rājeti{*2/72*}. nety ucyate, tad api vākyasaṃyogāt stutyartham eva. nanu vākyāl liṅgaṃ balīyaḥ. satyam, etad api liṅgam, yat stutivākyasya sākāṅkṣasya nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇasāmarthyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2532: tathāpy ubhayathā liṅge 'nugṛhyamāṇe kuto nirṇayaḥ? vākyaśeṣād eva na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2533: devatābhidhānārtha iti. devatābhidhānārtha ity etasmin pakṣe stutyarthaṃ sākāṅkṣavacanam anarthakam eva syāt. tasmād adṛṣṭārthatvāt stutivacanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2535: api ca - stautiśaṃsatīti sākṣād guṇavacanau lakṣaṇayābhidhānārthau syātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2546: śabdena pṛthaktvam eva gamyate, dvādaśastotraśastro 'gniṣṭomaḥ, itarathā hi dvādaśatvaṃ na syāt. stotrāṇāṃ śastrāṇāṃ ca ekam eva śaṃsanaṃ stavanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2547: ca, atha bheda āśrīyate, tato na dvādaśatve 'vatiṣṭhate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2549: agniṣṭuti{*2/73*} śrūyate - āgneyā grahā bhavantīti, tatra punar ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2550: āgneyīṣu śaṃsantīti, tan na vidhātavyam eva yadi saṃskārakarma{*2/74*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2556: saṃbaddhe vai stotraśastre veti, yady anyat stotram anyac chastram, tatas tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ. yadi vāpūrvavacane tato 'nyat stotram anyac chastram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2557: itarathā yad eva stotraṃ tad eva śastraṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2559: pradhānakarmaṇa iva cābhidhānaṃ bhavati dvitīyāsaṃyogena, praugaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2565: indravanto manemahi bhakṣīmahi{*2/78*} prajām iṣaṃ sā me saty āśīryajñasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2566: bhūyād iti{*2/79*} stotraphalam anūdyate, na devatāyāḥ. tasmāt pradhānakarmaṇī stotraśastre. anyatra sūtrabaddhaṃ prayojanam, daśame
GSP28msbh1-7u:2567: 'dhyāye{*2/80*} grahāṇāṃ devatānyatve stutaśastrayoḥ pradhānakarmatvād adhikāraḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2570: *{2/78: E1,6; E2: vanāmaha dhukṣīmahi, E4,5: vanāmahe dhukṣīmahi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2574: idaṃ samāmnāyate - na tā naśanti, na dabhāti, taskaro nāsām ā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2575: mitro{*2/81*} vyathir ā dadharṣati. devāṃś ca yābhiryajate, dadāti ca jyog
GSP28msbh1-7u:2576: ittābhiḥ sa ca te gopatiḥ saheti{*2/82*}. yajate dadātīty udāharaṇam, kiṃ yadvad brāhmaṇe bhāvaśabdo vidhāyakas tadvan mantre 'pi, uta mantre 'bhidhāyaka{*2/83*} iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam, vidhau matre cāmnāyamānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2577: bhāvaśabdasya eka evārthaḥ syāt, aika[125]{*2/84*}śabdyāt, sa evāyam ekaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2578: śabdo brāhmaṇagato vidhāsyati, mantragato na śaknoti vidhātum ity anupapannam, tasmād vidhāyakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2583: api vā prayogasāmarthyān mantro 'bhidhānavācī syāt // MS_2,1.31 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2584: api veti pakṣo vyāvartyate, evaṃjātīyako mantro 'bhidhānavacanaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2585: prayogasāmarthyāt, prayoge kriyamāṇe 'sya sāmarthyaṃ vidyate, godānaṃ goyāgaṃ ca pratyāyayitum, na vidhātum. kutaḥ? vihitatvād godānasya dakṣiṇāvidhāne, goyāgasya tv anubandhyāyām. karmāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīti cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2586: na, asakṛd apy ucyamāne tatpratyayād eva. stutyarthakalpanāyām apy ānarthakyam, parisamāptena sārthavādakena vākyena vihitatvād yāgasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2587: tasmān na mantragato bhāvaśabda evaṃjātīyako vidhāyaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2589: mantragato bhāvaśabdo vidhāyako neti parīkṣitam. ko 'yaṃ mantro nāmeti ucyate. ajñāte mantre tadgato bhāvaśabdaḥ kathaṃ vicārita iti, idam artho 'dhikaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ draṣṭavyam. kathaṃ lakṣaṇo mantra iti, taccodakeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:2590: mantrākhyā, abhidhānasya codakeṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣv abhiyuktā upadiśanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2591: mantrān adhīmahe, mantrān adhyāpayāmaḥ, mantrā vartanta iti. prāyikam idaṃ lakṣaṇam, anabhidhāyakā api kecin mantrā ity ucyanta{*2/85*}, yathā vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhata iti{*2/86*}, na śakyaṃ pṛṣṭhākoṭeṇa{*2/87*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2592: tatra tatropadeṣṭum iti lakṣaṇam uktam - ṛṣayo 'pi padārthānāṃ nāntaṃ yānti [126]{*2/88*} pṛthakkaśaḥ{*2/89*}. lakṣaṇena tu siddhānām antaṃ yānti vipaścitaḥ. udāharaṇam - medho 'sītyevamādayo 'syantāḥ, iṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:2595: pralapitam akṣī te indrapiṅgale duler{*2/95*} iveti, parivedanam{*2/96*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2596: ambe ambika iti{*2/97*}, praiṣa agnīd agnīn iti{*2/98*}, anveṣaṇaṃ ko 'si
GSP28msbh1-7u:2600: sāmarthyam abhidhānam, tac caitad vṛttikāraṇenodāharaṇopadeśenākhyātam{*2/106*}. etad api prāyikam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2601: asimadhyā api ca mantrā bhavanti, īḍyaś cāsi vandyaś ca vājin iti{*2/107*}, tvāmadhyāś ca tattvāyāmīti. āśīr brāhmaṇam api, so 'kāmayata
GSP28msbh1-7u:2602: prajāḥ sṛjeyeti, stutir api vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devateti{*2/108*}, pralāpo na caitad vidmo yadi brāhmaṇā vā smo 'brāhmaṇāḥ smo veti{*2/109*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2603: paridevanaṃ ye mām adhukṣanta te māṃ pratyamuñcanta iti, praiṣa amutaḥ somam āhareti, anveṣaṇam iha vā sa iha veti, praśnaḥ veda karṇavatīṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2604: sūrmim iti, prativacanaṃ vidmo veti, anuṣaṅgaḥ hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyaty atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasīti{*2/110*}, prayogaḥ traisvaryaṃ cātusvaryaṃ{*2/111*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2605: ceti, sāmarthyaṃ sruveṇāvadyati draveṣv iti. lakṣaṇakarmaṇi prayojanaṃ prasiddhatvān na vaktavyam, laghīyasī pratipattir lakṣaṇena. ākṣepeṣv apavādeṣu prāptyāṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi. prayojanaṃ na vaktavyaṃ yaś ca kṛtvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2607: prāptyām uttaravivakṣā, kṛtvācintāyāṃ pūrvādhikaraṇasya prayojanam. asti vede mantraśabdo yasyāyam arthaḥ parīkṣitaḥ, ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya yam ṛṣayas trayīvidā viduḥ, ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣīti{*2/112*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2637: atha kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brāhmaṇam? mantrāś ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca vedaḥ, tatra mantralakṣaṇa ukte pariśeṣasiddhatvād brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam avacanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2638: mantralakṣaṇavacanenaiva siddham, yasyaital lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tad brāhamaṇam iti pariśeṣasiddhaṃ brāhmaṇam. vṛttikāras tu śiṣyahitārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2640: hetuḥ sūrpeṇa{*2/114*} juhoti tena hy annaṃ kriyata iti{*2/115*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2641: nirvacanam, tad dadhno dadhitvam{*2/116*}, nindā, upavītā vā etasyāgnayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2642: praśaṃsā, vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devateti{*2/117*}, saṃśayaḥ, hotavyaṃ gārhapatye na hotavyam iti, vidhiḥ, yajamānasaṃmitaudambarī{*2/118*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2644: pacatīti{*2/122*}, purākalpaḥ, ulmukhair ha sma pūrve samājagmur iti,
