GSP28msbh1-7u:2645: vyavadhāraṇakalpanā, yāvato 'śvān pratigṛhnīyād iti. hetur nirvacanaṃ nindā praśaṃsā saṃśayo vidhiḥ. parakriyā purākalpo vyavadhāraṇakalpanā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2646: upamānaṃ daśaite tu vidhayo brāhmaṇasya tu. etad vai{*2/123*} sarvavedeṣu niyataṃ vidhilakṣaṇam. etad api prāyikam, itikaraṇabahulo mantro 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2647: kaścit, iti veti me manaḥ{*2/124*}, ity{*2/125*} āhopanibaddhaś ca, bhagaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2648: bhakṣīty{*2/126*} āha, ākhyāyikāsvarūpaṃ cogro ha bhujyam iti{*2/127*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2649: hetur idaṃ vo{*2/128*} vāmuśanti hi{*2/129*}{*2/130*}, nirvacanaṃ tasmād āpo nu sthanā{*2/131*} - iti{*2/132*}, nindā mogham annaṃ vindata
GSP28msbh1-7u:2650: apraceteti{*2/133*}, praśaṃsā - agnir mūrddheti{*2/134*}, saṃśayaḥ - adhaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2653: ayutādadat{*2/140*}{*2/141*}, purākalpaḥ - yajñena yajñam ayajanta devā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2684: anāmnāteṣv amantratvam āmnāteṣu hi vibhāgaḥ // MS_2,1.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2685: ūhapravaranāmadheyeṣu saṃśayaḥ, mantrā uta neti. abhidhāyakatvān mantrā iti prāpte brūmaḥ - anāmnāteṣu mantratvaṃ na syād abhidhāyakeṣv api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2686: nābhidhāyakatvaṃ mantratve hetuḥ, kiṃ tarhy abhiyuktaprayogaḥ, ye abhiyuktair mantrā iti nocyante, na te mantrāḥ, na caivamādāyo mantrasamāmnāye santi, tasmād amantrāḥ. prayojanam, mantre duṣṭe yat
GSP28msbh1-7u:2689: ṛca ity asti vede, ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya yam ṛṣayas
GSP28msbh1-7u:2691: kathaṃlakṣaṇikā ṛcaḥ? teṣām ṛg yatrārthavaśena pādavyavasthā, yatra pādakṛtā vyavasthā sa mantra ṛg nāmā, yathā - agnim īla iti{*2/147*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2692: evaṃjātīyakeṣu mantreṣv abhiyuktā upadiśanti, ṛco 'dhīmahe, ṛco
GSP28msbh1-7u:2693: 'dhyāpayāmaḥ, ṛco vartanta iti. yady arthavaśenety ucyate, yatra vṛttavaśena tatra na prāpnoti, agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir iti{*2/148*}, yato nārthavaśeneti vṛttādivaśavyāvṛttyartham, kiṃ tarhy anuvāda eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:2694: pradarśanārthaḥ. avaśyaṃ caitad evaṃ vijñeyam, vṛttādinirvṛttyarthe sati vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmād yatra pādakṛtā vyavasthā, sā ṛg iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2702: atha sāmnaḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam? viśiṣṭā kācid gītiḥ sāmety ucyate, pragīte hi mantravākye sāmaśabdam abhiyuktā upadiśanti, sāmāny adhīmahi, samāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:2703: adhyāpayāmaḥ, sāmāni vartanta iti, abhiyuktopadeśaś ca naḥ pramāṇam. yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2704: - amlaṃ{*2/150*} dadhi, madhuro guḍa iti gītiviśiṣṭe tāvan mantre
GSP28msbh1-7u:2705: gītiśabdaḥ, gītisaṃbandhān mantre saṃpratyaya ity avagantavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2707: *{2/150: E2: pratyakṣā amlaṃ, E4: yakṣā amlaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2709: atha yajuṣaḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti. yajuṣo lakṣaṇaṃ na vaktavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2710: ṛglakṣaṇasāmalakṣaṇābhyām eva yajur vijñāsyate vaiparītyena, yā na gītir
GSP28msbh1-7u:2711: na ca pādabaddham, tat praśliṣṭapaṭhitaṃ yajur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2712: atha nigado nāma kiṃ yajūṃṣy uta yajuṣo 'nya iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2713: nigado vā caturthaṃ syād dharmaviśeṣāt // MS_2,1.38 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2714: nigadāḥ na yajūṃṣi. kutaḥ? dharmaviśeṣāt, uccaiḥ ṛcā kriyate, uccaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2715: sāmnā, upāṃśu yajuṣā, uccair nigadenety eṣa dharmaviśeṣaḥ, uccair nigadenety anūdyate, yadi yajuṣo nigadatvaṃ [130]{*2/151*} syāt, na ca tasyoccais tvaṃ dharmo dṛśyeta. dṛśyate tu. tasmāc caturthaṃ mantrajātaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2719: vyapadeśo 'pi bhavati, yajūṃṣi vartante, na nigadāḥ. nigadā vartante, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2722: yajūṃṣy eva vā nigadāḥ. kutaḥ? tadrūpatvāt, tad evaiṣāṃ rūpam, yad yajuṣāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhaḥ, ṛksāmalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatā ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2727: asti ca taiḥ puruṣāntaraiḥ pratyāyitaiḥ prayojanam, nopaṃśūccāryamāṇāḥ puruṣāntaraṃ pratyāyayeyuḥ. tasmād dharmaviśeṣo 'rthavān. yāni ca yajaṃṣy{*2/152*} uccair uccāryante te nigadāḥ. kutaḥ? prakarṣasya vaktā, yathā prakarṣeṇa raktaṃ nitarāṃ raktam ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2728: gadatir gadanārthaḥ pāṭhavacanaḥ. eṣa eva hi prakarṣo yad uccais
GSP28msbh1-7u:2730: nanu vācaniko guṇo yajuṣām upāṃśutvam. neti brūmaḥ - guṇo nāma sa bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2731: yaḥ svakāryaṃ kurvatām upakāre vartate, na ca parasaṃbodhanārthānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2732: yajuṣām upāṃśutvaṃ sāhāyye vartate, tad dhi svakarmakriyāvighātaṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2733: tena puruṣāntarasaṃbodhanārtham uccais tvaṃ guṇaḥ. itarārthaṃ tu vacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2734: bhaviṣyati, itarāṇi yāni [131]{*2/154*} yajūṃṣi na parasaṃbodhanārthāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2740: atha yad uktaṃ vyapadeśa iti, sa caikatve 'pi guṇato bhavati, yatheto brāhmaṇā bhojyantām, itaḥ parivrājakā iti. evam uccaistvena guṇena tāny eva yajūṃṣi vyapadiśyante, nigadā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2742: yadi ya uccair gadyate sa nigadaḥ, ṛg api nigadaḥ prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2744: na ṛco nigadā{*2/155*} vyapadiśyante, ayājyā vai nigadā ṛcaiva yajantīti pṛthaktvanimittā hi vyapadeśā bhavanti. ucyate, vyapadeśo liṅgam, prāptir ucyatām iti. apādabaddhe gadatir vartate, apādabaddho hi gadya ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2747: arthaikatvād ekaṃ vākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ ced vibhāge syāt // MS_2,1.46 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2748: atha praśliṣṭapaṭhiteṣu yajuḥṣu katham avagamyeta iyad ekaṃ yajur iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2749: yāvatā padasamūhenejyate, tāvān padasamūhaḥ ekaṃ yajuḥ. kiyatā cejyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2750: yāvatā kriyāyā upakāraḥ prakāśyate, tāvad vaktavyatvād vākyam ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2751: tenābhidhīyate - [132]{*2/156*} arthaikatvād ekaṃ vākyam iti, etasmāc cet kāraṇād ekavākyatā bhavati. tasmād ekārthaḥ padasamūho vākyam, yadi ca vibhajyamānaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ padaṃ bhavati. kim udāharaṇam? devasya tvā savituḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2752: prasava iti{*2/157*}. nanu padaṃ padam atraikārtham. satyam, na tu tadvibhāge sākāṅkṣaṃ. na tarhy arthaikatvam upapadyate. bahutvāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:2753: padārthānām, padasamudāyasya ca pṛthagartho nāstīty uktam. bhedaḥ saṃsargo vā vākyārtha iti yady ucyate, tathāpy ekārthatā na syāt, bahupade bhedānāṃ saṃsargāṇāṃ ca bahutvāt. ekaprayojanatvād upapannam, yathā tāvad devasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2754: tveti nirvāpaprakāśanam, tasya viśiṣṭasya vācaka etāvān padasamūhaḥ, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:2755: vākyam. nanv atra devasya tvā savituḥ prasave nirvapāmīty ekaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2756: aśvinor bāhubhyāṃ nirvapāmīty aparam, evaṃ bahūni vākyāni. yadi nirvapāmīty anuṣaṅgaḥ, tato bahūni vākyāni, na tv evam anuṣaṅgo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2757: yadi guṇabhūto nirvapāmīti, tadā pratipradhānaṃ bhidyeta. na ca nirvāpo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2758: devasya tvetyevamādīnām arthenocyate, sādhanaprādhānye hy adṛṣṭārthatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2759: vacasya syāt. nirvāpe punaḥ pradhāne dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ nirvāpaprakāśanam, tat sarvair viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭam ucyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ. yathā ca padaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2760: padena viśeṣyate tathoktaṃ tadbhūtānām iti{*2/158*}. tasmād ekaṃ vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2761: atha kiṃ artham ubhayaṃ sūtritam, arthaikatvād iti ca vibhāge
GSP28msbh1-7u:2762: sākāṅkṣatvād{*2/159*} iti ca, ucyate, bhavati kiṃcid ekārtham, na tu vibhāge sākāṅkṣam, yathā bhago vāṃ vibhajatu, aryamā vāṃ vibhajatv ity ekārthāḥ sarve vibhāgam abhidadhati. nanu bhagaviśiṣṭād vibhāgād aryam aviśiṣṭo 'nyo vibhāgaḥ. nety ucyate, [133]{*2/160*} vibhāgasāmānyenāsya
GSP28msbh1-7u:2763: prayojanam, na viśeṣeṇa, sāmānye hi dṛṣṭo 'rtho bhavati, na viśeṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2764: vibhāge tu na sākāṅkṣam. tasmād bhinnam idaṃ vākyaṃ vibhāge vikalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2765: tathā syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā susevaṃ{*2/161*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2766: kalyayāmi{*2/162*}. tasmin sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medhaḥ sumanasyamāna iti{*2/163*} vibhāge sākāṅkṣam, dve tu prayojane kriyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2767: sadanakaraṇaṃ puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca. tasmād bhinne vākye, pūrvaṃ sadanakaraṇe viniyujyate, uttaraṃ{*2/164*} puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpane. tasmāt samyak sūtritam, na sūtropālaṃbho bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2777: īṣe tvā, ūrje tveti{*2/165*}, tathā - āyuryajñena kalpatām, prāṇo yajñena kalpatām iti{*2/166*}. atra sandehaḥ, kim evamādiṣu bhinnaṃ vākyam utaikam iti? ekam iti brūmaḥ, īṣe tvety evam ukte na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2778: tathā - ūrje tvety api ca, vacanasāmarthyād adṛṣṭam, tad ubhābhyām ekaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2779: kalpayituṃ nyāyyam, evam alyīyasy adṛṣṭānumānakalpanā bhaviṣyati. tasmād ekaṃ vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2780: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sameṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt, sameṣu parasparānākāṅkṣeṣu vākyaṃ bhidyate, īṣe tvety anenaiko 'rthaḥ kriyate, ūrje tvety anenāparaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2781: nanu idānīm evoktaṃ nātra dṛṣṭo 'rtha iti. yady api pratyakṣādinā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2782: pramāṇena nopalabhyate, śrutyā tu gamyate, īṣe tveti chinati, ūrje tvety anumārṣṭīti{*2/167*}. tathā - āyuryajñena kalpatām, prāṇo yajñena kalpatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:2783: ity āyuḥkḷpter anyā prāṇakḷptiḥ. nanu sāmānyamātram idaṃ tan na viśeṣaṇabhedād bhedam arhatīti, yathā - agnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2784: [134]{*2/168*} nirvāpa ekas tasya viśeṣāḥ savituḥ prasave 'śvinor
GSP28msbh1-7u:2785: bāhubhyāṃ puṣṇo{*2/169*} hastābhyām iti, na teṣāṃ bhedān nirvāpasya bheda iṣyate, evam ihāpi kḷptir nāmaiko 'rthaḥ, nāsāv āyurādibhir viśeṣair
GSP28msbh1-7u:2786: bhinno bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate - iha kḷptīr vācayatīti bahvaḥ{*2/170*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2787: kḷptayaḥ śrūyante, tāś ca vaktavyāḥ, tatraikām āyuḥkḷptim āyuḥyajñena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2788: kalpatām ity eṣa mantraḥ śaknoti vaditum, prāṇo yajñena kalpatām ity ayam api prāṇakḷptim aparām, evaṃ tu sarve kḷptiviśeṣavacanāḥ, tac ca dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2789: prayojanam. tasmād anekārthatvāt tatrāpi vākyabheda iti. nanu sāmānyavacanād ekatvaṃ yathā vibhāge. naitad evam, vibhāge dṛṣṭārthaṃ sāmānyam iha na. api ca kḷptīr vācayatīti vihitam, āyuḥyajñena kalpatām iti cāyuḥkḷptyabhidhānam abhinivartyate pratyakṣam. prāṇo yajñena kalpatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:2798: yā te agne 'yāśayā tanūrvarṣiṣṭhā gahvareṣṭhā, ugraṃ vaco apāvadhīt tveṣaṃ vaco apāvadhīt svāhā, yā te agne rajāśayā, yā te agne harāśayety{*2/171*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2799: atra sandehaḥ, tanūrvarṣiṣṭheti kiṃ sarveṣv anuṣaktavyam, āhosvil laukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti. kiṃ prāptam? yā te agne rajāśayety etasya tanūr-varṣiṣṭheti na vākyaśeṣaḥ, na hy ayam asmāt paraḥ prayujyate. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāptiḥ syāt tanūrvarṣiṣṭheti, yathaiva hy ayaṃ yā te agne 'yāśayety etasyānantaram, evaṃ yā te agne rajāśayā, yā te agne harāśayety etayor api. harāśayety etasya vyavahita iti cet. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2801: samudāyena ca vākyaśeṣasya saṃbandhābhāvāt samudāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2802: samudāyisaṃbandhe ca na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. tasmāt sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2803: api ca sākāṅkṣasya sannidhau paras tātpurastād vā paripūrṇasamarthaḥ śrūyamāṇo vākyaśeṣo bhavati. kiyāṃs tu kālaḥ sannidhir iti? ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2804: yāvati śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum. kaś cāsau? ānantaryaṃ saṃbandhipadavyavāyo vā, tāvati hi śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2805: saṃbandhipadavyavāye hi saṃbandhād eva pūrvasaṃskāro nāpaiti. yatrāpy apareṇa sākāṅkṣena vyavāyas tatrāpy asti saṃbandhaḥ, dvayor api hi kāryaṃ vaktavyam iti, paraḥ pūrvam apekṣate, anapekṣamāne 'nyataraḥ pramādapāṭhaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2806: syāt, śakyate cāsāv apekṣitum, tasmād yathaivāyam ekasya sannidhāv evam aparasya, dvayor apy asaṃbaddhaiḥ padair avyavahitatvāt, dvayor apy ākāṅkṣator{*2/173*} etāvac ca vākyaśeṣasaṃbandhe kāraṇam, nānantaryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2807: avyavadhāne vicchede 'pi bhavati saṃbandhaḥ. tasmād anuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2808: atheha kathaṃ bhavitavyam? yatra nirākāṅkṣāṇāṃ sannidhau
GSP28msbh1-7u:2809: paripūraṇasamarthaḥ śrūyate, yathā citpatis tvā punātu, vākypatis tvā punātu, devasya tvā{*2/174*} savitā punātv achidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhir iti{*2/175*}, atra hi punātv antāni paripūrṇāni na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2810: kiṃcid ākāṅkṣanti. nanv achidreṇety etad ākāṅkṣiṣyati{*2/176*}. satyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2811: ākāṅkṣati, ākāṅkṣad apy etad ekam ākāṅkṣet, ekenaivaitan{*2/177*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2812: nirākāṅkṣaṃ saṃpadyata iti, ekena hi nirākāṅkṣīkṛto netarāv ākāṅkṣiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2813: an-arthakatvād ākāṅkṣati, ekena ca saṃbaddho nānarthako bhavati. tasmān netarāv ākāṅkṣatīti, itarāv api paripūrṇatvān na tam ākāṅkṣataḥ. nanv etasya vākyaśeṣasyaikam apy ākāṅkṣato na gamyate viśeṣaḥ, kena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2814: nirākāṅkṣīkriyate, kena vā neti. tenānavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarvaiḥ saha
GSP28msbh1-7u:2815: saṃbhantsyate. āha, naitad evam, yenāsya pratyakṣam ānantaryam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2816: upalabhāmahe tena saha saṃbhantsyata iti gamyate viśeṣaḥ, tasmāt tenānantareṇa saha saṃbha[136]{*2/178*}ntsyata iti nāsti sarvatrānuṣaṅga
GSP28msbh1-7u:2817: iti. āha - naitad evam, punātuśabdenāsya pratyakṣam ānantaryam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2818: upalabhāmahe, punātuśabdasyāpi citpatis tvetyevamādibhiḥ, ekaś cāsau punātuśabdaḥ punaḥ punar uccaritaḥ, tenāvagacchāmaḥ, yatra punātuśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ, tatra tenaikavākyatvād achidreṇety ayam api prayoktavyaḥ, tathā ca sati citpatis tvetyevamādayo vinā punātuśabdena, sākāṅkṣāḥ, te ca punātuśabdam ākāṅkṣanti, sa ca punātuśabdo 'chidreṇety anena viśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2819: tena punātuśabdena sānuṣaṅgeṇa niyogataḥ sarve nirākāṅkṣīkartavyāḥ. tasmāt sarveṣu tulyaprayogā iti vākyaparisamāptir anuṣajyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2828: saṃ te vāryur{*2/179*} vātena gacchatām, saṃ jayatrair aṅgāni{*2/180*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2829: saṃ yajñapatir āśiṣā{*2/181*} iti. vāryur{*2/182*} vātena gacchatām ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:2830: eṣa saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīti bahuvacanāntana vyavahitatvāt saṃyajñapatir āśiṣety atra nānuṣajyata{*2/183*}, ekena sākāṅkṣeṇa vyaveto{*2/184*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2831: gacchatām iti śeṣaḥ, tato bahuvacanāntena saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīty etena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2832: saṃbandham anupetya vyavetatvāt pareṇa na saṃbadhyate, gamyate hi tadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2833: viśeṣaḥ, ekena vyaveta iti, gamyamāne viśeṣe na tatra bhāvo vākyaśeṣasyopapadyate. tasmād bahuvacanāntasya parasya ca tadvyapetasya laukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2839: *{2/183: E2: nānuṣañjate, E4: nānuṣajjate, E5: nānuṣajyate, E6:
GSP28msbh1-7u:2843: asti jyotiṣṭomas tatra śrūyate - somena yajeta, dākṣiṇāni juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2844: hiraṇyamātreyāya dadātīti{*2/186*}; yajati - dadāti - juhotayas te kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2845: saṃhatya kāryaṃ kurvanti, uta viyutyeti saṃśayaḥ, sādhakāḥ saṃhatyāpi sādhayanto dṛśyante, viyutyāpi. saṃhatya tāvat, trayo grāvāṇa ekāmukhāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2846: dhārayanto dṛśyante, nāgadantakās tu viyutyāpi, ekaikasmin hi śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:2847: śikyam avalambayitum. ato yajati, dadāti, juhotavyaḥ saṃhatya sādhayeyur
GSP28msbh1-7u:2849: kiṃ tāvat prāptam, saṃhatyeti. kutaḥ? adṛṣṭārthānām upakārakalpanālpīyasī nyāyyeti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2850: adṛṣṭo yo 'śruto vārthaḥ, sa nāstīty avagamyate/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2851: tasminn asati dṛṣṭaś cet śruto vā na virudhyate//
GSP28msbh1-7u:2852: virudhyamāne kalpyaḥ syāj jāyate tena so 'rthavān/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2853: viśeṣaś cen na gamyeta, tato naiko 'pi kalpyate//
GSP28msbh1-7u:2854: gamyate ca viśeṣaḥ, bahubhya ekam apūrvam iti. tasmāt samudāyaś cikīrṣitaḥ, tato hy adṛṣṭe kalpyamāne, avayavānāṃ samudāyaṃ praty
GSP28msbh1-7u:2855: arthavattvād ekam apūrvaṃ samudāyāt kalpitaṃ bhaviṣyati. na ca, aśabdaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2856: samudāyaḥ, avayavaśabdair eva samudāyasyoktatvāt. tasmāt samudāyaś cikīrṣitaḥ. atha vā yajetety etasya pūrvo bhāgo [138]{*2/187*} yajaty arthaṃ bravīti, uttaras tam eva{*2/188*} bhāvayed ity anuvadati, evaṃ juhotīti pūrvo bhāgo juhoty artham, uttaras tam evānuvadati. tenaikasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ trayo yajaty ādaya upāyā vidhīyante śrutyā. tasmād etair yāgadānahomair viśiṣṭāpūrvasya bhāvanā pratīyate, ata ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2857: saṃhatyaikam apūrvaṃ sādhayantīti. yad vā yajatiśabdena vihitaṃ dānaṃ dānahomaśabdenānūdyate guṇasambandhārtham, tasmād ekam apūrvam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2859: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - pratiśabdam apūrvabheda iti, śabdāntare karmabhedaḥ kṛtānubandhatvāt, yajetety anena kevalasya yāgasya kartavyatocyate, na tu juhotiśabdābhihitasya dadātiśabdābhihitasya vā, śabdāntaratvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2861: śrutyāvayavasya, yajeta - iti sannihitayor api vākyena dānahomayoḥ, śrutyā yāgasyaiva sattāsambandho gamyate, na dānahomayoḥ. śrutiś ca vākyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2862: balīyasī. tasmān na samudāyaḥ śabdaḥ, kalpyamāno hi prayogavacanenaikavākyatāṃ nītvā kalpyeta, śabdāntaraṃ ca yajater dadātiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2863: tatra yady api paro bhāgo bhāvanāvacanaḥ sarveṣu samānaḥ, tathāpy ekaikasya pūrvo 'vayavo 'nyaḥ, anyaś ca tena samudāyaḥ śabdāntaram anyasmāt samudāyāt, tatrārthāntaraṃ vyaktam, dadyād iti dānena sādhayed iti kevalam eva dānaṃ karaṇaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ pratīyate, na yāgahomau sahāyāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:2864: apekṣate. tathā juhotīti homasādhanāṃ bhāvanām āha, na dānayāgāv apekṣate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2865: tatraitāvac chabdenāvagatam, dānena kevalena sidhyatīti juhotīty api homena kevalena sidhyatīti, na tu dānena kevalena sidhyatīti vijñānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2866: nivartate. dadāti tarhi svena kārakagrāmeṇa kṛtānubandho na yāgaṃ homaṃ vānubandham apekṣate. tasmād bhinnāni vākyani, pratiśabdam apūrvabhedaḥ [139]{*2/189*} iti. na ca dānasya yajati juhotir vānuvādo yāgahomayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:2867: avivakṣāprasaṅgāt. na ca dānam itarayor anuvādaḥ, parasvatvārthatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2868: dadāteḥ, itarayoś ca tyāgārthatvāt. prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe samudāyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:2869: apūrvam, siddhānte tu yāgasya phalavattvād itarayor guṇabhāvaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2873: ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutir aviśeṣād anarthakaṃ hi syāt // MS_2,2.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2875: yajatiśabdaḥ kim ekam apūrvaṃ codayati, kiṃ pratyabhyāsam apūrvabheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2876: śabdāntare karmabheda uktaḥ, iha sa eva śabdaḥ punaḥ punar uccāryate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2877: tasmād ekam evātrāpūrvam. nanv apūrvāntaram avidadhad anarthako bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2878: satyam evāprayojano bhavati, bahukṛtvo 'pi coccāryamāṇo nānyārtho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2879: yat prathame uccāraṇe{*2/191*} gamyate, śatatame 'pi{*2/192*} tad eva gamyate. tasmāt pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiśabda ekam apūrvaṃ codayati. na cābhyāso 'narthako bhaviṣyati, tanūnapādādīr devatā vidhāsyati, tasmād ekam apūrvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2880: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutiḥ syāt, karmabhedaṃ kuryād ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:2881: arthaḥ. tāvaty eva vidhīyamāne 'sati kasmiṃścid viśeṣe punaḥśrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:2882: anarthakā bhavet. nanūktaṃ na śaknoty arthāntaraṃ vidhātum iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2883: samidho yajatīty api prathamo 'nuvāda eva, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti yāgaḥ prāpta eva. tatra devatā na śakyā vidhātum, śrutiprāptā hi tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:2884: devatā, iyaṃ vākyāt prakaraṇād vā, tayor vikalpo na nyāyyaḥ, sa eṣa devatāyāgasaṃbandho [140]{*2/193*} vidhīyamāno 'kriyamāṇe yāge na śakyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2885: kartum ity anarthakaḥ syāt. kriyamāṇe tu śakyate. tasmād abhyasitavyo yāgaḥ, pratyabhyāsaṃ cādṛṣṭabheda{*2/194*} iti, na ca yat samitsaṃbandhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2886: kriyate, tat tanūnapātsaṃbandhena, bhinnatvāt tayoḥ, ato na vikalpaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2887: prayojanaṃ{*2/195*} pūrvapakṣe sakṛt prayoga iti, siddhānte punaḥ punaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2896: evaṃ hi samāmananti - yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati{*2/196*}; tāv abrūtām agnīṣomāv ājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu{*2/197*} paurṇamāsyāṃ yajann iti; tābhyām etam agnīṣomīyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2897: ekādaśakapālaṃ paurṇamāse prāyacchat{*2/198*}; aindraṃ dadhyamāvāsyāyām aindraṃ payo 'māvās-yāyām iti{*2/199*}. tathāghāram āghārayati{*2/200*};
GSP28msbh1-7u:2898: ājyabhāgau yajati, sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati, patnīsaṃyājān yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2899: samiṣṭayajur juhoti{*2/201*}. tathā ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate, ya evaṃ vidvān amāvāsyāṃ yajata iti{*2/202*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - sarvāṇy etāni samapradhānāni, utāgneyādīni payontāni pradhānāni, āghārādīny ārādupakārakāṇy aṅgāni? tathā, ya evaṃ vidvān ity evaṃ saṃyuktau
GSP28msbh1-7u:2900: prakṛtānāṃ karmaṇām anuvaditārau, atha vā ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2901: yajate, ya evaṃ vidvān amāvāsyāṃ yajata ity apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2902: tatretare guṇavidhaya iti. kiṃ{*2/203*} prāptam - śabdāntara-tvād abhyāsāc ca samapradhānānīti prāpte brūmaḥ{*2/204*} - prakaraṇaṃ tu paurṇamāsyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2904: rūpāvacanāt, ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīsaṃjñakaṃ yāgaṃ yajata iti na sarve
GSP28msbh1-7u:2905: yāgā [141]{*2/205*} ucyante, yaḥ paurṇamāsīsaṃjñakaḥ sa vidhīyate, na caitad evam avagacchāmaḥ, kīdṛśam evaṃsaṃjñakasya yāgasya rūpam iti, te
GSP28msbh1-7u:2906: na{*2/206*} kiṃcit pratipadyemahi. ato brūmaḥ - yady apūrvasya vidhātārāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:2907: anarthakāv iti. atha nu prakṛtānām anuvaditārau, tataḥ sannihitāḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktā yāgā iti gamyate rūpam, tatrārthavattā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2908: vacanasya. kathaṃ punar ekavacanānto bahūnāṃ vācako bhaviṣyatīti yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:2909: ucyate. samudāyaśabdatayāvakalpiṣyate, rūpavanto hi pūrvaprakṛtā yāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2910: teṣāṃ ca pracayaśiṣṭaḥ samudāyo 'py asti tadapekṣo 'yam arūpaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2911: tasmād ekavacanāntatā na doṣaḥ, bhavati hi bahūnām ekavacanāntaḥ śabdaḥ samudāyāpekṣaḥ, yathā - yūthaṃ vanaṃ kulaṃ pariṣad iti. yadāgneyādīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2912: samudāyavacanāvetau, tadā darśapaurṇamāsaśabdenaita evābhidhīyante. tata eṣāṃ phalasaṃbandhaḥ, phalavat sannidhes tv āghārādīny ārādupakārakāṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2915: *{2/197: E1,6; E2,5: nāv upāṃśu; E4: nāv uvāṃśu}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2924: viśeṣadarśanāc ca sarveṣāṃ{*2/207*} sameṣu hy apravṛttiḥ syāt // MS_2,2.4
GSP28msbh1-7u:2925: yadi ca sarvāṇi samapradhānāny abhaviṣyan, na vikṛtau prayājā dṛṣṭantām dṛśyante tu - prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotīti{*2/208*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:2926: asatyāgneyaguṇatve prayājasya tannopapadyate{*2/209*}. ato na sarvāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:2933: naitad asti, paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktau samudāyaśabdāv iti, kiṃ tv apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau, tathā na lakṣaṇaśabdo [142]{*2/210*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2934: bhaviṣyati. nanu rūpaṃ nāsti. vākyāntareṇa rūpam avagamiṣyāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2935: paurṇamāsyām āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavatīti yad etat paurṇamāsīnām karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2936: tasyaitad rūpam, agnir devatā, puroṅāśo dravyam iti. ata āgneyādibhir guṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2939: codanā vā guṇānāṃ yugapac chāstrāc codite hi tadarthatvāt tasya tasyopadiśyeta // MS_2,2.6
GSP28msbh1-7u:2940: karmacodanā vāgneyādayaḥ syuḥ. kutaḥ? guṇānāṃ yugapac chāsanāt, ekenaiva vākyenātrāneko guṇo vidhātum iṣyate bhavatā, na ca, śabdāntareṇa codite karmaṇy aneko guṇaḥ parasparasaṃbandhe cāsati śakyate vidhātum. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2941: yadi tāvat paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālo bhavatīti saṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ, na tadāyam artho 'ṣṭākapālaḥ sat tayābhisaṃbadhyata iti, kas tarhy aṣṭākapālaḥ paurṇamāsyābhisaṃbandhyata iti? tatra tadā bhavatir vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2942: tadānīm āgneya ity ayam asyāntikād apy upanipatito bhavati saṃbandhābhāvān nānena saṃbandham arhati, aṣṭākapāla āgneyo bhavatīti. athāgneyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhavatīti vivakṣyate. tadāgneyapuroṅāśayor asaṃbandha eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:2944: vaktavyam{*2/211*}, kena tasyām aṣṭākapālo vihita iti. atha tasyām āgneyasyāṣṭākapālatā. tathāpy eṣa doṣaḥ{*2/212*}. atha paurṇamāsīty ubhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2945: paraspareṇa dravyadevatayor asaṃbandha eva{*2/213*} syāt. atha dravyadevate paraspareṇa viśiṣṭe satyau paurṇamāsyā saṃbadhyeyātām ity ucyate. āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo yaḥ, sa paurṇamāsyāṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2946: tasyāprasiddhatvād etad apy ayuktam. atha kenacid agnaye saṅkalpitaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ vidhīyate. tathāpi devatāyā avidhānād rūpābhāva eva. athāgnir devatā bhaviṣyatīti kaścid brūyāt. sa [143]{*2/214*} vaktavyaḥ - mithaś cānarthasaṃbandha iti, na hy āgneyaśabdo 'nuvādo vidhiś ca bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2947: kalpayiṣyāmo devatām iti cet. na, asati vidhāne devatāyā abhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2948: saṃbandhiśabdo 'yaṃ devateti sa evāgnir aṣṭākapālasya devatā, nājyasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2949: tasmād avaśyam āgneyāṣṭākapālasaṃbandho vidhātavyaḥ, sa eṣa yāgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2950: bhavatīti, tena paurṇamāsīyāgasyāparo yāgaḥ saṃbandhī vidhīyate, na dravyaṃ devatā vā. na ca yāgasya yāgāntaraṃ rūpaṃ bhavati. ato rūpāvacanāt paurṇamāsyam āvāsyāsaṃyuktau nāpūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau. yat tūktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2951: paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau lakṣaṇayā prakṛtān yāgānanuvadituṃ śaknuto nāñjasyeneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, yadāñjasyena śabdārtho nāvakalpate, tadā lakṣaṇayāpi kalpyamānaḥ sādhur bhavati, yathā, agnau tiṣṭhati, avaṭe
GSP28msbh1-7u:2952: tiṣṭhati, agnisamīpe, avaṭasamīpe tiṣṭhatīti bhavati saṃvyavahāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2959: ugrāṇi ha vaitāni havīṃṣy amāvāsyāyāṃ saṃbhriyante, āgneyaṃ prathamam aindra uttara iti sam-uccayaṃ darśayati, āgneyādīnāṃ guṇatve vikalpaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2960: syāt. tatrāgneyaṃ prathamam, aindra uttare dva iti vyavadeśo nāvakalpeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2963: liṅgaṃ ca dṛśyate - caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2967: jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyate yad anvañcau puroḍāśāv upāṃśuyājam antarā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2968: yajatīti{*2/216*}, viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya, prajāpatir upāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya, agnīṣomāv upāṃśu yaṣṭavyāv ajāmitvāya iti. tatra sandehaḥ - upāṃśuyājamantarā yajatīti kiṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakānāṃ prakṛtānāṃ yāgānāṃ samud-āyasya vācakaḥ, atha vāpūrvasya yāgasyeti. tata ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:2969: paurṇamāsīvad upāṃśuyājo bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ - nāmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2970: nāmasaṃbaddho hi viśiṣṭo yāgaḥ śrūyate, upāṃśuyājasaṃjñakaḥ, na ca dravyadevate rūpam, prakṛtāś copāṃśuguṇakā yāgā vidyante. tasmāt samudāyaśabda iti. nanūpāṃśuguṇakaṃ yāgāntaram upāṃśutvena rūpeṇa rūpavad vidhīyate. na evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabda upāṃśuviśiṣṭaṃ yāgaṃ śaknoti vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2971: upāṃśuyāga iti hi tasya vaktā, cajoḥ ku ghiṇṇyator{*2/217*} iti{*2/218*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2972: kutvena bhavitavyam, avyutpannaḥ punar upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ. tasmān na rūpavad
GSP28msbh1-7u:2973: yāgāntaram. athāpi nāmasaṃyuktaṃ yajatisāmānyam eva, tathāpy anupadiṣṭadevatādravyarūpaṃ na yāgāntaraṃ pratipadyemahi. nanv evaṃ sati
GSP28msbh1-7u:2974: prakṛtānām apy avācakaḥ prāpnoti. mā bhūd upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ, yajatiśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2975: bhaviṣyati, tathā saty upāṃśuyājaśabde 'py anuvādatvād anāñjasye 'pi na
GSP28msbh1-7u:2982: karmāntarasya vācakaḥ syāt, upāṃśuyājaṃ yajatīti. kutaḥ? prakṛtānāṃ yāgānām abhāvāt, na cet prakṛtā vidyanta{*2/220*}, kasya samudāyaṃ vakṣyati? nanv idānīm evoktaṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyanta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2983: na vidyante, na hi, te vidhayo viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2984: arthavādā hi te. katham? asmin vākye vidhyantarasya bhāvāt, upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti etad etasmin vākye vidhī-yate. yadīme 'pi vidhīyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2985: bhidyeta{*2/221*} tarhi vākyam. api ca - yāgasya viṣṇvādināṃ ca saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:2986: 'tra gamyate vākye, na ca yāgasya vidhānam. nanu ca, upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīty atrāpy antarālasaṃbandho 'vagamyate. vāḍham{*2/222*}, sa tu vidhīyata upāṃśutvādisaṃbandhaḥ. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyaṃ nānekaṃ vidhātum arhati. katham? jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyata ity evam upakramam etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:2987: vākyam ajāmitvāyety evam antam, tasya madhye samāmnātaṃ viṣṇvādivākyaṃ tena saṃbandhya-mānaṃ na vākyāntaraṃ bhavitum arhati. tasmād viṣṇur upāṃśu
GSP28msbh1-7u:2988: yaṣṭavya ityevamādayo na vidhayaḥ, kiṃ tarhy arthavādāḥ. kaḥ punar arthavādaḥ? āgneyāgnīṣomīyayor nirantaraṃ kriyamāṇayor jāmitādoṣa uktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2989: taṃ bhiṣajitum, upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti vihitam. kathaṃ tena bhiṣajiṣyate? tasmin kriyamāṇe jñāyata eva, yathā viṣṇur yaṣṭavyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2990: prajāpatir agnīṣomau ceti{*2/223*}, tataś ca vyavadhānād ajāmitāvagamyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:2991: eva, tenājāmitārthavādaṃ vakṣyāmīti viṣṇvādisaṃbandho 'nūdyate, na tv antarālasaṃbandhasyānyat prayojanam asty ato vidhānāt. kathaṃ viṣṇvādayo yaṣṭavyā ity etad avagamyate? yaṣṭavyān ayaṣṭavyān vā viṣṇvādīn upāṃśuyājābhiṣṭavāya saṅkīrtayatīti gamyate. [146]{*2/224*} tatra kecit tāvad āhuḥ - prāptā eveti. kutaḥ? śākhāntare vidhānād iti. yady apy aprāptiḥ, tathāpy upāṃśutvasāmānyāt prajāpatir devatā viṣṇuś cety anuvādāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:2992: eva, upāṃśudharmāṇau hi viṣṇuprajāpatī, tasmād yatkiñcit prājāpatyaṃ yajñe
GSP28msbh1-7u:2993: kriyate, tad upāṃśv eva kriyata ityevamādisaṅkīrtanān mantrasamāmnānāc ca viṣṇum aprāptam api prāptam iva vadet. agniṣomayos tu vidhāyakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2994: udāhriyate - etāv abrūyātām{*2/225*} agnīṣomāv vājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti, tasmād yāgāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3002: yad ucyate, na jñāyate, katamo 'sāv upāṃśuyājasaṃjñako yāga iti, yasyāyaṃ guṇa upabaddhaḥ, upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti. tasmān na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3005: agryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaved ayam agrya iti matiḥ. tasmān na samudāyaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3007: āghāram āghārayatīti{*2/226*} śrūyate, tathemāny aparāṇi, ūrdhvam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3008: āghārayati, santatam āghārayati, ṛjum āghārayatītyevamādi{*2/227*}. idaṃ cāgnihotraṃ juhoti, tathā, dadhnā juhoti, payasā juhotītyevamādi. tatra sandehaḥ - kim ūrdhvam [147]{*2/228*} āghārayati, dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir āghārā homāś ca vihitāḥ, teṣām āghāram āghārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3009: agnihotraṃ juhotīty etau samudāyānuvādau, utaitāv evāpūrvayor āghārahomayor vidhātārāv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? nāpūrvayor vidhī iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3010: kutaḥ? arūpatvāt, na hi, etayoḥ pūrvebhyo homāghārebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam asti. yataḥ karmāntaram adhyavaseyam. ataḥ prakṛtatvāt{*2/229*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3017: saṃjñopabandhaś ca bhavati, agnihotraṃ nāma homaṃ juhotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3018: āghārasaṃjñakaṃ karma karotīti, saṃjñāviśiṣṭāvāghārahomau vidhīyete. na ca vijñāyate{*2/230*}, ko 'sāv āghāro nāma karmaviśeṣaḥ, kaś āgnihotrasaṃjñaka iti. nanu vijñāyate, āghāraṇam āghāraḥ, havanaṃ homaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3019: yady āghāraṇasāmānyaṃ homasāmānyaṃ ca vidhīyete, vijñātapūrvau tarhy āghārahomau, tenānuvādau. athāvyutpannā ubhayor api saṃjñā, tathāpi nāghārāgnihotrasāmānyam ucyeta, viśeṣāśrayatvāt saṃjñāyāḥ. na ca, sa viśeṣo gamyata ity apūrvāvāghārahomavidhī nāvakalpyete. api ca kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3020: kriyā sādhanaśabdenocyeta? īpsitatamaṃ hi yat sādhanam, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:3021: dvitīyāntenocyate, kriyā tiṅantena. anuvādapakṣe kriyāṇāṃ samudāyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3026: na ca, prakṛtam api dravyadevatam āghāre vidyate. yena rūpavān syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3029: codanā vā śabdārthasya prayogabhūtatvāt, tatsannidher guṇārthena punaḥ-śrutiḥ // MS_2,2.16
GSP28msbh1-7u:3030: na caitad asti, samudāyaśabdāv iti, karmāntaracodane syātām. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3031: śabdārthasya prayogabhūtatvāt, āghārayati, juhotīti, homāghārau prayoktavyāv iti śabdārthaḥ, tena karmāntare vidhīyeta ity avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3034: yad uktam, ūrdhvam āghārayati, dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir vihitatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3035: anuvādāv iti. naitad evam, na hy ete homāghārau vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3036: ūrdhvam āghārayati, dadhnā juhotīti ca naitad uktaṃ bhavati, āghāraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3037: kartavyaḥ, homaḥ kartavya iti, kiṃ tarhi, ūrdhvatāghārasaṃbandhaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3038: kartavyaḥ, dadhihomasaṃbandhaḥ kartavya iti. tasmād arāptatvān nānuvādau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3039: nanu saṃbandhe vihita arthād dhomāghārau bhaviṣyataḥ. naitad evam, asmin hi sati vidhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nārthād āpadyete homāghārau, ato
GSP28msbh1-7u:3041: nanv āghārayati, juhotīti homāghāragato vyāpāraḥ śrūyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3042: dadhyūrdhvatādisaṃbandhaḥ. satyaṃ na śrūyate. tasmin nidher guṇārthena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3043: vyāpāraśravaṇam avakalpiṣyate. nanu padārthāntaragataṃ vyāpāraṃ śrutir na śaknoti vaditum. satyam evam etat, svapadārthagataṃ vakṣyati, taṃ tu svapadārthaṃ guṇaśabdo viśekṣyati, sa eva{*2/232*} viśiṣṭaḥ pratyeṣyata iti bhaved etat, viśiṣyāt svapadārthaṃ guṇaśabdaḥ, na tv eṣa{*2/233*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3044: guṇagato vyāpāraḥ pratīyeta. tatra kiṃ bhaviṣyati? avyāpriyamāṇe 'pi guṇe śabdārthāvakḷpto bhaviṣyati. guṇavacanasannidhir idānīṃ kim arthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3045: anarthakas tu. kathaṃ punar anarthako [149]{*2/234*} nāma vedo{*2/235*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3046: bhavitum arhati? saty arthe nānarthakaḥ, asati tv arthe kim anyad ucyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3047: evaṃ tarhi vākyād bhaviṣyati, śrutyarthe sati na vākyārtho 'vakalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3048: satyam evam etat. avivakṣite tv avakalpiṣyate. katham avivakṣā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3051: punaḥśrutiḥ{*2/236*}. juhoter uccāraṇaṃ cānuvādo guṇasaṃbandhārthaḥ. yadi juhotīty anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3052: kenedānīṃ guṇo vidhīyate? dadhiśabdeneti mā vocata. nanv idānīm eva vākyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3053: guṇavyāpāro{*2/237*} gamyata ity uktam. satyam evam etat, avidhīyamānas tu kuto gamyata iti, pramāṇam asya nāvagamyeta. asati pramāṇe vyāmohaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3054: evaṃ tarhi vidhāyakau juhotyāghārayatiśabdau. kasya tarhy anuvādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3056: yadi vidhāyakau, pūrvam eva vihite svārthe, kim arthaṃ punar uccāryete?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3057: vākyārtho yas taṃ vidhātum ity adoṣaḥ. tasmāt karmāntaracodane. yad uktam - nāsty āghāre prakṛtaṃ dravyadevatam iti. kim evaṃ sati dravyadevatena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3058: yadā prasiddhārthābhidhānān nirjñātam evāsya rūpam. api ca, caturgṛhītaṃ vaitad abhūt tasyāghāram āghāryety ājyamasya dravyam, māntravarṇiko
GSP28msbh1-7u:3059: devatāvidhiḥ, indra ūrdhvo 'dhvaro divi spṛśatu mahato yajño yajñapata indravān svāhetyāghāram āghārayatīti{*2/238*}, evam asāv indravān yady asyendro devatā, tad yadi devatābhidhānam etad āghārasya, tato 'nenāghāraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3060: kṛto bhavati. tasmāt karmāntare, na samudāyaśabdāv iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3068: dravyasaṃyogāc codanā paśusomayoḥ, prakaraṇe hy anarthako dravyasaṃyogo na hi tasya guṇārthena jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata
GSP28msbh1-7u:3069: iti{*2/240*}, tatredam āmananti, hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati, atha jihvāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3070: atha vakṣasa iti{*2/241*}. tathā{*2/242*} somena yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3071: tatrāpi{*2/243*}, aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇāti, maitrāvaruṇaṃ gṛhṇāti, āśvinaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3072: gṛhṇātītyevamādi. tatra saṃśayaḥ, kim avadyati gṛhṇāti{*2/244*} -
GSP28msbh1-7u:3073: coditānāṃ karmaṇām evālabhatiyajatī samudāyasyānuvaditarau, athāpūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:3074: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? samudāyasyeti. kutaḥ? ye ime ālabhatiyajatibhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3075: karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām iti cintyete, pūrvam eva ta avadyatigṛhṇātibhyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:3076: avagamite. na cāvagamito 'rtho vidhīyate. hṛdayādīṃs tu paśuśabdenānuvadati, somaśabdena ca rasam. tasmāt somena yajetety anuvādo yajatiḥ yajeta svargakāma iti{*2/245*} phalasambandhārthaḥ. paśum ālabheteti cālabhatir agnīṣomasaṃbandhārthaḥ. api ca, daśaitān adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇātīti samuccayo dṛśyate. tathāśvino daśamo gṛhyate, tṛtīyo hūyata iti ca kramaḥ. yadi cāpūrvau yāgau vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3077: tatraindravāyavādibhir devatā vidhīyeran, tā ekārthāḥ santyo vikalperan.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3078: yathā, khādire badhnāti, pālāśe badhnāti rohitake badhnātīti. tatra kramasamuccayadarśane nopapadyeyātām, atha punar asmin samudāyavacane,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3079: yajatau samyag etad avakḷptaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyānuvādau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3080: [151]{*2/246*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhānacodane
GSP28msbh1-7u:3081: paśusomayoḥ. kutaḥ? soma-śabdaḥ kṣīriṇyāṃ latāyāṃ prasiddho na rase,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3082: ākṛtivacano hi somaśabdo na vyaktivacanaḥ. tathā, śṛṅgiṇi pucchavati lomaśe catuṣpadi dravyaviśeṣe paśuśabdam ākṛtivacanam upacaranti, na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3083: evam ākṛtikadravyāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyante. yeṣām imau samudāyasyānuvaditārau bhaveyātām. nanu paśu-vikāro hṛdayādiḥ paśuśabdenāgnīṣomasaṃbandhārtham anūdyate. naitad evam, paśur agnīṣomīyo bhavatīty etāvad ucyate, nāyaṃ prakṛto hṛdayādiḥ paśur iti. tatra yadi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3084: laukikasya paśor grahaṇaṃ tato mukhyaḥ paśuśabdaḥ, yadi hṛdayādeḥ, tato jaghanyo vikārasaṃbandhena. tathā, somaśabdo 'pi vikārasaṃbandhenānuvādaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3085: syāt. tasmād apūrve karmaṇī vidhīyeyātāṃ nānuvādau. athaindravāyavādiṣu prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu latā vidhīyeteti. ucyate - na, sā śakyā vākyenaindravāyavī jñātum, śrutyā hi rasa aindravāyavaḥ. tasmād dravyasaṃyogavacanaḥ prakṛteṣu yāgeṣv api satsu vidhātum anuvadituṃ vā na śaknuvann anarthakaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrvakarmaṇī vidhīyeyātām, na prakṛtānām anuvādāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3092: *{2/245: E1,6; E2,4,5: svargakāmo vasante vasanta iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3094: evaṃ tāvat, prakṛteṣu satsv api nānuvādāv ity uktam, athedānīm, prakṛtā eva yāgā na santīty ucyate. kutaḥ? acodakāḥ saṃskārāḥ, na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3095: aindravāyavādibhir yāgā vidhīyante, tena grahaṇam upakalpanamātraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3097: ataḥ, aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītīndravāyubhyāṃ saṃkalpayatīty etāvad uktaṃ bhavati, tatra yāgam antareṇa saṃkalpayatīty etan na yujyata iti yāgaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3098: kalpyeta, sa evāmnāto yāgaḥ, yasmin sati saṃkalpo 'vakalpyeta. tasmān na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3099: aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītyevamādibhir yāgā vidhīyeran, prakṛtānāṃ yāgānām abhāvān na samudāyaśabdo yajatiḥ, tathā labhatiśabda{*2/248*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3102: tadbhedāt karmaṇo 'bhyāso dravyapṛthaktvād anarthakaṃ hi syād bhedo dravyaguṇībhāvāt // paśau vṛttā kathā daśame punar udbhaviṣyati, soma idānīṃ vartate. kathaṃ kramasamuccayāv iti. indravāyvādyā devatā naivaṃ śrūyante, indravāyubhyāṃ yāgo nirvartayitavyaḥ, mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ yāgo nirvartayitavya iti, yady evam aśroṣyanta, yāgaṃ prati devatā vyakalpiṣyanta, kevalayā hi devatayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3103: tadā yāgo nirvartyata iti vihitam abhaviṣyat. atha punar imāḥ adṛṣṭārthaṃ gṛhṇāti saṃskāraṃ prati devatā vidhīyante, tatrendravāyusaṃkalpād anyo mitrāvaruṇasaṃkalpaḥ, tena gṛhṇātau tatkṛtād adṛṣṭād adṛṣṭāntaram utpādayati, evam apareṣv api grahaṇeṣu, tasmāt samuccayaḥ. grahaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3104: tu{*2/249*} niyataparimāṇeṣūrdhvapātreṣu prādeśamātreṣu niyataparimāṇeṣūdakakalaśeṣu saṃskṛtasya daśamuṣṭiparimitasya kṛtsnasya somasya nāvakalpate. yady api cāvakalpeta, tathāpi nityavihitānāṃ devatānāṃ vikalpapakṣe tāvat prayogavacano mā bādhīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:3105: ava[153]{*2/250*}yavagrahaṇam eva nyāyyam, kṛtsnagrahaṇe hi tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3106: evendravāyubhyāṃ saṃkalpitam, tad eva mitrāvarūṇābhyām iti nāvakalpeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3107: tasmāt kalpanabhedāt pṛthagavasthitaḥ somo nānādevatatvād eva naikyena śakyaḥ kartum. na cāsati devatāyāge devatābhyaḥ śakyate saṃkalpayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3108: tasmād avaśyaṃ yathāsaṃkalpitā devatā yaṣṭavyāḥ, tāsu cejyamānāsu jyotiṣṭomena yajeteti śruto yāgo nirvṛtta eva bhavati, na devatāntaram ākāṅkṣati, kṛtsnena ca daśamuṣṭinā somena yāgaḥ śrutaḥ, so 'saty abhyāse nāvakalpata ity arthāt sa guṇo bhaviṣyatīty abhyasitavyo yāgaḥ, na hy anabhyastaḥ sarvābhir devatābhiḥ sarveṇa ca{*2/251*} somena saṃpanno bhaviṣyati. tasmiṃś cābhyasyamāne kramasamuccayau yuktāv eva bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3113: saṃskāras tu na bhidyeta, parārthatvād dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3114: yad apy ucyate - yathā khādire badhnāti, pālāśe badhnātīti khādirādayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3115: saṃskāre vikalpante, tadvad devatā vikalpayiṣyanta iti, tac ca naivaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3116: yuktam, tatra saṃskāram abhinirvartayituṃ khādirādayaḥ śrūyante. yadi cendravāyvādyā api grahadevatā yāgam abhinirvartayituṃ śrūyeran, tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:3117: 'trāpi vikalpaḥ syāt, na tv etā yāge śrutāḥ. tasmāt samuccīyeran.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3119: asti vājapeyaḥ, vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti, [154]{*2/252*} tatra prājāpatyāḥ paśavaḥ, saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate, saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ, prajāpater āptyai śyāmāstūparā ekarūpā bhavanti, evam eva hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3120: prajāpatiḥ samṛddhyai{*2/253*}. tatra sandihyate - kiṃ saptadaśaitāni karmāṇi, atha saptadaśapaśuguṇakam ekaṃ karmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ekaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3121: karmeti. kutaḥ? prajāpataye saptadaśa paśavaḥ saṅkalpyante. kim ekaṃ yāgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3122: abhinivartayitum uta bahūn iti saṃśaye ekam iti nyāyyaṃ, yo hi bahūn yāgān
GSP28msbh1-7u:3123: kalpayati, kalpayaty asāv ekam, tatraikasminn eva parikḷpte saptadaśānām eva paśūnāṃ parikalpanam upapannaṃ bhavati, kena ca dvitīyādīn yāgān
GSP28msbh1-7u:3124: avakalpayema. evaṃ saty{*2/254*} alpīyasy adṛṣṭānumānaprasaṅgakalpanā bhavati. tasmād eko yāgaḥ saptadaśabhiḥ paśubhir nirvartyate{*2/255*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3125: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṅkhyayā karmabhedo bhavet, pṛthaktve paśūnāṃ sati
GSP28msbh1-7u:3126: saptadaśasaṅkhyā niviśeta, tac ca paśūnāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bahuṣu yāgeṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:3127: avakalpate, naikasmin. katham? ekādaśabhir avadānair asau yāgo nivartayitavya ity evaṃ codakaḥ pratidiśati, tāni caikasmād eva paśor
GSP28msbh1-7u:3128: avāpyante, tatra dvitīyāder ālambho nāvadānasaṃpādanāya bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3130: atadarthatvān na te prājāpatyā bhaveyuḥ, tatra prājāpatyān iti śravaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3131: uparudhyeta{*2/257*}. tenaikasmin paśau pṛthaktve niveśinī saptadaśasaṅkhyā nāvakalpyeta, bahuṣu yāgeṣu bahubhir evāvadānagaṇaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3132: prayojanam, tena saptadaśabhyo yāgebhyaḥ saptadaśa paśūn upādadīraṃs tatra saṅkhyāsāmaṃ jasyaṃ bhaviṣyati, tasmāt saptadaśa yāgāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3133: nanv ekasminn api yāge saptadaśabhir avadānagaṇair yakṣyate vacanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3134: naitad evam, paśuṣu hiṃ sā saṅkhyā śrūyate, nāvadānagaṇeṣu. avadānāni havīṃṣi yāgasādhanāni, na paśvākṛtiḥ, sā hy avadānaprakṛtidravyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3135: viśiṣantī prakṛtau pradhānasyopakṛtavatīti [155]{*2/258*} vikṛtāv apy avadānaprakṛtidravyaṃ viśiṣantī pradhānasyopakariṣyati, tatra ca paśoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3136: saptadaśasaṅkhyā vikārikā, nāvadānagaṇasya, tasmād ekasmai avadānagaṇāyaikaḥ paśur ālabdhavyaḥ prāpnoti, tatra saptadaśasaṅkhyā nopapadyate, evam evāvakalpiṣyate. yadi śṛṅgābhiprāyā varṇābhiprāyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3137: rūpābhiprāyā vābhiviṣyan saptadaśapaśavaḥ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo rohita
GSP28msbh1-7u:3138: ityevamādayaḥ, teṣām anyatamo gṛhyata iti, athavā tūparāḥ śṛṅgiṇa ekaśṛṅgā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3139: ityevamādayaḥ, teṣām anyatama iti, te hi śyāmās tūparā ekarūpāḥ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3140: tadeṣu bahuṣu yāgeṣūpapadyate, naikasmin. tasmāt saptadaśa yāgā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3141: prayojanam ekasminn aṣṭe duṣṭe kṛtsnaḥ paśugaṇa āvarteta, ekam ālabhyamānam anvālabheran, pūrvapakṣe 'dṛṣṭārtham. siddhānta eka eva paśur
GSP28msbh1-7u:3142: āvartate, na hi karmabhede paśuḥ paśvantaram ākāṅkṣatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3150: athaiṣa jyotir athaiṣa viśvajyotir athaiṣa sarvajyotir iti. atra{*2/259*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3151: saṃdehaḥ, kim ebhir nāmadheyaiḥ prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ saṅkīrtya tatra sahasradakṣiṇādiguṇo vidhīyate, atha vā vakṣyamāṇaviśeṣāṇi karmāntarāṇy upadiśyanta iti. kiṃ prāptam, prakaraṇānugrahāt prakṛtasya guṇavidhānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3152: iti. nanu vākyasāmarthyāj jyotirādīnām ete guṇā vidhāyiṣyante. naiṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:3153: doṣaḥ, jyotiṣṭomasyaivaitāni vācakāni, jyotir iti jyotiṣṭomasya pratīkam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3154: upādīyate, viśvajyotir iti trivṛdādīny asya jyotīṃṣi vākyaśeṣasaṅkīrtitāni, tāni sarvāṇy asya, tenāsau viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotiś
GSP28msbh1-7u:3156: [156]{*2/260*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṃjñā hi tisro bhedikāḥ, teṣāṃ jyotir ādyāḥ, utpattivākye hy etāḥ śrūyante, tāsām{*2/261*} imāḥ punaḥ śrutayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3157: tasmād athaiṣa jyotir ity apūrvasya karmaṇo vidhāyakaṃ vākyam, anuvāde hi saty apravṛttiviśeṣakaram anarthakaṃ syāt. prakṛtasya ca guṇavidhāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:3158: vikalpo bhavet, tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ, na ca jyotirādayo jyotiṣṭomasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3159: vaditāraḥ, samudāyāntarāṇi hy etāni, na cāvayavena samānena samudāyāntaraṃ tadartham eva bhavati, yathā śālāśabdo gṛhavacanaḥ, tatra na śālāśabdasāmānyān mālāśabdādayo 'pi gṛhavacanā bhavanti. yat tu jyotiṣṭomasya jyotir iti pratīkam upādīyata iti. prakaraṇasāmarthyād dhi tatra jyotiṣṭomaśabdena parokṣenaikavākyatā bhavet, sā pratyakṣaṃ jyotiḥśabdena sahaikavākyatāṃ bādheta, nacaitan nyāyyam, vākyaṃ hi prakaraṇād balīyaḥ. atha punar ayaṃ dyotanārthatvād vā jyotiṣṭomatvād vā karmāntare vatsyati, yac{*2/262*} ca trivṛdādīni jyotīṃṣi teṣāṃ sākalyavacano viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotir iti cet. neti brūmaḥ, na hi trivṛdādiṣu jyotiḥśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ, evaṃ bruvan prasiddhaṃ bādheta. yat tu vākyaśeṣāj jyotiḥśabdas trivṛdādivacana iti, tasminn eva vākye sa tatra prayukta iti gamyate pramāṇāntareṇa na śabdena, yatra tu tatpramāṇāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3160: nāsti, na tatra vartitum arhati, yathā siṃho devadatta iti siṃhaśabdo devadattavacanaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa, na tu siṃham ālabheteti yatra, tatra tu tatpramāṇāntaraṃ nāsti. tasmān na viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotir iti{*2/263*} ca jyotiṣṭomasya vaditārau, na cej jyotiṣṭoma ucyate, sarvāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3162: *{2/259: E1,5,6; E2,4: sarvajyotir etena sahasradakṣiṇena yajeteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3169: cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve samāmananti, tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevy āmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam iti{*2/266*}. tatra sandihyate, kim āmikṣāguṇake karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇavidhiḥ, uta tasmād vājina-guṇakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3170: karmāntaram{*2/267*}? kiṃ prāptam? guṇavidhir iti. kutaḥ? vājenān nenāmikṣayā vājino viśve-devās tān anūdya vājinaṃ vidhīyate, tenobhayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3171: vaiśvadevam, āmikṣā vājinaṃ ca. tasminn eva ca karmaṇi vājinaguṇavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3172: yathā agnihotraṃ juhotīty ukte dadhnā juhoti, payasā juhotīti{*2/268*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3173: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇaś cāprakṛtena devatābhidhānena saṃbandhyamānaḥ karmāntaraṃ vidadhyāt, same hi tadaite vākye bhavataḥ, ubhe apy apūrvayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:3174: yāgayor vidhātṛṇī. kathaṃ punar apūrvadevatābhidhānam? yadedānīm eva uktam, viśveṣāṃ devānām anuvādo vājinam{*2/269*} iti. tad ucyate - iha viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ devatātvaṃ kvacic chrutyā, kvacit vākyena. tad dhitanirdeśe śrutyā, caturthīnirdeśe vākyena. yatra śrutyā devatātvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3175: tatrāmikṣayā sahaikavākyatvam. yatra caturthī, tatra vājinena, tatraiṣām ekatra śrutyā devatātvam, vākyena dravyaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ. ekatrobhayam api vākyena. tad iha devatātvaṃ prati śrutivākyayor virodhaḥ, virodhe ca śrutir balīyasīty āmikṣāvākye devatātvaṃ viśveṣāṃ devānām, na vājinavākya ity adhyavasīyate, tenāvagamyate, aprakṛtena devatāpadenāsya saṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:3177: atha yad upavarṇitam, yathāgnihotraṃ juhotīty ukte dadhnā juhotītyevamādayo guṇavidhaya iti. tatrocyate - [158]{*2/270*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3183: aguṇe tu karmaśabde guṇas tatra pratīyeta // MS_2,2.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3184: yuktaṃ yat tatra guṇavidhānam, na tatrāprakṛtena kenacid guṇena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3185: saṃbandhaḥ, prakṛtena tv asti yāgena. tasmād anupavarṇanam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3187: vikalpaparijihīrṣayāvakalpyante. tad eva tu karma juhotītiśabdād avagamyate, na karmāntaram. tasmāt tatraiva guṇavidhiḥ, vacanād vikalpaś ceti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3188: phalaśrutes tu karma syāt, phalasya karmayogitvāt // MS_2,2.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3189: agnihotraṃ prakṛtya samāmananti, dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyād ityevamādi{*2/271*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ, kim agnihotrahomād dhomāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3190: dadhyādihomaḥ, uta dadhyāder guṇāt phalam iti. kiṃ prāptam? homāntaram
GSP28msbh1-7u:3191: iti. kutaḥ? phalaśruteḥ, phalam iha śrūyate, tac ca karmaṇo nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3192: kiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇaḥ phalam? kṛṣyādito vrīhyādi. neti brūmaḥ, na hy etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3193: dṛṣṭenānena sidhyati, yadi darśanaṃ hetuḥ [159]{*2/272*} phalajñāne,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3194: kṛṣyādau padārthe taddarśanam, na home. atha kṛṣau dṛṣṭam anyatrāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3195: bhavati. dravyād api prasajyate. atha kṛṣisadṛśād bhavatīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3196: kṛṣisadṛśo homaḥ kriyātvāt, na dravyam, asadṛśaṃ hi tad iti. homo 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:3197: asadṛśaḥ, mantradevatādisādhanatvād dhomasya, lāṅgalādisādhanatvāc ca kṛṣeḥ. tyāgātmakatvād dhomasya, pāṭanātmakatvāc ca kṛṣeḥ. atha kiṃcit sādṛśyaṃ gṛhyate. dravyasyāpi sad anityam ityevamādi kiṃcit sādṛśyam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3198: atha dravyād anyat sadṛśataram astīti kṛtvā na dravyaṃ sadṛśam ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3199: homād apy anyat kṛṣeḥ sadṛśataram asti dṛṣṭārtham iti kṛtvā homo 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:3200: asadṛśaḥ syāt. na caitat siddham, yat kvacit dṛśyate, tad anyasmin sadṛśamātre 'dṛṣṭam api bhavitum arhatīti, yad dhi yasya kāraṇabhūtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ siddhe, tac cet sādhye 'pi kāraṇabhūtam ity avagamyate, bhavati tat tasya sādhakam, yan na jñāyate kāraṇabhūtam iti, na tat sadṛśam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:3201: sādhakam. tasmāt sadṛśam api sādhakam asādhakaṃ veti parīkṣitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3202: atha yat karma tat phalavad dṛṣṭam, homo 'pi karma, tenāpi phalavatā bhavitavyam iti. uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇāṃ tatsaṃyogānāṃ ca dravyāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3203: phalaṃ dṛṣṭam iti dravyam api phalavat syāt. api ca kṛṣer nādṛṣṭam iti tatsādṛśyād dhomād api nādṛṣṭaṃ bhavet, kṛṣisādṛśyād vā vrīhir eva bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3204: nendriyam. tasmān naivaṃjātīyakeṣv etad bhavati dṛṣṭād adṛṣṭasiddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3205: kathaṃ tarhi homān nyāyyaṃ phalam iti. ucyate, śabdenāvagamyate tatphalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3206: yataḥ phalam iti śabda āha, tato nyāyyam, homāc ca phalam iti śrutyā śabdena gamyate, dadhnaḥ phalam iti vākyena, śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3207: tasmāt homāt phalam iti nyāyyam, dadhnaḥ phalam iti cānyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3208: api ca dadhy ubhayam asamartham, kartuṃ phalam, sādhayituṃ homaṃ ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3209: [160]{*2/273*} nanu kambalanirṇejanavad etad bhaviṣyati, nirṇejanaṃ hy ubhayaṃ karoti, kambalaśuddhiṃ pādayoś ca nirmalatām. na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3210: ekasyobhayaṃ prayojanam abhiniṣpādayituṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti, kiṃ tarhi phale guṇabhūtaṃ dadhi home cety ekaṃ vākyaṃ vaditum asamartham iti. yadi phalaṃ dadhnā kuryād iti brūyāt, na dadhnā homam iti, atha dadhnā homaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3211: sādhayed iti brūyāt, na phalam iti. ubhayavacane bhidyeta vākyam, abhinnaṃ cedam upalabhyate. tasmān na guṇāt phalam ity agnihotrahomād dadhihomaḥ karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3214: atulyatvāt tu vākyayor guṇe tasya pratīyeta // MS_2,2.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3215: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate, na karmāntaram, kiṃ tu guṇāt phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3216: katham? atulye hy ete vākye, agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ity atra karmasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ phalaṃ svargakāmo homena kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3217: dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyād iti guṇasamabhivyāhṛtam. na hy atra homa indriyāya kartavya iti pratīyate, kiṃ tarhi dadhnā homa indriyakāmasyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3218: homasya dadhisaṃbandha indriyāya, na homasyotpattiḥ, ya indriyakāmaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3219: sa dadhnā homaṃ kuryād iti. katamo 'tra śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnasya vakteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3221: nanu śrutyā homasaṃbaddham eṣa puruṣaprayatnaṃ vadati, vākyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3222: dadhisaṃbandham, na ca, vākyaṃ śrutim apabādhitum arhati. na ca, yugapad ubhayasaṃbandho na virudhyate, vākyaṃ hi tathā bhidyeteti. atrocyate - ye bhavadīyaṃ pakṣam āśrayeran, te śrutim apabādher antarām{*2/274*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3223: asmadīye tu punaḥ pakṣe juhuyād iti dhātvarthaḥ kevalo 'pabādhito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3224: yuṣmadīye tu kṛtsna eva dadhneti śabdaḥ. taṃ cāpramādyantaḥ samāmanantīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3225: gamyate. na caitat pramattagītam, [161]{*2/275*} ity uktam, tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikam iti. tasmān na karmasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3226: guṇasamabhi-vyāhṛte tu na kaścit pramādapāṭhaḥ, avaśyaṃ hi, juhuyād iti dadhnendriyakāmayoḥ saṃbandhavi-dhānārthaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati. nanūcyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:3227: 'pi na kevalaḥ karoty artho 'vagamyate, kevale na vacaḥprayojanam, sa ca homasaṃbaddhaḥ, tasmād asamañjasam iti. neti brūmaḥ, homasaṃbaddho 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:3228: asau karoty artha eva, kevalaṃ tv asya homasaṃbandhe viśeṣaḥ, na tu karoty
GSP28msbh1-7u:3229: arthatāṃ bādhate, indriyakāmasya homasaṃbaddhaṃ prayatnaṃ dadhisaṃbaddhaṃ kuryād iti. nanv evaṃ sati sa eva doṣaḥ, homasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3230: ucyate - juhuyād iti śabdasyaitatsāmarthyam, yad dhomaviśiṣṭaṃ prayatnam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3231: āha, na tv atra homaḥ sādhanatvena vidhīyate, sādhyatvena viśiṣṭas tu
GSP28msbh1-7u:3232: prayatno vākyena dadhyāśrito 'vagamyate, ata eva ca vṛttikāreṇoktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:3233: homam āśrito guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti, yathā rājapuruṣo rājānam āśrito rājakarma karotīti. tasmād dadhnaḥ phalam, ya indriyakāmaḥ, sa dadhnā kuryād indriyam iti. katham iti. anayāgnihotretikartavyatayeti. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3234: phalasādhanasya dadhna itikartavyatākāṅkṣatvāt, asyāś cetikartavyatāyāḥ sannidhānāt, codanāliṅgasya ca juhoty arthasya darśanāt. yasmād eva cāyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3235: juhoty 'rtho 'nuvādaḥ, tasmād avidhāyakaḥ. na ca, anyad dhomasya vidhāyakaṃ nāstīti, tasmān na karmāntaram, tasmād dadhnaḥ phalam iti. atha vā dadhiśabdasya vivakṣitārthatvād dadhihomasaṃbandho 'yaṃ vākyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3236: vidhīyate, tena dadhno homena saṃbadhyamānāt phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3240: trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomas tasya vāyavyāsv ekaviṃśam agniṣṭomasāmakṛtvā brahmavarcasakāmo yajeteti, etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma kṛtvā paśukāmo hy etena yajeteti. atrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ, kiṃ tasyaivāgniṣṭuto 'gniṣṭomasya guṇād vāravantīyāt paśavaḥ phalam, etena yajeteti anuvādaḥ, atha kim etena yajeteti karmāntaram iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3241: na karmāntaraṃ guṇāt phalam iti. kutaḥ? etena yajeteti viditasyaitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3242: vacanam, nāviditasya, ato na vidhyantaram, paśukāma evaṃ yajetety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3243: na yajeteti, kathaṃ kṛtvā? vāravantīyaṃ kṛtveti. api ca, etasyaiveti vispaṣṭam akarmāntaravacanam. tasmād guṇāt phalam ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3244: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sameṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣu bhinnavākyeṣu karmayuktaṃ phalaṃ bhavet, etasyaiva revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ kṛtveti, na hy etasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3245: revatyaḥ santi, yāsv asya vāravantīyaṃ bhavet, tatra revatyo [163]{*2/277*} bhavanti, tāsu ca vāravantīyaṃ vidhīyeteti vākyam bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3246: athocyeta, asya pūrvā revatīr upādāya tāsu ca vāravantīyaṃ kṛtvā, etena yajetety anuvadatīti. tathāgniṣṭomasāmeti nāvakalpyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3247: athāgniṣṭomasāmakārye bhavatīty ucyate. etasyaivety etad avivakṣitaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3248: ubhayasmin vivakṣyamāṇe bhidyeta vākyam, tasmāt karmāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3249: atha karmāntare katham avākyabhedaḥ. revatīṣu ṛkṣu vāravantīyaṃ sāma kṛtvā paśukāmo yajetety apūrvo yāgaḥ sarvair viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3250: tenaikārthatvam, vibhāge ca sākāṅkṣatvam ity ekavākyatvam upapadyate. nanv arthabhedo yāgaś caivaṃ hy apūrvaḥ kartavyaḥ, revatīṣu vāravantīyam apūrvam iti. neti brūmaḥ, nirvṛttavāravantīyarevatīguṇako yāgo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3251: na vāravantīyanirvṛttiḥ, arthād revatīṣu vāravantīyam abhinirvartsyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3252: śakyate ca tan nirvartayitum. ucyate - revatīnāṃ vāravantī yasya ca saṃbandho na vihitaḥ syāt, tatra ca revatīṣv anyāny api sāmāni bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3253: vāravantīyaṃ cānyāsv api ṛkṣu. naiṣa doṣaḥ, kṛtvety abhinirvṛttaḥ saṃbandho yāgāyocyate, tena saṃbandho gamyate, dvāv apy etāv arthau kṛtvety eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditum, abhinirvṛttiṃ pūrvakālatāṃ ca, yathā śoṇamānaya - iti raktaguṇasaṃbaddho 'śvaḥ śabdenaivānayato{*2/278*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3254: vidhīyata iti, na vākyabhedo bhavati, evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3255: nanv evam api bahavo 'rthāḥ, revatyaḥ, vāravantīyam, tatsaṃbandhaḥ, yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3256: paśukāmaś ceti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, bahavaḥ śrūyante, eko 'tra vidhīyate, yāgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3257: viśiṣṭaḥ. nanu revatyo 'pi vidhīyante, vāravantīyam api, yadi na vidhīyeran, naiva tadviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ pratīyeta, na hy avidhāya viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3258: śakyate viśiṣṭo vidhātum, tasmād bahuṣu vidhīyamāneṣu naikārthyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3259: atrocyate - artha iti prayojanam abhidhīyate, yāvanti padāny ekaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3260: prayojanam abhi[164]{*2/279*}nirvartyanti, tāvanty ekaṃ vākyam, na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3261: atra bahūni prayojanāni, na hi, atrānekasyābhipretasyānekaṃ padaṃ vidhāyakam asti, revatīṣv iti naitat kevalaṃ revatīnāṃ vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3262: revatīṣu vāravantīyam iti. atrāpi padadvaye vāravantīyaśabdo dvitīyāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3263: nāsmāt saṃbandho 'bhipreto gamyate, prātipadikārthasyāvyatirekāt, kṛtvety api karotir na saṃbandhamātre paryavasitaḥ paraprayojanasaṃbandham āha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3264: evaṃ viśiṣṭas tu yajatir na parārthaḥ, tad ekam eṣāṃ padārthānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3265: prayojanam, tasmād ekavākyatvam. guṇe punaḥ phale prakalpyamāna agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ kārye vāravantīyam, etasya ca yadagniṣṭomasāmeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3267: athocyate, revatyādisarvaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭo yāga etasyāgniṣṭuto vidhīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3268: tathāpi paśukāmasaṃbandhād bhidyeta vākyam. athaivam ucyeta, revatīṣu kṛtena vārayantīyena paśukāmo yajeteti. naivaṃ śakyam, ṛgantarapragāṇād viśeṣahānād vaiguṇyaṃ syāt. nanv idānīm evoktam, śakyate hi revatīṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:3269: vāravantīyaṃ kartum iti. sati vacane śakyam, asati vacane na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3270: vāravantīyagrahaṇena gṛhyante. vacanaṃ tarhi bhaviṣyati, paśukāmo revatīṣu vāravantīyam abhinirvartayet, tato yajeteti yajatir anuvādaḥ. yadi vacanaṃ revatīṣu vāravantīyasaṃbandhasya, siddhaṃ karmāntaram, nāgniṣṭuto
GSP28msbh1-7u:3271: guṇavidhiḥ. nanu tato yajeteti yāgānuvādād yāgenāsyāṅgaprayojanasaṃbandho bhaviṣyati. naivaṃ śakyam, yāgaṃ pratyaṅgabhāve vidhīyamāne{*2/280*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3272: paśukāmaṃ pratyasaṃbandhaḥ, ubhayasaṃbandhe vākyaṃ bhidyeta. atha yāgasaṃbandho 'nuvādaḥ, prakareṇa cāṅgatā. nedam upapannam, prakaraṇād dhi vākyaṃ balavattaram, tasmāt karmāntaram, yāgaguṇakaṃ vā revatīṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:3273: vāravantīyam, tadguṇako vā yāgaḥ, tatra yāgapaśukāmayoḥ saṃbandhasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3274: vidhātrīṃ yajater uparitanīṃ vibhaktim upalabhāmahe liṅgam, na tu revatīvāravantīyasaṃbandhasya [165]{*2/281*} vidhāyakaṃ sākṣāt kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:3275: upalabhyate. tasmāt sarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ, paśukāmasya vidhīyata iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3277: atha punar viśiṣṭe yāge vidhīyamāne, tad revatīṣu vāravantīyaṃ katham agniṣṭomasāma bhavatīti? ucyate - vacanād agniṣṭomasāmnaḥ kārye
GSP28msbh1-7u:3278: bhaviṣyatīti, kim iva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt, nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. atha yad uktam etasyaiveti, anantarāpekṣaṃ vacanam iti tatrāpy avirodhād etaddharmakasyeti lakṣaṇāśabdo bhaviṣyati. tasmān na guṇāt phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3279: karmāntaram evaṃ dharmakam iti, siddhaṃ sameṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣu karmayuktaṃ phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3284: yo vṛṣṭikāmo yo 'nnādyakāmo yaḥ svargakāmaḥ, sa saubhareṇa stuvīta sarve vai kāmāḥ saubhara iti{*2/282*} samāmnāya tataḥ samāmananti, hīṣiti vṛṣṭikāmāya nidhanaṃ kuryāt, ūrgityannādyakāmāya, ū - iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3285: svargakāmāyeti{*2/283*}. tatra vicāryate, kiṃ saubharam, vṛṣṭer nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3286: hīṣ ity etad aparaṃ vṛṣṭer nimittam, atha saubharam eva vṛṣṭer nimittam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3287: yadā tad vṛṣṭer nimittam, tadā hīṣ iti saubharasya nidhanaṃ kartavyam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3288: (evaṃ ūrgityannādyakāmasya, ū - iti svargakāmasya ca tulyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3289: vicāraḥ.){*2/284*} kathaṃ nidhanād aparaṃ phalam? kathaṃ vā nidhanavyavasthārthaṃ śravaṇam iti, yady evam abhi[166]{*2/285*}saṃbandhaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3290: kriyate, hīṣ iti vṛṣṭikāmāya kuryād iti, tato nidhanād aparaṃ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3291: athaivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ, hīṣ iti nidhanaṃ kuryād iti, tadā nidhanavyavasthārthaṃ śravaṇam, tadā vṛṣṭikāmāyeti saubharaviśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3293: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? saubhare nidhane 'paraḥ kāmo vidhīyata iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3294: puruṣaśruteḥ, puruṣaprayatnasyātra śravaṇaṃ bhavati, kuryād iti, tad vṛṣṭikāmasya hīṣaś ca saṃbandhe kartavye vaktavyaṃ bhavati, na tu saubharanidhanasaṃbandhe, tatra hi sāṅgaṃ saubharaṃ kuryād iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3295: prayogavacanasāmarthyād eva siddham. tasmāt kuryād iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3297: arthavat tataro 'yaṃ pakṣa iti, tatra asmin pakṣe 'rthavat, nidhanād aparaṃ phalam iti. tasmāt saubhara ekaḥ kāmaḥ, bhedena nidhanād api
GSP28msbh1-7u:3299: atha vā vṛṣṭikāmāyeti puruṣaśrutiḥ, vṛṣṭiṃ yaḥ kāmayate, sa puruṣo vṛṣṭikāmaśabdenocyate, tad asmin pakṣe śrutir viniyoktrī, itarasmin pakṣe punar vṛṣṭikāmaśabdena puruṣavacanena satā saubharaṃ lakṣyeta, tathā lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ syāt. śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye ca śrutir nyāyyā, na lakṣaṇā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3300: tasmāt paśyāmo nidhane dvitīyaḥ kāma iti. evaṃ ca phalabhūyastvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3306: sarvasyoktakāmatvāt{*2/286*} tasmin kāmaśrutiḥ syāt, nidhanārthā punaḥśrutiḥ // MS_2,2.29
GSP28msbh1-7u:3307: vāsabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, yad uktam, nidhane 'paraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3308: kāma iti, naivaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyate, vṛṣṭikāmāya hīṣ iti kuryād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3309: kathaṃ tarhi? hīṣ iti nidhanaṃ saubharasyeti. katham? hīṣo vṛṣṭikāmasaṃbandhe kriyamāṇe, nidhanaṃ [167]{*2/287*} kuryād iti saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:3310: na kṛtaḥ syāt, tatra hīṣ iti nidhanam iti nāvakalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3311: tatrobhayasaṃbandhe vākyabhedaḥ, tatra nidhanaśabdaḥ pramādasamāmnāta iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3312: gamyeta{*2/288*}, nacaivaṃjātīyakaḥ pramādasamāmnāta ity uktam, tasmān na hīṣo vṛṣṭikāmena saṃbandhaḥ, tena na nidhanād aparaṃ phalam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3313: atha hīṣo nidhanasaṃbandhe katham avākyabheda iti. ucyate, vṛṣṭikāmāya saubharam asty eva, saubharasya nidhanaṃ (saubharaprāptir){*2/289*} asty
GSP28msbh1-7u:3314: eva, tatra hīṣ iti kuryād ity eṣa evārtho vidhīyate. tasmād avākyabheda iti, ato nidhanavyavastheti gamyate. evam eva ūrg iti, ū - iti ca vaditavyam, sarvasya saubharasya ūrgvṛṣṭisvargakāmatvāc chakyate kāmavacanaiḥ saubharaṃ lakṣayitum. kim arthaṃ lakṣyata iti. nidhanārthā punaḥśrutir (nidhanavyavasthāṃ kariṣyatīty arthaḥ){*2/290*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3318: *{2/289: In E1 geklammert; E6 ohne Klammern; E2,4: nidhanaprāptir; E5:
GSP28msbh1-7u:3321: guṇas tu kratusaṃyogāt karmāntaraṃ prayojayet saṃyogasyāśeṣabhūtvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3322: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti, taṃ prakṛtya śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3323: yadi rathantarasāmā somaḥ syāt, aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt, yadi bṛhatsāmā śukrāgrān, yadi gajatsāmā{*2/292*}, āgrayaṇāgrān iti. tatra sandihyate - kiṃ grahāgratāviśeṣo jyotiṣṭomasya vidhīyate, uta karmāntarasya rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ceti. yadi rathantarasāmagrahaṇena bṛhatsāmagrahaṇena ca jyotiṣṭomo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3324: tatas tasya grahāgratāviśeṣaḥ, atha nābhidhīyate, tataḥ karmāntarasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3325: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? prakaraṇāt, jyotiṣṭomasya. iti prāpte ucyate - guṇas tu kratusaṃyogād iti, tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3326: jyotiṣṭomasyeti. kutaḥ? kratusaṃyogāt. kathaṃ tarhi? karmāntarasyeti. nanu jyotiṣṭomakrator evaiṣa evaṃjātīyako vādaḥ, rathantarasāmā bṛhatsāmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3327: neti brūmaḥ - yadi na kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo bhavet, jyotiṣṭomasya vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3328: kṛtsnakratusaṃyogas tu eṣaḥ. kathaṃ kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo bhavati? kathaṃ vā na kṛtsnakratusaṃyoga iti. yadi rathantarasattā vā, bṛhatsattā vā nimittaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3329: grahāgratāviśeṣasya, tato na kṛtsnakratusaṃyogaḥ, rathantaraṃ bṛhad vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3330: yadi sāmāsti, tata aindravāyavāgratā śukrāgratā ceti, tato jyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhiḥ. atha rathantarasāmasattā bṛhatsāmasattā vā na [169]{*2/293*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3331: nimittam, tataḥ kṛtsnakratusaṃyogaḥ. yadi rathantarasāmeti ko 'rthaḥ? ayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3332: arthaḥ, yadi rathantarasāma asya viśeṣaṇaṃ krator iti. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3333: samāsapadasāmarthyāt, samarthānāṃ hi padānāṃ samāso bhavati, sāmarthyaṃ ca bhavati viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāve, asādhāraṇaṃ ca bhavati viśeṣaṇam, tatrāyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3334: arthaḥ, yadi rathantaram eva sāma, bṛhad eva vā nānyad iti. jyotiṣṭomasya ca bahūni sāmāni gāyatrādīni. tasmān na jyotiṣṭomasya vācakāv etau śabdāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:3335: iti. tena yady api prakaraṇāj jyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhir iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3336: tathāpi tad bādhitvā vākyena rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ca bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3337: nanu yathā jyotiṣṭomo na rathantarasāmā, evam anyo 'pi na rathantarasāmā kaścid asti. ucyate - karmāntaraṃ rathantarasāmakaṃ kalpayiṣyaty etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3338: vākyam, yadi rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti. nanu nāsty atra vidhāyakaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3339: śabdaḥ. ucyate - asti ya eṣaḥ syād iti. āha - naiṣa vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3341: na vidhānārtheneti. atra brūmaḥ - yad etat sayadikaṃ vākyam, yadi rathanatarasāmā somaḥ syād iti, atrāvāntaravākyam asti, rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti, yad avāntaravākyaṃ tasyānyo 'rthaḥ, anyaś ca sayadikasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3342: sayadiko na śaknoti vidhātum, yata avāntaravākyam, tadvidhāsyati. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3343: rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmno vā bhāvo nimittatvena śrūyamāṇo 'py arthavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:3344: bhavati. tasmād avivakṣito yadisaṃbandhaḥ, tasmiṃś cāvivakṣite padadvayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3345: idaṃ rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti śaknoti rathantarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ vidhātum, yadīty anarthakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3346: atha vā yadi rocetety adhyāhāraḥ. atha vā yathaitad bhavati, payasā ṣāṣṭikaṃ bhuñjīta, yadi śāliṃ bhuñjīta, tatra dadhyupasiñced [170]{*2/294*} iti. evaṃjātīyakena vākyena śālibhojanaṃ vihitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3347: evam atrāpi vihitaṃ draṣṭavyam, yadi rathantarasāmā somaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3348: aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyād iti. kathaṃ punaḥ śālibhojanaṃ tena vākyena vihitaṃ bhavatīti. ucyate - vyatyāsena saṃbandhaḥ kalpyeta, yadi dadhyupasecanam icchet, śāliṃ bhuñjīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3349: nanu na khalv icchateḥ parāṃ liṅvibhaktim upalabhāmahe, siñcater hi tāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3350: parāṃ samāmnantīti. siñcateḥ khalu sā parā samuccarantī kamer arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3351: gamayati, kāmapravedane hi tāṃ manyāmaha iti, evam ihāpi yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:3352: aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyād iti grahītum icched ity arthaḥ, tato rathanatarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ kuryād iti. nanv evaṃ saty icchāmātraṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3353: na grahāgratviśeṣavidhānam. ucyate - yathāsmin laukike vākye, yadi dadhyupasecanam icchet, śāliṃ bhuñjīteti dadhyupasecanasaṃkīrtanād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3354: dadhyupasiktaṃ śāliṃ bhuñjīteti tenaikavākyatvād gamyate, evam atrāpi grahāgratāviśeṣasaṅkīrtanāt tenaikavākyatvād grahāgratāviśiṣṭo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3355: rathantarasāmā gamyate. atha vātra hetuhetumator liṅ, rathantarasāmā soma aindravāyavāgrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ hetuḥ kartavya iti. tasmāt kṛtsnakratusaṃyogād guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ prayojayet, evaṃ kṛtsnakratusaṃyogo 'rthavān bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3356: api ca pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam, pareṇa naimittikena. katham? sati hi nimitte naimittikaṃ bhavitum arhati, nāsati, yac ca bhaviṣyat tan na sat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3357: bhaviṣyac ca rathantarasāma, tat kathaṃ pūrvakālasya grahāgratāviśeṣasya nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. api ca niḥsandigdhaṃ jagatsāmā karmāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3358: tatsāmānyād itarad api karmāntaram iti gamyate. tasmān na jyotiṣṭomasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3362: ekasya tu liṅgabhedāt prayojanārtham ucyetaikatvaṃ guṇavākyatvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3363: tuśabdāt pakṣo 'nyathā bhavati, naitad asti, yad uktam, kratvantaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3364: kathaṃ tarhi? jyotiṣṭomasyaiva grahāgratāviśeṣa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3365: prakaraṇasāmarthyāt. nanv etad uktam - vākyasāmarthyāt kratvantarasya rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ceti. parihṛtam etaj jyotiṣṭoma eva rathantarasāmā bṛhatsāmā ceti. punar dūṣitam anekasāmatvāj jyotiṣṭomasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3366: viśeṣaṇaṃ rathantareṇa bṛhatā vā na prakalpata iti. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:3367: prakalpate viśeṣaṇam, bṛhadrathantarayor vaikalpikatvāt, bhavati sa prayogaḥ, yatra rathantaraṃ nāsti. bhavati ca sa prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3369: viśeṣakam. tasmāj jyotiṣṭoma eva rathanatarasāmā bṛhatsāmā ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3370: atha yad uktam - pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam, uttareṇa naimittikeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3371: naitat, niyogato bhavati hi bhaviṣyad api nimittam, yathā varṣiṣyatīti kṛṣigṛhakarmānuṣṭhānam, api ca tad dṛṣṭam, idaṃ ca vācanikaṃ nimittam, tad yathāvacanaṃ bhavitum arhati. syād iti ceyaṃ liṅ triṣv api kāleṣu bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3372: tasmād bhaviṣyad api nimittam. yat tu jagatsāmeti karmāntaram, tatsāmānyād rathantarasāmāpi karmāntaram iti. jagatsāma, asaṃbhavāt karmāntaraṃ saṃbhavati, rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ca jyotiṣṭomasyābhidhānam, tasmān na karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3375: sati rājasūyaḥ, rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti. taṃ prakṛtyāmananty aveṣṭiṃ nāmeṣṭim, āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇetyevamādi. tāṃ prakṛtya vidhīyate, yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutim
GSP28msbh1-7u:3376: āhutiṃ hutvābhighārayet, yadi rājanya aindram, yadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3377: iti. tatra sandihyate, kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittārthena śravaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3378: uta brāhmaṇādīnām ayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti. kathaṃ nimittārthatā bhavet?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3379: kathaṃ vā yāgavidhānam iti. yadi rājaśabdo brāhmaṇādiṣv api kenacit prakāreṇa, tato nimittārthatā. atha kṣatriya eva, tataḥ prāpakāṇy evaṃjātīyakāni śravaṇāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3380: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? nimittārthateti, tata evaṃ tāvad upavarṇyate, yaugiko rājaśabda iti, rājyaṃ yasya karma, sa rājā. kiṃ punā rājakarma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3382: prayuñjante. rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti cābhiyuktā upadiśanti. tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3383: manyāmahe, yasyaitat karma sa rājeti, yathā ya udameghaṃ nāma kaṃcit puruṣaṃ nāvediṣuḥ, tasya tu putram audameghir ity evaṃ viduḥ, śaknuyus te yas tasya pitā, sa udamegha iti kalpayitum, udameghaputrasyaivaṃ samabhivyāhāro bhavatīti. evaṃ rājyayogād rājaśabda iti vijñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3384: nanu janapadapuraparirakṣaṇavṛttim anupajīvaty api kṣatriye rājaśabdam āndhrāḥ prayuñjante prayoktāraḥ. na brūmaḥ, na prayuñjata iti, kiṃ tarhi karmaviśeṣanimittatvād rājaśabdasya, tadyogād api [173]{*2/297*} rājaśabdo bhavatīty etad upapādayāmaḥ. prayuñjate ca tad yukte rājaśabdam akṣatriye
GSP28msbh1-7u:3385: 'pi, tad asminn upapanne prakaraṇavaśāt, yadiśabdasamabhivyāhārāc ca rājasūyasyaiva guṇavidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati, na brāhmaṇasya vaiśyasya ca karmāntaraṃ vidhāyiṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3386: atha vāsārvalaukikasya prayogasya sārvalaukikena prayogeṇa virudhyamānasyāprāmāṇyaṃ syāt, abhyupagacchanti hi te janapadinaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3387: sārvabhaumaṃ prayogam. api cāvipragītā laukikā arthā vipragītebhyaḥ pratyayitatarā bhavanti, tathāryāvartanivāsināṃ śabdārthopāyeṣv abhiyuktānām abhivyāharatāṃ karmāṇi cānutiṣṭhatām antyajanapadavāsibhyo mlecchebhyaḥ samīcīnatara ācāro bhavati. tasmād yaugiko rājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3388: nimittārthāni śravaṇāni, rājasūyasya guṇavidhir na karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3389: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - aveṣṭau tu khalu kratupradhānaṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3390: brāhmaṇādīnām aveṣṭiyāgaṃ vidhātum, na nimittārtham. kutaḥ? aprāptatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3391: brāhmaṇavaiśyayoḥ. katham aprāptiḥ? kṣatriyasya rājasūyavidhānāt, rājā rājasūyena yajeteti. nanūktam - yaugiko rājaśabda iti. etad apy ayuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3392: yataḥ jātivacana iti. nanūbhayābhidhāne yadiśabdasaṃbandhāt, prakaraṇāc ca na karmāntaravidhānaṃ nyāyyam ity uktam. atrocyate - nobhayābhidhānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3393: avakalpate. kutaḥ? yadi tāvaj jātiśabdo rājeti, tataḥ tatkarmatvāj janapadaparipālane rājyaśabdo bhaviṣyati, tenāryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3394: virotsyate. atha yadi rājyaśabdaḥ paripālane nityasaṃbaddho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3395: tatas tasya karteti rājaśabdaḥ kṣatriyajātau tannimitto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3396: tatrāndhrāṇāṃ prayogo na virotysyate. tasmān na prayogadarśanād ubhāv api rājarājyaśabdau jātiparipālanābhyāṃ nityasaṃbaddhāv ity abhyupagantavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3397: ko nu khalu nirṇayaḥ? rājajātīyasya karma [174]{*2/298*} ity ataḥ paripālanaṃ rājyaśabdenocyate, evaṃ hi smaranto 'bhiyuktāḥ tasya karmeti ṣyañpratyayaṃ vidadhati, na tu tasya karteti pratyayalopaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3398: prātipadikapratyāpattiṃ vā samāmananti. tasmād rājñaḥ karma rājyam, na rājyasya kartā rājā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3399: nanu yo yo janapadapuraparirakṣaṇaṃ karoti, taṃ tu loko
GSP28msbh1-7u:3400: rājaśabdenābhivadati. ucyate - yogāl lokaḥ prayuṅkte, paripālane rājyaśabdaḥ prasiddha iti, sa tu paripālane rājyaśabdo rājayogād ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:3401: asmābhir uktam, tasmād rājaśabdaḥ prasiddher mūlam, tadyogād rājyaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3402: tadayogād{*2/299*} api brāhmaṇavaiśyayo rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate. na tv evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3404: yat tūktam - anumānād rājyasya kartā yaḥ sa rājā, yathā audamegheḥ pitodamegha iti. ucyate - anumānāt prayogo balavān, rājyasya kartāraṃ rājety anumimīmahe, kṣatriye tu pratyakṣaṃ prayuñjānān upalabhāmahe. tathā yogam apy anumimīmahe, rājyasya kartā rājeti. rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti tu smaranti. anumimānāś ca smṛtiṃ anumimate sma, smarantas tu pratyakṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3405: upalabhante, tena tatra smṛtir balīyasīti. āha - yo yo rājyaṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3406: tatra rājaśabdaṃ prayuñjate, na yad rājñaḥ karma tad rājyam iti, tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3407: manyāmahe, rājyayogo rājaśadapravṛttau nimittam, na tu rājayogo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3408: rājyaśabdapravṛttāv iti. na brūmaḥ, prayogād vayaṃ rājayogaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3409: rājyaśabdapravṛttau nimittam avagacchāma iti. kathaṃ tarhi? smaraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3410: prayogāc ca smṛtir balīyasī, prayogād dhi smṛtir anumīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3412: janapadaparipālanam akurvaty api rājety āndhrā vadantīty uktam. nanu rājayogād rājyam ity etad api vyabhicarati, na hi rājñaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3413: syanditaṃ{*2/301*} nimiṣitaṃ ca sarvaṃ rājyam ity ucyate. yadi vayaṃ prayogān nimittabhāvaṃ brūyām, tata evam upālabhyemahi. smṛtyā tu vayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3414: nimittabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ, tena yad yad rājajātīyasya karma jātyā viśeṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3415: tad rājyam ity abhyupagacchāmaḥ. yat tūktam - āndhrā api rājyayogād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3416: rājānam abhyupa-gacchantīti, parihṛtam etat, prayogo durbalaḥ smṛter iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3417: yad uktam - āryāvartanivāsinaḥ, pramāṇam itarebhya ācārebhya iti. tulyaḥ śabdaprayoga ācāreṣv ity uktam. tasmāj jātinimitto rājaśabdaḥ, evaṃ ced yajñasaṃyogāt kṣatriyasya rājasūyena, yāgavidhir aveṣṭir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3422: idaṃ samāmananti, vasante brāhmaṇo agnīn ādadhīta, grīṣme rājyanyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3423: śaradi vaiśya iti{*2/303*}. tatra sandihyate - kiṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇaṃ nimittārtham, brāhmaṇādaya ādadhānā vasantādiṣv ādadhīrann iti, uta brāhmaṇādīnām ādhānaṃ vidhīyata iti. kathaṃ nimittārthatā syāt? kathaṃ cādhānavidhānam iti. yadi brāhmaṇo vasanta iti padadvayaṃ parasparaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3424: saṃbaddham, tato nimittārthaṃ śravaṇam. atha brāhmaṇa ādadhīteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3426: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? nimittārthaṃ śravaṇam iti. kutaḥ? nimittasarūpā ete śabdāḥ. kiṃ nimittasārūpyam? brāhmaṇā[176]{*2/304*}dīnāṃ vasantādibhiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3427: samuccāraṇam, tac cāviditaṃ vedyata iti. nanu brāhmaṇādīnāṃ ādadhati nāpy asti samuccāraṇam. vāḍham{*2/305*} asti samuccāraṇam, na tv amīṣām
GSP28msbh1-7u:3428: ādhānasaṃbandho na viditaḥ. kena prāpto vidita iti. kāmaśrutibhiḥ. kāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3429: kāmaśrutayaḥ? agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajetetyevamādayaḥ. kathamābhiḥ śrutibhir ādhānaṃ prāptam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3430: ucyate - sāmarthyāt, yathāgnihotram abhinirvartyate, tathā kuryāt. yathā darśapūrṇamāsāv abhinirvartyete, tathā kuryāt. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3432: samāmananti hi, yad āhavanīye juhoti, tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto
GSP28msbh1-7u:3433: bhavatītyevamādi{*2/306*}. tena sāmarthyād etad uktaṃ bhavati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:3434: āhavanīyādi kartavyam iti, tac cādhānena vinā na sidhyatīty ādhānam api kartavyam ity avagamyate. tat kena kartavyam? yasya kāmaśrutayaḥ. tāś cāviṣeśeṇa brāhmaṇādīnām. tasmād amīṣām ādhānasaṃbandho vidita iti. api
GSP28msbh1-7u:3435: ca, ubhābhyāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ saṃbandhe vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3436: tadānīm eko 'rtho vidhīyate. ato nimittārthāḥ śrutaya ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3437: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādhāne sarvaśeṣatvāt{*2/307*} prāpakāṇyādhānasyaitāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:3438: śravaṇāni. kutaḥ? sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣabhūtam ādhānam iti na śrutiliṅgādīnām
GSP28msbh1-7u:3439: anyatamenocyate, kiṃ tarhi, agnīnāṃ sarvaśeṣatvāt, taccheṣatvāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:3440: cādhānasya. kim ataḥ? yady evam, agnayaḥ kāmaśrutibhiḥ prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3441: nādhānm iti. nanv agnīnām abhyupāya ādhānam iti. ucyate - naiteṣām arjane ādhānam evaiko 'bhyupāyaḥ, kiṃ tarhi yathānyeṣāṃ dravyāṇām utpādane [177]{*2/308*} krayaṇādayaś cābhyupāyāḥ, evam agnīnām apīti na niyogataḥ utpādanam eva, tena pakṣe ādhānaṃ prāpnoti, pakṣe na. yatarasmin pakṣe 'prāptiḥ, tataraḥ pakṣa utpattiṃ prayojayiṣyati brāhmaṇādīnām ādhānasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3442: brāhmaṇa ātmārtham ādadhīteti yadaitad vacanam, tadātmārtham evāhitā āhavanīyādayo bhavanti, nānyathā. evaṃ ca sati, na kṛtrimeṇa yācitena vā karmāṇy agnihotrādīny anuṣṭhātavyānīti gamyate. tenākṛtrima eva kevalo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3443: 'gnis teṣāṃ sādhaka iti niścīyate. kathaṃ cātmārthatādhānasya gamyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3444: kartrabhiprāye hi kriyāphala ādadhītety etad ātmanepadaṃ saṃbhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3446: api ca satīṣv etāsv ādhānaśrutiṣu na kāmaśrutayaḥ śaknuvanty aparām ādhānaśrutiṃ kalpayitum, yathā prāptasyādhānasya punaḥśrutayaḥ etā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3447: bhaveyuḥ, asatīṣv etāsv ādhānaśrutim aparigṛhṇantaḥ{*2/309*} kāmaśrutayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3448: 'śakyān agnihotrādīn vadantīti parigṛhṇīyur ādhānaśrutim. satīṣv etāsu yeṣām ādhānam uktam, tān adhikṛtyottarakālāḥ kāmaśrutayo bhavantīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3450: atrāha - asti kevalasyādhānasya vidhāyikā śrutiḥ, evaṃ sapatnaṃ{*2/310*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3451: bhrātṛvyam avarti sahate, ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti, tayā prāptasya nimittārthāni brāhmaṇādīnāṃ śravaṇāni bhaviṣyanti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:3453: neti brūmaḥ, bhinnaṃ hīdaṃ vākyam saṃbhāravidhānavākyāt, anyo hy artha
GSP28msbh1-7u:3454: ādhatta iti, anya apa upasṛjatīti, ekārthavidhāne hy ekaṃ vākyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3455: bhinnau cemāv arthau, tasmād atra vākyabheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3456: ucyate - vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhītety asyāṃ śrutau satyāṃ punaḥśrutiḥ kevalasyādhānasyāvidhāyikā, apām upasarjanaṃ tu [178]{*2/311*} vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3457: tad ekasminn arthe vidhīyamāne nānekārthaṃ bhavati. nanv ādhānasyaitad vidhānam, guṇārthā sā punaḥśrutiḥ. neti brūmaḥ, sā brāhmaṇādisaṃbaddhā prathamā śrutiḥ, iyaṃ kevalā punaḥśrutiḥ. kutaḥ? sā hi śabdena vidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3458: tatra liṅgam uccarantīṃ paśyāmaḥ, iyaṃ praśastam ādhānam ity āha. tataḥ praśastatām ādhānasyānumanyāmahe. evaṃ ca, vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn
GSP28msbh1-7u:3459: ādadhītety eṣā vidhāyikā śrutir iti brūmahe, naitat praśaṃsāvacanam asmatpakṣaṃ bādhate, śakyate hy anyena vihitam anyena praśastam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3460: vaditum. yadi tv etad vidhāyakam ity ucyate{*2/312*}, tato 'smatpakṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3461: virudhyeta. katham? ajñātasya jñāpanaṃ vidhānam etat, yadi prāśaṃsāvacanenāpūrvaṃ vijñāpyeta, tadā liṅgā nāpūrvaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3462: tatrāpūrvajñāpanavacanaḥ śabdaḥ uparudhyeta. na tu liṅgā vihite praśaṃsāvacanam uparudhyate, vihite 'pi hi vākyāntareṇa praśaṃsāvacanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3463: avakalpate. api ca yal liṅgā vidhānam, tat śrutyā, vākyena tu praśaṃsā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3465: nanv idam api vākyam, brāhmaṇo 'gnīn ādadhīteti. ucyate - svapadārtham atra śrutir vidadhāty ādhānam, brāhmaṇādisaṃbandhena parapadārthaṃ praśaṃsati, ya evaṃ sapatnaṃ{*2/313*} bhrātṛvyam avarti sahata iti. nanv anekaguṇavidhānaṃ tvayā vākyenādhyavasitaṃ bhavati. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3466: aguṇavidhipare hi vākye bhavaty anekaguṇavidhānam ity uktam, tadguṇās tu vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭā iti{*2/314*}. tasmād brāhmaṇādisaṃyuktā vidhāyikā śrutiḥ, iyam api kevalasyādhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3468: yad uktam - anekaguṇavidhāne vākyaṃ bhidyeteti, yadīmau
GSP28msbh1-7u:3469: guṇavidhānaviśiṣṭau{*2/315*} vidhīyeyātām, bhaved vākyabhedaḥ, dvābhyāṃ tu viśeṣaṇābhyāṃ viśiṣṭam ekam ādhānaṃ vidhāyiṣyate, [179]{*2/316*} tena na bhaviṣyati vākyabhedaḥ. tasmād brāhmaṇādīnāṃ ādhānasya prāpakāṇi śravaṇānīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3484: sākaṃprasthāpyena{*2/317*} yajeta paśukāmaḥ, saṃkramayajñena yajetānnādyakāma iti{*2/318*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:3485: guṇāt phalam, uta karmāntaram evaṃjātīyakam iti? kiṃ prāptam? karmāntaram
GSP28msbh1-7u:3486: iti. kutaḥ? saṃjñopabandhāt, yady api prakaraṇād yajatiśabdāc ca sa eva pūrvaprakṛto yāga iti gamyate, tathāpi nāsāv evaṃsaṃjñaka iti yāgāntaraṃ vidheyaṃ gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3491: na ca, atra guṇa uparudhyate kaścit, yad vidhānārthā codanā bhavet, yadi ca na yāgāntaram, ānarthakyam eva. api ca, yadi guṇa upabadhyeta, tato yāgaguṇasaṃbandho gamyata iti tad anuṣṭhānaṃ vidhīyetety
GSP28msbh1-7u:3492: ananubadhyamāne{*2/319*} yāgamātraṃ gamyata iti tad anuṣṭhānaṃ vihitaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3497: itaś ca karmāntaram. katham? phale samāptaṃ vākyam, prājākāmo yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3498: prajākāmasya yāga upayo vidhīyate. vidhīyate cet, karmāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3501: darśapūrṇamāsayor evādhikāra evaṃjātīyakaḥ syād dākṣāyaṇayajñādiḥ, evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3503: liṅgam apy etam arthaṃ darśayati, triṃśataṃ varṣāṇi darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3504: yajeta, yadi dākṣāyaṇayājī syāt, atho api pañcadaśaiva varṣāṇi yajeta,
