GSP28msbh1-7u:3505: atra hy eva sā saṃpadyate, dve hi paurṇamāsyau yajeta dve amāvasye, atra hi eva khalu sā saṃpad bhavatīti. yadi dākṣāyaṇayajño darśapūrṇamāsāv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3506: evaṃ tarhi triṃśatsaṃpadā prayojanam, tatas tasya triṃśatsaṃpadanugraho
GSP28msbh1-7u:3509: yad uktaṃ saṃjñopabandhāt karmāntaram iti, yadi dākṣāyaṇaśabdo na kenacid api prakāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsavacanaḥ śakyate kalpayitum, tata ucyeta karmāntaram iti. śaknoti tv āvṛttiguṇasaṃbandhād viditum, ayanam ity āvṛttir ucyate, dakṣasya ime dākṣāḥ, teṣām ayanaṃ dākṣāyaṇam. kaḥ punar dakṣaḥ? utsāhī. tathā sākaṃprasthāpye{*2/321*} 'pi, sahaprasthānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3510: guṇasaṃbandhaḥ, evaṃ sarvatra. śakyate ced darśapūrṇamāsayor guṇasaṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:3511: vaditum, kim iti sa eva yāgaḥ pratīyamāno 'nya ity ucyate? kim iti vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3516: yad uktam, phale vākyaṃ samāptam, prajākāmāder yāgānuṣṭhānaṃ vidhīyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:3517: iti{*2/322*}. naivam, aviśiṣṭā phale samāptiḥ, yāni [181]{*2/323*} anyāni muktasaṃśayāni guṇe phalasya vidhāyakāni vākyāni guṇasya phalavacanāni paryavasitāni (yathā dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3518: ityevamādīni){*2/324*}{*2/325*}, tair etad aviśiṣṭam, atrāpi hi guṇāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:3519: phalam ucyate. kathaṃ naitad evaṃ saṃbadhyate, prajākāmasya yajñam anutiṣṭhed iti? kathaṃ tarhi prajākāmasyāvṛttiyajñam anutiṣṭhed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3520: āvṛttiyajña iti yajñāvṛtti-saṃbandho 'nuṣṭhātavyo nirdiśyate, na yajñaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3521: tasmāt prakṛtayor darśapūrṇamāsayor guṇāt phalam ucyate, na yāgāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti. evaṃ sākaṃprasthāpye{*2/326*} saṃkramayajñe ca draṣṭavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3529: anārabhyādhīyate kiṃcit, vākyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ{*2/327*};
GSP28msbh1-7u:3530: sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāmaḥ{*2/328*}; darśapūrṇamāsayor apy āmananti - īṣām ālabheta; caturo muṣṭīn nirvapatīti. tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ, kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsike{*2/329*} ālambhe ālambho guṇavidhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:3531: darśapūrṇamāsike{*2/330*} ca nirvāpe nirvāpo guṇavidhir uta na prakṛtim apekṣate itaraś cetavaraś ceti? yadā na prakṛtim apekṣate, tadāpi kiṃ yāvad ukte, uta yajimaty ete karmaṇīti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3532: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? prakṛtayor ālambhanirvāpayor guṇavidhīti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3533: akarmaśabdatvāt, nātra karmaṇo vidhāyakaḥ [182]{*2/331*} śabdo 'sti. nanv ālabheta nirvaped iti ca. naitau vidhātārāv aviditasyārthasya vaktā vidhāyako bhavati, na caitayor avidito 'rthaḥ, ālambhaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3534: nirvāpaḥ kartavya iti. tasmād anuvaditārau. kim artham anuvadataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3535: ālambhane śvetaṃ vidhātum, nirvāpe ca carum. tasmān nālambhāntaraṃ nirvāpāntaraṃ ca. prakṛtayor eva guṇavidhīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3541: yāvad uktaṃ vā, karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāt // MS_2,3.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3542: na caitad asti, prākṛtayor guṇavidhīti, kiṃ tarhy ālambhāntaraṃ vidhīyata iti nirvāpāntaraṃ ca, yady ālambhanirvāpau vidhīyete, tato na prākṛtau tau
GSP28msbh1-7u:3543: vihitau. yadi na vidhīyete, tataḥ prākṛtau lakṣyete, yāv ālambhanirvāpau kartavyāv iti, tataḥ tau lakṣayitvā śveto vidhātavyo bhavati, caruś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3544: tau ca bhūtikāmasya brahmavarcasakāmasya ceti dvāv apy athā vidheyau
GSP28msbh1-7u:3545: syātām, tatra vākyam bhidyeta. atha vā yo 'sau vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ, sa lakṣayitavyopayukta iti vidhāyakābhāvād eko 'py artho na śakyate vidhātum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3546: atha sa eva lakṣayiṣyati, tenaiva ca vidhāyiṣyate guṇa iti. na, mitho vidhānalakṣaṇasaṃbandho 'vakalpate. atha dhātvartho 'nuvādaḥ, pratyayo vidhātum iṣyata ity ucyate, ya ālambhaḥ sa etadguṇaḥ kartavya iti. tathāpi na prākṛto lakṣyeta, laukiko 'pi hy ālambho 'sti, pratyayārthe 'nūdyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:3547: prākṛto 'nūdyeteti, sa hi kartavyo nirjñāto na laukikaḥ, ato na prākṛtānuvādo ghaṭa iti yāvad uktam ālambhamātraṃ nirvāpamātraṃ{*2/332*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3548: cāpūrvaṃ kartavyam, karmaṇaḥ śrutimūlatvāt, śrutimūlaṃ hi karmety uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3553: yajatis tu dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogād eteṣāṃ karmasaṃbandhāt // MS_2,3.14
GSP28msbh1-7u:3554: yad uktam, na prākṛtayor guṇavidhīti, etad gṛhṇīmaḥ. yat tūktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3556: nirvāpamātram iti, etad apajānīmahe, yajimatī ete karmaṇīti. kutah?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3559: bhūtikāmasya brahmavarcaskāmasya ca. katham? na hi, idam evocyate, tataḥ śvetam ālabheteti, yadi hy etāvad evocyeta, tataḥ śvetālambhasaṃbandho 'vagamyate, iha hi śvetaṃ vāyavyam ālabhetety ucyate, tena śvetavāyavyasaṃbandho vidhīyate, yathā paṭaṃ vayeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3561: paṭasya dīrghatā vidhīyate, dīrghaśabdaprayogāt, evam ihāpi sauryavāyavyaśabdaprayogād dravyadevatābhisaṃbandho vidheya iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3563: nanv atrāpi śvetaṃ vāyavyaṃ kuryāt, taṃ cālabhetety arthadvayavidhānād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3564: bhidyetaiva vākyam. neti brūmaḥ, na hy ālabhetety asyāyam atibhāraḥ, yad dravyadevatāsaṃbandhena puruṣaprayatnaṃ brūyāt, taṃ cālabhetety arthaviśiṣṭam. śrutyaiva hi puruṣaprayatno viśiṣṭo gamyate, vākyena ca dravyadevatāśraya iti nātra dvābhyāṃ vākyābhyāṃ prayojanam, yathā raktam aśvaṃ yojayeti yadā guṇavidhiparaṃ bhavati vākyam, tadā dvābhyāṃ vākyābhyāṃ prayojanam, guṇadvayavidhāne. atha śoṇamānayety ucyate, tatra guṇavidhipare 'pi vākye paryavasita eva guṇadvayavidhānam, śrutyaiva viśiṣṭaguṇadravyasya pratītatvāt, na bhavaty ekasya vākyasyātibhāraḥ, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3565: ihāpīti. saṃbandhaś ca bahubhiḥ padair viśiṣṭa eka evocyata ity ekārthatvam, vibhajya[184]{*2/337*}mānāni cātra padāni sākāṅkṣāṇīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:3566: upapannam ekavākyatvam, na ca, yāgam antareṇa devatāyai dravyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3567: saṅkalpitavyam, ity eṣa saṃbandho 'vakalpate. tasmād yajimatī ete
GSP28msbh1-7u:3573: liṅgaṃ khalv apy etam arthaṃ darśayati, saumāraudraṃ caruṃ nirvaped
GSP28msbh1-7u:3574: iti{*2/338*} prakṛtya, pariśrite yājayed iti{*2/339*} pariśrayaṇavidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3575: etasya vākye yajatiśabdena saṅkīrtanam avakalpate, yadi yajimatī ete
GSP28msbh1-7u:3576: karmaṇī. atha prakṛtau guṇavidhānaṃ yāvad uktaṃ vā, yajatiśabdenānuvādo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3582: kim ihodāharaṇam? na tāvat śūtreṇaiva parigṛhītam, yathā, aveṣṭau yajñasaṃyogāt kratupradhānam ucyata iti{*2/340*}. nāpi ca sādhyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3583: pratijñātam, yathā, ayaneṣu codanāntaram iti{*2/341*}{*2/342*}. kevalaṃ viśaye saṃśaye prāyadarśanaṃ hetur iti nirdiśyate, kasyāyaṃ hetur iti na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3584: vijānīmaḥ. prakṛtaṃ yajimad etat karmeti{*2/343*}, tad api na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3585: saṃbandhyamānam iva paśyāmaḥ, tad etad agamakaṃ{*2/344*} sūtram eva tāvad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3586: anarthakam. atha kātra pratijñā? kaś ca sandeha iti vaktavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3587: vṛttikāravacanāt, pratijñāṃ saṃśayaṃ cāvagacchāmaḥ. atra bhagavān ācārya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3588: idam udāhṛtya vatsam ālabheta vatsanikāntā hi paśava iti{*2/345*}, imaṃ saṃśayam upanyasyati sma, kiṃ yajimadabhidhāna eṣa ālabhatiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3590: saṃśayaś ca. tatra ca pūrvapakṣaṃ pratijānīte sma, yajimad abhidhāna iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3591: idaṃ tu pratyudāharaṇasūtraṃ pūrvasyādhikaraṇasya, nātra pūrva-pakṣeṇātīva
GSP28msbh1-7u:3592: prayojanam, tathāpi puruṣāṇām uccāvacabuddhiviśeṣān ālocya bhavati mandānāṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭenāpy āśaṅkā, sāpi nivartanīyā, na hi, mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikenāpi daṣṭo mriyeta na jātucit kadāpi, tatra cikitsā nādareṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:3593: kartavyā bhavet. atastāṃ nivartayituṃ pūrvapakṣam upanyasyati sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3594: ālabhatir asmābhiḥ prāṇisaṃyukto yajimad abhidhāno dṛṣṭaḥ, ayam apy ālabhatiḥ prāṇisaṃyuktaḥ eva, tenāyam api yajimadvacana eveti bhavati kasyacid āśaṅkā. atha vā yajimadabhidhāno dṛṣṭa ālabhatiḥ prāṇisaṃyuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3595: tasyāyam anuvādo vatsavidhānārthaḥ, tathā ca phalam na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3596: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - asmin saṃśaye ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāraḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3598: ucyante, tatraitad api śrūyate. prāyād api cārthaniścayo bhavati, yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3599: agryaprāye likhito 'grya iti gamyate. nanu liṅgaṃ prāyadarśanam, katham anena siddhir iti. ucyate - yathā prāyadarśanena sidhyati, tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3600: varṇayitavyam. kathaṃ ca prāyadarśanaṃ hetuḥ? nyāyataḥ prāptau satyām. kaḥ punar nyāyaḥ? devatāsaṃbandhābhāvān na yāgavacano 'dṛṣṭārthatvāc ca, vatsa ālabhyamāno gāṃ prastāvayiṣyatīti. tasmād evaṃ nyāyaprāpte prāyadarśanaṃ dyotakaṃ bhavati. tasmād ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3610: arthavādaś ca bhavati, vatsanikāntā hi paśava iti{*2/348*}, [186]{*2/349*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3611: yasmād vatsapriyāḥ paśavaḥ, tasmād vatsa ālabdhavya iti, yadi gāṃ prastāvayitum{*2/350*} ālabhyate, tatraitad vacanam avakalpate, atha
GSP28msbh1-7u:3612: saṃjñapayitum, tatraivaṃjātīyakaṃ vacanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmād apy ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāra iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3616: saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena tadarthaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt // MS_2,3.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3617: asty agniḥ, tatra naivāraś carur bhavati, ity uktvā, yad enaṃ carum
GSP28msbh1-7u:3618: upadadhātīti samāmananti. tatra sandihyate, kiṃ carur yāgārtho yāgaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭa upadhātavyaḥ, utopadhānārtha eveti. yāgārtha iti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3619: caror hi prasiddhaṃ kāryaṃ yāgo nopadhānam. ucyate - yady api yāgārthatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3621: ca na yāgārthateti gamyate. tad ucyate - tasyaiva vākyaśeṣe śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3622: bṛhaspater vā etad annaṃ yan nīvārā iti, tena devatāvacanena sannihitenaikavākyatā bhaviṣyatīti bṛhaspatidevatāka upadhātavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3623: tasmād yāgārthaś carur ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3624: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena kāryaśabdenopadadhātīti tad arthaḥ eva syād upadhānārthaḥ. upadadhātinā cāsya pratyakṣam ekavākyatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3625: parokṣaṃ devatāvacanenānumeyam, carum upadadhātīti hi pratyakṣaṃ vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3626: bārhaspatyam upadadhātīty ānumānikam. tasmāt kṛtsnaś carur upadhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3627: tataś ccet kiṃcid ijyāyāṃ viniyujyeta, tad anyatra śrutam anyatra kṛtaṃ bhavet. yat tu bārhaspatyā nīvārā iti, arthavādaḥ sa iti. yat tūktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:3628: prasiddhā caror yāgārthateti, prasiddhir vākyena bādhyate. tasmād upadhānārtha iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3631: tvāṣṭraṃ pātnīvataṃ vidhāyedam ucyate{*2/352*}, yat paryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatam utsṛjantīti. tatra sandehaḥ, kiṃ tvāṣṭrasya paryagnikṛtasyaiṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:3632: utsargo vidhīyate, uta tasmād yāgāntaram iti. yadi paryagnikṛtam utsṛjantīti padadvayaṃ paraspareṇa saṃbaddham, tatas tvāṣṭrasyotsargaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3633: atha pātnīvataśabda utsṛjatinā saṃbadhyeta, tato yāgāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3634: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? yāgāntaram iti. kutaḥ? pūrvas tvāṣṭraḥ pātnīvataś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3635: ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kathaṃ pātnīvataśabdenānūdyeta. api ca tvāṣṭrasyotsarge vidhīyamāne paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvakalpeta. ato brūmaḥ - paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā vidhīyate, sa eva yāga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3636: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na karmāntaram, pūrvasyaivotsṛjatiśabdenāvacchedo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3637: vidhīyate. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati. yajimattā tāvat kalpayitavyā na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3638: bhaviṣyati, utsṛjatiśabdaś ca śrutyotsargaṃ vidadhad vākyena na bādhito
GSP28msbh1-7u:3639: bhaviṣyati, karmāntarapakṣe vākyena pātnīvatatāyāṃ vidhīyamānāyām arthāt prāpta utsargo dhātunānūdyeta. api ca paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā pūrvasya viditaiva, sā vidhātum na śakyate. tasmāt pūrvasya karmaṇo 'vacchedaḥ. yat
GSP28msbh1-7u:3640: tūktam, tvāṣṭrasyotsargo vidhīyamāne paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ tāvan
GSP28msbh1-7u:3641: nāvakalpeteti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, atantram evātra pātnīvataśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3642: nāsau viśeṣyate, ata eva tvāṣṭraḥ pātnīvata ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kevalena pātnīvataśabdena lakṣaṇayānūdyeteti na doṣaḥ. tasmād avaccheda iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3646: na kasyacid api prakaraṇe śrūyate, eṣa vai haviṣā havir yajate yo 'dābhyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3647: gṛhītvā somāya yajata iti, tathā parā vaitasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti yo 'ṃśuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3648: gṛhṇātīti{*2/354*}. tatra sandehaḥ, kiṃ yāgāntaram etad grahaṇakam, uta jyotiṣṭomayāge grahavidhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:3649: kiṃ prāptam? yāgāntaram iti. kutaḥ? apūrvanāmadheyasaṃyogāt, na prakṛtāv etan nāmadheyako yāgo 'sti, na grahaḥ kaścid yo 'bhyasyeta. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3650: yāgāntaram. nanu dravyadevataṃ na śrūyate. mā bhūd dravyadevatam, sākṣād eva yajatiśabdo vidyate. tasmāt karmāntaram adābhyasaṃjñakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3651: aṃśusaṃjñakaṃ ca yāgaṃ karotīty evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3652: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - adravyadevatāke kevale nāmadheye śrūyamāṇe brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3653: jyotiṣṭome eva grahābhyāsaviśeṣavidhānam iti. kutaḥ? etat tāvad grahasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3654: nāmadheyaṃ na yāgasya, grahaṇena sākṣāt saṃbandhāt, vyavahitatvād yāgasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3655: aṃśur iti ca muktasaṃśayam eva grahanāmadheyam, na ca grahabhede yāgabhedo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3656: bhavati, na ca, dravyadevataṃ śrūyate. yato gṛhṇātir yajimadvacano bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3657: yad apy uktam, sākṣād atra yajatiśabdo vidhāyaka iti, naivaṃ śakyaṃ karmāntaraṃ vidhātum, vihitayāgavacano hi saḥ, viśeṣābhāvāt. tasmād yajatinā jyotiṣṭoma evocyate, aṃśvadābhyaśabdābhyām apy aparau
GSP28msbh1-7u:3661: agnis tu liṅgadarśanāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta // MS_2,3.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3662: asty agniḥ, ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti, evaṃ vidhāya śrūyate, athāto
GSP28msbh1-7u:3663: 'gnim agniṣṭomenaivānuyajati, tam ukthena, tam atirātreṇa, taṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3664: ṣoḍaśinetyevamādi{*2/356*}. tatra sandehaḥ, kim ayam agniśabdo yāgavacano jyotiṣṭomādibhyaḥ karmāntaraṃ cinuta ity ākhyātena vidhīyate, uta dravyavacano jyotiṣṭomādiṣu guṇavidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3665: kiṃ prāptam? yāgavacana iti. kutaḥ? liṅgadarśanāt, liṅgaṃ hi dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3666: agneḥ stotram agneḥ śastram iti tathā, ṣaḍupasadḥ 'gneḥ cityasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3667: bhavantīti, yasya stotraṃ śastram upasadaś ca tasyāgniśabdo vācaka iti gamyate, yāgasyaitat sarvam, tasmāt yāgavacana iti. nanu liṅgam asādhakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3668: prāptir ucyatām iti. atrocyate - athāto 'gnim agniṣṭomenaivānuyajatīti yāgam abhinivartayatīty ucyate, tam agnim iti viśinaṣṭi. tasmād agnisaṃjñaka iti gamyate. anuśabdo 'py upasargo yajater viśeṣaka evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3669: upapadyate, yady agnir yāgaḥ. tasmāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3672: dravyaṃ vā syāc codanāyās tadarthatvāt // MS_2,3.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3673: dravyaṃ vāgniśabdenocyeta. katamad dravyam? yad etaj jvalanaḥ, atra hy eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:3674: prasiddhaḥ. cinuta ity eṣā hi codanā cayanārthā na yajaty arthaṃ śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3675: vaditum, cayanenainaṃ saṃskurute citau sthāpayatīti. anuśabdaś ca paścād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3676: artho bhaviṣyati, cayane nirvṛtte paścād agniṣṭomena yāgena yajatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3678: tatsaṃyogāt kratus tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharmavidhānāni // MS_2,3.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3679: yat tu liṅgadarśanam uktam, yāgavacano 'gniśabda iti, tat teṣv eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:3680: liṅgasaṃyukteṣu vacaneṣu, na sarvatra, teṣu cityāgnisaṃyogāt, yāge
GSP28msbh1-7u:3683: kuṇḍapāyinām ayane śrūyate, māsam agnihotraṃ juhoti, māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajata ityevamādi. tatra sandihyate, kiṃ niyate 'gnihotre niyatayoś ca darśapūrṇamāsayor māso vidhīyate kālaḥ, atha kiṃ niyatāgnihotrān niyatābhyāṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ karmāntaravidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3684: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? niyateṣu kālavidhir iti. kutaḥ? kālavidhisarūpa eṣa śabdo māsam iti. kathaṃ kālavidhisarūpatā? yad agnihotraṃ juhotīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3685: viditam, māsam ity aviditam. evaṃ cāgnihotraśabdo darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaś ca nārthāntaravṛttau bhaviṣyataḥ, tasmāt kālavidhiḥ. nanu kuṇḍapāyinām ayanaprakaraṇaṃ bādhyetaivam. kāmaṃ bādhyatām, vākyaṃ hi balavattaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3686: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇāntare śrūyamāṇaṃ vākyaṃ yasya prakaraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3687: tasya vācakaṃ bhavitum arhati. nanu pratyakṣo 'gnihotrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3688: darśapūrṇa[191]{*2/358*}māsayoś ca guṇavidhiḥ. na, ity ucyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3689: upasiddhaś caritveti hy uktvedam abhidhīyate, na ca, upasado 'gnihotrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3690: darśapūrṇamāsayoś ca santi. tasmād aśakyas tatra māsavidhiḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3691: upasado 'pi vidhīyanta iti. tathā guṇavidhānārtho 'smin vākye
GSP28msbh1-7u:3692: 'nekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asmin pakṣe punar atantram agnihotraśabdo na karma viśekṣyati, tena vākyabhedo na bhaviṣyati. tasmāt karmāntaram iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3695: anārabhya kiṃcic chrūyata āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped rukkāmaḥ{*2/359*};
GSP28msbh1-7u:3697: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet prajākāma iti{*2/361*}. atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:3698: sandihyate, kiṃ prākṛteṣv āgneyādiṣu phalaṃ vidhīyate, uta prākṛtebhyaḥ karmāntarāṇy etāni?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3699: kiṃ prāptam? prākṛteṣu phalavidhir iti. kutaḥ? viditā āgneyādayaḥ pratyabhijñāyante, tasmāt teṣām anuvādaḥ phalasaṃbandhārtha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3700: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - phalaṃ ca bhedakam akarmasannidhau śrūyamāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3701: katham? anuvāde sati na śakyeta phalaṃ vidhātum, vidhāyakasyābhāvāt, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3702: hi, avidhīyamāno hy upāyo ruco bhavatīti gamyate. api ca rukkāme 'tra
GSP28msbh1-7u:3703: vidhīyamāne kāmasya [192]{*2/362*} anityatvāt, āgneyādīnāṃ nityatvāt saṃbandho nāvakalpeta. evaṃ sarvatra. tasmāt karmāntarāṇi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3708: sannidhau tv avibhāgāt phalārthena punaḥśrutiḥ // MS_2,3.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3709: asty aveṣṭiḥ, āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavatītyevamādiḥ, tāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3710: prakṛtyocyate, etayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayeteti. tatra sandehaḥ - kiṃ karmāntaram aveṣṭer utāveṣṭir eveti? kiṃ prāptam, karmāntaram iti, uktena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3711: nyāyena. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sannidhau phalārthena punaḥśrutir aveṣṭer
GSP28msbh1-7u:3712: eva, na karmāntaram iti. kutaḥ? avibhāgāt, etayety eṣa śabdo na śaknoty aveṣṭyā vibhaktaṃ yāgam anyaṃ vaktum, sannihitasya pratinirdeśaka eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:3713: śabdaḥ. tasmād aveṣṭir evānnādyakāmasya vidhīyata iti. kiṃ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3714: yady aveṣṭiḥ, āgneyādīni havīṃṣi. atha karmāntaram, anyahaviṣko yāga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3716: darśapūrṇamāsayor āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyābhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti vidhāya punar ucyate, āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3717: tatra sandehaḥ - kim amāvāsyāyāṃ dvir āgneyena yaṣṭavyam, uta sakṛd iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3718: kiṃ prāptam? āgneyasūktahetutvād abhyāsena pratīyate, ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutir aviśeṣād anarthakaṃ hi syād iti{*2/363*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3721: avibhāgāt tu karmaṇā{*2/365*} dvir ukter na vidhīyate // MS_2,3.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3722: naitad asti, punar abhyasitavya āgneya iti. kutaḥ? na, abhyāsasya vācakaḥ śabdo 'stīti. nanv āgneyaḥ punaruccaritaḥ paraṃ karma vidhāsyati. neti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3723: brūmaḥ, śabdaḥ punaruccarito{*2/366*} na punar arthaḥ kartavya iti śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3724: vaditum, yo 'sya prathamam uccaritasyārthaḥ, śatakṛtvo 'py uccaritasya sa evārtho bhaviṣyati, nānyaḥ. nanu vihitam eva punar viśiṣṭaṃ vidadhad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3725: anarthako bhavati. bhavatu kāmam anarthakatvam, na tv anyaṃ śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3726: vaditum, bhaved upapannam anarthakatvam, na tv arthāntaravacanatā. tasmān na dvir abhyasyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3731: atha vā, nānarthikā punaḥśrutiḥ, arthavādārthā bhaviṣyatīty ucyate. kim arthavādena prayojanam? yadā pūrvenaiva vākyena sārthavādakena vihitaḥ āgneyaḥ, kamanyam arthaṃ vidhātum śrutiḥ{*2/367*} prayujyeta?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3732: śrutimātraṃ{*2/368*} yan na kasyacid vidhānārtham, tad anarthakam, ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:3733: uktam, āmnāyasya kriyārthatvād ānarthakyam atadarthānām iti{*2/369*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:3734: śrutaś cāśrutaś{*2/370*} ca tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ, yathā śrutā cāśrutā{*2/371*} ca devatā aṅgabhāvaṃ sādhayati, evam etad iti. tad ucyate - anyārthā vā punaḥśrutiḥ, na āgneyaṃ vidhātum, aindrāgnavidhānārthā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3735: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavaty eva, na kevalenāgninā sa sādhur bhavatītīndrasahito 'gniḥ samīcīnataraḥ, tasmād aindrāgnaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3741: *{2/371: E1,6; E2,4: stutā vāstutā vā, E5: stutā cāstutā ca}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3743: bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe śrūyate - yāvajjīvam agnihotraṃ juhotīti, yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām yajeteti. atra sandeheḥ - kiṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāso
GSP28msbh1-7u:3744: yāvajjīvikatā, uta kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyate yāvajjīvikateti. kathaṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāsaḥ, kathaṃ vā kartṛdharmo niyama iti. yadi juhotir anuvādaḥ, yāvajjīvam iti vidhiḥ. tataḥ karmadharmo 'bhyāsaḥ, yadi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3745: viparītam, tataḥ kartṛdharmo niyama iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam, karmadharmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3747: anuvādau, yāvajjīvam iti ca vidhiḥ, tataḥ prakaraṇam anugṛhyate, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3748: abhyāsaḥ. evaṃ kṛtvā satrasaṃstavo yukto bhaviṣyati, jarāmaryaṃ vā etat
GSP28msbh1-7u:3749: satraṃ yad agnihotram, darśapūrṇamāsau ceti dīrghakālasāmānyāt. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3752: atra brūmaḥ - yāvajjīviko 'bhyāso na syāt, kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:3753: iti. kutaḥ? śrutisaṃyogāt. evaṃ śrutiparicchinno 'rtho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3754: itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt. katham? yāvajjīvanam, tāvatā kālena kuryād iti, tad etat pradoṣaparisamāptam agnihotram anabhyasya, na śakyate yāvajjīvanakālena kartum, paurṇamāsyam āvāsyāparisamāptau ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:3755: darśapūrṇamāsau. yady ucyeta - jīvanakālasyaikadeśe 'pi kṛtaṃ tena kālena
GSP28msbh1-7u:3756: kṛtaṃ bhavatīti. naitad evam, [195]{*2/373*} arthaprāptaṃ hi tan na vidhātavyaṃ śabdena, jīvanaparimitaḥ kālo yaḥ, tena parisamāpayitavyam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:3757: arthād abhyāsaḥ, sa hi kartavyatayā śrūyate, na cāsāv juhotiyajatibhyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:3758: ucyate, lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate. yāvajjīvaṃ juhuyāt, yāvajjīvam abhyasyed iti, śrutiś ca prakaraṇād balīyasī. yadīyaṃ vacanavyaktir asya vākyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3759: yāvajjīvam ity anuvādo juhoti yajatīti ca vidhānam, ity evaṃ yajatijuhotiśabdau svārthāv eva bhaviṣyataḥ, yāvajjīvaśabdo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3760: jīvanavacana eva, nābhyāsalakṣaṇo bhaviṣyatīti jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate, jīvaṃś ced dhotavyam iti, jīvanaṃ nimittam, na kālaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3761: niyatanimittatvān niyataṃ karma tenocyate, kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:3764: liṅgadarśanāc ca, karmadharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta, tatrānarthakam anyat syāt // MS_2,4.3
GSP28msbh1-7u:3765: liṅgaṃ ca bhavaty api ha vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayeteti. kathaṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3766: karmadharme hi prakrāntaṃ satraṃ yāvajjīvanakālena parisamāpyeta, na tatra kālātipātaḥ syāt. tatra cānarthakam anyat syāt prāyaścittādi vidhīyamānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3767: vyapavargaṃ ca darśayati, kālaś cet karmabhedaḥ syāt // MS_2,4.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3768: vyapavargasya samāpanasya darśanaṃ bhavati, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeteti. yadi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somasya kālo 'sti, vyaktaṃ na yāvajjīvanakālena tau parisamāpyete. atha jīvanaṃ nimittam, upapadyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:3769: karmabhedaḥ, darśapūrṇamāsau parisamāpya somaṃ karmāntaraṃ kuryād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3770: [196]{*2/374*} api cāhitāgnir vā eṣa yo 'gnihotraṃ juhoti na darśapūrṇamāsau yajeta, yā āhutibhājo devatās tā anudhyāyinīḥ karotīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:3771: anudhyāyinīvacanaṃ bhavati, niyato ya āhutibhāgaḥ, tasmin adīyamāne 'nudhyāyinīvacanaṃ bhavati. yas tv aniyata āhutibhāgas tam{*2/375*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3772: anudhyāyanti, idaṃ no bhaviṣyatīti, niyataś ca bhāgo niyamapakṣe bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3773: na kāmyapakṣe, karmadharme ca kāmyam agnihotraṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsau ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3774: tasmān niyamapakṣaḥ. api ca śrūyate, jarāmaryaṃ vaitat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau ca, jarayā ha vaitābhyāṃ nirmucyate mṛtyunā ceti jarāmaraṇanirmocanāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ ca niyamapakṣa upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3779: tuśabdo 'nvācaye, itaraś ca paśyāmaḥ, kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3780: yadi pūrvasya homasya guṇavidhir bhavet sa ekaikaḥ pūrvo 'gnihotrahomo
GSP28msbh1-7u:3781: 'nityaḥ syāt, kāmasaṃyogena śruto nānyaḥ kaścin nityaḥ, tatra liṅgaṃ virudhyeta, jarāmaryaṃ vaitat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3782: jarayā vaitābhyāṃ nirmucyate mṛtyunā ceti. kathaṃ virudhyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3786: itaś ca paśyāmo na pūrvābhyāso guṇaś codyata iti. kutah? virodhāt, virodho
GSP28msbh1-7u:3787: bhavati, darśapūrṇamāsavikārāḥ sauryādayo 'pi yāvajjīvam abhyasitavyā bhaveyuḥ. so 'nārabhyārthaḥ pratijñātaḥ syāt. ato 'pi paśyāmo niyama iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:3790: kartus tu dharmaniyamāt kālaśāstraṃ nimittaṃ syāt // MS_2,4.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3791: yadi kartur dharmo niyamaś codyeta, tato jīvanaṃ nimittam, jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate. tatra prayoge parisamāptaṃ karma, tathā vyapavargasya darśanam akḷptaṃ bhavati, tasmāt kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyata iti siddhaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3794: iha śākhāntarāṇy udāharaṇam, kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ paippalādakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3795: ityevamādīni. tatra sandehaḥ, kim ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ yat karmāgnihotrādi śrūyate, tac chākhāntare punaḥ śrūyamāṇam bhidyeta tasmāt, uta na bhidyeta? bhidyeteti paśyāmaḥ. kutaḥ? nāmabhedāt, ekaṃ kāṭhakaṃ nāma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3796: anyat kālāpakaṃ nāma, evaṃ nāmabhedād bhedaḥ. nanu granthanāmaitat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3797: satyam, karmaṇām apīti brūmaḥ, karmabhir apy evamādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktitvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3798: rūpabhedāc ca, ekasyāṃ śākhāyām agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālam āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3799: ekasyāṃ dvādaśakapālam, evaṃ bhinnaṃ rūpam{*2/377*}, katham iva na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3801: dharmaviśeṣāc ca, kārīrīvākyāny adhīyānās taittirīyā bhūmau bhojanam ācaranti, apare śākhino nācaranti, tathāgnim adhī[198]{*2/378*}yānāḥ kecid
GSP28msbh1-7u:3802: upādhyāyasyodakumbhānāharanti, apare na, aśvamedham adhīyānāḥ kecid
GSP28msbh1-7u:3803: aśvasya ghāsam āharanti, apare na, pare 'nyaṃ dharmam ācaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3804: aśvaghāsāder ekeṣām upakāram ākāṅkṣaty aśvamedhādiḥ, ekeṣāṃ nākāṅkṣati, sa evaikaḥ kathaṃ nākāṅkṣeta kathaṃ vānyad ākāṅkṣitum arhati, ato gamyata anyad iti. punaruktiprasaṅgāc ca, yadi sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3805: ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ vihitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhāntare vacanaṃ punaruktam anarthakaṃ syāt. na tu bhedapakṣa eṣa doṣo 'sti, tasmād api karmabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3806: nindāvacanāc ca prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ te vadanti purodayā{*2/379*} juhvati ye 'gnihotraṃ divākīrtyam ādivā kīrtayantaḥ sūryo jyotir na tadā jyotir eṣām iti kecic chākhino 'nuditahomaṃ nindanti, apare punar uditahomaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3807: nindanti, yathātithaye pradrutāyānnam āhareyus tādṛk tad yady udite
GSP28msbh1-7u:3808: juhvatīti{*2/380*}, sarvaśākhyāpratyaye viruddham, na tu karmabhede,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3809: tasmād api bheda iti. aśakteś ca, na śaknuyuḥ khalv api sarvaśākhāpratyayam upasaṃhartum, tatrānārabhyo 'rtho vidhīyata iti pratijñātaṃ bhavet, śakyaṃ tu karmabhede, ataḥ karmabheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3810: samāptivacanāc ca, asamāpte 'pi samāpter vacanaṃ bhavati, kecid āhuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3811: atrāsmākam agniḥ parisamāpyata iti, apare 'nyaparisamāptiṃ vyapadiśanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3812: tad ekakarmatve nopapadyate, na hi tatra ca{*2/381*} parisamāpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3813: anyatra na. bhede tu yuktam, tasmād bheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3814: prāyaścittavidhānāc ca, kecid anuditahomavyatikrame prāyaścittam āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3815: kecid uditahomavyatikrame vṛddhe ca prāyaścittam, na ca karmaikatva
GSP28msbh1-7u:3816: ubhayathā vṛddhiḥ saṃbhavati, karmabhede tu yad anudite homakarma, tad udite vṛddham, itarad apy udite, tasmād api bhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3817: anyārthadarśanāc ca, idaṃ śrūyate, yadi purā didīkṣāṇāḥ syuḥ yadi vaiṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3818: gṛhapatir gṛhapater vānusatriṇa iti, ta enam eva [199]{*2/382*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3819: bṛhatsāmānaṃ kratum upeyur upetaṃ hy eṣāṃ rathantaram, atha yady adidīkṣāṇā itīṣṭavatām aniṣṭapūrvāṇāṃ ca dvādaśāhe darśanam upapadyate yadi karmabhedaḥ, ekakarmatve nāvakalpyate. katham? tāṇḍake{*2/383*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3820: śrūyate, eṣa vāva prathamo yajño yajñānām, yaj jyotiṣṭomaḥ, ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajeta gartapatyam eva taj jāyeta pravām īyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:3821: iti{*2/384*}, tat sarvatra syāt, tatrādidīkṣāṇāṃ dvādaśāhe darśanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3823: athāparaṃ liṅgadarśanam, yat pakṣasamitāṃ pinuyāt kanīyāṃsaṃ yajñakratum upeyāt kanīyasīṃ prajñāṃ kanīyasaḥ paśūn kanīyo 'nnādyaṃ pāpīyān syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3824: atha yadi vedisaṃmityā minotīti{*2/385*} pakṣasamāne pratiṣiddhe vedisaṃmānasya darśanaṃ bhavati, tat tu karmabheda upapadyate, pākṣikasya vedisaṃmānasya darśanam ekakarmatve nopapadyate. katham? eke hi samāmananti, rathākṣamātrāṇi yūpāntarālāni bhavantīti{*2/386*}, tat sarvatra syāt, tatra ca no pakṣasaṃmānaṃ no vedisaṃmānaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3826: aparaṃ ca liṅgadarśanam, keṣāṃcij jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyeta iti, pareṣāṃ tisraḥ saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyanta ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:3827: ekakarmatve virodhaḥ, nānākarmatve kasmiṃścij jyotiṣṭome dve, kasmiṃścit
GSP28msbh1-7u:3829: api ca sārasvate śrūyate, ye puroḍāśinas te upaviśanti ye sānnāyinas te vatsān vārayanti. sānnāyina iṣṭaprathamayajñāḥ, puroḍāśino viparītāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3830: ubhayeṣāṃ sārasvate darśanam avakalpate karmabhede, ekakarmatve sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣṭomapūrvatvaṃ syāt, tatra darśanaṃ nopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3831: api ca śrūyate - upahavyo niruktaḥ{*2/387*}, agniṣṭomo yajñaḥ rathantara[200]{*2/388*}sāmā, aśvaḥ śyāvo dakṣiṇā, pareṣāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3832: upahavyo 'niruktaḥ, uktho{*2/389*} yajño bṛhatsāmā, aśvaḥ śveto rukmalalāṭo dakṣiṇeti, karmaikatve rathantaravacanaṃ bṛhadvacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3833: cānarthakam, śākhādvayapratyayatvād bṛhatsāmā rathantarasāmā vā syāt, sa cāyaṃ prakṛtita evaṃlakṣaṇakaḥ prāptaḥ, nānākarmatve tv anyo bṛhatsāmānyo rathantarasāmeti yuktaṃ bhavati, tasmāc chākhāntare karmabhedo bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:3839: *{2/381: E1,6; E2,4,5: na hi tad eva tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3847: na caitad asti, yad uktam - śākhāntareṣu karmabheda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3849: arthasaṃyogasyāviśeṣāt, tad eva prayojanam uddiśya tad eva vidhīyamānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3850: pratyabhijānīmaḥ. rūpam apy asya tad eva dravyadevatam, puruṣaprayatnaś ca tādṛśa eva codyate, nāmadheyaṃ cāviśiṣṭam, tena tad eva karma sarvaśākhādiṣv iti pratyayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3852: yad uktam - nāmabheda iti, parihṛtaṃ tad granthanām ata iti. atha yad uktam - karmaṇo 'pi nāmasāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanād iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3853: granthasaṃyogāt karma kāṭhakādi, na karmasaṃyogād granthaḥ kāṭhakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3854: kathaṃ gamyate? yat karma kāṭhakādisaṃyuktam, tat kāṭhakādiśabdenocyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3855: kim ato 'pi? yad granthasaṃyogāt kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ karmocyate. ekatve 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3860: yadi śabdabhedād bhedo bhavet, śabdaikyāt tarhi karmaikyaṃ bhavet. tatra kāṭhakaśabdābhidhānād aikyaṃ bhaved agnihotrasya darśapūrṇamāsayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:3861: jyotiṣṭomasya ca, tacchabdatvāt, na caitad evam. tasmād apy abhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3863: idānīṃtanaṃ caitad abhidhānaṃ bhavet, asya na pūrvam āsīt, yataḥ prabhṛti kaṭhasya prakṛṣṭaṃ vacanam, tataḥ prabhṛti pravṛttam, pūrvaṃ nāsīd bhedaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3866: ekakarmatve 'pi rūpabhedo bhavati vacanāt, na ca, vācanike rūpabhede,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3869: atha yo dharmaviśeṣa uktaḥ, vidyāgrahaṇārthaḥ saḥ, na karmaṇa upakārakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3870: kathaṃ gamyate? śrutyādīnām abhāvāt, vidyāsaṃyogāc ca na karmaprayukta
GSP28msbh1-7u:3873: atha yad uktam - yathāmāvāsyāyām{*2/391*} āgneyasya punaruktadoṣān madhyamaḥ pakṣo nirastaḥ, evam ayam api tasmād eva doṣāt karmaikatvapakṣo nirasitavya iti, etat parihartavyam. (ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram){*2/392*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3878: naiva khalv etat dvirvacanam, sa evāyam arthaḥ punaḥ śrāvito 'gnihotrādir
GSP28msbh1-7u:3879: bahukṛtvo bahubhis tu puruṣaiḥ, na caiko 'rtho bahubhir ucyamānaḥ punarukto bhavati. yadi bhavet, ekasminn eva vede bahubhir ucyamāne bhavet, tasmān na bahukarmasamavāyo 'yam, ekam evedaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3882: *{2/394: Dieses Sūtra wurde von Śabara nicht kommentiert, es findet sich
GSP28msbh1-7u:3883: jedoch bei Kumārila. In E2,4,5 ist es aufgenommen worden. Dies bedingt eine von E1,6 abweichende Zählung der folgenden Sūtras}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3885: arthāsannidheś ca śākhāśabda upapanno bhaviṣyati, śākhā iva homāḥ śākhāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3886: tad yathā vṛkṣasya śākhāḥ, evam ihāpi vṛkṣasthānīyasya vedasya śākhāḥ. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3887: śākhāsārūpyam? yathā nānāvasthānam, na caikaikasyāṃ kṛtsnaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ sannihitam, evam ihāpi, naikaikasyāṃ kṛtsaṃ guṇakāṇḍaṃ sannihitam, ity arthāsannidheḥ śākhāśabdopapattiḥ. tasmād apy ekaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3889: na ca, yat kāṭhake 'gnihotram, tat kāṭhakam evaikaṃ puruṣaṃ prati vidhīyate. taittirīyasyāpi tadvihitam eva, puruṣaviśeṣavacanābhāvāt, yac cāgnihotrasya kiṃcid aṅgaṃ vidhīyate, sarvāvasthasya tad agnihotrasya, yac ca kāṭhakasyāgnihotraṃ, tac ca taittirīyakasyeti, viśeṣavacanābhāvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3890: tasmāt sarvaśākhyābhir ekaṃ samāptaṃ karmocyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3893: atrāsmākam agniḥ parisamāpyata ity utprekṣitāro bhavanti, anvāroheṣu maitrāyaṇīyānām agniḥ parisamāpyate, asmākaṃ teṣu na parisamāpyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3894: yady anyad eva maitrāyaṇīyānām, anyac ca teṣām, kathaṃ te brūyur eṣv asmākaṃ na parisamāpyata iti, ekatvam upapannam, teṣām api hi te santi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3896: na hi nindā nindyaṃ nindituṃ prayujyate. kiṃ tarhi ninditād itarat
GSP28msbh1-7u:3897: praśaṃsitum, tatra na ninditasya pratiṣedho gamyate. kiṃ tarhi ninditāditarat praśaṃsitum, tatra na ninditasya pratiṣedho gamyate. kiṃ tv itarasya vidhiḥ, tatraikasminn agnihotre dvau kālau vihitau vikalpyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3899: tathāsamarthānām ekasminn api vede vihitaṃ kṛtsnam{*2/396*} aṅgajātam upasaṃhartum aśaktiḥ, samarthānāṃ tu sarvaśākhābhyo 'py āgamitam adhikaṃ vidhim upasaṃhartum śaktir astīti tenaikakarmatve 'pi na viruddham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3900: tathaikasminn api karmaṇi kiṃcid vastu samāptam iti kṛtvā samāptiśabdaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3901: prayujyate, yathā, ādhvaryave samāpte jyotiṣṭomasya, samāpto jyotiṣṭoma iti bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3907: aviruddhaṃ nānātva iti, tat parihartavyam. (ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram){*2/400*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3909: *{2/397: E2: prāyaścinnānād; E4: prāyaścitāmnānād; E5: prāyaścittāmnānād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3913: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naiṣa doṣaḥ, udite hoṣyāmīti prakānte
GSP28msbh1-7u:3914: 'nyathā kriyamāṇe bhavati doṣaḥ, tatra prāyaścittasya viṣayo bhaviṣyatīti karmaikatve 'pi na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3916: pūrvavati samāptivacanaṃ bhavati, yat prārabdhaṃ tat parisamāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3917: tatrāsmākaṃ parisamāpto 'gnir iti yo 'smābhir jñāyate, prārabdhaś ca parisamāpyata ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:3920: liṅgam aviśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśeṣatvān na hi tatra karmacodanā tasmād dvādaśāhasyāhāravyapadeśaḥ syāt yad uktam - yadi purā didīksāṇā iti, dvādaśāha iṣṭaprathamayajñānām aniṣṭaprathamayajñānāṃ ca darśanaṃ karmabheda upapadyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:3921: sarvaśākhāpratyayaikakarmaṇīti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, yadi didīkṣāṇā dvādaśāhena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3922: adidīkṣāṇā dvādaśaśāhenety evaṃ tat, na hi sāmavede jyotiṣṭomasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:3923: vidhānam. kim ato 'pi? yatra vihitas tatrānūdyate, tena karmabhede 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3924: sarvajyotiṣṭomānām eṣa dharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ nāma. ato nānākarmapakṣe 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:3927: dravye cācoditatvād vidhīnām avyavasthā syān nirdeśād vyavatiṣṭheta tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt dravye cāgnāv acoditatvād ekādaśinyāḥ saṃmānaparimāṇaṃ parti naiṣā vyavasthā syāt, naivāgnāv ekādaśinī codyate, kutaḥ pakṣasaṃmānaṃ vedisaṃmānaṃ vā syāt? dvayam apy etat parārthaṃ kīrtyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3928: paśvekādaśinīvidhānārtham, yadi pakṣasaṃmitā syād ayaṃ doṣaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3929: vedisaṃmāne na doṣo bhavet, ka etat saṅkaṭamadhyavasānam{*2/403*} arhati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3930: ekasmin yūpa ekādaśa paśavo niyoktavā iti, vācastomādiṣu tu yūpaikādaśinyām asya nityānuvādatvād rathākṣamātrāṇy eva yūpāntarālāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:3931: bhaviṣyanti, nityānuvādatvāc cāsaty api pakṣasaṃmāne vedisaṃmāne vaikādaśinīvidhānārthaṃ vacanam upapadyata eveti na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3935: atirātre gṛhṇāti ṣoḍaśinam iti vihitaḥ ṣoḍaśī, nātirātre gṛhṇāti ṣoḍaśinam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3936: iti pratiṣiddhaḥ, tena pakṣe dvayoḥ stotrīyayor atirekaḥ, pakṣe tisṝṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3937: tasmād adoṣaḥ. kathaṃ punar ayaṃ dvayos tisṝṇāṃ vātirekaḥ? trivṛd
GSP28msbh1-7u:3938: bahiṣpavamānam, tat tāvan navakam. pañcadaśāny ājyāni, tāni [206]{*2/404*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3939: tāvac catvāri, tena sā ṣaṣṭiḥ. pañcadaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ, tayā pañcadaśasaṃkhyayā saha, pūrvayā ca navasaṃkhyayā caturaśītiḥ. saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni catvāri, saptadaśa ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ, pañcasaptadaśakāni tānīti pañcāśītiḥ. pūrvayā caturśītyā sahaikonasaptatiśatam. ekaviṃśaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3940: yajñāyajñiyam, tayaikaviṃśatyā saha tasya navatiśataṃ stotriyā{*2/405*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3941: iti brāhmaṇavādaḥ. agniṣṭomamātram abhipretyocyate, sā virāṭ saṃpūrṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3942: virāḍ iti daśakākhyāḥ{*2/406*}, traya ekaviṃśakā ukthaparyāyāḥ, sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3943: triṣaṣṭiḥ. ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī, tayaikaviṃśatyā saha caturaśītiḥ. pañcadaśakā rātriparyāyās trayaḥ, tatraikaikaparyāyaḥ catuḥstotraḥ, tad aśītiśataṃ saṃpūrṇā virāṭ. trivṛd rathantaraṃ pañcasāma, tan navakam, tataś caturaśīter ekaṃ navakam āgacchati, tathā tisraḥ saṃstutānāṃ virājam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3944: atiricyante, yadā ṣoḍaśī na gṛhyate, tadaikaviṃśatyā vinā dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyete, evam ekakarmatve 'pi liṅgam upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3949: yad uktam - puroḍāśināṃ sānnāyināṃ ca sārasvate darśanaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3950: jyotiṣṭomapūrvakatvāt sarvakarmaṇām, vipratiṣiddham etad iti, tena yadā sānnāyinaḥ puroḍāśina{*2/407*} iti kalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3954: atham yad uktam - upahavye bṛhadrathantaravidhānaṃ prakṛtiprāptam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3955: ekakarmatve pratiprasavatayāpy asaṃbhavād vidhīyamānam anarthakaṃ syād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3959: yadā rathantarasāmā, tadāśvaḥ śveto dakṣiṇā, yadā bṛhatsāmā tadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:3962: yadā na sarvaśākhāpratyayam ekaṃ karmeti, katham ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3963: samāmnāyate 'nyasyāṃ guṇo vidhīyate? yathā maitrāyaṇīyānāṃ samidādayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3964: prayājā na samāmnāyante, atha ca guṇāḥ śrūyante, ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:3965: samānīya hotavyā iti{*2/409*}. tathā yeṣāṃ śākhināṃ kuṭarur asīty{*2/410*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3966: aśmādānamantro nāmnātaḥ, teṣām api hi dṛśyate, kukkuṭo 'sīty aśmānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3967: upapādatte, kuṭarur asīti veti. tasmād ekaṃ karmeti pratīmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3971: api vā kramasaṃyogād vidhipṛthaktvam ekasyāṃ vyavatiṣṭheta // MS_2,4.31 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:3972: yo hy anyaśākhāvasthitān vidhīn upasaṃharati, sa svaśākhāvihitaṃ kramam
GSP28msbh1-7u:3974: virodhinā{*2/411*} tv asaṃyogād aikakarmye tatsaṃyogād vidhīnāṃ sarvakarmapratyayaḥ syāt ucyate - naiṣa śākhāntaravihitānām aikakarmye sati virodhinā{*2/412*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:3975: saṃyogaḥ. na hi kramo vākyena virudhyate, durbalo hi kramaḥ, balavad
GSP28msbh1-7u:3976: vākyam, vākyena ca śākhāntarīyāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ. tasmāt sarvaśākhāpratyayaṃ sarvabrāhmaṇapratyayaṃ caikaṃ karma codyata iti siddhaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:3982: *{3/1: E2: 4,1; E4: 3,525; E6: 1,143. E5 enthält jetzt nur noch die
GSP28msbh1-7u:3983: ŚBh-Zitate der Bṛhatī und bleibt daher unberücksichtigt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:3985: nānākarmalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam, anantaraṃ śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vartayiṣyāmaḥ. kaḥ śeṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:3986: kena hetunā śeṣaḥ? kathaṃ ca viniyujyate? iti, śrutyādīni ca viniyoge
GSP28msbh1-7u:3987: kāraṇānīti vakṣyate, teṣāṃ ca balavadabalavattā, etat tātparyeṇānyad apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:3990: iha sūtre śeṣasya lakṣaṇam, yena ca hetunā śeṣa ity ucyate, tad ubhayam ākhyāyate. yaḥ parasyopakāre vartate, sa śeṣa ity ucyate. tad yathā, ye
GSP28msbh1-7u:3991: parārthāḥ, te vaktāro bhavanti śeṣabhūtā vayam iheti. nanu yo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:3992: pradhānabhūtaḥ, so 'pi kadācit parārthe vartate, yathopādhyāyaḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ vidyāvinayādhāne vartate. satyaṃ vartate. yas tv atyantaṃ parārthaḥ, taṃ vayaṃ śeṣa iti brūmaḥ. yathā, garbhadāsaḥ karmārtha eva svāmino 'naḍvāṃś ca krīyate, vakṣyatīty eva. nanu garbhadāsasyāpi savāmī saṃvidadhāno guṇabhāvamāyāt. neti brūmaḥ, ātmana evāsau saṃvidadhāno guṇabhāvaṃ gacchati, nāntarīyakatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:3993: garbha[209]{*3/2*}dāsasyopakaroti, anaḍuho vā. yas tv atyantaṃ parārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:3995: atha tatra kiṃ vṛttam? yais tu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇas tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:3997: dṛṣṭaprayojanānāmākhyātānām. iha tu sarveṣām eva śeṣāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4002: vādarir{*3/6*} ācāryo 'tra dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣv eva śeṣaśabda iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4003: mane{*3/7*}, na yāgaphalapuruṣeṣu. dravyaṃ kriyārtham, yadi prayojanavatī kriyā, vyaktaṃ sā dravyeṇa nirvartayitavyā{*3/8*}, tasyā nirvṛttir dravyādṛte na bhavatīti tannirvṛttaye dravyam eṣitavyaṃ bhavati. tasmāt kriyārthaṃ dravyam. guṇaḥ śaknoti viśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ coditaṃ lakṣayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4004: lakṣitena ca tena prayojanam, viśiṣṭasya kriyāsādhanatvāt. tasmāt so 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4005: dravyadvāreṇa kriyāyā upakarotīti{*3/9*} kriyārtha eva. saṃskāro nāma sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4006: bhavati, yasmin jāte padārtho bhavati yogyaḥ kasyacid arthasya, tenāpi kriyāyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ prayojanam iti so 'pi parārthaḥ. tasmād dravyaguṇasaṃskārāḥ parārthatvāc cheṣabhūtāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4007: na tu yāgaphalapuruṣāḥ. yāgas tāvat kartavyaḥ puruṣasya. na hi, tasmin nirvartite kiṃcid aparam asti kartavyam. sa hi puruṣārthaḥ, yad anyad dravyādi, tat tadarthaṃ tasya śeṣabhūtam. sa tu na kiṃcid abhinirvartayituṃ kriyate. phalam api na tena kriyate, tasmiṃs tu kṛte
GSP28msbh1-7u:4008: svayam eva tad bhavati. tasmin kṛte phalam asya bhavatīty etāvad gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4009: nāsti śabdo yāgena kriyate [210]{*3/10*} phalam iti. tasmād yāgo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4010: śeṣabhūtaḥ kasyacid arthasya. phalam api na puruṣaṃ pratyupadiśyate. yaḥ svargaṃ kāmayate, sa yāgaṃ kuryād ity etāvac chabdenodiśyate, nātmanaḥ parasya veti. svargaṃ pratīcchāmātreṇa svargakāma iti bhavati. tasmāt puruṣaṃ prati guṇabhāvena na śrūyate svargaḥ. tasmāt so 'pi na śeṣabhūtaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4011: na cet phalayāgau guṇabhāvena codyete, kasya puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūto
GSP28msbh1-7u:4012: bhavati. pratyakṣaś cāsya dravyatvāt karma prati guṇabhāvaḥ. tasmād dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣv eva śeṣabhāvaṃ vādarir{*3/11*} mena iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4021: jaiminis tu khalv ācāryaḥ karmāṇy api śeṣabhūtāni manyate sma, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4022: vādarir{*3/12*} ivāvadhāraṇām anumene. sa hi dadarśa, na yāgaḥ kartavyatayā codyate, phalakāmasya tu tatsādhanopāyatveneti. evaṃ śruto 'rthaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati. arthavāṃś copadeśaḥ. enam evārthaṃ ṣaṣṭhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:4023: 'dhyāye sūtrair eva sādhayiṣyati. iha tu tatsiddhenaiva phalārthatvena śeṣabhāvaṃ yāgasyāpādayati sma. tasmād anavadhāraṇā dravyaguṇasaṃkārāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4028: phalam api puruṣaṃ pratyupadiśyate. yaḥ svargo me bhaved ity evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4029: kāmayate, tasya yāgaḥ. na yaḥ svargaḥ, sa ātmānaṃ labheteti. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4030: ātmanepadaprayogāt, kartrabhiprāya etad bhavati. kriyāphalam anubhavet kathaṃ puruṣa iti yāgaḥ prayujyate. tasmāt phalaṃ puruṣārthaṃ yāgāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:4035: anavadhāraṇaiṣā, dravyaguṇasaṃs-kāreṣu śeṣatvaṃ vādarir{*3/14*} mena iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4036: athedānīm atra bhagavān vṛttikāraḥ pariniścikāya - dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣv eva niyato yajiṃ prati śeṣabhāvaḥ, āpekṣika itareṣām. yāgasya dravyaṃ prati pradhānabhāvaḥ, phalam prati guṇabhāvaḥ, phalasya yāgaṃ prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:4037: prādhānyam, puruṣaṃ prati guṇatā, puruṣasya phalaṃ prati pradhānatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4043: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti. tatra śrūyante dharmāḥ, nir-vapaṇam, prokṣaṇam, avahananam ityevamādaya auṣadhadharmāḥ. tathā, utpavanavilāpanayahaṇā-sādanādaya{*3/15*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4044: ājyadharmāḥ. tathā, śākhāharaṇam, gavāṃ prasthāpanam, gavāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4046: kiṃ sarve, auṣadhe ājye sānnāyye ca kartavyāḥ, uta ye yatra kriyamāṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4048: nanu saṃyuktā eva{*3/18*} śrūyante, yathā, vrīhīn avahanti, taṇḍulān
GSP28msbh1-7u:4049: pinaṣṭīti. bāḍhaṃ saṃyuktāḥ, avaghātādayas tu padārthā vidhīyante śrutyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4050: vākyenaiṣāṃ vrīhyādisaṃyogaḥ. ato 'sti saṃśayaḥ. [212]{*3/19*} kiṃ tāvat prāptam? teṣām arthena saṃbandhaḥ. arthena prayojanena, ye yatra kriyamāṇāḥ prayojanavantaḥ, te tatra kartavyāḥ. prathanādaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4051: ājyasāntāyyayor{*3/20*} anupakārakā iti na tatra karaṇīyāḥ. evam utpavanādaya auṣadhasānnāyyayoḥ, śākhāharaṇādaya ājyauṣadhayoḥ. nanu śrūyante sarve sarvatra. etad eva na jānīmaḥ, śrūyante na śrūyanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4052: tad vicārāyitavyam. yady api śrūyaran{*3/21*}, tathāpy anupakārakatvān naiva kartavyā bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4056: *{3/17: E2: sāṃnāyyasya, E4: sānāyyasya, E6: sānnāyyasya}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4060: vihitas tu sarvadharmaḥ syāt saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4061: ucyate - yo 'rthāt prāptaḥ syāt, sa yatra prayojanaṃ tatraiva kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4062: śabdena tu sarve 'mī padārthā vihitāḥ, tena na, yatra kevalaṃ prayojanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4063: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate, tatraiva kartavyāh. kva tarhi? yatra yatra vihitāḥ, te cāmī sarvatra vihitāḥ gamyante. kutaḥ? saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:4064: ca. sarveṣāṃ tāvad ājyauṣadhasānnāyyānām apūrveṇa sādhyasādhanasaṃyogo 'viśiṣṭaḥ, yatra kriyamāṇā apūrvasya kṛtā bhavatīti vijñāyate. tathā prakaraṇam aviśiṣṭam, yasmin vihitāḥ sarveṣāṃ vihitā bhavantīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4065: ataḥ sarve sarvatra kartavyāḥ, yat tv amī na sarvatropakurvantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4066: vidhānasāmarthyāt sarvatropakārakā iti gamyate. sa cāyam adṛṣṭa upakāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:4069: naitat, sarve sarvatra karaṇīyā iti, ye yatra nopakurvanti, na te tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:4070: kriyām arhantīty uktam eva. nanu vidhānasāmarthyāt sarve
GSP28msbh1-7u:4073: phalaṃ tu saha ceṣṭayā śabdārtho 'bhāvād viprayoge syāt // MS_3,1.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4074: nāsti vidhānam, yena sarve sarvatropakurvanti. na ca pratyakṣādibhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4075: upakāram avagacchāmaḥ. arthāpattir api niyogatas tatraiva bhavet, yatraiva śabena codanā bhavati, nānyathā. yadi ca prathanādīnām ājyasānnāyyayor anupakurvatām api tatprakaraṇe samāmnāyo 'nupapanno bhavet, tato 'rthād
GSP28msbh1-7u:4076: adṛṣṭa upakāraḥ kalpyeta, te tv avaśyaṃ samāmnānīyā auṣadhārtham. phalaṃ hi saha ceṣṭayāvahananādikayāvagamyate tuṣavimocanādi, prayojanaṃ ca tena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4077: na tasmād ṛte puroḍāśaḥ sidhyati, sati cāsminn arthavān prakaraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:4078: samāmnāyaḥ. arthavati ca tasmin nādṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇam astīty ato na śakyaṃ kalpayitum. yadi ca tatra taṇḍulādiniṣpādanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nābhaviṣyat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4079: tato viprayoge taṇḍulādīnām abhāvād upakārasya śabdārthamātraṃ dṛṣṭopakārānapekṣaṃ kartavyam ity ājyasānnāyyayor api kriyamāṇānām adṛṣṭam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4080: abhaviṣyat. tasmān na prathanādayaḥ sarvatra. evam utpavanādayaḥ śākhāharaṇādayaś ca. tasmān na, sarve sarvtra kartavyāḥ, prathanādayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4081: nājyasānnāyayyoḥ, auṣadhe eva te, utpavanādaya ājyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4082: nauṣadhasānnāyyayoḥ, śākhāharaṇādayaś ca sānnāyyasya, nājyauṣadhayor iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4083: dravyaṃ cotpattisaṃyogāt tadartham{*3/23*} eva codyeta // MS_3,1.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4084: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra samāmananti - sphyaś ca kapālāni ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:4085: [214]{*3/24*} agnihotrahavaṇī ca śūrpaṃ ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca śamyā colūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ ca dṛṣṭac copalā caitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhānīti{*3/25*}. tatra saṃdihyate - kiṃ yo ya iha śakyata ebhiḥ kartum, tasmai tasmai padārthāyaitāni samāmnātāni, uta yad yena saṃyuktam, tasmā eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? yad yena śakyam iti. kutaḥ? evaṃ vidhayo bhaviṣyanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4087: prakaraṇāviśeṣaś ca sarvapadārthān prati, yajñāyudhānīti ca yajñasaṃyogo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4089: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - dravyaṃ cotpattisaṃyogāt tadartham eva codyeta, yo yena padārthena sahotpattivākyena saṃyuktaḥ sa padārthaḥ tenaiva kartavyaḥ, yathā sphyenoddhantīty uddhanārthatā sphyasya vākyena, tad uddhaṇanaṃ na sphyād anyena kartavyam. yadā caivam, tadā prāpta eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:4090: sphyaḥ, tasyāyam anuvādo bhavitum arhati, etāni vai daśayajñāyudhānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4091: evam ekaisyānuvādaḥ, tena tena vacanena prāptasya. yathā - kapāleṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:4092: śrapayati, agnihotrahavaṇyā havīṃṣi nirvapati, śūrpeṇa vivinakti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4094: upadadhāti, ulūkhala-musalābhyām avahanti, dṛṣad upalābhyāṃ pinaṣṭīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4095: prakaraṇāt sarvāṇi sarvatra prāpnuyuḥ, vacanāt tu yathāvacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4096: yajñāyudhaśabdo 'pi sāmānyena prayojanaṃ vidadhat tad vādhyetaiva{*3/29*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4097: parokṣaṃ hi sāmānyavacanena viśeṣavidhānaṃ bhavati, pratyakṣaṃ tu viśeṣavacanena viśeṣavidhānam. tasmād yad yenotpattyā saṃyuktam, tat tatraiva viniyujyata iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4105: arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4106: jyotiṣṭome krayaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā{*3/31*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4107: somaṃ krīṇātīti{*3/32*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aruṇimā kṛtsnaprakaraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:4108: niviśete, uta kraya evaikahāyanyām iti. kathaṃ punaḥ aruṇayā krīṇātīty evaṃ vispaṣṭe krayasaṃbandhe gamyamāne saṃśaya iti. ucyate - iha hi guṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4109: aruṇimānam amūrtaṃ santaṃ kriyāyāḥ karaṇam iti śabda upadiśati, yat karaṇābhidhāyinyā tṛtīyāvibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati - aruṇayeti, na cāmūrto 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavitum arhati, ato 'saṃ-bandhaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4110: krīṇātināruṇaguṇasyāvagacchāmaḥ. na cāśaṅkanīyam arthaṃ pramāṇabhūtaḥ śabdo 'bhidhāsyatīty evaṃ prakalpanā kadācid upapadyetāpi. kenacit prakāreṇa saṃbandha iti vacanaprāmāṇyaprakārānveṣaṇe buddhir bhavati, tad yadi param, vicārayantaḥ kriyāsaṃbandhasāmarthyam avagamiṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4111: ekavākyatayā kraya evāruṇimānaṃ niveśayiṣyāmaḥ. atha tv apramādyadbhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4112: anviṣyamāṇo na kathaṃcana saṃbandha upapatsyate, tato vākyabhedam abhyupagamya prakaraṇadharmam enam adhyavasāsyāmaḥ{*3/33*}. tasmād avaśyaṃ vicāraṇīyam etad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4113: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? kṛtsne prakaraṇe niveśaḥ. kasmāt? saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4114: prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca. nanu prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyo bhavatīty ekavākyatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:4115: aruṇimā krayeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. naitad evam avagamyate, na hi vacanaśatenāpy anāra[213]{*3/34*}bhyo 'rthaḥ śakyo vidhātum, yo hi brūyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:4116: - udakena dagdhavyam agninā kledayitavyam iti, kiṃ sa vacanaprayojanasāmañjasyam aśnuvīta? na cāmūrto 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanam upapadyate. tasmād aruṇayā krīṇātīti saṃbandhābhāvād ekavākyatā na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4118: nanu naivāyaṃ guṇavacanaḥ, kiṃ tarhi dravyavacanaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4119: strīliṅgasaṃbandhāt. dravyaviśeṣā hy ete strī pumān napuṃsakam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4120: strīyāṃ yat prātipadikaṃ vartate, tasmāt strīpratyayo bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4122: aruṇaśabda{*3/35*} iti. tad etad apeśa-lam, tad eva hi dravyam aruṇimnā parichidyamānam aruṇaśabdābhidhānīyatāṃ{*3/36*} labhate, tad evānyaguṇakaṃ nāruṇaśabdaḥ{*3/37*} śaknoty abhivaditum, aruṇimānam eṣa śabdo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4123: vyabhicarati, vy-abhicarati punar dravyam, avyabhicāri ca kāraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4124: kāraṇavatām iṣṭam. ato 'sya guṇaḥ svārtha iti gamyate, tad asya pratyakṣato guṇavacanatā gamyate, strīpratyayadarśanāt tu nūnam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4125: aruṇāprātipadikaṃ dravyavacanam ity anumānam. pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ, tasmād guṇavacanaḥ. kathaṃ tarhi strīpratyayasaṃbandhaḥ? bhavati hi guṇavacanasyāpi strīliṅgatā, yathā cāruṇā{*3/38*} buddhiḥ, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4126: aruṇeti. guṇavacanaś cet krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate. tasmād vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā prakaraṇe sarvasminn eva saṃniveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4127: atha yadi krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate, tasmin eva vākye ekahāyanīśabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4128: saṃbhantsyate, na bhaviṣyati vākyabheda iti. tan na, kevalaṃ hi guṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4129: aruṇaśābdo{*3/39*} 'bhidadhāti, na dravyaguṇau. kevalaṃ ca dravyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4130: ekahāyanīśabdaḥ, na guṇasahitam iti tayoḥ saṃbandhasya vācikāṃ ṣaṣṭhīm antareṇa kathaṃ saṃbandho gamyate? āha - antareṇāpi ṣaṣṭhīm,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4131: ekavibhaktinirdeśāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam [217]{*3/40*} avagamiṣyāmaḥ, yathā nīlam utpalam iti. tad anupapannam, rūpād aruṇaśabdasya{*3/41*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4132: guṇavacanatā, kalpanīyaṃ tv ekavibhaktisaṃyogād ekahāyanīśabdasaṃnidhānāc ca tad ekavākyatām abhyupagamyaikahāyanīśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyam, na ca liṅgād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. tasmād asad etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4133: tatrocyate - yadā kevalaguṇavacanatāyāṃ śabdaḥ pravartamāno nānyena saṃbandhaṃ labhate, tadānupadeśakatvād ānarthakyaṃ mā bhūd iti dravyaparatām āpadyate, tasyām avasthāyām ekavibhaktiyuktenaikahāyanīśabdena saṃnihitenaikavākyatām āpadyamānaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4134: samānādhikaraṇo bhavati, tathā ca kṛtvā, nīlam utpalam ity upapadyate. sa cāyam aruṇāśabdas tasyām avasthāyāṃ vartate, na hy asya svārtham abhidadhata ito vicchinnasya prakaraṇe 'py arthavattā. kutaḥ? yenaiva hetunā saṃbadhyate{*3/42*} krīṇātinā na, nāmūrto{*3/43*} 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavatīti. na ca kriyāsādhanair dravyaiḥ, na hi kevalaguṇavacanaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4135: śaknoti dravyam abhidhātum iti sa eva hetuḥ prakaraṇasaṃbandhābhāve 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4136: tatrāpi saṃbadhyamānaḥ kriyābhir vā saṃbadhyeta, tatsādhanair vā dravyaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4139: naitad evam, na hy ayam aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4140: kāraṇam? karaṇavibhaktyā tṛtīyayā samuccarito 'yam, tenaitena tṛtīyāśrutisāmarthyāt kriyāviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam, kārakāṇāṃ hi kriyayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4141: saṃbandho na dravyeṇeti. sa eṣa śrutisāmarthyāt kriyāviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4142: ekavākyatvād{*3/44*} ekahāyanīviśeṣaṇam. śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī, tasmān nāsyaikahāyanīsaṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:4143: nanu ca guṇasya kriyāsaṃbandhābhāvād avivakṣitā kāraka[218]{*3/45*}śaktir{*3/46*} ity ekahāyanīsaṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4144: adhyavasitaḥ. evam api nopapadyate, yadi kārakābhidhānam avivakṣitam iti guṇaśabdenaitena dravyam abhidhātum iṣyate, tadā prātipadikārthasyāvyatireka iti prathamā vibhaktiḥ prāpnoti. na hi tṛtīyāntas tam abhisaṃbandhaṃ śaknoti vaktum, na cānyathānupapattir ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:4145: anyo 'syānupapadyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyate kalpayitum, yathāgnau tiṣṭhati māṇavaka ity ukte jvalane 'nupapadyamāno nāśve gavi vā kalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4146: agnisamīpavacana evādhyavasīyate. tadvad ihāpy aprathamāntaḥ śabdo na kathaṃcid apy avyatirikte prātipadikārthe bhavitum arhatīti. tasmāt kāmam anarthako 'vagamyatāṃ nāsyaikahāyanīsaṃbandho 'dhyavasātavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4147: āha - na brūmaḥ, na kārakam aruṇāśabdenābhidhīyata iti, vyaktam aruṇaguṇaviśiṣṭam etena kārakam abhidhīyate. kadācit tu kiṃcid vidhitsitaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4150: 'vagamyate, kadācit tu nirjñāte puruṣe daṇḍaguṇavidhānārtham uccāryate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4151: daṇḍī praiṣānanvāheti. tathā{*3/47*} lohiteṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4152: evam ihāpi yady anupasarjanabhūto{*3/48*} 'ruṇo guṇaḥ, pradhānabhūtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4153: kārakam. tathāpy anūdite kārake 'ruṇaguṇavidhānārthaṃ vacanaṃ yujyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4154: tasmād ekahāyanīsaṃbandha upapadyate, nāsti vākyabheda iti. naitat sāram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4155: atra hy ekahāyanīkrīṇātyor anavabuddhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ bodhayitum ayam ekahāyanīśabda uccaritaḥ, sa eṣa katham ivāruṇāśabena saṃbadhyte, tad etad abhihitam api punaḥ punaḥ paryanuyujjyate. [219]{*3/49*} kathaṃ punar ekahāyanīśabdasya krīṇātinā, aruṇaguṇena ca samāne samabhivyāhāre krīṇātinā saṃbandho 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ, na punar āruṇyeneti. śabdaprāmāṇyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4156: bhavati hi kriyāsaṃbandhasya vācikā vibhaktir ekahāyanīśabdam anuniviṣṭā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4157: na tu guṇasaṃbandhasya vācikā. kā punaḥ kriyāsaṃbandhasya vācikā, kā vā guṇasaṃbandhasyeti. kārakalakṣaṇā kriyāsaṃbandhe vivakṣite bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:4158: dvitīyādiḥ, avivakṣite punaḥ kārake, saṃbandhamātravivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī. na cātra ṣaṣṭīṃ paśyāmaḥ, paśyāmas tu khalu tṛtīyām. ataḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandham abhyupagacchāma ekahāyanīśabdasya, nāruṇāśabdeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4159: kathaṃ tarhi bhavaty atra saṃbandhaḥ, nīlam utapalam iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4160: bhavati, na tu śrutilakṣaṇaḥ, kiṃ tu vākyalakṣaṇaḥ, utpalaśabdasaṃnidhāne tadapekṣī nīlaśabdas tenaikavākyatām abhyupagacchan nājahat svārthavṛttir upalaviśeṣābhidhānapara uccāryamāṇaḥ saṃbandham abhyupaiti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4161: nanv ihāpi vākyalakṣaṇas tadvad evāruṇimnā samaṃ saṃbandha ekahāyanyā yujyate. neti brūmaḥ, śrutir hi vākyād balīyasī, śrutiś cāsyāḥ kriyāsaṃbandham āha, na guṇasaṃbandham. yadi punaḥ śrutisāmarthyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4163: śakyam, yo hy anyena saha saṃbandhum uccāryate, na tatsamīpagato 'py anyas tena saha saṃbanddhum arhati. yathā bhāryā rājñaḥ, puruṣo{*3/50*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4164: devadattasyeti bhāryāviśeṣaṇārtham uccāryamāṇo rājaśabdo na puruṣeṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4165: saṃbadhyate, tadvad iha krayāviśeṣaṇārtham uccāryamāṇa ekahāyanīśabdo nāruṇāśabdena saṃbandham
GSP28msbh1-7u:4166: āha - satyam evam etat, asatyām ākāṅkṣāyām ānantaryam akāraṇam, sarvatra tu bodhite padārthe vākyārtha upapadyate, nānyathā, sāmānyavṛtti hi padam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4167: viśeṣavṛtti vākyam, sāmānyenābhipravṛttānāṃ [220]{*3/51*} padārthānāṃ yad viśeṣe 'vasthānam, sa vākyārthaḥ, tad etad uktam - tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāyo 'rthasya tannimittatvād iti{*3/52*}, tatra pratyakṣataḥ{*3/53*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4168: padārthaḥ, vākyārthaḥ punar ānumānikaḥ, tad etad avagamyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4169: kevalasvārthavṛtti padam anupadeśakam iti padāntareṇa saṃnihitenaikavākyatvam abhyupaiti, nānyatheti. tad iha yady apy ekahāyanīśabdaḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandhyamānaḥ kṛtārtho na padāntareṇa saṃbandham ākāṅkṣati, aruṇāśabdas tu padāntareṇa saṃbandham alabhamāno 'narthaka ity ekahāyanīśabdenaikavākyatām abhyupaiti. nanūktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4172: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārtham api śaknoti kartum, tad yathā śālyarthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4173: kulyāḥ praṇīyante, tābhyaś ca pānīyaṃ pīyata upaspṛśyate ca. evam ihāpi krayasaṃbandhārtham ekahāyanīśabda uccāryamāṇo 'ruṇāśabdena saha
GSP28msbh1-7u:4174: saṃbhantyate, na kiṃcid duṣyati. tasmān na vākyabheda iti. naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4175: yady apy ayam aruṇāśabdo 'narthako mā bhūd ity ekahāyanyā saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4176: tathāpi sarvasmin prakaraṇe niveṣṭum arhati. na cainaṃ somaṃ krīṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭum. na hy ayaṃ viśeṣaṇatvenocāryate, kiṃ tarhi apūrvo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4178: nanv apūrvo 'pi vidhīyamāna ekahāyanīśabdavad itareṇa saṃbhantsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4179: katham? prayojanāya hy uccāryamāṇaḥ śabdo yenārthaḥ, tasmai tāvat prayojanāyāvakalpyate, saṃnihitś ca buddhau bhavati, tena buddhau saṃnihitena śakyate sākāṅkṣaḥ śabdaḥ saṃbandhayitum iti. naitad evam, yo hy asaṃbadhyamāno 'narthako bhavati, sa saṃbadhyate nānyaḥ. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4180: saṃbadhyamāne hi sāmānyaṃ viśeṣe 'vasthāpyeta, tatra vākyena śrutiḥ pīḍitā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4181: syāt. na cāyam [221]{*3/54*} asaṃbadhyamānaḥ krīṇātinānarthako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4183: nanv etad uktam - prakaraṇe 'py asya saṃbandho 'nupapanna iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4184: nānupapannaḥ, ekasmin vākye 'nyo 'rtho vidhīyamāno nānyena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4185: vacanavyaktibhedāt, anyā hi vacanavyaktir vidhīyamānasya, anyā guṇena saṃbadhyamānasya. ajñātavaj jñāpyate vidhīyamāno 'rthaḥ, jñātavad anūdyate guṇasaṃbandhārtham, na ca sakṛd uccāryamāṇo jñātavad ajñātavac ca bhavitum arhati, ekahāyanīśabdaḥ kraye vidhīyamāno 'jñātavat syāt, aruṇāśabdena saṃbadhyamānaś ca jñatavat. vākyabhede punar na doṣo bhavati, prakaraṇe tu vākyāntaraiḥ kriyādravyāntarāṇī ca prāptāni. tair idaṃ vākyāntaravihitaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4186: saṃbadhyate, tatrānyasmin vidhīyate, anyasmin vākye 'nūdyata ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:4187: upa-pannaṃ bhavati. tasmāt saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/57*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4189: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syād iti, yatrārthaikatvaṃ śrūyate dravyaguṇayoḥ, tatra dravyaguṇāv ekasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:4190: padārthe niyamyeyātām. kutaḥ? aikakarmyād ekakāryatvāt, ekaṃ hi kāryaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4191: dravyaguṇayoḥ śrūyate krayasaṃbandhaḥ. katham etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4192: ekavākyatvāt. katham ekavākyatvam? aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyety aparyavasito 'rthaḥ sākāṅkṣatvād abhidhātṛpratipatroḥ, somaṃ krīṇātīti tu
GSP28msbh1-7u:4193: paryavasyati, tayor evaṃ nairutsukyāt. yady ekakāryatā kim iti vikalpo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4194: bhavati? naitad{*3/58*} evam. ekārthās tu vikalperann iti vikalpadharmāṇau prāpnuta ity ayukto 'yaṃ paryanuyogaḥ. katham? paryanuyogo nāma sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4195: bhavati, yaḥ svapakṣaṃ sādhayati, vipakṣasya ca pratīpam ācarati, na ca [222]{*3/59*} vikalpo 'smatpakṣasya pratīpam ācarati, krayeṇāruṇim
GSP28msbh1-7u:4196: āsaṃbandha{*3/60*} ity eṣa naḥ pakṣaḥ. na ca vikalpo nānākāryatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4197: nanv idānīm evoktam - ekaṃ kāryam iti, tac cāpi viruddham, evaṃ hi pūrvam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4198: abhihitam, amūrta-tvād guṇo na kriyayā saṃbadhyata iti, idānīṃ viparītam abhidhīyate - ubhāv api dravyaguṇāv ekārthau krayam abhinirvartayata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4199: ucyate, naitad viruddham, na ca vikalpaḥ, ekaṃ kāryam, sāmarthyabhedas tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4200: sākṣād dhi dravyaṃ kriyāṃ pratyupakaroti. guṇas tu viśiṣṭānāṃ sādhanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4201: yady evam, na tarhi guṇaḥ kriyām abhinirvartayati, sādhanasyāsau viśeṣaka iti. naitad evam, guṇasya kriyām abhinirvartayata etad eva sāmarthyam, yat sādhanaṃ viśiṣyāt. ākāṅkṣati ca kriyā sādhanaviśeṣaṇam, cihnabhūto hi guṇaḥ sādhanaṃ lakṣayati. asati cihne na lakṣyeta, katamat sādhanaṃ kriyāyā iti. tataḥ kriyā nādhyavasyema kartum iti bhavati kriyāsādhanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4202: gunaḥ. na caiva sati vikalpo bhavati, yathādhikaraṇasya kartrādīnāṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4203: adhikaraṇaṃ hi kartrādīni dhārayati, tāny adhāryamāṇāni na śaknuvanti kriyām abhinirvartayitum, tathā{*3/61*} kartā karaṇādīni samādhatte, tāny asamāhitāni na śaknuvanti svaṃ svam artham abhinirvartayitum. yasmiṃs tu sādhanopakāre kārye tasminn evopakāre 'nyat sādhanaṃ vidhīyate, tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:4204: vikalpaḥ, yathā vrīhim iryajeta, yavair yajeteti, ubhaye 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4206: evaṃ tarhi tad evedaṃ saṃjātaṃ bhavati, ekahāyanīvidhanam, tadviśeṣaṇaṃ cāruṇo guṇaḥ, tatra sa eva doṣo vākyabhedaḥ prasajjyeteti. na brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4207: aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīśabdena saṃbadhyata iti, kiṃ tarhi krīṇātinaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:4208: saṃbadhyate. evaṃ hi śrūyate 'ruṇaguṇena krayam abhinirvartayed iti, yathā ca tena nirvartyate, tathā yatitavya bhavati. na cāviśiṃṣan sādhanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4210: pratipadyate, yathā sthālyāṃ paced iti kriyāsādhanatvena nirdiṣṭe 'rthāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:4211: saṃbhavane dhāraṇe ca syālīṃ{*3/63*} vyāpārayati tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4213: nanv evam api vākyaṃ bhidyeta. katham? pratyekaṃ vākyaparisamāptir dṛṣṭeti, yathā devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrā bhojyantām iti pratyekaṃ bhujiḥ samāpyate, yathā ca yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pived iti. evam ihāpy aruṇayā krīṇāti, ekahāyanyā krīṇātīti. naitad asmatpakṣasya bādhakam, evam api kraya evāruṇimā nivekṣyati, na sarvasmin prakaraṇa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4214: satyam eṣa doṣo na bhavati, kiṃ tv anaruṇayāpy ekahāyanyā krayaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4215: aruṇayā cānekahāyanyā, tatra yad uktaṃ dravyaguṇayor niyama iti, sā pratijñā hīyate. na tarhi brūmaḥ - vākyabheda iti. katham? krayasya hi dravyāruṇimānāv upadiśyete, na krayas tayoḥ. na ca, pradhānaṃ pratiguṇaṃ bhidyate, pratipradhānaṃ hi guṇo bhidyata iti, asti cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptir iti, yathā gargāḥ śataṃ daṇḍyantām iti, tathā abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣāyantīti. tasmād ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ krayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4217: kathaṃ punas tasmiṃś cetariṃś ca dṛṣṭānte saty ekāntenāvadhāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4218: samudāya eva vākyaparisamāptir na pratyavayavam iti. atra brūmaḥ - iha dravyāruṇimānāv ubhāv api kriyāsaṃbaddhāv upalabhyete
GSP28msbh1-7u:4220: nānyayatareṇa, tatra yadi dravyaparam aruṇim aparaṃ ca bhavati vacanam idam, tataḥ pratyavayavam asaṃśayaṃ krayasaṃbandhaḥ. atha
GSP28msbh1-7u:4221: krayavidhitsayābhidhīyate, tato yathaivāyam ekahāyanīvi[224]{*3/64*}śiṣṭaḥ, evam aruṇim aviśiṣṭa iti niyamata ubhayasaṃbandho 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ. na cātra dravyāruṇimānāv īpsitau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4222: īpsitas tu krayaḥ, tena hi jyotiṣṭomadravyaṃ somaḥ pariprāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4223: dravyāruṇimānau krayārthau santāv īpsitau syātām, nānyathā. tasmāt krayo vidhīyate, sa ca nānyataraviśiṣṭaḥ pratīyata iti samudāye
GSP28msbh1-7u:4224: vākyaparisamāptir iha niścīyate. yadā caivam, tadā na, ekahāyanīṃ muktvānyad dravyaṃ krayasādhanam asti, na cāruṇād anyaḥ sādhanasya viśeṣako guṇa iti, niyamaḥ siddho bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4225: atra vadāmaḥ - yadi krayasya sādhane guṇo 'bhisaṃbandhum upaiti, tadā vākye bhinne 'pi krayasādhanatvād aruṇimāsmin dravye na nivekṣyate, kim artham ekavākyatā prayatnena sādhyata iti. tad etad abhidhīyate - bhinne hi vākya ekāhāyanīsādhanakaḥ krayo 'vabuddho bhavati, aruṇāsādhanam api krayāntaram, na tasminn evaikahāyanīsādhane kraye 'ruṇimā vihito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4226: tatra yat krayāntaram aruṇaguṇaviśiṣṭam, tatrārthāt prāptam anyad api sādhanaṃ bhavati. tad api viśiṃṣan aruṇo guṇas tena saṃbadhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4227: ekavākyatve tu tat parihṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt sādhv abhidhīyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4228: arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4256: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - ya evaṃ vidvān somena yajata iti{*3/65*}. [225]{*3/66*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4257: tatra śrūyate - daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃārṣṭīti, tathāgnihotre srūyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4258: agnes tṛṇāny apacinotīti, tathā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - puroḍāśaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4259: paryagnikarotīti{*3/67*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ekasya grahasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4260: ekasyāgneḥ, ekasya puroḍāśasya ca saṃmārjanādi kartavyam, uta sarveṣāṃ grahāṇāṃ sarveṣām agnīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ puroḍāśānām iti. kiṃ prāptam? eko
GSP28msbh1-7u:4261: grahaḥ, eko 'gniḥ, ekaḥ puroḍāśa iha grahītavyaḥ. kutaḥ? śrutisaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4262: ekatvaśrutisaṃyuktā ete padārthāḥ, ekaṃ hi dravyam eṣa śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4263: śabdalakṣaṇe ca hi karmaṇi yac chabda āha, tad asmākaṃ pramāṇam, yathā paśum ālabheta ity ukta eka eva paśuḥ pumāṃś cālabhyate. evam atrāpy eko
GSP28msbh1-7u:4264: grahaḥ saṃmārjanīyaḥ, ekasyāgnes tṛṇāny apaceyāni, ekaḥ puroḍāśaḥ paryagnikartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4268: sarveṣāṃ vā lakṣaṇatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi lakṣaṇam // MS_3,1.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4269: naitad asti - yad uktaṃ grahādiṣv{*3/68*} ekatvayukteṣv amī padārthāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4270: kartavyā iti, sarve grahāḥ saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ, sarvebhyo 'gnibhyas tṛṇāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:4271: apaceyāni, puroḍāśamātraṃ ca paryagnikartavyam iti. kutaḥ? grahajātyā dravyaṃ lakṣayitvā saṃmārgādi vidhīyate, aviśiṣṭaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4272: sarvadravyeṣu, tatra na gamyate viśeṣaḥ, ko grahaḥ saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ, ko neti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4273: sāmānyāvagamād viśeṣān avagamāc ca sarvapratyayaḥ. tathāgnipuroḍāśānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:4274: api. nanv ekavacanaṃ śrūyate, tad viśekṣyati. naitad asti, ekatvaṃ hi śrūyamāṇaṃ grahādiṣv ekatvaṃ brūyāt, na dvitīyādīn pratiṣedhet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4276: tenāpratiṣiddhe dvitīyādau sāmānyavacanena prāptaṃ saṃmārjanādi kim iti na kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4277: tatraitat syāt, ekavacanam iha śrūyamāṇaṃ prāpta evaikasmin dravye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4278: dvitīyādiṣu ca, kim anyat kuryād anyataḥ parisaṃkhyāyāḥ, na ced ekavacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4279: parisaṃcakṣīta dvitīyādīn, anarthakam eva syāt, śaknoti ca dvitīyādīn
GSP28msbh1-7u:4282: naitad evam, tatra mantrasyābhidhānyāś ca yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ, tad abhidhānaparaṃ vacanam, imām agṛbhṇān ity aśvābhidhānīm iti{*3/71*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4283: nānena mantreṇa, ādatta iti liṅgenaivādāne prāptatvān mantrasya parisaṃkhyā yuktā. iha punar yad ekavacanaṃ dravye śrūyate, tac chrūyamāṇam apy avidhīyamānatvena na nivartakaṃ bhavitum arhati, yathā kaścid odanaṃ nirdiśya brūyāt - ya enaṃ bhakṣayet kaścic chvā mārjāro vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4284: sa nivārayitavya iti, tatra yadi bhakṣaṇaṃ nimittatvena vidhīyate, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4285: śvamārjārasaṃbandhaḥ, tataḥ kāko 'py āgacchan nivāryate. śrūyamāṇe 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4286: śuni mārjāre vā śvamārjārasaṃbandhasya nimittatvenāvidhīyamānatvāt. evam ihāpy ekatvasaṃbandhasyāvidhīyamānatvāc chrūyamāṇe 'py ekatve grahamātraṃ saṃmṛjyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4287: na cātra dravyaikatvasaṃbandhavidhāyakaḥ kaścic chabdo 'sti. nanu
GSP28msbh1-7u:4288: saṃmārṣṭīti. na hy etad dravyaikatvasaṃbandhasya vidhāyakam. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4289: dravyasaṃmārgasaṃbandhasya vidhāyakam, evaṃ śrutyā svapadārtho vihito
GSP28msbh1-7u:4290: bhavati, itarathā vākyena parapadārtho vidhīyate. śrutyasaṃbhave ca vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4291: kramate, na saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutau. ato 'vidhīyamānaṃ viśeṣaṇatvena, ekatvaṃ na dvitīyādīn pratiṣeddhum arhati. evaṃ sati na dvitīyādau saṃmārgādi kriyamāṇam [227]{*3/72*} acoditaṃ bhavati, pratiṣiddhaṃ vā, yathaiva hi tad ekasya śrutam avagamyate, tathā dvitīyāder api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4292: ayaṃ cāparo doṣaḥ, na tad ekatvaṃ dravyasya saṃmārgādau viṣaye niyamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4293: na hi saṃmārgādiḥ, yasmin dravya ekatvaṃ niyamyeta, tasya viśeṣaṇatvena bhavati, vidhīyate hy atra saṃmārgādiḥ, na prāpto lakṣaṇatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4294: dravyasyāmnāyate, na hi yaugapadyena vidhātuṃ śakyate, lakṣaṇatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4295: coc-cārayitum. prasiddhasaṃbandho hi śaknoti lakṣayitum, na cāvihita evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdāvagamyaḥ prasiddhasaṃbandho bhavati. vidhīyate ca saṃmārgādiḥ, tasmān na viśeṣakaḥ, na ced viśeṣakaḥ, na dravya ekatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4297: athaikatvaṃ saṃmārga ucyate. tatrāpi dvayī gatiḥ syāt, ekatvaṃ pradhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4298: saṃmārgo vā, tac cobhayam apy anupapannam. na tāvad ekatvasya saṃmārgaḥ śākyate kartum. na ca dravye kriyamāṇa ekatvasyopakaroti kenacit
GSP28msbh1-7u:4299: prakaraṇam. na caikatvasyopakṛtena kiṃcit prayojanam asti, na hi tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:4300: guṇabhūtaṃ śrutam. athaikatvaṃ saṃmārgaṃ prati guṇabhūtam iti. tad api na.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4301: katham? amūrtatvāt, na hi tat saṃmārgaṃ niṣpādayati. yady apy anyad
GSP28msbh1-7u:4302: amūrtaṃ kriyāṃ niṣpādayati sādhanaṃ viśiṃṣat, tathāpy etan na bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:4303: arhati, na hy atra grahaḥ saṃmārgārthaḥ, saṃmārgo 'tra grahāya codyate, sa hi prayojanavān, kalpyaprayojanaḥ saṃmārgaḥ. yadi grahaḥ saṃmārgasyopakuryāt, tad upakāriṇa{*3/73*} upakarotīti saṃmārgasyopakārakam ekatvaṃ bhavet. na tv etad evam. tasmād ekatvasaṃmārgayor asaṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4304: nanu pradhānabhutam api grahādi saṃmārgaṃ niṣpādayaty eva, atas tatsādhanaṃ tac ca viśiṃṣat tad upakariṣyati, yathā ijyārthe dadhani
GSP28msbh1-7u:4305: payasi ca praṇītā dharmāḥ pāka upakurvanti. paridhānārthe ca [228]{*3/74*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4306: paridau yūpadharmā bandhane. tasmād ayam asamādhir iti. atrocyate - na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4307: brūmaḥ, atadarthe sādhake na śaknuvanty upakartum iti. kiṃ tarhi? yadā pradhānabhūtaṃ grahādi lakṣaṇatvenocyate, na tadaikatvasya grahādinā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4308: saṃbandhaḥ, na saṃmārgādineti. katham? yāvad iha lakṣaṇatvena kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:4309: ucyate, saṃvādas tatra bhavati, na tu tadvidhīyate vijñānāya. kim arthaṃ tarhy uccāryate? anyat tasya kiṃcid vidhāyiṣyata iti, tad etad grahādi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4310: lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārgādi vidhīyate. tad yady ekatvasaṃbandho 'paro
GSP28msbh1-7u:4311: grahadravye{*3/75*} saṃmārgādau vā padārthe{*3/76*} vidhīyeta, dvayoḥ saṃbandhayor vidhānād bhidyeta vākyam. athocyeta - grahādi lakṣayitvā tasyaikatvasaṃbandho vidhīyate, na saṃmārgādisaṃbandha iti, tathā ca saṃmārgādīnām adhyayanaṃ pramāda ity abhyupagataṃ syāt. na caitad evam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4312: tasmād ubhābhyām ekavacanasyāsaṃbandha iti. evam etad ekatvaṃ grahasya na kiṃcid upakāraṃ karoti, na saṃmārgasya, evam eva sadanūdyate. tasmān naitat kiṃcid api kartuṃ vivakṣyata iti sarveṣāṃ grahādīnāṃ saṃmārgādi kartavyam iti. kutaḥ? saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/77*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4313: yady avivakṣitam ekatvam, kathaṃ trahy ekavacanam uccāryate? nanu bahuṣu vivakṣiteṣu bahuvacanena bhavitavyam. ucyate - na vayam etad vicārayāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4314: ekavacanam uccārayitavyam, noccārayitavyam iti, uccāryamāṇe sati kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4315: pratipattavyam? ekasminn eva saṃmārgādi, uta sarveṣv iti, tac ca sarveṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:4316: iti sthāpitam. api ca na vibhakter vacanam evaikaṃ prayojanam. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4319: api ca grahaḥ prātipadikārtha ekatvaṃ vibhaktyarthaḥ. kim ato [229]{*3/78*} yady evam. etad ato bhavati - prātipadikārthagataṃ hi vibhaktiḥ svam arthaṃ śrutyaiva vadati. athaivaṃ sati kim na, saṃmārgeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. tena hi saṃbadhyamānaṃ vākyena saṃbadhyeta, na ca śrutyā, anyena saṃbadhyamānaṃ vākyenācchidyānyena saṃbandham arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4320: asaṃbadhyamānas tv ekatvena saṃmārgaḥ, yadi naikatvaviśiṣṭaḥ kriyate, na kiṃcid vipannaṃ bhavati, na caikatvaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃmārgādiḥ, grahādimātrasya ca vidhīyata iti kim iti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca na kriyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4330: codite tu parārthatvād yathāśruti patīyeta // MS_3,1.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4331: atha yad uktam - yathā paśum ālabhetety eka eva paśuḥ puṃpaśuś cālabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4332: evam idam apīti, asty atra vaiparītyam iha grahārthaḥ saṃmārgaḥ, tatra punar yāgārthaḥ paśuḥ. kim evaṃ sati bhavati? yo yāgārthaṃ paricchinati{*3/79*}, sa yāgasyopakaroti, aparicchinnena na śakyo yāgaḥ kartum iti. na tu graheṇa kenacid viśiṣṭena saṃmārgaḥ kartavyaḥ, yad grahaṃ viśiṃṣat saṃmārgasyopkuryāt, paśoś caitad ekatvaṃ yāgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4333: pratyupadiśyate. nanūktam - prātipadikārthagataṃ svam arthaṃ vibhaktiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4334: śrutyaivābhivadatīti{*3/80*}, yāga etad vākyena vidhāsyati, tatra vākyāc chrutir balīyasīty uktam. satyam, yatra śrauto 'bhisaṃbandho vivakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4335: avivakṣyamāṇe ca vākyāvagataḥ san aparyudasitavyo{*3/81*} bhavati, tasmād ekaḥ puṃpaśuś cālabhyata iti, grahaikatvaṃ na saṃmārgasyopakarotīti na grahaṃ śaknoti viśeṣṭum. tasmād avivakṣitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4339: *{3/81: E2,4: san na paryudasitavyo, E6: sann aparyudasitavyo}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4340: saṃskārād vā guṇānām avyavasthā syāt // MS_3,1.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4341: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ, tatra śrūyate - daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4342: tatraiṣo 'rtho 'dhigataḥ - sarve grahāḥ saṃmārjitavyā iti. idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ camasāpi saṃmārṣṭavyā uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4343: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? camasādy api sarvaṃ saṃmārjyam iti. kutaḥ? saṃyogato
GSP28msbh1-7u:4345: apūrvasaṃbandhaḥ, evaṃ camasānām api, yathaiva ca grahā asmin prakaraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4347: nanu grahāḥ śrūyante, te camasānāṃ nirvartakā bhaviṣyanti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4348: pradarśanārthaṃ grahagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati, grahādi somapātram, yasmin gṛhyamāṇaḥ somo vyavasicyeta, ity evam āśaṅkyate, tat sarvaṃ saṃmārjitavyam. yathā bhojanakālo vartate, sthālāni saṃmṛjyantām ity ukte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4349: yāni yāni bhojana upayogam arhanti, tāni tāni sarvāṇi saṃmṛjyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4350: sthālagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇārtham iti gamyate. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4351: ucyate - loke 'rthalakṣaṇaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ, yena yenārthaḥ saṃmṛṣṭena, ukto
GSP28msbh1-7u:4352: 'nukto vā sa sa{*3/84*} saṃmṛjyetaiva. iha tu vede śabdalakṣaṇaḥ, śabdaś ca grahasya saṃmārgam āha, tatra kim arthaṃ śrutau saṃbhavantyāṃ grahaśabdo lakṣaṇayā kalpyate. ucyate - saṃmārṣṭīti saṃmārge puruṣaprayatnaṃ vidhātum eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti śravaṇenaiva, grahasaṃbandhe tu vākyena, śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmāl lakṣaṇayā grahaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4353: varṇyate, na, yathāśruta iti, tena, yo yaḥ saṃmārjanasaṃskārārhaḥ sa sa saṃmārjitavyaḥ, neti{*3/85*} graheṣv eva vyavatiṣṭhetaivaṃjātīyako guṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4359: vyavasthā vārthasya śrutisaṃyogāt, tasya śabdapramāṇatvāt // MS_3,1.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4360: vyavatiṣṭheta vā graheṣv eva saṃmārgaḥ, na camaseṣv api prasajyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4361: kutaḥ? arthasya śrutisaṃyogāt, śrūyamāṇo hi graho notsraṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4362: utsṛjyamāne śrutir eva bādhyate graham iti, pramattagītaṃ tatra bhavatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:4363: ity avagamyate, na caitan nyāyyam. tasmād grahaśabdena grahaṃ lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārgasaṃbandho vidhīyate. na cāvidadhat saṃmārgam, śaknoti tatsaṃbandhaṃ vidhātum, ato vidadhāty evaiṣa śabdaḥ saṃmārgam. na ca śrutir bādhiṣyate. kutaḥ? saṃmārṣṭīti saṃmṛjigataṃ puruṣaprayatnaṃ śrutyā śaknoti vidhātum. na{*3/87*} tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ, utpādyamāne vā saṃmṛjau{*3/88*}, pareṇa vā saṃbadhyamāna iti. tena na grahasaṃbandhe 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4364: śrutir bādhitā bhavati, ato graheṣv eva saṃmārgo vyavasthātum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4365: nanv apūrvasaṃyogāviśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca camaseṣv api prasajyate, na graheṣv evāsya vidhānam ity uktam. atrocyate - prakaraṇavadbhir ekavākyatāṃ kṛtvā śaknoti tatra vidhātum, nākṛtvaikavākyatām. sā ca prakaraṇād anumīyate, iyaṃ punar grahaśabdena saha pratyakṣā, tasmān na prakaraṇe vidhānam, grahaikatvasaṃbandhe punar utsṛjya svārtham, na śaknoti vidhātum. tasmād vaiṣamyam grahaikatvavidhānena{*3/90*}. yad uktam - yathā sthālāni saṃmṛjyantām iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4366: lakṣaṇā, tadvad ihāpīti, parihṛtam etal loke karmārthaṃ lakṣaṇam{*3/91*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4375: vājapeye śrūyate - saptadaśāratnir vājapeyasya yūpo bhavatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saptadaśāratnitā vājapeyasyordhvapātre niviśate, uta paśor yūpe niviśata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ūrdhvapātra iti. kutaḥ? vājapeyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4376: yūpābhāvāt, yad vājapeyasyāsti pātraṃ yūpasadṛśam, tatra bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4377: asti ca ṣoḍaśipātram, tac ca khādiratvād ūrdhvatvāc ca yūpasadṛśam, tatra niveśe sati vājapeyaśabda āñjasyena bhavati, itarathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4378: vājapeyāṅgapaśuyāge{*3/93*} lakṣaṇayā vājapeyaśabdo vṛtta iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4379: nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇayordhvapātre. ucyate, sarvathā vayaṃ lakṣaṇāśabdān na mucyāmahe. matpakṣe tu vājapeyaprakaraṇam anugṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4381: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ānarthakyāt tadaṅgeṣu, vājapeyaśabdas tāvat somayāgaviśeṣavacanaḥ, tasya sākṣād yūpena na prayojanam, asti tu tasyāṅgaṃ paśuyāgaḥ, tasya tu paśuṃ bandhuṃ yūpena kāryam. sākṣād vājapeyayūpasya yadi saptadaśāratnitā vidhīyate, tasyābhāvād anarthakam eva vacanaṃ prāpnoti, tad anarthakaṃ mā bhūd iti yo 'sya paśuyāge yūpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4382: tatra niveśam arhati. ūrdhvapātre ca yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇayā syāt. nanv itarasminn api pakṣe vājapeyaśabdo lakṣaṇayeti. neti brūmaḥ, vājapeya eva vājapeyaśabdo bhaviṣyati, śakṣyati ca sa paśuyūpaṃ viśeṣṭum, so
GSP28msbh1-7u:4383: 'syāṅgasyopakārakaḥ, yaś ca yasyopakāriṇa upakaroti, bhavati sa tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4384: saṃbaddho mukhyenaiva saṃbandhena. na caikāntaritam iti kṛtvāsaṃbaddho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4385: bhavati, yathā devadattasya napteti, putreṇa cāsāv antaritaḥ, atha ca devadattena mukhyenaiva saṃbandhena saṃbaddhaḥ. tasmād eṣa eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:4386: [233]{*3/94*} pakṣa āśrayaṇīyaḥ, na hy etasmin pakṣe kaścid api
GSP28msbh1-7u:4390: kartṛguṇe tu karmāsamavāyād vākyabhedaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4391: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prayājavākye śrūyate - abhikrāmaṃ juhoty abhijityeti{*3/95*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim abhikramaṇaṃ prayājeṣv eva niviśata uta kṛtsne prakaraṇa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? kartṛguṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:4392: 'bhikramaṇe brūmaḥ - vākyabhedaḥ syād iti, karmaṇā karmaṇo 'samavāyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4393: abhikramaṇaṃ karmāmūrtam, na tat karma havanaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoti, tasmān na tenaikavākyatāṃ yāti. ataḥ sarvasmin prakaraṇe niviśate, saṃyogato
GSP28msbh1-7u:4395: nanv anenaiva hetunānyasminn api na nivekṣyate. ucyate - anyatra puruṣaiḥ saṃbhantsyate. nanu prayājeṣv api puruṣaiḥ saṃbadhyeta. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4396: juhḥtīti havana eṣa śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnaṃ vidhātuṃ śaknoti, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4397: puruṣābhikramaṇāsaṃbandham. nanv anyatrāpi puruṣābhikramaṇasaṃbandhasyāvidhānam. naiṣa doṣaḥ, anyatra prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgabhāve nirjñāte prayogavacano 'sya kartavyatāṃ vakṣyati. tasmāt sarvasmin prakaraṇe 'bhikramaṇasya niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4401: sākāṅkṣaṃ tv ekavākyaṃ syād asamāptaṃ hi pūrveṇa // MS_3,1.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4402: naitad asti - yad uktam abhikramaṇaṃ prakaraṇe niviśata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4403: prayā[234]{*3/97*}jeṣv eva bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ? taiḥ sahāsyaikavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4404: yataḥ sākāṅkṣam etat pūrveṇa padenāsamāptaṃ vākyam, abhikrāmaṃ juhotīty atra paryavasyati, prakaraṇāc ca vākyaṃ balavad iti prayājeṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:4405: evābhikramaṇaṃ niviśate. nanv abhikramaṇam amūrtatvād dhomanirvṛttāv asamartham ity uktam. ucyate, sākṣād asamartham, kartrā saṃbadhyamānaṃ śakṣyati nirvartayitum. katham? abhikramaṇena samāsīdaty āhavanīyaṃ kartā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4406: dvayam abhyupāyabhūtaṃ homasya, dūrād vābhiprasārya hastam, juhuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4407: samāsīded anvābhikramaṇena. tasmād abhikramaṇam upakaroti homasyety
GSP28msbh1-7u:4408: avagamyate. ataḥ prayājeṣv eva niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4410: saṃdigdhe tu vyavāyād vākyabhedaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.21 //
