GSP28msbh1-7u:4412: navame nividaḥ, daśame kāmyāḥ sāmidhenīkalpāḥ, idaṃ kāmasyaitāvatīr anubrūyāt, idaṃ kāmasyaitāvatīr iti, ekādaśe ca yajñopavītam āmnātam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4413: upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kuruta iti{*3/98*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sāmidhenīr evānubruvāṇa upavyayeta, uta prakaraṇe sarvān eva padārthān anutiṣṭhatā upavyātavyam iti. kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ? upavītaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇe samāmnātam, atha nivṛtte vā tāsāṃ prakaraṇa iti na jñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4414: nanu darśapūrṇamāsayor eva prakaraṇam idam, paraprakaraṇe sāmidhenyaḥ śrūyante. satyaṃ paraprakaraṇe śrūyante. tathāpi tāsām avāntaraprakaraṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4415: aparam, bhavati hi, sāmidhenīr anubrūyād iti viśeṣākāṅkṣaṃ vacanam, yena tatsaṃnidhāv abhidhīyamānaṃ tasyeti jñāyate. kathaṃ punar nivṛttaṃ tāsāṃ prakaraṇam ity āśaṅkyate? [235]{*3/99*} nivitpadāni tāsāṃ prakaraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4416: vyavadadhatīti. yady evam, katham anuvartate prakaraṇam ity āśaṅkā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4417: parastān nividām, sādmidhenīguṇā eva kāmyā vidhīyamānāḥ śrūyante, yad anantaraṃ yajñopavītam āmnātam, tenānivṛttaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇam iti bhavati matiḥ. ataḥ paraprakaraṇe nividaḥ samupanipatitā na vyavadadhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4418: yathā dvādaśopasattāhīnadharmo jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa iti. tena bhavati saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4419: asmin saṃdehe kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sāmidhenīprakaraṇam anivṛttam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4420: tatropavītaṃ samāmnātam iti. kutaḥ? kāmyānāṃ sāmidhenīkalpānām ānantaryavacanāt, hṛdayam anuviparivartamānāsu sāmidhenīṣu upavītam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4421: āmananti, kartuś ca vāsovinyāsamātraṃ guṇo bhavaty upavītaṃ nāma. kiṃ kurvatā tat kartavyam iti bhavati tatra padārthākāṅkṣā, tatra buddhau saṃnihitenāviprakṛṣṭena sāmidhenīvākyenaikavākyatāṃ upagamya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4422: sāmidhenīṣūpavītaṃ upavyayata ity eṣa śabdo vidadhātīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4423: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na, asmin saṃdehe yas tv ayoktaḥ, sa nirṇayaḥ. asmin saṃdehe vākyabheda iti nirṇaya iti. kutaḥ? vyavāyāt, iha samāptasya sānubandhasya sāmidhenīvākyasya, asya copavyayata iti vacanasya, nividāṃ vidhāyakena sāmidhenībhir asaṃbaddhena granthena vyavadhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4424: yasya ca paryavasite 'pi vacane tatsaṃbaddham evārthāntaraṃ prakramante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4425: na tatrānanuvṛttaṃ prakaraṇam, āgacchati hi tatsaṃbaddhābhidhāne hṛdayam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4426: yatra tu paryavasite vacane tadasaṃbaddham evārthāntaraṃ prakramante, na tatra buddhau pūrvaḥ padārthaḥ saṃnidhīyate. na ca, buddhāv asaṃnihitenaikavākyatā bhavati. dvābhyāṃ hi buddhābhyāṃ{*3/100*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4427: padārthābhyāṃ vākyārthaḥ saṃjanyate, nānyatareṇa, saṃnidhau samāmnānasyaitad eva prayojanam, katham ubhābhyāṃ padārthābhyāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ buddhim utpādayeyur iti. [236]{*3/101*} anantarāv abuddhena saha
GSP28msbh1-7u:4428: vākyārthaḥ śakyate kartum, asaṃbaddhapadoccāraṇe ca nānantarāv abuddho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4429: bhavati. tasmād vyavahitena saha naikavākyatā bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4430: athānyena prakāreṇa dhyānādinā pūrvapadārtham avagamya, vākyārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4431: saṃjanayet. avaidikaḥ sa puruṣabuddhir pūrvako vākyārtho bhavet, yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4432: anyasmād anuvākād ākhyātapadaṃ gṛhītvā, anyasmāc ca nāmapadaṃ yo vākyārthaḥ saṃjanyate, tādṛśaṃ tad bhavet, yatrānyena dhyānādinā pūrvapadārtham avagamya, vākyārthaṃ saṃjanayet. tasmān nāsaṃbaddhārthavyavadhānaikavākyatā bhavatīti niścīyate. tasmān na sāmidhenībhir ekavākyatopavītasyeti. nanu sāmidhenīkalpānām anantarabuddhānāṃ saṃnidhāv upavītam āmnāyate, tena sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbhantsyata iti. neti brūmaḥ - ativṛttam eva hi sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ nivitpadair vyavadhānāt. vākyena hi sāmidhenīkalpāḥ kāmyāḥ saṃbandham upagacchanti, na prakaraṇam anuvartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4433: na ca, punaḥ kalpavacanena sāmidhenyaḥ prakṛtā bhavanti. na hi, tatra tāsāṃ vacanaṃ kartavyā iti. kiṃ tarhi? saṃkhyābhiḥ saṃbandhayitavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4434: tad api vākyena, na prakaraṇena. tatrāprakṛtāsu samidhenīṣu yasyaikavākyatā guṇasya sāmidhenībhir nāsti, na tasya tābhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4435: tasmāt{*3/102*} prakaraṇe{*3/103*} yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad yajñopavītineti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4443: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād asaṃbandhaḥ samatvāt syāt // MS_3,1.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4445: ca śrūyante - tasmād vāraṇo vai yajñāvacaraḥ syāt, na tv etena juhuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4446: vaikaṅkato yajñāvacaraḥ syāj juhuyād eteneti. na ca vāraṇavaikaṅkatānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4447: pātrāṇām agnyādheyena saṃbandhaḥ. kutaḥ? yajñāv acaravacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4448: yajñasyaitāni pātrāṇi, vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā bhavanti. tatraiṣa saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pavam āneṣṭiṣu niviśante, uta darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu sarvayāgeṣv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? pavamānahaviḥṣv iti. kutaḥ? uktam etat pradhāne 'saṃbhavan padārthas tadguṇe kalpyata iti, agnyādheyaprakaraṇe ca samāmnānāt pavamānahaviṣāṃ tadguṇatā. tasmāt pavamānahaviḥṣv ity evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4450: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇānāṃ samatvāt, pavamānahaviṣām agnyādheyasya ca na paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. yathādhānam agner guṇaḥ saṃskārārthaḥ, evaṃ pavamānahavīṃṣy apy agner eva guṇabhūtāni. kas tatra paraspareṇa saṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:4451: iti. yad uktam - ādhānasya prakaraṇe samāmnāyanta iti, yady api samāmnāyante, tathāpi prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyenāgner bhavanti. kim iha vākyam? yad āhavanīye juhoti{*3/105*} tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4452: nanv āhavanīyo 'tra yāgasyādhikaraṇatvena guṇabhūtaḥ śrūyate. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4453: adhikaraṇam āhavanīyaḥ, tathāpi tv āhavanīyārtha eva yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4454: prayojanavattvād āhavanīyasya niṣprayojanatvāt pavamānahaviṣām. katham eṣāṃ niṣprayojanatā? phalāśravaṇāt. kalpyaṃ phalam iti cet. satyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4455: kalpyam, agnisaṃskāras tu tatphalam, na svargaḥ, svarge kalpyamāne dvir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4456: adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta, homāc ca [238]{*3/106*} svargo bhavati, tasya cāhavanīyenāparo 'dṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāra iti. tasmād agnyarthatā pavamānahaviṣām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4457: naiṣām ādhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nādhāne śrūyamāṇam, pavamānahaviṣāṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ tarhi sarvayāgeṣu darśapūrṇamāsaprabhṛtiṣv ādhānasya pradhānabhūteṣu niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4461: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - vārtraghnī paurṇamāsyām anūcyete, vṛdhanvaty amāv asyāyām iti{*3/107*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim anuvākyādvitvasya pradhāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:4462: niveśaḥ, utājyabhāgayor iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? pradhāna iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4463: paurṇamāsīsamabhivyāhārāt, amāv asyāsamabhivyāhārāc ca. pradhānaṃ paurṇamāsī cāmāv asyā ca nājyabhāgau. tasmāt sākṣād vākyāt pradhānasyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4465: tatra brūmaḥ - mithaḥ saha dvābhyām anuvākyābhyāṃ na pradhānasya kāryam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4466: asti, yatra tu dva anuvākye, tatra tayor vārtraghnatā vṛdhanvattā ca vidhīyate, pradhāne caikānuvākyā, tatra dvitvaṃ vārtraghnatāṃ vṛdhanvattāṃ ca vidadhad vākyaṃ bhidyeta. ājyabhāgayos tu dve prāpte āgneyī saumī ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4467: tatra vārtraghnatāṃ vṛdhanvattāṃ kevalāṃ śakṣyati vidhātum. nanu pradhānagāmitve 'pi dvayoḥ pradhānayor dve anuvākye, āgneyasyāgnīṣomīyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4468: ceti. ucyate - ekā [239]{*3/108*} vārtraghny āgneyī, ekā saumī, tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4469: vṛdhanvatyai, tatra yāgneyī, sā vidhīyamānā saṃbadhyeta na saumī. amāv asyāyāṃ tāvan nāsty eva{*3/109*}, paurṇamāsyām apy agnīṣomīya eva kriyamāṇe kriyeta, tatrāpy ekadevatyā na śaknuyād devatādvitve kāryaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4470: kartum. athobha agnīṣomīye prāpte iti. na, ekasya yāgasya dvābhyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:4471: anuvākyābhyāṃ prayojanam. upādeyatvena hy anuvākyā codyate, tatraikatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4472: vivakṣitam, tena tatrāpi na dve. tasmād ājyabhāgayor niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4477: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - muṣṭīkaroti, vācaṃ yacchati, dīkṣitam āvedayatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4478: tathā hastāv avanenikte, ulaparājiṃ stṛṇātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaś cāvedanārtham, uta kṛtsnaprakaraṇe niveśa iti tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4479: hastāv anejanaṃ kim ulaparājiṃ staritum, uta prakaraṇe sarvapadārthān
GSP28msbh1-7u:4480: kartum iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? hastāv anejanaṃ hastasaṃskārārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4481: vāgyamaḥ puruṣasaṃskārārthaḥ, āmantrayamāṇa ekāgro bhavati, padārthān
GSP28msbh1-7u:4482: anutiṣṭhati, tena keṣāṃ keṣāṃ padārthānām ime{*3/110*} saṃskārāv ity ākāṅkṣāsti, satyām ākāṅkṣāyām ānantaryeṇa nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇam. tasmād ānantaryād āvedanārtho vāgyamo muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ ca, hastāv anejanaṃ colaparājiṃ staritum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4483: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvaiḥ prakaraṇādhītaiḥ saṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4485: arthadvayasyābhidhānāt. na hi, dīkṣitam āvedayitum ity asminn artha āvedayatīti, na ca staritum ity asminn arthe stṛṇātīti. staraṇam api vidhīyate 'vanejanaṃ ca. muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaś ca vidhīyate, āvedanaṃ ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4486: na ca, eṣāṃ paraspareṇa kaścit saṃbandho 'sti, na ca, padārthākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyām ānantaryam ekavākyatve kāraṇaṃ bhavati, tasmāt prakaraṇadharmā evaṃjātīyakāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4490: svena svena padasamūhena paripūrṇam ekaṃ vākyam, tathāparam, tathā sarvāṇi yāny udāhṛtāni. tasmād vispaṣṭam arthadvayam, vibhāge ca nirākāṅkṣatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4491: tena vākyabhedaḥ. ataḥ saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/112*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4495: śeṣas tu guṇasaṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyeta mithas teṣām asaṃbandhāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4496: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate - āgneyaṃ caturdhā karotīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim āgneye 'gnīṣomīye aindrāgne{*3/113*} ca sarvatra caturdhākaraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4497: kiṃ vāgneya eveti. kiṃ prāptam? śeṣaś caturdhākaraṇam, āgneyam iti devatāguṇasaṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyate, agnīṣomīye 'pi syāt, aindrāgne
GSP28msbh1-7u:4498: 'pi. kutaḥ? tāv apy āgneyau, yasyāgnir devatā, anyā ca bhavati, asāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:4499: āgeyaḥ. tad yathā, yā ḍitthasya ḍavitthasya ca mātā, sā ḍavitthasya [241]{*3/114*} bhavati, evam ihāpi. yady āgneyāgnīṣomasya ca puroḍāśasya mithaḥ saṃbandho na bhavet, tata āgneya eva caturdhākaraṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4500: bhavati tu saṃbandhaḥ, tasmād avyavasthā, yathāgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4501: prāśitram avadyatīti sarvebhyaḥ prāśitrāv adānam, evaṃ caturdhākaraṇam api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4504: vyavasthā vārthasaṃyogāl liṅgasyārthena saṃbandhāl lakṣaṇārthā guṇaśrutiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4505: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, vyavatiṣṭheta vā caturdhākaraṇam āgneya eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4506: na sādhāraṇaṃ bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ? arthasaṃyogāt, agninā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4508: dvidaivatyasyāgnīṣomīyasyaindrāgnasya{*3/116*} ceti. kutaḥ? yasya hy agnīṣomau devatā, ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kriyate, tasyāgniḥ somam apekṣamāṇo devatā, na nirapekṣaḥ, yasya cāgniḥ somam apekṣamāṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4509: devatā, na tasmāt taddhita utpadyate, samarthānāṃ hi sa ucyate, sāpekṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4512: tatraiva caturdhākaraṇam iti, devatāliṅgasya hi sāmartyena saṃyogo bhavati taddhitārthasya, nāsati sāmarthye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4513: atha yad uktam, yathā{*3/119*} prāśitrāv adānaṃ sarvebhyaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4514: evaṃ{*3/120*} caturdhākaraṇam apīti, yuktaṃ prāśitrāv adānena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4515: tatraiva{*3/121*} saṃbandhaḥ kriyate, āgneyasya prāśitram avadyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4516: kathaṃ tarhi, āgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajyeti. ekaṃ hy etad vākyaṃ prāśitram avadyatīti, dvitīyam āgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajyeti, tatrāgneyasya mastakād avadyatīti gamyate, anyasya mastakāt, anyasmād vety aniyamaḥ. yadi tu tatra kevalāgnidaivatyo{*3/122*} nābhaviṣyat, tadānarthakyaparihārāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4518: [242]{*3/125*} yat tu, ḍitthasya māteti, yuktaṃ tatrāvyāsaṅgi mātṛtvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4519: tato jāto ḍitthaḥ, etāvatā saṃbandhena, mātety ucyate, nātra kiṃcid apekṣyate. sa ca tāvāṃs tatra saṃbandho 'stīti ḍitthasya māteti yuktaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4528: *{3/121: E2: adāne. na tatraivaṃ, E4: adāne. tatraivaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4532: arthabhidhānasāmarthyān mantreṣu śeṣabhāvaḥ syāt tasmād utpattisaṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4534: iha mantrā udāharaṇam - bahirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyevamādayaḥ. kiṃ mukhya evābhidheye mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaḥ, uta gauṇe 'pīti. kaḥ punar mukhyaḥ ko vā gauṇa iti. ucyate - yaḥ śabdād evāvagamyate, sa prathamo 'rtho mukhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4535: mukham iva bhavatīti mukhya ity ucyate. yas tu khalu pratītād arthāt kenacit saṃbandhena gamyate, sa paścād bhāvāj jaghanam iva bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4537: yady evaṃ sarva eva mukhyaḥ, sarvo hi śabdād gamyate, yathaiva hy agnir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4538: jvalatīty ukte jvalane saṃpratyayaḥ{*3/127*}, evam evāgnir māṇavaka iti śabda evoccārite māṇavake saṃpratyayaḥ. athocyate, yasmin nirupapadāc chabdāt saṃpratyayaḥ sa mukhyaḥ, yasmin sopapadāt sa gauṇa iti. naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:4539: yuktam. yasya hi śabdasya rūpaṃ kasyacid arthasya nimittam, sopapadasyāpi tad eva rūpam, nirupapadasyāpi. na ca śakyaṃ nimitte sati naimittikena na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4540: bhavitum. kim ataḥ? yady evam, idaṃ na śakyate vaditum - upapadād ṛte na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4541: so 'rtho bhavati, upapade tu saṃjāte so 'rthaḥ saṃjaniṣyata iti. na cāsau samudāyārthaḥ śakyate vijñātum. anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hi vibhāgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4542: 'vagamyate. atha, vāk-yārtho 'yam ity ucyate. naivaṃ śakyam, na hy ananvitaḥ padārtho bhavati [244]{*3/128*} vākyārthaḥ. tad evaṃ dṛśyatām -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4543: agniśabda evāyaṃ jvalanavacanaḥ, agniśabda eva māṇavakasyābhidhāteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4544: tasmān na gauṇo mukhya iti kaścid viśeṣaḥ. athocyate, yaḥ suṣṭhu prasiddhaḥ sa mukhyaḥ, yo manāg iva sa gauṇa iti. idam api nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4545: prasiddhir nāma prajñānam, na ca prajñāne kaścid viśeṣo 'sti. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4546: yasya bahuśaḥ prayogo 'sti sa mukhyaḥ, alpaśaḥ prayujyamāno gauṇa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4547: naitad evam, alpaśo 'pi prayujyamāno nāsati sāmarthye pratyāyayet. ataḥ so 'pi śabdāt pratīyata iti mukhya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4548: atrocyate - asty atra viśeṣaḥ, māṇavako nāgniśabdāt pratīyate. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:4549: avagamyate? uktam - anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. kathaṃ na viparyayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4550: ucyate - anādṛtyaiva māṇavakapratyayaṃ jvalanam agniśabdāt pratiyanto dṛśyante. na tv anādṛtya jvalanam{*3/129*}, mānavakam agniśabdāt pratiyanti. kuta etat? yo yo 'gnisadṛśo vivakṣyate, tatra tatrāgniśabdo niyata iti. ata eva vigatasādṛśyād ayaṃ tu dṛśyate. ato 'gnisādṛśyam asya pravṛttau nimittaṃ na ca jvalane 'pratīte tatsādrṛśyaṃ pratīyate. tasmāj jvalanasyāgniśabdo nimittam, na māṇavakasya. tasmāj jvalane mukhyo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4551: māṇavake. evam eva tṛṇapratyayasya barhiḥśabdo nimittam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4552: tṛṇasadṛśapratyayasya. tad evaṃ dvaite sati mukhyaparatā śabdasya, uta gauṇaparatāpīti yukto vicāraḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? mukhye gauṇe ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:4553: viniyogaḥ. kutaḥ? ubhayasya śakyatvād ubhayam api barhiḥśabdena śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:4554: pratyāyayitum, tṛṇaṃ ca tṛṇasadṛśaṃ ca, tṛṇaṃ sākṣāt, tṛṇasadṛśaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4555: tṛṇapratyayena. yac ca nāma darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sādhanabhūtena barhiḥśabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4556: śakyate pratyāyayitum, tat sarvaṃ pratyāyayitavyam, vinigamanāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4558: [245]{*3/130*} api caivam āśrīyamāṇe pūṣādyanumantraṇādīni darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ notkṛṣyante{*3/131*}, tatraiva gauṇenābhidhānena prakṛtāṃ devatām abhivadiṣyanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4559: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - mukhya eva viniyoktavyo mantro na gauṇa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4560: ubhayāśakyatvāt, prakaraṇe hi samāmnānāt pradhānenaikavākyatām upaiti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4561: tatraitad āpatati yac chaknuyād anena mantreṇa sādhayitum, tathā sādhayed iti. sa cāsāv arthābhidhānasaṃyogāc chaknoty upakartum, na gauṇam arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4562: śakyoty abhidhātum, tasmān na gauṇe viniyogaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4563: nanu mukhyapratyayāc chakyate gauṇaḥ pratyāyayitum. satyam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4564: mukhyapratyāyanenaivāsya prayojanavattā nirvṛtteti na gauṇaṃ prati viniyoge kiṃcit pramāṇam asti. mukhye viniyogena tv ānarthakyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4565: parihriyate, parihṛta ānarthakye na gauṇābhidhānam āpatati. na hy anabhidhāya mukhyam, gauṇam abhivadati śabdaḥ. ataḥ pramāṇābhāvān na gauṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:4567: api ca gauṇasya pratyāyane sāmarthyād bahavo 'bhyupāyāḥ prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4568: sāmarthyaṃ ca śabdaikadeśa ity uktam - arthād vā kalpanaikadeśātvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:4569: iti{*3/132*}, tatra mantre niyogato gauṇaṃ prati viniyujyamāna
GSP28msbh1-7u:4570: upāyāntaram, vinā pramāṇena bādhyeta. mantrāmnānaṃ pramāṇam iti cet. na tasyopāyāntaranivṛttau sāmarthyam asti. nanu mukhye 'pi viniyujyamānsyaiṣa eva doṣaḥ. nety ucyate - yadi mukhye 'pi na viniyujyeta, naiva pradhānasyopakuryāt tatra cāsyotpattir anarthikaiva syāt. tasmād asti gauṇe mukhye ca viśeṣaḥ. api ca yo gauṇe mantraṃ viniyuṅkte, sa vaktavyaḥ - kim arthaṃ mukhyaṃ pratyāyayasi [246]{*3/133*} iti. sa ced brūyāt -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4572: gauṇapratyayasyābhyupāyāḥ santīti. atha sa evam abhiyuktaḥ pratibrūyāt -mukhyapratyayo 'pi pākṣiko 'bhyupāya iti, brūyād enam - na tarhi niyogato
GSP28msbh1-7u:4573: gauṇe viniyojanīyaḥ, yadā gauṇapratyayāya mukham upādatte, tadaitad āpatitaṃ bhavati, mukhya eva viniyoga iti. arthena ca pratītena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4574: prayojanam, na pratyāyakena mantreṇa, ato 'nyenāpy upāyena gauṇaḥ praty-āyayitavyaḥ, na sa eva mantra ādartavyaḥ. athāpi mantreṇa pratyāyakena prayojanaṃ syāt, tathāpi mukhyapratyāyanenaiva nirvṛttaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4575: prayojanam iti natarāṃ gauṇe viniyujyeta. tasmān mukhyagauṇayor mukhye
GSP28msbh1-7u:4583: atha yad uktam - pūṣādyanumantraṇādīnām utkarṣo na bhaviṣyatīti, yuktas teṣām utkarṣaḥ, saṃskārako hi mantraḥ, so 'sati saṃskārye 'narthaka iti yatrārthavāṃs tatra nāyayiṣyate. na ca kaścid doṣo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4584: vacanāt tv ayathārtham aindrī syāt // MS_3,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4585: agnau śrūyate - niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnām ity aindryā gārhapatyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4586: upatiṣṭhata iti{*3/134*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim indrasyopasthānaṃ kartavyam, uta gārhapatyasyeti. kutaḥ punar gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata ity evaṃ vispaṣṭe vacane saṃśaya iti. ucyate, [247]{*3/135*} yad dhi{*3/136*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4588: samīpasthānamātram, na ca, aindreṇa mantreṇāgner abhidhānaṃ śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:4589: kartum. ato gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti na gārhapatyārtham upasthānam etad iti jāyeta śaṅkā - gārhapatya upasthānārtho bhaved iti, tādṛśaś ca śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4590: nāsti, tṛtīyāntaḥ saptamyanto vā. tasmād vicāraḥ - katham upapannaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4591: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sāmarthyād indropasthānam, aśakyatvāc ca gārhaptyopasthānasya. kathaṃ dvitīyā vibhaktir iti cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4592: avivaksitepsitārthā vā saṃbandhamātrapradhānā. yad vopasthānaviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhād gārhapatyaśabdaḥ. tasmād gārhapatyaviśiṣṭam upasthānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4593: indrārthaṃ kartavyam iti. gārhapatyaś ca deśena viśiṃṣyān mukhyam eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:4595: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vacanāt tv ayathārtham aindrī syāt. naitad astīndrārtham upasthānam iti, ayathārtham aindrī syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4596: vacanasāmarthyāt, vacanam idaṃ bhavati, aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata
GSP28msbh1-7u:4597: iti, gārhapatye dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ prādhānyam āha, kim iva vacanaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4598: kuryāt, nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. tasmād gārhapatyārtham upasthānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4603: guṇād vāpy abhidhānaṃ syāt saṃbandhasyāśāstrahetutvāt // MS_3,2.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4604: atrāha nanv etad uktam - naindreṇa mantreṇa gārhapatyopasthānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4605: bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, vacanād bhaviṣyati. āha - na vacanaśatenāpi śakyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4606: etat, indraśabdenāgninaṃ pratyāyayed iti bruvan vihanyeta, yathāgninā siñced iti{*3/138*}, udakena dīpayed iti, na hi śāstrahetukaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bhavati. nityau 'sau lokato 'vagamyata ity uktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4607: autpa[248]{*3/139*}ttikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandha iti{*3/140*}. nanu śabdalakṣaṇo 'pi bhavati śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kṛtrimaḥ, yathā devadatto yajñadatta iti. bhavati kaścit, yatra saṃbandhasya vidhāyakaṃ vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4608: bhavati, na tv etad vākyaṃ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4610: gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti. na ca śakyate paraśabdena paro vaditum. kim atra vacanaṃ kariṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4611: atrocyate - guṇād vāpy abhidhānaṃ syāt saṃbandhasyāśāstrahetutvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4612: yady api nedaṃ vākyaṃ śabdārthasaṃbandhasya vidhāne hetubhūtam, tathāpy anenendraśabdena śakyaṃ kartum - gārhapatyābhidhānam. kutaḥ? guṇasaṃyogād gauṇam idam abhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati, bhavati hi guṇād apy abhidhānam, yathā siṃho devadattaḥ, agnir māṇavaka iti. evam ihāpy anindre gārhapatya indraśabdo bhaviṣyati, asti cāsyendrasādṛśyam{*3/141*}, yathaivendro
GSP28msbh1-7u:4613: yajñasādhanam, evaṃ gārhapatye 'pīti. athavā indrater aiśvaryakarmaṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4614: indro bhavati, bhavati ca gārhapatyasyāpi svasmin kārya īśvaratvam. tasmād indraśabdena yaḥ pratyāyate 'rthaḥ sa pratītaḥ sādṛśyād gārhapatyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4615: pratyāyayiṣyati, aiśvaryād vā pratyāyayiṣyatīti na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4621: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatredaṃ samāmnāyate - haviṣkṛd ehi [249]{*3/142*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4622: iti trir avaghnann āhvayatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣa mantro 'vahantiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4623: pratyupadiśyate, uta hantir asya kālaṃ lakṣayatīti. kathaṃ hantiṃ pratyupadiśyate? kathaṃ vā kālaṃ lakṣayet? yady evaṃ saṃbandhaḥ kriyeta -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4624: haviṣkṛd ehīty avaghnann iti, tato hantiṃ pratyupadiśyate, athāvaghnann
GSP28msbh1-7u:4625: āhvayatīti, tato 'sya kālaṃ lakṣyatīti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tathāhvānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4626: api, yathaindrī gārhapatyaṃ pratyupadiśyate, evam eṣa mantro hantiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4627: pratyupadiśyate. evaṃ śrutir anugṛhītā bhavati, itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4628: hantikālasya mantrasya ca saṃbandho bhavet, na hanter mantrasya. evaṃ ca satyāhvayatīty ayam anuvādaḥ, āhvānaṃ karoti, yo hy ehīti brūte sa āhvayati, tatra kenacid guṇena mantro hantiṃ pratyāyayiṣyati, tasmān nāhvāne viniyoktavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4631: naitad asti - hantiṃ pratyupadiśyata iti. kiṃ tarhi? kālalakṣaṇā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4632: kutaḥ? trir āhvayatīti tritvam atra vidhīyate, yady asminn eva vākye mantro vidhīyeta, anekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmān naivam abhisaṃbandha evam avaghnann iti. kathaṃ tarhi, avaghnann āhvayatīti. nanv asminn api pakṣe mantro vidhīyate kālaś ca, tatra sa eva doṣo bhavet. neti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4633: brūmaḥ, avahananakāla evārthena haviṣkṛd āhvātavyā, tatrāyam eva saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4634: 'nūdyate. kevalā tu trir āvṛttir vidhīyate. yat tu kālalakṣaṇārthaḥ śabda
GSP28msbh1-7u:4635: iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, laukikī hi lakṣaṇā. mantro 'pi ca rūpād evāhvāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:4636: prāptaḥ, so 'py anūdyata eva, coditaś ca vākyāntareṇāvaghātaḥ śaknoti kālaṃ lakṣayitum. tasmād āhvāne viniyoktavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4639: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*3/144*}. atha kasmān na guṇād avahantiṃ brūte?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4640: haviṣkaroti hy avahantiḥ, tasmād dhaviṣkṛt. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati? rūpād evāvahantau mantre prāpte kevalaṃ trir āvṛttim eva vakṣyati na bhaviṣyati vākyabheda iti. atrocyate - guṇābhāvād gauṇam abhidhānam avahantau na saṃbhavatīti. na hy asāv āhūto 'smīty avagacchati, tatrādṛṣṭārtham āhvānaṃ syāt. yajamānasya patnyāṃ haviṣkṛti dṛṣṭārtham āhvānam. tasmān na hantimantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4642: *{3/144: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in E1 geklammert}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4644: liṅgaṃ ca bhavati - vāg vai haviṣkṛd vācam evaitad āhvayatīti{*3/145*}, na ca vāco 'vahantinā sādṛśyam asti, asti tu yajamānasya patnyā, sā hi strī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4645: vāg iti ca strīliṅgaḥ śabdaḥ, avahantis tu na strī na pumān na napuṃsakam iti. nanv avahanter api strīliṅgaḥ śabdo 'sti, kriyeti. atra brūmaḥ - na niyogato 'vahanteḥ strīliṅgaḥ śabdaḥ, puṃliṅgo 'pi tasyāsti, avaghāta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4646: napuṃsakasiṅgo 'pi, karmeti. api ca, patnyāḥ svarūpeṇa sādṛśyam, avahanteḥ pararūpeṇa śabdena. tasmāt patnyāṃ haviṣkṛti liṅgam anurūpataraṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4650: avahantimantre saty asmin mantre vidhyantarakopaḥ syāt. apahataṃ rakṣa ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:4651: avahanty apahatā yātudhānā ity avahantīti. tatra pakṣe 'bhāvān nityavac chrūtir upadhyeta. tasmād avaghnann [251]{*3/146*} iti kālalakṣaṇārtha iti. mantro 'py ahvānārtha iti{*3/147*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4655: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - uttiṣṭhann anvāha, agnīd agnīn vihara iti. tathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4656: vrataṃ kṛṇuteti vācaṃ visṛjatīti{*3/148*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim utthānaṃ vāgvisarjanaṃ ca prati mantrayor upadeśaḥ, uta kālārthaḥ saṃyoga iti. atra pūrvādhikaraṇyāyo 'tidiśyate. yas tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, sa iha pūrvaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4657: pakṣaḥ. yas tatra siddhāntaḥ, sa iha siddhāṇtaḥ. agnīd agnīn ity evam uttiṣṭhann anvāheti, vrataṃ kṛṇutety evaṃ vācaṃ visṛjatīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4658: lakṣaṇābhāvāt, uttiṣṭhann anvāheti siddhānte saṃbandhaḥ. vrataṃ kṛṇutety ucyamāne vācaṃ visṛjatīti. vākyena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, liṅgena siddhāntaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4659: yady api ca śakyate, utthānakriyāgnīd agnīn vihareti vaktum, utthānenāgnir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4660: idhyate, vahniś ca vihriyata iti. vrataṃ kṛṇuteti ca vāgabhidhānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4661: tathāpy adṛṣṭārthaṃ vacanaṃ bhavatīti na mantrayor utthānavisarjanārthatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4662: kalpyeta. kalpyamānāyāṃ ca mantrāntaraṃ vihitaṃ bādhyeta - yāḥ paśūnām ṛṣabho vāca iti. api cotthānavāgvisargau prati mantrau vidhīyamānāv adṛṣṭārthau syātām, preṣaṇe tu dṛṣṭhārthau. tal{*3/149*} lakṣaṇaivātra
GSP28msbh1-7u:4669: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sūktavākaḥ prastaraprakaraṇaṃ pratyupadiśyate, uteyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4670: kālalakṣaṇeti. tad ucyate - kālalakṣaṇeti. kutaḥ? sūktavākasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4671: devatāsaṃkīrtanārthatvāt, prastaraprakaraṇaṃ ca pratyaśakteḥ, prastarasya ca srugdhāraṇārthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4674: upadeśo vā yājyāśabdo hi nākasmāt // MS_3,2.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4675: upadeśo vā prastaraprakaraṇaṃ prati mantrasya syāt, evaṃ śrutivihito 'rtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4676: bhavati, sūktavākeneti karaṇavibhaktisaṃyogāt, itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4677: sūktavākena lakṣaṇena prastaraṃ prahared iti. evaṃ ca kṛtvā yājyā śabda upapanno bhavati, sūktavāka eva yājyā, prastara āhutir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4679: yad uktam - devatāsaṃkīrtane sūktavākaḥ samarthaḥ, na prastaraprakaraṇa iti. ucyate - na{*3/152*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4680: devatāvacanaḥ{*3/153*} parkaraṇena saṃbadhyate, prakaraṇaṃ hi yajiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4681: māntravarṇiko devatāvidhiḥ, evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ. agnir idaṃ havir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4682: ajuṣatāvīvṛdhata ity{*3/154*} evaṃ devatām anukramya, āśāste 'yaṃ yajamāna
GSP28msbh1-7u:4683: ity{*3/155*} uktvā, idam idam āśāsta iti ca yad anena haviṣāśāste tad asya syād [253]{*3/156*} iti{*3/157*} prastaraṃ havir nirdiśati, agnyādīṃś ca devatāviśeṣān, tena praharatir yajatiḥ. evaṃ sūktavākena prastaraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4684: prahartuṃ śakyate, yadi praharatir yajatiḥ, agnyādidevatākaś ca. tasmāt sūktavākasya haratisaṃyogo 'pi devatārthatā ghaṭata eva. yady agnir idaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4685: havir ajuṣatāvī vṛdhata ityevamādy eva śrūyeta. na, āśāste 'yaṃ yajamāna ityevamādīny aparāṇi, tato 'gnyādaya eveṣṭā nāntaritā ity eva paryavasitaṃ vākyaṃ bhavet. yatas tu khalv āśāste 'yaṃ yajamāna ityevamādīny aparāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4686: śrūyante, teneha paryavasānam, agnyādayaḥ puroḍāśādibhir iṣṭāḥ, aparaṃ tu yajamāna āśāste. tad anena prastareṇa prāpnuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4687: nanu satsv apy eteṣu devatāsaṃkīrtana eva paryavasyet, puroḍāśādibhir iṣṭā agnyādayaḥ, tata eva yajamāna āyur ādīny apy āśāsānaḥ prāpnuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4688: ucyate - ubhayathā saṃbandhe sati praharaṇe viniyoktavyaḥ, liṅaṃ ca na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4690: athavāgnir idaṃ havir ajuṣateti prastara eva havir nidiśyate. evam idam iti saṃnihitavacanam upapannaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4697: pratipattir iti cet, sviṣṭakṛdvad ubhayasaṃskāraḥ syāt // MS_3,2.14
GSP28msbh1-7u:4698: atha srugdhāraṇe viniyuktasya prastarasya prakaraṇaṃ pratiprattir ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:4699: ucyate. tatra prativacanam -sviṣṭakṛdvad etat syād iti, yathā, ijyārthāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:4700: puroḍāśāt, vacanaprāmāṇyāt sviṣṭakṛd ijyate, yāgaś ca sa bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4701: pratipādyate ca puroḍāśaḥ, evaṃ [254]{*3/159*} pratipādyetaiva hi prastaraḥ, yāgaś ca nirvartyata iti na doṣaḥ. pratipādyamāno 'pi hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:4702: tyajyate. pratyakṣataḥ pratipādyate, vacanād ijyāṃ sādhayatīty evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4705: *{3/158: E2,4 spalten MS 3.2.14 in zwei Sūtras, dadurch weicht nun auch ihre Zählung ab: pratipattir iti cet // MS_3,2.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4706: atha srugdhāraṇe viniyuktasya prastarasya prakaraṇaṃ pratiprattir ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:4707: ucyate. sviṣṭakṛdvad ubhayasaṃskāraḥ syāt // MS_3,2.15 // tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:4710: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ prayoktavyaḥ, kṛtsno
GSP28msbh1-7u:4711: 'māvāsyāyām, uta yathāsāmarthyaṃ niṣkṛṣya yathāyathaṃ prayoga iti. tad ucyate - ubhayatra sarvavacanam iti. kutah? kṛtsno hi mantraḥ sūktavāka ity ucyate, sa padenāpi vinā, sūktavāko na syāt, tatra sūktavākena na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4712: prahṛtaṃ bhavet. tasmād ubhayatra kṛtsnaḥ sūktavāko vaditavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4716: ye paurṇamāsīdevatātāvācinaḥ śabdāḥ, te paurṇamāsyāṃ prayoktavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4718: śeṣabhūtam arthaṃ saṃskurvanto mantrā upakurvanti, nānyathety uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4719: tasmād ye yatropakurvanti, te tatra prayoktavyā iti na kṛtsnaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4722: atha yad uktam - vacanam idaṃ bhaviṣyati, sūktavākena praharati [255]{*3/161*} iti. tatra padenāpy ūnena na sūktavākena prahṛtaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4727: ubhe paurṇamāsyamāvāsye prati eṣa kṛtsnaśabdaḥ, ubhayoḥ prakaraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4728: ubhayor asau kṛtsna ucyate, avayave 'vayava iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4729: naitad evam, na hi sāpekṣāṇām itikartavyatayā saṃbandhaḥ. na hītikartavyataitad viśiṣṭā śrūyate, itikartavyatāviśiṣṭās tv ete gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4730: kutaḥ? na hītikartavyatāṃ prati karmaṇi vidhīyaṇte, phalaṃ prati teṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4731: vidhiḥ, itikartavyatā tu karmaṇāṃ vidhīyate, tatra saṃnidhānāviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4732: kasya kiṃ vidhīyate, kasya neti na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. sādhanatvena ca sarveṣāṃ nirdeśād itikartavyatāyāḥ saṃnidhānāc ca, vacanāc cāsya{*3/162*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4733: prakaraṇaliṅgasyāviśeṣāt, ekaikasya kṛtsnaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nirākāṅkṣasya, na sahāyam apekṣamāṇasya. tasmād ekaikaṃ prati kṛtsnaḥ sūktavāka upadiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4734: sa vibhāge 'pi pradhānānām, kṛtsna eva prayoktavya iti yāni yatrānarthakāni padāni, tāny api tatra prayoktavyāny adṛṣṭāya bhaviṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4735: sūktavākena praharatīti vacanāt, nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ, guṇena vā kenacid abhidhānaṃ tāsāṃ devatānāṃ nirvartayiṣyantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4736: atrocyate, naitad evam. uktam - mukhyam eva kāryaṃ mantrāṇām, na gauṇam iti{*3/163*}, saṃskārārthatvād votkarṣo{*3/164*} nyāyyaḥ, na gauṇam abhidhānam iti. kas tarhi kṛtsnasaṃyogasya samādhir ucyata iti. eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4737: samādhiḥ, na hy etad ekaṃ vākyam, yaḥ [256]{*3/165*} kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4738: bahūny etāni vākyāni, yeṣāṃ pradhānadevatābhidhāyīni padāni madhye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4739: sādhāraṇāni tantrapadāni purastād uccāryante, tathā parastāt. yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4740: agnir idaṃ havir ajuṣatāvī vṛdhata mahojyāyokṛtāgnīṣomāvidaṃ havir ajuṣetām avī vṛdhetām ityevamādīni{*3/166*}. teṣāṃ purastāt tantram -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4741: yathā, idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivīti, parastād api yathā, asyāmṛdhed iti. tāny etāni sarvāṇi sūktavacanena sūktavākaśabdaṃ labhyante. na ca teṣāṃ samudāyaḥ kiṃcid arthaṃ vadati. tasmān na samudāyaḥ sūktavākaḥ, na ca sākṣāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:4742: sādhanam, sūktavākasāmānyasyaikatvāt, sūktavāko vartata ity ekavacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4743: bhavati. sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti tu yena kenacit sūktavākena prahriyamāṇe yathāśrutaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyaḥ sūktavākaḥ. yat tv amāvāsyādevatāvācīni padāni, na paurṇamāsyāṃ prayujyante, na tatra sūktavākaśabdo bādhyate, prakaraṇaṃ tatra liṅgena bādhitam, tac ca nyāyyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4744: eva. tasmāt paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca vibhajya sūktavākaḥ prayoktavya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4747: *{3/162: E2: saṃnidhānāvacanāc ca, asya, E4: saṃnidhānād avacanāc ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4753: iha kāmyayājyānuvākyākāṇḍam udāharaṇam - indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ{*3/167*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4755: vṛtram{*3/170*} ityevamādyā ṛcaḥ. aparā api kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ - aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet, yasya sajātā viyāyuḥ, aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped bhrātṛvyavān, agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālaṃ [257]{*3/171*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4756: nirvaped rukkāmaḥ, agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet sapatnam abhidroṣyann ityevamādyāḥ. tad etā yājyānuvākyāḥ prati saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ yāvat kiṃcid aindrāgnaṃ karma, tatra sarvatrānenaindrāgnena yājyānuvākyāyugalena bhavitavyam, utaitasyām evaindrāgnyām iṣṭau kāmyāyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:4757: iti. evaṃ vaiśvānarīyayor yājyānuvākyayoḥ, evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4758: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? yāvat kiṃcid aindrāgnaṃ vaiśvāvarīyam agnīṣomīyaṃ jātavedasaṃ ca sarvatraitā yājyānuvākyā bhaveyuḥ. kutaḥ? liṅgāt. nanu kramasamākhyāne viśeṣake bhaviṣyataḥ. satyam, tathāpi kramaṃ samākhyāṃ ca śaknoti liṅgaṃ bādhitum iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - liṅgakramasamākhyānāt tāsv eva kāmyāsv etā yājyānuvākyā iti gamyate, ya eva hi liṅgakrama eṣāṃ karmaṇām, sa evāsāṃ yājyānuvākyānām, tena tāsām eva tāḥ śeṣabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4759: nanu liṅgaṃ balavattaram ity uktam. satyam etat, iha tu samākhyā balīyasī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4760: na hy etāḥ samākhyānād ṛta eṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ prāpnuvanti, na bhinnadeśānāṃ karmaṇām. kutaḥ? samākhyām antareṇāsām ṛtāṃ yājyānuvākyātvam eva na vijñāyate, kuto bhinnadeśānāṃ karmaṇāṃ yājyānuvākyā bhaviṣyantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4761: yā caiṣāṃ samākhyā, sā kāmyānām eva yājyānuvākyātvam ācaṣṭe na sarveṣām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4762: yadi samākhyā nādriyate, yājyānuvākyātvam evaiṣāṃ na bhavati, yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:4763: ādriyate, tadā kāmyānām eva. evaṃ hi tat samākhyāyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4765: atha kim artham ubhayam upadiśyate - liṅgakramād iti, samākhyānād iti ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4766: asti tatra pāthikṛtīyaṃ vrātapatīyaṃ ca karma, sāmidhenīkāryam apy asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4767: yājyānuvākyākāryam api. yadi liṅgakramād ity etāvad evocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4768: sāmidhenīkārye 'pi liṅgena [258]{*3/172*} tāsāṃ viniyogaḥ syāt. atha kim arthaṃ liṅgakramau vyapadiśyete? sarvā yājyānuvākyākārya eva viniyujyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4769: sāmidhenīṣu viniyogo na syāt. atha punaḥ samākhyānāl liṅgakramāc ca nirvṛtte yājyānuvākyākārye, sāmidhenīṣu viniyogaḥ siddho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4770: yathāgnivāruṇyā iṣṭeḥ krame 'tīte saumāraudrīṇām anāgate, manor ṛcas tāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4771: sāmidhenīṣu dhāyyā ity ucyante, tathā - pṛthuyājās tam saṃbādha iti dve dhāyye kalpyete. tasmād ubhayaṃ vyapadeṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4777: adhikāre ca mantravidhir atadākhyeṣu śiṣṭatvāt // MS_3,2.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4779: aindryā sadaḥ, vaiṣṇavyā havir dhānam{*3/175*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prakṛtābhir evaṃliṅgavatībhir upasthātavyam, uta dāśatayībhya evaṃliṅgā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4781: kiṃ tāvat prāptam. prakaraṇe ca mantro liṅgena vidhīyamāno dāśatayībhya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4782: evāgamayitavyaḥ, āgneyītyevamādibhir hi śakyā dāśatayo 'bhivaditum. yaś cāyaṃ prakṛtaḥ, sa kāryāntare viniyuktaḥ, nehāpy upadeśam arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4783: upadiṣṭopadeśo hi na nyāyya evaṃjātīyakasya. kathaṃ jātīyakasya? yaḥ kasmiṃścid viśeṣeṇopadiṣṭaḥ, nāsau sāmānyena liṅgenānyātropadeśam arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4784: katham? yadi tal liṅgaṃ tasya lakṣaṇatvena, tataḥ sa viśiṣṭo lakṣyeta
GSP28msbh1-7u:4786: athopadiśyate - evaṃliṅgena karotīti, tato na lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4789: nanu prakaraṇasāmarthyataḥ prakṛtā grahītuṃ nyāyyāḥ. nety ucyate, liṅgaṃ hi prakaraṇād balīyaḥ. āha, virodhe sati liṅgena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyeta, na caitayor virodhaḥ, na vayaṃ prakaraṇam anujighṛkṣantaḥ prakṛtaṃ liṅgavantam upādadānā liṅgam upabādhemahi{*3/177*}. yadi tu prakṛtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4790: viliṅgam upadademahi{*3/178*}, tato bādhemahi liṅgam. ubhayaṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ ca. naitad evam, liṅgena pratyayo bhavati, dāśatayenāpi kartavyam iti, dāśatayo 'pi hy āgneyīśabdena śakyante vaditum, sa pratyayo liṅgajanito yan mithyeti kalpyate, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:4791: prakaraṇānurodhāt. sa cet prakaraṇam anurudhyate, mithyeti kalpyate, atha nānurudhyate samyag iti, tasmād virodhaḥ. virodhe ca prakaraṇadaurbalyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4792: ucyate - tal liṅgavattānenopasthānenānugrahītavyā, na dāśatayī mantravyāktiḥ, sā ca prakṛte mantra upādīyamāne niravaśeṣā upāttā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4793: dāśatayāṃ punar mantravyaktāv upādīyamānāyāṃ prakaraṇād yā mantravyaktiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4794: prāpnoti, sā bādhitā bhavati, asati virodhe. na ca, iha liṅgaprakaraṇayor virodhaḥ, prakaraṇād vyāktiḥ pratīyate, liṅgāt sāmānyam, anyā ca vyaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4795: anyat sāmānyam. tasmāt prakṛto liṅgavān upādeya iti. ucyate, satyam evam etat prakṛta upādīyamāne prakaraṇaṃ na bādhitaṃ bhavati, liṅgam apy anugṛhītam, liṅgajanitas tu pratyayaḥ kaścin mithyeti kalpito bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4796: nanu vyaktir apadārthaḥ, kathaṃ{*3/179*} vyaktāv anupādīyamānāyāṃ pratyayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4797: bādhyeta? ucyate - etad eva na [260]{*3/180*} vijānīmo liṅgavattātrāṅgaṃ na veti. kiṃ tu tad dhitarnirdeśo 'yam, tatra devatāyā mantro lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4798: mantravyaktir hi sādhanam, na sāmānyaṃ nāma kiṃcid aparam, devataivātra
GSP28msbh1-7u:4799: sāmānyam, yayāsādhanaṃ{*3/181*} lakṣayitavyam. na ca gamyate viśeṣaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4800: ayam asau mantro nāyam asāv iti, anavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarve talliṅgā grahītavyā iti, dāśatayām api mantravyaktau bhavati pratyayaḥ, sa prakaraṇānurodhena bādhyetety anyāyyam. evaṃ sati na dāśataya evopādātavyā bhavanti, prakṛtam apy upādadīran. nanv etad uktam, kāryāntare prakṛtasyopadeśo nāsāv arthāntara upadekṣyata iti. ucyate, na niyogataḥ sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:4801: evārthāntare vartate, sa cānyaś ca sāmānyena liṅgena. naivaṃ sati kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:4802: duṣyati. nanv etad duṣyati - nobhayam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca. satyam, nānugṛhītaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tv ananugrāhyam eva prakaraṇaṃ liṅgapratyayaviruddhatvāt. api ca na liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ cānugrahītavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4803: iti, tatparicchinne pravṛttir bhavati, yad avagamyate - etat phalavad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4804: tatra pravartate. kim ato yady evam? etad ato bhavati, na liṅgam anugṛhītaṃ kvacid ity aparasmiṃs tatparicchinne na pravṛttir bhavitum arhati. tasmād dāśatayo grahītavyā iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4815: prakaraṇopapattibhyām, prakṛto hy asau, prakṛtapratyayaś ca nyāyyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4816: katham? na jyotiṣṭomaṃ prati mantrasya vyāpāravidhānam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4818: vyāpāraviśeṣasya, anapekṣya ca prakaraṇaṃ dāśataye vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4819: bhidyeta. upasthānaṃ ca kuryāt. tac caivaṃ liṅgeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4822: anarthakaś copadeśaḥ syād asaṃbandhāt phalavatā, na hy upasthānaṃ phalavat
GSP28msbh1-7u:4823: nanu ca prakaraṇāj jyotiṣṭomasyopakārakaṃ syāt. yady upasthānajyotiṣṭmasaṃbandho vivakṣyeta, tadopasthānaṃ jyotiṣṭome upadiśyeta, prakaraṇāt tenaikavākyatām iyāt. yadā tu khalūpasthānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4825: prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā. na prakaraṇaṃ viśeṣakaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4826: ubhayasaṃbandhe vākyabhedaḥ. asmatpakṣe na punar ayaṃ doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4827: yenāgneyenaindreṇa vā jyotiṣṭome vyāpāraḥ kriyate, tena upasthānavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ tadā jyotiṣṭomiko vidhīyate, anyat sarvam anūdyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:4828: iti na doṣo bhavati. athavā, agnīdhrahavir{*3/184*} dhānasadaḥ saṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyate, upatiṣṭhata ity ayam anuvādaḥ, anena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4829: mantreṇāgnīdhram{*3/185*} upatiṣṭhata iti samāsīdatīty arthaḥ. tasmāt prakṛtā mantrā evaṃjātīyakā upādātavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4834: yad apy uktam upadiṣṭā hi te prakṛtāḥ kāryantara iti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4835: uktottaram etat. api ca na kenacin nopadiṣṭāḥ{*3/186*}, sarve vācāstoma āśvine śasyamāne sūrye 'nudyati, tena na prakṛte kaścid viṣeśaḥ. tasmāt prakṛtasyaiva grahaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4837: *{3/186: E2: api ca kevalam eta evopadiṣṭāḥ, E4: api ca na kevalam eta evopadiṣṭāḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4839: bhakṣamantraḥ śrūyate - bhakṣe hi mā viśa dīrghāyutvāya śaṃtanutvāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4840: rāyaspoṣāya varcase suprajāstvāya. ehi vaso purovaso priyo me hṛdo 'sy
GSP28msbh1-7u:4841: aśvinos tvā bāhubhyāṃ sadhyāsam. nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā deva soma sucakṣā avakhyeṣam. hinva me gātrā harivo gaṇān me mā vitītṛṣaḥ, śivo me saptarṣīn
GSP28msbh1-7u:4842: upatiṣṭhasva mā me 'vāṅ nābhimatigāḥ mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānaṃ vāg juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu, vasumad gaṇasya rudramad gaṇasyādityavad gaṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya tṛtīyasavanasya gāyatracchandasas triṣṭupchandaso jagacchandaso
GSP28msbh1-7u:4843: 'gnihuta{*3/188*} indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmītyevamādiḥ{*3/189*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsna eṣo 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ, uta kaścid asyāvayavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4846: bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ. kutaḥ? bhakṣayāmīty eṣa śabdo vyaktaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ, bhakṣaṇam eṣa śaknoti vaditum, nānyat kiṃcit. anyāni cāsya padāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaṇavacanāny eva, yatra yatra bhakṣayāmīti, tatra tatra prayujyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4847: nanu ehi vaso ityevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antaṃ grahaṇārtham, svena padasamūhena parasparākāṅkṣiṇaikārtham, vibhinnaṃ bhakṣaṇavākyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4848: nṛcakṣasam ityevamādy avakhyeṣam ity evam antam avekṣaṇavacanam. hinva me gātrā hariva ityevamādi ca [263]{*3/190*} mā me vāṅ nābhimatigā ity evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4849: antaṃ samyag jaraṇārtham. tad bahutvād arthānām, bahūni vākyāni. katham etac chakyaṃ vadituṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4850: ucyate - sarvāṇy etāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇānīty uktam. āha, evam api bhidyeta vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāṃ yugapad vacanāsaṃbhavāt. ucyate - na viśeṣaṇāni vivakṣiṣyāmaḥ, viśeṣaṇair grahaṇāvekṣaṇādibhir viśiṣṭa eko
GSP28msbh1-7u:4852: avivakṣitasvārthavacanatā, bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaṇaparatā ceti, lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate. śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye ca śrutir nyāyyā, na lakṣaṇā, tasmān naikaṃ vākyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4853: atrocyate - yady apy amī grahaṇādayo bahavo 'rthā gamyante, na tu sarva
GSP28msbh1-7u:4854: īpsitā iti, bhakṣaṇam evaikaṃ pratyāyayitavyam. tad dhi śrutam, viśeṣaṇāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:4855: aśrutāni, na taiḥ pratītaiḥ prayojanam, prayojanaṃ ca yāvataḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4856: padasamūhasyaikam, tāvad ekaṃ vākyam. tasmād viśiṣṭabhakṣaṇārtham etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:4857: ekaṃ vākyam iti bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavyam. samākhyānaṃ ca bhavati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4859: nanu ca samākhyā laukikaḥ śabdaḥ kathaṃ vaidikam aṅgaṃ niyaṃsyatīti. yady api laukikaḥ, tathāpy anādiḥ tasyānuvākena saṃbandhaḥ. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4860: etad ato bhavati, bhakṣaṇasamabhivyāhṛtam anuvākaṃ brūte, samabhivyāhāraś ca sati saṃbandhe bhavati, yathā pācako lāvaka iti samabhivyāhārāt saṃbandham anumāsyāmahe. āha nānumānagamya evaṃjātīyakeṣv aṅgabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4861: vidhānād evāvagamyate, nānyathā, na ca samākhyā vidhātrī. atrocyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4862: samākhyā saṃbandhinau buddhau saṃnidhim upaneṣyati, prayogavacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:4863: vidhāsyatīti. tasmāt kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4868: naitad evaṃ kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti. rūpād grahaṇavākyaṃ grahaṇe viniyujyeta, ehītyevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antam. nṛcakṣasam ityevamādi cāvakhyeṣam ity evam antaṃ darśane. kutaḥ? mukhyārtham evaṃ tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:4869: vākyaṃ bhavati, itarathā lakṣaṇārthatā syāt, mukhyārthatā ca nyāyyā na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4871: ucyate - viśeṣaṇānām abhidhāne, na kiṃcid asti prayojanam ity uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4872: atrocyate - naivaitāni viśeṣaṇāni, pṛthag evaitāni grahaṇādīni svaiḥ svair vākyair ucyanta iti. kutaḥ? asti hi taiḥ prayojanam, coditāni hi tāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4873: kānicit tu pṛthagvākyaiḥ, kānicid arthaprāptāni, tāny avaśyaṃ prakāśayitavyāni. tāni prakāśayiṣyanty etāni vākyāni. rūpaṃ caiṣāṃ tatprakāśanasāmarthyam, ato nānārthatvān naikaṃ vākyam ucyate. nanu bhakṣaṇavākyaśeṣī bhavitum apy eṣāṃ rūpam iti. ucyate - bāḍham asti rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4874: na tu tadviśeṣaṇāny etāni kalpyante. kasya hetor adṛṣṭārthāni tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4875: bhavanti? uktair anuktair vā viśeṣaṇais tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ, itarathā grahaṇādīni prakāśayiṣyanti, tathā dṛṣṭārthāni bhaviṣyanti. tasmād rūpopadeśābhyām apakrṣo bhavet keṣāṃcid atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4876: guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syāt tayor ekārthasaṃyogāt // MS_3,2.26
GSP28msbh1-7u:4878: vāgju[265]{*3/192*}ṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu. vasu-mad guṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandaso 'gnihuta{*3/193*} indrapītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti{*3/194*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ mandrādiḥ tṛpyatv ity evam anta eko mantraḥ, vasumad gaṇādir aparaḥ, uta mandrādir bhakṣayāmy anta eka eva mantra iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? dvau
GSP28msbh1-7u:4879: mantrau, dvau hy etāv arthau, anyā tṛptir anyad bhakṣaṇam, tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:4880: 'rthabhedād vākyabhedaḥ. tad uktam - tasya rūpopadeśābhyām apakarṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4882: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti, tṛptir bhakṣaṇāviśeṣaṇatvenābhidhīyata iti{*3/195*}. bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4883: nanu tṛpyatv ity eṣo 'nyaḥ śabdaḥ, anyaś ca tarpsyatīti, eṣā bhaviṣyantī kriyāyām upapadabhūtāyāṃ bhavatīti, tatra dvayoḥ kriyayor asti saṃbandho bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīti. iha punar bhakṣayāmi tṛpyatv iti nāsti kaścit
GSP28msbh1-7u:4884: saṃbandhaḥ. ucyate - na hy ayaṃ vidhau tṛpyatv iti vijñāyate. kva tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4885: prārthanāyāṃ vā prāptakāle vā. yadi bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīty evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate. yadi vā bhakṣayāṃi vācas tarptuṃ prāptaḥ kāla iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4886: tena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvād ekārthatāyām ekavākyatve mantraikyam upapadyate. nanu nirākāṅkṣa ete vākye bhaṅktvā rūpaṃ sākāṅkṣe kriyete.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4887: atrocyate -yady apy ete vākye bhinnārthe nirākāṅkṣe dvāv arthāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:4888: abhivadeyātām, tathāpi bhakṣaṇasya prakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:4889: tarpaṇasya, iti kṛtvaikārthyam eva bhavet. kim aṅga punar guṇabhāve gamyamāna evātra. tasmād guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4895: eṣa eva mantra udāharaṇam - iha ca pradānāny aindrāṇy anaindrāṇi ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:4896: vidyante, teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇāny api santi. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aindreṣv anaindreṣu ca mantraḥ, utaindreṣv eva mantraḥ, anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? anaiṇdrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4897: kutaḥ? samānavidhānāny etāni pradānāni, teṣv indrapītasyeti mantro
GSP28msbh1-7u:4898: 'nindrapītaṃ na śaknoti vaditum, na ca samānaprakaraṇa ūhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4901: yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati // MS_3,2.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4902: athavā yathādevatam ūhena lakṣayitavyam kasmāt? dhruvacamasā hi prakṛtibhūtāḥ. ke punar dhruvacamasāḥ? ye śukrāmanthipracāre savanamukhīyāḥ, aindrās te bhavanti, teṣāṃ prakṛtibhūtaṃ pradānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4903: vikṛtibhūtāny anyāni. katham avagamyate? tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4904: katham? anuṣṭupchandasa iti ṣoḍaśiny atirātre bhakṣamantraṃ namatīti. kim atra darśanam? namatīti vipariṇāmaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4905: nanu vacanam etat syāt. nety ucyate, naitan namatīti śrūyate. kathaṃ tarhi evaṃ namatīti, anuṣṭupchandasa iti bhakṣamantraṃ namatīti, sa eṣa ūho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4906: vikāreṣūpapadyate, [267]{*3/197*} tasmād ete vikārāḥ, ato 'naindreṣv api codakaprāpto mantra ūhitavyo bhavati. ucyate - vikārā eta iti liṅgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4907: apadiṣṭam, nyāyo 'bhidhīyatām iti. ucyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:4908: ca, tenaindreṣu somo 'naindreṣu soma eva nāstīti sarve somadharmā aindreṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:4909: eva, adharmakā itare sākāṅkṣāḥ. kathaṃ punar jñāyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ceti? mantravarṇāt, indrāya tvā vasumata ityevamādir mantra aindraṃ somaṃ vadituṃ śaknoti nānyam. tasmād aindraḥ somaḥ, tenaindreṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:4910: somadharmāḥ, anyāni tu pradānāni sākāṅkṣāṇi, ato dharmān grahīṣyantīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4911: nyāyaḥ. tasmād yathādevatam ūhitavyo mantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4912: evaṃ sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam, tata evaṃ sati cintāntaraṃ vartiṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4915: santi punarabhyunnītāḥ somāḥ śukrāmanthipracāra eva savanamukhīyāḥ, teṣāṃ hotur vaṣatkāre 'nuvaṣatkāre ca caturbhir madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasair hutvā hotrakāṇāṃ camasaiḥ sakṛt sakṛd vaṣaṭkāra eva hutvā punaḥ saśeṣeṣv eva pātreṣu somo 'bhyunnītaḥ, evaṃ hi tatrādhvaryuḥ saṃpreṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4916: madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasādhvaryavo vaṣaṭkṛte 'nuvaṣaṭkṛte jahuta, hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛd dhutvā śukrasyābhyunnīyopāvartadhvam iti. tatra hotrakā nānādevatā yajanti, maitrāvaruṇo mitrāvaruṇau, mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmaha iti{*3/198*}, [268]{*3/199*} brāhmaṇāc chaṃsī indram, indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayam iti{*3/200*}, potā marutaḥ, maruto yasya hi kṣaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4917: iti{*3/201*}. neṣṭā tvaṣṭāraṃ patnīś ca, agne patnīr ihāvaheti{*3/202*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:4918: āgnīdhro 'gnim ukṣānnāya vaśānnāyeti{*3/203*}. tatra taiś camasaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4919: pūrvasmin vaṣaṭkāra indra iṣṭaḥ, punar abhyunnīya mitrāvaruṇādyā devatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4920: iṣṭāḥ, śeṣas tatrendrasya mitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ ca. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prasthitadevatāyāś cendrasya mitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ copalakṣaṇam, utendro nopalakṣayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4921: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? punar abhyunnīteṣu sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4922: dviśeṣatvāt, camase camase tatra dvayoḥ śeṣaḥ, prakṛtau yasyai hutam, tac cheṣas tatpīta ity uktam. ihāpi tadvad eva vaditavyam. tasmāc camase camase dvayor upalakṣaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4930: apanītaṃ prasthitadevatāyāḥ śeṣaṃ manyāmahe. kutaḥ? mitrāvaruṇādibhyas tatpātrastham abhyāśrāvyate. katham etat? ucyate - mitrāvaruṇādayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4931: hījyante, tad yathācāryaśeṣaṃ devadatto bhuñjāno yadi śeṣaṃ pūrṇakāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4932: prayacchati, pūrṇako devadattam upalakṣayati, devadattaśeṣaṃ bhuñja iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4933: nācāryaśeṣam. tasmān na prasthitadevatā indra upalakṣayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4935: na caitad asti, indro nopalakṣaṇīya iti, tasyāpi hy asau śeṣaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate. nanv apanīta iti. ucyate - nāsāv apanīyate. sakṛd dhutāṃś camasānabhidroṇakalaśād gṛhṇāti, saśeṣaś camaso lakṣaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4936: anyasyonnīyamānasya. tataś{*3/206*} camasastho hotum unnetavyaḥ preṣito
GSP28msbh1-7u:4937: vā. yat tu yakṣyamāṇā devatāḥ praty āśrā[269]{*3/207*}vita iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4938: āśrāvyate tatra devatābhyo na tv idaṃ vā tad veti. tena{*3/208*} yad dhotuṃ gṛhītaṃ tad āśrāvitam iti gamyate. na ca, āśrāvaṇavelāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4939: devatābhisaṃbandhaḥ, yad yad devatābhisaṃbaddham, tad āśrāvyate, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:4940: astīndraśeṣaḥ, lakṣyate{*3/209*} ca. ataḥ sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4941: kṛtvācintaiṣā, nātra prayojanaṃ vaktavyam, pūrvādhikaraṇasyaivaitat prayojanam avadhāryate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4949: asti pātnīvato grahaḥ, yad upāṃśupātreṇāgrayaṇāt pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4950: dvidevatyānāṃ śeṣā āgrayaṇasthālyāṃ upanītāḥ, tataḥ pātnīvato gṛhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4951: atha hute pātnīvate, tac cheṣe bhakṣyamāṇe bhavati saṃdehaḥ - kim indravāyvādaya upalakṣayitavyā na veti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4952: upalakṣayitavyāḥ. teṣām api hy asau śeṣo yathā prasthitadevatāyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4954: apanīyate hi sa śeṣa iha, na yathāpūrvavat, tatra hi pātralakṣaṇatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4955: saṃkīrtyate na somo grāhyatvena, iha tu āgrayaṇād gṛhṇātīti, sthālīsthaḥ somo nirdiśyate hotum, yakṣyamāṇadevatāṃ prati. nanu sthālyām āgrayaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4956: nāgrayaṇaś{*3/210*} ca, tatra yas tasmād āgrayaṇād gṛhyate, sa pātnīvataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4957: yas tu saṃpātānn āsau pātnīvata iti. ucyate - āgrayaṇo 'pādānam, tasmād yo 'paity āgrayaṇo 'nāgrayaṇo{*3/211*} vā, sa sarvaḥ pātnīvataḥ, āgrayaṇāc caiṣa sarvo 'petaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4958: [270]{*3/212*} nanv anāgrayaṇād apy apetaḥ. naiṣa doṣaḥ, āgrayaṇāt tāvad apetaḥ, tenāsau pūrvadevatābhiḥ pīta iti na śakyate vaktum. yo hīndrārthasya somasyāvayavaḥ śeṣaḥ sa indrapīta iti prakṛtāv ucyate. ihāpi tadvad eva pūrvadevatārthasyāvayavo vaditavyaḥ. nanu yo 'sau
GSP28msbh1-7u:4959: pūrvadevatārthaḥ, tasyaivāyam avayavaḥ. neti brūmaḥ, na hi hutasyāvayavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4960: dṛśyate. nanu prakṛtāv api hutasyāvayavo na dṛśyate. ucyate - hutāhutasya samudāyasya tatrāvayava upalakṣyate taddevatasya. nanv ihāpi samudāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4961: evāsīt taddevatyaḥ, tasyaivāyam avayavaḥ. nety ucyate, āsīd ayaṃ samudāyas
GSP28msbh1-7u:4962: taddevatyaḥ, idānīṃ tasyāvayavo 'nyadevatyo jātaḥ, tena samudāyas taddevatyatvād apetaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4963: āha pūrvadevatāpītasyāsāv avayava āsīt tena bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4964: ucyate - prakṛtau na bhūtapūrvagatyābhidhānaṃ kṛtam, ihāpi tadvad eva na kartavyam iti. api cendradevatyas tatrendrapīta ity uktam, anapanītā ca tasyendradevatyatā, asya punaḥ pūrvadevatāsaṃbandho 'pagataḥ. tasmān nātra pūrvadevatopalakṣaṇīyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4969: asti pātnīvataḥ somaḥ, tatra mantraḥ, agnā i patnīvan sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4970: somaṃ pibeti{*3/213*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ tvaṣṭopalakṣayitavyo na veti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4971: kiṃ prāptam? upalakṣayitavyaḥ. kutaḥ? pānāt, pānaṃ śrūyate - sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā [271]{*3/214*} somaṃ pibeti. tenāyam agnaye patnīvate saha tvaṣṭrā dīyata iti gamyate. yasmai ca yena saha dīyate, ubhābhyāṃ tad dīyate, evaṃ tat sahadānaṃ bhavati, yathā devadattāya yajñadattena saha śataṃ dīyatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:4972: ity ukte, tatrobhābhyām api dīyate. tasmāt tvāṣṭro 'py asau soma iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4978: naitad evam, śabdapramāṇakā vayam, yac chabda āha, tad asmākaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4979: śabdaś cāgneḥ patnīvataḥ pānam āha tvaṣṭuḥ sahabhāvamātram, na hy ananuṣṭhīyamāne sahabhāvaḥ sidhyatīti tvaṣṭari pānam anumīyate. nanu tvaṣṭre pānaṃ coditam. satyam, coditaṃ mantravarṇena, na codanayā. codanā hi pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti, loke tu kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā coditam acoditam apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:4980: anuṣṭhīyata{*3/216*} eva, lokataś caitat paricchinnam, naivaṃjātīyakena
GSP28msbh1-7u:4983: *{3/216: E2,4, E1 (v.l.): coditam acoditam apy anuṣṭhīyata}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4985: tasminn eva pātnīvate mantraḥ - aibhir agne sarathaṃ yāhy arvāṅ nānārathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4986: vā vibhavo hy aśvāḥ. patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasveti{*3/217*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ trayastriṃśato [272]{*3/218*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4987: devānām upalakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? trayastriṃśataṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4988: devānupalakṣayet. katham? dīyate hi somas trayastriṃśate devebhyaḥ. evaṃ hy agnim agnīd adhīcchati, āyāhy agner 'vācīnam, trayastriṃśatā devaiḥ saha samānaṃ ratham adhiṣṭhāya nānārathair vā vibhavanti hi te 'śvāḥ. tad idam anuṣvadham āvaha trayastriṃśataṃ patnīvato devān āgamaya tarpaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4989: ceti. atra hy agnim agnīd adhīcchati trayastriṃśato devānāṃ tṛptaya iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4990: gamyate, yat pradhānaś cātra mantraḥ, tat paraḥ somaḥ. tasmād ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4992: nanu codanāyāṃ patnīvān kevalo 'gnir devatātvena śrūyate. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4993: codanāyāṃ patnīvān devatātvena śrūyate, na tu devatāntaraṃ niṣidhyate. kim ato yady evam? etad ato bhavati, māntravarṇikās trayastriṃśad devā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4995: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na trayastriṃśad devā upalakṣayitavyā iti, nātra mantre 'gnir āhvātā pariveṣṭā vā tarpayitā vādhyeṣyate. nātra trayastriṃśad deveṣv iṣṭeṣu prayojanaṃ nirvartyate. kas tarhi yaṣṭavyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4996: patnīvān. kuta etat? sa hi codyate - pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti. nanu māntravarṇikānāṃ trayastriṃśato devānām atra saṃkīrtanam. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:4997: parārthatvena tāḥ saṃkīrtyante. katham? na hy aprattam agneḥ, tad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4998: na ca parakīyasya dānam avakalpate. tasmāt tvam amūbhyas trayastriṃśad devatābhyo dehīty asamañjasaṃ vacanam, agnaye tv anena dānam uktaṃ bhavati. katham? īśāno hi vilaṃbhayati dravyam, tad iha vilaṃbhanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4999: saṃkīrtayan tvam asya īśāna iti pratyāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5000: [273]{*3/219*} nanu mādayasvety ucyate, na vilaṃbhayeti. ucyate - na hi mādyanti devatāḥ, tasmān madakaraṇasaṃkīrtanam adṛṣṭāya syāt, dṛṣṭāya tu tyāgasaṃkīrtanaṃ lakṣaṇayā, lakṣaṇā hy adṛṣṭakalpanāyā jyāyasī, pramāṇād dhi sā bhavati. nanu tyāge 'pi lakṣyamāṇe 'gniḥ kartādhīṣyate. tad ucyate - agner apy adhyeṣaṇādṛṣṭāyaiva, tasmād agner aiśvaryakaraṇam etad vākyaṃ lakṣayatīti nyāyyam. api ca pātnīvate somaś codyate - pātnīvataṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5002: nanūktam, māntravarṇikaṃ ca pratiṣedhati codaneti. ucyate - tad api māntravarṇikaṃ nāstīty uktam. api ca sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhatīti gamyate. na hi sāpekṣaḥ patnīvac chabdaḥ, tad dhitārthena saṃlakṣyate, tasmāt kevalaḥ patnīvān devateti. etac codanāvaśena mantro varṇanīyaḥ. tasmād yathaivāsmābhir varṇito mantraḥ, tathaiva bhavitum arhatīti, patnīvāṃś cāgnir agne patnīvann iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyate. tasmād agnir upalakṣayitavyo na trayastriṃśad devatā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5007: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim anuvaṣaṭkāradevatopalakṣayitavyā na veti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5008: prāptam? upalakṣayitavyeti, na tatra pārārthyaṃ kiṃcit pūrvad upalakṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5009: tasmād upalakṣayitevyati. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - anuvaṣaṭkāradevatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5011: hotṛpīta[274]{*3/221*}syādhvaryupītasyeti, evam evānuvaṣaṭkāradevatāpi. na hi sā prakṛtāv upalakṣitā, yac ca nāma prakṛtau kṛtam, tad iha karaṇīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5016: sthitād uttaram ucyate - naitad asti, yad uktam ūhena mantravad bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti, amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam. kasmāt? ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5017: samānavidhānatvāt, nāsty atra prakṛtivikṛtibhāvaḥ. katham? prakaraṇasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5018: tulyatvāt, yal liṅgaṃ uktam{*3/222*}, chandaḥpratiṣedhaḥ sa ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5019: tṛtīyasavanatvāj jagatīcchandasa iti prāpte 'nuṣṭupchandasa iti ṣoḍaśini bhakṣamantraṃ namatīti{*3/223*} samānavidhāne 'py avakalpyate. yat
GSP28msbh1-7u:5020: tūktam{*3/224*} - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ceti, naita aindrā anaindrāś
GSP28msbh1-7u:5021: ca bhinnā yāgāḥ, ekasyaivaite 'bhyāsaviśeṣāḥ, na cābhāsaviśeṣāṇāṃ dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5022: guṇatvāt, sarva ete yāgadharmāḥ. tena kṛtsnā yāgasya codyante somadharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5023: somaś ceti. yac ca, indro gṛhyate mīyate ceti, indrasya mantrāmnānān mantreṇa grahaṇaṃ prakāśayitavyam, itarāsāṃ devatānāṃ dhyānādineti. tasmād anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5029: evaṃ sthite cintyate - asti tatraindrāgnaḥ somaḥ, aindrāgnaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5030: gṛhṇātīti{*3/226*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ mantravad bhakṣaṇam, amantrakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5031: veti. kiṃ prāptam? aindrāgne tu mantraḥ syāt, yasya hīndrāgnī devatā tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5032: nendraḥ{*3/227*}, śakyate hi sa indrapīta iti vyapadeṣṭum, yasya hy avayavāntaram indreṇa pītam, sa indrapītaḥ, tasyendrāgnibhyāṃ pibadbhyāṃ pītam avayavāntaram indreṇa. tasmān mantravad bhakṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5037: nāsyāvayavāntaram indreṇa pīyate, na cāvayavāntareṇendrapītena tat pītaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5038: bhavati, tena pīta iti lakṣaṇāśabdo 'yam. indram uddiśya yaḥ saṃkalpito indro yasya devateti, yathaiva ca sākāṅkṣasya tad dhitārthenāsaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5039: evaṃ samāso 'pīndrapītasyeti sākāṅkṣasya nāvakalpate, tad uktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5041: āha - nanu tenaivādhikaraṇenaitad gatam{*3/229*}. kim arthaṃ punaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:5042: cintyata iti. ucyate - yat tatra vicāritaṃ siddham eva tat. kathaṃ punar vicāryate? naiva sākāṅkṣasya devatāsaṃbandha iti. naiveha devatāsaṃbandha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, pānamātrasaṃbandho 'treti, pānamātrasaṃbandhena yatra dvābhyāṃ pīyate, tatraikena devatāsaṃbandha ity uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ, tasmān na punaruktam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5047: asmin mantre gāyatrachandasa ity ucyate, tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ekacchandasi some mantraḥ, uta nānācchandasyapīti{*3/231*}. ucyate - chandaś ca devatāvat, yathānyasahitendre na mantraḥ, evam anekacchandaske some na syān mantra iti. atrāpi hi gāyatracchandasa iti saviśeṣaṇasya samāso
GSP28msbh1-7u:5052: sarveṣu vā mantraḥ syāt. kutaḥ? abhāvād ekacchandasaḥ, naiva kaścid ekacchandasāḥ somo 'sti, tena yathābhūto 'yam, tathābhūtasya{*3/232*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5053: chando viśeṣaṇam. tasmād anekacchandaske some mantraḥ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5056: sarveṣāṃ vaikamantryam aitiśāyanasya bhaktipānatvāt savanādhikāro hi //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5057: yad uktam - anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti, tan na, sarveṣāṃ samantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti, yathāsamāmnātaś ca mantraḥ syāt. nendrapīta iti soma ucyate. kiṃ tarhi? savanam, prātaḥsavanaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5058: nanu some 'pi ṣaṣṭhī. satyam asti ṣaṣṭhī, na tu tena sāmānādhikaraṇyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5059: nāsāv indreṇa somaḥ pītaḥ, nāpīndrāya dattaḥ, anya eva pīto datto vā, sa gata eva. na cātītaḥ samudāyo vyapadiśyate, [277]{*3/233*} pratyakṣavacano hy ayaṃ śabdaḥ. savane tu na doṣaḥ, indrapītaṃ bhavati savanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5060: yatrendreṇa pītam. tasmād anaindro 'pītasavane 'ntarbhavatīti śakyate mantreṇa vaditum. śakyate cet samānavidhāne katham iva mantro na
GSP28msbh1-7u:5061: bhaviṣyati. bhaktyā hy apītaḥ pīta ity ucyate. evam eva aitiśāyana ācāryo manyate sma. asmākam apy etad eva matam. ācāryagrahaṇam, tasmād āgatam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5065: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - uccair ṛcaḥ kriyate, uccaiḥ sāmnā, upāṃśu yajuṣā iti{*3/234*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ ṛgādijātim adhikṛtyaite śabdāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5066: pravṛttāḥ, uta vedam adhikṛtyeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? jātādhikāraḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5067: kutaḥ? śruteḥ, eṣāṃ śabdānāṃ śravaṇād eva jātiṃ pratipadyāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5068: tenopāṃśutvaṃ jātyādhikṛtayā saṃbadhyate, vedānām adhikārakaḥ śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5069: nāstīti. api ca - ṛgvedavyatikrāntānām ṛcāṃ yajurveda uccaiḥ prayogo bhaviṣyati, itarathā tasyā eva ṛca ubhau dharmau vaikalpikau syātām, tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt. prakaraṇaṃ caivam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati, itarathā vedasaṃyoge sarvasminn api kratāv upāṃśutvaṃ syāt. tasmāj jātādhikārā ete
GSP28msbh1-7u:5074: vedaṃ vādhikṛtyedam ucyate. kutaḥ? prāyadarśanāt. kim idaṃ prāyadarśanād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5075: iti? vedaprāye vākye vedopakrame nigamyamānā ime śabdāḥ śrūyante -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5076: prajāpatir vā idam eka āsīt, sa tapo 'tapyata, tasmāt tapas te pānāt trayo devā asṛjyanta - agnir vāyur ādityaḥ, te tapo 'tapyanta tebhyas te pānebhyas trayo vedā asṛjyanta. agner ṛgvedo vāyor yajurveda ādityāt sāmaveda ity evam upakramya nigamana idaṃ śrūyate - uccair ṛcā kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5077: ucchaiḥ sāmnā, [279]{*3/235*} upāṃśu yajuṣeti. etasmāt kāraṇād ebhiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5078: prakṛtair upāṃśvādi kartavyam, na jātyā ṛgādibhir ity ucyate. kuta etad avagamyate? vākyopasaṃhāre śrutatvāt, yasmād ita ete vedā jātāḥ, tasmād etair upāṃśvādi kartavyam iti, ṛgādibhir api vedavacanair evopasaṃhāreṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5079: bhavitavyam. itarathā vākyam eva nāvakalpeta, tatrānarthakā eva bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5083: liṅgam apy asminn arthe bhavati, yathā ṛgādayaḥ śabdāḥ śaknuvanti vedam abhivaditum iti, ṛgbhiḥ prātardivi deva īyate. yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye
GSP28msbh1-7u:5084: ahnaḥ. sāmavedenāstamaye mahīyate. vedair aśūnyais tribhir eti sūrya iti{*3/236*}, dvau vedau saṃkīrtya, ṛkśabdaṃ ca triṣu pādeṣu, caturthe pāda upasaṃharati bahuvacanena, vedair aśūnyas tribhir eti sūrya ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:5085: ṛkśabdaṃ vedavacanaṃ darśayati. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ. vedādhikārā ete śabdā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5089: dharmopadeśāc ca na hi dravyeṇa saṃbandhaḥ // MS_3,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5090: dharmopadeśaś ca bhavati sāmnaḥ, uccaiḥ sāmneti, sa vedādhikārapakṣe yujyate. jātādhikāre tv ṛca uccais tvena sāmna uccais tvaṃ siddham, nāsya sāmadravyeṇa saha saṃbandho veditavyaḥ, tasmād api vedādhikārā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5092: trayī yasya vidyā sa trayīvidyaḥ, yas trīn vedān adhīte, sa evaṃ prakhyāyate{*3/237*}. trayīti caiṣa śabdā ṛksāmayajuḥṣu prasiddhaḥ, yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:5093: [280]{*3/238*} ṛksāmayajūṃṣīti trayo vedā ucyante, evaṃ tadvidi trayīvidyākhyā yujyate, bhavati ca. tasmād vedādhikārā ete.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5097: atha yad uktam - ṛgvedam atikrāntānām ṛcāṃ yajurvede 'py uccais tvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tatra matpakṣe yathāśrutaḥ prayogo bhaviṣyatīti yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5102: naiṣa doṣaḥ, sarvasminn ṛgveda uccais tvaṃ sarvasmiṃś ca yajurveda
GSP28msbh1-7u:5103: upāṃśutvam, tatra yady ṛgvedavyatikrāntāyā ṛco yajurveda upāṃśutvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5104: bhavatīti, naitad dūṣyati. vedadharmaḥ san{*3/240*} ṛgdharma iti, vedasya ca na dharmadvayena
GSP28msbh1-7u:5108: yad uktam - prakaraṇam evam anugṛhītaṃ bhavatīti, vedasaṃyogād vākyena prakaraṇe bādhyamāne na doṣo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5110: asty ādhānam, ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti{*3/241*}. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:5111: yājurvaidikam, tatra sāmagānam āmananti - ya evaṃ vidvān vāravantīyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5112: gāyati{*3/242*}, ya evaṃ vidvān yajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati, ya evaṃ vidvān
GSP28msbh1-7u:5113: vāmadevyaṃ gāyati{*3/243*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ādhāne sāmagānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5115: [281]{*3/244*} uccair iti prāptam. kutaḥ? sāmavedenaitat kriyate yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:5116: vāravantīyādibhiḥ, tasmād uccair etāni sāmāni geyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5117: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇānurodhena vā mukhyaṃ vyatikramet, mukhyānurodhena vā guṇam iti, guṇo vyatikramitavyo nyāyyaḥ, mukhyaś cānugrahītavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5118: kutaḥ? mukhyārthatvād guṇasya, guṇasyānuṣṭhānena mukhyaḥ saguṇaḥ kathaṃ syād iti guṇe pravartate, guṇapravṛttyā cen mukhyasya guṇahānir bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5119: guṇapravṛttau phalam eva nāvāptaṃ bhavati. atha pradhānaṃ saguṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5120: kariṣyāmīti guṇe pravartamāno guṇasya guṇaṃ vinipātayati, nāsya svārtho hīyate. nāsau guṇaṃ saguṇaṃ kartuṃ pravartate, guṇaś ca sāmagānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5121: pradhānam ādhānam, ādhānasya yājurvaidikatvāt{*3/245*}, upāṃśutā guṇaḥ, sa gaṇadharmam uccais tvaṃ sāmavaidikaṃ{*3/246*} bādhate. tasmād upāṃśu sāmāni geyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5129: yajurvede jyotiṣṭomaṃ samāmananti - jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5130: tathā sāmavede 'py asyaivam eva samāmnānam. sakṛc ca kṛtāyāṃ buddhau dvitīyaṃ guṇārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5131: yājurvaidikam{*3/247*} āmnānaṃ kriyārtham, sāmavaidikaṃ{*3/248*} guṇārtham uta viparītam iti. yatarac cāmnānaṃ kriyārthaṃ taddharmā bhaviṣyanti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sāmavedikaṃ{*3/249*} kriyārthaṃ yājurvedikaṃ{*3/250*} vety aniścayo viśeṣān avagamād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5132: [282]{*3/251*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - bhūyastvena guṇānāṃ paricchidyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5133: yatra bhūyāṃso guṇāḥ samāmnātāḥ, tatra kriyārthā{*3/252*} codaneti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5134: gamyate. yatra hi kartavyatayā codanā, tatretikartavyatākāṅkṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5135: yatrākāṅkṣitetikartavyatā, tatretikartavyatāvacanaṃ nyāyyam. ye ca bhūyāṃso guṇāḥ, setikartavyatā, tad itikartavyatāliṅgena kartavyatācodanām{*3/253*} anumimīmahe, yathā bahuṣu rājapratimeṣūpaviṣṭeṣu yasya śvetaṃ chatraṃ bālavyajanaṃ ca, sa rājety avagamyate, anākhyāto 'pi rājaliṅgena. evaṃ kartavyatāliṅgena guṇānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5137: jyotiṣṭomasyopāṃśuprayogaḥ, yajurvedena hi jyotiṣṭomaḥ kriyate, yat tena codyate. acoditaṃ na śakyate kartum iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5147: uktāni viniyogakāraṇāni śrutir liṅgaṃ vākyam iti. śrutir aindryā gārhapatyam iti{*3/255*} dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ, liṅgaṃ mantreṣu vacanasāmarthyaṃ bahirdevasadanaṃ dāmīti{*3/256*}, vākyam aruṇayā krīṇātīti{*3/257*}. atha kim etāvanty eva viniyogakāraṇāni? nety ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5148: kim aparaṃ kāraṇam iti praśnenaivopakramaḥ, bhavati ca praśnenaivopakramaḥ, yathā kā nāmeyaṃ nadī? ko nāmāyaṃ pravataḥ? kim idaṃ phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5149: tad ucyate - asaṃyuktaṃ prakaraṇāt, itikartavyatārthitvāt, yad asaṃyuktaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vā, tat prakaraṇāt, itikartavyatārthitvāt. yad itikartavyatākāṅkṣiṇaḥ saṃnidhau pūraṇasamartham upanipatati yad vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5150: tat{*3/258*} tena prakṛtena sahaikavākyatāṃ yāti. [283]{*3/259*} tasmāt prakṛte viniyujyate. kim ihodāharaṇam? kiṃ ca prayojanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5151: darśapūrṇamāsau prakṛtya śrūyate - samidho yajati, tanūnapātaṃ yajati, iḍo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5152: yajati, barhir yajati, svāhākāraṃ yajati{*3/260*} iti{*3/261*}, tāni tatraiva prakaraṇasāmarthyād viniyujyante, nāgnihotre jyotiṣṭome vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5161: atha kim etāvanty eva viniyogakāraṇāni. nety ucyate. kiṃ ca? kramaś ca deśasāmānyāt, kramavatām ānupūrveṇopadiśyamānānāṃ{*3/262*} yasya paryāye yaṃ dharmam āmananti, tasya taṃ praty ākāṅkṣānumīyate, satyām ākāṅkṣāyāṃ ekavākyabhāvaḥ, tasmāt tato viniyoga iti. kim ihodāharaṇam? kiṃ ca prayojanam? ānupūrvyavatāṃ yāgānām anumantraṇeṣv āmnāteṣūpāṃśuyājasya krame dabdhir nāmāsīti{*3/263*} samāmnātaḥ, tasyākāṅkṣām utpādya tenaikavākyatāṃ yāt vā tatraiva viniyogam arhatīti, tathā caindrāgnaṃ karma viyātasajātasyāsti bhrātṛvyavataḥ{*3/264*}, tasya yājyānuvākyāyugalam apy āmnāyata aindrāgnam, indrāgnī rocanādivaḥ pravarṣaṇibhya{*3/265*} ity{*3/266*} ekam, aparam indrāgnī navatiṃ puraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5162: [284]{*3/267*} ślathad vṛtram iti{*3/268*}. tatra liṅgād viniyoge siddhe viśeṣaviniyogo bhavati, pūrvaṃ yugalaṃ pūrvasyaindrāgnasya, uttaram
GSP28msbh1-7u:5172: atha kim etāvanty eva viniyogakāraṇānīti. nety ucyate. kiṃ ca? samākhyā caivaṃ syāt. kathaṃ viniyogakāraṇam iti. samākhyā sati saṃbandhe bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5173: yathā pācako lāvaka iti, tatra pācakaśabdam upalabhya pacatināsya saṃbandha iti gamyate, evaṃ vede 'pīti. akṛtakārthasaṃbandhaṃ{*3/269*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5174: samācakṣāṇaṃ śabdam upalabhya bhavati saṃbandhe tasmin saṃpratyayaḥ. kim ihodāharaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ca? ādhvaryavam iti samākhyātāni karmāṇy adhvaryuṇā kartavyāni, hautram iti ca hotrā. etad udāharaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5179: uktāni viniyogakāraṇāni, śrutiliṅgaṃ vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyānam iti, teṣāṃ samavāye kiṃ balīya iti cintyate, ekārthavṛttitvād vāco yugapad
GSP28msbh1-7u:5180: asaṃbandhād dvayor dvayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇā. tatra śrutiliṅgayoḥ kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5181: śrutibalīyasy āhosvil liṅgam iti. kiṃ punar atrodāharaṇam? aindryā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5182: [285]{*3/270*} gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti, atra cintyate - kim indrasya gārhapatyasya vopasthānaṃ kartavyam ity aniyamaḥ, uta gārhapatyasyaiveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5183: yadi tulyabale ete kāraṇe tato vikalpaḥ, atha śrutir balīyasī, gārhapatya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5185: kā punar atra śrutiḥ? kiṃ liṅgam? śrutir gārhapatyaśabdaśravaṇam, liṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5186: punaḥ, kadā ca na starīrasi nendrasaścasi dāśuṣe, itīndraśabdasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5187: viśiṣṭadevatābhidhānasāmarthyam. atha kiṃ vākyaṃ nāma? saṃhatya artham abhidadhati padāni vākyam. yady evam idam api vākyam - aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti, idam api - kadā cana starīr asīti{*3/271*}, ubhayatrāpi saṃhatyārtham abhidadhati padāni. tena vākyasya vākyasya caiṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5188: saṃpradhāraṇā, na śrutiliṅgayoḥ, yadi vā śrutiliṅgavākyāni vivektavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5189: idaṃ śrutivākyayor antaram, idaṃ liṅgavākyayor iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5190: tad abhidhīyate - yat tāvac chabdasyārtham abhidhātuṃ sāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5191: talliṅgam, yad arthasyābhidhānaṃ śabdasya śravaṇamātrādevāvagamyate, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5192: śrutyāvagamyate, śravaṇaṃ śrutiḥ. ekārtham anekaṃ padaṃ vākyam ity uktam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5193: eva. tad etat sarveṣv eva vākyeṣu samavetaṃ viviktaṃ ca dṛśyate. iha tāvat kadā cana starīr asīty{*3/272*} anena mantreṇa indra upasthātavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5194: naitat kasyacic chabdasya śravaṇād evāvagamyate. nāpi śabdāntarasya samīpa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5195: uccāritasya sāmarthyam asti, yenaitad avagamyate. etasyāṃ khalv ṛcīndraśabdo vidyate, yo viśiṣṭāṃ devatām avagamayituṃ śaknoti, tayā cāvagamitayā prayojanam astīti. tenendropasthāna indraśabdaḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5196: tadekavākyatāc cāvaśiṣṭāni padāni, na tv [286]{*3/273*} evam asyām ṛci
GSP28msbh1-7u:5197: kasyacic chabdasya sāmarthyād gārhapatyasyopasthānaṃ bhavati. śravaṇād eva tu gārhapatyaśabdasya, vayam agniṃ pratīmo na liṅgāt. yadi tu liṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5198: balīyaḥ, indra upasthātavyaḥ, yadi gārhapatyaśravaṇam, tato gārhapatyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5199: evaṃ tarhi liṅgavākye virudhyamāna iha saṃpradhārye na śrutiliṅge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5200: indraśabdasya viśiṣṭadevatābhidhānasāmarthyād indropasthānam, yadi liṅgaṃ balīyaḥ. atha tu vākyam, gārhapatya upastheyaḥ. vākyaṃ hy etad aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti. naitad evam, yady apy etad vākyaṃ śrutir apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:5201: atrāsti, yā tv atra śrutiḥ, sā liṅgena virudhyate, na yad vākyam. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5202: balīyasy api hi liṅge, aindryopatiṣṭhata ity etad gārhapatyaśabdena sahaikavākyatām upaityaiva{*3/274*}, yadi hi nopeyāt, tato liṅgena virudhyate. yas tu gārhapatyaśravaṇād evārthaḥ pratīyate, sa liṅge balīyasi parityakto bhavati. nāsāv upasthānena saṃbadhyate, tadā hīndraṃ gārhapatyaśabdo 'bhivaded agnisamīpaṃ vā. atha nu śrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5203: tato liṅgenāvagatam indropasthānaṃ bādhyeta. tasmāc chrutiliṅgayor evaiṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5204: virodhaḥ, na liṅgavākyayor iti. athavā nātraikavākyatvād indraprādhānyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5208: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tulyabale ete kāraṇa iti. katham? idam api kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5209: idam api, śrutir api, liṅgam api{*3/275*}. na hi vijñānasya vijñānasya ca kaścid viśeṣa upalabhyate rūpaṃ prati, asya bhaṅgurasyeva rūpam, asya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5210: dṛḍhasyeveti. nanu liṅgasya bhaṅgurasyeva rūpam, savicikitso hi bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:5211: liṅgāt pratyayaḥ, nirvicikitsaḥ śruteḥ. naitad yuktam, yato liṅgāt [287]{*3/276*} savicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ, tasya ca śruteś ca naiva saṃpradhāraṇāsti. yatas tu khalu liṅgān nirvicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ sa śrutyā vikalpitum arhati. nanu naiva kadācil liṅgān nirvicikitsaḥ pratyayo 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5212: naitad evam, evaṃ hi sati naiva liṅgaṃ nāma kiṃcit pramāṇam abhaviṣyat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5213: kāmaṃ mā bhūt pramāṇam, bhavati tu saṃśayo liṅgaparijñāteṣv artheṣu. yadi vā vispaṣṭam evāprāmāṇyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ. katham? samartham etad imam artham abhinirvartayitum iti liṅgād etāvad avagamyate. na ca yad yasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5214: nirvartanāyālam, tad asaty eva vacane tan nirvartayitum arhati. tasmān na liṅgaṃ viniyojakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5215: atrābhidhīyate - prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāne yam artham āmananti, sa tasya sādhanabhūta ity eva gamyate. kathaṃ khalūpakariṣyatīti saṃdihyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:5216: bhavati sāmarthyāt pariniścayaḥ. yatrāyaṃ samarthaḥ, tatra śakyo viniyoktam iti, tasmād bhavati liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. na ca liṅgaprāmāṇye
GSP28msbh1-7u:5217: vinigamanāyāṃ hetur asti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇe, kadā cana starīr
GSP28msbh1-7u:5218: asīti{*3/277*} liṅgād indra upasthātavyaḥ, śruter gārhapatya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5219: avirodhāt khalv apīmam evārthaṃ pratipadyāmahe. balīyān api hetur
GSP28msbh1-7u:5220: virudhyamānm abalīyāṃsaṃ bādhitum arhati nāviruddham, na ca kaścana
GSP28msbh1-7u:5221: virodhaḥ, yad indram upatiṣṭhetānena mantreṇa, gārhapatyam api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5222: nanv ayam eva virodhaḥ - sakṛd upasthānaṃ coditam, asakṛd abhinirvartyata iti. upastheyabhedāt pratipradhānam āvartante guṇā iti nyāya evaiṣa na virodhaḥ. ayaṃ tarhi virodhaḥ - gārhapatya upasthīyamāne 'gnivacana
GSP28msbh1-7u:5223: indraśabdo guṇaṃ kriyāyogaṃ vāpekṣamāṇo bhavitum arhati. indre tūpasthātavye nirapekṣa indra[288]{*3/278*}vacana eva, gauṇamukhyayoś ca mukhye saṃpratyaya iti. neti brūmaḥ - virodhe mukhyena gauṇo bādhyeta, na ca kaścid virodhaḥ, yugapad abhhidhāne hi virudhyeyātām. iha cānyasmin prayoge 'gnivacano 'nyasminn indravacanaḥ. atas tulyabale ete kāraṇe iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5224: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasī. kutaḥ? arthaviprakarṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5225: kim idam arthaviprakarṣād iti? arthasya viprakarṣo 'rthaviprakarṣaḥ. kaḥ punar arthaḥ? śrutyārthaḥ. gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5226: śrutyarthaḥ, indra upastheya iti viprakṛṣṭaḥ. katham? kadā cana starīr
GSP28msbh1-7u:5227: asīty{*3/279*} anena mantreṇendra upasthātavya iti na śrūyate. saty apīndrābhidhānasāmarthye vacanābhāvād anupasthānīya indra ity eva gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5228: nanv idam uktam - prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgam ity avagamyate, sāmarthyād viniyoga iti. naitad asti, uktam evaitat - dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5229: anapekṣaṃ syād iti. yad etat prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ cobhayam apy etad śabdam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5230: na cātikrāntapratyakṣaviṣaya evaṃlakṣaṇake 'rthe śabdam antareṇa paricchedo 'vakalpate. ato manyāmahe - viprakṛṣṭaṃ śrutyarthāl liṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5231: yady evaṃ śrutir yatra virodhinī na vidyate, tatrāpi na liṅgād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5232: arthaparicchedaḥ. tatraitad eva nāsti liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. kuta evaitena śrutir virotsyata iti. tatra śrutiliṅgayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇaiva nopapadyata iti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5233: atrocyate - itikartavyathārthinaḥ prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāv upanipatito mantra āmnānasāmarthyād itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vākyaśeṣatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:5234: abhyupetyaitena mantreṇa yajeteti. kim uktaṃ bhavati? yāgenābhīpsite sādhyamāne 'nena mantreṇopakuryād iti, na cāntareṇendrābhidhānam ayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5235: mantra upakartuṃ śaknoti, [289]{*3/280*} tenaitad uktaṃ bhavati, anenendro
GSP28msbh1-7u:5236: 'bhidhātavya iti. ataḥ śrutimūla evāyam arthaḥ. yadi śrutimūlaḥ, na śrutyantareṇa bādhituṃ śakyaḥ. tad etal liṅgaṃ yadi vā naiva pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5237: yadi vā śrutyā vikalpitum arhatīti. nāpy apramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati, nāpi vikalpiṣyata iti brūmaḥ. katham? śrutilakṣaṇo 'yam artha ity upapāditam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5238: tasmān nāpramāṇam. yatas tu khalv ānumānikīm ekavākyatāṃ liṅgasāmarthyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5239: cāpekṣya śrauto 'yam arthaḥ, yad indrasyopasthānam anena mantreṇety
GSP28msbh1-7u:5240: avagamyate, pratyakṣā tu śrutigārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti, sa eṣo 'rthaviprakarṣaḥ. prathamaṃ tāval liṅgajñānam, tataḥ sāṃarthyāc chabdenāyam artho 'bhihito bhavati, tad etac chrutivirodhe nāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5241: vispaṣṭaṃ hy avagatam etat, anena mantreṇa gārhapatya upastheya iti. tatra vijñātam etad evam ayam upakaroti mantra ity etasmiṃś ca nirjñāte kṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor naitad evaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5242: indropasthānaṃ śabdenābhihitam iti. tasmād arthaviprakarṣāc chrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5243: vikalpasya cānyāyyatvāt, anyāyyaś ca vikalpaḥ. tatra hy abhāvaḥ pakṣe nityavac ca, aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti śrūyamāne yad abhāvaḥ pakṣe parikalpyate, tad aśrutaṃ bhavati, śrutaṃ ca hīyate. yāvāṃś ca śrutasyārthasyotsarge doṣaḥ, tāvān aśrutaparikalpanāyām, ubhayatra hi prasiddhir bādhyate. tasmād anyāyyatvād vikalpasya śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasīty avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5244: atha yad uktam - sati virodhe nyāyyo bādhaḥ, na cātrāsti virodha iti, ayam asti virodhaḥ, yad akṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor indropasthānavācinī śrutir bhavati, kṛtasāmarthyayos tu nāvakalpate, na ca vākyaprakaraṇābhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5246: bhavitum. tasmād virodhaḥ, virodhe ca śrutir liṅgād balīyasīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5247: liṅgavākyayor virodhe kim udāharaṇam? syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suṣevaṃ{*3/282*} kalpayāmi. tasmin sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamāna iti{*3/283*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsno mantra
GSP28msbh1-7u:5248: upastaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavyaḥ, uta kalpayāmy anta upastaraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5249: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ puroḍāśāsādana iti. yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ, tataḥ kṛtsna ubhayatra. katham? suṣevaṃ{*3/284*} kalpayāmīty etad apekṣya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5250: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatām upaiti - yat kalpayāmi, tasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:5251: sīdeti. atha liṅgaṃ balīyaḥ, tataḥ kalpayāmy antaḥ sadanakaraṇe. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5252: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomīti{*3/285*}, sadanakaraṇam abhivaditum alam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5253: tasmin sīdety ayam api puroḍāśaṃ sādayitum iti, sādane viniyujyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5254: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tulyabale ete kāraṇa iti, yathā liṅgaṃ prati śruter balīyastvam uktam, na tathā vākyaṃ prati liṅgasyocyate. athavā vākyam eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:5255: liṅgād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ? tad dhi śrutyāpi bādhyate, na ca balīyaḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyate bādhitum. tenāsya bhaṅguratām adhyavasyāmaḥ, yas tv ekena
GSP28msbh1-7u:5257: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - liṅgavākyayor liṅgaṃ balīya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5259: darśapūrṇamāsāṅgam ayaṃ mantra ity avagamyate, tasmin sīdeti puroḍāśāsādanābhidhānasāmarthyāt sādane viniyujyamāne kṛtasāmarthyaṃ mantrāmnānam iti, nāsti pramāṇaṃ yenopastaraṇe 'pi viniyujyeta. tathā syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomīty{*3/286*} eṣo 'pi prakaraṇāmnānasāmarthyād eva darśapūrṇamāsāṅgatām āpannaḥ [291]{*3/287*} sāmarthyād evopastaraṇe viniyogāt kṛtaprayojane na puroḍāśāsādane viniyogam arhati, na hy asmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:5260: viniyuj-yamānasya kiṃcid api prayojanam asti. evam upastaraṇe tasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:5261: sīdety asya nāsti sāmarthyam. pūroḍāśāsādane 'pi syonaṃ ta ity{*3/288*}
