GSP28msbh1-7u:5262: asya. pūrveṇaikavākyatām upetyopastaraṇe sāmarthyam, pūrvasya pareṇaikavākyatvāt sādane, na tu svarūpeṇobhayoḥ. tad eṣo 'rthaviprakarṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5263: yat syonaṃ ta ity{*3/289*} asya pratyakṣaṃ sadanakarmaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5264: 'bhidhānasāmarthyam, tan mukhyam. tasmin sīdety asya punaḥ pūrveṇa sahaikavākyatām upagatasya bhavati jaghanyam. tad atra pūrvasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5265: mantrasyābhidhānasāmarthyād upastaraṇe viniyoga ukto bhavatīti, saṃnikṛṣṭo liṅgasya śrutyarthaḥ, uttarasya tūpajanite 'bhidhānasāmarthye tataḥ śrutyartha iti liṅgāntarito viprakṛṣṭo bhavati. evam uttarasya sādane
GSP28msbh1-7u:5266: saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ pūrvasya ca liṅgāntaritaḥ. tasmād arthaviprakṛṣṭāl liṅgavākyayor liṅgaṃ balavattaram, tataḥ syonam ity{*3/290*} eṣa śabdo yady apy uttareṇākāṅkśita iti sādane 'pi prayogam arhati, tathāpi bhitvā vākyam upastaraṇa eva viniyoktavyaḥ. tasmin sīdety eṣa ca sādane.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5267: nanu syonaṃ ta ity{*3/291*} asya śabdasya yathaivopastaraṇābhidhānasāmarthyam, evam uttareṇaikavākyatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:5268: sāmarthyam, sāmarthyaṃ ca liṅgam ity ucyate. tasmād bhidyamāne vākye
GSP28msbh1-7u:5269: liṅgam eva bādhitaṃ bhavatīti. satyam evam, etad api liṅgam, liṅgam api khalv etad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ viprakṛṣṭārtham eva bhavati, liṅgād ekavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5270: tasmād abhidhānasāmarthyam. tataḥ śrutyartha iti viprakṛṣṭārthatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5271: viprakṛṣṭārthatā ca bādhane hetubhūtā. tasmān na [292]{*3/292*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5272: uttaraṇaikavākyatāṃ yāsyatīti. evaṃ tasmin sīdety uttaraṃ na pūrveṇāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5273: api cottareṇaikavākyatām upagatasya na kiṃcid api dṛṣṭam asti kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5274: upastaraṇapratyāyanaṃ tu dṛṣṭam. kutaḥ? śrutatvād upastaraṇasya sādanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5275: ca. evam uttarasya sādanapratyāyanam, na tu pūrveṇaikavākyatāyām. na caitau pūrvottarābhyām ekavākyatām antareṇa pṛthag yathāyathaṃ kārye na
GSP28msbh1-7u:5276: kurutaḥ. tasmāt pūrvaḥ pūrvatra viniyojanīyaḥ, uttara uttaratreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5277: atha yad uktam - śrutyāpi tad bādhitam iti vākyenāpi tad bādhitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5278: naitad evam, na hi bādhitasyānyenāpi bādhanam eva nyāyyam, bādhitaṃ hy anugṛhītavyam arthavattvāya, śrutiṃ prati viprakṛṣṭārtham, vākyaṃ prati saṃnikṛṣṭārtham, tasmāl liṅgaṃ balīya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5279: atha vākyaprakaraṇayor virodhe katham iti. kiṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5280: kartavyasyetikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vacanaṃ prakaraṇam. prārambho hi sa tasyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5281: vacanakriyāyāḥ, na eṣa vidhyādir vidhyantāpekṣaḥ. vākyaṃ tūktam eva. tayor virodhe kim udāharaṇam? sūktavākanigadaḥ. tatra hi paurṇamāsīdevatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5282: amāvāsyādevatāś cāmnātāḥ, tāḥ paraspareṇaikavākyatāṃ nābhyupayanti. tatra liṅgasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīprayogād indrāgniśabda utkraṣṭavyo 'māvāsyāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5283: prayoktavyaḥ. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate, yo 'sya śeṣaḥ, avīvṛdhetāṃ mahojyāyo krātām{*3/293*} iti{*3/294*}, sa kiṃ yāvat kṛtvaḥ sūktavāke samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5284: tāvat kṛtva ubhayoḥ paurṇamāsyam āvāsyayoḥ prayoktavyaḥ, prakaraṇaṃ balavattaram iti, uta yatrendrāgniśabda utkṛṣya nītaḥ, tatraiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:5285: prayoktavyaḥ, vākyaṃ balavattaram iti. evaṃ sarveṣu saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5286: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tulyabale ete kāraṇa iti. kutaḥ? [293]{*3/295*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5287: itaratrāpy ākāṅkṣā, itaratrāpi, tulyāyām ākāṅkṣāyāṃ nāsti vinigamanāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5288: hetuḥ, tasmāt tulyabala iti. athavā vākyaṃ durbalam, bādhitaṃ hi talliṅgena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5289: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5291: vibhajyamānaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati, kṛtsnaṃ paripūrṇaṃ bhavati, tatra pratyakṣa ekavākyabhāvaḥ, prakaraṇe tv apratyakṣaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5292: itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya samīpa upanipatitaṃ pūrṇam iti tasya prakṛtasya sākāṅkṣatvam avagamyate, naikavākyabhūtam ity anumīyate. ekavākyatayā cābhidhānasāmarthyam avakalpyābhihito 'yam evaṃ bhavatīti parikalpanā. eṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5294: viprakṛṣṭā. tasmāt sūktavākena prastaraṃ{*3/296*} praharatīti paurṇamāsīdevatāvācinām amāv āsyā devatāvācināṃ ca niṣkṛṣya prayoge tac
GSP28msbh1-7u:5295: cheṣāṇām api niṣkṛṣya prayogaḥ, tena yady api prakaraṇasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīdevatāpadaśeṣāṇām amāv āsyā devatāvācibhiḥ sahaikavākyatānumīyate, pratyakṣā tv amāv āsyā devatāpadaiḥ saha, na ca pratyakṣavirodhe 'numānaṃ saṃbhavati. arthavati ca prakaraṇe saṃjāte na nirākāṅkṣāṇām ākāṅkṣā śakyopapādayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5296: atha yad uktam - liṅgenāpi hi tad bādhyate, ataḥ prakaraṇenāpi bādhitavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5297: iti. na, yad anyenāpi bādhyate, tad bhaṅguram anyatrāpīty avagantavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5298: atha bhaṅguram, pramāṇam eva nābhaviṣyat. kiṃcit tu prati kasyacit
GSP28msbh1-7u:5299: prabhāvaḥ, vākyasya prakaraṇaṃ prati bādhakaśaktir na tu liṅgaṃ prati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5300: liṅgaṃ prati viprakṛṣṭārtham etat prakaraṇaṃ prati saṃnikṛṣṭārtham, tena vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5301: [294]{*3/297*} atha prakaraṇasya kramasya ca virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5302: rājasūyaprakaraṇe 'bhiṣecanīyakrame śaunaḥśephākhyānādy āmnātam, yadi prakaraṇaṃ balavat, sarveṣāṃ tad aṅgam, yadi kramaḥ, abhiṣecanīyasyaiva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5303: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tulyabala ete kāraṇa iti. kutaḥ? na tāvad viśeṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5304: upalabhāmahe, yenāvagacchāma idaṃ balīya iti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5305: iti. api ca prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhitam, tasmād bādhyeta krameṇāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5306: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇaṃ kramād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ? arthaviprakarṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5307: ko 'trārthaviprakarṣaḥ? prakaraṇavataḥ sākāṅkṣatvāt, tatsaṃnidhānāmnātena paripūrṇenāpy avakalpetaikavākyatvam, na tu kramavataḥ krama āmnātena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5308: anekasyāmnāyamānasya saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānamātraṃ hi kramaḥ. tatra saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānasāmarthyāt kramavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnātasyānupalabhyamānam evākāṅkṣāvattvam astīty avagantavyam. prakaraṇe tu prakaraṇavataḥ pratyakṣam, na ca prakaraṇavatā kramavatā ca yaugapadyenaikavākyatā saṃbhavaty āmnātasyeti virodhaḥ. tatra prakaraṇe pratyakṣaṃ sākāṅkṣatvam, krama ānumānikaṃ bādhitum arhati, sākāṅkṣatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5309: ekavākyatvam. ekavākyatvād abhidhānasāmarthyam, sāmarthyāc chrutyartha iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5310: saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasya śrutyarthaḥ, viprakṛṣṭaḥ kramasya. tasmāt krama karaṇayoḥ prakaraṇaṃ balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5311: atha yad uktam - vākyenāpi hi tad bādhitam, ato 'nyenāpi tad bādhitavyam iti. naitat, bādhitasyānugraho nyāyyaḥ, na bādhitaṃ{*3/298*} bādhitavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5313: atha kramasamākhyayor virodhe kim udāharaṇam? kiṃ balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5314: pauroḍāśikam iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sāṃnāyyakrame śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya kramaṇa iti{*3/299*} śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ. tatra saṃdihyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5316: viniyoktavyaḥ, uta kramasya balīyastvāt sāṃnāyyapātrāṇām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tulyabale ete karaṇe{*3/301*} syātām. kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, yadi vā samākhyaiva balīyasī, bādhito hi kramaḥ prakaraṇenāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5317: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kramo balīyān. kutaḥ? arthaviprakarṣāt. kaḥ punar atrārthaviprakarṣaḥ? nirjñāte prakaraṇena kenāpi sahaikavākyatve yat saṃnidhāv āmnāyate, tatrākāṅkṣāṃ parikalpyate, naikavākyatety avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5318: laukikaś ca śabdaḥ samākhyā. na ca, loka evaṃvidheṣv artheṣu pramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5320: yady evaṃ bhavaty evaṃlakṣaṇakeṣu krameṇa viniyogaḥ, na tv arthāviprakarṣāt kramo balīyān. katham? dvayor hi pramāṇayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇam, na caivaṃ sati samākhyā pramāṇam, laukikatvāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:5321: chabdasya, puruṣasya pramāṇatā bhavatīti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, nātrāṅgabhāvaḥ puruṣaprāmāṇyād gamyate, pauroḍāśikaśabda etasya kāṇḍasya, ity etad atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:5322: puruṣapramāṇakam. bhavati cāsminn arthe puruṣaḥ pramāṇam, yathā sāṃnāyyakrama āmnānaṃ puruṣapramāṇakam, yathā prakaraṇam ekavākyatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5323: vedaśabdaś cāyam iti. na hy ete 'nindriyaviṣayā arthā upapadyante, eṣv abhiyuktānāṃ prāmāṇyam, ye tv anindriyaviṣayās teṣv abhiyuktā na pramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5324: tasmāt samākhyā kāraṇam, kāraṇatve ca sati balīyastvaṃ parīkṣyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5326: arthaviprakarṣaḥ. upadiśyate hi krame samāmnānāt sāṃnāyyasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5327: nopadiśyate samākhyāyām, śabdam uccāryamāṇam upalabhyārthāpattyā nūnam astīti kalpyate. tasmāt pūrvavedārthaviprakarṣāt krameṇa samākhyā bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5328: atha yat tatra tatrocyate - idam anena bādhyate, idam aneneti. tatra yad bādhyate, tat kiṃ bādhakaviṣayaṃ prāptam utāprāptam [296]{*3/302*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5329: kiṃ cātaḥ? yady aprāptam, kiṃ bādhyate? atha prāptam, kathaṃ śakyeta bādhitum? prāptaṃ bādhakaviṣayaṃ pūrvavijñānam iti brūmaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5330: sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamānatvāt. atha kathaṃ nivartate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5331: mithyājñānam{*3/303*} iti pratyayāntaraṃ bhavati. kiṃ tu{*3/304*} khalv amithyājñānasya svarūpam? yasya bādhakaḥ pratyayo vimṛṣyamāṇasyāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5332: nopapadyate, na tan mithyā. tad eteṣāṃ śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:5333: paraṃ paraṃ prati balīyo bhavati, naitasyotpannasya vimṛṣyamāṇasya bādhakaṃ vijñānāntaram asti. tasmāt teṣāṃ samavāye virodhe{*3/305*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5339: *{3/275: E1 gibt śrutir api, liṅgam api in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5351: *{3/293: E2: maho jyāyate 'krātām, E4: maho jyāyo 'krātām, E6: mahojyāyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5358: *{3/303: E2,4: naiva hi tannivartate. kathaṃ tarhi? mithyājñānam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5362: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado
GSP28msbh1-7u:5363: dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/306*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ dvādaśopasattā jyotiṣṭoma
GSP28msbh1-7u:5364: utāhīna iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? jyotiṣṭoma iti. kutaḥ? prakaraṇāt, evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati. nanu vākyena bādhyate. na bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5365: ahīnaśabdena jyotiṣṭomaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ. kutaḥ? na hīyata ity ahīnaḥ, dakṣiṇayā kratukaraṇair vā phalena vā na hīyate, tena jyotiṣṭomo 'hīnaḥ. vāśabdena saṃśayo nivartyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5368: asaṃyogāt tu mukhyasya tasmād apakṛṣyeta{*3/308*} // MS_3,3.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5369: apakṛṣyeta dvādaśopasattā. kutaḥ? asaṃyogāj jyotiṣṭomena. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:5370: asaṃyogaḥ? ahīnenaikavākyatvasya pratyakṣatvāt. nanu jyotiṣṭoma eva gauṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5371: 'hīnaḥ. nety ucyate, na hi mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇagrahaṇam arhati. nanu nañsamāso bhaviṣyati. neti brūmaḥ, tathā saty ādyudātto 'hīnaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5372: 'bhaviṣyat, madhyodāttas tv ayam{*3/309*}. tasmāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvāhīnasya dharmaḥ. api ca vyapadeśo bhavati - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti. yady anyaḥ sāhno 'nyaś cāhīnaḥ, tata evaṃ vyapadeśo 'vakalpate, vidyate ca vyapadeśavacanam, tasmād ahīnasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5377: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī{*3/311*} iti{*3/312*} dvayor yajamānayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt{*3/313*}. ete 'sṛgram indava iti{*3/314*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5378: bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti{*3/315*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - jyotiṣṭoma eva niviśete pratipādāu, uta dviyajñaṃ kiṃcit kulāyādiṃ bahuyajñaṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:5379: dvirātrādim utkraṣṭavya iti. kiṃ prāptam? dvitvabahutvayukte
GSP28msbh1-7u:5380: jyotiṣṭomenāsaṃyogād{*3/316*} utkṛṣyeyātāṃ pratipadau, na hi [298]{*3/317*} jyotiṣṭomasya dvau yajamānau śrūyete, yathā kulāyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5392: iti cet paśyasi - partipadāv utkraṣṭavya iti. naitad evam, prakaraṇaṃ hi bādhyeta. bādhyatām asaṃyogād dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:5393: yajamānair jyotiṣṭomasyeti cet. asaty api vacane 'rthād dvau yajamānau bhaviṣyataḥ, ya eko na śakṣyati, samahāyaḥ sa upakraṃsyate, avaśyayaṣṭavye sati yathā śakyate, tathā yaṣṭavyam iti bādhitvāpi kāṃcit prāptiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5394: yajamānaḥ sahāyam upādāsyate. evaṃ prakaraṇe pratipadau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5397: prakṛtir hi jyotiṣṭomaḥ, pratyakṣās tatra dharmā āmnātāḥ, na kutaścic codakena prāpyante. kim ataḥ? yady evam, pratyakṣaśrutā na śakyā bādhitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5398: vikṛtau tu codakaprāptāḥ santa ānumānikā bādhyerann iti, vivakṣitaṃ hi jyotiṣṭome kartur ekatvaṃ pratyakṣaśrutaṃ na sāmarthyena bādhyate. yatrāpi hy avaśyakartavyatā śrūyate, tatrāpy eka eva yajamānaḥ śrūyate - vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeteti. tasmāj jyotiṣṭomād utkraṣṭavya ete pratipādāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5399: atha kasmāt patnyabhiprāyam etan na bhavati? ekasyāṃ patnyāṃ yajamāne ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5400: yuvaṃ hi stha iti, dvayor bahuṣu vā patnīṣv ete 'sṛgram indava iti, yathā kṣaume vasānāv agnimādadhīyātām iti kṣaumavasānaparaṃ vacanam, evam ihāpi pratipad vidhānaparam. ucyate - asaṃbhavāt tatra mukhyasya, lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ puṃso [299]{*3/319*} vācakaḥ striyām, iha tu dviyajñe bahuyajñe ca saṃbhavati na lakṣaṇāśabdo bhavitum arhati, bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti. yad apy etad dvivacanaṃ dvayor yajamānayor iti, atrāpi yaḥ, ekaśeṣaḥ, pumān striyety asāv api lakṣaṇāśabda eva. api ca, upāsmai gāyatā nara iti pratipador niravakāśatvam eva syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavye ete pratipadāv iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5403: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim etad vidhānaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ, uta paśāv iti. kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5404: darśapūrṇamāyayoḥ? kathaṃ ca paśāv iti. yadi jāghanyāṃ patnīsaṃyājā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5405: vidhīyante tata utkarṣaḥ, atha patnīsaṃyājeṣu jāghanī vidhīyate tato darśapūrṇamāsayor eva. kiṃ prāptam? utkarṣaḥ. kuta etad utkṛṣyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5406: jāghanyāṃ patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyanta iti. katham? śabdāt patnīsaṃyājānāṃ vidhānam, vākyena jāghanyāḥ, śabdaś ca balavān, na vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5407: nanu patnīsaṃyājā vihitā eva. satyaṃ vihitāḥ, jāghanyām idānīṃ punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:5408: vidhīyante, sā tatsaṃbaddhā kartavyety ucyate. evaṃ sati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5409: patnīsaṃyājā vināpi jāghanyā na viguṇāḥ, jāghanī tu tatra pratipādyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5410: tasmād yatra jāghanī prayojanavatī tatra tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ, paśau ca sā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5411: na darśapūrṇa[300]{*3/320*}māsayoḥ. ekadeśaś ca jāghanī pratipādyamānā na paśuṃ prayokṣyate, tasmād asya vidhānasyotkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5414: jāghanī vā patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena vidhīyate. kutaḥ? apūrvatāt, aprāptā jāghanī patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena. tatra svaśabdena patnīsaṃyājā vihitā jāghanīsaṃbandhas teṣām avihitaḥ, yatra ca saṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5415: tatrānyatarasyānyatra vidhānam, saṃbandho nāntarīyakaḥ. yad vā saṃbandhasya vidhānaṃ nāntarīyakau saṃbandhinau, yatrobhau lakṣaṇatvena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5416: tatra svaśabdena saṃbandho vidhīyate, yatra tv anyataro lakṣaṇatvena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5417: tatra ekaṃ lakṣayitvānyataro vidhīyate, lakṣaṇatvena cātra patnīsaṃyājāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5418: katham avagamyate? patnīsaṃbandhān na sarvo yāgaḥ, kaścid eva tu lakṣyate yasya patnyaḥ sādhanatvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5419: atha kasmān na jāghanīṃ lakṣayitvā patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante? nāsyāpūrvasya yāgasya patnyaḥ śak-yante vidhātum, jāghanyāṃ tu lakṣyamāṇāyāṃ yāge sapatnīke vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asti tv atra vihitaḥ sapatnīko yāgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5420: ya patnībhir lakṣyate. tasmād yāgaṃ lakṣayitvā jāghanī vidhīyate. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5421: vākyena jāghanīvidhānaṃ śrutyā yāgasyeti, tad iha yāgavidhānaṃ na saṃbhavatīty uktam, vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt. tasmāj jāghanīvidhānam. evaṃ ced darśapūrṇamāsayor vinā jāghanyā viguṇaḥ patnīsaṃyājayāgaḥ syāt, tasmād anutkarṣam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5423: atha yad uktam - ekadeśo jāghanī na paśuṃ prayokṣyate, tasmād utkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5427: na prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayor jāghanī śāstrenocyate. evaṃ paśor niṣpannayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5428: jāghanyā patnīsaṃyājā yaṣṭavyā iti. aviśiṣṭā jāghanī vidhīyate. sā saṃbhavati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ krītyāpy ānīyamānā, tasmād anutkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5429: saṃtardanaṃ prakṛtau krayaṇavad anarthalopāt syāt // MS_3,3.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5430: jyotiṣṭome 'bhiṣavaṇaphalake{*3/322*} prakṛtya śrūyate - dīrghasome saṃtṛdyād dhṛtyā iti{*3/323*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭoma
GSP28msbh1-7u:5431: eva, āhosvid dīrghakāleṣu someṣv iti. ucyate - naital luptārthaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5432: tasmān notkṛṣyeteti. āha nanv asaṃtardanam api śrūyate - asaṃtṛṇe{*3/324*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5433: bhavata iti{*3/325*}. ucyate - krayaṇavad vikalpiṣyate{*3/326*}, yathā hiraṇyena krīṇāti gavā krīṇātītyevamādīnāṃ vikalpaḥ, evam atrāpi vikalpo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5438: *{3/324: E2: asaṃtṛṇye, E4: asaṃtṛṣṇe; E6: asantṛṇṇe}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5442: utkṛṣyate vā saṃtardanam, gṛhyate hi viśeṣaḥ, dīrghasome [302]{*3/327*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5443: saṃtṛdyād iti. jyotiṣṭomam apekṣya satrāṇi kālato dīrghāṇi bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5446: notkṛṣyeta vā saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭomāt. evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5447: dīrghasomaśabdaś ca kartṛto bhaviṣyati, dīrghasya yajamānasya somo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5450: na caitad asti - jyotiṣṭome saṃniveśa iti, dīrghakāle some kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5451: kratuta eva dīrghatvam, na kartṛtaḥ. kutaḥ? arthavādānupapatteḥ, dhṛtyety arthavādo bhavati, dhāraṇāyety arthaḥ, dīrghakāle some punaḥ punar grāvabhir abhihanyamāne somābhiṣavaṇaphalakayor dāraṇaśaṅkāyām, dhṛtyety arthavāda upapadyate, tasmād utkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5453: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram. kāni padāni? atha kim arthaṃ saṃsthāsu na niveśaḥ?. tathā sati prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhaviṣyati, dīrghasomaśabdaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:5454: ca. dīrghakālo hy agniṣṭomam apekṣyokthyādiṣu saṃsthāsu soma iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5455: na saṃsthāsu dīrghakālatve 'pi some 'rthavāda upapadyate, tāvān eva hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5456: tatra somo daśa muṣṭīr mimīta iti vacanāt. tatra dhāraṇe na viśeṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5460: na caitad asti - utkarṣa iti, prakaraṇānugrahād anutkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5461: dīrghasomaśabdaś ca dīrghakālatvād upapadyate, tatrāpy adhiko 'gniṣṭomāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:5462: somaḥ, pradānāni hi vivardhante. tāny avivṛddhe pradeye na śakyāni vivardhayitum. pūrṇe grahe grahaśabdo bhavati, tena na śakyāni nyūnāni pātrāṇi grahītum. tasmād dāraṇāśaṅkāyāṃ dhāraṇam āśaṃsitavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5465: iti cet paśyasi - saṃsthāsv apy arthavādo 'vakalpate pradeyavivṛddhyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5466: naitad evam, vyarthaiva hi stutir bhavet. kutaḥ? somāviśeṣāt, yāvān evāgniṣṭome somaḥ, tāvān evokthyādiṣv api saṃsthāsu, ukthyādiṣv api daśamuṣṭir eva somo grahītavyaḥ. nanv arthāt pradeyaṃ vivartsyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5467: daśamuṣṭiḥ sa kathaṃ śakyeta vivardhayitum? triparveti ca parvasaṃkhyāniyamān na śakyo bahuparvā grahītum, tasmād dhāraṇāviśeṣād arthavādānupapattiḥ saṃsthāsu syāt, tasmād utkarṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5469: naitad asti - utkarṣa iti, saṃsthāsu syāt, prakaraṇānugrahāt. arthāc ca pradeyavivṛddhyā dāraṇaśaṅkāyām arthavāda upapadyate, kena prakāreṇa pradeyaṃ vivardhiṣyata iti, viprakṛṣṭaparvā somo grahīṣyate. api ca tṛtīye
GSP28msbh1-7u:5470: savana 'śur eko 'bhiṣūyate, tasya pramāṇaṃ ca nāmnātam. tam anekaparvāṇaṃ sthūlaparvāṇaṃ ca grahīṣyati, [304]{*3/329*} tena pradeyavivṛddhir bhaviṣyati, ato 'rthavādo 'vakalpiṣyate, tasmāt saṃsthāsu niveśa iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5474: jyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtya samāmnāyate - na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5475: dvitīye tṛtīye vā pravṛñjyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jyotiṣṭome sarveṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:5476: eva prayogeṣu na pravarjitavyam, uta prathame prayoge pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? jyotiṣṭome pratiṣedhaḥ. kutaḥ? yajñasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5477: prathamaśabdena yajño 'bhidhīyate jyotiṣṭomaḥ. tasya hi prathamasaṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5478: evaṃ samāmnāyate - eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ{*3/330*} yaj jyotiṣṭomo ya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5479: etenānṣṭvāthānyena yajeteti. yajñānāṃ prathama iti kṛtvā prathamaśabdena jyotiṣṭomo 'bhidhīyate, evaṃ ca prakaraṇam anugṛhyate, yadi krator eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5480: vādaḥ. tasmāt saṃkhyāyuktaḥ pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomasya pravargyaṃ pratiṣedhed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5483: naimittikaṃ vā kartṛsaṃyogāl liṅgasya tannimittatvā // MS_3,3.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5484: na caitad asti - yajñasyaiṣa vāda iti, caturṣv api vedeṣu na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5485: prathamayajña{*3/331*} ityevaṃsaṃjñakaḥ kaścid yajño 'sti, bhavati tu prathamo [305]{*3/332*} yajñasya prayogaḥ, kartṛsaṃyogāt. pūrvasya dvitīyādīn apekṣya prathamaśabdo bhavati, sa prayogasyopapadyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:5486: kratoḥ. prayogaḥ śravaṇād gamyate, kratuḥ prayogasaṃbaddhatvāt, śrutiś ca balīyasī na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt prathame prayoge na pravarjitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5487: atha yad uktam - jyotiṣṭomena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt tad vacana iti, laksaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti tat parihṛtam. yat tu prathamayajña iti yajñaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam, tad api yajñaśabdasya yāgavacanatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5491: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetācodanāt prakṛtau // MS_3,3.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5492: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmananti - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi sa iti{*3/333*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau, uta vikṛtāv iti. kiṃ prāptam? prakṛtāv iti. kutaḥ? prakaraṇāt. nanu prakṛtau pūṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5493: na kasyacid dhaviṣo devatāṃ samāmanantīti. ucyate - prākṛtīṃ kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5494: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yatra pauṣṇaṃ havir asti, tatra tasya pesaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5495: vidhātsuṃ śakyam, na ca prakṛtau pūṣāsti, tasmād utkraṣṭavyaṃ peṣaṇam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5496: yad uktam - kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyatīti, brūyāt, yady anyatrāpi mukhyaḥ pūṣā na syāt. nanv anyatra kriyamāṇe prakaraṇam uparudhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5497: uparudhyatām, vākyaṃ hy asyoparodhakam. athavā naivātra saṃdehaḥ, evam eva prāptam ucyate - pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau na prakṛtāv iti, nāsti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5498: puṣṇaḥ{*3/334*} prakṛtau [306]{*3/335*} codaneti. kim arthaṃ prāptam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5504: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau śrūyamāṇaṃ vikṛtāv ity uktam. tatra saṃdehaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5505: kiṃ carau, paśau, puroḍāśe ca, uta carāv eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? tat sarvatra syāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca. kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, na kaścid viśeṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5507: carau vā, arthoktaṃ puroḍāśe 'rthavipratiṣedhāt paśau na syāt // MS_3,3.36
GSP28msbh1-7u:5508: carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ viniyujyeta. puroḍāśe tāvat peṣaṇam arthād eva prāpnoti, naivām yathā puroḍāśo bhavati, tad arthaṃ tāvan na vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5509: paśau ca na syāt, hṛdayādiṣu piṣyamāṇeṣu teṣām ākāravināśaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ? hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyatīti{*3/336*} na hṛdayād avadāyiṣyate, tathānyad apy avadānaṃ na yathāśrutād avadāsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5510: nanu śakyate piṣṭebhyo 'pi hṛdayādibhyo 'vadātum. neti brūmaḥ, ākārā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5511: hṛdayādayaḥ, na māṃsāni, uktam etad ākṛtiḥ śabdārtha iti{*3/337*}. yady api punas tadākṛtikaḥ kriyate, tathāpy asyotsādanapradeśaṃ prati muhyeyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5512: tasmāc carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty evam arthaṃ vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5517: iti cet paśyati bhavān - arthavipratiṣedhān na paśvartham [307]{*3/338*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5518: iti. nanu carāv apy arthavipratiṣedhaḥ, viśadasiddha odane caruśabdam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5519: upacaranti, piṣyamāṇo hi piṣṭakaṃ yavāgūrvā syāt khalir vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5522: atrocyate - satyaṃ viśadasiddha odane caruśabdaḥ prayujyate, viśadasiddhaś carur dīyata iti, na tv asya viśadasiddhir nimittam. yadi viśadasiddhir nimittaṃ syāt, na piṣṭasiddhe prayujyeta. tatrāpi hi prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5523: piṣṭakacaruḥ sādhyata iti, ato 'nyad etayoḥ sāmānyam, tan nimittam, tad etad ucyate - na paktināmatvād iti, na carau vipratiṣedhaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5525: anavasrāvitāntaruṣmapākenābhinirvartyasya bhavati caruśabdo vācakaḥ. tena piṣṭa odane viśadaudane ca prayoktāro bhavanti, carur iti. pakṣoktam eva prayojanam, pūrvapakṣe paśāv api peṣaṇaṃ, siddhānte cārāv eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5527: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau bhavati carāv evety uktam. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5528: kim ekadevatye pauṣṇa etad bhavati, uta dvidevatye 'pīti. kiṃ dvidevatya udāharaṇam? rājasūya uttare trisaṃyukte saumāpauṣṇe ekādaśakapāle aindrāpauṣṇaś caruḥ śyāvo dakṣiṇeti, tatraindrāpauṣṇa udāharaṇam. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5529: prāptam? ekadevatyasyaiva peṣaṇam iti. kutaḥ? kevalasaṃyogāt, yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5533: dvidevatye vipratiṣidhyeta dharmaḥ, pūṣṇaḥ peṣaṇam, netarasya, tatra yadi pūṣṇo bhāgaḥ piṣyeta, apiṣṭa itarasya syāt. tatra viṣamaḥ pāko bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5534: pākanimittaś ca caruśabdaḥ sa vipratiṣidhyeta. athāvirodhaṃ manyamānā aparasyāpi bhāgaṃ piṃṣyuḥ. bhāgasaṃmohaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ? anyasya bhāgo 'nyasymā avadīyeta. tathāyathāśrutaṃ kriyeta, tasmād apy ekadevatye
GSP28msbh1-7u:5536: api vā sadvitīye syād devatānimittatvāt // MS_3,3.41 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5537: devatānimittam etat peṣaṇaṃ śrūyate - pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti, sa ca dvidevatye 'pi bhāge piṣyamāṇe prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kṛto bhavati, na yathā caturdhākaraṇe, tatra hi tad dhito nirapekṣasya bhavati, na sadvitīyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5538: indrapīta iti samāso 'pi nirapekṣasya, na sadvitīyasya. iha tu prapiṣṭaśabdasya bhāgaśabdena sahānyapadārtho bahuvrīhiḥ samāsaḥ, eṣo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5539: samarthayor eva, na tv atra dvidevatye kaścid evaṃjātīyako doṣaḥ. tasmād ekadevatye dvidevatye 'pi vā carāv asya bhāgaḥ peṣṭavya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5541: liṅgam apy evaṃ bhavati - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako
GSP28msbh1-7u:5542: hīti{*3/340*}, devatānimittaṃ peṣaṇam iti stutir darśayati. tathā saumāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapen nemapiṣṭaṃ paśukāma iti{*3/341*} nemapiṣṭatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5543: darśayati. tathārdhaṃ piṣṭam ardham apiṣṭaṃ bhavati dvidevatyatvāyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5548: vacanāt sarvapeṣaṇaṃ taṃ prati śāstravattvād arthābhāvād dvicarāv{*3/343*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5550: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram, nemapiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti kasmād etan na vacanam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5551: ucyate, yadi vacanam etad bhavet saumāpauṣṇamātram anūdya sarvatra peṣaṇaṃ vidadhyāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca, tatra somāpauṣṇasya{*3/344*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5552: carusaṃbandhe nemapiṣṭasaṃbandhe cobhayasmin vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5553: tasmād yo yaḥ saumāpauṣṇas tatra tatra nemapiṣṭatā, taṃ prati saumāpauṣṇamātraṃ prati{*3/345*} śāstravattvam ardhapeṣaṇasya, puroḍāśe
GSP28msbh1-7u:5554: 'rthāt sarvapeṣaṇe prāpte 'rthābhāvāc ca paśau carau vāpeṣaṇe prāpte vacanam idaṃ bhavet. tatra caruśabdo na vivakṣitasvārthaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5555: pradarśanārthaḥ kalpyeta, peṣaṇānuvādapakṣe punar naiṣa virodho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5556: tasmād bhavaty eva liṅgam. nanv aṅganāśabhayāt paśor apeṣaṇam. neti brūmaḥ - ardhapeṣaṇe nāṅganāśo 'piṣṭād avadāsyate, peṣaṇaṃ cādṛṣṭārtham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5560: *{3/345: E1 gibt saumāpauṣṇamātraṃ prati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5561: ekasmin vārthadharmatvād aindrāgnavad ubhayor na syād acoditatvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5562: ekadevatye vā pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati, naindrāpauṣṇe. kutaḥ? naiṣa devatādharmo vidhīyate, pūṣṇo bhāgaḥ piṣṭa upayoktavya iti. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5563: arthasya dharmaḥ. kaḥ punar arthaḥ? yāgaḥ. katham avagamyate? na devatādharma iti. ucyate - na hi tasyā bhāgo 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5564: nanu yad devatāyai dīyate, tat tasyā bhāgo bhavati. ucyate - etad dhi devatām uddiśya tyajyate, na ca tyāgamātreṇa devatāsvatvaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5565: parigrahaṇena hi svasvāmisaṃbandha āpadyate, na ca parigṛhītaṃ devatayeti kiṃcana pramāṇam asti. yaś{*3/346*} ca yaṃ bhajate, sa [310]{*3/347*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5566: tasya bhāgaḥ, na ca havir devatā bhajate, tasmān nāsti pūṣṇo bhāgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5567: athāpi kathaṃcid bhaved bhāgaḥ, tathāpi na devatāyā dharmaḥ peṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati, niṣprayojano hi tathā syād ayāgadharmatvāt. kathaṃ tarhi prakaraṇāntare samāmnāto yāgadharmo bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, vākyasaṃyogāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5568: nanu ca devatayaiṣa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate na yāgeneti. ucyate - bhāgābhāvād anarthakatvāc ca na devatāsaṃyoga ity uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5569: tathāpi tu yathā yāgasaṃbandho bhavati, tathā vaktavyam. tad ucyate - ayam atra pūṣṇo bhāgo yaḥ pūṣaṇam uddiśya tyajyate, yasya dravyasya tyāge pūṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5570: devatā, na caindrāpauṣṇe bhavati pūṣā devatā, na sa caruḥ pūṣṇaḥ svatvena saṃbadhyate. tasmād aindrāpauṣṇe na kaścid asti pūṣṇaś caruṇā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5571: kevale tu pūṣaṇi devatābhūte tasmai saṃkalpito bhāgo bhavati. katham? yam uddiśya saṃkalpo bhavati sa tasya bhāga iti prasiddhir eṣā, tena yady api
GSP28msbh1-7u:5572: pūṣā svenoccāraṇenendrāpūṣṇor upakārakam uccāraṇaṃ kurvann upakārako
GSP28msbh1-7u:5573: bhavet, tathāpi na tasya dvidevatyo bhāga ity ucyate, asaṃkalpanāt. kevale pūṣaṇi devatāyāṃ caroḥ peṣaṇaṃ kriyate, naindrāpauṣṇeṣu dvidevatyeṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5577: yad uktam - adantako hīti{*3/348*} devatādharmaṃ darśayatīti. arthavāda eṣa itarasminn api pakṣa upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5581: athāparaṃ yat kāraṇam uktam - nemapiṣṭam iti{*3/349*} dvidevatye peṣaṇaṃ darśayati, ardhapiṣṭaṃ{*3/350*} bhavaty ardham apiṣṭaṃ dvidevatyatvāyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5582: [311]{*3/351*} devatādharmaṃ darśayatīti. atrocyate - evaṃ sati vacanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5583: idam aprāpte bhavatīti. nanv anekārthavidhidhānam ekaṃ vākyaṃ prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5585: asati punaḥ pakṣāntare uccāraṇānarthakyaprasaṅgaparijihīrṣayānekārthaṃ vākyam abhyupagantavyaṃ bhavati. tasmān na dvidevatye peṣaṇam iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5589: nivītam iti manuṣyadharmaḥ śabdasya tatpradhānatvāt // MS_3,4.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5590: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam - nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṝṇām upavītaṃ devānām upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kuruta iti{*3/353*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5591: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām ity atra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ vidhir utārthavāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5592: yadā vidhiḥ, tadā kim ayaṃ puruṣadharma uta karmadharmaḥ? atha yat prakaraṇe manuṣyāṇām, tatra vidhiḥ, uta manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇi niviśata
GSP28msbh1-7u:5594: kiṃ prāptam? vidhir manuṣyadharmaś ceti, yadi vidhir evam apūrvam arthaṃ vidadhad arthavān bhavati, itarathārthavādamātram anarthakam. vidhiś cet puruṣadharmo nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti puruṣapradhāno nirdeśaḥ. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:5595: avagamyate? nātra manuṣyā vidhīyante, manuṣyāṇāṃ nivītaṃ vidhīyate, na cāvihitam aṅgaṃ bhavati. yadi manuṣyā api vidhīyeran vākyaṃ bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5597: nanu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor upakārakam. prakaraṇād dhi vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5598: balavattaram. api ca guṇabhūteṣu manuṣyeṣu kārakasaṃbandhasya vivakṣitatvāt tṛtīyā bhavet, ṣaṣṭhī tv eṣā saṃbandhalakṣaṇā, tatra guṇabhūteṣu manuṣyeṣu manuṣyagrahaṇaṃ naiva kartavyaṃ syāt. manuṣyair eva tat kriyamāṇaṃ kriyeta, manuṣyapradhānapakṣe tu kartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5602: apadeśa iti jñāyamānasya vacanam. sa eṣa na vidhiḥ. anuvāda eṣaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5603: arthasya vidyamānatvāt. prāpta evārthaḥ, yan nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām, nivītaṃ hi manuṣyāḥ prāyaśaḥ svārthaṃ kurvanti, tasmād anuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5605: vidhir eva bhavet, tathā prayojanavān, itarathā vādamātram anarthakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5606: pūrvavān anuvādo bhavati, ayaṃ tv apūrvaḥ, yan niyamena nivyātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5610: yad uktam - vidhir iti, etad gṛhyate. yat tu manuṣyadharma iti, tan
GSP28msbh1-7u:5611: nānumatam. kratudharmo{*3/356*} 'yaṃ prakaraṇāt, prakṛtyaiva{*3/357*} hi karmaprāyeṣu dharmeṣūcyamāneṣv etad abhidhīyate, tasmāt karmadharmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5616: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām ity asya vākyaśeṣaḥ samākhyā, ādhvaryavam iti{*3/358*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5617: yadi darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śeṣaḥ, tato 'dhvaryuṇā kartavyam. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:5622: ucyate - prakaraṇāt samākhyānāc ca karmadharmo vijñāyate, [314]{*3/360*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5623: vākyān manuṣyadharmaḥ, tasmād utkarṣam arhati. neti brūmaḥ, prakaraṇa evābhiniviśamānasya manuṣyapradhānatāvakalpiṣyate. katham? yad darśapūrṇamāsayor manuṣyapradhānam, tatra nivekṣyate 'nvāhāryakarmaṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5626: tatpradhāne vā tulyavat prasaṃkhyānād itarasya tadarthatvāt // MS_3,4.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5627: naitad asti - prakaraṇe niveśa iti, manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇi nivītaṃ syād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5628: ātithye. kutaḥ? tulyavat prasaṃkhyānāt, tulyāni caitāni prasaṃkhyāyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5629: yat tāvat, upavītaṃ devānām upavyayata iti, tat prakṛtayor darśapūrṇamāsayor upavītaṃ vidadhāti. yat prācīnāvītaṃ piṭṝṇām iti, tat pitṛpradhāne karmaṇi prācīnāvītaṃ vidadhāti. yad apy etat, nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti, tad apy ātithye nirapekṣaṃ vidadhāti. kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5630: manuṣyapradhāne vidadhātīti. manuṣyāṇām iti ṣaṣṭhyantena saṃbandhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5631: manuṣyāṇām eva prāpnoti, na manuṣyapradhāne. ucyate - manuṣyāṇāṃ kalpyamāne phalaṃ kalpanīyam, manuṣyapradhāne punaḥ ṣaṣṭhī bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5632: saṃbandhaś caivam avakalpiṣyate, phalaṃ caivaṃ na kalpanīyam. tad uktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5634: nanu{*3/362*} manuṣyapradhānena sahaikavākyatāṃ prāptam, punaḥ prakṛtābhyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ekavākyatāṃ yāsyati. na hi dvau
GSP28msbh1-7u:5635: saṃbandhāv ekasmin vākye vidhīyete, bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. itarasya manuṣyagrahaṇasya nivītasaṃbandhārthatvāt, tenaiva sahaikavākyatā bhaviṣyati pratyakṣeṇa śabdena, tad ekavākyatayā cārthavattve sati na prakṛtenaikavākyatāvakalpyate. tasmāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvātithye nivekṣyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:5641: naitad asti - vidhiḥ sa ca manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇīti. manuṣyāṇām iti manuṣyasaṃbandho 'tra śrūyate, na manuṣyapradhānena karmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5642: manuṣyaprādhānye ca sati phalaṃ kalpanīyam. ātithyakarmaṇā tv anirdiṣṭenāprakṛtenānumeyena saṃbadhyeta. tatra ko doṣaḥ? prakaraṇād utkṛṣyeta saṃbhavaṃs tatra. kathaṃ saṃbhava iti cet. arthavāda eṣaḥ sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5643: prakṛtaṃ stuvan prakaraṇe saṃbhaviṣyati, vidhiḥ sann utkṛṣyeta. tasmān na vidhir manuṣyapradhāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:5645: itaś ca na vidhiḥ, kutaḥ? vidhinaikavākyatvāt - upavyayate devalakṣmam eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:5646: tat kurute ity eṣa vidhiḥ, anenāsya sahaikavākyatā bhavati. yadītaro 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5647: vidhiḥ syāt, vākyaṃ bhidyeta, na hi vidheś ca{*3/364*} vidheś caikavākyatā bhavati, vacanavyaktibhedāt. tatraikavākyatārūpaṃ bādhyeta. kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:5648: ekavākyatārūpam? nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti prāptānuvādaḥ. prāptasya kim arthena punar vacanam? upavītastutyarthena. katham upavītastutiḥ? nivītam ayogyaṃ devakarmaṇi darśapūrṇamāsasaṃjñake, manuṣyāṇāṃ hi tat. tathā prācīnāvītaṃ pitṝṇām, na devakarmaṇi. upavītaṃ tu tatra yogyam, tasmād upavyātavyam iti. yathā, yādṛśo 'sya veśaḥ{*3/365*}, tādṛśo naṭānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5649: yādṛśo devadattasya tādṛśo brāhmaṇānām iti devadattaveśapraśaṃsārtham{*3/366*} itaraveśasaṃkīrtanam{*3/367*}. evam ihāpy upavyānastutyarthena nivītasaṃkīrtanam. nāsty atra vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5650: - nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kartavyam iti. ātithyaprayogavacanam, tasya kartavyatāvidhāyakam iti cet. naitad evam, [316]{*3/368*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5651: stutyarthenārthavattve sati na śakyaṃ kalpayitum, parokṣaṃ hi tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:5652: ānarthakyaparijihīrṣayā kalpyeta. parihṛte tv ānarthakya iha punar na
GSP28msbh1-7u:5653: kiṃcit kalpanīyam, tasmād arthavādaḥ. evaṃ ca vākyenāviruddhaṃ prakaraṇam arthavad bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5655: b. na vā prakaraṇāt tasya darśanam//
GSP28msbh1-7u:5661: *{3/364: E2,4 om. ca, E6 om. vidheś ca}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5665: *{3/369: Zu diesen 6 im Bhāṣya nicht kommentierten Sūtrāṇi vgl. G.Jha, Ü.,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5667: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - prācīṃ devā abhajanta dakṣiṇāṃ pitaraḥ pratīcīṃ manuṣyā udīcīm asurā iti{*3/370*}. apareṣām, udīcīṃ rudrā iti{*3/371*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ vidhir utārthavādaḥ? [317]{*3/372*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5668: vidhiḥ san kiṃ manuṣyadharmaḥ, uta karmadharmaḥ? atha vā prakaraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:5669: manuṣyapradhāne karmaṇi niveśaḥ? kiṃ vātithya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5670: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? digvibhāgaś ca tadvat, saṃbandhasyārthahetutvāt. ya eṣa digvibhāgaḥ, sa nivītavad vicāryaḥ. yo nivīte pūrvapakṣaḥ, sa iha pūrvapakṣaḥ, yo madhyamaḥ, sa madhyamaḥ, yaḥ siddhāntaḥ, sa siddhāntaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5671: arthavattvād vidhir manuṣyasaṃbandhān manuṣyadharma iti pūrvapakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5672: pratyaṅmukhā udaṅmukhā vā pṛṣṭhata ādityaṃ prāṃśu{*3/373*} padārthān anutiṣṭhanti manuṣyā ity anuvādaḥ. vidhir eva prakaraṇānugrahāc ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:5674: dakṣiṇāvyāpāre niveśa ity aparaḥ pakṣaḥ. bhinnatvād vākyānām ātithye
GSP28msbh1-7u:5675: niveśa ity aparaṃ matam. arthavādo 'yaṃ prakaraṇānugrahāya, prācīnavaṃśaṃ karotīty anena vidhinaikavākyatvasya pratyakṣasiddhatvād iti siddhāntaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5678: *{3/371: E1 gibt apareṣām, udīcīṃ rudrā iti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5681: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam - yat puruṣi ditaṃ tad devānām, yad antarā, tan
GSP28msbh1-7u:5682: manuṣyāṇām, yat samūlam, tat pitṝṇām iti{*3/374*}. tathā - yo vidagdhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5683: sa nairṛtaḥ. yo 'śṛtaḥ, sa raudraḥ, ya śṛtaḥ, sa sadevatyaḥ{*3/375*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5684: tasmād avidahatā śrapayitavyaṃ sadevatyāya iti{*3/376*}. jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yat pūrṇam, tan manuṣyāṇām upari, adho devānām adhaḥ pitṝṇām
GSP28msbh1-7u:5685: iti{*3/377*}. tathā - ghṛtaṃ [318]{*3/378*} devānāṃ mastu pitṝṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5686: niṣpakvaṃ manuṣyāṇām iti{*3/379*}. tatra manuṣyasaṃbaddheṣu, raudre ca saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmā vidhayaḥ, uta karmadharmā anūvādāḥ? atha yat prakaraṇaṃ{*3/380*} manuṣyapradhānam, raudraṃ ca tatra niviśeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5688: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? etāny api tadvat, yo nivīte pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ sa eteṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5689: pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, yo madhyamaḥ sa madhyamaḥ, yaḥ siddhāntaḥ sa eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:5690: siddhāntaḥ. arthavattvān manuṣyasaṃbandhāc ca vidhayo manuṣyadharmāś ceti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5691: pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. upari mūle cāniyamāl lāghavam, aśṛtaṃ rogatvād raudram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5692: pūrṇe 'pi ślakṣṇatvāl lāghavam. evaṃ ghṛtaṃ{*3/381*} śirasi nihitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhakaram eva, arthaprāptatvād anuvāda ity uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5693: vidhiḥ, karmadharmaprāyāt samākhyānāc ca karmadharma iti pakṣaḥ. anvāhārye dakṣiṇāsu ceti vākyaprakaraṇānugrahāt pakṣaḥ. ātithya iti vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt. arthavāda iti, prakaraṇād vidhinaikavākyatvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5694: parva pratilunāti{*3/382*}, upari vilād gṛhṇāti, navanītenābhyaṅkte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5695: avidahatā śrapayitavyam{*3/383*} ity ebhiḥ sahaiṣām ekavākyabhāvaḥ. tasmād ete na vidhayo 'rthavādā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5706: akarma kratusaṃyuktaṃ saṃyogān nityānuvādaḥ syāt // MS_3,3.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5707: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - nānṛtaṃ vaded iti{*3/384*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5709: prakaraṇa eva niveśaḥ. atha prāyeṇa prāptasya karmaṇaḥ puruṣaṃ prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:5710: pratiṣedhaḥ puruṣadharmo 'yam iti. kiṃ prāptam? puruṣadharmaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5711: puruṣasyāyam upadiśyate, na darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ. kutaḥ? puruṣaprayatnasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5712: śravaṇāt, vaded iti vadanam anutiṣṭhed iti śrutyā gamyate, tasya puruṣasaṃbandhaḥ śrutyaiva, karmasaṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇāt. śrutiś ca prakaraṇād balīyasī. itarathā vadanaṃ bhavatīty etāvaty arthe vadanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5713: anutiṣṭhed ity avivakṣitasvārthaḥ parārtho vidhyartho bhavet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5714: puruṣasyopadeśe punar vivakṣitasvārtha eva śabdaḥ. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:5715: puruṣasyopadeśaḥ. yasya copadeśaḥ, tasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ. sa cāyam artha
GSP28msbh1-7u:5716: upanayanakāla eva puruṣasya pratiṣiddhaḥ, tena saṃyogenāyaṃ nityānuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5717: nanv eṣā śrutis tasyāḥ smṛter mūlam. naiṣā tasyā mūlaṃ bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5718: yadīyaṃ tanmūlikā bhavet, darśapūrṇamāsayor iti smaryeta, upanayanakāla eva cāsyopadeṣṭāro bhavanti. api ca puruṣadharma ity upadiśanti, tasmān naiṣā smṛtir ataḥ śruter iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5722: vidhir vāyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor nānṛtaṃ vaded iti, nānuvādaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5724: padārthapratiṣedheneha saṃyogaḥ puruṣasya. katham anyac chrūyamāṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:5725: anyasyānuvādo bhaviṣyati, tasmād vidhiḥ pratiṣedhasyāyam. āha
GSP28msbh1-7u:5726: gṛhṇāma{*3/386*} etat, vidhir iti. puruṣadharma iti tu gṛhṇāmaḥ{*3/387*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5727: puruṣaprayatnasya śrutatvāt. atra brūmaḥ - sarveṣv ākhyāteṣu kriyānuṣṭhānaṃ śrūyate na kārakaṃ kiṃcit. katham etad gamyate? pratyayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5729: nanu kartāram api pratiyanti. satyaṃ pratiyanti, na tu śabdāt. kutas
GSP28msbh1-7u:5730: tarhi? arthāt, yadā kriyānuṣṭhātavyā vidhīyate, [320]{*3/388*} tadārthāt kārakavyāpāro gamyate, yaś cārthād gamyate. na sa śrautaḥ, yaś ca na
GSP28msbh1-7u:5731: śrauto na sa vākyād gamyate. katham asau prakaraṇaṃ bādhiṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5732: āha - prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta ity ācāryopadeśāt kartā śabdārthaḥ karma cety avagamyate, kartari śap{*3/389*}, karmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5733: yag{*3/390*} iti pratyayārthaṃ kartāraṃ karma ca samāmananty ācāryāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5735: ucyate - nācāryavacanāt sūtrakāravacanād vā śabdārtho bhavati, pratyayād asau gamyate. anuṣṭheyā ca kriyā pratītā satī kārakāṇi pratyāyayatīty avagatam etat. api ca, naiva kartā pratyayārthaḥ karma vety ācāryā āhuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5736: nanu kartari karmaṇi ca lakāraḥ śrūyate. nāsau kartari karmaṇi vā śrūyate kiṃ tv ekasmin, ekavacanam, dvayor dvivacanaṃ bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti tatrāparaṃ vacanam. tatraivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate - ekasmin kartari dvayoḥ kartror bahuṣu kartṛṣv iti. evaṃ karmaṇy ekatvādisaṃbandhaḥ. tatra naivaṃ bhavati - kartari bhavaty ekasmiṃś ceti. kathaṃ tarhi? kartary ekasminn ekavacanam, kartur ekatva ity arthaḥ. evaṃ dvitve bahutve karmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5737: ca. evaṃ varṇyamāne laukikanyāyānugataḥ sūtrārtho varṇito bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5738: sūtrākṣarāṇi ca nyāyānugatāni bhavanti. āgamo 'pi cāyam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5740: nanv etad apy asti yadā karmādayo vibhaktyarthāḥ, tadaikatvādayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:5741: viśeṣaṇatveneti. ucyate - arthaprāptā hi karmādayas te na bhavanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5742: śabdasyābhidheyabhūtāḥ. na tv ekatvādayo 'rthāt prāpnuvanti, tena te śabdārthabhūtāḥ, tasmād api viśeṣaṇam ekatvādayaḥ, tathāpi viśeṣaṇam evābhidhīyate, yathā hiraṇyamālina ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti hiraṇyamālitvaṃ viśeṣaṇa[321]{*3/391*}tvena, tathāpi tad eva vidhīyate, tasmāt kartur ekatvaṃ śabdārtho na kartā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5743: nanu kartur ekatvād ekavacanam, kartur dvitvād dvivacanam, kartur bahutvād bahuvacanam. tena nūnaṃ kartā śabdārtha iti gamyate. ucyate - naitad anumānāc chakyam, kartānuṣṭheyakriyāvagamād evāvagamyata iti pratyakṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5744: tat tāvat kenacin na bādhyate. ekavacananirdeśe kartrekatvaṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5746: tad api pratyakṣam, katarad atrānumāṇaṃ bādhitum arhatīti, yathākṛtivacane śabde dvivacane dravyabhedo 'vagamyate, eka-vacane dravyaikatvam, evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmān na śrautaḥ, na cec chrautaḥ, na prakaraṇaṃ bādhiṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5747: yat tu puruṣaprayatno 'narthako bhavati karmadharmapakṣe prayogavacanena
GSP28msbh1-7u:5748: kartavyatāvacanād iti. tad ucyate - aṅgaṃ sat prakaraṇena gṛhyeta, na cāvihitam aṅgaṃ bhavati, tasmād aṅgatvāya vidhātavyam, asminn api pakṣe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5749: ato manyāmahe - prākaraṇikasyāyaṃ niṣedha{*3/393*} iti. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5750: tad{*3/394*} aṅgam, yad anṛtaṃ tan na vācyam iti, tena yat saṃkalpitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5751: tad aṅgam, tad eva kartavyam, vrīhim ayaṃ saṃkalpya na yavamayaḥ pradeyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5752: āha yadobhayor api pakṣayor nānṛtaṃ vaditavyam, tadā ko vicāreṇārtha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5753: ucyate - pūrvasmin pakṣe puruṣadharmaḥ, tatra bhraṃśe{*3/395*} smārtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5762: *{3/393: E1: niṣedhaḥ, E2,4: niṣedhe, E6: niṣedha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5767: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - aṅgiraso veta uttamāḥ suvargaṃ [322]{*3/397*} lokam āyante 'psu dīkṣātapasī prāveśayaṃs tīrthe snāti tīrtham eva hi sajātānāṃ bhavatīti{*3/398*}. darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate, tasmāj jañjabhyamāno 'nubrūyāt. mayi dakṣakratū iti. prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ dharmaḥ prakaraṇe niviśate, uta puruṣasyopadiśyata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ahīnavat puruṣaḥ, tadarthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5768: eṣa vidhiḥ prakaraṇād utkṛṣyeta. kutaḥ? puruṣaśruteḥ, brūyād iti puruṣaprayatnasya vivakṣitatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5769: nanu prakaraṇaṃ bādhyate. ucyate - bādhyatāṃ prakaraṇam, vākyaṃ tv asya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5771: iti gamyate, vākyāj jañjabhyamānasya, vākyaṃ ca prakaraṇād balīyaḥ. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5772: utkṛṣyeteti. phalam apy āmananti, prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta iti, sa ca saṃyogo bādhyate. tasmāt puruṣadharmaḥ, prakaraṇād utkṛṣyetāhīnavat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5773: yathāhīnasaṃyogād{*3/400*} dvādaśopasattā prakaraṇād utkṛṣyate. evaṃ jañjabhyamānasaṃyogān mayi dakṣakratū iti vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5778: prakaraṇaviśeṣād vā tad yuktasya saṃskāro dravyavat // MS_3,4.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5779: na votkraṣṭavyam. kutaḥ? prakaraṇaviśeṣāt, prakaraṇayukta eva jañjabhyamāno vacanena saṃskriyate, yathā yavādidravyaṃ prokṣaṇā[323]{*3/401*}dinā. nanu na śaknoti prakaraṇaṃ jañjabhyamānaśabdam ekadeśe 'vasthāpayitum, vākyaṃ hi prakaraṇād balavattaram iti. ucyate - na brūmo jañjabhyamānaśabdaḥ prakaraṇenāprākaraṇikāt puruṣān nivartyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5780: kiṃ tu phalaṃ tatra kalpanīyam. nanu pratyakṣaṃ śrūyate phalam, prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta iti. neti brūmaḥ - nātra vidhāyakaṃ śabdam upalabhāmahe, ya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5781: eṣaḥ, prāṇāpānāv evātmandhatta iti, vartamānāpadeśa eṣa na vidhāyakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5782: stāvakas tu bhavati mantravacanasya, tasmād darśapūrṇamāsābhyām anyatraitan na phalavat. ataḥ puruṣasya darśapūrṇamāsau kurvataḥ saṃskārakarmeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5783: āha puruṣasaṃskārakarmeti gṛhyate, darśapūrṇamāsāv eva kurvata ity etan na. katham? yo 'pi hy anyatra darśapūrṇamāsābhyām, jañjabhyate, so 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5784: jañjabhyamānaśabdenocyata eva. na ca, prakaraṇena vyāvartyata ity etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:5785: uktam, tasmād utkṛṣyate. atrocyate - naiva vyāvartyate, saṃskṛtena tu tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:5786: nāsti prayojanam. nanu prakaraṇe puruṣasaṃskāreṇāpi nāsti prayojanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5787: ucyate - saṃskṛtapuruṣo darśapūrṇamāsāv anuṣṭhāsyati. āha, utkarṣe 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:5788: sati saṃskṛto 'nyad anuṣṭhāsyati. ucyate - nānyasya saṃskāro guṇo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5789: aprakṛtatvāt. āha prakṛtasyāpi na guṇaḥ, vākyena puruṣadharma ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:5790: avagamāt. ucyate - ānarthakyān na puruṣadharmo 'vagamyate. tasmād asya prakṛtābhyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ekavākyatā, nānyena phalavatāpi karmaṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5792: yat tu prakaraṇe niveśa etasmin{*3/402*} pakṣe brūyād - ity anuṣṭhānavacanam avivakṣitasvārtham iti, evaṃ sati atyanuvādo{*3/403*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5798: atha yad upavarṇitam - dvādaśopasattā yathotkṛṣyate, tathedam apy utkraṣṭavyam iti. ucyate - tad dhi vākyenāhīnānāṃ vyapadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5799: phalavantaś cāhīnāḥ. na ca tatra jyotiṣṭome 'hīnaśabdaḥ, gauṇatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5800: vyapadeśāc ca tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/405*}. tato yuktaṃ dvādaśopasattā yat prakaraṇād utkṛṣyate. na tv iha puruṣasaṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:5805: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - devā vai śaṃyuṃ bārhaspatyam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti prakṛtya, vacanam idaṃ bhavati - kiṃ me prajāyā iti te 'bruvan yo brāhmaṇāyāvaguret taṃ śatena yātayād yo nihanat taṃ sahasreṇa yātayāt, yo lohitaṃ karavat yāvataḥ praskandya pāṃsūn saṃgṛhaṇāt tāvataḥ saṃvatsarān
GSP28msbh1-7u:5806: pitṛlokaṃ na prajānīyād iti. tasmān na brāhmaṇāyāvaguren na hanyān na
GSP28msbh1-7u:5808: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor avagoraṇapratiṣedhaḥ, uta puruṣāsyopadiśyata iti. kiṃ prāptam? prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor avagoraṇādipratiṣedhaḥ. na darśapūrṇamāsyor brāhmaṇasyāvagoritavyaṃ vadho vā kāryo lohitaṃ vā praskandanīyam. anya upāya āsthātavya ānataye, te nānvāhāryeṇānamanti [325]{*3/407*} iti prakaraṇāt prāpnoti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śaṃyau ca prakaraṇād utkarṣaḥ. kasmāt? sarvaparidānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5809: sarvāvasthasya brāhmaṇasyāyaṃ pratiṣedha uktaḥ, na darśapūrṇamāsagatenaiva nāvagoraṇādi kartavyam iti. nanu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsadharmo 'yam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5810: satyaṃ prakaraṇāt, evaṃ vākyenāvaguramāṇasya dharmaḥ, vākyaṃ ca prakaraṇād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5812: nanu jañjabhyamānasyeva prakaraṇe niveśo bhavet. nety ucyate, tatra phalaṃ kalpanīyam, iha kḷptam. asti hy atra vidhāyakavibhaktiḥ - śatena yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5813: sahasreṇa yātayāt, svargaṃ lokaṃ prajānīyād iti, tasmād utkarṣa evaṃjātīyakasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5817: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - malavad vāsasā na saṃvadet, nāsyā annam adyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5818: iti{*3/408*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ malavad vāsasā saha darśapūrṇamāsāṅgasya saṃvādasya pratiṣedhaḥ, uta puruṣasya sarvatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:5819: pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ prāptam? prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ pratiṣedhavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5820: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - malavad vāsasā saha saṃvāda utkṛṣyeta, prakaraṇāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5821: kasmāt? prāgaparodhāt. evaṃ śrūyate - yasya vratye 'hani patny anālambhukā syāt tām aparudhya yajeteti{*3/409*}. patnyā ca saha saṃvādo 'dhvaryor
GSP28msbh1-7u:5822: darśapūrṇamāsayor asti - patni patny eṣa te loka iti{*3/410*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5823: prasajyamānaḥ pratiṣidhyeta, sa cāprāpta [326]{*3/411*} eva prāgaparodhād apanīyatāṃ yāgam anutiṣṭhatām, kathaṃ saṃvādaḥ prasajyeta? yataḥ pratiṣedham arhet. tasmād utkṛṣyeta malavad vāsasā saha saṃvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5829: annapratiṣedhaś ca bhavati - nāsyā annam adyād abhyañjanaṃ vai striyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5830: annam ity{*3/412*} upagamanapratiṣedha eṣa{*3/413*} vidhīyate, sa ca prakaraṇe na prasakta iti, prakaraṇād utkṛṣṭaḥ puruṣadharma eṣa niścīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5834: aprakaraṇe tu taddharmas tato viśeṣāt // MS_3,4.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5835: anārabhya śrūyate - tasmāt suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryaṃ durvarṇo 'sya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5836: bhrātṛvyo bhavatīti{*3/414*}. suvāsasā bhavitavyaṃ rūpam eva bibhartīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5837: tatra kiṃ prakaraṇadharma uta puruṣadharma iti saṃśayaḥ. atrocyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5838: aprakaraṇe tu tad dharmaḥ, tato viśeṣāt, puruṣadharma evaṃjātīyakaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5839: kutaḥ? tataḥ prakaraṇādhītād{*3/415*} viśeṣo 'sya, nāyaṃ prakaraṇādhītaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5840: yady aprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ, sarvaprakaraṇadharmaḥ syāt. aprakaraṇe samāmnānaṃ na kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ kuryāt. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma
GSP28msbh1-7u:5846: tuśabdaḥ pakṣavyāvṛttau. na puruṣadharmo bhavet, agnihotrādīnāṃ śeṣaḥ syāt. kasmāt? adravyatvāt, nātra dravyadevataṃ śrūyate, yac{*3/416*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5847: chravaṇāt, bhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyam iti parikalpyeta. asati tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe vibhartir ayaṃ dhāraṇāvacanaḥ saṃskāravācī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5848: [327]{*3/417*} saṃskāraś ca śeṣabhūtasyāvakalpate nānyathā, tasmāt karmaṇām agnihotrādīnāṃ śeṣaḥ. evaṃ suvāsasā bhavitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5852: ādhvaryavam iti vedasaṃyogaḥ śeṣabhūtasya yujyate, śeṣabhūto hy adhvaryuṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5853: kriyate, na puruṣadharmaḥ, darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi karmaṇāṃ sāṅgānām aṅgānām ardhvayuḥ kartā. tasmād api karmadharmā evaṃjātīyakā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5855: dravyaparaś cātra bhavati nirdeśaḥ - suvarṇaṃ bhāryam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5858: syād vāsya saṃyogavat phalena saṃbandhas tasmāt karmaitiśāyanaḥ //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5859: syād vā phalenaivaṃjātīyakānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ puruṣadharma ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5860: suvarṇasya vāsaso vā dharmo bhavan niṣprayojanaḥ syāt. nanu saṃskṛtena suvarṇena vāsasā ca karma setsyati. naitad evam, suvarṇasyāṅgaṃ na karmaṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5861: upakuryāt. śrutyādīnām abhāvān na karmāṅgam. tasmāt durvarṇo 'sya bhātṛvyo bhavatītyevamādinā evaṃjātīyakānāṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5862: nanu vartamānāpadeśo 'yam. satyam evam etat, ānarthakyaparihārāya phalacodanayā saṃbandha eṣi-tavyo bhavati. anyasmāc caiṣitavyād ekavākyagatasya vipariṇāmo{*3/418*} laghīyān. kutaḥ? pratyakṣā tenaikavākyatā, parokṣānyena, vipariṇāmaś ca vartamānakālasyāvivakṣā, saṃbandhasya ca tātparyādhyavasānam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ pradhānakarmopadeśaḥ syāt, yathā prajāpativratānāṃ phalena
GSP28msbh1-7u:5863: saṃbandhaḥ. etāvatā hainasāviyukto bhavatīti. evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5868: iha karmasaṃyuktā homā jayādaya udāharaṇam. yena karmaṇetsat{*3/420*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:5869: tatra jayāñ juhuyāt, rāṣṭrabhṛto juhotīti, abhyātānāñ juhotīti{*3/421*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5870: tatraite kiṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ kṛṣyādīnāṃ śeṣabhūtāḥ, uta vaidikānām agnihotrādinām iti. śeṣatvaṃ tu nirjñātakarmasaṃbandhāt, phalāśravaṇāc ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5871: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣāḥ, viśeṣān abhidhānād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5874: *{3/421: Vgl. Tait.S. 3.4.6.2; dazu auch Jha, Übs., Bd.1, S.516}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5876: na caitad asti - sarvakarmaṇāṃ karṣaṇādīnām apy aṅgabhūtā iti. homā ete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5877: ato vyavatiṣṭheran, āhavanīyasaṃyogo bhavati homeṣu. yadāhavanīye juhoti tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti{*3/422*}. tena yasyāhavanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5878: tasyaite 'ṅgam. na [329]{*3/423*} ca kṛṣyādīny āhavanīye vartante. na caiṣāṃ gārhapatyo 'sti, yataḥ praṇīta āhavanīyaḥ syāt. tasmān na karmaṇādīnāṃ jayādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5882: itaś ca paśyāmo vaidikānāṃ śeṣabhūtā iti. kutaḥ? sāmakhyānāt, ādhvaryavam iti hi samākhyāte vede jayādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ santo 'dhvaryuṇā kariṣyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5883: karṣaṇādiṣv adhvaryor abhāvād anadhvaryuṇāpi kriyamāṇāḥ samākhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5885: doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāc chāstrād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.28
GSP28msbh1-7u:5886: asty aśvapratigraheṣṭiḥ - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti, yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5887: yāvato 'śvān pratigṛhṇīyāt, tāvato vāruṇāṃś catuṣkapālān nirvaped
GSP28msbh1-7u:5888: iti{*3/424*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ laukike 'śvapratigraha iṣṭiḥ, atha vaidika iti. kaḥ punar laukiko 'śvapratigrahaḥ? ko vā vaidika iti. loke bhikṣamāṇo vābhikṣamāṇo vā yatrāśvaṃ labhate, tatra laukikāśvapratigrahaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5889: vaidiko 'pi pauṇḍarīke 'śvasahasraṃ dakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭome gauś cāśvaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5890: tatrocyate - vaidikatvasāmānyād vaidika iti prāpte. [330]{*3/425*} ucyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:5891: - doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāt. doṣo hi śrūyate - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti, sa cāyam anuvādo yatra doṣaḥ, tatreti, sa ca laukike
GSP28msbh1-7u:5892: 'śvapratigrahe śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ kṛto bhavatīty upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5893: doṣasaṃyogāl laukika iti gamyate. āha na doṣasaṃkīrtanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5895: doṣanirdhātārthe saty evaṃ syāt, varuṇapramocanam idaṃ karma, tal laukike bhavitum arhati, loke varuṇagrahaṇasya vidyamānatvāt. vaidike tv aśvapratigrahe tan na syāt, śāstrād dhi vacanena{*3/426*} tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5896: kartavyatāvagamyate. yadi ca tataḥ pāpaṃ syāt, na tasya kartavyatāvagamyeta, akartavyaṃ hi pāpaphalam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5897: nanu vaidike 'pi pratigrahe 'pratigrāhyāt pratigṛhṇataḥ pāpam asti. ucyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:5898: - bhaved evam, yadi pratigrahasya kartur iṣṭir bhavet, sā tu khalu yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:5899: hetukartuḥ, tathottarādhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ. tasmān na vedacodite
GSP28msbh1-7u:5905: na caitad asti, yad uktam - yaḥ śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakṛto loke 'śvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5906: pratigṛhṇīyāt sa etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapet. sa hi varuṇagṛhīta ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5907: jalodareṇa yo gṛhītaḥ, yasyodaraṃ jalavṛddhyā śvayati. jalodaram ity eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:5908: loke tat prasiddham. na ca tasyāśvapratigraho laukiko nidānam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5909: prati[331]{*3/427*}jñāyate. na cānena vidhīyate. tasmān nāśvapratigrahāj jalodaropapātaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5910: atha pāpaṃ varuṇaśabdenocyate, vṛṇīta ity eṣo 'bhiprāya iti. tadā prasiddhau tyaktāyāṃ kleśamātram, vṛṇvad varuṇaśabdenocyate, tatra yājñe 'pi pratigrahe varuṇagṛhītaḥ syāt, rakṣaṇapoṣaṇavicikitsādinā kleśena naiṣa pakṣo vyavatiṣṭheta - laukike 'śvapratigraha iti, prasiddhiś ca bādhyeta. tasmād arthavāda eṣaḥ, yāvad{*3/428*} varuṇagṛhītasya varuṇonmocane śreyaḥ, tāvad etety upamānenaiṣā stutiḥ. yo 'sya
GSP28msbh1-7u:5911: pratigrahaḥ, tad varuṇagrahaṇam iva, yeṣṭiḥ, sā tad unmocanīva, yathā varuṇagṛhītenonmocanam avaśyakartavyam, tādṛg evaitad iti, tasmād yajñe pratīyeta. laukike hi phalaṃ kalpanīyam, vaidike yasminn aśvapratigrahaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5912: tasyāṅgabhūtā bhaviṣyati. tatra prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatā saṃbandhād
GSP28msbh1-7u:5913: avakalpyamānā, parokṣāyāḥ phalavacanena sahaikavākyatāyā laghīyasīti yuktam iṣṭir vaidike dāna iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5917: yāvato 'śvān pratigṛṇīyāt, tāvato vāruṇāṃś catuṣkapālān nirvaped
GSP28msbh1-7u:5918: iti{*3/429*}. tatraitat samadhigatam - vaidike 'śvapratigraha iṣṭir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5919: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ pratigrahakartrā kartavyā, yasmai dīyate, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:5920: hetukartrā, yo dadātīti. kiṃ prāptam? acoditaṃ ca karmabhedāt, na dānasya kartur iṣṭiś codyate, pratigrhakartus tām avagacchāmaḥ - yāvato 'śvān
GSP28msbh1-7u:5921: [332]{*3/430*} pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataś catuṣkapālān vāruṇān nirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5926: naiṣā pratigrahakartuḥ, kiṃ tarhi hetukartuḥ syāt. kutaḥ? liṅgāt. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5927: liṅgam? pūrvapadānām uttaraiḥ padair yathārtham abhisaṃbandhaḥ. idaṃ śrūyate - prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anyad iti{*3/431*}, prajāpatir aśvasya dātā kīrtitaḥ, varuṇaḥ pratigrahītā, sa svāṃ devatām ārcchad iti. sa iti sāpekṣaṃ pūrvaprakṛtaṃ vākyaśeṣam apekṣate, sa iti prajāpatiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5928: pratinirdiśatīti tena sahaikyavākyatāṃ yāti. sāmānādhikaraṇyāc ca prajāpater eva pratinirdeśo 'vakalpate, na tu varuṇasya, vaiyadhikaraṇyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5929: sa paryadīryata ity eṣo 'pi prajāpatim eva pratinirdiśati pūrvaprakṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5930: tena ca sahaikavākyatāṃ yāti. sa evaitaṃ vāruṇaṃ catuṣkapālam apaśyad iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5931: prajāpatir eveti, niravapat{*3/432*} prajāpatir eveti, tato vai sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5932: varuṇapāśād amucyata prajāpatiḥ. varuṇa etaṃ{*3/433*} gṛhṇātīti hetvapadeśo 'yam, yasmād eva prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvaṃ dattvā paridīrṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5933: tasmād yo 'śvaṃ prati gṛhṇāti prayacchati{*3/434*} taṃ varuṇo gṛhṇāti, sa paridīryata iti. yatas tu vāruṇena pratimuktaḥ, tasmād anyenāpy aśvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5934: prayacchatā vāruṇo nirvaptavya ity aśvasya dātur vāruṇīṣṭiḥ praśasyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5935: kartavyānenākhyātena. tasmād aśvaṃ dattvā vāruṇīm iṣṭiṃ nirvaped iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5936: āha, nanu yo 'svaṃ pratigṛhṇāti sa nirvaped ity ucyate. evaṃ saty anyathopakrānte vākye 'nyathopasaṃhṛta upakramo 'py anarthakaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5937: upasaṃhāro 'pi. tasmād upakrame vā śabdārtha upasaṃhāravaśena kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5938: upasaṃhāre vopakramavaśena. tatra [333]{*3/435*} prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anayad iti, varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād ity upasaṃhārānurodhena kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5940: pratigrāhayatīti. tatra - mukhyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ codanāl lokavad iti{*3/436*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5941: prathamam anugrahītavyaṃ virodhābhāvāt. paścāt tanaṃ tu virodhāl lakṣaṇayā kalpanīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5942: api ca, prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anayad iti varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād iti bahvasamañjasaṃ kalpayitavyam. pratigṛhṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ, pratigrāhayatīty etam arthaṃ śaknoti yayā kayācic chaktyā vaktum, yo hi tad ācarati, yena
GSP28msbh1-7u:5943: ca{*3/437*} kriyā praṇāḍyāpi sidhyati, sa tasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ karteti śakyate vaditum, yathā ṣaḍbhir halaiḥ karṣatīti saṃvidhānaṃ kurvan vilekhanam akurvann apy ucyate, tatsamartham ācaratīti. evam ihāpi sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5944: pratigrahasamartham ācarati yo dadāti{*3/438*}. tasmād dadat pratigṛhṇātīti śakyate vaditum. tasmād adhyavadhāryedam avakḷptam. dadat pratigṛhṇātīty ucyate, tasya ca vāruṇīṣṭir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5952: *{3/438: E1 gibt yo dadāti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5954: idaṃ samāmananti - somendraṃ caruṃ nirvapec chyāmākaṃ somavāmina iti{*3/439*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - laukikasya somapānasya vamane
GSP28msbh1-7u:5955: saumendraś{*3/440*} caruḥ, uta vaidikasyeti. kiṃ laukikaṃ somapānam? kiṃ ca vaidikam? ucyate - vaidikaṃ somapānaṃ jyotiṣṭome tadvikṛtiṣu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5957: dhātusāmyārtham{*3/442*} āsevyamāne some. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? pānavyāpac ca tadvat, laukike vamana iṣṭir bhavitum arhati, na vaidike, tadvad iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ pratinirdiṣṭaḥ, yathā tatra doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇāt, laukike
GSP28msbh1-7u:5958: 'śvapratigraha ity uktam, evam ihāpi doṣasaṃyogena śravaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5959: indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ pibatīti{*3/443*} loke dhātusāmyārtham āsevite vamanena vinaṣte dhātusāmyavyāpadā, indriyeṇa vyṛddhir upapadyate, śās-trād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt. tatra śeṣaḥ pātavya iti śabdāc codite nirvṛtte nāsti doṣaḥ. yady api vamyate, tathāpi pānakriyā tatra nirvartitā, kṛto vacanārtha iti na doṣaḥ syāt. tasmāl laukikasya somapānasya vyāpadi saumendraḥ{*3/444*} syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5964: *{3/443: E2: soma vamati, iti, E4: somaṃ vamity iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:5966: doṣāt tu vaidike syād arthād dhi laukike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5967: vaidikasya pānasya vyāpadi bhavitum arhati, na laukikasya. kasmāt? doṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5968: doṣasaṃbandho 'tra śrūyate - indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5969: laukike punar dhātusāmyādyarthaṃ kriyamāṇe na kiṃcid duṣyati, vamanāyaiva hi taṃ pibanti loke. athāpy ayam arthavādaḥ, tathāpi phalakalpanāparīhārāya vaidika eveti kalpanā nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5971: tad etat somapānavyāpadi saumendraṃ{*3/445*} karma, sarvatra vamane syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5972: ārtvije yājamāne ca. kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, na viśeṣaḥ [335]{*3/446*} kaścid āśrīyate 'sya vamane syāt, nāsyeti, tasmāt sarvatra bhavet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5976: svāminoḥ vā vamane syāt. kutaḥ? tad arthatvāt, tad arthaṃ karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:5977: yajamānārtham{*3/447*}, yatra somo vamyate, yat tv atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:5978: saumendraṃ{*3/448*} karma. tad api tad artham eva. idaṃ hi somavāmina
GSP28msbh1-7u:5979: upakārāya śrūyate, tat somavāminaḥ, yajamānasyopakartuṃ{*3/449*} śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:5980: nārtvijaḥ, na hi tad ṛtvig arthaṃ karma, yatra somo vamyate. athocyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:5981: somavāmino 'dhvaryor hotur vātmīyā ṛtvijaḥ, tadīyeṣv agniṣu nirvartayiṣyantīti. tathā sati yadi vā vyṛddhasomasya karmaṇo nāṅgam, na somavāmino 'dhvaryor hotur vā, tatrātyantaguṇabhūtā adhvaryvādayaḥ svair
GSP28msbh1-7u:5982: ṛtvigbhiḥ kārayanto na phalaṃ prāpnuvanti. tad arthaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ na yajamānasyopakāre vartata iti na ṛtvijo vamane kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5988: liṅgaṃ ca bhavati, yajamānasya somavāmina iti. katham? somapīthena vā eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:5989: vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamatīti. yajamānaḥ, somasaṃskāre vinaṣṭe viguṇam asya karmeti vyṛdhyeta, na kathaṃcid ṛtvijo vyṛddhiḥ. ṛtvijo yasya somaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:5990: vamantīti vamanena saṃbandhaḥ syāt, na yaḥ somaṃ vamatīti. tasmād api paśyāmo yajamānasya vamane saumendram{*3/450*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5994: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra sāmāmnāyate - yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māv
GSP28msbh1-7u:5995: āsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti{*3/452*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsnaṃ haviḥ, agnaye pradātavyam, uta śeṣayitavyaṃ kiṃcit, kiṃcid dātavyam iti. kiṃ prāptam? kṛtsnaṃ haviḥ pradīyeta. kutaḥ? tadarthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5996: puroḍāśa āgneyaḥ kartavya iti vacanam. tasmāt sarvaṃ pradātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6000: niṣkṛṣyāvadānaṃ niravadānam. tad dhi śrūyate - dvir haviṣo 'vadyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6001: aparam api vacanam - dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti, tena{*3/453*} dvyavadānamātraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6006: na caitad asti - dvyavadānamātraṃ hotavyam iti, yaj juhoti, tad dvir avakhaṇḍanena saṃskartavyam iti, hotavye dvir avakhaṇḍamātraṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6007: nādvir avakhaṇḍitasya homaḥ pratiṣidhyate, kṛtsnaṃ ca hotavyam iti tad evaṃ nyāyyam, nānyathā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6008: kṛtatvāt tu karmaṇaḥ sakṛtsyād dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_3,4.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6009: ucyate - yadā dvir avakhaṇḍanaviṣiṣṭaṃ home śrutam, tadā sakṛd [337]{*3/454*} avadānaṃ{*3/455*} yāvac chrutaṃ{*3/456*} tat sarvaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6010: tadā nāparaṃ dravyam astīti punar yāgo nāvartitavyaḥ. kathaṃ? tad dhi dravyaṃ yāganirvṛttyartham, na dravyaṃ yāgena saṃbandhayitavyam iti. yadi hi yāgena haviḥ saṃbandhayitavyaṃ syāt, tato yāgena dvyavadāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:6011: saṃbandhite, aparam api saṃbandhanīyam astīti, tatsaṃbandhārthaṃ punar yāga āvarteta. na tu yāgo dravyasaṃbandhārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi, dravyaṃ yāge guṇabhūtam, yāgaḥ kathaṃ nirvṛttim upeyād iti dravyam upādīyate. tena nirvṛtte yāge siddhe ca puruṣārthe{*3/457*} na niyogena guṇānurodhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:6013: kathaṃ na dravyaṃ pradhānam, yenāvṛttir ta bhavet. yato yāgāt phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6014: bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti. na ca yāgena
GSP28msbh1-7u:6015: dravyasyopakāro nirvartyate pratyakṣaḥ kaścit, tasmād dvyavadānaṃ hutvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6016: śeṣayitavyam iti. yat tūktam - āgneyaṃ havir itivacanāt, sarvaṃ hotavyam iti gamyata iti, tatrānumāniko homasaṃbandhaḥ, iha tu pratyakṣo dvir
GSP28msbh1-7u:6017: avadāne. api cākṛtsnasaṃbandhe 'pi tad dhitasyopapattiḥ, tato grahītavyam iti. sāmānyaṃ khalv āgneya iti dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti viśeṣaḥ. tasmāc cheṣayitavyaṃ kiṃcid iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6020: *{3/456: E1 gibt yāvac chrutaṃ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6023: śeṣād iḍām avadyati śeṣāt sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīty anuvādād asti śeṣa iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6026: aprayojakatvād ekasmāt kriyerañ cheṣasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_3,4.42 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6028: aiḍaprāśitrasauviṣṭakṛdādīni{*3/459*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ haviṣo haviṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6029: kartavyāni, utaikasmād dhaviṣa iti. kiṃ prāptam? aprayojakatvād ekasmāt kriyeran, aprayojakāni śeṣakāryāṇi haviṣām. yadi śeṣakāryaiḥ prayuktāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6030: bhaveyuḥ sarvāṇi prayuktānīti sarvebhyaḥ kriyeran anyathārthāni tv etāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6031: nāvaśyaṃ śeṣakāryeṣu viniyoktavyāni. saṃnidhānāt tu yataḥ - kutaścid
GSP28msbh1-7u:6032: anuṣṭhātavyāni, śeṣo hi sādhanam amīṣām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6036: sakṛc caivaṃjātīyakena śeṣakāryeṇa saṃskṛtaṃ pradhānam iti kṛtvā nāparasmād api kartavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6037: sarvebhyo vā kāraṇāviśeṣāt, saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt // MS_3,4.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6038: sarvebhyo vā havirbhyaḥ śeṣakāryāṇi kartavyāni. kutaḥ? kāraṇāviśeṣāt, yad ekasya haviṣaḥ śeṣakāryakriyāyāṃ kāraṇam, tat sarveṣām. sa hi śeṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6039: pratipādayitavyaḥ, yasyaiva na pratipādyate, tasya tena saṃskāreṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:6042: liṅgaṃ ca dṛśyate - devā vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyaṃ no vaha
GSP28msbh1-7u:6043: [339]{*3/460*} iti, so 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai bhāgo me 'stv iti, vṛṇīṣveti te 'bruvan, so 'bravīd uttarārdhād eva mahyaṃ sakṛt sakṛd avadyād iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6047: atha kṛtvācintā. yadaikasmād bhaveyuḥ{*3/461*}, kiṃ tadā yataḥ - kutaścid uta prathamād iti. kiṃ prāptam? yataḥ kutaścid iti. kutaḥ? na kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyata iti. tasmād aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6051: mukhyād vā kartavyāni. kutaḥ? pūrvakālatvāt, tataḥ kartavyeṣu nāsti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6052: nimittavighātaḥ, asati nimittavighāte naimittikaṃ kartavyam iti. tataḥ kṛteṣu dvitīyādīnāṃ nimittavidhāta ity akriyā. tasmān mukhyād eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6055: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - idaṃ brahmaṇaḥ, idaṃ hotuḥ, idam adhvaryoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6056: idam agnīdha iti{*3/462*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayam [340]{*3/463*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6057: ṛtvijāṃ vibhāgaḥ parikrayāya, uta bhakṣaṇāyeti. kiṃ prāptam? parikrayārtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:6058: vibhāgaḥ. kutaḥ? bhakṣāśravaṇāt, na śrūyate - bhakṣitavyam iti. ya eva śrutasyotsarge doṣaḥ, sa evāśrutaparikalpaṇāyām. karmakarebhyaś ca dīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6063: eṣā vai darśapūrṇamāsayor dakṣiṇeti dakṣiṇāsaṃstavāc ca parikrayārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6066: bhakṣārtha eṣa vibhāgaḥ. kutaḥ? dānasyābhāvāt. katham abhāvaḥ? prabhavatā hi śakyaṃ dātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6067: nāprabhavatā. kathaṃ na prabhutvam? saṃkalpitaṃ hi yajamānena, devatāyā etad iti. na ca devatāyai saṃkalpitena śiṣṭāḥ sveneva vyavaharanti. tasmāc chiṣṭācāram anuvartamānenāśakyaṃ prabhavitum, tasmān na parikrayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6068: atha yad uktam - na śrūyate, bhakṣayitavyam iti, yāvāṃś ca śrutasyotsarge
GSP28msbh1-7u:6069: doṣaḥ, tāvān aśrutaparikalpanāyām iti. ucyate - idaṃ brahmaṇa ityevamādibhir brahmādīnām, bhāgair abhisaṃbandhaḥ, tatra bhāgā brahmādīnām upakuryur brahmādayo vā bhāgānām. brahmādibhir bhāgānām upakurvadbhir na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam asti, bāgais tu brahmādīnām upakārakaiḥ śakyate kenacit prakāreṇa dṛṣṭa upakāraḥ kartuṃ bhakṣyamāṇaiḥ. tasmād bhakṣaṇāya vibhāga iti. kaḥ punar upakāra iti cet. tṛptānāṃ karmaśeṣaparisamāpane sāmarthyaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6072: atha yad dakṣiṇāsaṃstava iti, vyādeśasāmānyāt tat, aparikrayārthe 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:6076: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra śrūyate - uttarārdhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyatīti{*3/466*}, tathā - iḍām upahvayatīti{*3/467*}, tathānyāni prāśitrāvadānādīni śeṣakāryāṇi{*3/468*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ājyād upāṃśuyājadravyāt sviṣṭakṛd iḍam avadātavyam, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6077: avadātavyam iti. kutaḥ? sarvasaṃyogāt, sādhāraṇaprakaraṇasamāmnātāt sarveṣāṃ śeṣakāryāṇi. api ca sarvasaṃyogo bhavati, tad yat{*3/469*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6078: sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ samavadyatīti. tasmād ājyād api śeṣakāryāṇi kriyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6085: kāraṇaṃ śrūyate - devā vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti, so
GSP28msbh1-7u:6086: 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai bhāgo me 'stv iti, vṛṇīṣvety abruvan{*3/470*}, so
GSP28msbh1-7u:6087: 'bravīd uttarārdhād eva mahyaṃ sakṛt sakṛd avadyād iti, tulyaṃ kāraṇam anyeṣām ājyasya cārthavāde saṃkīrtyate. tasmād apy ājyād avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6091: āditye carau prāyaṇīye śrūyate - agnaye sviṣṭakṛte samavadyatīti{*3/471*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6092: ājyād ekasmāc ca haviṣo 'vadyatīti, miśrasyānyena haviṣā samavadyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6093: yadi cājyād api sviṣṭakṛte 'vadīyeta, tataś codakena prāpaṇīya{*3/472*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6094: ājyāvadāne kriyamāṇe [343]{*3/473*} samavadyatīty upapadyate. itarathā caror ekasmād avadyatīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:6098: ājye ca darśanāt sviṣṭakṛd arthavādasya // MS_3,5.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6099: dhrauve cājye sviṣṭakṛd arthavādo bhavati - avadāyāvadāya dhruvāṃ pratyabhidhārayati, sviṣṭakṛte 'vadāya na dhruvāṃ pratyabhidhārayati. na hi tataḥ parāmāhutiṃ yakṣyan bhavatīti, pratyabhidhāraṇasyaitat prayojanaṃ darśayati - tataḥ patrāmāhutiṃ hoṣyatīti. sauviṣṭakṛte vṛtte{*3/474*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6100: tataḥ parāhutir nāstīti na pratyabhidhāryeta. sviṣṭakṛd arthe dhruvāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6104: aśeṣātvāt tu naivaṃ syāt sarvādānād aśeṣatā // MS_3,5.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6105: naivam, dhrauvājyāt sviṣṭakṛd iḍam avadātavyam iti. kasmāt? aśeṣatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6108: nanūpāṃśuyājārthaṃ gṛhīte yad dhruvāyāṃ śiṣṭam, tat śeṣabhūtam. naitat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6109: sādhāraṇaṃ hi tat, upāṃśuyājāya, anyebhyaś ca prayojanebhyaḥ. yāvad ājyena yaṣṭavyam, tat tad ājyaṃ prayojayati. yasya yasyājyam, tasya tasyaivaṃ grahītavyaṃ saṃskartavyaṃ ceti, tasmāt sādhāraṇaṃ dhrauvam ājyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6110: darśayati ca - sarvasmai vā etad yajñāya gṛhyate yad dhruvāyām ājyam iti{*3/475*}. kim ato yady evam iti. yat sādhāraṇam upāṃśuyājāyāvattaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6111: dhruvāyām ājyam, tenānyāni prayojanāni kāryāṇi, na [344]{*3/476*} tu tat pratipādyam, yad dhi kṛtaprayojanam ākīrṇakaram avatiṣṭhate, tat pratipādayitavyam iti. kvacic ca, yat pratipādayitavyam tat, evaṃ pratipādayitavyam iti. yat tu prayojanavad upāttaṃ tan na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6113: sauviṣṭakṛtaś ca{*3/478*} kaścic cheṣaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ, yathā yatraikasyāmukhyāyāṃ bahūnām odanaḥ śṛto bhavati, tatraikasmin bhuktavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6114: na tasya śiṣṭaṃ bhṛtyebhyaḥ pratipādanīyamukhāyām astīti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6115: prayojanavad dhi tat. evam upāṃśuyājājye 'pi draṣṭavyam{*3/479*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6116: āha - juhvāṃ tarhy ājyasya śeṣo bhaviṣyati, camasavat, yathā camaseṣu graheṣu ca somasya codanayeti. tatra pratyāha -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6122: avattatvāc ca juhvām, tasya ca homasaṃyogāt // MS_3,5.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6123: dhruvāyāṃ tāvan nāsti śeṣaḥ, upāṃśuyājasya sādhāraṇatvād ity uktam. atha kasmān na juhvāṃ yac chiṣṭam, tena śeṣakāryam, yathā homārthe camase śeṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:6124: iti. ucyate - yaj juhvām avattam, tat sarvaṃ homena saṃbaddham, tasmān na juhvāṃ śeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6126: iti punar yad uktam, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6128: naitad evam. kutaḥ? codanāvirodhāt, somasyāgner{*3/480*} vīhīty{*3/481*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6129: anuvaṣaṭkarotīti{*3/482*} tatra codanā. api ca, tatraindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītyevamādīni grahaṇāni na somasaṃyuktāni{*3/483*}, [345]{*3/484*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6130: haviḥprakalpanāny eva, iha punar homasaṃyogaḥ, caturgṛhītaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6138: atha yad uktam - tad yat{*3/486*} sarvebhyaḥ havirbhyaḥ samavadyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6139: ucyate - utpannaṃ śeṣam adhikṛtyaitad ucyate, nāviśeṣaṇam, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6140: ya{*3/487*} iha śeṣās tebhyaḥ sarvebhya iti, yathā sarva odano bhuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6141: sarve brāhmaṇā bhuktavanta iti prakṛtāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabda evam atrāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6146: atha yad uktam - prāpaṇīye{*3/488*} kevale carau samavattaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6147: nāvakalpate, yadi na tatra codakenājyād api sviṣṭṛakṛd avadānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6148: ucyate - asaty apy ājyāc cheṣakārye samavattaśabdo jātiviśeṣāpekṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:6149: upapadyate, odanajātim ājyajātiṃ{*3/489*} cāpekṣya. anuvādo hi saḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6155: atha yad uktam - sviṣṭakṛd arthaṃ dhruvāyām abhidhāraṇaṃ darśayatīti. na tat sviṣṭakṛd artham, śeṣābhāvād ity uktam. tasmād ayaṃ tasyārthaḥ. na hi tata āhutiṃ yakṣyan bhavatīti na rekṣyate, dhruvāto yady āhutir aparā hotavyā bhavet, na ca pratyabhidhāryeta. dhuvātaḥ kila{*3/490*} ricyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6156: na rakṣyate, aparasyā āhuter abhāvāt, kiṃ pratyabhidhāraṇeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6159: sākaṃ prasthāyīye{*3/492*} sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ ca tadvat // MS_3,5.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6160: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - sākaṃ prasthāyīyena yajeteti{*3/493*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sviṣṭakṛd iḍam asti, nāstīti. astīti brūmah. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6161: darśapūrṇamāsavikāro hi sākaṃ prasthāyīyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6162: nāstīti. kutaḥ? aśeṣatvāt, sarvādānāc cāśeṣatā. katham? evaṃ tatra śrūyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:6163: - ājyabhāgābhyāṃ pracaryāgneyena ca puroḍāśenāgnīdhre srucau pradāya saha kumbhībhir abhikrāmann āheti. tasmān na tataḥ śeṣakāryad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6168: asti sautrāmaṇī, tatra grahāḥ{*3/494*} śrūyante, āśvinasārasvataindrāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6169: tatra codakena sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ prāptam. athedānīṃ saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ nivartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6170: uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? codakānugrahāya kartavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6171: sautrāmaṇyāṃ ca graheṣu na{*3/495*} kartavyam iti caśabdenātidiśyate{*3/496*}. kutaḥ? aśeṣatvāt, sarvādānād śeṣatā. tatrāpi hi grahair evaṃ hotuṃ pratiṣṭhante, yat payograhāś ca suragrahāś ca gṛhyanta iti. grahasthaṃ khalv api tad dravyam abhigṛhītam abhyanukramam abhyāśrāvitaṃ devatāṃ prati. yathā - gṛhītān grahān ṛtvija ādadate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6172: āśvinam adhvaryuḥ, sārasvataṃ brahmā, aindraṃ pratiprasthāteti, homārtham
GSP28msbh1-7u:6173: [347]{*3/497*} aśeṣādānaṃ bhavati. homasaṃyogaś caiṣāṃ śruyate - uttare
GSP28msbh1-7u:6180: etam eva nyāyam, śeṣavacanam upodbalayati. ucchinaṣṭi, na sarvaṃ juhotīti{*3/498*}, sarvahome prāpte, pratiṣedho 'vakalpyate. vācanikatvāc ca sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ na bhavati, tasyānyatropayogavacanāt, brāhmaṇaṃ parikrīṇīyād uccheṣaṇasya pātāram iti, aparasyāpi śeṣasya vācaniko
GSP28msbh1-7u:6185: asti sarvapṛṣṭheṣṭiḥ - indrāya rāthantarāya, indrāya bārhatāya{*3/499*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6186: indrāya vairūpāya, indrāya vairājāya, indrāya śāknarāyeti. tatra puroḍāśo bahūnāṃ karmaṇāṃ sādhāraṇaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pratikarma, sviṣṭakṛd iḍaṃ kartavyam, sakṛd eva veti. kiṃ prāptam? codanānugrahāt pratikarma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6187: kartavyam, ekasminn api dravye bahutvāt karmaṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6190: avibhāgāc ca śeṣasya, sarvān praty aviśiṣṭatvāt // MS_3,5.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6191: sakṛd eva kartavyam iti brūmaḥ, avibhāgāc cheṣasya. na [348]{*3/500*} atra vibhāgaḥ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ puroḍāśasya, uttarārdhāt sviṣṭakṛd avadātavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6192: ekaś cāsau uttarārdhaḥ, tato 'vadīyamāne na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. kasyāvattam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6193: kasya neti, evam iḍāyām api. tasmāt sakṛd avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6195: aindravāyave tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,5.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6196: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti. tatraindravāyave grahe saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sakṛd bhakṣaṇam, uta dvir iti. somasaṃskārārthatvāt sakṛd iti prāpte brūmaḥ - aindravāyave dvir bhakṣayitavyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6197: vacanāt, vacanam idaṃ bhavati, dvir aindravāyavasya bhakṣayati, dvir hy etasya vaṣaṭkarotīti, nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6199: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti somān. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ{*3/501*} teṣāṃ śeṣo bhakṣayitavyaḥ, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? some bhakṣo na vidyate. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6200: avacanāt, na śakyam asati vacane 'dhyavasātuṃ bhakṣaṇam. tasmāt somaśeṣo na bhakṣayitavya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6204: bhaved vā bhakṣaḥ, anyārthaṃ hi vacanaṃ bhakṣaṃ darśayati - sarvataḥ parihāram āśvinaṃ bhakṣayati, bhakṣitāpy āyitāṃś camasān [349]{*3/502*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6209: vacanāni tv apūrvatvāt tasmād yathopadeśaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,5.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6210: nanu darśanam idam, prāptir vaktavyā. ucyate - vacanāni tarhi bhaviṣyanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6211: sarvataḥ parihāram āśvinaṃ bhakṣayati{*3/504*}. tasmāt sarvā diśaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6212: śṛṇotīti viśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate. apūrvatvād bhakṣānuvādo nāvakalpate. api ca, evam apūrvam arthaṃ vidadhato 'rthavattā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6213: tasmād yatraiva viśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ śrūyate, tatraiva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6218: jyotiṣṭoma eva śruyate - praitu hotuś camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6219: pra yajamānasya prayantu sadasyānām iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ camasinām asti bhakṣaḥ, neti. kiṃ prāptam? neti brūmaḥ, nātiprasajyata{*3/505*} ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:6221: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - camaseṣv asti bhakṣa iti. kutaḥ? samākhyānāt, hotuś camaso brahmaṇaś camasa udgātuś camasa iti samākhyayā nirdiśyate, hotā yatra camati camiṣyati, acamīd vā sa hotuś camasaḥ. yady atra hotā na camen na hotuś camaso bhavet. tasmāc camatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6222: āha, kāsya liṅgasya prāptir iti. sāmarthyam iti brūmaḥ - hotuś camasena praitavyam. yadi cātra hotā na [350]{*3/506*} camet, na śakyaṃ bhaved
GSP28msbh1-7u:6223: dhotuś camasena praitum. na cātrānyad dhotā, odanādi camiṣyati, somacamasa iti hi taṃ samācakṣate. api ca, na tad dhotur dravyaṃ yajamānasya tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:6224: dravyam, hotus tatra camanaṃ kartavyam. some ca bhakṣyamāṇe tena homo 'vakalpate. pavitraṃ hi somaḥ, na tasmin bhakṣite pātraṃ vyāpadyate. tatra camasena śakyate hotum. vacanaprāmāṇyād ucchiṣṭena hoṣyatīti cet. naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:6225: evam, asati avakāśe vacanaṃ bādhakaṃ bhavati, asti cāvakāśaḥ somabhakṣaṇam, tasmāc camasibhir bhakṣayitavyaḥ somaḥ iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6226: atha takṣaṇādīny āśrīyeran. tathā saṃbandhāpahnavād ataccamasataiva syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6227: dravyāntaraṃ syāt. tasmāc cābrāhmaṇasya somaṃ pratiṣedhati, sa yadi rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet, sa yadi somaṃ vibhakṣayiṣet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6228: nyagrodhastibhīrāhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhany unmṛja{*3/507*} tasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchet, na somam iti{*3/508*} bhakṣānivṛttiṃ{*3/509*} darśayati. saiṣa bhakṣāśaṅkaivaṃ saty upapadyate, yadi camasino 'sti bhakṣaḥ, tasmād astīti manyāmahe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6235: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti. tatrāsti - praitu hotuś camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām iti. tatrāsti{*3/510*} samākhyānād bhakṣa ity uktam. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eka evainaṃ camasam udgātā bhakṣayet, uta sarve [351]{*3/511*} bhakṣayeyuḥ? atha subrahmaṇyavarjitāś chandogā bhakṣayeyuḥ, athavā saha subrahmaṇyeneti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? eko bhakṣayed udgātaiva. kutaḥ? śrutisaṃyogāt, udgātaikaḥ śrutyā saṃyujyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6237: nanu bahuvacanaṃ śrūyate - tena bahavo bhakṣayeyuḥ. ucyate, śrūyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:6238: bahuvacanam, tad udgātṛprātipadikagatam, tad vivakṣitaṃ sad udgātṛbahutvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6239: brūyāt, ekaś cogātā, tatra bahutvaṃ śrūyamāṇam api na śaknuyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6240: udgātṛbhedaṃ kartum. tasmād avivakṣitaṃ bahuvacanam, anumānaṃ hy etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6241: bahūnāṃ camasa iti. katham? yad bahuṣu prātipadikaṃ vartate, tato bahuvacanaṃ bhavati, bahuvacanaṃ tu tato dṛśyate, prodgātṝṇām iti. tasmān nūnaṃ bahūnāṃ camasa ity anumānam. pratyakṣaṃ tv eka udgātā, na dvitīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6242: na tṛtīyaḥ. anumānāc ca pratyakṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ balavad bhavet. tasmād ekasya camasaḥ, sa codgātur
GSP28msbh1-7u:6246: sarve vā bhakṣayeyuḥ, ekasminn udgātari bhakṣayati bahuvacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6247: pramādādhītam{*3/512*} iti gamyate. na hi tad anūdyate, na vidhīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6248: nanu sarveṣv api bhakṣayatsūdgātṛśabdaḥ pramādo gamyate. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6253: ucyate - naitad asti, bahūnāṃ camasa iti. kutaḥ? [352]{*3/513*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6254: udgātṛśabdasya camasena saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vākyena, bahuvacanasya punar udgātṛśabdena śrutyā saṃbandhaḥ. anyena ṛtvijā tu bahuvacanasya naiva kaścid asti saṃbandhaḥ. tasmād bahūnāṃ camasa ity anupapannam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6255: atrocyate - śaknoty ayam udgātṛśabdo bahutvaṃ vaditum, kriyāyogena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6256: udnāyantīty udgātāraḥ. ke te? prastotā, udgātā, pratiharteti, tad etena bahuvacananirdeśenānumānikakriyāyoganimitta udgātṛśabdo vivakṣita ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:6257: avagamiṣyāmaḥ. bahuvacanaṃ hy evam avakḷptaṃ bhaviṣyati, udgātṛśabdaś ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6260: sarve tu vedasaṃyogāt kāraṇād ekadeśo syāt // MS_3,5.26 //
