GSP28msbh1-7u:6261: sarve chandogāḥ sahasubrahmaṇyā bhakṣayeyuḥ. kim iti? gānasaṃyogād iti nāyaṃ pakṣa upapadyate. katham? ekas tatrodgānena saṃbandhaḥ{*3/514*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6262: itaro gānena, anyad dhi gānam, anyad udgānam, gītimātraṃ gānaṃ laukikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6263: vaidikaṃ ca. dvitīyaṃ sāmnaḥ parva, utpūrvasya gāyater abhidheyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6264: prasiddham. tatraika evodgīthaṃ karotīty eka evodgātā, na bahavaḥ. tasmād gānasaṃyogād bahavo bhaviṣyantīty etad api nopapadyate. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6265: vedasaṃyogāt, audgātraṃ nāma pravacanam, tathā - audgātrāṇi karmāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6266: audgātrasya kartā vādhyetā vodgātety ucyate. katham? udgātuḥ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6267: audgātram iti prasiddham. evaṃ ced vyaktam audgātrasya kartā, udgāteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6268: gamyate. yasyodgātā prasiddhaḥ, tad viśiṣṭaṃ karmānākhyātam apy audgātram iti vadati. śabdaś ca yasyaudgātraṃ prasiddham, sa tasya kartāram udgāteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6269: vadati, anākhyātam api, yathā yasyodameghaḥ prasiddhaḥ, sa tasyānākhyā-tam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6270: apy apatyam audameghir iti brūte, yasyaudameghiḥ, sa tasya [353]{*3/515*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6271: pitaram anākhyātam apy udameghaṃ pratipadyate. evam audgātrasaṃbandhād upapadyata udgātṛśabdaḥ, prastotāpy udgātāpi pratihartāpi subrahmaṇyo 'pi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6272: evaṃ bahuvacanam udgātṛśabdaś cobhayam apy upapannaṃ bhaviṣyati, na cānyaḥ kaścid doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6273: tasmād audgātreṇa saṃbaddhāśvatvāra udgātṛcamasaṃ bhakṣayeyur iti. yatra kāraṇam asti, tatrāpi subrahmaṇyā udgātāraḥ, yathā - udgātṛśabdo viniṣadyodgātāraḥ sāmnā stuvata iti stotrakāriṣu, tathedam{*3/516*} api
GSP28msbh1-7u:6274: vacanam, udgātāro nāpavyāhareyur uttamāyām eṣottamā ity apasubrahmaṇyānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:6280: jyotiṣṭome grāvastun nāma hotṛpuruṣaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sa somaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6281: bhakṣayet, neti. ucyate - grāvastun na bakṣayet. kutaḥ? yato 'sya bhakṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6282: nāmananti. hāriyojane camasinām adhikāra iti manyamāna evaṃ ha smāha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6285: *{3/517: E1 gibt hāriyojane camasinām adhikāra iti manyamāna evaṃ ha smāha, nāsyāmnāyate bhakṣa in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6287: hāriyojanasya vā grāvastutaṃ bhakṣayitāraṃ manyāmahe, evaṃ hy āmananti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6288: yathā camasam anyāṃś camasāṃś camasino bhakṣayanti. [354]{*3/518*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6289: athaitasya hāriyojanasya sarva eva lipsanta iti. yadā hāriyojanasya sarve
GSP28msbh1-7u:6293: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti grāvastuto hāriyojane bhakṣa iti, camasināṃ tatrādhikāro na sarveṣām. katham? camasinām eṣa vibhāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6294: camasino 'nyāṃś camasān, yathā - camasaṃ bhakṣayantīty anūdya, camasina eva vadati, athaitasya hāriyojanasya sarva eva lipsanta iti. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyam, athaitasyety athaśabdaprayogāt, anantaravṛttam apekṣate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6295: atha{*3/519*} sarva evety evaśabdaḥ, sāmarthyāt sarvān pūrvaprakṛtān
GSP28msbh1-7u:6296: apekṣate, ato manyāmahe - yathā camasam anyāṃś camasāṃś camasino bhakṣayantīty anena pūrveṇa, athaitasya hāriyojanasyety etasyaikavākyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6297: bhavatīti. tena camasināṃ saṃnihitānām eṣa vibhāgaḥ, yathā camasam anyatra, hāriyojane tu sarva eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6300: sarveṣāṃ tu vidhitvāt tadarthā camasiśrutiḥ // MS_3,5.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6301: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti - camasina eva hāriyojane
GSP28msbh1-7u:6302: lipsanta iti, sarve tu vidhīyante hāriyojane, sarve bhakṣayantīti, na punaś camasina iti saṃbandhaḥ śakyate vidhātum. dvau hi saṃbandhāv asmin vākye 'pūrvau na śakyete vidhātum. tasmād anyā vacanavyaktiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6303: [355]{*3/520*} kā punar asau? yathā camasam anyāṃś camasāṃś camasino bhakṣayantīty anuvādaḥ, camasinaś camasān bhakṣayanty eva, te bhakṣayanto yathā camasam eva, athaitasya hāriyojanasya na kevalaṃ camasinaḥ, sarva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6304: eveti. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati? sarvaśabdaś ca sarvān vadan naikadeśe kalpito
GSP28msbh1-7u:6305: bhaviṣyati. na ca, dvau saṃbandhāv apūrvāv ekasmin vākye bhaviṣyataḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6306: tasmād eṣa pakṣo jyāyān iti tadarthā hy eṣā camasiśrutiḥ, hāriyojanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6307: praśāṃsārthā{*3/521*} camasinaḥ kīrtyante hāriyojanaṃ praśaṃsitum. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6308: mahābhāgo hi hāriyojanaḥ, yasmāt tatra sarve lipsante, anyāṃś camasān ekaikaḥ, na te mahābhāgāḥ, nyūnā hāriyojanād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6310: *{3/521: E1 gibt hāriyojanasya praśāṃsārthā in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6312: atha kiṃ samākhyaivaikā bhakṣakāraṇam? neti brūmah, vaṣaṭkārāc ca bhakṣayet, vaṣaṭkāraś ca bhakṣaṇe nimittam. katham? vacanāt, evaṃ hi śrūyate - vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣa iti, bhakṣaṇasyāprāptatvāt, na prāthamy avidhānārtha eṣa śabdaḥ, prāthamy aviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇam eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6315: aparam api kāraṇaṃ homābhiṣavau. katham? havirdhāne [356]{*3/522*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6316: grāvabhir abhiṣutyāhavanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ parety sadasi bhakṣān
GSP28msbh1-7u:6317: bhakṣayantīti{*3/523*}. na tāvat, eṣa kramo vidhīyate, home nirvṛtte tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:6318: bhakṣaṇasyāprāptatvāt{*3/524*}. dvayoś ca kramayor vidhānāt, abhiṣutya hutveti vākyaṃ bhidyeta. arthena ca prāptatvād asya kramasya. na hy akṛte
GSP28msbh1-7u:6319: prayojane kaścit pratipādanam arhati. na ca, bhakṣaṇāṅgabhāvena homābhiṣavau codyete. abhiṣavasya homārthatvāt, homasya ca phalārthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6320: tasmād dhomābhiṣavayoḥ kartṝṇāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate. ye 'bhiṣuṇvanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6326: idaṃ śrūyate - praitu hotuś camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - camaseṣu homābhiṣavayoḥ kartāro vaṣaṭkartāraś ca kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6327: bhakṣayeyuḥ, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? na bhakṣayeyuḥ, pratyakṣopadeśāc camasānāṃ camasinaḥ prati. praitu hotuś camasa ityevamādibhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:6328: viśeṣavacanaiḥ, homābhiṣavakāriṇāṃ{*3/525*} sāmānyavākyena, yaḥ somo bhakṣaṇena saṃskartavyaḥ, sa camaseṣu camasibhir iti, athedānīm anyan nimittaṃ kva bhaviṣyati? avyaktaḥ sāmānyanimittaḥ kva? śeṣe bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6332: syād vā kāraṇabhāvād anirdeśaś camasānāṃ kartus tadvacanatvāt // MS_3,5.34
GSP28msbh1-7u:6333: syād vā camaseṣu vaṣaṭkartrādīnāṃ bhakṣaḥ, prāpyate hi teṣāṃ tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:6334: kāraṇam, na ca pratiṣidhyate. nanu camasināṃ pratyakṣo[357]{*3/526*}padeśān nivarteran. ucyate - anirdeśaś camasānāṃ kartus tadvacanatvāt, praitu hotuś camasa ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6335: śaknuvanti vaṣaṭkartrādīn pratiṣeddhum, upadeṣṭāro hi te, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6339: camase cānyāṃś camasino darśayati - camasāṃś camasādhvaryave prayacchati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6340: tān sa vaṣaṭkartre haratīti. eko hi svaś camaso vaṣaṭkartre hriyate, tena bahuharaṇadarśanaṃ nāvakalpate, yadi vaṣaṭkartrādayo na camaseṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:6342: atha yatraikasmin pātre bahavo bhakṣayanti, kas tatra krama iti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6343: ekapātre kramād adhvaryuḥ pūrvo bhakṣayet // MS_3,5.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6344: tasya hi kramo bhakṣayitum, yasya haste somaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6346: hotā vā pūrvo bhakṣayet, mantravarṇāt, mantravarṇo hi tathā - hotuś cit pūrve haviradyam āśateti{*3/527*}, tathā - hoteva naḥ prathamaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6351: vacanam idaṃ bhavati - vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathamabhakṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6352: vacana[358]{*3/529*}m evedam, na mantavyam, anekaguṇavidhānād avivakṣitaṃ prāthamyam iti. aprāptatvāt prāthamyasya, nāyam anuvādaḥ, vidhir eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6356: prathaṃ hi vaṣaṭkaraṇaṃ nimittaṃ hotuḥ, tato homo 'dhvaryor nimittam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6359: atha ya ekapātre somo 'nekena bhakṣyate, kiṃ tatrānujñāpya, ananujñāpya vā bhakṣayitavyam, utānujñāpyaiveti. lāghavād aniyamo prāpta ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6360: anujñāpya bhakṣayitavyam iti. kasmāt? vacanāt, idaṃ vacanaṃ bhavati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6361: tasmāt somo nānupahūtena peya iti. upahvānaṃ cānujñāpanam. prāptisūtram
GSP28msbh1-7u:6362: athānujñātena bhakṣayitavyam iti sthite, kiṃ laukikena vacanenānujñāpayitavyam, uta vaidikeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6366: *{3/531: E1 gibt prāptisūtram etat in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6369: [359]{*3/533*} sāmarthyād vinijujyate, tatra kṛte 'rthe laukiko nivartate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6374: iti. atha prativacane saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ laukikaṃ prativacanam utaitad eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6375: kiṃ prāptam? etad vaidikam, praśne viniyuktam. laukikam anyat prativacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6376: bhavitaum arhati. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tatraitad eva prativacanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6377: nanu praśnaliṅgam etad upahūyasveti{*3/536*}. ucyate - yad asya pūrvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6378: upahūta iti prativacanasya samartham, tat prativacanakārye baviṣyati. āha
GSP28msbh1-7u:6379: - viparītam etat samāmnānam, pūrvaṃ hi praśnena bhavitavyam, tataḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6380: prativacanena. ucyate - arthāt, pūrvaṃ prativacanakārye bhaviṣyati, artho hi kramād balīyān
GSP28msbh1-7u:6386: idaṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ yaḥ kaścid anujñāpayitavyaḥ, uta samānapātra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6387: aviśeṣābhidhānād yaḥ kaścid iti prāpta ucyate - tat khalv anujñāpanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6388: ekapātrāṇāṃ syāt. kutaḥ? anujñāpanam ihāṅgam, anujñāpanasya caitad rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6389: yatrānyena kartavyam anyaś cikīrṣet, so 'numanyasveti brūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6390: sahabhoja[360]{*3/537*}nādi vācaritukāmaś cittam anyasyānukūlayati. tad etan nānāpātreṣu naiva saṃbhavati. na hi tatrānyena kartavyam, anyo vā cikīrṣatīti{*3/538*}. sahabhojanādau vā padārthe{*3/539*} saṃmānayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6391: ekapātre tu some sādhāraṇe saṃskartavye nyāyena samo vibhāgaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6392: tatrāvibhajya pīyamāne kadācid anyena pātavyam anyaḥ pibet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6393: tatrānujñāpanaṃ saṃbhavati, tvayārdhaṃ pātavyam, mayār-dham. kadācid aham abhyādhikaṃ nyūnaṃ vā pibeyam, tadanujñātum arhasīti, ekapātre vā pānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6394: tvayā sahācarann ahaṃ tava cittaprasādānaṃ vyāhanyām iti saṃbhavaty anujñāpanā. tasmād eka-pātreṣv evaitat syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6399: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ, tatra ṛtuyāgeṣu śrūyate - yajamānasya yājyā so
GSP28msbh1-7u:6400: 'bhipreṣyati hotar etad yajeti svayaṃ yā niṣpadya yajatīti. yadā svayaṃ yajati, tadā saṃdehaḥ - kim asya bhakṣo 'sti, nāstīti. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6401: yājyāyām apanīyamānāyāṃ nāpanīyeta bhakṣaṇam, hotur eva tu bhakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6402: na yajamānasyeti. kutaḥ? anyā hi yājyā, anyad bhakṣaṇam, na cānyasminn apanīyamāne 'nyad apanīyate. yathā tasyām eva yājyāyām apanīyamānāyāṃ pravaro nāpanīyate, tadvad etad apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6403: nanu{*3/540*} yājyāyā adhi vaṣaṭkarotīti, yatra yājyā, tatra vaṣaṭkāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6404: yatra vaṣaṭkāraḥ, tatra bhakṣaṇam apīti. na [351]{*3/541*} ity ucyate, na tāvad yājyāyām avayavabhūto vaṣaṭkāraḥ, yena yājyāgrahaṇenāsau gṛhyeta{*3/542*}. yat tu tasyā adhi vaṣaṭkarotīti, anyenāpi prayujyamānāyā upari hotā vaṣaṭkariṣyati, yājyāpanayo hi vacanāt, na vaṣaṭkārāpanayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6405: yāvad vacanam, vācanikaṃ bhavaty eva, vacanaṃ hi tadviṣayam eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6408: *{3/542: E2,4 geben yena yājyāgrahaṇenāsau gṛhyeta in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6410: yaṣṭur vā bhakṣaḥ syāt. kutaḥ? kāraṇāgamāt, bhakṣasya kāraṇaṃ vaṣaṭkāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6411: sa ca yājyāyām āgacchantyām āgacchati. evaṃ hi śrūyate - yājyāyā adhi vaṣaṭkarotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6412: nanv etad uktam - yajamānenāpi prayujyamānāyāṃ hotā{*3/543*} adhi{*3/544*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6413: vaṣaṭkarotīti. naiṣa samādhiḥ, anavānatā yaṣṭavyam, vaṣaṭkāreṇa yāgaḥ kriyate, na yājyāmatreṇa. tasmād ā vaṣaṭkārān nāvānitavyaṃ yajamānena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6414: anyaś ced vaṣaṭkuryād avānyād yajamānaḥ. na ca yajeta. yaṣṭavye cāsau codyate, na yājyāmātravacane, svayaṃ nipadya yajatīti sāṅgasya niṣadyayāge vidhānāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6419: atha yad uktam - yathā pravaro nāpanīyate, evaṃ bhakṣo 'pīti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6420: aśakyatvāt pravaro nāpanīyate, atikrānto hi sa katham apanīyeta hotuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6421: bhraṣṭe cāvasare, anuṣṭhīyamāno yajamānasya viguṇaḥ syāt. na ca viguṇaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6422: kathaṃcid arthaṃ sādhayet. nātra codakena prāpnoti. athocyate - yac chakyaṃ tac codakena prāpitam, yan na śakyam, na tat prāpitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6423: prakṛtir iyam, [362]{*3/545*} apūrvasyātra vidhānam, yādṛśam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6424: tādṛśaṃ yadi śakyate kartavyam. yadi na śakyate, yatraiva śakyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6425: tatraiva kāryam. na yatra viguṇam iti. tasmāt pravarasyānapāyo yukto na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6429: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - sa yadi rājanyaṃ vā{*3/546*} vaiṣyaṃ vā yājayet, sa yadi somaṃ vibhakṣayiṣet, nyagrodhastibhīr āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhany unmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchen na somam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ phalacamaso bhakṣavikāraḥ, utejyāvikāra iti. kiṃ phalacamasaṃ bhakṣayed
GSP28msbh1-7u:6430: ity arthaḥ, uta phalacamasena yajeteti{*3/547*}. kiṃ prāptam? phalacamaso naimittiko bhakṣavikāraḥ, bhakṣaṇena hi śrutenaikavākyatā bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6431: tasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacched iti, na, tena yajetetiśabdo 'sti, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6435: *{3/547: E1 gibt kiṃ phalacamasaṃ bhakṣayed ity arthaḥ, uta phalacamasena yajeteti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6437: ijyāvikāro vā phalacamasaḥ phalacamasena yajetety arthaḥ{*3/548*}. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6438: yad etad bhakṣaṇam, etat somasaṃskārārtham, phalacamasyāpi yadi bhakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6439: phalacamasasaṃskārārtham, phalacamasasyānyatrānupayogād anarthakam. atha bhakṣaṇaṃ pradhānam. tathā - na somam [363]{*3/549*} ity anuvādo nāvakalpate. yadi tv ijyāvikāro{*3/550*} bhavet, tataḥ phalacamasasaṃskāro 'vakalpate. tasmād ijyāvikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6440: āha - kathaṃ yajisaṃbandhe 'sati, ijyāvikāro bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate - asti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6441: yajisaṃbandhaḥ. katham iti. yadi rājanyaṃ vā{*3/551*} vaiṣyaṃ vā yājayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6442: nyagrodhastibhīḥ saṃpiṣya tam asmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchet, yājayitum iti gamyate. bhakṣasaṃbandhe hi na pūrvam uttareṇa saṃbadhyate, yadi somaṃ bhakṣaṇena saṃskartum icchen nyagrodhastibhīḥ saṃskuryād iti. tasmān na bhakṣaṇasaṃbandhaḥ. yāgo hi prakṛto 'sti, tena saha saṃbhantsyate, na doṣo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6443: nanu tasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacched itivacanād bhakṣasādhanam iti gamyate, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6444: yāgasādhanam iti, bhakṣaśabdānantaryāt. ucyate - śrūyamāṇe saṃbandhe 'narthakam iti kṛtvā prakṛtasaṃabdha ity ucyate. kathaṃ tu bhakṣasaṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:6445: iti. yad dhi{*3/552*} yāgadravyaṃ bhakṣayitavyam, tac codakena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6446: tasmād bhakṣasaṃbandhaṃ labhate, bhakṣasaṃbandhena ca yāgasaṃbandha eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6447: lakṣyate, yadi tenejyate, tataḥ sa bhakṣo bhavati, tasmād bhakṣavacanāt sutarāṃ tenejyata iti gamyate, saiṣā vyavadhāraṇakalpanā. tasmai bhaksaṃ prayacchet, tam asmai bhakṣaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ, yathā sa bhakṣo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6448: tathā kuryād iti, yadi ca tenejyate, tato 'yaṃ bhakṣo bhavati. tasmāt tena yaṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6450: *{3/548: E1 gibt phalacamasena yajetety arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6455: homaviśeṣavacanaṃ bhavati - yadānyāṃś camasāñ{*3/553*} juhvati, athaitasya darbhataruṇakenopahatya juhotīti. ijyāvikāre sati darbhataruṇakeneti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6460: yadānyāṃś cāmasān unnayanti, athainaṃ camasam unnayantīti. ijyāvikāre saty unnayanadarśanaṃ yujyate, na bhakṣavikāre. tasmād apījyāvikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6462: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ - ijyāvikāra iti. kutaḥ? liṅgadarśanāt. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati? somapratiṣedhānuvādaḥ, tasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchet, na somam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6463: ijyāvikāre sati somo na bhakṣyate. tasmāt paśyāmaḥ - ijyāvikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6465: asti rājasūye daśapeyaḥ, tatra śrūyate - śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somān
GSP28msbh1-7u:6466: bhakṣayanti, daśadaśaikaikacamasam anuprasarpantīti. atra rājanyacamase saṃdehaḥ - kim, taṃ rājanyā anuprasarpeyuḥ, uta brāhmaṇā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6467: rājyanyā iti. katham? daśadaśaikaikaṃ camasam anuprasarpeyur ity anuprasarpatāṃ saṃkhyā vidhīyate. ekasyāṃ rājanyajātau daśasaṃkhyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6468: vidhīyate. rājanyajātiḥ saiva, tena taṃ daśa rājanyā anuprasarpeyur evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6469: śataṃ brāhmaṇā rājanyāś ca. teṣu śataśabdo 'nuvādaḥ. anuvādasarūpaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6470: śataṃ bhakṣayantīti. tasmād rājanyā rājanyacamasam anuprasarpeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6471: kecid āhuḥ - brāhmaṇarājanyānām ekasmiṃś camase bhakṣaṇaṃ [365]{*3/555*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6472: virudhyata iti. na sa doṣaḥ, na hi somenocchiṣṭā bhavantīti śrūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6475: brāhmaṇā vā rājanyacamasam anuprasarpeyuḥ. katham? śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6476: bhakṣayantīti vidhiḥ śrutyā brāhmaṇagatām eva saṃkhyām āha. tasmāc chataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ, teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇārtham anuprasarpatām ekaikasmiṃś camase daśadaśopadiśyante. tasmād brāhmaṇāśatasya daśa brāhmaṇā rājanyacamasam anuprasarpeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6479: anārabhya kiṃcid ucyate - yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavati sa chadasām eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6480: rasenāvadyati, sarasā asyāhutayo bhavanti. yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotīty{*3/557*}evamādi. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ khādiratā sruve, pālāśatā juhvām, prakṛtau niviśate, uta prakṛtau vikṛtau
GSP28msbh1-7u:6481: ceti. kiṃ prāptam? sarvārtham aprakaraṇāt, prakṛtivikṛtyartham
GSP28msbh1-7u:6482: evaṃjātīyakam. kutaḥ? aprakaraṇāt, na kasya-cid prakaraṇe śrūyante, tāni vākyena sarvatra bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6486: prakṛtau vā niviśerann anārabhyādhītāni pātrāṇi. kutaḥ? adviruktatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6487: evam adviruktaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. dviruktāyāṃ ko doṣaḥ? asaṃbhava iti brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6488: yad dhi prakṛtau vikṛtau ca bhavati, asti tat prakṛtau. prakṛtau ced asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6489: codakenaiva vikṛtiṃ prāpnoti, tato nānārabhya vidhim ākāṅkṣati. tasmād anākāṅkṣitatvād anārabhyavidhir na tatra vidadhāti, tena brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6492: aprakaraṇāt prakṛtivikṛtyartham evety ucyate - yat tu coda[367]{*3/558*}kena prāpnotīty anārabhyavidhinā prāpte na codakam ākāṅkṣati. tasmād anārabhyavidhivarjaṃ codakaḥ prāpayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6494: vikṛtau. ānumānikāc ca pratyakṣaṃ balavat. tasmāt prakṛtivikṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6497: yady anārabhyavidhiś codakād balīyān, anārabhyavidhinā prāpte na codakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6498: ākāṅkṣati, nirākāṅkṣe vaikṛte karmaṇi codako naiva prāpnoti. tatra prayājādīnāṃ darśanaṃ naivopapadyeta, dṛśyante ca prayājādayaḥ kvacit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6499: prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotīti{*3/559*}. atha codako balīyān{*3/560*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6505: na prakṛtyarthaḥ, sarvārtha{*3/561*} iti brūmaḥ, aprakaraṇe samāmnānāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6506: yad uktam, anārabhyavidhinā nirākāṅkṣasya na codaka iti, tan nopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6507: na hy anārabhyavidhiś codanāṃ nirākāṅkṣīkaroti, prāpte hi codake na sruve khādiratānārabhyavidhinā śakyā vidhātum. asati codake 'nārabhyavidhir api
GSP28msbh1-7u:6508: nāsti, na cānārabhyavidhiḥ sruvaṃ prāpayati, tasya ca khādiratām. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6509: codanaikārthyāt. ekārthā hi codanā, yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavatīti. na cātra sruvaḥ khādiratā cobhayaṃ vidhīyate, sruvasya sataḥ khādiratām eṣa śabda āha, sa ca codakena prāptaḥ. tasmād asti codakaḥ, sa hy anārabhyavidhivākyasya pratyakṣatvāt taṃ varjayitvānyaṃ prāpayati. tasmāt prakṛtivikṛtyartho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6511: *{3/561: E2: sarvārtham, E4: sarvārthe, E6: sarvārtha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6513: iti cet paśyasi - utpattir eṣāṃ prakṛtividhibhis tulyā, prakṛtāv aṅgāni saṃkṣepeṇa vistareṇa cocyante - pañca prayājān yacatīti saṃkṣepeṇa.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6514: samidho yajatīty{*3/563*}evamādinā vistareṇa. ihāpi yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavatītyevamādir vistāraḥ, yasyaivaṃrūpāḥ sruva iti saṃkṣepaḥ. evaṃrūpaḥ prakṛtau vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ, ayam apy evaṃrūpaḥ, tasmāt prākṛta iti sāmānyato
GSP28msbh1-7u:6519: naitad evam. na hy evaṃjātīyakaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ sādhakaṃ bhavati, kevalam atra prākṛtavidhisārūpyam, na tu prakṛtāv etad bhavatīti pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6520: api ca vikṛtāv api saṃkṣepavistārābhyām{*3/564*} aṅgāni vidhīyante, tisra āhutīr juhotīti{*3/565*} saṃkṣepaḥ, āmanam asyāmanasya devā iti{*3/566*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6521: vistāraḥ{*3/567*}. ato vaikṛtair{*3/568*} apy anārabhyavidhayas tulyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6530: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na sarvārtho 'nārabhyavidhiḥ, prakṛtyarthaḥ sa iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ? codanārthakārtsnyāt, kṛtsnaṃ codakaḥ prāpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6531: nānārabhyavidhinā vaikṛtam apūvaṃ? nirākāṅkṣam, pātrāṇāṃ hi tad vākyena na yāgānām. yāgāś codanāliṅgasaṃyogāt prakṛtim apekṣante, tayā sahaikavākyatāṃ yānti. prākṛtāś ca tāñ śaknavanti nirākāṅkṣīkartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6532: nānārabhya[369]{*3/569*}vidhayaḥ. tasmād avaśyaṃ codaka utpādayitavyaḥ. sa ced utpādyate, nārtho 'nārabhyavidhinā. na cāsau prakaraṇādīnām abhāvāt pravartamāno 'pi vaikṛtena yāgena saṃbadhyeta. tasmād vaikṛtena karmaṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6535: codakasāmarthyāt, prākṛte vākyaśeṣe prāpte 'nārabhyavidhir na bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6541: prakaraṇaviśeṣāt tu vikṛtau virodhi syāt // MS_3,6.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6542: anārabhya, kiṃcit, sāmidhenīnāṃ parimāṇam āmnātam - saptadaśa sāmidhenīr anubrūyād iti{*3/573*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim etat prakṛtau, uta vikṛtāv iti. kiṃ prāptam? pūrveṇa nyāyena prakṛtāv iti prāptam, prakṛtau ca pāñcadaśyam āmnātam, tena vikalpa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6543: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vikṛtāv evaṃjātīyako vidhiḥ syāt. kasmāt? prakṛteḥ pāñcadaśyena nirākāṅkṣatvāt. nanu vikalpo bhavaiṣyatīty uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6544: prakaraṇaviśeṣāt pāñcadaśyena na vikalpaḥ, viṣamaśāsanāt. vikṛtau tv ānumānikaṃ pāñcadaśyaṃ bādhitvā, anārabhyavidhivākyena pratyakṣeṇa sāptadaśyaṃ nivekṣyate. advi[370]{*3/574*}ruktaṃ caitat prayogavacanam upasaṃhariṣyati. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaṃ vikṛtyartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6547: naimittakaṃ tu prakṛtau, tadvikāraḥ saṃyogaviśeṣāt // MS_3,6.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6548: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam - godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed iti, tathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6549: agnīṣomīye paśau śrūyate yūpaṃ prakṛtya, bailvo brahmavarcaskāmena kartavya iti{*3/575*}. evaṃjātīyakeṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prakṛtau niveśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6550: vikṛtau veti{*3/576*}. kiṃ prāptam? vikṛtāv iti, prakṛtīr anyena pātreṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:6551: yūpena ca nirākāṅkṣāḥ. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakṛtau naimittikaṃ niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6553: ca, godohanaṃ bailvaś ca viśeṣavihitau, viśeṣavidhinā cāviśeṣavidhir bādhyate. prakaraṇaṃ sāmānyam, nimittasaṃyogo viśeṣaḥ, sāmānyena yat prāpnoti, tat parokṣaṃ lakṣaṇayā. yat tu viśeṣeṇa, tat pratyakṣaṃ śrutyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6554: śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā balīyasī, pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣāt. tasmāt prakṛtāv eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6560: santi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ - agnaye pavamānāyāṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet, agnaye
GSP28msbh1-7u:6561: pāvakāya, agnaye śucaya iti{*3/577*}. tāsāṃ prakaraṇe, samāmnātam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6562: brāhmaṇo vasante 'gnim ādadhīteti{*3/578*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim agnyādheyaṃ pavamāneṣṭyartham, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? [371]{*3/579*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6563: iṣṭyartham iti. kutaḥ? prakaraṇāt, tāsāṃ prakaraṇe śrūyate - atas
GSP28msbh1-7u:6569: pavamāneṣṭayo hy agnyarthāḥ, yady agnir iṣṭyarthaḥ syāt, tatas tadartham agnyādheyam iṣṭīnām upakuryāt. niṣphalās tv iṣṭayaḥ, tadartham agnyādheyam api niṣphalaṃ syāt. kathaṃ punar agnyarthatā pavamāneṣṭīnām?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6570: niṣprayojanatvād eva, prayojanavattvāc cāgnīnām. bhāvayitavyā apīṣṭayo bhūtānām agnīnām arthena kriyeran. tasmād agnyādheyaṃ pavamāneṣṭyartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6572: liṅgaṃ darśayati{*3/580*}, yathāgnyarthāḥ pavamāneṣṭaya iti. kiṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6573: jīryati vā eṣa āhitaḥ paśur yad agniḥ, tad etāny evāgnyādheyasya havīṃṣi saṃvatsare nirvapet, tena vā eṣa na jīryati, tenainaṃ{*3/581*} punar navaṃ karoti tan na sūkṣmam iti{*3/582*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6579: tad etad ādhānaṃ kiṃ prakṛtyartham, uta sarvakarmārtham iti saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6580: prāptam? ucyate, tat prakṛtyartham. katham? yathānye 'nārabhyavādāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6583: sarvakarmārthaṃ vādhānam. ko 'rthaḥ? sarvakarmārthaṃ yad agnidravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6584: tadartham ādhānaṃ na prakṛtyartham. na prakṛtīḥ prakṛtya śrūyate. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6586: anyeṣv anārabhyavādeṣv anyato nirjñāte 'ṅgabhāve tato vicāraḥ - kiṃ prakṛter aṅgabhūtāni vikṛter iti, tasmāt teṣu yuktam. iha tv aṅgabhāve na kāraṇam asti, tasmād agniprayuktam ādhānam, na karmaprayuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6587: sarvakarmārthā agnaya{*3/584*} iti sarvārtham ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6588: api cāsya svataḥ kālo vidhīyate, sa na vidhātavyaḥ, yadā jyotiṣṭomasya prayogaḥ, tadedaṃ kartavyam. tadā ca vasantaḥ. evaṃ yadā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6589: prayogaḥ, tadā kartavyam. tadā paurṇamāsy amāvāsyā vā. aprakṛtyarthaṃ tu na prakṛtiprayoge kriyeta, tatra kālavacanaṃ yuktam. tasmān na prakṛtyartham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6592: tāsām agniḥ prakṛtitaḥ prayājavat syāt // MS_3,6.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6593: santi pavamāneṣṭavyaḥ - agnaye pavamānāyety{*3/585*}evamādyāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛte 'gnau pavamāneṣṭayaḥ kartavyāḥ, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:6594: neti. kiṃ prāptam? tāsāṃ khalu pavamāneṣṭīnāṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛto 'gniḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6595: prakṛtitaḥ syāt. kutaḥ? codakasāmarthyāt, prayājavat, yathāsu prayājā bhavanti codakena, evaṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛtā agnayo 'pi bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6599: na veṣṭisaṃskāraḥ, agnīnāṃ pavamāneṣtiṣu syāt. kasmāt? [373]{*3/586*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6600: tāsāṃ tadarthatvāt, tāḥ pavamāneṣṭayo 'gnisaṃskārārthā ity uktam. yac ca nāmāṅgabhūtaṃ tac codakena gṛhyate. agniprayuktaś ca pavamāneṣṭisaṃskāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:6601: na darśapūrṇamāsaprayuktaḥ, tena na codakenākṛṣyate. api ca pavamāneṣ-ṭaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6602: iṣṭisaṃskāravarjitāṃ prakṛtim apekṣante, avihitatvāt tasyām avasthāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6606: jyotiṣṭome, paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata
GSP28msbh1-7u:6607: iti{*3/587*}, tathā savanīyo 'nubandhyaś ca. santi ca paśudharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6608: upākaraṇam upānayanam akṣayā bandhaḥ, yūpe niyojanaṃ saṃjñapanaṃ viśasanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6609: ityevamādayaḥ. te kiṃ sarveṣām agnīṣomīyasavanīyānubandhyānām, uta agnīṣomīyasya savanīyasya vā{*3/588*}, utāgniṣomīyasyaiveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6610: aviśeṣat, sarvapaśūnām. katham aviśeṣaḥ? jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe sarve paśavaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6613: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - savanīyasyaite dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ, tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ paśuvidhiḥ syāt, yadi prakaraṇe viśeṣo na bhavet. bhavati tu prakaraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:6614: viśeṣaḥ, savanīyānāṃ prakaraṇe paśudharmāḥ samāmnātāh, āgneyaḥ paśur agniṣṭoma ālabhyaḥ, āgneyo hy agniṣṭomaḥ. aindrāgnaḥ paśur ukthya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6615: ālabhyaḥ, aindrāgnāni hy ukthyāni. aindro vṛṣṇiḥ ṣoḍaśiny ālabhyaḥ, aindro vai vṛṣṇir aindraḥ ṣoḍaśī. sārasvatī meṣy atirātra ālabhyā, vāg vai sarasvatī [374]{*3/590*} iti{*3/591*} prakṛtya paśudharmā āmnātāḥ, tasmāt savanīyasya prakaraṇād bhavitum arhati // MS_3,6.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6622: yad uktam - prakaraṇāt savanīyārthā iti, etad gṛhṇīmaḥ, kramāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:6623: cāgnīṣomīyasya. tasya hi krama aupavasathye 'hani samāmnātam, tasmād dvayor apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6624: śvas tv ekeṣāṃ tatra prākśrutir guṇārthā // MS_3,6.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6625: ekeṣāṃ śākhināṃ śvaḥ savanīyānām āmnānam, tad apekṣyeyam eṣāṃ guṇārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6626: punaḥśrutiḥ. kaḥ punar guṇaḥ? yad arthaiṣā śrutiḥ. ucyate - paśūn
GSP28msbh1-7u:6627: saṃkīrtya, yathā vai matsyo 'vidito janam avadhuute{*3/592*}, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6628: vaite{*3/593*} 'prajñāyamānā janam avadhunvata ity eṣām avijñāne doṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6629: abhidhāya, ebhiḥ kathaṃ savanāni paśumantītipraśnarūpakeṇa vapāpracāro guṇo vidhīyate, tad arthaiṣā śrutiḥ, vapāpracāreṇaikavākyatvāt. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6630: yady evam, na, savanīyānāṃ prakaraṇena paśudharmāḥ, kramād agnīṣomīyārthā eveti. kiṃ punas tac chva āmnānam? āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ savanīyapaśum{*3/594*} upākarotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6636: naitad asti - kramād agnīṣomīyārthā eveti, prakaraṇāt savanīyārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6638: katham? tena vapāpracāreṇokṛṣṭasya kāla eṣa vidhīyate, prātaḥsavane vapāpracāre codite sati paśvālambho 'pi tatraiva prapnoti. tatra kālāniyame prāpte, āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītveti kālamātraṃ vidhīyate. trivṛtā yūpaṃ [375]{*3/595*} parivīyopākarotīty{*3/596*} anuvādaḥ. itarathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6639: hi{*3/597*} parivyāṇasya kālo vidhīyeta, upākaraṇasya ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6640: tatrānekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmāt savanīyārthāḥ paśudharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6646: naitad evam, agnīṣomīyārthā evaite kramāt. āśvinakālaṃ hy āmnānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6647: vidhānārtham. guṇārtha etasmin vākyaṃ bhidyeta, na vidhānārthe. na hi vapāpracāreṇotkṛṣṭasya kālavidhiḥ saṃbhavati. ekadeśo hi vapādravyaṃ tena saṃnipātino vapāsaṃskārāt, utkarṣen nopākaraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6649: āha - arthena tarhy{*3/598*} utkṛṣṭasya kālo vidhīyate. muṣṭinā pidhāya vapoddharaṇam āsīta ā vapāhomād iti śrūyate. pūrvedyur vapoddharaṇaṃ muṣṭinā pidhāya na śaknuyād etāvantaṃ kālamāsīnenāvasthātum, avaśyam āhāravihārādayas tena kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6653: naitad evam, śrutivipratiṣedho{*3/599*} bhaved evam, na ca śrutivipratiṣedhaḥ, tṛṇamuṣṭinā parṇamuṣṭinā vā pidhāyiṣyate. nanv āsta ity upaveśane bhavati. nāvaśyam upaveśana eva{*3/600*}, audāsīnye 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:6654: dṛśyate. tad yathā - gṛhyāṇi parigṛhyāste, kṣetrāṇi parigṛhyāsta ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:6655: anupadeśane 'pi bhavati, vyāpāranivṛttau. ihāpi tṛṇamuṣṭinā parṇamuṣṭinā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6656: vā pidhāya, ā vapāhomād udāsiṣyate. tasmād āśvinakālam āmnānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6657: vidhānārtham, na savanīyānāṃ prakaraṇe paśudharmāḥ, tasmān na savanīyārthāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6661: sthānāt tu pūrvasya saṃskārasya tad arthatvāt // MS_3,6.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6662: nāsti savanīyānāṃ prakaraṇam ity evaṃ sati pūrveṇaiva hetunā sthānena pūrvasyāgnīṣomīyasya bhavitum arhati. saṃskāro 'yaṃ paśuyāgaprayuktaḥ, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6663: jyotiṣṭomaprayuktaḥ, jyotiṣṭomaprayuktatve na viśeṣaḥ paśūnāṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6664: paśuyāgā api hi dharmān prayoktum apūrvatvāt samarthāḥ, prakaraṇavantaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:6667: itaś ca paśyāmo 'gnīṣomīyārtāḥ paśudharmā iti. kutaḥ? liṅgadarśanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6668: liṅgam asminn arthe bhavati, vapayā prātaḥsavane caranti, puroḍāśena mādhyaṃdine savana iti paśupuroḍāśaṃ darśayati. itarathā samānavidhāneṣu sarveṣu paśuṣv agnīṣomayor devatayoḥ saṃskārārthaḥ san puroḍāśaḥ sāmarthyād agnīṣomīyasya bhaven na savanīyasya, tayor devatayor abhāvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6671: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*3/602*}. āha, nanu chidrāpidhānārthaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ. neti brūmaḥ, acodanā guṇārthena, tasya chidrāpidhānārthena na codanā, arthavādaḥ sa ity uktam. tasmād devatāsaṃskārārthaḥ, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6672: agnīṣomīyārthatve{*3/603*}, savanīye puroḍāśasya darśanam upapadyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6675: *{3/602: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6677: dohayoḥ kālabhedād asaṃyuktaṃ śṛtaṃ syāt // MS_3,6.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6678: asti sāyaṃdohaḥ, tathāsti prātardohaḥ. santi tu dohadharmāḥ śākhāharaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6679: gavāṃ prasthāpanam, prasāvanam, godohanam ityevamādayaḥ. te kiṃ sāyaṃdohārthāḥ, utobhayārthā iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? dohayos tayor asaṃyuktaṃ dharmaiḥ śṛtaṃ bhavet. kasmāt? sāyaṃdohasya hi krama
GSP28msbh1-7u:6680: aupavasathye 'hani śākhāharaṇādīn samāmananti, tasminn evāhani sāyaṃdohaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6683: prakaraṇaṃ hi sādhāraṇam, yathaiva dadhna evaṃ payasaḥ, kramāc ca prakaraṇaṃ balavattaram, tasmād ubhayārthā dohadharmāḥ. api ca, na sāyaṃdohasya pūrvedyur āmnānam. kva tarhi? uttaredyuḥ. katham? evam āmananti - aindraṃ dadhy amāvāsyāyām, aindraṃ payo 'māvāsyāyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:6684: iti{*3/605*}, amāvāsyāyāṃ hy ubhayaṃ{*3/606*} sāṅgaṃ codyate. sa eṣa sāyaṃdoho 'rthāt pūrvedyur anuṣṭhīyate, svabhāva eṣa dadhnaḥ, yat pūrvedyur upakrāntam aparedyur abhinirvartate. tasmāt sāyaṃdohasya krama
GSP28msbh1-7u:6685: āmātā ity etad eva tāvan nāsti. ata ubhayārthā dohadharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6691: iti{*3/608*}. tatraindravāyavādyā grahāḥ prātaḥsavane daśa āmnātāḥ, tatra dharmā śrūyante - upopte 'nye grahāḥ sādyante, anupopte dhruvāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6692: daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ samārṣṭīti. santy apare mādhyaṃdine savane, apare tṛtīyasavane grahāḥ. teṣu mādhyaṃdinīyeṣu tārtīyeṣu ca savaneṣu saṃdehaḥ{*3/609*} - kiṃ sarveṣu grahadharmāḥ kartavyāḥ, uta prātaḥsavane ye grahās teṣv iti. kiṃ prāptam? prātaḥsavanagraheṣu bhaveyuḥ, teṣāṃ hi krame{*3/610*} samāmnānāt{*3/611*} netareṣām. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6693: savanāntare prātaḥsavanāt, mādhyaṃdine tṛtīyasavane ca grahāmnānaṃ tadvad eva bhavitum arhati. sarveṣāṃ hi tulyaṃ prakaraṇam, yatraite dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ, vākyena grahamātrasya vidhīyante. kramāc ca vākyaprakaraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:6701: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3/612*}. tatra raśanā śrūyate, raśanādharmāś ca - trivṛd
GSP28msbh1-7u:6702: bhavati, darbhamayī bhavati, prapiṣṭānāṃ{*3/613*} kartavyā ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ete dharmā agnīṣomīyaraśanāyāḥ savanīyaraśanāyāś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:6703: sādhāraṇāḥ, utāgnīṣomīyaraśanāyā eveti. kiṃ prāptam? prakaraṇād agnīṣomīyaraśanāyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6704: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇā iti. kutaḥ? liṅgadarśanāt, liṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6705: bhavati, evam āha - āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6706: paśum{*3/614*} upākarotīti [379]{*3/615*} savanīyaparivyāṇe raśanāṃ darśayati, sā yadi sādhāraṇī, tata etad darśanam avakalpate. yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:6707: agnīṣomīyārthāḥ, tato 'prākṛtāt savanīyaparivyāṇān nivarteta. savanīye ca parivyāṇāntaraprākṛtam, yatra trivṛttvaṃ dṛśyate. katham? sa vai āśvinaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6708: grahaṃ gṛhītvopaniṣkramya yūpaṃ parivyayatīti. tatra yadi na sādhāraṇī
GSP28msbh1-7u:6709: raśanā, vāsasā parivyāṇaṃ prāpnoti, raśaṇāṃ tu darśayati. tasmāt sādhāraṇī raśanā, tat sā-dhāraṇyāc ca taddharmā api sādhāraṇāḥ. tad etal liṅgād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6710: raśanāsādhāraṇyam. ko 'tra khalu nyāya iti. ucyate - prakaraṇād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6718: 'ṃśvadābhyau{*3/616*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jyotiṣṭomasamāmnātā grahadharmāḥ kartavyāḥ, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? na kartavyāḥ, asaṃnidhānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6720: maitrāvaruṇasyaiva śravaṇam, na sarveṣām. evam idam api dharmajātaṃ prakaraṇasthānām eva, na sarveṣām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6724: saṃyuktaṃ vā tadarthatvāc cheṣasya tannimittatvāt // MS_3,6.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6725: saṃyuktaṃ vā dharmaiḥ, evaṃjātīyakaṃ syāt, aprakaraṇastham api. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6726: yataḥ prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. nanv anyatra kriya[380]{*3/618*}māṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6727: jyotiṣṭomasya nopakuryuḥ. ucyate - upakariṣyanti, aṃśvadābhyayos tadarthatvāj jyotiṣṭomārthatvāc{*3/619*} cheṣo 'yaṃ grahadharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6729: tasya sarvasya bhavitum arhati. tasmād aṃśvadābhyayor api grahadharmāḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6733: yad uktam - yathā maitrāvaruṇaṃ payasā śrīṇātīti, tad yuktam, śrayaṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:6734: vacanāt, prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vyavasthānam. iha tu viparītam, tatra sarveṣu graheṣu prakaraṇam, viśiṣṭeṣu vākyam. iha tu sarveṣu graheṣu vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6735: viśiṣṭeṣu prakaraṇam. tasmād aprakaraṇasthasyāpi dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6737: anārabhyāgnim ucyate - citriṇīr upadadhāti, vajriṇīr upadadhāti{*3/620*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:6738: bhūteṣṭakā upadadhātīti{*3/621*}. santi tu prakaraṇe, iṣṭakādharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6739: akhaṇḍām akṛṣṇalām iṣṭakāṃ kuryād iti. tatha bhasmanā iṣṭakāḥ saṃyujyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:6740: iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aprakaraṇe samāmnātānām ime dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6741: uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? na kartavyāḥ. kutaḥ? asaṃnidhānād, iti prāpte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6742: ucyate - agnyaṅgam evaṃjātīyakaṃ tadvad eva syāt, yadvad grahāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6743: prakaraṇād dhi vākyaṃ balavat. amūṣāṃ ceṣṭakānām agnyarthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6748: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - sa yadi rājanyaṃ vā{*3/623*} vaiśyaṃ vā yājayet, sa yadi somaṃ vibhakṣayiṣet, nyagrodhastibhīr āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhany unmṛjya tamasmai bhakṣaṃ prayacchen na somam iti. jyotiṣṭome santi somadharmāḥ, mānam upāvaharaṇaṃ krayo 'bhiṣava ityevamādayaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ samānavidhānā ime dharmāḥ somasya phalacamasya ca, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:6749: somadharmāḥ, phalacamasasya tu tadvikāratvād iti. guṇakāmānāṃ pravṛttir vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6751: kiṃ prāptam? samānavidhānāḥ prakaraṇāvibhāgād iti prāpte, ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6753: atulyatvāt, atulyaḥ somena phalacamasaḥ, somo nityavad āmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6754: phalacamaso naimittikaḥ. kim ataḥ? yady evam, dharmā api nityavad āmnātāḥ na śakyā anityavat kartum. yadi sādhāraṇāḥ, tatrānārabhyo 'rtho vidhīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6755: api ca naimittikaḥ phalacamasaḥ sa somadharmān gṛhṇāti, tatra dharmāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ santo dviruktā ity ucyeran. tasmād asamānavidhānāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6758: *{3/624: E1 gibt guṇakāmānāṃ pravṛttir vā prayojanam adhikaraṇacintāyāḥ in
GSP28msbh1-7u:6762: asti pratinidhiḥ, śrute dravye 'pacarati, yathā vrīhiṣv apacaratsu
GSP28msbh1-7u:6763: nīvārāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ nīvārāḥ samānavidhānāḥ, uta neti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6764: prāptam? pratinidhiś ca tadvat, yathā naimi[382]{*3/626*}ttikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6765: nityenāsamānavidhānam, evaṃ pratinidhiḥ, atulyatvāt. kātulyatā? vrīhīṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6766: vihitāḥ, na nīvārāṇām. iyam atulyatā, vrīhīṇāṃ vihitāḥ, nīvārāṇām arthāpattyā bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6769: naitad asti - asamānavidhānaḥ pratinidhir iti, tadvat syāt, yadvac
GSP28msbh1-7u:6770: chrutaḥ, na prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. kutaḥ? vrīhitvaṃ hi vrīhidharmāṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6771: vrīhivyaktau nimittam. na ca vrīhitvasya sthāne nīvāratvaṃ bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:6772: śrūyate, tasmān na prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. kathaṃ tarhi nīvāreṣu dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6773: bhavantīti. ucyate -yā vrīhitvena paricchinnā vrīhivyaktayaḥ, nīvāreṣu tāḥ santi. tāsām arthena te dharmāḥ kriyante, tāsāṃ ca vyaktīnām anyāsāṃ ca vrīhigatānāṃ tulya eṣa vidhiḥ. kā tulyatā? ubhaye 'pi vrīhitvalakṣitā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6778: itaś ca na pratinidheḥ śrutena saha prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6779: arthalakṣaṇatvāt, arthād dhi pratinidhiḥ kriyate. na cārthenaitad avagantuṃ śakyate, vrīhitvasya sthāne nīvāratvaṃ bhavatīti. tasmān na pratinidheḥ śrutena saha prakṛtivikārabhāvo bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6781: atha yaḥ śrutaḥ pratinidhiḥ, tatra kiṃ sāmānavidhyam uta na [383]{*3/628*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6782: iti. yathā - yadi somaṃ na vindeta pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti{*3/629*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6783: asāmānavidhyam iti brūmaḥ, aśrutād dhy etad viparītam. evaṃ prāpta ucyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:6784: - niyamārthā guṇaśrutiḥ, atrāpy arthalakṣaṇa eva pratinidhiḥ, some
GSP28msbh1-7u:6785: 'vidyamāne somasadṛśaṃ dravyaṃ prāptam. tatra susadṛśe dravye prāpta īṣatsadṛśaṃ niyamyate. anyasmin pratinidhātavye 'nyat pratinidhīyate śrutasya sthāne. na yāgadravyatvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6789: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ, tatra saṃsthāḥ samāmnātā agniṣṭomaḥ, ukthyaḥ, ṣoḍaśī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6790: atirātra iti. tatra dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sarvasaṃsthaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā uktāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6791: utāgniṣṭomasaṃsthyam{*3/630*} abhipretyeti. kiṃ prāptam? sarvasaṃsthāsu samānaṃ vidhānam. kutaḥ? prakaraṇāviśeṣāt, nāsti prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ, yena jñāyetāgniṣṭomasaṃsthaṃ prakṛtyeti. tasmāt samānavidhānāḥ saṃsthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6795: tulya iva prakaraṇe vyapadeśo bhavati - yady agniṣṭomo juhoti, yady ukthyaḥ paridhimanakti, yady atirātra etad eva yajur japan havirdhānaṃ pratipadyeteti sarvāvasthasya viśeṣavacanād avagamyate. yadi api sāmānyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6796: tad api sarvāvasthasyaiveti. yadi hi na{*3/631*} samānaṃ vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6798: asaṃkīrtyamāne 'pi dharmasaṃbandho bhavatīti, sarvāvasthasya kīrtanāt sarvāvasthaprakaraṇam{*3/633*} ity avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6799: api ca śrūyate - āgneyam ajam agniṣṭoma ālabheta, aindrāgnaṃ dvitīyam ukthye, aindraṃ vṛṣṇiṃ tṛtī-yaṃ ṣoḍaśinīti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca darśanaṃ sāmānavidhye ghaṭate. ukthye hi dve nimitte staḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6800: agniṣṭomastotram ukthyastotraṃ ceti, tatra dvau naimittikāv āgneyaḥ paśuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6801: aindrāgnaś ceti tena dvitīyadarśanaṃ tatra yujyate. evaṃ ṣoḍaśiny atirātre
GSP28msbh1-7u:6802: ca. prakṛtivikārabhāve tu pratyakṣaśrutair aindrāgnādibhir atideśena prāpta āgneyo bādhyeta. tatra dvitīyādidarśanaṃ nopapadyeta. bhavati ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6803: tasmāt sarvāvasthasya jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6805: *{3/631: E2 und 4 geben na in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6807: vikārās tu kāmasaṃyoge sa nityasya{*3/634*} samatvāt // MS_3,6.43 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6808: naitad asti, samānavidhānā iti. kiṃ tarhy ukthyādayaḥ saṃsthāvikārabhūtāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6809: syuḥ, agniṣṭomasaṃsthyamurīkṛtya{*3/635*} dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ. kutaḥ? ukthyādīnāṃ kāmasaṃyogena śravaṇāt. paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, ṣoḍaśinā vīryakāmaḥ stuvīta, atirātreṇa prajākāmaṃ yājayed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6810: kāmyo guṇaḥ śrūyamāṇo nityam arthaṃ vikṛtya niviśate. katham? guṇād evaṃjātīyake kāmye phalanirvṛttiḥ, paśukāma ukthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, na jyotiṣṭomakāma ukthyagrahaṇakāmo vā, yathā paśavo bhavanti, tathā gṛhṇīyād ity arthaḥ. katham iti. tatrāvaśyam itikartavyatāpekṣitavyā, saṃnidhānān nityasyetikartavyatayeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6811: kathaṃ punar yeyam itikartavyatā, sā nityasyety avadhāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6812: [385]{*3/636*} na punar asyaiva kāmyasya, sādhāraṇī veti. ucyate - yatra yatra guṇe kāmo bhavati, tatra tatra kriyāyāṃ sādhyamānāyāṃ nānyathā. sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6813: tatretikartavyatā, yāntikam upanipatati, sā sādhanasya vā sādhyasya veti saṃdihyamānā sādhyasya bhavitum arhati. nāsau sādhyasyābhavantī sādhanena
GSP28msbh1-7u:6814: saṃbadhyate, evaṃ hi sa itikartavyatāviśeṣaś codyate, anena
GSP28msbh1-7u:6815: sādhane{*3/637*} sādhakam upakuryād{*3/638*} iti. na cāsti sa prakāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6816: yenāsādhyamānāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tena sādhakaḥ kṛto bhavet. tasmāt sādhakasyāpītikartavyatāviśeṣam abhyupagacchatā, sādhyasyāpīty etad abhyupagamanīyam, sādhyaś ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ, sādhikāḥ saṃsthāḥ, tasmāj jyotiṣṭomasya tāvat setikartavyateti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6817: atha kasmān na sādhāraṇī? nityavad āmnānāt, yadaiva jyotiṣṭomaḥ, tadaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:6818: dīkṣā. yadā tu jyotiṣṭome paśukāmaḥ, tadokthyasaṃsthāḥ, sarvadā jyotiṣṭome dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ, ekadokthyasaṃsthāḥ, tatra sarvadā jyotiṣṭomasya dharmāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6819: kartavyāḥ, te cokthyādisaṃsthasyārtheneti pūrvam uttareṇa virudhyate, yadi sarvadā nokthyādīnām arthena. athokthyādīnām arthena na sarvadā, ubhayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6820: viprati-ṣiddham. tasmān na sādhāraṇī. nityavad āmnānaṃ ca yady anityasya syāt, nityavad āmnānaṃ tad anityaṃ kriyeta, tatra nityavad āmnānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6828: api vā dviruktatvāt prakṛter bhaviṣyantīti // MS_3,6.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6829: nanv agniṣṭomasaṃsthāpi kāmyā śrūyate. dve hi tatrāmnāte{*3/639*}, ekaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6830: nityavat, ekaṃ kāmyam, tatra dvayor vākyayoḥ sāmarthyān nitya eva sakāmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6831: bhaviṣyati. nityatāvidhāto [386]{*3/640*} nāstīty agniṣṭomasaṃsthasya jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīyādayo dharmā bhaviṣyantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6836: nānyatheti, vacanaṃ tad bhaviṣyati, na darśanam. aindrāgna ukthye dvitīyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6839: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāva iti. kutaḥ? pratiṣedhāt pūrvaliṅgānām - yady agniṣṭomo juhoti, yady ukthyaḥ paridhimanakti na juhotīti homābhāvadarśanaṃ na syāt. prāpte nimitte vacanaprāmāṇyāt sāmānavidhye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6841: atha yad uktam - vyapadeśa iti. ekasyaivādhikṛtasya yathoktena nyāyenāyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6842: anadhikṛtena guṇena vyapadeśaḥ. agniṣṭomagrahaṇaṃ cānuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6845: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra barhir barhir dharmāś ca, tathā vedir vedidharmāś ca. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ barhirādayo barhirādidharmāś ca pradhānasyotāṅgapradhānānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? prakaraṇaviśeṣād asaṃyuktaṃ pradhānasya, pradhānasya evaṃjātīyakā dharmāḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6846: prakaraṇaviśeṣāt, pradhānānāṃ hi prakaraṇaṃ nāṅgānām, prakaraṇena caiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ, tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:6848: sarveṣāṃ vāṅgapradhānānām ime dharmāḥ, nātra śeṣatvaṃ prakaraṇād bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6849: upakāralakṣaṇaṃ hi tat. yad yasyopakaroti, tat tasya śeṣabhūtam, sarveṣāṃ cāṅgapradhānānām ime dharmā upakurvanti. katham avagamyate? vākyāt, vedyāṃ havīṃṣy āsādayatīti havirmātraṃ vākyād gamyate, pradhānahavīṃṣi
GSP28msbh1-7u:6850: prakaraṇāt. vākyaṃ ca prakaraṇād balīyaḥ, tasmād barhiṣi havīṃṣy
GSP28msbh1-7u:6852: āha yadi prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhyate, loke 'pi barhiṣām ime dharmā uktā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6853: bhavanti. tatra ko doṣaḥ? sarvatra dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ prāpnuvanti. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6854: prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor upakārakā eveti gamyate. tasmāl laukikeṣu na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6856: evaṃ ced aṅgāny api na darśapūrṇamāsaśabadakāni, tasmāt teṣv api na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6857: prāpnuvanti. ucyate - yady apy aṅgāni na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6858: darśapūrṇamāsa[388]{*3/642*}śabdakāni, darśapūrṇamāsayor upakārakāṇi, eṣu kriyamāṇā dharmā darśapūrṇamāsayor upakariṣyanti. tasmād aṅgapradhāneṣu kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6861: piṇḍapitṛyajñe 'pi barhir dharmair yujyeta, so 'pi dāte barhiṣi vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6862: tasya cāpi barhiṣāsti prayojanam. tad apy ārāc chiṣṭadharmavat syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6863: na tad vākyaṃ hi tadarthatvāt // MS_3,7.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6864: na tasya barhir etair dharmair dharmavat, vākyaṃ hy ekaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6865: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ saha dharmāṇām, tena darśapūrṇamāsayor upakārakā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6866: dharmāḥ, yad darśapūrṇamāsārtham, tatra prāpnuvanti, nānyatra. tasmāt piṇḍapitṛyajñabarhiṣo na bhaviṣyanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6868: liṅgaṃ bhavati, evam āha - sa vai dhruvām evāgre 'bhidhārayati, tato hi prathamāvājyabhāgau yakṣyan bhavatīty abhidhāraṇasyājyabhāgārthatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6871: jyotiṣṭome keśaśmaśruṇor vapanaṃ payovratāni tapaś cāmnātāni. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārthāny uta pradhānārthāni? kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6873: [389]{*3/643*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - svāmiyuktam etat, tasmāt pradhānasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6874: kasmāt? phalasaṃyogāt, puruṣasya yogenāyaṃ saṃbandhaḥ, yāgo 'pūrvasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6875: dātā, puruṣaḥ pratigrahītā. nanv aparo 'py asti saṃbandhaḥ, yāgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6876: nirvartyaḥ, puruṣo 'bhinirvartaka iti. phalena tu saṃbandho bhaviṣyatīty evam arthaḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate. na hi yāgaṃ sa sādhayati, yāgaḥ sattayā saṃbhantsyata iti. kim iti tarhi nirvartayataḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti. saṃskārāś ca saṃskurvantīty ucyante. yat tasya saṃskartavyasya prayojanam, tatra sāmarthyaṃ janayantīti. phalaṃ ca grahītuṃ puruṣasya prayojanam, na yāgam abhinirvartayitum. tasmād ye puruṣasaṃskārās te puruṣaṃ phalapratigrahaṇasamarthaṃ kurvanti, na yāganirvṛttisamartham. āha, yadi yāganirvṛttau na sāmarthyaṃ janayanti, kathaṃ tarhi yāgadharmās te
GSP28msbh1-7u:6877: bhavanti. ucyate - yāgasya svārthaṃ sādhayataḥ sāhāyye vartante. kaś ca tasya svārthaḥ? yad asya kartā phalena saṃbadhyate. tasmāt svāmisaṃskārāḥ pradhānārthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6880: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - ṣaṭtriṃśatprakamā prācī caturviṃśatir agreṇa triṃśaj jaghaneneyati śakyāmaha iti{*3/644*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣā vedir
GSP28msbh1-7u:6881: aṅgapradhānārthā, uta pradhānārtheti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt pradhānārtheti. kā cikīrṣā? iyati śakṣyāmaha iti. yac cikīrṣitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6882: tasyārthenaiṣā śrūyate - śakṣyāmahe 'syāṃ kartum iti pradhānaṃ ca tasya cikīrṣitam, nāṅgāni. pradhānaṃ hi phalavan nāṅgāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6883: [390]{*3/645*} āha yady aṅgāni na cikīrṣitāni, kim arthaṃ kriyanta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6884: ucyate - acikīrṣitāny apy aṅgāni kriyante, yady api tāni na cikīrṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6885: tathāpi tair acikīrṣitair anyāc cikīrṣyate. tasmāt tāni kriyanta iti, yac
GSP28msbh1-7u:6886: cikīrṣitam, tasya vediḥ. tasmāt pradhānārtheti, sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam{*3/646*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6889: *{3/646: E1 gibt sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6891: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra śrūyate - caturhotrā paurṇamāsīm abhimṛśet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6892: pañcahotrā amāv āsyām iti{*3/647*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārtham abhimarśanam, uta pradhānārtham iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? pradhānārtham iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6893: pradhānanāmadheyaṃ caitat{*3/648*}, paurṇamāsy amāvāsyeti ca. tasmāt pradhānasyābhimarśanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6897: tad yukte tu phalaśrutis tasmāt sarvacikīrṣā syāt // MS_3,7.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6898: sthitād uttaram{*3/649*}. yad uktam - pradhānaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ nāṅgāni, tasmāt pradhānasya vedir iti. tan na, tad yukte phalaśrutiḥ, sāṅgāt phalaṃ śrūyate, tasmāt sāṅgaṃ cikīrṣitam. yady apy aṅgāni na
GSP28msbh1-7u:6899: cikī[391]{*3/650*}rṣitāni, tathāpi vedyāṃ kartavyāni. anyathā na sāṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6902: *{3/649: E1 gibt sthitād uttaram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6905: pradhānahaviṣām abhimarśanam iti. naitad evam, aṅgahaviṣām apy abhimaṛśanaṃ syāt. kutaḥ? guṇābhidhānāt, guṇo 'bhimarśanam ity abhidhānaṃ bhavati. katamat tadabhidhānam? yat guṇo 'bhimarśanam iti brūte.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6906: paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām iti ca dvitīyāntaṃ paurṇamāsyartham abhimarśanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6907: kartavyam, amāvāsyārtham abhimarśanaṃ kartavyam iti, ato yatra yatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:6908: kriyamāṇaṃ paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vopakaroti, tatra tatra kartavyam. yad yat paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vābhisaṃbadhyate, sāksāt, praṇāḍyā vā, tatra tatra kriyamāṇaṃ tayor upakaroti. tasmāt pradhānahaviṣām aṅgahaviṣāṃ ca kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6910: jyotiṣṭome dīkṣāḥ śrūyate - tisro dīkṣā iti, tathā dakṣiṇāḥ śrūyante -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6911: tasya dvādaśaśataṃ dakṣiṇā iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ dīkṣādakṣiṇam aṅgapradhānārtham, uta pradhānārtham iti. kiṃ prāptam? puruṣāṇām aṅgapradhānārthatvād dīkṣādakṣiṇasyāṅgapradhānārthateti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - dīkṣādakṣiṇaṃ pradhānasya. kutaḥ? vacanāt, vacanaṃ hi bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6912: dīkṣāḥ somasya, dakṣiṇāḥ somasyeti, na hi vacanasya [392]{*3/651*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6913: atibhāro nāma kvacit. tasmād dīkṣādakṣiṇaṃ vacanāt somasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6916: nivṛttiṃ dīkṣāṇāṃ darśayati. katham? adhvaryo yat paśunāyākṣīratha kāsya dīkṣeti yat ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ juhoti sāsya dīkṣeti, asatyām api dīkṣāyāṃ vacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6919: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3/652*}. tatra yūpaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - vajro vai yūpo yad antarvedi muniyāt tan nirdahet, yad barhirvedy anavaruddhaḥ syād ardham antarvedi minoty ardhaṃ bahirvedy anavaruddho bhavati, na nirdahatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6920: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim antarvedīti yūpāṅgabhāvena vedir upadiśyate, utārdham antarvedy ardhaṃ bahirvedīti deśalakṣaṇārtham ucyata iti. kathaṃ yūpāṅgabhāvena kathaṃ vā deśalakṣaṇeti. yadi yūpārdhasya vedyantarasya ca saṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ, evaṃ vedisaṃbaddho yūpaḥ kartavyaḥ, tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:6921: yūpāṅgabhāvena. atha yasmin deśe mīyamānasyārdhaṃ vedyabhyantare 'rdhaṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:6922: bahiḥ, sa deśa upadiśyate, tato deśalakṣaṇā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6923: kiṃ prāptam? tathā yūpasya vediḥ, yathā dīkṣādakṣiṇaṃ pradhānasya, tathā yūpasya vediḥ, tathā yūpo mātavyaḥ, tathā mīyamānasya [393]{*3/653*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6924: ardhaṃ vedyabhyantare bhavati. evaṃ vediśrutir apy anugrahīṣyate, itarathā vediśabdo lakṣayed deśam, śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6929: deśāmātraṃ vā vediśabdena lakṣyate na vediyūpāṅgam{*3/654*}. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6930: aśiṣyeṇaikavākyatvāt, ardham antarvedi minoty ardhaṃ bahirvedīty etenaikavākyatā yā, sā śāsitavyena, yadi deśalakṣaṇā, atha yūpāṅgabhāvena vedyā nirdeśaḥ, tato na śāsitavyo bahirvedinirdeśo{*3/655*} bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6933: atha bahirvedideśam api yūpāṅgabhāvenopadiśet. vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmād yūpāṅgabhāvena vedyā nirdeśe bahirvediśabdaḥ sarvathā na śāsitavyaḥ. yadi tu deśalakṣaṇā, tato viśiṣṭe deśe lakṣyamāṇe 'vaśyavaktavyo bahirvediśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6934: bhavati, anucyamāne vedyabhyantare yasmin kasmiṃś ca pradeśe yūpa iti gamyate. atha punar bahirvediśabde śrūyamāṇe, yatarasmin deśe mīyamānasyārdham antarvedy ardhaṃ bahirvedi, sa deśo lakṣayitum iṣṭo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6935: bhavati. sa ca bahirvediśabdena vinā na śakyate lakṣayitum ity, avaśyaṃ śāsitavyo bhavati. tasmād deśalakṣaṇeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6939: svāmidhenīs tad anvāhur iti havirdhānayor vacanāt sāmidhenīnām //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6940: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - uta yat sunvanti sāmidhenīs tad anvāhur
GSP28msbh1-7u:6941: [394]{*3/656*} iti, havirdhānayor yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti, tat sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbandhayed ity arthaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sāmīdhenīnām aṅgabhāvena havirdhānaṃ codyate, havirdhānaviśiṣṭāḥ sāmidhenyo 'nuvaktavyāḥ, uta havirdhānenāmūṣām anūcyamānānāṃ deśo lakṣyata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sāmidhenīnām aṅgatvena havirdhānaṃ codyate - yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti, tat sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbandhayed iti, tena havirdhānasaṃbaddhāḥ sāmidhenyo 'nuvaktavyā iti vacanāt sāmidhenyaṅgabhāve
GSP28msbh1-7u:6942: sati havirdhānaśrutir anugrahīṣyate. itarathā deśaṃ lakṣayed iti. tasmāt sāmidhenyaṅgaṃ havirdhānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6944: deśamātraṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ hy arthakarma somasya // MS_3,7.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6945: deśalakṣaṇārthaṃ vaitad ucyate - yasmin sunvanti, tasmin deśe sāmidhenyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6946: 'nuvaktavyā iti, pratyakṣaṃ hy arthakarma somasya tena kriyate. dakṣiṇe havirdhāne somam āsādayatīti{*3/657*}, somāsādanārthaṃ tāvad etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:6947: upādeyam. sāmidhenyo 'py agnisamindhanārtham upādeyā iti. iha tv etāvac
GSP28msbh1-7u:6948: chrūyate - yasya havirdhānasya samīpe sunvanti tatsaṃbaddhāḥ sāmidhenyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:6949: 'py{*3/658*} agnisamindhanārtham upādeyā{*3/659*} iti, tatra na jñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6950: kiṃ sāmidhenyaḥ saṃbaddhāḥ havirdhānasyopakurvanti? kiṃ havirdhānaṃ sāmidhenīnām iti. tad ucyate - sāmidhenyas tāvad dhavirdhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6951: nopakurvanti, na hi tāvad vidhīyante, sāmidhenyo 'nuvaktavyā iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6952: tarhi? havirdhānaviśeṣasaṃbandhas tāsāṃ vidhīyate, [395]{*3/660*} na cāvihitam aṅgaṃ bhavati. nāpy evaṃ vidhīyate, havirdhānamāsām anucyamānānām upādātavyaṃ saṃbandhayitum iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6955: havirdhānasya prāptaḥ, yo viśeṣārtham anūdyeta. kena tarhi havirdhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6956: saṃbandhaḥ? pratyakṣaṃ hy arthakarma somasya, na tu sāmidhenīkarma
GSP28msbh1-7u:6957: pratyakṣaṃ havirdhānasya. bhavati tu deśasya sāmidhenīsaṃbandhaḥ, apareṇa vedim iti hotur deśo lakṣitaḥ, sa uttarasya dakṣiṇasya vā havirdhānasya samāsannaḥ. tatra yat{*3/663*} sunvanti, tad anvāhur ity upapadyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:6959: athaivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kasmān na bhavati? yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6960: tasya havirdhānasya sāmidhenīsaṃbandha iti. naivaṃ śakyam, evaṃ dvāv arthau vidhātavyau bhavataḥ, havirdhānasaṃbandho havirdhānaviśeṣasaṃbandhaś ca. tatra vākyaṃ bhidyate. tasmān naivam abhisaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6964: *{3/659: E2 und 4 geben sāmidhenyo 'gnisamindhanārtham upādeyā in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:6969: samākhyānaṃ ca tadvad eva bhavati, yathāsmābhir nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:6971: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāt tasmāt svayaṃ prayoge syāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6972: iha karmāṇy udāharaṇam - agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6973: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6974: tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim etāni karmāṇi svayam [396]{*3/664*} anuṣṭhātavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6975: utātrotsargamātraṃ svayaṃ kuryāt, śeṣam anyaḥ svayaṃ vā, uta śeṣam anya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6976: eveti. kiṃ prāptam? svayaṃ prayoge syāt. kutaḥ? yataḥ svayaṃ prayuñjānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6977: phalaṃ bhavati. katham avagamyate? tallakṣaṇatvāt, śabdo 'syārthasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:6978: lakṣaṇam, svayaṃ prayuñjānasya phalaṃ bhavatīti. katamaḥ sa śabdaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6979: svargakāmo yajeteti, yaḥ svargaṃ kāmayate, sa evocyate, yāge kartā bhavan
GSP28msbh1-7u:6980: phalaṃ sādhayed iti. sāṅge ca kartā bhavan phalaṃ prāpnoti, tasmāt svayaṃ prayoge syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6982: utsarge tu pradhānatvāc cheṣakārī pradhānasya, tasmād anyaḥ svayaṃ vā syāt // MS_3,7.19
GSP28msbh1-7u:6983: utsarge prādhānyam asti. katham? ya utsargaṃ karoti tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6984: bhavati. katham? parikraya utsargaḥ, tenānantāḥ sarvaṃ kurvanti. tasmād yaḥ parikrayaṃ karoti tena svayam eva sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmād utsargamātraṃ svayaṃ kuryāt, śeṣam anyaḥ svayaṃ vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6985: anyo vā syāt parikrayāmnānād vipratiṣedhāt pratyagātmani // MS_3,7.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6986: śeṣasyānya eva syāt kartā. kutaḥ? parikrayasyāmnānatvāt. puruṣān atiprakāreṣu bahuṣu prāpteṣu parikrayo niyataḥ. tasmāt parikrayeṇānataiḥ sarve padārthāḥ kartavyā iti. vipratiṣeddhaś cātmani parikrayaḥ. yadi svayaṃ kuryāt, aparikrītena kṛtaṃ syāt, tatra parikrayāmnānānarthakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6987: adṛṣṭārtho vā pratijñāyeta. tasmād anyaiḥ parikrītaiḥ śeṣāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti. utsargaṃ tu svayaṃ kurvatā sarvaṃ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6990: tatra taiḥ parikrītaiḥ kartavyeṣv aniyamena kartṛparimāṇaṃ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6991: aviśeṣāt, na kartṛparimāṇe viśeṣaḥ kaścid āmnāyate. arthena tatparimāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6992: yāvādbhir asāv itikartavyatā nirvartate, tāvato vṛṇīta{*3/666*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6995: api vā śrutibhedāt pratināmadheyaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,7.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6996: yāvanti kartṛnāmadheyāni karmāṇi śrūyante - tāvanto varītavyā bhidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6997: tāni ca{*3/667*} nāmadheyaśravaṇāni. tān puro 'dhvaryur vibhajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6998: pratiprasthātā manthinaṃ juhoti, neṣṭā patnīm abhyudāyati{*3/668*}, unnetā camasān unnayatīti. tathā - prastotā prastauti, udgātodgāyati, pratihartā
GSP28msbh1-7u:6999: pratiharati, subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām āha, hotā prātaranuvākam anubrūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7000: maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati, cānucāha, acchāvāko yajati, grāvastotrīyām anvāha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7001: etāvadbhiḥ karmaṇi prayojanam, tena te 'vaśyam etāni yathāśrutāni kartuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7002: varītavyāḥ, etad vyatirikto 'nyaḥ padārtho na vidyate. yo 'pi vākyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7003: nopadiṣṭaḥ, sa samākhyayā gamyate. tasmād etāvato vṛṇīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7008: evaṃ cet pratijñāyate - etāvato vṛṇīteti. tan na, yo yas tatkarma
GSP28msbh1-7u:7009: kariṣyatīti saṃkalpate, sa sa tat tac chabdābhidheyo [398]{*3/669*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7010: bhavati, eko 'pi bahūn padārthān kartuṃ bahubhir nāmadheyair ucyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7014: naitad evam, utpattau puruṣāṇām, utpādyamāneṣu puruṣeṣu nāmadheyāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:7015: bhidyante - brāhmaṇaṃ{*3/670*} vṛṇīte, hotāram vṛṇīte, udgātāraṃ vṛṇīte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7016: adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīta ityevamādi. tasmāt karmaṇi tair evaṃ nāmakaiḥ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7017: avaśyante varītavyāḥ. tasmād eṣāṃ varaṇe saṃkīrtanaṃ na vidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7018: prayojanasyābhāvan nānuvādaḥ. na vede tāvanto varītavyā iti brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7019: anarthakam eva syāt. śaknoti cedaṃ pratyāyayituṃ saṃkhyāviśeṣam. tasmād yaḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣo eṣāṃ pratīyate tadartham etad vacanam. tasmāt ṣoḍaśa kartāro varītavyāḥ, somas{*3/671*} tāvat kartṛkaś ca syāt{*3/672*}. evaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7025: santi jyotiṣṭome camasādhvaryavaḥ - camasādhvaryūn vṛṇīteti. teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣām anyatamāḥ, utaitebhyo 'nya iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? etāvatāṃ saṃkīrtanād eṣām evānyatamāḥ. iti{*3/673*} prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7026: camasādhvaryavaś cāpare bhaveyus tebhyo 'nya iti. kutaḥ? tair vyapadeśāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7027: taiḥ parigaṇitair eṣāṃ vyapadeśo bhavati - madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7029: nanu ya eva prakṛtās te camasādhvaryavo bhaveyuḥ. neti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ? tair
GSP28msbh1-7u:7030: vyapadeśāt, madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasādhvaryavo [399]{*3/674*} hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryava iti, ṣaṣṭhī saṃbandhe sati bhavati. ṛtvigbhis te vyapadiśyante, ṛtvijas teṣāṃ svāmino na yajamānaḥ, yajamānapuruṣebhyaś caite 'nya iti naḥ pratijñātam. na yajamānena camasādhvaryavaṃ{*3/675*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7031: kartuṃ varītavyāḥ, ṛtvigbhis te varītavyā iti. api caiṣām utpattivākya eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:7034: *{3/673: E2: saṃkīrtanād eṣām evam anyatamā iti, E4: saṃkīrtanādeśām evānyatamā iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7037: teṣv va saṃdehaḥ - kim aniyamaḥ, eko dvau bahavo vā, uta bahava eveti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7038: aniyama iti prāpta ucyate - bahava iti. kutaḥ? utpattau bahuśruteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7039: camasādhvaryava ity eṣām utpattau bahuśrutir bhavati, tasmād bahava iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7041: jyotiṣṭome santi camasādhvaryavaḥ{*3/676*}, te ca bahava ity uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7042: kiyanto bahava iti saṃdehe trayaḥ, bahuvacanasāmarthyād iti prāpte brūmaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7043: - daśatvaṃ liṅgadarśanāt. te daśa bhaveyuḥ, tathā hi liṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7044: jyotiṣṭomavikāre daśapeye śrūyate - daśa camasādhvaryavo daśa daśaikaikaṃ camasam anusarpantīti, etasmāt kāraṇād daśapeyo bhavatīti bruvan daśa
GSP28msbh1-7u:7045: camasādhvaryūn darśayati, yadi trayo bhaveyuḥ, etaddarśanaṃ nopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7046: tasmāt trīn atītyaiṣā saṃkhyā, yadi ca daśa na bhaveyur nopapadyetaitaddarśanam. tasmād [400]{*3/677*} bhavanti daśa, daśa caiṣāṃ svāminaḥ. tasmāt prayojanabhāvād daśasaṃkhyopādīyate, tasyāṃ copādīyamānāyām aparāpi saṃkhyānugṛhyate, tenāpi daśa bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7050: asti śamitā - śamitāram upanayīteti. sa kiṃ saṃkīrtitānām anyatamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7051: utānyas tebhya iti. kiṃ prāptam? teṣāṃ varaṇe saṃkīrtanāt, teṣām
GSP28msbh1-7u:7052: anyatamaḥ, iti prāpte ucyate - śamitā ca śabdabhedāt, śabdo bhidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7053: evaṃsaṃjñakenedaṃ karma kartavyam iti, tasmād evaṃsaṃjñaka utpādayitavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7054: asya saṃkīrtanāt saṃkhyāv vṛddhir gamyate, tasmād anyaḥ śamitā syāt. api ca - klomā cordhaṃ{*3/678*} vaikartanaṃ ca śamituḥ tad brāhmaṇāya dadyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7055: yadbrāhmaṇaḥ syād ity{*3/679*} abrāhmaṇāśaṅkā bhavati, sā ṛtviji nopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7060: satyaṃ saṃkhyāvivṛddhir gamyate, na tūtpadyamāneṣu, yā tv anutpattis teṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7061: gamyate, tatraikasya karmabhedād ity evam apy avakalpate. yat tūktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7062: abrāhmaṇāśaṅkā bhavatīti, yajamānābhiprāyā sā, yady abrāhmaṇo yajamānaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7063: syād iti. nanu yady abrāhmaṇaḥ syād iti prakṛtaḥ śamitā saṃbadhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7064: ucyate - śamayatīti śamitā, yaugika eṣa śabdaḥ prakṛteṣv apy avakalpate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7065: śāmitram apy ādhvaryave samāmnānād adhvaryuṇā kartavyam. [401] tasmāc chamanād adhvaryuḥ śamitā. evaṃ sati aprakṛto yajamānaḥ saṃbandhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7067: jyotiṣṭome santy upagā nāma, te śabdabhedāt saṃkhyāvivṛddhiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7068: pratyāyayantīty adhvaryvādibhyo 'nya iti prāpte brūmaḥ - teṣām eva kecit
GSP28msbh1-7u:7069: syur iti. kasmāt? utpattau parigaṇanāt, yaugikakatvāc ca śabdasya. liṅgam idaṃ bhavati - nādhvaryur upagāyed iti, yady ebhyo 'nye bhaveyur nādhvaryuṃ pratiṣedhet. aprāptatvāt. yatas tu pratiṣedhati, ato
GSP28msbh1-7u:7072: asti somavikrayī, tatra saṃdehaḥ - sa kim adhvaryvādīnām anyatamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7073: utaibhyo 'nya iti. kiṃ prāptam? teṣāṃ saṃkīrtanāt, teṣām anyatama iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7074: prāpte brūmaḥ - vikrayī tv anyaḥ syād iti, vikrayo na codyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:7075: krayacodyate, tatrārthād vikrayaḥ, jyotiṣṭomasya ca padārthān kartum adhvaryvādaya utpādyante, na tu vikrayo jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyate. tasmān nādhvaryvādīnām anyatama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7078: ya ete puruṣā jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyante, te kiṃ sarva eta ṛtvijaḥ, uta kecid eṣām iti. kiṃ prāptam? sarve. kutaḥ? karmakāryāt, sarve yāgasya sādhanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7079: kurvanti, tasmāt sarva ṛtau yajanti. ye cartau yajanti ta ṛtvijaḥ, na kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyate, ima evartau yajantīty ṛtvijaḥ, ime neti. tasmāt sarveṣām ṛtviktvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7080: nanu parisaṃkhyā śrūyate - saumyasyādhvarasya yajñakratoḥ saptadaśa ṛtvija
GSP28msbh1-7u:7081: iti. ucyate - parisaṃkhyāyāṃ bahavo doṣāḥ santīti, avayutyavādo 'yaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7084: na vā sarve. kasmāt? parisaṃkhyānāt, evaṃ hi śrūyate, saumyasyādhvarasya yajñakratoḥ saptadaśa ṛtvija iti, sa eṣa na vidhiḥ, bahutarāṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7085: prāptatvāt, nānuvādaḥ, paryojanābhāvāt. na cet parisaṃkhyāpi, ānarthakyam eva syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7086: nanu parisaṃkhyāyāṃ svārthahānaṃ parārthakalpanā prāptabādhaś ca. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7087: svārthahānam adoṣaḥ prāptatvāt. parārthakalpanā ca pratyayāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7088: katham{*3/681*}? bahūnām ṛtviktve jñāte punaḥ saptadaśa ṛtvija ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7089: saptadaśabhir ṛtvikśabdasya saṃbandhaḥ punaḥ prakāśyate, adhikaiś ca na
GSP28msbh1-7u:7090: prakāśyate. tatra vijñāyata etat, ṛtvikśabdasya puruṣaiḥ saṃbandhe punaḥ prakāśyamāne saptadaśabhyo 'bhyadhikā varjitā iti gamyate. tatra kiṃ saptadaśabhiḥ saṃbandho [403]{*3/682*} vivakṣitaḥ, kiṃ vādhikānāṃ varjanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7091: iti, saptadaśasaṃbandhasyāprayojakatvād adhikānāṃ varjanaṃ vivakṣitam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7092: āha - nanu pratiṣidhyamāneṣv apy adhikeṣu pratiṣedho na prāpnoti, na hi ta
GSP28msbh1-7u:7093: ṛtau na yajanti, na vartau yajanto na ṛtvijaḥ syuḥ. ucyate - satyam, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7094: pratiṣedhād ṛtvikśabdena na saṃbadhyate{*3/683*}, kiṃ tu pratiṣedhasāmarthyād dhy ṛtvikkārye na bhavanti. kiṃ punar ṛtvikkāryam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7095: ṛtvija upavasantīti{*3/684*}, ṛtvijo vṛṇīte, ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7096: āha - yad ṛtvijāṃ kāryam, kathaṃ tat keṣāṃcid ṛtvikśabdakānāṃ na syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7097: ucyate - evaṃ tarhi dvividho 'yam ṛtvikśabdaḥ, ṛtuyajananimittaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7098: varaṇabharaṇanimittaś ca, tatra yāganimittasya grahaṇam anarthakam, tasmād varaṇabharaṇanimitto gṛhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7099: āha - nanv itaretarāśrayam evaṃ bhavati - ya ṛtvijas te varītavyāḥ, ye vriyante ta ṛtvija iti tad itaretarāśrayam. ucyate - na hy ṛtvijo vṛṇīta ity ayam arthaḥ, ṛtvijaḥ santo varītavyā iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7100: varaṇenartvijaḥ kriyanta iti, evaṃ dvitīyānirdeśo yukto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7101: adhvaryaṃ vṛṇīta ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ. dṛṣṭārthatā ca varaṇasya bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7102: katham ātmecchayādhvaryur bhavatīti cet kaścid brūyāt, bhavatīti brūyām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7103: katham? evaṃśabdakenāyaṃ padārthaḥ kartavya iti, nāsty evaṃśabdakaḥ. yaś ca nāsti, sa yadi śakyate kartum, kartavyo bhavati. yathā - juhvā juhotīty avidyamānā juhūḥ kriyate, evam etad api draṣṭavyam. tatrārthād aniyamenartvikśabdasaṃbandhe kartavye, evaṃ varaṇaviśeṣeṇa kṛtavya iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7104: niyamyate. tasmān netaretarāśrayam. tasmāt saptadaśaiva ṛtvijaḥ[404]{*3/685*} kartavyā iti parisaṃkhyā, saptadaśa ṛtvijaḥ saṃskāraiḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7110: evaṃ cen manyase - yathoktapakṣeṇaitad evam ucyate, avayutyavādapakṣeṇa saptadaśa ṛtvija iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7112: naitad evam, nātra sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ vacanam, yān adhikṛtyāvayutyavādo bhaviṣyati. yatra parā saṃkhyā kīrtyate, tatrāvayutyavādo bhavati, yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7113: dvādaśakapāle yad aṣṭākapālo bhavatīti, na ca, iha parā saṃkhyā kīrtyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7116: saptadaśa ṛtvija iti samadhigatam. katame te saptadaśa itīdaṃ cintyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7117: kiṃ prāptam? ajñānam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - niyamas tu dakṣiṇābhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7118: śrutisaṃyogāt, dakṣiṇāsaṃbandhena niyamyeran. evaṃ hy āmnāyate - ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadātīti, evam abhidhāya dakṣiṇādānakramapare vākye brahmādayaḥ śrūyante - agnīdhe 'gre dadātīti, tato brahmaṇe, tato 'muṣmai cāmuṣmai
GSP28msbh1-7u:7119: ceti{*3/686*} kecid eva viśiṣṭāḥ śrūyante - evaṃ ye śrūyante, te tāvad ṛtvijaḥ, tato 'bhyadhikā nānye bhavitum arhanti. dakṣiṇābhir niyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7122: uktvā ca yajamānatvaṃ teṣāṃ dīkṣāvidhānāt // MS_3,7.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7123: ya ṛtvijas te yajamānā ity evam abhidhāya brahmādīnāṃ dīkṣākramapare ca vākye dīkṣāṃ darśayati. katham? adhvaryur gṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7124: dīkṣayati, tat udgātāram, tato hotāram. tatas taṃ pratiprasthātā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7125: dīkṣayitvārdhino dīkṣayati, brāhmaṇāc chaṃsinaṃ brahmaṇaḥ, prastotāram
GSP28msbh1-7u:7126: udgātuḥ, maitrāvaruṇaṃ hotuḥ. tatas taṃ neṣṭā dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyino dīkṣayati, āgnīdhaṃ{*3/688*} brahmaṇaḥ, pratihartāram udgātuḥ, acchāvākaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7127: hotuḥ. tatas tam unnetā dīkṣayitvā pādino dīkṣayati, potāraṃ brahmaṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7128: subrahmaṇyam udgātuḥ, grāvastutaṃ hotuḥ. tatas tam anyo brāhmaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7129: dīkṣayati, brahmacārī vācāryapreṣita iti. dīkṣā ca yajamānasaṃskāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7134: etad uktam - saptadaśa ṛtvija iti, te ca brahmādayaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim eṣāṃ sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ, uta gṛhapatiḥ? kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sadasya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7135: sa hi karmakaraḥ, itaraḥ svāmī. yaś ca karmakaraḥ, sa parikretavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7136: ṛtvijaś ca parikrīyante, tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśa ṛtvig iti. api ca -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7137: tasya camasam āmananti varaṇaṃ ca. ṛtvigvarītavyo na svāmī. tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśa iti prāpte, ucyate - svāmisaptadaśāḥ karmasāmānyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7138: svāmy eṣāṃ saptadaśaḥ syāt. kutaḥ? karmasāmānyāt, yajñe kartāra ṛtvijo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7139: bhavanti, yajñe ca kartā gṛhapatiḥ, tasmād ṛtvik, [406]{*3/689*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7140: yajñakarmasāmānyāt. yad uktam - taṃ samāmananti, tasya camasam āmananti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7141: varaṇaṃ ca, tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśa iti. ucyate - brahmāṇam eva te
GSP28msbh1-7u:7142: samāmananti, varaṇam api camasaś ca brahmaṇa eva, sa hi sadasi bhavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7145: te svārthāḥ prayuktatvād agnayaś ca svakālatvāt // MS_3,7.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7146: svāmisaptadaśā jyotiṣṭomasyartvijaḥ samadhigatāḥ. atredānīm ayaṃ saṃdehaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7147: - kiṃ sarvaṃ puruṣakāryaṃ taiḥ kāryam, agnibhiś ca gārhapatyādibhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:7148: agnikāryam, uta kācid vyavastheti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? te sarvārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7149: prayuktatvād agnayaś ca svakālatvāt, te vṛtāḥ sarvasmai puruṣakāryāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7150: syuḥ, agnayaś cāgnikāryāya. kutaḥ? taiḥ kāryair ākāṅkṣitvāt, prati svaṃ grahaṇam eṣām anuvādaḥ, svakālatvād agnayaś ca sarvārthā iti, samadhigatam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7153: tatsaṃyogāt karmaṇo vyavasthā syāt, saṃyogasyārthavattvāt // MS_3,7.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7154: tatsaṃyogād viśiṣṭapuruṣasaṃyogāt, vyavatiṣṭheta, ye yena puruṣeṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:7155: samākhyāyante, te tena kartavyāḥ, evaṃ teṣāṃ puruṣasaṃyogo 'rthavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:7156: bhaviṣyati. ādhvaryavam adhvaryuṇā, hautraṃ hotrā, audgātram udgātreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7158: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ? sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ samākhyātapuruṣaiḥ kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7159: neti brūmaḥ, tasyopadeśād viśeṣasamākhyānāc ca nirdeśaḥ. yathopadeśaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7160: tasmān maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cāheti{*3/691*}. samākhyā - potrīyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7165: yatra hetuḥ prātaranuvākam anubruvata upaśṛṇuyād iti hotre{*3/692*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7166: prātaranuvāke samākhyayā prāptaṃ hotāraṃ darśayati. tathedam aparaṃ liṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7167: bhavati - udgītha udgātṝṇām ṛcaḥ praṇava ukthaśaṃsināṃ{*3/693*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7168: [408]{*3/694*} pratihāro{*3/695*} 'dhvaryūṇām iti, samākhyākṛtaṃ bhedaṃ darśayati. tathedam api liṅgaṃ bhavati - yo vādhvaryoḥ svaṃ veda svavāneva bhavati, etad vādhvaryoḥ svaṃ yad āśrāvayatīti{*3/696*} samākhyākṛtaṃ niyamaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7175: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*3/697*}. tatredaṃ samāmananti - tasmān maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cāheti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ sarvānuvacaneṣu sarvapraiṣeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7176: ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāt, uta yatrānuvacane praiṣa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7177: sarvānuvacaneṣu, aviśeṣāt. na hi kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyate - asminn anuvacane maitrāvaruṇo 'smin neti. tasmāt sarvānuvacaneṣu sarvapraiṣeṣu ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7181: puro 'nuvākyaṃ vā maitrāvaruṇo 'nubrūyāt. kutaḥ? yatra praiṣaś cānuvākyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7182: ca sahocyete, tatra maitrāvaruṇaḥ, yatra kevalānuvākyā na tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:7183: maitrāvaruṇaḥ, yatra vā kevalaḥ praiṣaḥ, tatrāpi na. yatrobhe samuccīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7184: tatra sa bhavet. tathā hi samuccitayos taṃ samāmananti, tasmān maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati cānu cāheti, caśabdāt samuccitayor iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7187: itaś ca paśyāmo na sarvānuvacaneṣu maitrāvaruṇa iti. kutaḥ? yataḥ prātaranuvāke hotāraṃ darśayati. katham? yatra hotuḥ prātaranuvākam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7188: anubruvata upaśṛṇuyāt, tadādhvayur gṛhṇīyād iti. tasmān na sarvānuvacaneṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7191: santi camasādhvaryavas teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ camasādhvaryavaś camasāñ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7192: juhuyur utādhvaryur iti. camasādhvaryava iti brūmaḥ. kasmāt? camaseṣv ādhvaryavaṃ te kurvantīti camasādhvaryavaḥ, tasmāt te juhuyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7194: adhvaryur vā juhuyāt, esa hi nyāyaḥ - yad ārdhvaryavapadārtham adhvaryuḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7195: kuryāt, ādhvaryavaś ca homaḥ, tasmād adhvaryur juhuyāt. nanu camasādhvaryava iti viśeṣasamākhyānāc camasādhvaryavo hoṣyantīti. nety
GSP28msbh1-7u:7196: ucyate, camaseṣv ete 'dhvaryuvad bhavantīti camasādhvaryavaḥ. yadi tair adhvaryur juhoti, tatas taiś camasādhvaryubhir api hotavyam. yadi camasādhvaryavo juhvati, nādhvaryuḥ. tadā te na tadvat syuś camasādhvaryavaḥ. tasmān na juhuyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7198: camase cānyaṃ camasādhvaryor darśayati. katham? yamasāṃś
GSP28msbh1-7u:7199: ca[410]{*3/699*}masādhvaryave prayacchati, tān sa vaṣaṭkartre harati, anyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7200: hutvā{*3/700*} camasādhvaryave prayacchatīti gamyate. katham? sa{*3/701*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7201: vaṣaṭkartre harati, bhakṣayitum iti gamyate. tasmād dhutasya camasādhvaryave pradānam, yo juhoti, sa prayacchati. tasmād anyo juhotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7202: api ca - yo vādhvaryoḥ svaṃ veda svavāneva bhavati, srugvādhvaryoḥ svaṃ vāyavyam asya svaṃ camaso 'sya svam iti. na tāvad asya camasaḥ svam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7203: yajamānasya hi saḥ. camaso 'sya svam iti bruvan, adhvaryoś camasena homaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7209: atha kathaṃ camasādhvaryava iti samākhyānam? ucyate - aśaktau te pratīyeran, yadā vyāpṛtatvāt, na śaknoty adhvaryur hotum, tadā samākhyāsām arthāt te hoṣyanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7210: vedopadeśāt pūrvavad vedānyatve yathopadeśaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,7.50 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7211: asty audgātre samākhyātaḥ śyenaḥ, ādhvaryave vājapeyaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7212: kiṃ śyena udgātṛbhir eva padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ, vājapeye 'dhvaryubhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7213: utobhayatra nānartvigbhir iti. kiṃ prāptam? vedopadeśāt, samākhyānād ity arthaḥ{*3/702*}, pūrvavat, yathā, ādhvaryavam iti samākhyānāt padārthān adhvaryuḥ karoti, evam eva vedānyatve yathopdeśaṃ syuḥ, yo yena samākhyāte
GSP28msbh1-7u:7214: veda upadiṣṭaḥ, tasya padārthās tenaiva kartavyāḥ. sāṅgaḥ sa tatropadiśyate. tasmāc chyena udgātṛbhir vājapeye cādhvaryubhiḥ padārthāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7217: *{3/702: E1 gibt samākhyānād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7218: tadgrahaṇād vā svadharmaḥ syād adhikārasāmarthyāt sahāṅgair avyaktaḥ śeṣe // MS_3,7.51
GSP28msbh1-7u:7219: tadgrahaṇāt, prākṛtadharmagrahaṇāt{*3/704*}, vā svadharmaḥ svair dharmaiś codakaprāptaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ{*3/705*} syāt, codakasāmarthyāt sahāṅgaiḥ kuryād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7220: iti śrūyate, tāni cāṅgāni jyotiṣṭome santy apekṣyante. tatra jyotiṣṭome nānarvijas tair asya sahaikavākyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7221: nanu pratyakṣā samākhyā, codaka ānumānikaḥ. ucyate - satyam, pratyakṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7222: samākhyā, laukikī tu sā. tatrānumāya vaidikaṃ śabdaṃ tenaikavākyatā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7225: yat tūktam - samākhyānād iti. tatrocyate - avyaktaḥ śeṣe samākhyāto
GSP28msbh1-7u:7226: bhaviṣyati. yaḥ padārtho na codakena prāpnoti, tatra samākhyayā niyamo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7227: bhaviṣyati. yathā śyene kaṇṭakair vitudantīty udgātāro vitotsyanti, vājapeye coṣapuṭair{*3/706*} arpayantīty{*3/707*} adhvaryavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7231: *{3/705: E1 gibt codakaprāptaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ in Klammer, E2,4: svair dharmaiś codakaprāptaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7236: anvāhāryam{*3/709*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim adhvaryuṇā parikretavyā ṛtvijaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7237: uta svāmineti. kiṃ prāptam? samākhyānād adhvaryuṇeti prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7238: svāmikarma parikrayaḥ. svayaṃ karotīti gamyate. kasmāt?{*3/710*} karmaṇas
GSP28msbh1-7u:7239: tadarthatvāt, phalakāmo hi yajamānaḥ, yaś ca phalakāmaḥ, tena svayaṃ kartavyam. sa yadi parikrīṇīte, tataḥ svayaṃ sarvaṃ karotīti gamyate. atha na parikrīṇīte na sarvaṃ kuryāt. tasmāt svāmī parikrīṇīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7244: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ? nety ucyate - vacanād itareṣāṃ syāt. yatra vacanaṃ bhavati, tatra vacanaprāmāṇyād bhavati parikrayaḥ. ya etām iṣṭakām
GSP28msbh1-7u:7245: upadadhyāt sa trīn varān dadyād iti{*3/711*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7248: saṃskārās tu puruṣasāmarthye yathāvedaṃ karmavad vyavatiṣṭheran //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7249: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - keśaśmaśrū vapate, dato dhāvate, nakhāni nikṛntate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7250: snātīti{*3/713*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim evaṃjātīyakā adhvaryuṇā kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7251: uta yajamāneneti. kiṃ prāptam? adhvaryuṇā kartavyāḥ, saṃskārā yathāvedaṃ vyavatiṣṭheran samākhyānāt puruṣeṇa karmavat, yathā - anye padārthā yasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:7252: veda āmnātāḥ, tatsamākhyātena puruṣeṇa kriyante, evam ete 'pīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7256: yajamānena vā kartavyāḥ. kutaḥ? puruṣapradhānatvāt. kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7257: puruṣaprādhānyam? kartrabhiprāyaṃ kriyāphalaṃ gamyate, tasmāt puruṣasya karmakaraṇasāmarthyam upajanayanti. na ca kaścid yena karmakaraṇena sāmarthyam upajanyate{*3/714*} tad arthaṃ puruṣān krīṇātīti, īpsitebhyaḥ padārthebhyaḥ krīṇāti, yena yasya sāmarthyaṃ bhavati, tat tenaiva kartavyam, karmavat, yathā - pradhānakarmaṇi puruṣārthāni yajamānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7260: *{3/714: E1 gibt yena karmakaraṇena sāmarthyam upajanyate in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7262: parasmaipadavyapadeśaś ca bhavati - tam abhyanakti, śareṣīkayānaktīti ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7265: yad uktam - samākhyānād yathāvedam iti, naitad evam, guṇatve
GSP28msbh1-7u:7266: [414]{*3/715*} tasya nirdeśaḥ, tatra vayaṃ samākhyāṃ niyāmikām icchāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7267: yatra karmaṇaḥ prādhānyam, yad arthaṃ kretavyāḥ puruṣāḥ prāptāḥ, tatra samākhyayā niyamaḥ. kalpyo hi saṃbandho vapanādibhiḥ, puruṣāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7268: adṛṣṭārthatvāt, kḷpta ārād upakārakaiḥ. na ca kḷpta upapadyamāne kalpyaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum. tasmān na puruṣaprādhānye samākhyā niyāmikā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7271: codanety apūrvaṃ brūmaḥ - apūrvaṃ prati saṃskārā vidhīyante. te hy asaṃbhavād dravyeṣu kalpyante, saṃnikṛṣṭadravyābhāve ca viprakṛṣṭeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7272: bhaveyuḥ, yadā tu saṃnikṛṣṭe dravye saṃbhavanti, tadā na viprakṛṣṭeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7275: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*3/716*}. atha kasmān na samānavidhānā bhavanti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7276: aviśeṣavidhānād dhi puruṣamātrasya prāpnuvanti. tad ucyate - naitat samānaṃ sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ vidhānam. kutaḥ? atulyatvāt, atulyā eta etadvidhānaṃ prati. kātulyatā? yat, yajamānasya vihitā nartvijām. kathaṃ yajamānasya vihitā ity agamyate? arthāt svayaṃ prayoge syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7277: nanv aviśeṣād ṛtvijām api vihitāḥ. prayojanābhāvād avihitā iti paśyāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7278: kathaṃ prayojanābhāvaḥ? ṛtvigbhiḥ kriyamāṇā na yajamānena kṛtā na kāritāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7279: atadarthatvāt parikrayasya. svayaṃkṛtāś ca nārthina upakurvanti. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7280: apryojanāḥ, ata ṛtvijām avihitāḥ, etad atulyatvam. tasmān na samānavidhānā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7283: *{3/716: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7285: tapaḥ śrūyate - dvy ahaṃ nāśnāti, try ahaṃ nāśnātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ārtvijaṃ tapaḥ, yājamānam iti. kiṃ prāptam? samākhyānād ārtvijaṃ tapa iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7286: prāptam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yājamānaṃ tapa iti. kutaḥ? phalasiddhitvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7287: phalasiddhyarthaṃ tapaḥ. tapaḥsiddhasya yāgaphalaṃ siddhyati. katham etad avagamyate? duḥkhaṃ hi tapaḥ, duḥkhaṃ cādharmaphalam, adharmo yāgaphalasya pratibandhako bhavati. aśreyaskaro hi saḥ, tasmin sati na śreyo bhavitum arhati, tasmāt so 'panetavyaḥ, phalabhogena ca virudhyete dharmādharmau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7288: tasmād duḥkhaphalabhogāya dharmaḥ{*3/718*} śrūyate. yat tena duḥkham
GSP28msbh1-7u:7289: utpādyaitavyam, idaṃ tad iti. evaṃ dṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavati, nādṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7290: kalpayitavyam, tena phalopabhogena kṣīṇo 'dharme 'pratibaddho yāgaḥ phalaṃ dāsyatīti, phalasiddhiś ca yajamānasya kartavyā nartvijām. tasmād yājamānaṃ tapa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7294: etam evārthaṃ vākyaśeṣo 'pi dyotayati - yadā vai puruṣe na kiṃcin āntarbhavati, yadāsya kṛṣṇaṃ cakṣuṣo naśyati, atha medhyatama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7295: yadānaśanam{*3/719*}, tadā medhārha iti. medhaś ca yajñaḥ, yajñaś ca tyāgaḥ, tyāgaṃ kartum arhas tapasā kriyata iti vākyaśeṣo bhavati, tyāgī ca yajamānaḥ. tasmād yājamānaṃ tapa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7299: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ? sarvaṃ tapo yājamānam iti. na{*3/720*}, [416]{*3/721*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7300: vacanād itareṣām, yatra vacanam, tatrartvijām, yathā - sarva ṛtvija upavasantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7303: guṇatvāc ca vedena na vyavasthā syāt // MS_3,8.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7304: atha yad uktam - samākhyānād artvijaṃ tapa iti, guṇatvān na samākhyayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7305: gṛhyate, yatra puruṣasya guṇabhāvaḥ, tatra samākhyā niyāmikā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7306: evaṃ vā śyene śrūyate - lohitoṣṇīṣā lohitavasanā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti.
