GSP28msbh1-7u:7307: tathā vājapeye śrūyate - hiraṇyamālina ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ śyena udgātṛbhir lohitoṣṇīṣatā kartavyā, vājapeye cādhvaryubhir hiraṇyamālitvam, utobhayam api sarvartvijām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? samākhyānāt śyena udgātṛbhir vājapeye 'dhvaryubhir iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇatvāc ca vedena na vyavasthā syāt, guṇo lohitoṣṇīṣatā hiraṇyamālitvaṃ ca, puruṣaḥ pradhānam, ato lohitam uṣṇīṣaṃ hiraṇyamālā ca puruṣaviśeṣaṇatvena śrūyate, na kartavyatayā, tasmāt puruṣaprādhānyam. kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:7308: ataḥ? yady evam, puruṣāṇāṃ pradhānabhāve samākhyā na niyāmikety etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:7310: api ca - guṇatvaśravaṇāt sarvapuruṣāṇām etad vidhānam iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7311: pradhānasaṃnidhau hi guṇaḥ śiṣyamānaḥ pratipradhānam upadiṣṭo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7312: tatra vacanena prāptaṃ kathaṃ samākhyayā vidyamānayāpi niyantuṃ śakyeta?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7313: tasmād ubhayatra sarvartvigbhir evaṃjātīyako dharmaḥ kriyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7316: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti - yadi kāmayeta varṣet parjanya iti nīcaiḥ sado minuyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ, atha yājamāna iti. kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:7317: evam? yadi kāmayetādhvaryur iti, uta yajamāna iti, evaṃ saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7318: prāptam? ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ, samākhyānāt. arthī prakṛto 'dhvaryuḥ, sa vākyena saṃbadhyate, minuyād iti. tasmād ārtvijaḥ kāma iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7320: tapaḥ, yājamānaḥ kāma ity arthaḥ{*3/723*}. kutaḥ? arthasaṃyogāt, arthena yāgasya sāṅgasya, yajamānaḥ phalena saṃbadhyata iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7321: upagrahaviśeṣāt, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetety upagrahaviśeṣāś ca minuyād ity adhvaryuḥ parārtham iti gamyate. atha yad uktam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7322: prakṛtenārthinā sahaikavākyatvād iti. ucyate, evam api prakṛtena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7323: vākyena{*3/724*} sahaikavākyatā, yajamāne kāmayamāne minuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7325: *{3/723: E1 gibt yājamānaḥ kāma ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7328: yatra bhavati vyapadeśaḥ, tatrārtvijaḥ kāmo bhavati, yathā - udgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate, tam āgāyatīti, yady ātmana iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7329: yajamānāyeti parikalpyeta, yajamānagrahaṇaṃ vāśabdaś ca na samarthitau syātām. tasmād yajamānavyapadeśād ātmānam evodgātā pratinirdiśatīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7332: ihaivaṃjātīyakā mantrā udāharaṇam, āyurdā agna āyur{*3/726*} me dehīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7333: varcodā agne 'si varco me dehīti{*3/727*}. eṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim ārtvijā uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:7334: yājamānā iti. samākhyānād ārtvijā iti prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7335: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - mantrāś caite tadvad bhaveyuḥ, yathā kāmaḥ, evam ātmābhidhāyipadaṃ yuktaṃ bhavati. āyur me varco ma iti, āyur varca ityevamādibhiḥ karmaphalam abhidhīyate, agne tvaṃ karmaphalaṃ me
GSP28msbh1-7u:7336: sādhayeti. tad iha karmaphalam utsāhārthaṃ saṃkīrtyate, yajamānaś ca tenotsahate, nānyaḥ. yad ṛtvijaḥ kramaphalam, na tad artho 'gniḥ, siddhaṃ hi tat. yad yajamānasya, tad artho 'gniḥ, tac cāsiddhaṃ sad āśāsitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7337: yad utsāhaṃ janayaty avaiguṇyāya. ṛtvig api siddhe yad utsahate, tad yajamānasyaiva karmaphalāyotsahate. tatrātmābhidhāyipadaṃ nāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7338: yajamāne cātmābhidhāyipadaṃ kalpyamānam agauṇaṃ bhavati, tasmād yājamānāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7343: viprayoge cāgnīnāṃ pravāsa upasthānam asti, iha eva san tatra santaṃ tvāgna iti. na ca proṣito 'gnibhya ṛtvig bhavati, karma kurvata eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:7344: vācakaḥ śabdaḥ. bhavati tu yajamāno 'gnibhyaḥ proṣito 'pi yajamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7345: saṃvidhāya so 'gnihotrāya pravasati, śakyate ca videśasthenāpi tyāgaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7346: kartum. sa eva proṣitasyopasthānaviśeṣaṃ bruvan yajamānasyopasthānaṃ darśayati, tenaivaivaṃjātīyakā yajamānasya bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7349: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra dvy āmnātā mantrā ādhvaryave kāṇḍe yājamāne ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7350: ājyaṃ yair gṛhyate, pañcānāṃ tvā vātānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīty{*3/729*}evamādayaḥ, tathā srugvyūhanamantrāḥ, srucau vyūhati vājasya mā prasaveneti{*3/730*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ ta ubhābhyām api kartavyā utādhvaryuṇaiveti. kiṃ prāptam? samākhyānād ādhvaryavā iti. iti prāpta ucyate{*3/731*} - ubhāv api tān prayuñjīyātām iti. kutaḥ? dvy
GSP28msbh1-7u:7351: āmnātasyārthavattvāt, dvābhyāṃ samākhyānād dvāv api kartārau gamyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7352: tasmād dvau brūyātām. adhvaryur etena prakāśitam anuṣṭhāsyāmīti, yajamāno na pramadiṣyāmīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7357: jñāte ca vācanaṃ na hy avidvān vihito 'sti // MS_3,8.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7358: vājapeye śrūyate - kḷptīr yajamānaṃ vācayaty ujjisatīr{*3/732*} yajamānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7359: vācayatīti{*3/733*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jñaś cājñaś ca sarvo vācayitavya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7360: uta jña eveti. kiṃ prāptam? aviśeṣāj jñaś cājñaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7361: iti{*3/734*} prāpte brūmaḥ - jña eveti. kutaḥ? na hy avidvān vihito 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7362: yo hy avidvān nāsāv adhikṛtaḥ sāmarthyābhāvāt. nanu prayogakāle śikṣitvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7364: vedādhyayanād uttarakāle prayogaḥ śrūyate, na prayogaśrutigṛhītaṃ vedādhyayanam. kutaḥ? anārabhyakarmaṇi vede{*3/736*} śrūyate - tasmāt svādhyayo 'dhyetavya iti. saty etasmin vacane, agnihotraṃ juhuyād ityevamādibhir vedo 'dhyetavya ity etad uktaṃ bhavatīti na śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:7365: kalpayitum. tatra homamātre codite vedādhyāyī śakta ity adhikriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7366: nāvidvān. kiyatā punar viditena vidvān adhikriyata iti. yāvatā viditena śakto bhavati, yathoktaṃ kratum abhinirvartayitum. tasmāt{*3/737*} tāvad yo veda sa tena kratunādhikriyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7367: nanu vedam adhīyīteti vacanāt kṛtsno vedo 'dhyetavya iti bhavati, na vedāvayavenādhīkriyata iti. ucyate - kratūnāṃ jñānārthaṃ vedādhyayanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7368: kāryam. tatrānyasmin kratau kartavye 'nyakratujñānaṃ na dṛṣṭāya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7370: kratvantaragranthaḥ, sarve kratavaḥ kathaṃ jñāyeran? pṛthak pṛthag iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7372: tenāsvapadārthajñasya karmaiva nāsti, kathama asau vācyeta. tasmāt sādhv abhidhīyate, jña eva vācayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7379: yājamāne samākhyānāt karmāṇi yājamānaṃ syuḥ // MS_3,8.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7380: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra karmāṇy{*3/738*} āmnātāni dvādaśa, vatsaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7381: copāvasṛjati, ukhāṃ cādhiśrayati, ava ca hanti, dṛṣadupale ca samāhanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7382: adhi ca vapate, kapālāni copadadhāti, [421]{*3/739*} puroḍāśaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7383: cādhiśrayate, ājyaṃ ca, stambayajuś ca harati, abhi ca gṛhṇāti, vedaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7384: patnīṃ ca{*3/740*} saṃnahyati, prokṣaṇīś cāsādayati, ājyaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7386: atra saṃdehaḥ - kim etāny adhvaryoḥ karmāṇi, uta yajamānasyeti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7387: prāptam? yajamāne samākhyānāt karmāṇi yājamānaṃ syuḥ. viśeṣasamākhyānād yājamānānīti gamyate, yathā potrīyaṃ neṣṭrīyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7394: adhvaryur vā tadartho hi nyāyapūrvaṃ samākhyānam // MS_3,8.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7395: adhvaryur vā kuryād etāni, tad artho hy adhvaryuḥ parikrīta iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7396: samākhyānād avagamyate. adhvaryava eva sarva ime padārthāḥ samāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7397: yājamāna eṣāṃ dvandvatocyate, dvandvatā ca samabhyāśakriyā{*3/744*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7399: ity etad aśakyam. tatrāṅgaguṇavirodhe ca, tādarthyād iti dvandvatāguṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7400: bādhitavyaḥ. tasmād ādhvaryavā ete padārthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7401: yad uktaṃ samākhyānād iti, tat parihartavyam, ucyate - nyāyapūrvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7402: samākhyānam, samākhyānād yajamānena dvandvatā saṃpādayitavyā, idaṃ cedaṃ ca saṃpādayeti yajamāno brūyāt. keṣucic cātra padārtheṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7403: yajamānasyānumantaraṇam, tannimittā samākhyā bhaviṣyati, apūrvaṃ tv apakṛṣyeta. tad uktam - yathā potrīyam, neṣṭrīyam iti, evam atrāpīti. tad ucyate - yuktaṃ tatra viśeṣa[422]{*3/746*}samākhyānāt. iha tu dvandvatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7404: yājamānīyā, padārthās tv ādhvaryavā eva. tasmād adoṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7408: vipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ, samavāyaviśeṣād itaram anyas teṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:7409: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agniṣomīyaḥ, tasya yūpasya parivyāṇe mantrau, ekaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7410: adhvaryoḥ parivīrasīti{*3/747*} karaṇaḥ, aparo hotur yuvā suvāsā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7411: iti{*3/748*} kriyamāṇānuvādī. tayoś codakaparamparayā kuṇḍapāyinām ayanaṃ prāptayor bhavati saṃdehaḥ - kaḥ punar asau? tatra ṛtviksamāsa āmnātaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7412: yo hotā so 'dhvaryur iti, kiṃ karaṇam ādhvaryavaṃ hotā kuryāt? kiṃ hautraṃ kriyamāṇānuvādinam iti. kiṃ prāptam? aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7413: iti prāpta uccyate - vipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ syāt, ādhvaryavaḥ parivīrasīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7414: na kriyamāṇānuvādī hotur yuvā suvāsā iti. kutaḥ? samavāyaviśeṣāt. dvau tatra samavāyau, hotuś codakena hautreṣu, pratyakṣaśravaṇenādhvaryaveṣu -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7415: yo hotā so 'dhvaryur iti. evaṃ pratyakṣam adhvaryoḥ kārye codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7416: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ. tasmād ādhvaryavaṃ karaṇaṃ parivīrasīti hotā kuryāt. atha hautraṃ viruddhaṃ kaḥ kuryāt? itaram anyaḥ, teṣāṃ yato viśeṣaḥ syāt, anyo hotṛpuruṣa eva syāt, yasyāvyāpṛtatā, prādhānyaviśeṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7422: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra praiṣāḥ samānātāḥ, prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmā barhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:7423: upasādhaya srucaś saṃmṛḍḍhi{*3/749*} patnīṃ saṃnahyājyenodehīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ ya eva praiṣe, sa eva praiṣārthe, utānyaś ca praiṣe, anyaś ca praiṣārtha iti. kiṃ prāptam? eka eva praiṣapraiṣārthayor iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7425: nanv ātmanaḥ praiṣo vipratiṣidhyate. ucyate, na praiṣo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7426: prāptakāle loṭaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ. āha, prāptakāle 'pi sati yuṣmadādiṣv evopapadeṣu madhyamādayo vyavasthitāḥ, na puruṣasaṃskaro bhavati. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7427: satyāṃ vivakṣāyāṃ yuṣmadādiṣu madhyamādayaḥ, yadā tava prāptaḥ kāla iti vivakṣyate, tadā yuṣmad eva madhyamo nāsmadi śeṣe vā. yadā khalu kriyāyāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7428: prāptaḥ kāla ity etāvad vivakṣyate, na tava, mama veti, na tadā yuṣmadādīnām anurodhena madhyamādayo bhavitum arhanti. na ca, idaṃ yugapad vivakṣituṃ śakyate, padārthasya prāptaḥ kālaḥ, tava ceti, bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tena, yadi vā nirjñāte padārthakāle tava kāla iti śakyate vaditum, yadi vā taveti nirjñāte padārthasya kāla iti. tatra padārthasya kālo vaditavyaḥ, na tu yauṣmadarthasya, tena hi smṛtena prayojanam, sa hi kartavya ity avagataḥ, na tu yuṣmadarthaḥ tathā, tasmāt samākhyāyād adhvaryor eva praiṣapraiṣārthāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7429: iti{*3/750*} prāpte brūmaḥ - praiṣeṣv anyo 'nyas tadartheṣv iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7430: parādhikārāt, parasmin hi praiṣa upapadyate, nātmanīti. āha, nanūktaṃ prāptakāle bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, [424]{*3/751*} na, saṃbhavati praiṣa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7431: prāptakālatā nyāyyā. tasya hi yuṣmadartho{*3/752*} gamyamāno na vivakṣita
GSP28msbh1-7u:7432: ity ucyate, saṃbhavati cātra praiṣārthaḥ. tasmāt praiṣaḥ, praiṣaś cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7435: *{3/749: E2,4: sruvaṃ ca srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7439: athaivaṃ gate, idaṃ saṃdihyate - kim adhvaryur agnīdhraṃ preṣyet, utāgnīd adhvaryum iti. aniyamo 'viśeṣād iti prāpte brūmaḥ - adhvaryur uktapraiṣārthakārī syāt. kutaḥ? darśanāt, darśanaṃ bhavati - tiryañ ca sphyaṃ dhārayed yad anvañcaṃ dhārayed vajro vai sphyo vajreṇādhvaryuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7440: kṣiṇvīteti{*3/753*}, yaḥ preṣyati, tasya haste sphyaḥ. sphyenādhvaryuṃ kṣiṇvītety anyam adhvaryuṃ preṣakād darśayati. tasmād agnīd adhvaryuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7445: naitad asti, agnīdhraḥ praiṣo 'dhvaryoḥ praiṣārtha iti. kiṃ khalv adhvaryur evāgnīdhaṃ preṣyet, evam adhvaryuṇā praiṣaḥ praiṣārthaś cobhāv api kṛtau bhaviṣyataḥ, tatrādhvaryavam iti samākhyānugrahīṣyate. tasmād adhvaryur eva mukhyaṃ{*3/754*} syāt. kim asya mukhyatvam? yad anena sarvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7446: kartavyaṃ samākhyānād iti. atha yad uktam - adhvaryuḥ pracaritā dṛśyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:7447: iti. tad ucyate - satyaṃ dṛśyate, na tv asya praiṣārthakaraṇe pramāṇam asti cintyamānam. tasmād etan mithyādarśanam, yasya hi darśanasya pramāṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7448: nāsti, vyāmohaḥ saḥ. yathā śuktikāyāṃ rajatavijñānam. asti tv agnīdhraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7449: praiṣārthakaraṇe pramāṇam. tasmād agnīdhraḥ pracaritā pracaritari
GSP28msbh1-7u:7450: [425]{*3/755*} cādhvaryuśabdo dṛśyate. tasmād gauṇaḥ, ādhvaryave vede samāmnātān{*3/756*} padārthān karotīti kṛtvādhvaryur ity ucyate, āgnīdhra
GSP28msbh1-7u:7451: iti. tasmād ādhvaryavaḥ praiṣaḥ, āgnīdhraḥ praiṣārtha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7456: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmananti - mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astv iti pūrvam agniṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7457: parigṛhṇātīti{*3/757*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ṛtvikphalam āśāsitavyam, agne varco vihaveṣv astv iti, uta yajamānasyeti. kiṃ prāptam? adhvaryor eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7458: kutaḥ? evaṃ śrutir ādṛtā bhavisyati, itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt, ātmanā yajamānaṃ lakṣayet. tasmād ṛtvikphalam āśāsitavyam iti. ko 'rthaḥ? anayā samidhā dhāryamāṇe 'gnau yāgaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati. tatra vihaveṣu spardhāsthāneṣv ahaṃ varcasvī bhaviṣyāmīty adhvaryor vacanam, evam utsāhī bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7462: yajamānasya vā vacanaṃ tadarthatvāt karmaṇaḥ, yajamānārthaṃ hīdaṃ karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:7463: sāṅgam, upagrahaviśeṣāt, sāṅgasyāsya prayojanaṃ yajamānasya phalaniṣpattir nādhvaryoḥ supravaritur{*3/758*} api yaśaḥ. kim ataḥ? yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7465: agnyanvādhānaṃ yajamānasya phalasaṃkīrtane kriyamāṇe 'nena mantreṇa phalasaṃbandhāt prakāśitaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati, nādhvaryuyaśaḥkīrtanena. tasmād yajamānaphalam āśāsitavyam iti. atha kasmān na yājamāna eṣa mantro
GSP28msbh1-7u:7466: bhavatīti. ucyate - agnyanvādhānaṃ samākhyayādhvaryavam. tac caivaṃ guṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7467: mantraḥ karoty ādhvaryavaḥ, sa ucyate 'nena mantreṇeti, tasmād ādhvaryavo mantraḥ. mama varco 'stv atyapi yajamānasya varco mameti vyapadiśati lakṣaṇayā, yathā rājani jayaṃ vartamānaṃ sainikā asmākam iti vyapadiśanty evam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7471: liṅgam apy amum arthaṃ darśayati, evaṃ hy āha - yāṃ vai kāṃcana ṛtvija āśiṣam āśāsate, yajamānasyaiva sety āśiṣo yajamānārthakatāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7472: tasmād api brūmaḥ - yajamānaphalam āśāsitavyam iti. pakṣoktam eva prayojanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7473: karmārthaṃ tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ svāminaṃ pratyarthavattvāt // MS_3,8.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7474: idaṃ samadhigatam - karaṇeṣu mantreṣu svāminaḥ phalam āśāsitavyam iti. kim eṣa evotsargaḥ? nety āha, kvacid ṛtvijāṃ api phalam āśāsitavyam iti, yatra karmārthaṃ phalam, yathā - [427]{*3/760*} agnāviṣṇū māvakramiṣam{*3/761*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7475: vijihāthāṃ māmā saṃtāptam iti{*3/762*}, asaṃtapto 'dhvaryuḥ karma śaknoti kartum, karmasiddhir yajamānasyopakāriketi, ṛtvikphalam āśāsitavyam atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7480: yatra ca vyapadeśo bhavati, tatrārtvijam, dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyādhas tāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:7481: catvāra uparavāḥ prāveśamukhyāḥ{*3/763*} pradeśāntarālāḥ, tatra hastau praveśyādhvaryur yajamānam āha, kim atreti, sa āha - bhadram iti. tan nau sahety adhvaryuḥ pratyāheti vyapadeśo bhavati, adhvaryor yajamānasya ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7482: tan nau sahety ubhayor vacanam adhvaryuyajamānayoḥ. tasmād adhvaryuphalam āśāsitavyam atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7486: darśapūrṇamāsayor barhirdharmā vedidharmāś ca, teṣu saṃdehaḥ - kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:7487: aṅgapradhānārthāḥ, uta pradhānārthā iti. prakaraṇāt pradhānārthā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7489: yathā vyākhyātam{*3/765*} evottaravivakṣayā prāptir eṣā kriyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7494: jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ, yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata
GSP28msbh1-7u:7495: iti{*3/767*}. tatra śrūyate - barhiṣā yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇāty ājyena yūpam anaktīti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ tayor ājyabarhiṣor ājyabarhirdharmāḥ prākṛtāḥ kartavyāḥ, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? kartavyā iti. kutaḥ? vākyaṃ hi barhirmātrasyājyamātrasya ca dharmāṇāṃ vidhāyakam, tad ihāpi vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7496: codakena prāptam. na caitad barhir ājyaṃ niṣprayojanam. tasmād atra dharmāḥ kiyerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7497: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nirdeśād vikṛtāv apūrvasyānadhikāraḥ, nirdiṣṭā ete dharmāḥ prakṛtau, yatra pradhānasyopakurvanti prākṛtakāryayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:7498: ājyabarhiṣoḥ. ye ca pradhānasyopakāriṇo dharmāḥ, ta ihātidiśyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7499: pradhānaṃ hi codako 'pekṣate, na dharmān. pradhānasya hi codakena sāmānyaṃ na dharmāṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7500: api ca, nānyārtha iti jñātena saṃnihitenāpy ekavākyatā bhavaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:7501: anyasaṃbandhopapattau satyām, yathā bhāryā rājñaḥ, puruṣo devadattasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7502: kim aṅga punar viprakṛtena, nirjñātaṃ khalv aṅgatvaṃ pradhānāpekṣāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7503: bhavati, kevalam ihātideśaḥ kriyate, padārthāpekṣāyām aṅgatvam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:7504: sādhayitavyaṃ syāt. dharmāś cāpekṣyamāṇāḥ sādhāraṇā bhaveyuḥ, tathoho
GSP28msbh1-7u:7505: nāvakalpeta. liṅgaviśeṣadarśanāc ca vyavatiṣṭheran dharmāḥ, tatra darśanaṃ nopapadyeta, vapayā prātaḥsavane caranti, puroḍāśena mādhyaṃdina iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7506: tathā na pitā vardhate, na mātā, na nābhiḥ, prāṇo hi sa iti. tasmād yad dvārā prakṛtau kṛtāḥ, tad dvāraiva vikṛtau, nānyadvārāḥ. na ca yūpāvaṭas
GSP28msbh1-7u:7507: taraṇaṃ prakṛtāv asti yūpāñjanaṃ [429]{*3/768*} vā. tasmān na tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:7511: virodhe ca śrutiviśeṣād avyaktaḥ śeṣe // MS_3,8.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7513: pavitre karoti, tathā - aratnimātre vidhṛtī pavitre, utānyata iti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ vedistaraṇārthād barhiṣo vidhṛtī pavitre, utānyata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? vedistaraṇārthād barhiṣaḥ kārye. kiṃ kāraṇam? tad dhi prakṛtam, dharmāś cāviśeṣāt sarvabarhiṣām arthena, tasmāt tataḥ. iti prāpte brūmaḥ - anyataḥ kriyeta. kutaḥ? virodhāt. kathaṃ virodhaḥ? śrūyate hi - tridhā tu pañcadhā tu vā vedīṃ stṛṇātīti, tad yenāstīryate, kathaṃ tad vidhṛtipavitraṃ kriyeta, na hi saṃbhavaty ekaṃ staraṇāya vidhṛtipavitrāya ca. tad etad upadiṣṭavacanam anekaguṇatvaṃ cobhe apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:7514: asaṃbhavinī pratijñāte syātām. tasmān na tataḥ kriyeteti. yadi na tataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7515: kutas tarhi? avyakta evaṃjātīyakaḥ śeṣe, asti tatra paribhojanīyaṃ nāma
GSP28msbh1-7u:7518: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - puroḍāśaśakalam aindravāyavasya pātre nidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7519: dhānā āśvinapātre, payasyāṃ maitrāvaruṇapātra iti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim anyata eṣāṃ kriyeta, uta prakṛtebhya [430]{*3/769*} iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7520: pūrveṇa nyāyenānyata iti. tatrocyate - tata ekadeśasyāpanayaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7521: vidyamānasaṃyogāt, vidyate hi tatra puroḍāśo dhānāḥ payasyā ca, tatsaṃyoga eva nyāyyo nānyasaṃyoga iti, puroḍāśādīnāṃ eva saṃskāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7524: evaṃ prakṛtānugraho bhaviṣyati, tasmāt prakṛtasyopadeśena tat kriyeta. na cātropadiṣṭopadeśa āśaṅkyo 'nekaguṇabhāvaś ca, anyena śakalena homo 'nyaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:7531: idam āmananti - yajñārthavaṇaṃ vai kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ, tā upāṃśu kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7532: atra saṃśayaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārtham upāṃśutvam, uta pradhānārtham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7533: kiṃ prāptam? vikṛtau sarvārthaḥ śeṣaḥ syāt, aviśeṣād aṅgānāṃ pradhānānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7534: ca prakṛtivat, yathā prakṛtau vedidharmā ājyadharmāś cāṅgapradhānārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7537: pradhānārtho vā eṣa vikṛtiṣu syāt. evam idaṃ sarvārtham ucyeta, prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyenāṅga-pradhānārtham iti, tad evedānīṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣitam -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7538: kāmyā iṣṭaya iti. kāmyāś ca pradhānayāgāḥ, aṅgayāgāḥ pradhānārthāḥ, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7539: aṅgacoditam. yat kāmena phalavac codyate, tad evānayopāṃśutvetikartavyatayā [431]{*3/773*} anubadhyate. tasmāt pradhānārtham upāṃśutvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7542: śyene śrūyate - dṛtanavanītam{*3/774*} ājyam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ navanītaṃ pradhānasya, utāṅgānām iti. kiṃ prāptam? pradhānasya, tasya hi prakaraṇam iti vacanaprāmāṇyān navanītena pradhānaṃ nirvartayitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7543: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - asaṃbhava etasmiṃs tadaṅgānāṃ śyenāṅgānāṃ{*3/775*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7544: syāt. kathaṃ asaṃbhavaḥ? somadravyakatvāt pradhānasya. nanu vacanān navanītaṃ bhaviṣyati. na śyene navanītaṃ bhavatīty eṣa vākyārthaḥ. kas
GSP28msbh1-7u:7545: tarhi? śyene navanītam ājyaṃ bhavatīti navanītājyasaṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7547: śyenāṅgānāṃ tu vidyate. yasyāsti, tasyānūdya navanītaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7553: evaṃ ced dṛśyate - śyenāṅgānāṃ navanītam iti, ādhāne 'pi pavamāneṣṭiṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:7554: syāt. tā api hi śyenasyopakurvanti, tatsaṃskṛte 'gnau śyeno nirvartata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7556: na śyenasya prakaraṇe pavamāneṣṭayo 'gnyādhānaṃ vā śrūyate. kim ataḥ? yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:7557: evam, ādhānasya ca śyenasya ca na kaścid asti [432]{*3/776*} saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7558: agnīnām ādhānam, agnayaś ca śyenasya, tasmān na pavamānahaviḥṣu navanītam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7559: naitac chyenāṅgatve nimittam, yad ādhānam agnīnām upakaroti. yadi prakaraṇādīnām anyatamad{*3/777*} asti, tan nimittaṃ bhavet. tasmān na śyenāgnyādhānayoḥ saṃbandho 'stīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7563: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ navanītam uta sarveṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7564: iti. sutyākālānāṃ syāt, liṅgadarśanāt. idaṃ śrūyate - saha paśūn ālabhata
GSP28msbh1-7u:7565: iti. tatra punar vacanam - agnīṣomīyasya sthāne 'gnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7566: anubandhyāyāḥ sthāne maitrāvaruṇīyasyeti{*3/778*}, dve sthāne śrūnye{*3/779*} darśayati, tenāvagamyate śyenasya vacanaṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ viśeṣaṃ vidadhātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7571: sarveṣām eva cāṅgānāṃ navanītaṃ syāt. kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, asati viśeṣe sarveṣām apy aṅgānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:7573: yad uktaṃ liṅgam, tat pariharaṇīyam. nāsti tāvat pramāṇam, yac chyenasya vacanaṃ tat stutyākālānām{*3/780*} aṅgānām iti. kiṃ tu darśanam? tad apramāṇamūlatvān mithyādarśanaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāvat. kathaṃ tu madhye paśūnām ālambha iti. nyāyāt. ko nyāyaḥ? kramānugrahaḥ. evaṃ vacanavarjitaḥ kramo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7580: śākyānām ayanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsaram. tatredaṃ samāmananti - saṃsthite saṃsthite 'hāni gṛhapatir mṛgayāṃ yāti, sa tatra yān mṛgān hanti, teṣāṃ tarasāḥ puruḍāśāḥ savanīyā bhavantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ savanīyānām anyeṣāṃ ca saṃbhavatāṃ puroḍāśānāṃ sthāne tarasā uta savanīyānām eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7581: kiṃ prāptam? sarvapuroḍāśānāṃ māṃsamayatā syāt, na śakyate puroḍāśānāṃ ca māṃsamayatā vidhātum, savanīyaśabdena ca puroḍāśān viśeṣayitum, bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmāt sarvapuroḍāśānāṃ māṃsamayateti. iti{*3/783*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7582: prāpte ucyate - māṃsaṃ tu savanīyānāṃ syāt, tarasāḥ savanīyā bhavantīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:7583: ayaṃ tv anūdyate. kuta etat? sarvapuroḍāśeṣu savanīyaśabdo 'nuvādo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:7584: ghaṭate, puroḍāśaśabdas tu savanīyeṣv avakalpate. tasmāt puroḍāśaśabdo 'nuvāda iti. tasmāt savanīyānāṃ dhānādīnāṃ sthāne māṃsaṃ codanāśeṣād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7588: iti cet paśyasi - savanīyeṣu puroḍāśaśabdo 'nuvādo bhaviṣyatīti, dhānādiṣu puroḍāśaśabdo na vartate, bhaktiś cānyāyyā mukhye saṃbhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7591: prakṛtau jyotiṣṭome dhānādiṣv ayaṃ puroḍāśaśabdo bhāktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7592: saṃnihite{*3/785*} prayuktaḥ, ihāpi bhākta eva prayokṣyate. atrāpi hi savanīyaśabdena te saṃnihitāḥ. prakṛtau liṅgasamavāyāc chabdapravṛttir
GSP28msbh1-7u:7593: vikṛtāv api tathaiva, yathā - chatriṇo gacchanti, dhvajino gacchantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7594: yathā - ukthyo vairūpasāmā, ekaviṃśaḥ poḍaśī vairājasāmā iti prakṛtiliṅgena sāmaśabdena vairūpapṛṣṭho vairājapṛṣṭha iti gamyate. evam ihāpi savanīyānāṃ māṃsamayateti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7600: tṛtīye 'dhyāye śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānaiḥ śeṣaviniyogalakṣaṇam uktam. ihedānīṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthau jijñāsyete, kaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7604: puruṣārthaḥ. phalavidhiḥ puruṣārthaḥ, arthavādaḥ kratvarthaḥ. prayojakaḥ kaścit puruṣārtho 'prayojakaḥ kratvarthaḥ. tasmāt kratvarthapuruṣārthayor jijñāseti sūtritam. tatrāthātaḥ śabdau prathama evādhyāye prathamasūtre varṇitau. atheti prakṛtaṃ{*4/2*} śeṣaviniyogalakṣaṇam apekṣate. ata iti kratvarthapuruṣārthajijñāsāviśeṣaṃ prakurute. kratave yaḥ sa kratvarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7605: puruṣāya yaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. jijñāsāśabdo 'pi tatraiva samadhigataḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7606: jñātum icchā jijñāseti. tad etat pratijñāsūtram, kratvarthapuruṣārthayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:7610: yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇāvibhaktavāt // MS_4,1.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7611: atha{*4/3*} kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ kratvarthaḥ, kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ puruṣārtha iti lakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7612: [436]{*4/4*} vācyam, tathā hi laghīyasī pratipattiḥ, pṛṣṭākoṭenopadeśe
GSP28msbh1-7u:7613: garīyasī. tad ucyate - yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya, yasmin kṛte padārthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:7614: puruṣasya prītir bhavati{*4/5*} sa puruṣārthaḥ padārthaḥ. kutaḥ? tasya lipsārthena ca bhavati{*4/6*}, na śāstreṇa, kratvartho hi śāstrād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7615: avagamyate, nānyathā. avibhakto hi puruṣārthaḥ prītyā. yo yaḥ prītisādhanaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. puruṣārthe lakṣite tadviparītaḥ kratvartha iti kratvarthasya lakṣaṇaṃ siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7616: evaṃ vā sūtraṃ varṇyate - darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - anatidṛśyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7617: stṛṇāti, anatidṛśyam evainaṃ prajayā paśubhiḥ karotīti{*4/7*}, tathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7618: āhāryapurīṣāṃ paśukāmasya vediṃ kuryāt, vatsajānuṃ paśukāmasya vedaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7619: kuryāt, godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed ityevamādīni. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim evaṃjātīyakāḥ kratvarthā uta puruṣārthā iti. kiṃ prāptam? kratvartha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7620: kutaḥ? pratyakṣa upakāras tebhyo dṛśyate kratoḥ, purīṣaharaṇaṃ vedistaraṇaṃ ca, tad uktam - dravyaguṇasaṃskāreṣu bādarir{*4/8*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7621: iti{*4/9*}. tasmāt kratvarthā ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7622: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya sa puruṣārtha eveti, prītis tebhyo nirvartate, tasmād ete puruṣārthā iti. nanu pratyakṣa upakāraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7623: krator dṛśyata ity uktam. ucyate - satyaṃ dṛśyate, na tu krator
GSP28msbh1-7u:7624: upakārāyaibhyaḥ{*4/10*} saṃkīrti tebhyaḥ, phalebhya ete śrūyante. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7625: ya upakaroti sa śeṣaḥ. yas tu yadarthaḥ śrūyate, sa tasya śeṣa ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:7627: evaṃ vā, dravyārjanam udāharaṇam. iha dravyārjanaṃ tais tair niyamaiḥ [437]{*4/13*} śrūyate, brāhmaṇasya pratigrahādinā, rājanyasya jayādinā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7628: vaiśyasya kṛṣyādinā. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvartho dravyaparigraha uta puruṣārtha iti. kiṃ prāptam? kratvartho niyamāt. yady eṣa puruṣārthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7629: syāt, niyamo 'narthako bhavet. pratyakṣeṇaitad avagamyate, niyamād aniyamāc cārjitaṃ dravyaṃ puruṣaṃ prīṇayatīti. tasmāt kratvarthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7630: kāmaśrutibhiś cāsya sahaikavākyatā dṛṣṭā. itarathā, anumeyena phalavākyena sahaikavākyatāṃ yāyāt. liṅgaṃ cāpi bhavati - agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7631: aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet, yasyāhitāgneḥ sato 'gnir gṛhān dahet{*4/14*}, yasya hiraṇyaṃ naśyed āgneyādīni nirvaped{*4/15*} ityevamādi. tad dhi dravyopaghāte codyate, yadi dravyaparigrahaḥ karmārthaḥ, tata etad api
GSP28msbh1-7u:7632: sati saṃbandhe karmārtham ity ucyate, itararthāsati saṃbandhe karmārtham
GSP28msbh1-7u:7633: ity anumīyate, phalaṃ cāsya kalpyeta. tasmād yajatiśrutigṛhītaṃ dravyārjanaṃ yena vinā yogo na nirvartate, sa yāgasya śrutyā parigṛhīta iti gamyate. tasmāt kratvartha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7634: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣārtha iti. etasmin kṛte padārthe prītiḥ puruṣasya bhavati, tasmād asya lipsārthalakṣaṇā śarīradhāraṇārthā, yasya śarīraṃ dhriyate, vyaktaṃ tasyāsti dravyam. śarīriṇaś ca yāgaḥ śrūyate, tasmād vidyamānadravyasya viniyoga ucyate. na dravyārjanaṃ śrutigṛhītam{*4/16*}, vināpi hi dravyārjanavacanatvena śabdasya, yāgo nirvartata eva, tasmāt puruṣārtho dravyaparigrahaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7635: api ca, yadi śāstrāt karmārthaṃ dravyārjanam, tan nānyatra viniyujyeta
GSP28msbh1-7u:7636: tathārjitam, tatra sarvatantraparilopaḥ syāt. api ca, upakrāntāni sarvakarmāṇi dravyārjanena bhaveyuḥ, tatraitan nopapadyate. api vā eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:7637: suvargāl{*4/17*} lokācchidyate, yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī [438]{*4/18*} sann amāvāsyāṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vātipātayed{*4/19*} iti. evaṃ ca sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7638: prayogakālād vahir{*4/20*} etad aṅgaṃ sad anupakārakaṃ syāt. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7639: ādhānavad bhavitum arhati, tatra hi vacanam - vasante 'gnim ādadhīteti, na caitad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7640: atha yad uktam - niyamavacanam anarthakam, puruṣārthe dravyaparigrahe satīti. ucyate, naitāvatā puruṣārthatā vyāvartate. pratyakṣā hi sā, tvayā ca parokṣaṃ yuktibuddhyā vyapadiśyate, na ca, parokṣaṃ pratyakṣasya bādhakaṃ bhavati. tasmān niyamavacanāt kāmam aparam adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta, na tu dṛṣṭahānam. tasmād yat puruṣasya prayojanaṃ prītiḥ, tad arthaṃ dhanasyārjanam ity evaṃ ca sati, vrīhiṇā yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ, prītyartham arjitena vā kratvartham arjitena vā, nātra kaścid viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7641: prītyartham upārjito 'pi vrīhiḥ, vrīhir eva, karmārtham upārjito 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7642: vrīhiḥ, vrīhir eva. tasmān{*4/21*} na prayogacodanāgṛhītaṃ dravyārjanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7643: atha yad uktam, anumeyenāprakṛtena vā śabdena yuṣmatpakṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:7644: niyamasyaikavākyatā, asmatpakṣe tu dṛṣṭena prayogavacaneneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7645: asmatpakṣe 'pi dṛṣṭena bhujinā, na phalavacanena. kathaṃ tarhi? niyamād adṛṣṭaṃ bhavatīti gamyate. yathaiva bhavadīye pakṣe. āha, asmatpakṣe phalavata ekavākyabhāvāt{*4/22*} phalavata upakarotīti gamyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7646: asmatpakṣe 'pi phalavata evaikavākyabhāvaḥ{*4/23*}, etāvāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7647: tava śrutaṃ phalam, mama tu dṛṣṭam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7648: atha yal liṅgam uktam - gṛhadāhādiṣu karma śrūyata iti. tatrocyate, yady api na kratvarthaṃ dravyārjanam, tathāpi dāhe nimitte phalāya vā karmāṅgabhāvāya vā jāmavatyādīnāṃ{*4/24*} vidhānam upapadyata eva. tasmāt puruṣārthaṃ dravyārjanam, prītyā hi tadavibhaktam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7651: *{4/5: E1 hat yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya, yasmin kṛte padārthe puruṣasya pratītir bhavati in
GSP28msbh1-7u:7652: *{4/6: E2: tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇā. tasya lipsārthenaiva bhavati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7665: *{4/21: E2: eva, karmārtham upārjito 'pi vrīhivrīhir eva, tasmān}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7669: tadutsarge karmāṇi puruṣārthāya, śāstrasyānatiśaṅkyatvān na ca dravyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7671: iha prajāpativratāny udāharaṇam - nodyantam ādityam īkṣeta nāstaṃyantam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7672: ityādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvarthāni prajāpativratāny uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:7673: puruṣārthānīti. kiṃ prāptam? kratvarthānīti. kutaḥ? evaṃ hi, phalaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. nanu śrūyata evaiteṣāṃ phalam, etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti. ucyate - naitat phalaparaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7674: vartamānāpadeśa evaiṣa śabda iti. tena yatrāditya īkṣitavyaḥ prāptaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7675: tatrāyaṃ pratiṣedha udyato 'staṃyataś ca niyamo vā syāt kaścit karmāṅgabhūtaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7676: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tad utsarge prītyutsargo 'pi{*4/27*}, karmāṇi puruṣārthāya bhaveyuḥ, evaṃjātīyakāni. kartur etāny upadiśyante, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:7677: karmaṇaḥ. arthaprāptena kartrā saṃbandho yaḥ, sa vidhitsitaḥ, na karmasaṃbandho 'vidyamāna eva. śāstraṃ cānatiśaṅkyaṃ pitṛmātṛvacanād api
GSP28msbh1-7u:7678: pramāṇataram, svayaṃ hi tena pratyeti, indriyasthānīyaṃ hi tat. na caivam ādibhir dravyasya kaścid dṛṣṭa upakāraḥ sādhyate. tasmāt tena puruṣārthenābhisaṃyogāt kriyāyām evaṃjātīyakāyāṃ puruṣaḥ śrūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7679: api ca, puruṣaprayatnaḥ padārthavidhimātraṃ lakṣayitum uccāryeta, svayam avivakṣitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7680: atha yad uktam - yatrādityasyekṣaṇaṃ prāptam, tatrodyato 'staṃyataś ca partiṣedha iti, satyaṃ pratiṣedho nyāyyaḥ, tathā śrutir anugahyeta{*4/28*}, [440]{*4/29*} itarathā niyamo lakṣyeteti. kiṃ tv iha
GSP28msbh1-7u:7681: niyamaḥ śabdena śrūyate, tasya vratam iti, tena niyama eṣaḥ, nodyann āditya īkṣitavya iti. api ca, etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7682: puruṣasaṃbaddho doṣaḥ kīrtyate, na karmasaṃbaddhaḥ. tasmāt puruṣārthāni prajāpativratānīti. golakṣaṇāny apy evam eva kartarīkarṇyaḥ kartavyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7688: aviśeṣāt tu śāstrasya yathāśrutiphalāni syuḥ // MS_4,1.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7689: ucyate - yady evam, imāny api puruṣārthāni syuḥ - samidho yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7690: tanūnapātaṃ yajati{*4/30*}, nānṛtaṃ vaded{*4/31*} ityevamādīni. atrāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7691: puruṣaprayatnasaṃkīrtanam, atrāpi na dravyaṃ cikīrṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7695: api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe tadartham arthasyānabhisaṃbandhāt // MS_4,1.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7696: api vā naitad{*4/32*} asti, samidādīny api puruṣārthāni prāpnuvantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7697: kāraṇāgrahaṇe puruṣārthāni prajāpativratāni bhaveyuḥ. na tatra śrutyādikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7698: kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ gṛhyate, yena karmaṇām aṅgabhūtānīti gamyate, tasmāt tāni puruṣārthāni. arthasya karmaṇo{*4/33*} nābhisaṃbandhaḥ prajāpativrataiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7699: iha tu samidādīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ gṛhyate, yena karmārthānīti vijñāyante{*4/34*}. tasmād viṣama upanyāsaḥ, puruṣaprayatnaś caivaṃ saty
GSP28msbh1-7u:7706: loke 'pi, niṣpannakāryādiṣu prayojanavatsu yad asaṃyuktaṃ phalena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7707: tat tadaṅgaṃ vijñāyata iti manyamānā upavāsaṃ japaṃ vā [441]{*4/35*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7708: upadiśyaiva kṛtino manyante, na brutave, idam asya prayojanavato 'ṅgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7709: iti, tathā cāpare 'pi manyamānā na duruktaṃ manyante. tasmāt samidādīni karmāṅgāni, na prajāpativratānīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7712: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatrāmnāyate - sphyaś ca kapālāni cāgnihotrahavaṇī ca śūrpaṃ ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca śamyā colūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ ca dṛṣac copalā caitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhānīti{*4/36*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ. kim etāni dravyāṇi pradātavyāni, uta svena svenārthena saṃbandhanīyāni? tad etat siddhyartham idaṃ cintanīyam, kim eṣa vidhir utānuvāda iti. vidhau sati pradānam anuvāde sati yathārthasaṃbandhaḥ. kiṃ prāptam? vidhir iti, tathā hi pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ, itarathā vādamātram anarthakam. pradāne caiṣāṃ yajñāyudhaśabdo 'nugṛhītaḥ, yajñasyāyudhāni, yajñasya sādhanānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7713: itarathoddhananādīnām āyudhāni bhaveyuḥ śravaṇena, lakṣaṇayā yajñasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7714: saṃkhyā caivam avakalpate, yāgenaikena saṃbandhāt, itarathā nānārthasaṃbandhād daśeti saṃkhyā nāvakalpate. tasmāt pradīyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7715: aviśeṣeṇa vihitaṃ prakaraṇena pradhānasya bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7718: svena tv arthena saṃbandho dravyāṇāṃ pṛthagarthatvāt, tasmād yathāśruti syuḥ // MS_4,1.8
GSP28msbh1-7u:7719: na caitad asti vidhiḥ, pradeyānīti, anuvādaḥ, prāpta[442]{*4/37*}tvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7721: agnihotrahavanyāṃ{*4/41*} nirvapati, śūrpeṇa vivinakti, kṛṣājinam ulūkhalasyādhastād avastṛṇāti, śamyāyāṃ dṛṣadam upadadhāti, prokṣitābhyām ulūkhalamusalābhyām avahanti, prokṣitābhyāṃ dṛṣadupalābhyāṃ pinaṣṭīty evaṃ svena svena vākyenoddhananādiṣu prāpnuvanti, prāptānāṃ vacanam anuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7722: prakaraṇam api vākyena bādhyate, yajñāyudhaśabdaś cānuvādapakṣe nyāyyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7723: na vidhipakṣe, gauṇo hi sa āyudhaśabdaḥ sphyādiṣu, saṃkhyāpi pāṭhābhiprāyā bhaviṣyati, vispaṣṭaṃ caitad uddhananādibhiḥ sphyādīni prayuktānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7724: bhavati hi tatra vidhiḥ - sphyenoddhantītyevamādiḥ, na tu yajñāyudhāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:7725: kartavyānīti. tasmād uddhananādiṣu vākyena prāptānām anuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7732: arthakarmasu codyante puroḍāśādīni, tāny api vikalperan. tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ, na samuccayaḥ. puroḍāśādīnāṃ nirapekṣāṇāṃ yajisaṃbadhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7733: sphyādīnāṃ ca. evaṃ vā codyante cārthakarmasu, codyante, paridhānīye karmaṇi - āhitāgnim agnibhir dahanti yajñapātraiś ceti. yadi pradīyeraṃs tatra na bhaveyuḥ, tasmād api na pradātavyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7735: liṅgadarśanena ca - caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante, trayodaśām āvāsyāyām iti. tasmād apy anuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7738: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśuṃ ālabhata iti{*4/43*}. tathā, anaḍvāhau yunaktīti, tathā, aśvamedhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7739: vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhata iti{*4/44*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7740: vivakṣitam, ekatvaṃ dvitvaṃ bahutvaṃ ca, utāvivakṣitam iti. tatraikatvam ayajñāṅgabhūtaṃ na vivakṣitam ity arthaḥ, arthasya guṇabhūtatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7741: nālambhasya guṇabhūtā saṃkhyā niyojanasya vā. kasya tarhi? paśor anaḍuhoḥ kapiñjalānāṃ ca. vibhaktir hi śrutyā prātipadikārthagataṃ saṃkhyārthaṃ brūte, vākyena sā yajñāṅgaṃ brūyāt, vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasī. tasmān na yajñāṅgaṃ vivakṣitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7742: āha, mā bhūd yajñāṅgam, paśvadīnām aṅgaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tathāpīti. ucyate, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7743: paśvādīnām aṅgenoktenānuktena vā kiṃcit prayojanam asti, yajñāṅgena hy avipannena prayojanam. vipanne 'pi hi paśvādyaṅge 'viguṇa eva kratur bhavati, yajñāc ca phalaṃ na paśvādeḥ. tasmāt paśvāder guṇenājñātena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7744: jñātena vā na kiṃcit prayojanam astīti, na tad vivakṣitam, yad dhi prayojanavat tad vivakṣitam ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7749: bhavati ca kiṃcid vacanam, yena vijñāyate na tad vivakṣitam iti, yadi somam apahareyur ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād iti{*4/45*}. yadi vivakṣitaṃ bhavet, naikām iti brūyāt, gām ity ekavacanasya vivakṣitatvāt. tathā, avī
GSP28msbh1-7u:7750: dve, dhenū dva ity{*4/46*} atrāpi dva iti vacanaṃ jñāpakam, avivakṣitam avīti dvitvam [444]{*4/47*} iti. trīn lalāmān ity{*4/48*} atrāpi trīn iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7751: vacanaṃ liṅgam, lalāmān iti bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7757: evaṃ cet paśyasi - avivakṣitā saṃkhyeti, tan na, pratīyate hi saṃkhyākhyātavacanasyāṅgabhūtā, yathā paśum ānayety ukte, eka evānīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7758: paśū iti, dvau. paśūn iti bahava ānīyante, yaś ca pratīyate sa śabdārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7759: tasmād yajñasyāṅgabhūtā saṃkhyeti śabdād gamyate, na ca śabdād gamyamānam ṛte kāraṇāt, avivakṣitaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7761: naitad evam, satyaṃ pratīyate, na tv ayaṃ śabdārtho vyāmohādoṣā pratītiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7762: kuta etat? vākyād dhi yajñāṅgam ity avagamyate, vākyaṃ ca śrutyā bādhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7763: tasmād aśabdārtho 'yaṃ yajña ekatvād iti. śabdārtho 'pi hi pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7764: yathā, pūrvo dhāvatīti. sa pūrva ity ucyate, yasyāparo 'sti, tena pūrva ity ukte, aparo gamyate. na tv aparo dhāvatīti śravaṇāt pratīyate. evam ihāpi paśum ity ekatvaṃ gamyate, na tu yajñe. yathaiva hi pūrvam ity ukte 'paro gamyata eva kevalaṃ, na tu sa vidhīyate kasmiṃścid arthe. evam ihāpi saṃkhyā pratīyate eva kevalam, na tu kartavyatayā yajñe vidhīyate na
GSP28msbh1-7u:7766: kathaṃ na paśau vidhīyata iti cet. vidhāyakasyābhāvāt. ākhyātaśabdo vidhāyako bhaviṣyatīty etad api nopapadyate, dravyadevatāsaṃbandhasya sa vidhāyakaḥ sann ālabhata iti na saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyasaṃbandhaṃ vidhātum
GSP28msbh1-7u:7767: arhatīti. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmād avivakṣitā saṃkhyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7769: śabdavat tūpalabhyate tadāgame hi tad dṛśyate tasya jñānaṃ yathānyeṣām //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7770: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti, na yajñe saṃkhyā śabdena śrūyata iti, ākhyātavācye hy artha upalabhyate, loke paśum ānayety
GSP28msbh1-7u:7771: ekavacane sati ekatvapaśuviśiṣṭam ānayanaṃ pratīyate, paśv ānayeti dvitvaviśiṣṭaṃ gamyate, tatra hy ekatvam apaiti, dvitvam upajāyate. yasya cāgame yad upajāyate, sa tasyārtha iti gamyate. tasya jñānaṃ, yathānyeṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7772: śabdānām, aśvam ānayety ukte 'śvānayanaṃ pratīyate, gām ānayeti gavānayanam, tatrāśvo 'paiti gauś copajāyate, tena jñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7774: yad uktam - śrutyā vākyārtho bādhyata iti, ucyate, na śrutir brūte -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7775: vākyārtho nāstīti, kevalaṃ tu prātipadikārthagatāṃ saṃkhyām āha, nādṛśī saṃkhyā vākyena yajñe vidhīyate, prātipadikārtho hy ākhyātavācyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7776: saṃbadhyate, vibhaktyartho 'pi. tathā hi, tadviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa ālambho gamyate, tatraikārthatvād ekavākyam avakalpate. paśau hi saṃkhyāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7777: vidhīyamānāyām eka ākhyātaśabdo na śaknuyāt, ākhyātārthaṃ vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7778: saṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyasaṃbandhaṃ ca. tasmād yajñe vivakṣitā saṃkhyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7780: kim iti. karṇā yāmyāḥ, avaliptā raudrāḥ, nabhorūpāḥ pārjanyāḥ, teṣām aindrāgno daśama iti{*4/50*}. yadi tritvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tadaindrāgno daśamo bhavati. tathā kṛṣṇā bhaumāḥ, dhūmrā āntarikṣāḥ, vṛhanto{*4/51*} divyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7781: śavalā{*4/52*} vaidyutāḥ, siddhās tārakā iti{*4/53*} prakṛtya āha -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7782: ardhamāsānāṃ vaitad rūpaṃ yat pañca[446]{*4/54*}daśina iti{*4/55*}. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ, vivakṣitā saṃkhyeti. yat tūktam - ekāṃ gām ity avivakṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7783: darśayatīti. atrocyate, gosaṃkhyāsaṃbandhaṃ vidhātum, etad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7784: itarathā hi, godakṣiṇāsaṃbandho vihito gamyeta. tasmād vivakṣite 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7785: vācyam etat. avī dve dhenū dve trīn lalāmān iti cānuvādāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7793: evaṃ ca kṛtvā samānaśrutikaṃ liṅgam api vivakṣitaṃ bhaviṣyati, tatra idaṃ darśanam upapadyate, vasante prātar āgneyīṃ kṛṣṇagrīvām ālabhate, grīṣme mādhyaṃdine siṃhīm aindrīṃ śarady aparāhṇe śvetāṃ bārhaspatyām iti{*4/56*}. tatra śrūyate - garbhiṇyo bhavtīti{*4/57*}, garbhaḥ strīṇāṃ guṇaḥ, tena striyo darśayatīti bhaviṣyati. tathā aśva ṛṣabho vṛṣṇir
GSP28msbh1-7u:7794: vastaḥ{*4/58*} puruṣa iti te prājāpatyā iti{*4/59*}. tatra śrūyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7795: muṣkarā{*4/60*} bhavanti sendriyatvāyeti{*4/61*}. muṣkaratvaṃ puṃsāṃ guṇaḥ, tena puṃprāptiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7796: adhikaraṇāntaraṃ vā, tathā ca liṅgam iti, saṃkhyādhikaraṇaṃ liṅgādhikaraṇe 'tidṛśyate{*4/62*}. liṅgam avivakṣitam, śrutyā vākyasya bādhitatvāt, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:7797: ca, vivakṣitam iva śruyata iti, bhavati liṅgam. strī gauḥ somakrayaṇīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7798: strīvacanāt somakrayaṇīty avivakṣitam eva liṅgaṃ pratīyate. nanu kathaṃ mṛgīm ānayeti na mṛga ānīyate? naivam, aśābdaṃ tu tat, pūrvo dhāvatīti yathā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7799: liṅgaṃ vivakṣitaṃ vā{*4/63*} vākyārthasya śrutyāpratiṣiddhatvāt. tathā ca liṅgam, garbhiṇyo bhavantīti, tathā ca muṣkarā bhavanti [447]{*4/64*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7800: yad uktam - strī gauḥ somakrayaṇīti, tatra strīty avivakṣitam, tathā prajāpataye puruṣān hastina ālabhata iti puruṣagrahaṇam avivakṣitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7801: vispaṣṭo hi nyāya ukto liṅgavivakṣāyām. tasmād vivakṣitaṃ liṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7812: atrāśrayiṇaḥ padārthā udāharaṇam uttamaḥ prayājaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ sviṣṭakṛd ity ete yāgā udāharaṇam{*4/65*}. eṣu saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yajimātraṃ saṃskāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:7813: devatāyāḥ, uta yajinādṛṣṭaṃ devatāyāṃ kriyata iti. kiṃ prāptam? āśrayiṣv aviśeṣeṇa bhāvo 'rthaḥ pratīyata{*4/66*} ity{*4/67*} āśrayiṣv evaṃjātīyakeṣv apūrvasya bhāvo 'rthaḥ pratyetavyo 'viśeṣād anyair
GSP28msbh1-7u:7814: ākhyātaśabdaiḥ, yajati dadāti juhotīti, uktam etad bhūtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7817: *{4/65: E1 hat uttamaḥ prayājaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ sviṣṭakṛd ity ete yāgā udāharaṇam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:7820: codanāyāṃ tv anārambho vibhaktatvān na hy anyena vidhīyate // MS_4,1.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7821: asyāṃ tu codanāyām anārambho 'pūrvasya, vibhakto 'yam ākhyātaśabdaḥ, yo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7822: dṛṣṭārthaḥ, tato nāpūrvam, yaḥ khalv adṛṣṭārthaḥ, tato 'pūrvam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7823: dṛṣṭārthaś cāyam. asmin hi yāge kriyamāṇe devatā [448]{*4/68*} smaryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7824: sviṣṭakṛty api dravyaṃ pratipādyate. na cānyena śabdenātrāpūrvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7827: syād vā dravyacikīrṣāyāṃ bhāvo 'rthe ca guṇabhūtatāśrayād dhi guṇībhāvaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7828: syād vāpūrvamataḥ satyām api devatācikīrṣāyām, tasmin devatāsaṃskārārthe guṇabhūtatā yāgasya, dravyapratipādanena ca, mantreṇa tatra devatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7829: smaryate. tasmin mantreṇa dṛṣṭe 'rthe kriyamāṇe tyāgo 'paro 'dṛṣṭārthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7830: śrūyate, tasya na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam asti, devatāśrayāt tu devatāgataṃ tad apūrvam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7832: atikrāntas tṛtīyaviṣayaḥ, ataḥ prabhṛti dravyāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ cārthe prayojane{*4/69*} samavaiṣamyaṃ vakṣyate. kvacit sāmyam, kvacid vaiṣamyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7833: āmikṣāvājinayor vaiṣamyam, krayapāṃsūnāṃ vaiṣamyam, daṇḍasya maitrāvaruṇadhāraṇe yajamānadhāraṇe ca sāmyam, evaṃ tatra tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:7838: cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve śrūyate - tapte payasi dadhy ānayati, sā vaiśvadevy āmikṣā vācibhyo{*4/71*} vājinam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ tapte payasi dadhyānayanam āmikṣā prayojayati, na vājinam, utobhayam iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7839: prāptam? ubhayam iti. kutaḥ? yasmin kṛte, yan niṣpadyate prayojanavat, tat tasya prayojakam iti gamyate, dadhyānayane ca kṛta ubhayaṃ niṣpadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7840: āmikṣāpi, tata eva yājinam api{*4/72*} tatrānyatarārthaṃ kriyeta, yadi vinigamanāyāṃ hetur bhavet. agamyamāne viśeṣa ubhayārtham ānayanam iti gamyate. tasmād ekāsāv ubhābhyām api prayojitā niṣpattir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7844: saṃsargarasaniṣpatter āmikṣā vā pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,1.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7845: naitad asti, ubhayaṃ prayojakam iti, āmikṣā prayoktrī. kutaḥ? nātra yad dadhipayobhyaḥ nirvartyate, tad dhaviḥ. yadi tad dhaviḥ syāt, ubhayaṃ tābhyām eva niṣpadyata iti gamyata{*4/73*} viśeṣaḥ. kiṃ tarhi havir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7846: payo dadhisaṃsṛṣṭam. kuta etat? sā vaiśvadevīty ucyate, na tato yan
GSP28msbh1-7u:7848: nanu strīliṅganirdeśāt, āmikṣā haviḥ, sā ca tato niṣpadyate, vājinaṃ ca haviḥ, tad api niṣpadyata iti. na, ity ucyate - tad eva hi payas taptaṃ dadhisaṃyuktam, āmikṣā bhavati. tasmāt strīliṅgam adoṣaḥ. āha - yadi payo dadhisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ haviḥ, kiṃ tarhy ucyate, āmikṣā prayojiketi. ucyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:7849: [450]{*4/74*} - āmikṣāyāṃ dadhipayasī vidyete, na vārjine. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:7850: avagamyate? saṃsargasaniṣpatteḥ, tatra hi dadhipayasoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayo rasa upalabhyate, tena tatra dadhipayasī ity anumānaṃ bhavati, vājine tiktakaṭuko rasaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7851: āha, tapte payasi dadhany ānīyamāna ubhayaṃ bhavati, dadhnā ca payaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7852: saṃsṛjyate vājināc ca vivicyate. tatra saṃsargaś cikīrṣitaḥ, na viveka iti. kuta etat? ucyate - śābdaḥ saṃsargo dadhnā, aśābdo vājinena vivekaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7853: payasa iti, sarvanāma ca pūrvoktena śabdenaikavākyatāṃ yāti. itarasmin pakṣe payasi dadhyānayanaṃ vājinavivekalakṣaṇārthaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7854: śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā. tasmād āmikṣārthaṃ dadhyānayanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7855: āmikṣāśabdaś cātrānuvādaḥ, āmikṣaiva sā bhavati, yatra tapte payasi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7856: dadhyānīyate. tasmād āmikṣikā prayoktrī, vājinam aprayojakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7860: na ca, ubhayaṃ prayojakaṃ nyāyyam, nātra vacanam asti, idaṃ prayojakam idaṃ neti, asati prayojake 'narthakaṃ bhavatīti prayojakaṃ kalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7861: tatraikasminn api prayojake siddhe 'rthavaty upadeśe nānyad api prayojakaṃ bhavitum arhati. na ca, na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7862: mukhyaśabdābhisaṃstavāt, mukhyaśabdaḥ saṃstotuṃ nyāyya iti, prāthamyāt tu tasya tāvat prayojakatvajñānam{*4/75*}, tasmin sati prayojake,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7863: parikṣatatvād{*4/76*} ānarthakyasya, na dvitīyam api prayojakam, prathamā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7864: cāmikṣā, dvitīyaṃ vājinam, tasmād āmikṣā prayoktrī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7865: api ca mukhyaśabdena ca, āmikṣā stūyate - mithunaṃ vai dadhi ca śṛtaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7866: atha yat saṃsṛṣṭaṃ maṇḍam iva mastv{*4/77*} iva pari ca dadṛśe{*4/78*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7867: [451]{*4/79*} garbha eva sa iti, garbhastutāmikṣā{*4/80*}, mithunasya ca garbhaḥ prayojakaḥ, na garbhodakam. tasmād apy āmikṣā prayojiketi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7868: manyāmahe. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam? yady ubhayaṃ prayojakam, vājine naṣṭe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7869: punas tapte payasi dadhy ānetavyam, atha vājinam aprayojakam, naṣṭe vājine lopo dadhyānayanasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7877: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇātīti{*4/81*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7878: tatredam aparaṃ śrūyate - ṣaṭ padāny anuniṣkrāmatīti{*4/82*}, tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7879: saptamaṃ padaṃ gṛhṇātīti. idam aparam - yarhi havirdhāne prācī
GSP28msbh1-7u:7880: pravartayeyus tarhi tenākṣam añjyād{*4/83*} iti{*4/84*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7881: kiṃ somakrayaṇyānayanaṃ padapāṃsvartham, uta krayaprayuktam iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7882: prāptam? nayanād ubhayaṃ niṣpadyate, krayaḥ padaṃ ca, tasmād ubhayaṃ prayojakam. na hi gamyate viśeṣa iti, tad uktam - ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād iti{*4/85*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7883: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - padakarmāprayojakam iti. kutaḥ? yasmān nayanaṃ krayārtham, na hi nayanam antareṇa viśiṣṭe deśe kraya upapadyate. tasmāt krayeṇa tāvan nayanaṃ prayuktam iti gamyate. krayaprayuktaṃ cet, na padaprayuktam api bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7884: api ca, ekahāyanyāḥ padapāṃsavo grahītavyā iti nāsti śabdaḥ. nanu prakṛtaikahāyanī padapāṃsugrahaṇavākyena{*4/86*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7885: saṃbhantsyate. neti brūmaḥ - ekahāyanyā krīṇātīti viśiṣṭena vākyena kraye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7886: upadiṣṭaikahāyanī prakṛtatvāt padapāṃsuvākyena saṃbadhyate, prakaraṇāc ca vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. athedānīm, ekahāyanī krayaṇārthaṃ saṃkīrtitā satī saṃnihitatvāt prasaṅgam upajīvatā padapāṃsuvākyena saṃbadhyeta, yāsau
GSP28msbh1-7u:7887: parārthā, etasyāḥ padaṃ grāhyam iti. tasmāt krayapayuktaṃ nayanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7889: kiṃ punaś cintāyāḥ prayojanam? yady ubhayam ekahāyanīnayanasya prayojakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7890: yadaikahāyanyāḥ saptaṃ padaṃ grāvaṇi nidhīyate, tadā punar ekahāyanī
GSP28msbh1-7u:7891: nīyeta saptamāya padāya, yadā padaṃ na prayojakam, tadā naikahāyanī punaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7900: arthābhidhānakarma ca bhaviṣyatā saṃyogasya tannimittatvāt tadartho hi vidhīyate // MS_4,1.26
GSP28msbh1-7u:7901: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - kapāleṣu puroḍāśaṃ śrapayatīti{*4/88*}, tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7902: - puroḍāśakapālena tuṣān upavapatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ubhayaṃ kapālāni prayojayati, puroḍāśaśrapaṇaṃ tuṣopavāpaś ca, uta śrapaṇaṃ prayojakam, na tuṣopavāpa iti. kiṃ prāptam? vinigamanāyāṃ hetor abhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7904: iti prāpte ucyate, arthābhidhānaṃ prayojanasaṃbaddham abhidhānaṃ yasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7905: yathā puroḍāśakapālam iti, puroḍāśārthaṃ kapālaṃ puroḍāśakapālam. katham etad avagamyate? puroḍāśas tāvat tasmin kāle nāsti, yena vartamānaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kapālena syāt. tenaiva hetunā na bhūtaḥ, sa eṣa kapālasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7906: puroḍāśeṇa bhaviṣyatā [453]{*4/89*} saṃbandhaḥ, bhaviṣyatā saṃbandhaś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:7907: tan nimittasya bhavati. tasmāt puroḍāśena prayuktaṃ yat kapālam, tena tuṣā upavaptavyā iti. evaṃ ca sati carau puroḍāśābhāve yadā tuṣānupavaptuṃ kapālam upādīyate, na tat puroḍāśakapālaṃ syāt. na cen na tena tuṣā upavaptavyā bhavanti. tasmān na tuṣopavāpaḥ kapālānāṃ prayojakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7912: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agniṣomīyaḥ. tatra śrūyate - hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:7913: atha jihvāyā ityevamādi{*4/90*}. tathā, lohitaṃ nirasyati, śakṛt
GSP28msbh1-7u:7915: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ hṛdayādibhir avadānair ijyā paśoḥ prayoktrī, uta śakṛt saṃpravyādho lohitanirasanaṃ ca tad api prayojakam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7916: ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād{*4/93*}, ubhayaṃ prayojakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7917: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, paśau{*4/94*} śakṛllohitayor aprayojakatvam, na hi tadarthaḥ paśor ālambhaḥ{*4/95*}, sakṛt saṃpravidhyati lohitam apāsyatīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:7918: ucyate, na paśor anyasya veti, paśur agnīṣomīyo vākyena, yo dīkṣito yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:7919: agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/96*}. śakṛllohite paśoḥ prakaraṇena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7920: bhavetām, prakaraṇaṃ ca vākyena bādhyate. nanv ete śakṛllohite
GSP28msbh1-7u:7921: pratipādyete, tena yāgārthasya paśor nānyasyeti niścayaḥ. evaṃ cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7922: aprayojake śakṛllohita iti. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam? sāmye sati śakṛllohitābhāve 'nyaḥ paśur ālambhanīyaḥ, śakṛllohitayor aprayojakatve lopaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7929: *{4/95: E2 om. śakṛl lohitayor aprayojakatvam, na hi tadarthaḥ paśor
GSP28msbh1-7u:7933: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ{*4/99*} śrūyate - uttarārdhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyatīti{*4/100*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ puroḍāśasyāgneyayāgaḥ prayojakaḥ, sviṣṭakṛd aprayojaka utobhayam iti. kiṃ prāptam? ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād iti{*4/101*}. evaṃ prāpte brumaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7936: vidyamānasyāvayavina ekadeśa upādātavya iti, tatrārtho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7937: nāvayavinam upādadīteti, yathekṣukhaṇḍam asmai prayaccha, modakaśakalam asmai prayaccheti, nekṣum upādadīteti gamyate, sata ikṣoḥ khaṇḍam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7938: upādadīta, sato modakāc chakalam upādadīteti. tasmād anyārthaṃ dravyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7939: tasyottarārdhād avadeyam, asti cāgnyarthaḥ puroḍāśaḥ. tasmād viṣṭakṛd aprayojaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7947: iti cet paśyasi, aprayojakaḥ puroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛd iti, naitad evam, agniṃ prati nirdeśāt tasya puroḍāśasya{*4/103*} sviṣṭakṛd artham anyaḥ puroḍāśa
GSP28msbh1-7u:7948: utpādayitavyaḥ, yasyottarārdhāt sviṣṭakṛd ijyate, tasyāgnaye saṃkalpitasya neṣṭe yajamānaḥ. katham asau tad anyasyai devatāyai dadyāt. katham agniṃ prati nirdeśa iti. idaṃ śrūyate - aṅgiraso vā ita uttamāḥ suvargaṃ loka[455]{*4/104*}māyaṃs te yajñavāstv abhyāyaṃs te puroḍāśaṃ kūrmaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7949: bhūtvā sarpantam apaśyaṃs tam abruvann indrāya dhriyasva bṛhaspataye dhriyasvādityāya dhriyasva sa nādhriyata tam abruvan agnaye dhriyasveti so
GSP28msbh1-7u:7950: 'dhriyata yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo{*4/105*} 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti{*4/106*}. tasmāt tena sviṣṭakṛto na saṃbandhaḥ. evaṃ cet tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7951: anyad dravyam arthād utpādayitavyam, na hy anutpannasya dravyasyottarārdho
GSP28msbh1-7u:7958: naitad evaṃ saṃnihito hi śeṣaḥ, yasminn anutpādyamāne 'rtho na sidhyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7959: so 'rthād upādyate. saṃnihite ca śeṣe sati sidhyaty uttarārdhād grahaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7960: tasmān nārthād dravyam utpādayitavyam, yad evānyārthaṃ dravyaṃ saṃnihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7961: tasyaivottarārdhād grahītavyam. uttarārdhamātraṃ hi sviṣṭakṛte śrūyate nāmuṣya dravyasyeti. na caitāvatā vyavahāro bhavati, sarvo hi kasyacid
GSP28msbh1-7u:7962: uttarārdhaḥ, sa eṣa saṃnihitam apekṣate, saṃnihitaṃ ca parārtham. tasmāt parārthād dravyāt sviṣṭakṛd ijyā. ataś cāprayojiketi. yad uktam, anīśānena na śakyaṃ dātum iti, tad ucyate, vācanika eṣa śeṣapratipādanārtha
GSP28msbh1-7u:7963: utsargaḥ, sa śakyaḥ kartum. dānaṃ hy utsargapūrvakaḥ parasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7966: karmanimittaś ca sviṣṭakṛto bhāga iti śrūyate. katham? devā vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyaṃ no vaheti, so 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai [456]{*4/107*} bhāgo me 'stv iti vṛṇīṣvety abruvan so 'bravīd uttarārdhād eva mahyaṃ sakṛt sakṛd avadyād iti. karma kurvato bhāgo 'yam uttarārdhād iti stutir bhavati. yady āgneyasyottarārdhād ity ucyate, tato 'sti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7967: karmārthena bhāgena sādṛśyam idam, tadāgneyaṃ havyaṃ yat kila vahasīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7968: tatra sati sādṛśye stutir upapadyate, prayojakatve cāsati sādṛśye
GSP28msbh1-7u:7969: stutisāmañjasyaṃ na syāt. tasmād aprayojakaḥ puroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛdyāga
GSP28msbh1-7u:7973: liṅgam api bhavati - tad yat sarvebhyo havirbhyaḥ samavadyati, tasmād idam udare viśvarūpam annaṃ samavadhīyata iti, yadi parārthād dravyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:7974: saṃnihitād ijyate, tadā satsaṃnidhānāviśeṣāt sarvebhyo 'vadīyata ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:7975: upapadyate. prayojakatve tv ekasmād evāvadīyeta. tasmād apy aprayojakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7976: tathedam aparaṃ liṅgam - śeṣād iḍām avadyati, śeṣāt sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7977: nanv ayaṃ vidhiḥ syāt. neti brūmaḥ, nātra vidhivibhaktir vartamānāpadeśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:7979: abhighāraṇe viprakarṣād anuyājavat pātrabhedaḥ syāt // MS_4,1.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7980: asti vājapeyaḥ, vāyapeyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti. tatra śrūyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7981: saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate, saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpater
GSP28msbh1-7u:7982: āptyai, iti{*4/108*}, prājāpatyānāṃ kratupaśūnāṃ ca samuccayo vakṣyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:7983: prajāpātyeṣu cāmnānād iti{*4/109*}. asti [457]{*4/110*} tu prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7984: prayājaśeṣeṇa havīṃṣy abhighārayatīti{*4/111*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighārayituṃ prayājaśeṣasya dhāraṇārthaṃ pātram aparam utpādayitavyam, tatas tena prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighārayitavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7985: uta na śeṣo dhārayitavyaḥ, naiva tataḥ prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighāraṇīyā iti. kiṃ prāptam? abhighāraṇe prayājaśeṣadhāraṇārthaṃ pātram utpādyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7986: prātaḥsavane ca prayājaśeṣo viprakṛṣṭakāle{*4/112*} mādhyaṃdine savane,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7987: brahmasāmakāle prājāpatyānām ālabhyaḥ śrūyate - tān paryagnikṛtān utsṛjanti, brahmasāmny ālabhata iti{*4/113*}, vyāpṛtā ca juhūr bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7988: tasmāt pātrāntaram utpādanīyam iti, yathānuyājeṣu pṛṣadājyadhāraṇārthaṃ pātram utpādyate, pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīti{*4/114*} vacanāt, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7997: na vāpātratvād apātratvaṃ tv ekadeśatvāt // MS_4,1.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7998: na vā prājāpatyānāṃ vapā abhighāryāḥ. kutaḥ? śeṣābhāvāt. kathaṃ śeṣābhāva iti cet. apātratvāt. katham apātratā? ekadeśatvāt, prayājārthasya hi gṛhītasyājyasya sa ekadeśaḥ śeṣaḥ. kim ataḥ? yady evam, ekadeśavyāpāraḥ śrūyamāṇo nāvayavinam upādeyatvena codayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7999: āha, utpattiṃ na codayet, dhāraṇam utpannasyārthād bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8000: ekadeśatvād abhighāraṇaṃ dravyam eva na prayuṅkta ity ucyate, kṛtārthasya dravyasyāyam ekadeśaḥ pratipādyate, nābhighāraṇam arthakarma. nanu
GSP28msbh1-7u:8001: haviṣām, dvitīyānirdeśāt prādhānyaṃ syāt. nety ucyate, adṛṣṭo hi haviṣām
GSP28msbh1-7u:8002: upakāraḥ kalpyeta, ājyaprādhānye punar juhvā riktatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8004: nābhighṛtena haviṣā. tasmāt prājāpatyānām abhighāritābhir vapābhiḥ prayojanam eva nāsti, kim arthaṃ śeṣo dhāryata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8007: hetutvāc cābhighāraṇasya, sahālabhata iti stutir bhavati, tīrthaṃ vai prātaḥsavanam, yat prātaḥsavane paśava ālabhyante, tīrtha evaitān ālabhate, sayonitvāyārtho vapānām abhighṛtatvāya, ity arthānatareṇa vapābhighāraṇam anugṛhṇan nehāstīti darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8009: abhāvaṃ khalv apy abhigdhāraṇasya darśayati - savyā vā etarhi vapā yarhy anabhighṛtāḥ, brahma vai brahmasāma, yad brahmasāmny ālabhate tenāsavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8010: tenābhighṛtā iti. savyaśabdo rūkṣe bhāṣyate, savyā vapety anabhighṛtatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8013: āha naitad darśanam, saty eva hy abhighāraṇe bhavaty etat savyavacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8014: asti hi vapāyā anyad abhighāraṇam - upastṛṇāty ājyaṃ hiraṇyaśakalam, vapā hiraṇyaśakalaṃ tato 'bhighārayatīti{*4/116*}. tasmin sati kathaṃ savyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8015: bhaveyuḥ? brūte{*4/117*} ca, tasmān naitac chakyam avagantum rūkṣās tā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8016: vapā dṛśyanta iti, tena nūnam abhighāraṇaṃ prayājaśeṣeṇāstīti, saty asminn abhighāraṇe pratyakṣe, rūkṣās tā iti darśanaṃ vyāmoha iti{*4/118*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8020: *{4/118: E2: pratyakṣam arūkṣās tāḥ. ato rūkṣāvacanaṃ vyāmoha iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8022: evaṃ ced dṛśyate, saty abhighāraṇe savyā iti vacanam aliṅgam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8023: nāliṅgam, tasyaitad vacanam, yat snehanaṃ karoti. katamat tat? yat
GSP28msbh1-7u:8024: prathamam, prathamaṃ hi snehanaṃ karoti, na dvitīyam. snigdhasya tad bhavati, na ca snigdhasya snehanaṃ kriyate, yathā bhavati loke vādaḥ, yad asmābhiḥ kāntārān nirgatair devadattasya gṛhe snigdham bhuktam{*4/120*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8025: tena vayam arūkṣāḥ kṛtā iti, satsv apy anyeṣu snigdheṣv eva bhojaneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8026: evaṃ tasyārūkṣākaraṇasyābhighāraṇasyābhāvād rūkṣā iti vacanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8027: asmiṃs tu sati nopapadyate. tasmād api prayājaśeṣeṇābhighāraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8032: idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram{*4/121*}. yadi prathamasyābhāvāt savyā iti vacanaṃ bhavaty anupapannam, tarhy anyasya prathamasya vidyamānatvāt. katamat tat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8033: yac chrapyamāṇāyā aparam udvāsitāyāḥ. atrocyate - syāt tasya mukhyatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8034: yat prayājaśeṣeṇābhighāraṇam, tasyaivābhāvād etad upapadyate, saty api śrapyamāṇāyā abhighāraṇa udvāsitāyāś ca, yat tāvac chrapyamāṇāyāḥ, tad agner arcīṃṣi dahanti, yad udvāsitāyāḥ, tad ūṣmāvayavāś ca nāśayanti, saiṣā rūkṣaiva, idaṃ tu prayājaśeṣeṇa śītāyāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8035: kriyate, tat snehayati, tena snigdhāyāḥ padānakālam abhighāraṇaṃ yat, tan na snehayati. tad idaṃ snehanasyābhighāraṇasyābhāvāt savyatāvacanam upapadyata ity uktam, tasmān na prayājaśeṣo dhāryata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8037: *{4/121: E1 gibt idaṃ padottaraṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8039: samānayanaṃ tu mukhyaṃ syāl liṅgadarśanāt // MS_4,1.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8040: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - atihāyeḍo barhiḥ prati samānayatīti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8041: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ samānayanam ājyasya dharmāṇāṃ ca prayojakam, utāprayojakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8042: iti. kiṃ prāptam? aprayojakam iti. kutaḥ? prayājānuyājārthasyājyasyāyam ekadeśaḥ samānīyata iti, pūrveṇa nyāyenāprayojakatā prāptā. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:8043: mukhyaṃ samānayanaṃ liṅgadarśanāt. kiṃ liṅgam? caturgṛhītāny ājyāni bhavanti, na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīty ātithyāyāṃ śrūyate, yadi prayājārthaṃ samānayanam, tatas tatraikaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ samānīyate. ekam apy anuyājānāṃ bhavati, tataś cātithyeḍāṃ tā saṃtiṣṭhata ity anuyājābhāva
GSP28msbh1-7u:8044: upabhṛti samānayanārtham ekaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ grāhyam, na tv anuyājārtham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8045: tatra bahūnāṃ caturgṛhītānāṃ darśanam upapadyate, itarathā hy anuyājābhāve
GSP28msbh1-7u:8046: naivopabhṛti catur gṛhyeta, tatra caturgṛhītānīti bahuvacanaṃ nopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8048: nanu liṅgam upadiśyate, kā prāptiḥ? ucyate - dṛṣṭaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8049: prayājau dvau yaṣṭavyau, tatra juhvām ājyena prayojanaṃ nopabhṛti riktāyām, upabhṛto recanam adṛṣṭārthaṃ juhvāṃ nidhānaṃ dṛṣṭārtham eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8051: prayojayati. tad api hi prayājārtham anuyājārthaṃ ceti vakṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8054: atha kasmān na vacanam etat, na caturgṛhītāny ājyānīti. ucyate, vacane hi hetur asamarthitaḥ syāt, na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti. yadā samānayanaṃ na prayājārtham iti gamyate, tadā vacanam. yadā vacanam, tadā nānuyājābhāvo hetuḥ, asati hetau, na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti hetuvan nigado nopapadyeta. tasmāt prayājārthaṃ samānayanaṃ prayojakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8055: aupabhṛtasyājyasya. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam? paryājārthe samānayane yāvat
GSP28msbh1-7u:8056: prayājārtham, tāvat sarvaṃ samāneyam, ardham aupabhṛtasya, aprayojanakatve na niyogato 'rdhaṃ yāvat tādvat vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8058: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - caturjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāty aṣṭāv upabhṛti
GSP28msbh1-7u:8059: gṛhṇātīti{*4/125*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ jauhavam aupabhṛtaṃ cobhayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8060: ubhayārtham, prayājebhyaś cānuyājebhyaś ca, uta jauhavaṃ prayājebhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8061: aupabhṛtam anuyājebhyaḥ? athavā aupabhṛtaṃ prayājebhyo 'nuyājebhyaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8062: kiṃ prāptam? ubhayam ubhayārtham. kutaḥ? yad yad ājyena kriyate, tasmai tasmai bhavitum arhaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:8065: naivam, ubhayam ubhayārtham iti, jauhavaṃ prayājārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8066: aupa[462]{*4/126*}bhṛtam ubhayārtham. katham? yaj juhvāṃ gṛhṇāti, ṛtubhyas tad gṛhṇāti, ṛtavo vai prayājā iti jauhavavacanam anuyājapratiṣedhārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8068: āha, nanu nāsty atrānuyājapratiṣedhārthaṃ vacanam, yad etat prayājebhyas
GSP28msbh1-7u:8069: tad gṛhṇātīti{*4/127*}, prayājeṣūpadeśakam etat, nāsty asyānuyājapratiṣedhe sāmarthyam iti. ucyate - na brūmaḥ, pratiṣedhakam etad iti. kiṃ tūtpattivākya ājyānāṃ naiva prayojanābhisaṃbandhaḥ, anena vacanena prayājaprayojanatā kriyate jauhavasya, anuyājaprayojanatāsya vacanābhāvād eva na gamyata iti, anuyājapratiṣedhārthaṃ vacanam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:8074: iti ced dṛśyate, jauhavam anuyājebhyaḥ pratiṣidhyate, aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham iti, bhavatu jauhavaṃ prayājārtham, na tv aupabhṛtam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8075: ubhayārtham. tad api tathā syāt, yathā jauhavam. katham? etad apy anuyājārtham eva śrūyate, yad upabhṛti gṛhṇāty anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇāti
GSP28msbh1-7u:8078: naitad evam, ubhayārthaṃ hy aupabhṛtam, evaṃ hi śrūyate - yad aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇāti prayājānuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīti{*4/128*}. nanūktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8079: anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīty anuyājārthatāsyeti. ucyate, juhūpratiṣedhān
GSP28msbh1-7u:8080: nityānuvādaḥ. ubhayasminn aupabhṛte jauhave ca{*4/129*} ubhayārthe prāpte jauhavam anuyājebhyaḥ pratiṣiddham, naupabhṛtam, tad aupabhṛtasyobhayārthatāyāṃ satyām anu[463]{*4/130*}yājārthatāvacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8081: nityānuvādo bhavitum arhati, na śaknoti prayājārthatāṃ pratiṣeddhum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8082: pratyakṣaśrutā hi sā, tasmād aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. samānayanaṃ ca tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:8083: juhvāṃ śrūyate, tasmād api prayājārthatā na śakyā bādhitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8086: *{4/129: E1 gibt aupabhṛte jauhave ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8088: aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīti{*4/131*} śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ tad aupabhṛtam ājyam aṣṭasaṃkhyena grahaṇena saṃskriyate, uta catuḥsaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā dvayor grahaṇayor iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? aṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8089: na catuḥsaṃkhye dve iti. kutaḥ? śravaṇād aṣṭasaṃkhyā śrūyate, catuḥsaṃkhyā aṣṭasaṃkhyayā lakṣyate, śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā, tasmād aṣṭasaṃkhyaṃ grahaṇam etad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8093: anugrahavādaś ca bhavati - caturgṛhītaṃ vā etad abhūt tasyāghāram āghārya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8095: caturgṛhītatvāyeti caturgṛhītānugrahaḥ kathaṃ syād iti. kiṃ caturgṛhītaṃ bhavati samānayanena? neti brūmaḥ, caturgṛhītaṃ prathamam eva tat, āghāre
GSP28msbh1-7u:8096: 'py āghārite, yad avaśiṣṭaṃ catuḥsaṃkhyam eva tasya grahaṇam āsīt. kiṃ tarhi caturgṛhītatvāyeti. caturgṛhītasyānugrahārtham, alpaṃ hi caturgṛhītaṃ homāyāparyāptam, tat paryāptaṃ kathaṃ syād iti. evaṃ caturgṛhītaśabdenālpam iti lakṣyate, alpatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ kasyacid apekṣya bhavati, yadi hy aupabhṛtam aṣṭasaṃkhyam evaṃ caturgṛhītam [464]{*4/134*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8097: alpaṃ bhavati, tatra{*4/135*} caturgṛhītaśabdena alpatā śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:8098: lakṣayitum. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ, aupabhṛte 'ṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8102: *{4/135: E2 om. caturgṛhītam alpaṃ bhavati, tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8103: dvayos tu hetusāmarthyaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca samānayane // MS_4,1.48 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8104: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, dve ete caturgṛhīte, evaṃ hetuḥ samarthito
GSP28msbh1-7u:8105: bhavaty ātithyāyām, caturgṛhītāny ājyāni bhavanti, na hy atrānuyājān
GSP28msbh1-7u:8106: yakṣyan bhavatīti{*4/136*}, asatsv apy anuyājeṣv etad aṣṭagṛhītam evaupabhṛtaṃ bhavet. yadāṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā, na tadā dvayoś
GSP28msbh1-7u:8107: caturgṛhītayoḥ satoś caturgṛhītān{*4/137*} ājyānīti bahuvacanam ājyeṣūpapadyate. tasmāc caturgṛhīte dve iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8108: āha, liṅgam etat prāptir ucyatām iti. tad abhidhīyate, anārabhya ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8109: caturgṛhītaṃ juhotīti sarvahomeṣu, tena prayājānuyājeṣv api na tad aṣṭagṛhītena śakyate bādhitum, nānāviṣayatvāt. aṣṭagṛhītaṃ hi grahaṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8110: caturgṛhītaṃ hi home, asti hi saṃbhavaḥ, yad aṣṭagṛhītaṃ gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8111: caturgṛhītaṃ hūyeta, tad etad ihāṣṭatvam grahaṇe bhavati. kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte home sampādayet? tasmād dve ete caturgṛhīte, aṣṭagṛhīte gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyete. caturgṛhīte dve nāgṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ{*4/138*} kaścit
GSP28msbh1-7u:8112: sampādayet. tasmād dve ete caturgṛhīte iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8113: atha yad uktam, aṣṭagṛhītaṃ śrūyate, śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā garīyasīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8114: ucyate - uktam asmābhir aṣṭasaṃkhyāyāḥ prayojanam, kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte
GSP28msbh1-7u:8115: syātām iti. api ca, aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīty upabhṛti samānīte dve
GSP28msbh1-7u:8116: caturgṛhīte kathaṃ syātām iti. itarathāsaty aṣṭaśabde nānāpātrayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:8117: gṛhyeyātām. tasmād aṣṭaśabdaśravaṇam adoṣaḥ, sādhv etat, dve caturgṛhīte [465]{*4/139*} upabhṛtīti. prayojanam, dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8118: samānayane 'rdhaṃ samānetavyaṃ bhavati, aṣṭagṛhīte sati na niyogato
GSP28msbh1-7u:8119: 'rdham. tathā yatrānuyājārthaṃ na grahaṇam, tatrāpy aṣṭagṛhītam, yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā ca siddhāntaḥ, tathā cāturmāsyeṣu caturgṛhītam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8124: *{4/138: E2: na hi dve caturgṛhīte agṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8126: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ, yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/140*}, tatredam āmnātam - khādire badhnāti, pālāśe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8127: badhnāti, rohite badhnātīti. tat saṃnidhāv idam aparam āmnāyate, svaruṇā paśum anakti yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8128: athedānīm idaṃ saṃdihyate, kiṃ bhedena yūpāt svarur utpādayitavyaḥ, uta yūpaṃ kriyamāṇam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. tatredaṃ tāvan naḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8130: utāprayojakaḥ{*4/141*}? prayojakaś cet, bhedena yūpān niṣpādyeta. na cet prayojakaḥ, yūpaṃ niṣpadyamānam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahīṣyata iti. sa kathaṃ prayojakaḥ syāt? kathaṃ vā na prayojaka iti. yady eṣā vacanavyaktiḥ, svaruśabdavācyaṃ bhāvyate. kathaṃ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8131: joṣaṇādinetikartavyatāviśeṣeṇeti. tataḥ, svaruṇā paśum anaktīti, sa svarur ity avagato grahīṣyate, tataḥ prayojakaḥ. athaivaṃ vijñāyate, svaruṇā paśum anaktīty anavagataḥ svaruḥ. etāvad asya{*4/142*} vijñāyate 'ñjanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8132: tena kriyata iti, idam api, yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti yūpaikadeśaṃ svarukārye 'ñjane viniyuṅkta iti tato 'prayojakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8133: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? svarus tv anekaniṣpattiḥ svakarmaśabdatvāt, svarur na yūpenaikaniṣpattiḥ syāt, yūpam anapekṣamāṇasya svaror
GSP28msbh1-7u:8134: jo[467]{*4/143*}ṣaṇādinotpattiḥ. kutaḥ? svakarmaśabdatvāt. svo hy asya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8135: karmaśabdaḥ svarutāyā vidhāyako bhavati, svaruṃ karotīti. evaṃ ca yūpakāṣṭāvayavasya svarutvaṃ kriyata iti, yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:8136: lakṣaṇayā yūpaśabdaḥ, khadirādyavayavasyety arthaḥ. kutaḥ? svarutvabhāvanā hi śrutyā gamyate, svaruṃ karotīti svarum utpādayatīti. yūpāvayavopādānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8137: vākyena, vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasīti. tasmād evaṃ sati na niyogato yūpakāṣṭhād eva svarur utpādayitavyaḥ, nirapekṣād anyasmād api vṛkṣāt kartavyo bhedeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8143: itaś ca nirapekṣasya svaror utpattir iti gamyate. kutaḥ? jātyantarād apy āśaṅkā bhavati, vṛkṣāntarāt{*4/144*}. katham? nānyasya svaruṃ kuryāt, yady anyasya vṛkṣasya svaruṃ kuryāt, anye 'sya lokam anvāroheyuḥ, yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na hi yūpam anuniṣpannasya garhaṇe jātyantarāśaṅkāvakalpate, yūpaśakalo hi svarukārye tadānīṃ viniyujyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8144: tasmād api bhedena yūpāt svarur utpādayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8147: tad ekadeśo vā svarutvasya tannimittatvāt // MS_4,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8148: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. yūpaikadeśo hi yūpam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. kasmāt? evam āmnāyate - yady anyasya vṛkṣasya svaruṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8149: kuryāt, anye 'sya lokam anvāroheyuḥ, yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na cātrāyam artho vidhīyate, svarum utpādayatīti. kiṃ tarhi? svarukāryaṃ kartuṃ yam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8150: upādatte, taṃ yūpād iti. kutaḥ? svarutvasya tannimittatvāt, svarutvam atra śrūyate svaroḥ, yūpasya svaruṃ karoti [468]{*4/145*} iti. kasyātmīyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8151: yūpasyeti, ātmīyaś ca samudāyasyaikadeśo bhavati, tasmād idam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8152: aprāṇinaḥ ṣaṣṭhī pañcamy arthe bhavati, yathā śākasya dehi, śākād dehīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8153: tathā kvacit tṛtīyārthe, ghṛtasya yajati, ghṛtena yajati. pañcamy arthe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8154: ghṛtād yajati, ghṛtasya yajatīti. dvitīyārthe vā, somasya pibati, somaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8156: nanūktam, yūpāvayavo 'tra vākyena vidhīyate, śrutyā svaror utpattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8157: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasīti. ucyate, satyam, evam, yūpasyeti tu śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8158: 'vivakṣitārtho bhavati. tatra śrutir api bādhyate, vākyam api. na tv asmatpakṣe kiṃcid avivakṣitārtham, svaruṃ karotīti svārtha evānuvādo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8159: bhaviṣyatīti, yūpaśakalo vidhāyiṣyate. svaruśabdaś cāñjanārthena śakale
GSP28msbh1-7u:8160: upacarita iti gamyate, avayavaprasiddhiś caitam arthaṃ gamayiṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8161: bhavati hi brāhmaṇam - atha kasmāt svarur nāma? etasmād veṣo{*4/146*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8162: 'vacchidyate, tad asyaitat svam ivārur bhavati, tasmāt svarur nāmeti{*4/147*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8167: itaś ca yūpam anuniṣpannasya grahaṇam. kutaḥ? śakalaśruteḥ, śakalaśrutir bhavati svaroḥ, yaḥ prathamaḥ śakalaḥ parāpatet, sa svaruḥ kārya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8168: śakalaś caikadeśaḥ, ekadeśaś cāprayojakaḥ, saṃbandhiśabdatvāt. tāvatā ca vyavahārāt samudāyāpekṣiṇaḥ. tatra prakaraṇād anyārthena khadirādinā joṣaṇādikarmaviśiṣṭena yāgārthena prakṛtenāsyaikavākyatā, yūpāya khadirādi joṣayate, chinatti, takṣati ca. tatra yaḥ śakalaḥ prathamaḥ parāptitas taṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8169: ca svarum añjanārthaṃ karotīti. svaruśabdaṃ ca tatrānuvadann evopacarati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8170: tasmān naitad asti, pṛthaṅniṣpattiḥ svarur iti, [469]{*4/148*} yenānyasmād api vṛkṣād iti śaṅkyate. tasmāj jātyantarāśaṅkāvacanaṃ nityānuvādo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8174: itaś ca na pṛthaṅniṣpattiḥ svaruḥ. kutaḥ? ekādaśinyām, pratiyūpaṃ ca darśanāt, yathā, anupūrvaṃ svarubhiḥ paśūn samajya{*4/149*} madhyame raśanāguṇe sve sve{*4/150*} svaṃ svaṃ yūpaśakalam upagūhatīti svarubahutvaṃ darśayati, yadi ca svaruḥ pṛthaṅniṣpattiḥ syāt, eka evaikādaśinyāṃ tantreṇa kāryaṃ sādhayet. yūpam anuniṣpannasya tu grahaṇe prakṛtau svayūpaśakalenāñjanaṃ kṛtam ity ekādaśinyām api codakaḥ svayūpaśakalam eva prāpayatīti bahutvam upapannaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8175: svayūpaśakalagrahaṇaṃ ca prākṛtasya grahaṇād adhyavasīyate, yādṛśo 'sau
GSP28msbh1-7u:8176: prākṛtaḥ, tādṛśo 'sau garhītavyaḥ, na viśiṣṭa iti. tasmāt svarur utpatter
GSP28msbh1-7u:8180: *{4/150: So E1,6, E2 (Fn.); E2 om. sve sve}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8182: atha yad uktam, utpattir asya śabdenocyate, svaruṃ karotīti, evaṃ ca karotiśabdo 'vakalpiṣyata iti. ucyate, ādāne karotiśabdo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8183: svaruṃ karoti, svarum ādatta iti. yathā kāṣṭhāni karoti, gomayāni karotīty ādāne karotiśabdo bhavati, evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam{*4/151*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8185: *{4/151: Die Ausgaben wiederholen zwischen MS 4.2.6 und 4.2.7 noch einmal MS 4.2.1-6 mit kürzerer, inhaltlich kaum abweichender Kommentierung}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8187: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate, śākhām adhikṛtya, prācīm āharaty udīcīm āharati prāgudīcīm āharatīti{*4/152*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim ayaṃ digvādaḥ, uta śākhāvāda iti. digvāda iti prāptam, tathā śrutiśabdaḥ, śākhāvāde
GSP28msbh1-7u:8188: lakṣaṇeti. tasmād digvāda iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, śākhāvāda iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8189: yadi tāvad ayam arthaḥ, prācī dig āhartavyeti, tato 'śakyo 'rthaḥ, atha prācīṃ diśaṃ pratyāharaṇīyeti, tataḥ kāhartavyeti, vākye śākhāśabdasyābhāvād anupapanno 'yaṃ saṃbandhaḥ. atha prakṛtā śākheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8190: tataḥ prācīśabdena tasyā evābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ. kutaḥ? pratyakṣā hi prācīśabdena harater ekavākyatā, prakaraṇāc chākhāśabdena bhavet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8191: ubhayathātra prācīśabdo lakṣaṇayā prakṛtāṃ vā śākhāṃ lakṣayet, diśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8193: api ca, prācīti saṃbandhiśabdo 'yam, saṃbandhiśabdāś ca sarve sāpekṣāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8194: vinā padāntareṇa, na paripūrṇam artham abhivadanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8195: sāmānyapadārthasaṃbandhe ca saṃvyavahārānupapattiḥ, sarvasyaiva deśasya kutaścit prāgbhāvāt. tathā śākhāśabdo 'pi saṃbandhiśabdaḥ, vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate. yadā vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate, tadā vṛkṣasya śākhā prācī, udīcī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8196: prāgudīcī veti bhavati saṃbandhaḥ, tathā ca saṃvyavahāro 'vakalpate. yat tu śākhāvāde [473]{*4/154*} lakṣaṇeti. ucyate, bhavati lakṣaṇayāpi śabdārthaḥ. tasmāc chākhāvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8199: *{4/153: E2: īpsitatamaṃ yuktam; E6, E2 (Fn.): īpsitamayuktam; E2 (Fn.):
GSP28msbh1-7u:8201: śākhāyāṃ tatpradhānatvād upaveṣeṇa vibhāgaḥ syād vaiṣamyaṃ tat // MS_4,2.8
GSP28msbh1-7u:8202: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate, mūlataḥ śākhāṃ parivāsyopaveṣaṃ karotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8203: tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ, kiṃ śākhāchedanasyobhayaṃ{*4/155*} prayojakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8204: śākhā upaveṣaś ca, uta śākhā prayojakā, upaveṣo 'nuniṣpādīti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8205: ubhayaṃ chedanān niṣpadyate, śākhā śākhāmūlaṃ ca, ubhayaṃ ca prayojanavat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8206: agreṇa vatsāpākaraṇādi kariṣyate, mūlata upaveṣaḥ, tena viśeṣābhāvād ubhayaṃ prayojakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8207: iti prāpte, ucyate, śākhāyāṃ brūmaḥ, tatpradhānatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8208: śākhāpradhānatvād{*4/156*} upaveṣeṇa vibhāgo bhavet. śākhām anuniṣpanno gṛhyate. kathaṃ tatprādhānyam? śākhāṃ parivāsyeti dvitīyānirdeśāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8209: nanūpaveṣaṃ karotīty api dvitīyā. ucyate, nāsau parivāsayateḥ karma. kasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8211: āha, kasmād evam abhisaṃbandho na bhavati, śākhāṃ parivāsya mūlata
GSP28msbh1-7u:8212: upaveṣaṃ karotīti, śākhāśabdaś ca yathaivāgre tathā mūle 'pi. tatrāyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8213: arthaḥ, chedenāgramūle vibhajet. [474]{*4/157*} kiṃ prayojanam? vibhajya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8214: mūlam, upaveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti{*4/158*}. ucyate, naivam, vyavahitakalpanā hy evaṃ bhavet, avayavadhānena śākhārthaṃ parivāsanam, vṛtte tasminn upaveṣakaraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8215: nanu prakṛtatvān mūlam upaveṣaśabdena saṃbadhyate. ucyate, ubhayasaṃbandhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8216: virodhaḥ. virodhe ca prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. atha saṃnihitena saṃbadhyate, tathāpi śākhāprayuktenety āpatati. ataḥ{*4/159*} siddham eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8217: uvaveṣo{*4/160*} na prayojayati chedanam iti. etad atra vaiṣamyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8225: śākhayā vatsān apākaroti{*4/161*}, śākhayā gāḥ prāpayati, śākhayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8226: dohayatīty{*4/162*}evamādiṣu śākhāgrahaṇeṣu nopaveṣasya vyāpāras tataḥ śākhāśabdo 'paiti. na hi tanmūlaṃ śākhety ācakṣate. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8227: yatraivaṃ{*4/163*} yatra śākhāśabdaḥ, tadarthaṃ chedanam, dvitīyānirdeśāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8228: athāpi mūle śākhāśabdo bhavet, evam api śākhāśabdopadiṣṭeṣu na mūlam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8229: amūlaparivāsitatvāt. yac caivaṃ saṃskṛtayā śākhayā kriyate, tadarthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8230: chedanam. na copadhānaṃ mūlaparivāsitayā kriyate. tasmān na tadarthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8231: chedanam. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam? paurṇamāsyām api śākhotpādyā, yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā siddhāntaḥ, tathā notpādayitavyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8236: haraṇe tu juhotir yogasāmānyād dravyāṇāṃ cārthaśeṣatvāt // MS_4,2.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8237: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmananti - saha śākhayā prastaraṃ praharatīti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8239: arthakarmeti. kiṃ prāptam? haraṇe tu juhotiḥ syāt, arthakarmety arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8240: kutaḥ? yogasāmānyāt, yogo 'syāḥ samānaḥ prastareṇa, saha śākhayā prastaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8241: praharatīti. sahayoge yatra tṛtīyā, tasya guṇabhāvaḥ, yatra dvitīyā tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8242: prādhānyam. prastare ca vispaṣṭo yajiḥ, śākhāpi tasminn eva yajau prastarasya viśeṣaṇam, samānayogitvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8243: āha, nanu tatra tatra guṇabhūtā śākhā, tasyāḥ pratipattir nyāyyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8244: itarathānekaguṇabhāvaḥ prasajyeteti. ucyate, dravyāṇāṃ cārthaśeṣatvād utpattyā cikīrṣitasya śeṣabhūtāny eva dravyāṇy upadiśyante, bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti. tasmād anekaguṇataiva dravyānāṃ nyāyyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8247: pratipattir vā śākhāpraharaṇam, śabdasya tatpradhānatvāt. śabdo 'tra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8248: śākhāpradhānaḥ. katham? dvitīyāśravaṇāt. nanv anyatraiva sā dvitīyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8249: prastare, na śākhāyām. ucyate, prastare dvitīyārthaḥ śākhāyām api. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8250: tulyayogāt saha śākhayā, evaṃ prastaraḥ prahṛto bhavati, yadi śākhāpi prahriyate. tena tulyayoge sahaśabdo 'yam. yadi prastaraḥ praharaṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8251: pradhānam, śākhāpi prastaraviśeṣaṇam, na tarhi{*4/165*} tulyayogaḥ. tasmād yaḥ prastare dvitīyārthaḥ, sa śākhāyām api, ataḥ śākhā pradhānam. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8252: tatra tatra śākhā guṇabhūtā, tasyām anyatropadiśyamānāyām anekaguṇabhāvaḥ{*4/166*}. tatra ko doṣaḥ? dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ hitvādṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8253: kalpyeta. kṛtaprayojanāyāḥ śākhāyā apanayanena vedivivecanāt sukhapracāro dṛṣṭaṃ kāryam, na tu prahareṇa kiṃcit sūkṣmam api dṛṣṭam asti, tasmāt pratipattir nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8254: [476]{*4/167*} āha, nanu tṛtīyāśravaṇāt parārthena śākhoccāraṇena bhavituṃ nyāyyam. ucyate, bhaved etan nyāyyam, yadi nirjñātakālā śākhā syāt, tataḥ prastarasya kālaparicchedāya kīrtyamānā parārthā uccāryeta, iha punar etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8255: viparītam, nirjñātakālaḥ prastaro 'nirjñātakālā śākhā. tasmāt saty api
GSP28msbh1-7u:8256: tṛtīyāśravaṇe prastara eva śākhāyāḥ kālaṃ paricchetsyati. yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8258: tṛtīyānirdiṣṭā{*4/169*}, tathā prastaraḥ. sāmarthyaṃ hi balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8265: āha, nanu guṇabhāve 'pi dvitīyā bhavati{*4/170*}, yathā saktu mārutaikakapāleṣu{*4/171*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8269: na, tasyānadhikārād arthasya ca kṛtatvāt // MS_4,2.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8270: naitat saktvādibhis tulyam, tasya saktvāder anyatrānadhikārāt, iha ca śākhayānyasyārthasya kṛtatvād vatsāpākaraṇādeḥ. āha, nanu punaruktam etat
GSP28msbh1-7u:8271: saktvādīnāṃ pradarśanaṃ samādhiś ceti. ucyate, na punaruktatā mahān doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8273: punaruktaṃ necchanti. arthāgrahaṇāt tu{*4/173*} bibhyataḥ punar{*4/174*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8274: punar abhidhīyamānaṃ bahu manyanta eva. kiṃ cintāyāḥ prayojanam? yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:8275: arthakarma, paurṇamāsyām api śākhotpādyā, atha pratipattir notpādayitavyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8280: utpattyasaṃyogāt praṇītānām ājyavad vibhāgaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8281: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - apaḥ praṇayaty āpo vai śraddhā śraddhām
GSP28msbh1-7u:8282: evālabhya yajata iti{*4/176*}, ubhayatra ca praṇītānāṃ vyāpāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8283: praṇītābhir{*4/177*} havīṃṣi saṃyautīti, tathā, antarvedi praṇītā ninayatīti. atra{*4/178*} saṃdehaḥ, kim ubhayam āsāṃ prayojakaṃ saṃyavanaṃ ninayanaṃ ca, uta saṃyavanārthānāṃ ninayanaṃ pratipattir iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8284: utpattisaṃyogo nāsāṃ kenacit prayojanena, ubhābhyām utpannānāṃ saṃyogaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8285: tasmān na gamyate viśeṣaḥ, agamyamāne viśeṣe ubhayārthānāṃ vibhāgo 'yam,
