GSP28msbh1-7u:8286: kaścid yāgaḥ{*4/179*} saṃyavane kaścin ninayana iti, ājyavat, yathā sarvasmai vā etad yajñāya gṛhyate yad dhruvāyām ājyam iti{*4/180*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8289: *{4/177: E2: praṇītānām utpannānāṃ vyāpāraḥ śrūyate, praṇītābhir}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8293: saṃyavanārthānāṃ vā pratipattir itarāsāṃ tatpradhānatvāt // MS_4,2.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8294: saṃyavanārthāḥ praṇītāḥ. kutaḥ? tṛtīyānirdeśāt, saṃyavane 'pāṃ guṇabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8295: dvitīyānirdeśāc ca ninayane prādhānyam. cintāyāḥ prayojanam, puroḍāśābhāve praṇītānām abhāvaḥ, yathā payasyāyām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8298: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - vāg vai devebhyo 'pākrāmat yajñāyātiṣṭhamānā sā vanaspatīn prāviśat saiṣā vāg vanaspatiṣu vadati. yā dundubhau yā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8299: ca{*4/182*} tūṇave yā ca{*4/183*} vīṇāyām, yad dīkṣitāya daṇḍaṃ{*4/184*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8300: prayacchati vācam evāvarundhe, krīte{*4/185*} some maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8302: udāharaṇam. tatra saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ dīkṣitadhāraṇe śeṣabhūtasya daṇḍasya maitrāvaruṇadhāraṇaṃ pratipattiḥ, athavārthakarmeti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8303: maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍadānaṃ pratipattiḥ. kutaḥ? dīkṣitadhāraṇe kṛtārthatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8305: pratipattir nyāyyā, yathā cātvāle kṛṣṇaviṣāṇāṃ prāsyatīti kaṇḍūyane śeṣabhūtāyāḥ prāsanaṃ pratipattiḥ, evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. dvitīyā ca daṇḍe vibhaktiḥ. tasmāt prādhānyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8315: arthakarma vā syāt. kutaḥ? kartṛsaṃyogāt, kartṛsaṃyogo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8316: maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍam iti kartṛdaṇḍasaṃyogo bhavati{*4/189*}, tasmiṃś ca daṇḍo guṇabhūtaḥ, puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūtaḥ. puruṣaṃ hi sa pracarituṃ samarthaṃ karoti. katham? yathā pūrvaṃ{*4/190*} tamo 'vagāhate 'paḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8317: sarpati{*4/191*} gāṃ ca sarpaṃ ca vārayati, avalambanaṃ ca bhavati. ataḥ puruṣaprādhānyān na pratipattiḥ. sragvac ca draṣṭavyam, yathā srajam udgātre dadāti [479]{*4/192*} ity{*4/193*} asaty apy upakāre puruṣasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8318: prayojanavattvāt, niṣprayojanatvāc ca srajaḥ, bhavati puruṣaprādhānyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8319: evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmān na pratipattir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8320: atha yad uktam - dvitīyāśravaṇād daṇḍaprādhānyam iti. ucyate, tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8321: yuktaṃ{*4/194*} cānīpsitam iti dvitīyā draṣṭavyā. kutaḥ? maitrāvaruṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8322: caturthīnirdeśāt. saṃpradāne hi caturthī bhavati, saṃpradānaṃ ca karmaṇābhipreyate. tatra daṇḍād abhipretataro maitrāvaruṇa iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8324: *{4/189: E1,6 und E2 (Fn.); E2 om. kartṛdaṇḍasaṃyogo bhavati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8330: daṇḍī praiṣān anvāhety anūdyate, tena pracarato daṇḍaṃ pradarśayati. tad arthakaramaṇi saty upapadyate. pratipattau tu daṇḍo maitrāvaruṇāya dattas tato 'pavṛjyeta, kṛtaṃ ca kartavyam iti na{*4/195*} tena prayojam iti na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8331: dhāryeta. tatraitaddarśanaṃ nopapadyate, tathā, ahis tvāṃ daśatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:8332: maitrāvaruṇaṃ brūyād ahir iva hy eṣa iti, tathā{*4/196*}, muśalyan vāheti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8333: muśalaśabdaś ca daṇḍe prasiddhaḥ, yathā kva nu khalu{*4/197*} muśalino māṇavakā gaṅgāṃ avatareyur{*4/198*} iti. tasmād apy arthakarma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8335: *{4/195: E2: 'pavṛjyeta. tatkarma kartavyaṃ ca kṛtam iti na}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8336: *{4/196: E2: iva yena draṣṭavya iti. tathā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8339: utpattau yena saṃyuktaṃ tadarthaṃ tac chrutihetutvāt tasyārthāntaragamane śeṣatvāt pratipattiḥ syāt // MS_4,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8340: yad uktam, yathā kṛṣṇaviṣāṇāprāsanam iti. tatrocyate, yuktaṃ tatrotpadyamānaṃ yat, yena prayojanena saṃbaddham utpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8341: [480]{*4/199*} tat tadartham eva nyāyyam. tasyānyatra gamane pratipattir
GSP28msbh1-7u:8342: ity etad upapadyate, yadi na dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ bhavati. iha tu dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8343: prayojanaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya dhāraṇae{*4/200*}, tasmād viṣamam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8344: athavā - adhikaraṇāntaram, viṣāṇāyāḥ kaṇḍūyanaṃ prāsanaṃ cobhayam api prayojakam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, ekaniṣpatteḥ sarvaṃ samaṃ syād iti. utttaraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8345: pakṣaḥ, kaṇḍūyane tṛtīyānirdeśād viṣāṇāyā guṇabhāvaḥ. prāsane ca dvitīyānirdeśāt, anyatra ca kṛtārthatvāt prādhānyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8350: abhyavapantīti{*4/201*}{*4/202*}. tatrāmnāyate, varuṇagṛhītaṃ vaitad yajñasya yadṛjīṣaṃ yadgrāvāṇa yadaunduvarī{*4/203*} yadabhiṣavaṇaphalake,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8351: tasmād yatkiṃcit somaliptaṃ dravyaṃ tenāvabhṛthaṃ yantīti{*4/204*}. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8352: saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ somaliptānāṃ dravyāṇām avabhṛthagamanaṃ pratipattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8353: athavārthakarmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? pratipattir iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8354: kṛtārthatvāt, kṛtārthāny etāni dravyāṇi tatra tatra, teṣām avabhṛthagamanaṃ pratipattir nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8361: arthakarma vā, abhidhānena saṃyogāt, tenāvabhṛthaṃ yantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8363: dvitīyāvabhṛtham iti. tasmāt somaliptaṃ guṇabhūtam, avabhṛthaḥ pradhānabhūta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8364: pratipattir vā tan nyāyatvād deśārthāvabhṛthaśrutiḥ // MS_4,2.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8365: pratipattir vā. kutaḥ? tannyāyatvād eva. eṣa hi nyāyaḥ, yad anyatra kṛtārtham anyatra pratipādyate, tad iha yadi somaliptaṃ dravyam avabhṛthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8366: karaṇaṃ vidhīyate, tato 'rthakarma. atha somaliptena yānaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8367: tataḥ pratipattiḥ. na hy atra somaliptaṃ vidhīyate 'vabhṛthe, tathā saty avabhṛthasomaliptasaṃbandho 'bhyavayantīty anenākhyātena vidhīyeta. tatra vākyena vidhānaṃ syāt, na tu śrutyā, yāne 'munā śrutyā vidhānam. tat parigṛhītaṃ bhavati, śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8368: tasmāt pratipattiḥ. atha yad uktam, arthakarmābhidhānena saṃyogād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8369: tatra brūmaḥ, evaṃ sati deśārthā avabhṛthaśrutiḥ, avabhṛthaṃ yantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8370: avabhṛthena deśaṃ lakṣayati, yasmin deśe 'vabhṛthaḥ, taṃ deśaṃ yantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8375: idaṃ śrūyate - paśubandhasya yajñakratoḥ ṣaḍ ṛtvijaḥ{*4/206*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8377: yajñakratūnāṃ{*4/208*} pañca ṛtvijaḥ{*4/209*}, agnihotrasya yajñakrator eka ṛtvik{*4/210*}, saumyasyādhvarasya yajñakratoḥ saptadaśa
GSP28msbh1-7u:8378: ṛtvijaḥ{*4/211*}, tathā, same darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta, prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta, paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā [482]{*4/212*} yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8379: amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayeti{*4/213*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ kartṛdeśakālā vidhīyante, utānūdyanta iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? kartṛdeśakālānām acodanam anuvādaḥ{*4/214*}. kutaḥ? prayoge nityasamavāyāt, prayoge nityasamavetā eta iti. na, ṛte kartṛdeśakālebhyaḥ, prayogaḥ sidhyati, tena prayogacodanayaiva prāptānām anuvādaḥ. nanu viṣamādipratiṣedhārtham etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8380: vacanaṃ bhaviṣyati. neti brūmaḥ, upadeśakam evaṃjātīyakaṃ vacanam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8392: ucyate, na caitad asty anuvāda iti, anuvādamātram anarthakam. yadi vidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8393: evam apūrvam arthaṃ prakariṣyati, tasmād vidhir iti. nanu prayogāṅgatvāt prāpta eveti. ucyate, niyamārthā śrutir bhaviṣyati. ko 'yaṃ niyamaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8394: aniyatasya niyatatā, prayogāṅgatayā sarve deśāḥ prāpnuvanti, na tu samuccayena. yadā samaḥ, an tadā viṣamaḥ, yadā viṣamaḥ, na tadā samaḥ. sa eṣa samaḥ prāptaś cāprāptaś ca, yadā na prāptaḥ, sa pakṣo vidhiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8395: prayojayati. ato viṣamacikīrṣāyām api samo vidhīyate. tasmād viṣamasyāprāptir vidhau sati bhavatīti samo vidhīyate. evam itareṣv api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8398: adhikaraṇapradeśo 'yam{*4/215*}. idam āmamanti - vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta
GSP28msbh1-7u:8399: bhūtikāmaḥ{*4/216*}. tathā, somāraudraṃ ghṛte caruṃ nirvapec chuklānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ brahmavarcaskāmaḥ{*4/217*}, tathā, nairṛtaṃ caruṃ nirvapet
GSP28msbh1-7u:8400: kṛṣṇānāṃ vrīhīṇām iti{*4/218*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ śvetādivarṇo vidhīyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:8401: utānūdyate, utānūdyata iti. kiṃ prāptam? anūdyate, dravyaśrutigṛhītatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8402: vidhir vā, pakṣe prāptasya niyamārtha{*4/219*} iti. pakṣoktaṃ prayojanam ubhayor apy adhikaraṇayoḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8410: ayam apy adhikaraṇāpradeśaḥ. darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - vrīhīn avahanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8411: taṇḍulān pinaṣṭīti, tat kim, imau vidhī, utānuvādāv iti. saṃśaye
GSP28msbh1-7u:8412: 'rthaprāptatvāt, anuvādāv iti prāpte, niyamārthatvād vidhī iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8414: śeṣaviniyoga uktaḥ, kiṃ tat pradhānam, yasyaite śeṣā iti. ucyate, yajati dadāti juhotīty evaṃlakṣaṇam. atha kiṃlakṣaṇako yajatijuhotir{*4/220*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8415: dadātiś ceti. yajaticodanā, tāvad dravyadevatākriyam, dravyaṃ devatā ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8416: tasya dravasya kriyā, yayā{*4/221*} tayoḥ{*4/222*} saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:8417: bhavati{*4/223*}. samudāye, samuditeṣv eṣu{*4/224*} yajatiśabdo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8418: loke, iṣṭo 'nena paśupatir iti. tena manyāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8420: kriyata iti. lakṣaṇakarmaṇi prayojanaṃ na vaktavyam, jñānam evātra prayojanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8424: *{4/222: E2: dravyaṃ devatām uddiśya tyajyate, tasya ca kriyā, yathā kriyayā tayoḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8425: *{4/223: E1 gibt yayā tayoḥ saṃbandho bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8426: *{4/224: E1 gibt samuditeṣv eṣu in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8427: tadukte śravaṇāj juhotir āsecanādhikaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8428: atha kiṃlakṣaṇako juhotir iti. tad ukte yajaty ukte 'rthe{*4/226*} juhotiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8429: śrūyate, āsecanādhike. tasmād yajatir evāsecanādhiko juhotiḥ, hutam anenety evaṃjātīyake vaktāro bhavanti loke. vede 'pi yajaticoditaṃ juhotinānuvadati - saṃgrāmiṇaṃ caturhotrā yājayet, caturgṛhītam ājyaṃ kṛtvā caturhotāraṃ vyācakṣīta, pūrveṇa graheṇārdhaṃ juhuyād uttareṇārdham
GSP28msbh1-7u:8431: atha dadātiḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaka iti. ātmanaḥ svatvavyāvṛttiḥ parasya svatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:8432: saṃbandhaḥ. yajatidadātijuhotiṣu sarveṣūtsargaḥ samānaḥ. tatra yajatir devatām uddiśyotsargamātram, juhotir āsecanādhikaḥ, dadāti{*4/227*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8433: utsargapūrvakaḥ parasvatvena saṃbandha ity eṣa eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8435: *{4/226: E1 gibt yajaty ukte 'rthe in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8437: vidheḥ karmāpavargitvād arthāntare vidhipradeśaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8438: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yad ātithyāyāṃ barhiḥ, tad upasadām, tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8439: agnīṣomīyasyeti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ paradravyasyopadeśaḥ, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:8440: niriṣṭikasya{*4/229*}, athavā dharmavidhipradeśaḥ, athavā dravyasādhāraṇyam iti. kiṃ prāptam? paradravyasyopadeśaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8441: paradravyasyopadeśasadṛśaḥ śabdaḥ, yad ātithyāyām, tad upasadām iti, yathā yo devadattasya gauḥ, sa viṣṇumitrasya kartavya iti devadattād ācchidya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8442: viṣṇumitrāya dīyata iti. ataḥ paradravyasyopdeśa iti. na caitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8443: tathā saty ātithyāyāṃ tasya vidhānaṃ yat pūrvam, tad anarthakaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8444: evaṃ tarhi niriṣṭikasyopadeśaḥ{*4/230*}, tenātithyāyāṃ yad vihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8445: ātithyāyāṃ yad upāttam iti, tathā saty arthavad ātithyāyāṃ tad vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8446: niriṣṭikena{*4/231*} tūpasadaḥ kartavyā bhavanti{*4/232*}. na caiṣa śiṣṭānām ācāraḥ. na ca sarve codakaprāptā dharmā bhaveyuḥ, ato brūmaḥ -
GSP28msbh1-7u:8447: vidheḥ karmāpavargitvād arthāntare vidhipradeśaḥ syāt. tad barhiḥ parisamāptāyām ātithyāyām apavṛktam, pūrvaṃ{*4/233*} tad ātithyāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8448: upasatkāle{*4/234*} ātithyāsaṃbandhas tasya nāsti. bhūtapūrveṇātithyayā karmaṇā lakṣyeta. lakṣaṇā[486]{*4/235*}śabdaś ca na nyāyyaḥ. tasmād ātithyābarhiṣa āñjasyābhāvād yad dharmakamātithyābarhiḥ, tad dharmakam upasadām agnīṣomīyasya ceti nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8457: api veti pakṣo vyāvartate. utpattisaṃyoga evaiṣo 'sya barhiṣaḥ. yadi hy utpannam ātithyāyāṃ barhir viśiṣṭaṃ syāt, tasya dharmā aupasade barhiṣy
GSP28msbh1-7u:8458: atidiśyeran, na tu tad asti kenacid vākyena. evaṃ{*4/236*} prakṛtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8459: barhiṣo viśeṣo vakṣyate. āśvavālaḥ prastaraḥ, vidhṛtī caikṣavyāv iti. tena na paravihitaṃ barhir ucyate, na niriṣṭikam{*4/237*}, na kutaścid dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8460: pratidiśyante. kiṃ tarhi? sādhāraṇam amīṣāṃ barhir ucyate, yad ātithyāyāṃ vidhīyate, tad evopasadām, agnīṣomīyasya ca vidhīyata iti, aviśiṣṭānāṃ barhiṣā saṃyoga ekena sarveṣām, yad ādau barhir lūyate, tal lavanaṃ sarveṣām arthena, sādhāraṇo barhiṣaḥ prayogaḥ. evaṃ śrutiḥ śabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8461: parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati, itarathā dharmalakṣaṇā bhavet, śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt trayāṇāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ barhir iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8466: dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syāt // MS_4,3.1
GSP28msbh1-7u:8467: yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavati, sa chandasām eva rasenāvadyati, sarasā asyāhutayo bhavanti. yasya parṇamayī juhūr bhavati, na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8468: śṛṇotīti. yasyāśvatthy upabhṛd bhavati, brahmaṇaivāsyānnam avarundhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8469: yasya vaikaṅkatī dhruvā bhavati, praty evāsyāhutayas tiṣṭhanti. atho praiva jāyate, yasyaivaṃrūpāḥ sruvā{*4/239*} bhavanti, sarvāṇy evainaṃ rūpāṇi paśūnām upatiṣṭhante, nāsyāparūpam ātman jāyata iti{*4/240*}. tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8470: jyotiṣṭomasaṃskāre{*4/241*} phalaśrutiḥ, yadāṅkte cakṣur eva bhrātṛvyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8471: vṛṅkte{*4/242*}, tathā, keśaśmaśrū vapate, dato dhāvate, nakhāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:8472: nikṛntati, snāti, mṛtā vā eṣā tvag amedhyaṃ vāsyaitad ātmani śamalaṃ tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8473: evopahate medhya eva medham evam upaiti{*4/243*}. karmaṇi phalaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8474: abhīṣū vā etau yajñasya yad ādhārau, cakṣuṣī vā etau yajñasya yad ājyabhāgau{*4/244*}, yat prayājānuyājā ijyante, varma vā etad yajñasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8476: atra saṃdehaḥ, kim ime phalavidhayaḥ, utārthavādā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8477: phalavidhayaḥ, pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvāt phala[488]{*4/246*}vidheḥ, yathā khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kūryāt, pālāśaṃ brahmavarcaskāmasya, bailvam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8478: annādyakāmasyeti{*4/247*}. yathaite phalavidhayaḥ, evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8479: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ. phalārthavādā iti. kutaḥ? parārthatvāt, kratvarthāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:8480: etāni. juhūḥ pradāne guṇabhūtāḥ, upabhṛd upadhāraṇe, sruvā{*4/248*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8481: ājyadhāraṇe, añjanavapanādi ca yajamāne, āghārāv ājyabhāgau prayājānuyājāś
GSP28msbh1-7u:8482: cāgneyādiṣu. yadi phale 'pi guṇabhāvaḥ syāt, anyatropadiṣṭānām anyatra punar guṇabhāva upadiṣṭa iti pratijñāyeta. na caitan nyāyyam, parārthatā hi guṇabhāvaḥ, kratvarthā caiṣāṃ śabdena, juhvā juhoti juhvā homam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8483: abhinirvartayatīti{*4/249*}, evaṃ sarvatra. tasmān naite puruṣārthāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8494: *{4/249: E2 gibt juhvā homam abhinirvartayati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8496: athocyeta - puruṣam api prati guṇabhāva upadiṣṭaḥ, yasya parṇamayī juhūr
GSP28msbh1-7u:8497: bhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotītyevamādibhir vākyair iti. tac ca na.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8499: juhvāpāpaślokaśravaṇaṃ{*4/251*} kriyata iti na{*4/252*} kaścic chabda āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8500: etāvac chrūyate, yasyāsau bhavati, na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotīti, etāvad atra śabdena gamyate, yasyaivaṃlakṣaṇā{*4/253*} juhūḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8501: tasyāpāpaślokaśravaṇam iti. tatra juhvā tat kriyate, juhūr vā tadartheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8503: nanv anumānād etad gamyate, dhruvaṃ pālāśyā juhvā tat kriyate, yatas tasyāṃ satyāṃ tad bhavatīti. atrocyate, na, evaṃjātīyakaṃ kāryakāraṇatve 'numānaṃ bhavati, kāryakāraṇasaṃbandho nāma sa bhavati, yasmin sati yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8504: bhavati, yasmiṃś cāsati yan na bhavati, tatraiva kāryakāraṇasaṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8505: iha tu tadbhāve [489]{*4/254*} bhāvo jñātaḥ, nābhāve 'bhāvaḥ. yasya pālāśī na bhavati tasyāpāpaślokaśravaṇaṃ nāstīti, na, evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8506: tena na, niyogato 'vagamyate, tenedaṃ kriyata iti, lakṣaṇam etat puruṣasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8508: api ca, yasyāpi juhūḥ pālāśī bhavati, tasyāpi pāpaślokaśravaṇaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8509: katham avagamyate? pratyakṣataḥ. nanv evaṃ saty agnihotreṇāpi phalaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8510: sādhyeta. na{*4/255*} hutāmātreṇa phalaṃ dṛśyata iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, na hi tatrocyate, tāvataiva phalaṃ bhavatīti. iha tu vartamānāyāṃ juhūsattāyāṃ vartamānasya pāpaślokaśravaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ. tasmān na tatrānumānam, idaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8511: kāryam, idaṃ kāraṇam iti. agnihotrādiṣu tu śabdenaiva kāryakāraṇasaṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:8512: ucyate. tasmāt tatra tatkāle 'dṛśyamāne 'pi phale, kālāntare phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti gamyate, na tv evaṃjātīyakeṣu, tasmān naivaṃjātīyakebhyaḥ phalam astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8513: nanu yasya pālāśī juhūr bhavati, na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇotīty evam ukte tat eva tat phalaṃ bhavatīti gamyate, tasmād ihāpi kālāntare phalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8514: bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, satyaṃ gamyate, pramāṇaṃ tatra kim iti vicārayāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8515: na tāvat pratyakṣam, nānumānam, netarad dṛṣṭaviṣayam upamānādi, no khalv api śabda ity etad uktam, vākyārtho 'pi padārthopajanito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8516: nānyathā, tad uktam - tadbhūtānām kriyārthena samāmnāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8518: laukikeṣu tu vākyeṣv athaivaṃ{*4/258*} gamyate, tāni hi vijñāte 'rthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8519: prayujyamānāny adhyāhāryapadāni gauṇāni vipariṇatavyavahitārthāni ca prayujyante. tasmāt tatsādṛśyād vacanāvagamyeṣv apy artheṣu bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:8521: [490]{*4/259*} api ca, vartamānāpadeśo 'yam, na ca, ayam artho vartamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8522: tasmān na khādirasruvādisadbhāve tatphalaṃ bhavet. tad evam āpatati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8523: khādirādau sati bhavati tatphalaṃ nāpi bhavati, asaty api bhavati vā na veti. naivaṃ vijñāyate, kutas tatphalam iti. tasmād evaṃjātīyakeṣūccariteṣu na kvacit pravṛttir na kutaścin nivṛttir ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:8524: ānarthakyam akriyārthatvāt. arthavāde tu sati bhavati prayojanaṃ khadirādeḥ, sruvādiṣu karmārtheṣu prayojanavatsu. yady eṣāṃ kratuṃ prati prayojanavattā na syāt, tata etad eva phalaṃ kasyācic chabdavṛttyā bhaved vā na veti vicāryeta. sati tu pārārthye naiva kācic chabdapravṛttir
GSP28msbh1-7u:8525: āśrayituṃ śakyate. kaimarthye hi sā kalpyeta. tasmād evaṃjātīyakā arthavādāḥ, arthavādatve cāvartamāne lakṣaṇayā vartamānaśabdaḥ praśaṃsārtha upapatsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8536: atha yad uktam, yathā, khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kuryāt, bailvam annādyakāmasya pālāśaṃ brahmavarcasakāmasyeti, yuktaṃ teṣu, vidhivibhaktiḥ kuryād iti vīryakhādirasaṃbandhasya vidhātrī, na ca vartamānāpadeśinī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8537: tasmāt tatrāvirodha iti. evaṃ hi padavākyārthanyāyavidaḥ ślokam āmananti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:8538: kuryāt, kriyeta, kartavyam, bhavet, syād iti pañcamam/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8540: vidhivibhaktiṃ hi vidhāyikāṃ liṅgaṃ manyamānāḥ ślokam imaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8541: samāmananti{*4/260*}. asti cātra vidhivibhaktiḥ. tasmād anupavarṇanam etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8545: naimittike vikāratvāt kratupradhānam anyat syāt // MS_4,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8546: asti jyotiṣṭome naimittikam, bārhadgiraṃ brāhmaṇasya brahmasāma kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8547: pārthur aśmāṃ{*4/262*} rājanyasya, rāyovājīyaṃ vaiśyasyeti, tathāgnau
GSP28msbh1-7u:8548: naimittikam, sāhasraṃ prathamaṃ cinvānaś cinvīta, dvisāhasraṃ dvitīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8549: trisāhasraṃ tṛtīyam iti{*4/263*}, tathā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8550: godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayet, kāṃsyena brahmavarcasakāmasya, mārtikena pratiṣṭhākāmasyety etāni naimittikāni. teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kim etāny eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:8551: naimittikāni nityārthe, utānyat tatra tatra{*4/264*} nityārtha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8552: kiṃ prāptam etāny eveti. kutaḥ? atra brahmasāmādibhir avaśyaṃ bhavitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8553: coditāni hi tāni, saṃnihitāni sādhanāny ākāṅkṣanti. na ca, eṣāṃ santi vihitāni sādhanāni, samīpataś ca naimittikāny upanipatanti, taiḥ prakṛtaiḥ saṃnihitair etāni nirākāṅkṣīkriyanta ity etan nyāyyam. katham? naimittikaṃ hi saṃnihitam, vākyād avagamyate nānyac chrūyate, yāvāṃś ca śrutasyotsarge
GSP28msbh1-7u:8555: āha, nanu nimittārthāni tāni prakṛtāni. ucyate, naiṣa doṣaḥ, anyārtham api prakṛtam anyena saṃbadhyate, yathā, śālyarthaṃ kulyāḥ praṇīyante, tābhyaś ca pānīyaṃ pīyate, upaspṛśyate ca. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam. athavā, asty
GSP28msbh1-7u:8556: evātrāvāntaravākyam, yathā, godohanena praṇayed iti, tad akāmasaṃbaddhaṃ godohanena praṇayanaṃ prāpayati. na ca śakyaṃ śrutam utsraṣṭum. yo 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:8557: ayam, [492]{*4/265*} paśukāmasyeti śabdaḥ, sa paśukāmasaṃbandhaṃ śaknuyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:8558: kartum, nāvāntaravākyasyārthaṃ nivārayitum, na ca gamyamānam, vinā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8559: kāraṇena, avivakṣitam iti śakyaṃ vaditum. bhavanti ca dviṣṭhāni{*4/266*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8560: vākyāni, yathā, śveto dhāvati, alambusānāṃ yāteti. tasmān naimittikāny eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:8562: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, naimittike śrūyamāṇe kratvartham anyat syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8563: kutaḥ? vikāratvād viśeṣe śrutatvād ity arthaḥ{*4/267*}. viśeṣe hi tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:8564: naimittikaṃ śrūyate, tad asati tasmin viśeṣe na bhavitum arhati. yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8565: uktam, avaśyakartavyānīti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, avaśyaṃ kartavyatvāt kariṣyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8566: yat tu nānyad eṣāṃ vihitaṃ sādhanam iti, sāmānyavihitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8567: doṣaḥ. kiṃ tat? abhīvarto brahmasāma, aṣṭādaśamantragato 'gniḥ, vāraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8568: praṇayanapātram. atha yad uktam, saṃnihitaiḥ prakṛtair naimittikair
GSP28msbh1-7u:8569: brahmasāmādīni saṃbhatsyanta iti. neti brūmaḥ, na hi bārhadgirādīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8570: prakaraṇam. athocyeta, prakṛtaiḥ stotrādibhiḥ saṃbadhyanta iti, etad api nopapadyate. yady api prakṛtāni nityāni stotrādīni, tathāpi vākyena nimittasaṃyoge śrūyante bārhadgirādīni, vākyaṃ ca prakaraṇād balīyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8571: yad uktam, saṃnidhānād vākyād avagato 'yam artha iti. na, evaṃjātīyako vākyārthaḥ sāmānyaṃ padārthaṃ{*4/268*} bādhitum arhati. nimittasaṃyoge hi bārhadgirādīnām arthavattā. tasmāt tatra tatrānyan naimittikād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8572: atha yad uktam, avāntaravākyena godohanam api prāpitaṃ na śakyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8574: dviṣṭhaṃ hi tad bhavatīti. ucyate, kāraṇād avivakṣitam. kiṃ kāraṇam? na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8575: hi, idaṃ yugapad bhavati, paripūrṇena cārthābhidhānam avāntaravākyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:8576: ceti. katham? praṇayatīti prapūrve nayatau vidhivibhaktiḥ svapadagatam arthaṃ śrutyā vidadhāti, praṇayanādisaṃbaddham api godohanādi śrutyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8577: vākyena ca. vastu phalasya godohanādeś ca saṃbandhaḥ. sa hitvā śrutyartham, kevalena vākyena. atha praṇayanasya godohanādisaṃbandham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8578: godohanādeś ca phalena saṃbandhaṃ vadatīty ucyate. na{*4/271*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:8579: dvyarthābhidhānād bhidyeta nitarāṃ vākyam, na caitan nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8580: yat tu, śveto dhāvatītyevamādi, bhavet tatra viśeṣānavagamād
GSP28msbh1-7u:8581: ubhayārthāvagatiḥ. iha tu gamyate viśeṣaḥ kamipadoccāraṇam, sa iha śrauto
GSP28msbh1-7u:8582: 'rthaḥ. manyeta, yadi godohanādeḥ kriyāsaṃbandho vivakṣyate, kamipadaṃ pramādo bhavet. na cāyaṃ pramādaḥ, naivāvāntaravākyārthe vivakṣite kamipadasaṃbandho 'vakalpate. tasmān na dviṣṭhaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8583: godohanādikamisaṃbandha evātrābhidhīyate, na nityakārye bhavitum arhatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8590: *{4/267: E1 gibt viśeṣe śrutatvād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8592: *{4/269: E1 gibt avivakṣitaṃ kalpayitum in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8595: agnihotre śrūyate, dadhnā juhotīti, punaś ca, dadhnendriyakāmasya juhuyād iti. tathāgnīṣomīye paśāv āmnāyate, khādire badhnātīti, punaś ca, khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kuryād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim atrāpy anyan
GSP28msbh1-7u:8596: nityārtham, [494]{*4/272*} uta naimittikam eveti. kiṃ prāptam? pūrveṇa nyāyenānyad iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ekasyobhayatve nityatve naimittikatve ca{*4/273*} saṃyogapṛthaktvaṃ kāraṇam. tad iha saṃyogapṛthaktvam asti, ekaḥ saṃyogo dadhnā juhotīti, eko
GSP28msbh1-7u:8597: dadhnendriyakāmasyeti, tathaikaḥ, khādire badhnātīti, aparaḥ, khādiraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8598: vīryakāmasyeti. tasmān nityārthe kāmāya ca dadhikhādirādīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8600: *{4/273: E1 gibt nityatve naimittikatve ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8602: iti cet paśyasi, kasmān na pūrvasyāyam api śeṣo bhavati? yad etad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8603: dadhnā juhoti, khādire badhnātīti, tasyaiva tu dadhnaḥ phalam indriyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8604: tathā khādirasya vīryam. tac cedaṃ caikaṃ vākyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8606: naitad evam, pṛthag etāv arthau, yaś ca dadhihomasaṃyogaḥ, yaś ca dadhīndriyasaṃyogaḥ, tathā khādirasya badhnātinā saṃyogo vīryeṇa ca. dvāv etāv arthau, dvāv api ca vidhitsitau, arthaikatvāc caikaṃ vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8608: juhotisamabhi[495]{*4/274*}vyāhṛtā vidhivibhaktiḥ, asaṃbhave śrautasya homavidhānasya{*4/275*}, guṇaṃ samabhivyāhṛtaṃ vidhātum arhati, tad asaṃbhave guṇaphalasaṃbandham. tatra hy atyantāya śrutir utsṛṣṭā vākyānurodhena syāt, na ca yugapat saṃbhavāsaṃbhavau saṃbhavataḥ. tasmād yad eva naimittikaṃ tad eva nityārtham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8611: dravyāṇāṃ tu kriyārthānām saṃskāraḥ kratudharmaḥ syāt // MS_4,3.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8612: jyotiṣṭome samāmananti - payovrataṃ brāhmaṇasya, yavāgū rājanyasya, āmikṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8613: vaiśyasyeti{*4/276*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim ayaṃ puruṣadharmaḥ, uta krator iti. prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyena viniyuktaḥ puruṣasyeti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, puruṣāṇāṃ kriyārthānāṃ śarīradhāraṇārtho balakaraṇārthaś cāyaṃ saṃskāro vrataṃ nāma, sa kratudharmo bhavitum arhati, prakaraṇānugrahāya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8614: nanu vākyāt puruṣadharma iti. neti brūmaḥ, tathā sati phalaṃ kalpyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8615: kḹptam itaratra. prayogavacanenopasaṃhṛtaṃ hi tatpradhānasya. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:8620: atha puruṣasaṃyogaḥ kim arthaḥ? vyavasthāpanārtha iti brūmaḥ, payovrataṃ jyotiṣṭomasya bhavati, tat tu brāhmaṇakartṛkasyaiva, nānyakartṛkasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8624: codanāyāṃ phalāśruteḥ karmamātraṃ vidhīyeta na hy aśabdaṃ pratīyate //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8625: idam āmananti, tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyuḥ karotīti{*4/279*}, tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8626: sarvebhyo vā eṣa devebhyaḥ sarvebhyaś chandobhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhya ātmānam āgurate, yaḥ satrāyāgurate, sa viśvajitātirātreṇa sarvapṛṣṭhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:8628: bhavati saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ niṣphalam etat karmamātram, uta saphalam iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8629: prāptam? niṣphalam iti. kutaḥ? phalāśruteḥ, śabdapramāṇake karmaṇy evaṃjātīyake. na hy aśabdaṃ pratīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8630: nanu vaidikāni karmāṇi phalavanti bhavantīty evam uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8631: phaladarśanāt tāni phalavantīty uktam, na vaidikatvāt. evaṃ tarhi kartavyatāvagamāt phalavantīty adhyavasyāmaḥ, sukhaphalaṃ hi kartavyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8632: bhavatīti. ucyate, pratyakṣaviruddham evaṃjātiyakasya kartavyatvam, sākṣād dhi tad duḥkhaphalam agacchāmaḥ. na caivaṃjātīyakaṃ pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8633: vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati, yathāmbuni majjanty alābūni, śilāḥ plavante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8634: pāvakaḥ śīta iti. api ca, anumānād atra sukhaphalatā, yasmāt kartavyam ataḥ sukhaphalam iti, pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ. tasmān niṣphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8635: evaṃ hy atra phalaṃ kalpyeta, yady etat phalavat, evam upadeśo 'rthavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:8636: bhavatīti. ucyate, kāmaṃ vākyam anarthakam iti nyāyyaṃ vacanaṃ bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8637: bhavanti hy anarthakāny api vacanāni, [497]{*4/281*} daśa dāḍimāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8638: ṣaḍapūyā{*4/282*} ity evaṃjātīyakāni. nanu viśvajidvyāpāraḥ sukhaphala
GSP28msbh1-7u:8639: iti. uttaram{*4/283*}, sukhaphalaṃ hi bhavaty apūrvam, na vyāpāraḥ, na cāyam apūrvasya kartavyatām āha, phalakartavyatāyāṃ hi satyāṃ tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8640: avagamyate, vākyārthaś ca phalasya kartavyatām āha, na padārthaḥ. na cātra phalasaṃbaddhaṃ vākyam asti. tasmān nāyam apūrvasya vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8641: vyāpāramātram eva{*4/284*} vidadhāti, sa ca vyāpāro na tadātve sukhaphalaḥ, nāpy āyatyām, bhaṅgitvāt. tatrāpūrvaṃ kalpayitvā phalam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8642: avagamyeta, phalaṃ ca kalpayitvāpūrvam. evam itaretarāśrayaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8643: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na{*4/285*} prakalpante. tasmān niṣphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8644: āha, adhyāhariṣyāmahe phalavacanam{*4/286*}. ucyate, na śakyaṃ paripūrṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:8645: vākye 'dhyāhartum, paripūrṇaṃ hīdaṃ vākyam, viśvajidyāgaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8646: na, kiṃcit padam asti sākāṅkṣam, yenādhyāhṛtya phalaṃ saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8648: kṣemo 'yam, yathā gacchatu bhavān aneneti. paripūrṇam evedaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8649: nādhyāhāram arhati vipralambhakakartṛkam{*4/289*}, evam idam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:8650: paripūrṇaṃ vākyaṃ nādhyāhāram arhati. api ca, adhyāhriyamāṇenaivedaṃ vākyaṃ saṃbadhyeta, viśvajidyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ, idaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8651: dvāv imāv arthau, ekārthaṃ ca vākyaṃ samadhigatam. tasmād anarthakam evaṃjātīyakaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8663: api vāmnānasāmarthyāc codanārthena gamyetārthānāṃ hy arthavattvena vacanāni pratīyante 'rthato hy asamārthānām ānantarye 'py asaṃbandhas tasmāc chrutyekadeśaḥ saḥ // MS_4,3.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8664: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. na caitad asti, aphalam iti, phalacodanā, arthena
GSP28msbh1-7u:8665: gamyeta. katamenārthena? kartavyatāvacanena. āha, nanu vyāpārasya pratyakṣaviruddhā kartavyatā. na vyāpārasyocyate. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8666: vyāpāreṇānyasya kasyacid iti, bhavati tenedānīṃ vākyaṃ sākāṅkṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8667: tatrādhyāhāro 'vakalpate, bhavati cādhyāhāreṇāpi kalpanā, yathā dvāraṃ dvāram ity ukte, saṃvriyatām apāvriyatām iti{*4/291*}. kathaṃ punar avagamyate, ihādhyāhāreṇa kalpayitavyam iti. āmnānasāmarthyāt, evam idam āmnānam arthavad bhaviṣyati, śaknoti cārtham avagamayitum. tasmān
GSP28msbh1-7u:8669: nanu yat padam adhyāhriyate, tat pauruṣeyam, tenāvagataṃ cāpramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8670: ucyate, nāpūrvam adhyāhariṣyāmaḥ, vaidikenaivāsya, sahānyatra samāmnātena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8671: ekavākyatām adhyavasāmaḥ. āha, naivaṃ śakyam, antikād upanipatitaṃ hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:8672: padam{*4/292*}, vākyārtham upajanayitum alaṃ bhavati, na dūrād avatiṣṭhamānam. atrocyate, vyavahitam api hi, parāṇudya vyavadhāyakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8673: ānantaryeṇa manasi viparivartamānam alam eva bhavati viśeṣam upajanayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8675: itaḥ paśyasi dhāvantaṃ dūre jātaṃ vanaspatim/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8676: tvāṃ bravīmi viśālākṣi yā pinakṣi jarad gavam// [499]{*4/293*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8677: itaḥ{*4/294*} paśyasīti śabdo buddhau bhavati, saḥ dūre jātaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8678: vanaspatim{*4/295*}, etaiḥ padair vyavahitena jarad gavam ity anena śabdena vyavadhāyakāny apodya saṃbadhyamānaḥ saṃbadhyate, arthānāṃ hy arthavattvena hetunā vyavahitāny api vacanāni saṃbadhyante. yāni punar arthato hy asamarthāni, tāny ānantarye 'pi sati na paraspareṇa saṃbandham
GSP28msbh1-7u:8679: arhanti, yathā yā pinakṣi jarad gavam ityevamādīni. tasmān na pauruṣeyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8680: bhaviṣyati. āha, nanv atrāpy apekṣā pauruṣeyī. ucyate, nāpekṣā vede,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8681: vedārthapratipattāv abhyupāya eṣa bhavati, ananatarāpekṣāyām asaṃbhavantyām āmnānasāmarthyād itarāpekṣāvṛttir āśrīyate. tasmāc chruty ekadeśaḥ saḥ, phalakāmapadaṃ dūre 'pi sat tasya vākyasyaikadeśabhūtam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:8687: *{4/296: E1 gibt phalakāmapadaṃ dūre 'pi sat tasya vākyasyaikadeśabhūtam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8690: indrāya rājñe śūkara{*4/297*} iti{*4/298*} yathā vākyāntarasthena vidhiśabdena guṇavidhānaṃ bhavati, evaṃ phalavidhānam api bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:8691: arhatīti, yathā varuṇo vaitam agre pratyagṛhṇād iti{*4/299*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8699: tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyuḥ karotīti{*4/301*}. viśvajitā yajeteti phalavad
GSP28msbh1-7u:8700: evaṃvidhaṃ karmety etat samadhigatam. idaṃ tu saṃdihyate, kiṃ sarvaphalam etat karma, utaikaphalam iti. kiṃ prāptam? tat sarvārtham iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8701: anādeśāt, [500]{*4/302*} na kiṃcid ihātidiśyate, idaṃ nāma phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8702: asti cet, vijñāyeta. tasmāt sarvārtham aviśeṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8706: ekaṃ phalaṃ{*4/303*} syāt, na vā sarvārtham. kutaḥ? codanaikatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8707: sakāṅkṣatvād etad arthipadena saṃbadhyata ity uktam, yac cānekenāpi saṃbaddhuṃ śaknoti, tad ekena saṃbadhyate, ekena saṃbaddhaṃ san
GSP28msbh1-7u:8708: nirākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati, na tad apareṇāpi saṃbandham arhati. tasmād ekaiva kartavyatācodanā{*4/304*} nyāyyā, tasmād ekaphalateti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8712: sa svargaḥ syāt, sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt // MS_4,3.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8713: evaṃjātīyakeṣv evodāhāraṇeṣv{*4/305*} etat samadhigatam, ekaṃ phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8714: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate, kiṃ yatkiṃcit, uta svarga iti. yatkiṃcid iti prāptam, viśeṣānabhidhānāt, tata ucyate, sa svargaḥ syāt sarvān
GSP28msbh1-7u:8715: pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt, sarve hi puruṣāḥ svargakāmāḥ. kuta etat? prītir hi svargaḥ, sarvaś ca prītiṃ prārthayate. kim ataḥ? yady evam, aviśeṣavacanaḥ śabdo na viśeṣe vyavasthāpito bhaviṣyati, yajeta kuryād iti. tasmāt svargaphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8719: bhavati ca, anādiṣṭaphale karmaṇi svargaḥ phalam iti pratyayo loke, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:8720: ucyate, ārāmakṛd devadattaḥ, niyato 'sya svargaḥ. [501]{*4/306*} taḍāgakṛd
GSP28msbh1-7u:8721: devadattaḥ, niyato 'sya svarga iti. kim ataḥ? yady evam, ittham anena nyāyena svarge saṃpratyayo bhavati, yasmāt svargaphaleṣu karmasu
GSP28msbh1-7u:8722: kartavyeṣu phalavacanaṃ naivoccārayanti, gamyata eveti. tasmād apy avagacchāmaḥ, evaṃjātīyakeṣu svargaḥ phalam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8725: rātrīḥ prakṛtya śrūyate, pratitiṣṭhanti ha vaite, ya etā upayanti{*4/307*}. brahmavarcasvino 'nnādā bhavanti, ya etā upayantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8726: tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ te phalārthavādāḥ, uta phalavidhaya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8727: phalārthavādā iti kārṣājinir mene. kutaḥ? phalārthavādasarūpā ete śabdā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8728: iti. kiṃ sārūpyam? vidhivibhakter abhāvaḥ, aṅgavat{*4/308*}, yathā yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavati, sa chandasām eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:8730: *{4/307: E2: vā ya etā rātrīr upayanti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8733: phalamātreyo nirdeśād aśrutau hy anumānaṃ syāt // MS_4,3.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8734: ātreyaḥ punar ācārya evaṃjātīyakebhyaḥ, phalam astīti mene, na phalārthavāda iti. kutaḥ? aśrutaphalatve 'py amīṣām, phalacodanayā vākyaśeṣabhūtayā bhavitavyam. tasmād anyā vyavahitā satī, avyavahitā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8735: kalpanīyā, iyaṃ tv avyavahitā kḹptaiva, pratiṣṭhayā brahmavarcasasattayā ca samabhivyāhāra āsāṃ pratyakṣaḥ, vidhivibhaktimātram anyato 'pekṣyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8736: [502]{*4/310*} āha, kathaṃ kevalaṃ vidhivibhaktimātram anyato bhaviṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8737: yad anena pratiṣṭhādinā dhātvarthena saṃbhantsyata iti. ucyate, saha dhātvarthena bhaviṣyati, na kevalam. tasmād adoṣaḥ. athavā rātrīṇāṃ yā
GSP28msbh1-7u:8738: vidhāyikā vibhaktiḥ, sā imam api pratiṣṭhādiviśeṣaṃ vidhāsyati prayogavacanena, stutir vā saha pratiṣṭhādibhir vidhātrī bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8741: atha yad uktam, yathā yasya khādiraḥ sruvo bhavatītyevamādiṣu{*4/311*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8742: phalaśrutir arthavādo bhavati, evam ihāpi syād iti, yuktaṃ tatra phalārthavādaḥ, phalavidhyasaṃbhavāt, phalārthavādasaṃbavāc ca. tad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8743: dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syād iti{*4/312*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8747: kāmye karmaṇi nityaḥ svargo yathā yajñāṅge kratvarthaḥ // MS_4,3.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8748: kāmyāni karmāṇy udāharaṇam, sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāma
GSP28msbh1-7u:8749: ityevamādīnīti{*4/313*}{*4/314*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim eṣāṃ svargaḥ phalaṃ kāmaś ca, uta kāma eveti. kiṃ prāptam? kāmye karmaṇi nityaḥ svargaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8750: katham? sarvapuruṣārthābhidhāyī sāmānyavacanaḥ śabdo na viśeṣe 'vasthāpito
GSP28msbh1-7u:8751: bhavati, śakyate hy asya dūrasthenāpi svargakāmaśabdena saṃbandhaḥ. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8752: nanu viśeṣakaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate, brahmavarcasakāma iti. naiṣa viśeṣakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8753: upādhikara eṣaḥ, yathā kāṣṭhāny āhartuṃ prasthita ucyate, bhavatā śākam apy āhartavyam iti, kāṣṭhāharaṇe [503]{*4/315*} śākāharaṇam upādhiḥ kriyata iti. kim idam upādhiḥ kriyata iti. kāṣṭhāharaṇādhikārasamīpe dvitīyaṃ karmopadhīyate, sati kāṣṭhāharaṇe, idam aparaṃ kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8754: evam ihāpi svargaphale phalam aparam upadhīyate, brahmavarcasakāmo yāgena svargam abhinirvartayed iti. na hi tatra brahmavarcasaphalavacanaṃ svargaphalasya pratiṣedhakam, yathā yajñāṅge kratvarthaḥ, godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed iti. yaḥ paśukāmaḥ sa godohanena praṇayanam abhinirvartayed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8759: vīte ca kāraṇe, vītāyāṃ phalecchāyām avāpte vā phale samāptiniyamo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8760: dṛśyate, vṛṣṭikāmeṣṭyām, yadi varṣet tāvaty eva juhuyāt, yadi na varṣet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8761: śvobhūte juhuyād iti{*4/316*}. yadi na svargaḥ, kim arthaḥ samāptiniyamo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8766: kāmo vā phalaṃ bhavet, na svargaḥ, tatsaṃyogenāsya codanā bhavati, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8767: svargakāmasaṃyogena, ānumāniko 'sya svargakāmenaikavākyabhāvaḥ. pratyakṣas tu kāmavacanena, pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ. tasmāt kāma eva phalam iti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:8770: pratyakṣas tatra ṛtunā saṃyogaḥ, kāmena ca. yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syāt, sa godohanena praṇayanam abhinirvartayed iti. na tv atra pratyakṣaḥ śabdo 'sti, yo brahmavarcasakāmaḥ syāt, sa yāgena [504]{*4/318*} svargam abhinirvartayed iti. kathaṃ tarhi? yo brahmavarcasakāmaḥ syāt, sa tad yāgena nirvartayed iti. tasmān nāṅgavad bhavitum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8774: atha yad uktam, vītāyāṃ phalecchāyām, avāpte vā phale samāptiniyamo dṛśyata iti. tatra brūmaḥ, vīte niyamas tadartham, vīte niyamo bhavati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8792: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate, kiṃ sakṛt prayoge sarve kāmāḥ, uta paryāyeṇeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8793: kiṃ prāptam? sakṛt prayoge sarve kāmā iti. katham? sarveṣāṃ kāmānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsau nimittam, jyotiṣṭomaś ceti, nimittaṃ cet sarveṣāṃ kāmānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8794: ko 'tra khalu kāmo na bhaviṣyatīti. tasmād yaugapadyena sarve kāmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8797: na caitad asti, sarve yugapat kāmā iti, paryāyo yogasiddhiḥ, paryāyeṇa bhaveyuḥ kāmā iti. kutaḥ? arthasyotpattyasaṃyogitvāt, arthā ime kāmā nāma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8798: na sarva eva yugapad utpadyante, asaṃbhavo yugapad utpatteḥ sarveṣām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8799: virodhāt. athavā, utpattyasaṃyogitvād iti, na, kāmānām etad utpattivacanam, utpannānāṃ lakṣaṇatvena vacanam, ye sarve kāmās tebhyo darśapūrṇamāsau jyotiṣṭomaś ceti. na sarve kāmāḥ karmaṇaḥ śrūvante, ye sarve kāmās tebhyo hi karma vidhīyate. tasmān na kāmānāṃ sāhityaṃ gamyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8801: kāmyāni karmāṇy udāharaṇam, sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped

GSP28msbh1-7u:8805: kāmāḥ, aviśeṣāt, yathā svargaḥ, evam ime 'pi, na hy anantaranirvṛtte{*4/329*} karmaṇi phalam upalabhyate paśvādi, yac cānantaram upalabhyate, tat tata iti vijñāyate, yathā yatkālaṃ mardanam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8807: tasyāpy anyad eva kāraṇam asti pratyakṣam{*4/331*}, śarīragrahaṇasya tu nādṛṣṭādṛte kiṃcit kāraṇam asti. tasmād viśiṣṭendriyaśarīrādi phalaṃ

GSP28msbh1-7u:8925: itarasmin pakṣe kālo 'peyāt, lakṣaṇā cāsmin pakṣe syāt. tasmāt kṛte jātakarmaṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8926: atha kim antardaśāhe yasmin kasmin vāhani, uta svakāla iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8927: yasmin kasmin vāhanīti, evam aniyamaḥ prāptaḥ. atrocyate, paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā. kutaḥ? śruteḥ, evaṃ hi śrūyate, ya iṣṭvā{*4/357*} paśunā somena vā yajeta, sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā yajeteti. nātibhāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:8928: vacanasya, itarasmin pakṣe kālo 'peyāt. lakṣaṇāpy asmin pakṣe syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8929: anyasyāṃ tithāvantardaśāhe vā kurvan sarvāṇy aṅgāny upasaṃhartuṃ na śaknuyāt. kālaṃ śaucaṃ ca [514]{*4/358*} nopasaṃgṛhṇīyāt. tasmād atīte daśāhe paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kuryād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8935: agniṃ citvā sautrāmaṇyā yajeta{*4/359*}, vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeteti, aṅgaprayojanasaṃbandha ity uktam. etad idānīṃ saṃdihyate, kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8936: citamātre, tantramadhya eva kartavyam, uta svakāle kartavyam iti. tathā vājapeye kiṃ bṛhaspatisave, uta svakāla iti. mukhyakālatvam anayoḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8937: kutaḥ? pradhānākālatvād aṅgānām. eko hi kālaḥ pradhānānām aṅgānāṃ ceti
GSP28msbh1-7u:8938: vakṣyate{*4/360*}. aṅgāni tu vidhānatvāt pradhānenopadiśyerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8939: agnicayanaṃ kṛtvā na tāvaty eva sthātavyam, sautrāmaṇīsaṃjñako 'paro yāgaḥ kartavya iti. tathā vājapeyam abhinirvartya naitāvatā kṛtī syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8944: apavṛtte tu codanā tatsāmānyāt svakāle syāt // MS_4,3.41 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8945: apavṛtte yāge codyate yāgāntaram idam, apavṛttiś ca sarveṣu yāgāṅgeṣv akṛteṣu na bhavati. na yathā bhavān manyate, [515]{*4/361*} yāgamātre nirvṛtta iti. kutaḥ? karaṇavibhaktyā saṃyogāt, vājapeyeneṣṭyā vājapeyena phalasya vyāpāraṃ kṛtvā{*4/362*}, sāṅgena ca vyāpāro gamyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:8946: niraṅgena. bhavet tantramadhye prayogaḥ, vadi vājapeyam abhinirvartyetīpsitabhāvo vājapeyasya syāt, tataḥ pradhānamātraṃ vājapeyasaṃjñakam abhinirvartyeti gamyeta, na tv evam asti. tasmād yathoktāni sarvāṇy aṅgāni kṛtvety arthaḥ. evaṃ cet, nirvṛtte prayoge,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8947: atikrānte vājapeyakāle yāga prayujyate. tasya codanāsāmānyāj jyotiṣṭaumike
GSP28msbh1-7u:8948: vidhyante prāpte svena codakaprāptena kālena bhavitavyam. sautrāmaṇyāś
GSP28msbh1-7u:8950: āha, vājapeye tāvad iṣṭvetivacanād yāgam abhinirvartyeti gamyate, agnau tu nopapadyate. tatra citvetivacanāc cayanam abhinirvartyety arthaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8951: ucyate, naitad evam. agniṃ citveti hi śrūyate, agni cayanena saṃskṛtyety
GSP28msbh1-7u:8952: arthaḥ{*4/363*}. agnir iti jvalano 'bhidhīyate. na tasya sthalasthāpanamātram upakāraḥ, yadi sthalasthite yāgo bhavati, tataś cayanenāgner upakāro 'sti. tam abhinirvartyeti sthalasthite 'gnau yāgam abhinirvartyeti gamyate. yāvat sthalasthite 'gnau yāgo na bhavati, na tāvad agniś cayanenopakriyate. yenāgnir yajamānasyopakaroti, so 'gner
GSP28msbh1-7u:8953: upakāro na sthalasthāpanamātram. tasmāt tatrāpi yāgam abhinirvartyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:8956: *{4/362: E1 gibt vājapeyena phalasya vyāpāraṃ kṛtvā in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8957: *{4/363: E1 gibt agni cayanena saṃskṛtyety arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8959: santy anumatyādīny aiṣṭikāni karmāṇi, malhādayaḥ paśavaḥ, pavitrādayaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8960: somāḥ, valmīkavapāyāṃ homa ityevamādīni dārvihomikāni. tathā yaṣṭauhīṃ dīvyati, rājanyaṃ jināti, śaunaḥśepham{*4/365*} ākhyāpayati, abhiṣicyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:8961: iti, eteṣāṃ sannidhau śrūyate, rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti, sa eṣa rūpavatāṃ yāgānāṃ saṃnidhāv{*4/366*} arūpaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8962: samudāyavācakaḥ samadhigataḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ sarveṣām anumatyādīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8963: samudāyasya rājasūyaśabdo vācakaḥ, uta keṣāṃcid vācakaḥ keṣāṃcin neti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8964: prāptam? sarveṣāṃ vācaka iti. kutaḥ? prakaraṇaśabdasāmānyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8965: prakaraṇaśabdaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāno rājasūyeneti. rājā tatra sūyate, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:8966: rājasūyaḥ. rājño vā yajño rājasūyaḥ. tat prakaraṇasaṃnidhāne sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8967: viśeṣābhāve ca sarveṣāṃ vācako bhavitum arhati. yaś ca rājasūyaśabditas
GSP28msbh1-7u:8968: tataḥ phalaṃ bhavati. tasmāt sarvāṇi pradhānānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8972: api vāṅgam anijyāḥ syus tato viśiṣṭatvāt // MS_4,4.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8973: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. yā anijyās tā aṅgam, yathā videvanādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8974: rājasūyasaṃjñakena yāgena svārājyaṃ kuryād ity ucyamāne yāgenaiva svārājyaṃ sādhyate, nāyāgena. ayāgāś ca videvanādayaḥ. tasmād aṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ, ijyānāṃ phalavatīnāṃ śrūyamānā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8977: te kim abhiṣecanīyasyāṅgam, uta kṛtsnasya rājasūyasyeti saṃśayaḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8979: sarvāsāṃ vā samatvāc codanātaḥ syān na hi tasya prakaraṇaṃ deśārtham ucyate madhye // MS_4,4.4
GSP28msbh1-7u:8980: sarvāsāṃ cānumatyādīnāṃ codanānām aṅgaṃ videvanādi syāt. kutaḥ? codanātaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8981: samatvāt, samānā etā anumatyādyāś codanāḥ, tāḥ sarvāḥ phalavatyaś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:8982: pradhānabhūtāḥ. sarvāsām āsāṃ prakaraṇam, na hy abhiṣecanīyasya kevalasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8984: prakaraṇaṃ ca kramād balīyaḥ. tasmān nābhiṣecanīyasya kevalasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8985: abhiṣecanīyasya tu madhye sthānaṃ videvanādīnām, tatra kriyamāṇāḥ sarvāsām
GSP28msbh1-7u:8988: *{4/368: E2: kevalasya. kāmād abhiṣecanīyasya kevalasya. kāmād; E6:
GSP28msbh1-7u:8990: prakaraṇāvibhāge ca vipratiṣiddhaṃ hy ubhayam // MS_4,4.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8991: rājasūya upasadaḥ prakṛtya śrūyate, purastād upasadāṃ saumyena pracaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8992: antarā tvāṣṭreṇa, upariṣṭād vaiṣṇaveneti{*4/370*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim upasadaṅgaṃ saumyādayaḥ, utopasatkālā iti. upasadaṅgam iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8993: upasatsaṃyogasya śrutatvāt, kālavidhau sati lakṣaṇā syāt. tasmād upasadaṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8994: nanu kālavad aṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati, tathā saty ubhayam anugṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8995: upasatsaṃyogaś ca, purastād iti ca kālābhidhānam, upasacchabdasaṃyogād upasadaṅgatā bhaviṣyati. purastācchabdasāmarthyāc ca pūrvādiṣu prayoga
GSP28msbh1-7u:8996: iti. ucyate, vipratiṣiddhaṃ hy ubhayam, na śaknoty upasadām ity eṣa śabdaḥ, saumyādīṃś ca viśeṣṭum, ekasmin vākye, pūrvādīṃś ca. bhidyate hi tathā vākyam. tasmān na kālavad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8999: api vā kālamātraṃ syād adarśanād viśeṣasya // MS_4,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9000: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. kālamātraṃ syāt, nāṅgaprayojanasaṃbandhaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9001: adarśanād viśeṣasya, nānyaiḥ kālābhidhānair asya kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9002: āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś carantītyevamādibhiḥ. atrāpi hi saumyādayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9003: vihitā upasado 'pi. idam ānupūrvyam avihitam, tad vidhīyate. tasmāt kālamātram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9005: phalavad voktahetutvād itarasya pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,4.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9006: vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrahāyaṇīṃ nirvaped grāmakāma iti. tatrāmanahomāḥ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9007: āmanasyeti{*4/372*} tisra āhutīr juhotīti. atra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ samapradhānabhūtā āmanahomāḥ sāṃgrahāyaṇīṣṭyā, utāṅgaṃ tasyā iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9008: prāptam? samapradhānabhūtā iti. kutaḥ? tulyahetutvād itarasya. tulyaṃ hi yajimattvam. nanv aphalā homāḥ. ucyate, grāmakāma ity atrānupajyate{*4/373*}. tasmāt samapradhānabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9009: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, phalavad voktahetutvād itarasya pradhānaṃ syāt. na caitad asti, samapradhānabhūtā homā iṣṭyā iti. phalavad dhy aphalasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9010: pradhānam, phalavatī ceṣṭiḥ, aphalā homāḥ. nanūktam, anuṣaṅgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9011: bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, nānuṣaṅgaḥ prāpnoti. kutaḥ? vyavāyāt. tad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9012: vyavāyān nānuṣajyeteti. kena vyavāyaḥ, paridhimantraiḥ, ugro 'sy ugrastvaṃ deveṣv adhyugro 'haṃ sajāteṣu bhūyāsaṃ priyaḥ, sajātānām ugraś cet tā vasuvid ityevamādibhiḥ, etān anukramya, āmanasyeti{*4/374*} tisra āhutīr juhotīty āmananti. tasmāt sāṃgrahāyaṇyā aṅgam āmanahomā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9018: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, yāṃ vai kāṃcid adhvaryuś ca yajamānaś ca devatām antaritaḥ, tasyā āvṛśceta, yat prājāpatyaṃ dadhigrahaṃ gṛhṇāti, śamayaty evainām iti{*4/376*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ nityo dadhigrahaḥ, uta naimittika iti. kiṃ prāptam? dadhigraho naimittikaḥ syāt śrutisaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9019: devatāntarāye nimitte śrūyate, na ca nityo 'ntarāyaḥ. tasmān naimittika iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9023: yad uktam, naimittika iti, tad gṛhyate, kiṃ tu nityaś ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9024: jyeṣṭhaśabdāt, jyeṣṭhaśabdo bhavati, jyeṣṭho vā eṣa grahāṇāṃ yasyaiṣa gṛhyate, jyaiṣṭhyam eva gacchatīti{*4/377*}. jyeṣṭhaśabdaś ca prādhānye
GSP28msbh1-7u:9025: prāthamye vā syāt. eṣa{*4/378*} prathamaḥ, na pradhānam. yadi nityaḥ, evaṃ praśasyatvād upapadyate, na jātu calācalaṃ hi{*4/379*} praśaṃsanti. tasmān nityaś ca naimittikaś ceti, vināpi nimittena grahītavyaḥ, nimittenāpi punar iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9031: sarvarūpatā ca śrūyate, sarveṣāṃ vaitad devānāṃ rūpaṃ yad eṣa graho yasyaiṣa gṛhyate sarvāṇy evainaṃ rūpāṇi paśūnām upatiṣṭhanta iti{*4/380*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9032: na hi devatārūpam asmākaṃ kiṃcid anyat pratyakṣam, anyad ato nityatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9033: tasmād api nityaś ca naimittikaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9036: nityo vā syād arthavādas tayoḥ karmaṇy asaṃbandhād bhaṅgitvāc cāntarāyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9037: yad uktam, nityo naimittikaś ceti, tatra nitya eva syāt, jyeṣṭhaśabdāt sārvarūpyāc ca. yad uktam, devatāntarāye nimitte śrūyata iti. na devatāntarāyo nimittatvena gamyate. tayor adhvaryuyajamānayoḥ{*4/381*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9038: karmaṇy antarāyeṇa saṃbandhāt. na hy etac chrūyate, adhvaryuṇā devatāntaritavyā yajamānena veti, anityo hi antarāyaḥ. na caivaṃśabdo 'sti, antarāye sati dadhigraho grahītavya iti. vinaiva saṃyogena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9039: dadhigrahasya grahaṇam, antarāyasamādhānaṃ tv asya prayojanam iti. tad etan nityavad grahaṇam, anityaṃ prayojanam. nityaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, anityam antarāyaṃ samādhātum iti nāvakalpate. tatra prayojane 'nityatvād grahaṇe nityavac chrutir bādhyeta, arthavādatve tu na bādhyate. na hi tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9040: antarāyaṃ samādhātuṃ gṛhyate. anyad eva prayojanam asyāstīti praśaṃsitum abhidhīyate. dadhigrahasya tu somāṅgataiva prayojanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9042: saṃkīrtyate. tasmān naiṣa doṣaḥ, nitya eva dadhigraha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9045: vaiśvānaraś ca nityaḥ syān nityaiḥ samānasaṃkhyatvāt // MS_4,4.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9046: asty agniḥ, ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/382*}. tatra śrūyate, yo vai saṃvatsaramukhyam abhṛtvāgniṃ{*4/383*} cinute, yathā sāmigarbho vipadyate, tādṛg eva tadārtim ārcchet, vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ purastān
GSP28msbh1-7u:9047: nirvapet. saṃvatsaro vāgnir vaiśvānaraḥ, yathā saṃvatsaram āptvā kāla āgate vijāyate, evam eva saṃvatsaram āptvā kāla āgate 'gniṃ cinute, nārtim ārcched iti, eṣā vāgneḥ priyā tanūr yad vaiśvānaraḥ, priyām evāsya tanūm
GSP28msbh1-7u:9048: avarundha iti{*4/384*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ nityo vaiśvānaraḥ, atha naimittika iti. kiṃ prāptam? atrāpi nitya eva. arthavādaḥ, ukhyasya saṃvatsarābharaṇena kṛto doṣaḥ, vaiśvānareṇa vihanyata iti. nityaiś cāsya samānasaṃkhyatvaṃ bhavati, trīṇy etāni havīṃṣi bhavanti, traya ime lokā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9049: eṣāṃ lokānām ārohāyeti, lokānāṃ haviṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ nāsti. yadi yathā lokā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9050: nityās trayaḥ, evam imāni havīṃṣi nityāni trīṇi, evaṃ lokaiḥ saṃstavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9059: dadhigrahavad virodho 'sti. tena nārthavādaḥ, naimittika iti. atha yad uktam, lokaiḥ samānasaṃkhyatvaṃ nityatvād upapadyate, nānyatheti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9060: brūmaḥ, tritvāl lokānāṃ haviṣāṃ ca sāmānyād arthavādo bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9062: asty agniḥ, ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/385*}. tatra [523]{*4/386*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9063: śrūyate, saṃvatsaro vainaṃ pratiṣṭhāyai nudati yo 'gniṃ citvā na pratitiṣṭhati, pañca pūrvāś citayo bhavanti. atha ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ cinuta
GSP28msbh1-7u:9064: iti{*4/387*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yo 'yaṃ nitya evāgniḥ sa evāyaṃ ṣaṭcitika ucyate, utaikacitiko naimittika iti. kiṃ prāptam? tasminn eva nitye 'gnau ṣaṣṭhī citir eṣā vidhīyate, nityāyām eva ṣaṣṭhyām eṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9065: 'rthavādaḥ. yo 'pi na pratiṣṭhārhaḥ, so 'py anayā ṣaṣṭhyā cityā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9066: pratiṣṭhātum arhatīti citipraśaṃsā. kim artham evaṃ varṇyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9067: ṣaṣṭhīśabdaśravaṇāt. ṣaṇṇāṃ hi pūraṇī ṣaṣṭhī, ekasyāṃ hi citau ṣaṣṭhīśabdo na sāmañjasyena syāt. tasmāt ṣaṭcitiko 'gnir nitya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9072: tābhiś ca pūrvābhir asyās tulyavat prasaṃkhyānaṃ bhavati. katham? iyaṃ vāva prathamā citiḥ, oṣadhayaḥ purīṣam. antarīkṣaṃ vāva dvitīyā citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9073: vayāṃsi purīṣam. asau vāva tṛtīyā citiḥ, nakṣatrāṇi purīṣam. yajño vāva caturthā{*4/388*} citiḥ, dakṣiṇā purīṣam. yajamāno vāva pañcamī citiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9074: prajāḥ purīṣam. saṃvatsaro vāva ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ, ṛtavaḥ purīṣam iti{*4/389*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:9075: tulyānāṃ ca tulyavad anukramaṇaṃ bhavati, yathā - devā ṛṣayo gandharvās te
GSP28msbh1-7u:9076: 'nyata āsan. asurā rakṣāṃsi piśācāḥ te 'nyata āsann iti{*4/390*}, tulyavac cāmūṣāṃ citīnām anukramaṇam anayā ṣaṣṭhyā. tasmād etayā tattulyayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9077: bhavitavyam. yadi ca yasminn eva kratau [524]{*4/391*} tāḥ, tasminn
GSP28msbh1-7u:9078: evaiṣā, tata etābhis tulyā. tasmād api sa eva nityo 'gniḥ ṣaṭcitika iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9084: arthavādaś ca bhavati, ṣaṭ citayo bhavanti, ṣaṭ purīṣāṇi, tāni dvādaśa saṃpadyante, dvādaśā māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ, saṃvatsara eva pratitiṣṭhatīti{*4/392*}, tad ekacitike 'gnau na sāmañjasyena vacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9088: ekacitir vā syād apavṛkte hi codyate nimittena // MS_4,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9089: ekacitir vā naimittikaḥ{*4/393*} syāt. kutaḥ? apavṛkte hi yāge codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9090: apratiṣṭhayā nimittena. yo na pratitiṣṭhati, tasyaiṣā citir ucyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:9091: naimittikī, sā na nityā bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9092: api cāpavṛkte yāge codyate sā, na vartamāne bhavitum arhati. nanu citveti cayane nirvṛtte, na yāge. ucyate, naitat padārthe nirvṛtte citveti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9093: tarhi? vākyārthe. agniṃ citveti, agneś cayanenārtham abhinirvartyeti. kṛte ca yāge cayanenāgner artho nirvartito bhavati, nānyathā. ṣaṣṭhīśabdaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9094: pañca pūrvāś citaya uktāḥ, tā apekṣyāvakalpiṣyate, tasmān nirvṛtte yāga
GSP28msbh1-7u:9095: ity ucyate. tasmād vacanād ekacitir agniḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9099: dvayoḥ sūtrayor idam uttaram, tābhiś ca tulyasaṃkhyānāt, [525]{*4/394*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9101: samānasaṃkhyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati, arthavādaś copapatsyate. pañca pūrvāś citayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9102: bhavanti, yābhir asau citibhir na pratitiṣṭhate, atheyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣṭhārtham iti. tāś ca sapurīṣā apekṣya dvādaśatvena saṃstavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9103: bhaviṣyati. vipratiṣedhād ekasya, ṣaṭsaṃkhyāyā dvādaśasaṃkhyāyāś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9104: atulyānām api tulyavad anukramaṇaṃ bhavati, yathā - devā manuṣyāḥ pitaras
GSP28msbh1-7u:9107: *{4/395: E1 gibt dvayoḥ sūtrayor idam uttaram, tābhiś ca tulyasaṃkhyānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9112: asty āmāvāsye karmaṇi pitṛyajñaḥ, amāvāsyāyām aparāhṇe piṇḍapitṛyajñena
GSP28msbh1-7u:9113: carantīti{*4/398*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ, kim āmāvāsyasya karmaṇaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9114: piṇḍapitṛyajño 'ṅgam, utānaṅgam iti. kiṃ prāptam? aṅgam, phalavat saṃnidhānān niṣkrayavacanāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:9115: āha, nanu phalavat saṃnidhāv aphalaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhavati, phalavac cedaṃ kalpyeta svargeṇeti. ucyate, satyam, amānāsyayaikavākyatvān na śakyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9116: svargaḥ kalpayitum iti. āha, kālavacanatvān na karmaṇaikavākyatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9117: saṃbhavatīti. ucyate, lakṣaṇayāpi tāvat karmaikavākyatvaṃ saṃbhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9118: svarge kalpye na lakṣaṇā, na śrutiḥ. evaṃ cāmananti, yat pitṛbhyaḥ purvedyuḥ karoti, pitṛbhya etad yajñaṃ niṣkrīya yajamāno devebhyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9119: pratanuta iti{*4/399*}, amāvāsyāṃ prati niṣkretum{*4/400*} ca śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9121: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pitṛyajñaḥ svakālatvād anaṅgaṃ{*4/401*} syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9123: svaśabdābhihitena kālenāsya saṃbandhaḥ, na karmaṇā lakṣiteneti, yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9124: darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeteti{*4/403*}, yathā tad etat{*4/404*} purastād upasadāṃ saumyena carantīti{*4/405*} ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9125: kāla{*4/406*} evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ śabdo na karmaṇi, karmaṇi{*4/407*} lakṣaṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9126: śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā balīyasī. yac coktam, laksaṇayā karmaikavākyatā bhaviṣyatīti, tac ca na. kasmāt? anuvāde hi lakṣaṇā nyāyyā, na vidhau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9127: vidhiś cāyam. tasmān nāmāvāsyākarmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ, ekasmin kāle dve karmaṇī paraspareṇāsaṃbaddha
GSP28msbh1-7u:9139: tulyavac cānyaiḥ pradhānaiḥ prasaṃkhyāyate, catvāro vai mahāyajñāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9140: agnihotram, darśapūrṇamāsau, jyotiṣṭomaḥ, piṇḍapitṛyajña iti, mahāyajñais tulyavat prasaṃkhyāyate. kāsya mahāyajñatā syāt, anyataḥ phalavattāyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9143: itaś cānaṅgam, pratiṣiddhe{*4/408*} āmāvāsye piṇḍapitṛyajñaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9144: paurṇamāsīm eva yajeta bhrātṛvyavān, nāmāvāsyām, hatvā bhrātṛvyam amāvāsyayā yajeta, piṇḍapitṛyajñenaivāmāvāsyāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9145: asatyām amāvāsyāyāṃ piṇḍapitṛyajñaṃ darśayati, tadanaṅgatva upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9147: kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ? yadi paurṇamāsyām ādhānam, tato 'nantarāyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:9148: amāvāsyāyāṃ na kriyate, yathā pūrvapakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ, tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9149: kartavyaḥ. idam aparaṃ prayojanam, kuṇḍapāyināmayane māsam agnihotraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9150: juhoti, māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ [527]{*4/410*} yajeteti, yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, tathā kartavyaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ. yathā siddhāntaḥ, tathā na kartavya iti. ślokam apy udāharanti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9151: ādhānaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ced vṛtte darśe kariṣyate/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9152: anaṅgaṃ pitṛyajñaś cet tatraiva{*4/411*} na kariṣyate// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9157: paśvaṅgaṃ raśanā syāt tadāgame vidhānāt // MS_4,4.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9158: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9159: savanīyaṃ paśum upākarotīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ paśvaṅgaṃ raśanā, uta yūpāṅgam iti. kiṃ prāptam? paśvaṅgam. kutaḥ? tadāgame vidhānāt, paśvāgame hi vidhīyate. paśunāsyāḥ saṃbandha utpattivākye śrūyate, parivyāṇaṃ kṛtvopākaroti paśuṃ nānyatheti. evaṃ śrutir bhavati, kālavacane lakṣaṇā syāt, parivyāṇena kālo lakṣyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9161: jyotiṣṭome pratyakṣo hi yūpasya saṃskāraḥ, raśanā hi yā ca yāvatīṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:9162: draḍhimno mātrāṃ yūpasya saṃjanayati, draḍhimnā ca prayojanaṃ yūpasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9163: tasmād yūpasyaiva draḍhimne raśanā syāt. dvitīyā ca vibhaktis tatprādhānya eva bhavati, raśanāyāṃ ca tṛtīyā. tṛtīyā ca guṇatve tasyāḥ, tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:9164: yūpāṅgam. yat tu, tadāgame vidhānād ity uktam, tatparihartavyam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9165: tadāgame vidhānaṃ [528]{*4/412*} vākyam{*4/413*}, dvitīyā ca vibhaktiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9166: śrutiḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca, vākyaṃ bādheyātām iti. yat tu lakṣaṇeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9171: evaṃ ca mantrārthavādo 'rthavān bhaviṣyati, yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ. taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya unnayanti svādhyo manasā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9173: kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ? agnau śrūyate, ekayūpa ekādaśa paśavo niyojyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9174: iti. pratipaśu raśanā kāryā, yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. siddhānte dvairaśanyam eva. ślokam apy udāharanti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9175: paśvaṅgaṃ raśanā cet, yady ekasmin bahūn niyuñjīta/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9176: pratipaśu raśanā kāryā, yūpe ced dvairaśanyaṃ syāt// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9180: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ somāṅgabhūtaḥ, yo dīkṣito yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9181: agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/415*}. tatra śrūyate, svaruṇā svadhitinā vā paśum anaktīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yūpāṅgaṃ svaruḥ, uta paśvaṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9182: kiṃ prāptam? yūpāṅgam iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ? ekadeśatvāt. ekadeśaḥ svarur yūpasyeti śrūyate, yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti svarum antaṃ yūpaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ{*4/416*}. evaṃ sa yūpo bhavatīti, yathā caṣālam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9185: *{4/416: E1 gibt svaruṃ karotīti svarum antaṃ yūpaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ in
GSP28msbh1-7u:9188: yūpāṅgam iva svaruṃ niṣkrayavādo darśayati, apaśyan ha sma vai purā ṛṣayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9189: ye yūpaṃ prāpayanti, saṃbhajya sruvante manyante, yajñavaiśasāya vā idaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9190: karmeti, te prastaraṃ sruvaniṣkrayam apaśyan, yūpasya svarum ayajñavaiśasāyeti, niṣkrayaśravaṇāt tadaṅgatā vijñāyate. tasmād yūpāṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9192: paśvaṅgaṃ vā, tasya hy añjanārthena svaruṇā prayojanam. tathā hi śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9193: svaruṇā paśum anaktīti. tad añjanaṃ paśoḥ, svaror utpattiṃ prayojayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9194: yadi tadartha eṣaḥ svaruḥ, tato dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam. atha yūpārthaḥ, adṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9195: prayojanaṃ{*4/418*} tataḥ kalpyam. tasmāt paśvaṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9199: kayā bhaktyā? evam āha, yūpaḥ kilāgnau pakṣetavyaḥ, yat svaruḥ prakṣipyate, tena{*4/419*} yūpaḥ prakṣipyata iti sa eṣa niṣkaya iva
GSP28msbh1-7u:9201: kiṃ bhavati prayojanam? ekayūpa ekādaśa paśavo yadā niyujyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9202: tadaikasyaiva paśoḥ samañjanam, pūrvasmin pakṣe. sarveṣāṃ siddhānte.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9204: svarur yūpāṅgam iti ced ekasmaiva samañjanam/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9205: bahūnām ekayūpatve, sarveṣāṃ tu samañjanam// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9211: prayājānuyājāḥ, patnīsaṃyājāḥ, samiṣṭayajuḥ, sviṣṭakṛd iti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9212: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ sarve yāgāḥ pradhānabhūtāḥ, uta kecid guṇabhūtā iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9213: prāptam? darśapūrṇamāsayor yāvatya ijyās tāḥ sarvāḥ pradhānabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9214: yajeta svargakāma ity aviśeṣeṇa yāgebhyaḥ phalaṃ śrūyate, phalavac ca pradhānam, sarve cāmī yāgāḥ. tasmāt sarve pradhānabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9215: api vāṅgāni kānicid yeṣv aṅgatvena saṃstutiḥ sāmānyo hy abhisaṃstavaḥ{*4/421*} // MS_4,4.30
GSP28msbh1-7u:9216: api vā kānicid aṅgāni bhaveyuḥ. kāni punas tāni? yeṣv aṅgatvena saṃstutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9217: yathā, abhīṣū vā etau yajñasya yad āghārau, cakṣuṣī vaitau yajñasya yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9218: ājyabhāgau{*4/422*}, yat prayājānuyājāś cejyante varma vā etad yajñasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9219: kriyate, varma vā yajamānasya bhrātṛvyasyābhibhūtyai, iti{*4/423*}. abhīśū
GSP28msbh1-7u:9220: rathasyāṅgam, cakṣuṣī cakṣuṣmataḥ, varma varmavataḥ. sāmānyo hy abhisaṃstavo yuktaḥ. yadi cāṅgāni tāni saṃstutāni, tataḥ saṃstavo 'rthavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:9227: evaṃ ca kṛtvānyārthadarśanam upapannaṃ bhavati, prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9228: juhotīti{*4/425*}. na ca prayājān yajati, na cānuyājān yajatīti ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9231: aviśiṣṭaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ pradhāneṣu guṇasya vidyamānatvāt // MS_4,4.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9232: aviśiṣṭam etat kāraṇaṃ saṃstavo nāma, āgneyādīnām apy aṅgatvena saṃstutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:9233: asti, śiro vaitad yajñasya yad āgneyaḥ, hṛdayam upāṃśuyāgaḥ, pādāv agnīṣomīya iti, śiraḥ śirasvato 'ṅgam, hṛdayaṃ hṛdayavataḥ, pādau pādāvata iti sarvasyaivāṅgatvena saṃstutir iti sarvam evāṅgaṃ prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9234: tat{*4/426*} pradhānaṃ na syāt. asati pradhāne kasyāṅgam? tasmān naitad aṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9238: atha yad uktam, anyārthadarśanaṃ parārthatvāt, na tat sādhakaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9239: parārthaṃ hi tad vākyam, na dṛśyamānasya prayājādeḥ prāpaṇārtham. tasmād anyad asya pramāṇam anveṣṭavyaṃ śrutyantaraṃ nyāyo vā. tasminn asati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9240: mṛgatṛṣṇādarśanam iva tad bhavati, saṃstutir apy asati nyāye, asādhikaiva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9242: pṛthaktve tv abhidhānayor niveśaḥ, śrutito vyapadeśāc ca, tat punar mukhyalakṣaṇaṃ yat phalavattvam, tat saṃnidhāv asaṃyuktaṃ tadaṅgaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9244: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. tad uktam, sarvāṇi samapradhānānīti. naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9245: evam, darśapūrṇamāsaśabdavācyāni pradhānāni karmāṇi. kutaḥ? phalasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9246: darśapūrṇamāsaśabdakebhyaḥ phalaṃ śrūyate, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti{*4/428*}. kāni punar darśapūrṇamāsaśabdakāni? yeṣāṃ vacane paurṇamāsīśabdo 'māvāsyāśabdo vā, āgneyādīni tāni. nanv amāvāsyāśabdakānāṃ naiva phalaṃ śrūyate. ucyate, pṛthaktve samudāyayor niveśa etayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:9247: abhidhānayoḥ, paurṇamāsīti cāmāvāsyā iti ca, triṣv āgneyādiṣu yaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9249: kathaṃ paurṇamāsy amāvāsyeti ca dviśabdaḥ śrūyate? dvyarthavad vyapadeśāc ca. kathaṃ tad vyapadeśaḥ? dvivacannirdeśāt, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9250: ekārthau ca darśāmāvāsyāśabdau. katham? darśo vā etayoḥ pūrvaḥ, pūrṇamāsa uttaras tayor atha yat pūrṇamāsaṃ pūrvam ārabhate tad ayathāpūrvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9251: prakriyate, darśapūrṇamāsam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai caruṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9252: sarasvate dvādaśakapālam amāvāsyā vai sarasvatī, pūrṇamāsaḥ sarasvān.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9253: ubhāv etau yathāpūrvaṃ kalpayitvārabhata ṛddhyai ṛdhnoty evārtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:9254: mithunatvāyeti{*4/429*}. tatra darśaśabdena prakṛtyāmāvāsyāśabdena bruvann ekārthatāṃ darśayati. śakyate ca candrasyādarśanenāmāvāsyā darśa iti lakṣayitum, yathā cakṣuṣor abhāve sati cakṣuṣmān iti cakṣurbhyāṃ lakṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9255: [533]{*4/430*} etasmād vyapadeśāc ca śrutitaś ca loke śravaṇād{*4/431*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9256: ekārthatām evādhyavasyāmaḥ. tat punar mukhyalakṣaṇam, yat phalavattvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9257: yad anyat tat saṃnidhau śrūyate, tat tad aṅgam. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9258: itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhau śrūyamāṇam, itikartavyatāviśeṣaṇatvena paripūraṇasamarthaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhavitum arhati. akalpyamāne vākyaśeṣe phalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9260: āha, nanu darśapūrṇamāsaphalam evātrānuṣajyate. ucyate, śakyam anuṣaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9261: kiṃ tu darśapūrṇamāsavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣam eva syāt. anyāsyetikartavyatāśrutā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9262: kalpyeta. eṣām api prayājādīnām anyā kalpyeta. etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9263: itikartavyatāvagamyamānotsṛjyeta, tenāṅgatvam, kāraṇaṃ bhāgīti. eṣāṃ anyena phalena saṃbandho 'śrutaḥ. tasmān na sarvāṇi samapradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9268: *{4/431: E1 gibt loke śravaṇād in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9269: guṇāś ca nāmasaṃyuktā vidhīyante nāṅgeṣūpapadyante // MS_4,4.35 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9270: nāmaviśeṣasaṃyuktāś ca guṇaviśeṣā vidhīyante, yathā - caturhotrā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9271: pūrṇamāsīm{*4/432*} abhimṛśet, pañcahotrāmāvāsyām iti, sarveṣu pradhāneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9272: asmin samudāye caturhotrā, asmin pañcahotreti vibhāgāvijñānāc cedaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9273: nopapadyeta. bhavati caivaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ guṇavidhānam. tasmād asmatpakṣa eveti. api cāṅgatvenādhārādīnāṃ saṃstutir upapannā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9276: tulyā ca kāraṇaśrutir anyair aṅgāṅgisaṃbandhaḥ // MS_4,4.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9277: atha yad uktam, āgneyādīnām apy aṅgatvena saṃstutir aṅgatvaṃ khyāpayed
GSP28msbh1-7u:9279: utpattāv abhisaṃbandhas tasmād aṅgopadeśaḥ syāt // MS_4,4.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9280: naiṣa doṣaḥ, pradhānānām{*4/434*} apy eṣāṃ satām utpattyapekṣā{*4/435*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9281: śirādistutir abhiviṣyatīti{*4/436*}. jāyamānasya{*4/437*} hi puruṣasyāgre śiro jāyate, madhye madhyam, paścāt pādau, evam āgneyo 'grataḥ, upāṃśuyājo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9282: madhye, agnīṣomīyaḥ paścād iti. etasmāt sāmānyādoṣā stutir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9289: caturdaśa pūrṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante, trayodaśāmāvāsyāyām iti, itarathā na caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo bhaveyuḥ, na vāmāvāsyāyāṃ trayodaśeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9290: tasmād āgneyādīni pradhānāni, āghārādīny aṅgānīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9291: jyotiṣṭome tulyāny aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_4,4.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9292: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti. [535]{*4/438*} tatra dīkṣaṇīyādayaś ca yāgā vidyante, sautye cāhani somayāgaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9293: kim atra yāgamātra pradhānam, uta somayāga iti. kiṃ prāptam? jyotiṣṭome tulyāni sarvāṇi bhaveyuḥ. kutaḥ? aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam, yāgāt phalaṃ śrūyate, sarve cāmī yāgāḥ, phalavac ca pradhānam. tasmāj jyotiṣṭome sarve
GSP28msbh1-7u:9296: guṇānāṃ tūtpattivākyena saṃbandhāt kāraṇaśrutis tasmāt somaḥ pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,4.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9297: guṇānāṃ tūtpattivākyena saṃbandho bhavati. keṣāṃ guṇānām? jyotiṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9298: stomānām. katamenotpattivākyena saṃbandho bhavati? jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeteti{*4/439*}, jyotiṣṭomād yāgāt svargaḥ śrūyate, na yāgamātrāt. yatra ca jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ, sa jyotiṣṭomaḥ. kasya jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ? stomayāgasyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:9299: brūmaḥ. evaṃ hy āmnāyate, katamāni vaitāni jyotīṃṣi, ya ete tasya stomāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9300: trivṛt pañcadaśasaptadaśaikaviṃśā etāni vā jyotīṃṣi. tāny etasya stomā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9301: iti{*4/440*}, somayāgasya stomā aṅgam, samabhivyāhārāt, grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9302: camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākarotīti, te ca stomās trivṛdādayaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9304: tasmāt trivṛdādistomakaḥ somayāgaḥ, sa jyotiṣṭoma iti. yaś ca jyotiṣṭomas
GSP28msbh1-7u:9305: tataḥ phalam, yataś ca phalaṃ tad eva pradhānam iti. kathaṃ punas trivṛdādayo jyotīṃṣi? ucyate, bhavantu vā jyotīṃṣi, mā vā bhūvan,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9306: jyotiḥśabdena tāvad uktāni. [536]{*4/441*} vacanamātreṇāpi śabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9307: viśeṣato lakṣaṇāyām. api ca dyotater vā dīptikarmaṇo jyotayater
GSP28msbh1-7u:9308: vā{*4/442*} jyotiḥśabdaṃ labhante. dyotyate{*4/443*} hi taiḥ śabdaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9309: dyotayantīti vā stutyām{*4/444*}. tasmāt somayāgo jyotiṣṭomaḥ. sa ca pradhānam, guṇabhūtā dīkṣaṇīyādaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9317: śiro vā etad yajñasya yad dīkṣaṇīyetyevamādi ca liṅgaṃ dṛśyate. tathā guṇāś ca jyotiṣṭomavikāre dīkṣaṇīyādayo dṛśyante, caturviṃśati mānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ dīkṣaṇīyāyāṃ dadyāt, prāpaṇīyāyāṃ dve caturviṃśatimāna iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9318: tulyatve na pravartayiṣyante dīkṣaṇīyādayaḥ. tasmād api somayāgaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9322: caturthe 'dhyāye prayojakāprayojakalakṣaṇaṃ vṛttam, tan na prasmartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9323: ihedānīṃ kramaniyamalakṣaṇam ucyate, tac chrutyarthapāṭhapravṛttikāṇḍamukhyair vakṣyate, śrutyādīnāṃ ca balābalam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9324: āditas tu śrutikramaś cintyate. kiṃ yathāśruti padārthānāṃ krama āstheyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9325: utāniyameneti. kiṃ prāptam? ekatvāt kartuḥ, anekatvāc ca padārthānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9326: avaśyaṃ bhāvini krame lāghavāt prayogaprāśubhāvāc cāniyama ity evaṃ prāpte
GSP28msbh1-7u:9328: śrutilakṣaṇam ānupūrvyaṃ tatpramāṇatvād iti. śrutir grahaṇam{*4/446*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9329: akṣarāṇām, tan nimittaṃ yasya kramasya, sa sādhuḥ kramaḥ. śrutipramāṇakā hi vaidikā arthāḥ, naiṣām anyat pramāṇam astīty{*4/447*} uktam. kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:9330: ihodāharaṇam? satre dīkṣākramaḥ{*4/448*}, ya ṛtvijas te yajamānā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9331: ity{*4/449*} uktvā, teṣāṃ dīkṣākramaṃ vidhatte, adhvyaryur gṛhapatiṃ dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇaṃ dīkṣayati, tata udgātāram, tato hotāram, tatas taṃ pratiprasthātā dīkṣayitvārdhino dīkṣayati, brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaṃ brahmaṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9332: prastotāram udgātuḥ, maitrāvaruṇaṃ hotuḥ, tatas taṃ neṣṭā{*4/450*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9333: dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyino dīkṣayati, āgnīdhraṃ brahmaṇaḥ, pratihartāram udgātuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9334: acchāvākaṃ hotuḥ, tatas tam unnetā dīkṣayitvā padino{*4/451*} dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9335: potāraṃ [538]{*4/452*} brahmaṇaḥ, subrahmaṇyam udgātuḥ, grāvastutaṃ hotuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9336: tatas tam anyo brāhmaṇo dīkṣayati, brahmacārī vācāryapreṣita iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9337: aniyamena kramaḥ kartavyaḥ, yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9339: tatrāha, anyāyyaṃ śrutivacanam iti. ucyate, kim ayaṃ{*4/453*} na sādhuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9340: na, na sādhur iti brūmaḥ. nyāyyaṃ tarhi. na brūmaḥ, na sādhuḥ krama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9341: kiṃ tarhi? uktasya punarvacanam anyāyyām iti. ucyate, sādhor vacanaṃ bahuśo 'py ucyamānaṃ nyāyyam eva. asādhos tu sakṛd apy anyāyyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9342: sakṛdvacanena jñātasya punarvacane na prayojanam astīti. ucyate, bhavaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:9343: aprasmaraṇam{*4/454*} api prayojanam ity uktam. vṛttikāreṇa tat kāryam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:9345: athavā - arthāntaram evedam, tatra hy anya eva saṃśayo vicāro nirṇayaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9346: śrutipramāṇako dharmaḥ, anyapramāṇaka iti saṃśayaḥ. pratyakṣādīnām adhigamya nimittatvān na tatpramāṇakaḥ, atīndriyatvāc codanālakṣaṇa iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:9347: vicāraḥ. codanālakṣaṇa eveti nirṇayaḥ. iha tu siddhe tatprāmāṇye
GSP28msbh1-7u:9349: athavā - śrutivicāro{*4/456*} 'yam. kiṃ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9350: kiṃ vā kramo vidhīyata iti. anekārthavidhānānupapatteḥ krame{*4/457*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9352: śrutyā, kramavidhānaṃ vākyena, tasmān na kramo vidhīyata iti pūrvaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9353: pakṣaḥ. nanv avadānavākyeṣu kramo vidhīyate. satyaṃ vidhīyate, pāṭhena, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:9354: śrutyā, ya{*4/459*} ṛtvijas te [539]{*4/460*} yajamānā iti tu, dīkṣāyāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9355: prāptatvāt, kramavidhānārthā śrutir iti siddhāntaḥ. tasmād apunaruktam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9360: *{4/449: E2: ye yajamānās ta ṛtvija ity}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9371: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ sarvatra śrutivaśenaiva bhavitum arhatīti. uktaṃ hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9373: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, arthāc ca sāmarthyāc ca{*4/462*} kramo vidhīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9374: guṇabhūto hi padārthānāṃ kramo bhavati, yaś ca yasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9375: nirvartyamānasyopakaroti, sa tasya guṇabhūtaḥ. yasmiṃś cāśrīyamāṇe padārtha eva na saṃpadyate, na sa guṇabhūtaḥ, vināpi tena, na vaiguṇyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9376: evaṃ pratyakṣaḥ kramasya guṇabhāvo yatra, tatrārthena sa evāśrayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9377: yathā jāte varaṃ dadāti, jātam añjalinā gṛhṇāti, jātam abhiprāṇitīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9378: arthāt pūrvam abhiprāṇitavyam, tato 'ñjalinā grahītavyaḥ, tato varo deya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9379: iti. tathā vimokaḥ pūrvam āmnātaḥ, paścāt tadyogaḥ, arthād viparītaḥ kāryaḥ. yājyānuvākye tu viparyayeṇāmnāte, viparyayeṇa kartavye. nātra pāṭhakramo mīyate{*4/463*}. yato devatopalakṣaṇārthānuvākyā, pradānārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9380: yājyā. agnihotraṃ juhotīti pūrvam āmnātam. odanaṃ pacatīti paścāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9381: asaṃbhavāt pūrvam odanaḥ paktavyaḥ. praiṣapraiṣārtho tu viparyayeṇāmnātau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9385: *{4/462: E1 gibt sāmarthyāc ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9388: asmin viṣaye kramasya niyamo nāsti, yathā darśapūrṇamāsayor yājamānānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9395: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnātam, samidho yajati, tanūnapātaṃ yajati, iḍo yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9396: barhir yajati, svāhākāraṃ yajatīti{*4/467*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ, kim aniyatenaiva krameṇaiṣām anuṣṭhānam, uta yaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ sa eva niyamyeteti. kiṃ prāptam? niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvād aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9397: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, krameṇaiva niyamyetaikasmin kratāv iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9398: tadguṇatvāt. tadguṇatvaṃ hi gamyate padārthānām, yathā - snāyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9399: anulimpet, bhuñjīteti ca krameṇānuṣṭhānam avagamyate, vākyāt padārthānām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9400: yathā cādṛṣṭārtheṣūpadiśyamāneṣu, kaścid brūyāt, devāya dhūpo deyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9401: puṣpāṇy avakaritavyāni candanenānuleptavya upahāro 'smā upahartavyaḥ, evaṃ kṛte devas tuṣyatīti. tam anyaḥ pratibrūte, naitad evam, na prathamaṃ dhūpo dātavyaḥ, prathamaṃ puṣpāṇy avakaritavyānīti. evaṃ manyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9402: dhūpadānasya prāthamyam anenoktam iti. tasmād vācanika eṣām eṣa krama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9406: iti cet paśyasi, athaivaṃ gamyamāne 'śabda eva kramaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9407: padārthapūrvako vākyārthaḥ, padebhyaś ca padārthā evāvagamyante, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:9408: kramaḥ. syād etad evam, yadi padārthānāṃ{*4/469*} samūhasya śravaṇaṃ pratyāyakam arthasya syāt, na tu samudāyaḥ pratyāyakaḥ, ity uktaṃ tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāya ity{*4/470*} atra. tasmāt kramasya vācakaśabdābhāvād vyāmoha eṣa kramo 'vagamyate. evaṃ cāpūrvāsattir anugrahīṣyate, itarathā sāpi viprakṛṣyeta ghaṭīyantra iva. darśayiṣyati
GSP28msbh1-7u:9409: ca, hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati, atha jihvāyāḥ, atha vakṣasa iti. yadi niyāmakaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ, tato na vidhātavyam etat, niyāmake hi pāṭhakrame pāṭhakramād eva prāpnuyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9413: arthakṛte vānumānaṃ syāt, kratvekatve parārthatvāt svena tv arthena saṃbandhaḥ, tasmāt svaśabdam ucyeta//5.1.6//
GSP28msbh1-7u:9414: ekasmin kratāv ekatvāt kratuḥ, anekasmin padārthe 'rthakṛtatvāt kramasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9415: tatraiṣa eva kramo niyamyetānumānena. kutaḥ? parārthatvād vedasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9416: parārtho hi vedo yad yad anena śakyate kartum, tasmai tasmai prayojanāyaiṣa samāmnāyate. śakyate cānena padārtho vidhātum, śakyate ca kriyākāle pratipattum. tasmād vedaḥ padārthāṃś ca vidhātum upādeyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9417: kriyākāle ca pratipattum. na gamyate{*4/471*} viśeṣaḥ, vidhātum ayaṃ samāmnāyate, na pratipattum iti. agamyamāne viśeṣa ubhayārtham upādīyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:9418: [542]{*4/472*} iti gamyate. pratipattuṃ cānena krameṇa śakyate, nānyena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9419: ata eva ca kṛtvā pāṭhakramāpacāre, vinaṣṭa ity ucyate, itarathā hi yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9420: yasya prayojanam, tasmin nirvartamāna eva kiṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt. adṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9421: kalpyeta, tac cānyāyyaṃ dṛṣṭe sati. tasmāt svaśabdaḥ kramaḥ, ya eva padārthānāṃ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, sa eva kramasyāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9425: evaṃ cānyārthaṃ darśayati, vyatyastam ṛtavyā upadadhāti{*4/473*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9426: vyatyastaṃ ṣoḍaśinaṃ śaṃsati{*4/474*}. āśvino daśamo gṛhyate, taṃ tṛtīyaṃ juhotīti. yady aniyamenopadhānaṃ śaṃsanaṃ ca, vyatyastavacanam anarthakaṃ syāt. na hi kathaṃcid avyatyāsa iti, tathāśvinasya tṛtīyasya homānuvādo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9427: nāvakalpyeta, yadi pāṭhakrameṇa niyama{*4/475*} iti. tathā, abhicaratā pratilomaṃ hotavyam, prāṇān evāsya pratīcaḥ pratiyautīti{*4/476*} kvacit pratilomaṃ vidadhad anulomaṃ darśayati, tad upapadyate, yadi pāṭhakrameṇa prayogaḥ. itarathā, sarvam anulomaṃ syāt, pratilomadarśanaṃ nopapadyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9428: tathā caturthottamayoḥ pratisamānayatīty ukte sati, atihāyeḍo barhiḥ pratisamānayatīty ucyate, tena barhiṣaś caturthatāṃ darśayati, sā pāṭhakrame niyāmake 'vakalpate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9435: vājapeye saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhata iti śrūyate. teṣu paśuṣu codakaprāptāḥ prokṣaṇādayo dharmāḥ. tatra [543]{*4/477*} prathamaḥ padārtho yataḥ kutaścid ārabdhavyaḥ, dvitīyādiṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tata eva dvitīyo 'pi padārtha ārabdhavyaḥ, uta dvitīyādiṣv aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9436: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvād aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9437: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, yataḥ pūrva ārabdhaḥ, tata eva dvitīyādayo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:9438: padārthā ārabdhavyā{*4/478*} iti. kuta etat? tadupakramāt, sarve hi padārthāḥ pradhānakālān na viprakraṣṭavyāḥ, pradhānaṃ hi cikīrṣitam, kṛtaṃ vā teṣāṃ{*4/479*} nimittam. sahavacanaṃ hi bhavati, padārthaiḥ saha pradhānaṃ kartavyam iti, bahupadārthasamāmnānāt tv avaśyaṃ bhāvī
GSP28msbh1-7u:9439: viprakarṣaḥ, tathāpi tu yāvadbhir nāvyavahitaḥ śakyaḥ padārthaḥ kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9440: tāvadbhir vyavadhānam avaśyaṃ kartavyam, tato 'bhyadhikena{*4/480*} na vyavadhātavyam iti. yadi dvitīyaṃ padārtham anyata ārabheta, tato 'dhikair
GSP28msbh1-7u:9441: api vyavadadhyāt, tathā prayogavacanaṃ bādheta. nanu tathā sati kaścid alpair vyavahito bhaviṣyati. ucyate, anumatānāṃ vyavadhāyakānāṃ tyāgena
GSP28msbh1-7u:9442: kaścid abhyadhiko guṇo bhavatīti, tasmād yataḥ pūrvapadārtha ārabdhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9449: iti cet paśyasi, pradhānāviprakarṣeṇa prayogavacanānugraha iti, sarvaṃ tarhi guṇakāṇḍam ekasminn apavarjayitavyam, yathā sauryādiṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9450: naitad evam, sahaprayoga eva hi nānuṣṭhitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9453: atha yad uktam, yathā kratvantareṣu sauryādiṣv iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9454: na teṣām arthāt kramaḥ prāpnoti, yo niyamyeta. aṅgāśrayo hi niyamo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9460: trayastriṃśena pratiṣṭhākāmam{*4/484*} ityevamādi śrūyate. tatrāgamena saṃkhyāpūraṇam iti vakṣyate{*4/485*}. tatrāgame kriyamāṇe, kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:9461: aniyamajakramāḥ{*4/486*} sarvā ṛca āgamayitavyāḥ, uta kāṇḍakramebhya iti{*4/487*}. kiṃ prāptam? aniyameneti. kutaḥ? atirātre triṇavādiśabdārthenaitāḥ prāpnuvanti, tatraitāsāṃ prāpnuvatīnāṃ pāṭhakramo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9462: nāstīti. evaṃ prāpta ucyate, yad āsāṃ samāmnāye sthānam, tenaitā atra niyamyante. yāḥ pūrvaṃ samāmnātāḥ, tāḥ pūrvam eva prayoktavyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9463: ānupūrvyasya hi dṛṣṭam etat prayojanam, yad uttarasphuraṇaṃ{*4/488*} tad api cikīrṣitam eveti. trinavādiśabdair{*4/489*} atirātre yaugapadyenāsāṃ prāpteḥ pāṭhakramasyāviṣaya [545]{*4/490*} ity adhikaraṇāntaram iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:9465: samāmnāyapāṭhakramād evātra niyama iti punaruktatā gamyata ity anyathā varṇyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9475: sādyaskre{*4/491*} śrūyate, saha paśūn ālabhata iti. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9476: samadhigataḥ, savanīyakāle trayāṇām ālambha iti. athātra pāṭhakramāt, kim agnīṣomīyaḥ pūrvam ālabdhavyaḥ, uta sthānakramāt pūrvaṃ savanīya iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9477: prāptam? pūrvam agnīṣomīya iti. kutaḥ? pāṭhakramāt. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9478: savanīyaḥ pūrvam, sthānāt. yadi pūrvam agnīṣomīyaḥ syāt, savanīyasthānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9479: vyāhanyeta. āśvinaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyeti. nanv itaratrāpi pāṭhakramo bādhyeta. bādhyatām, tasya hi pratiṣedhārthaḥ sahaśabdaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9480: samāmnātaḥ{*4/492*}, apratiṣiddhaṃ cāśvinagrahasthānam. tan na bādhitavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9485: sārasvatau bhavataḥ, etad vai daivyaṃ mithunam iti{*4/493*} śrūyate. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9486: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ strīdevatyasya prathamaṃ dharmāḥ, uta puṃdevatyasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9487: niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvād aniyamaḥ. iti prāpte brūmaḥ, mukhyakrameṇa vā niyamaḥ syād iti, strīdevatyasya hi pūrvaṃ yājyānuvākyayoḥ samāmnānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9488: praṇo devī sarasvatīti{*4/494*}. tasmāt strīdevatyasya pūrvaṃ pradānena
GSP28msbh1-7u:9489: [546]{*4/495*} bhavitavyam, tasmāt strīdevatyasya pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ kāryāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9490: tathā hi pradhānakālatā bhavaty aṅgānām, itarathā, yaiḥ padārthair vyavadhānaṃ sāmarthyād anujñātam, tebhyo 'dhikair api vyavadhānaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9495: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ pūrvamauṣadhadharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ, tata ājyasya. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9496: saṃdehaḥ, kim agnīṣomīyadharmānām, mukhyakrameṇa pūrvam ājyasya dharmāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9497: kartavyāḥ, uta yathāpāṭham iti. mukhyakramānugraheṇājyasya pūrvām. iti prāpte brūmaḥ, prakṛtau yathāpāṭhaṃ pratīyeta, svaśabdo hi teṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9498: pāṭhakramaḥ, so 'nyathā kriyamāṇe bādhitaḥ syāt. sahatvasya punarupasaṃgrāhakaḥ prayogavacanaḥ, svakrameṇa padārthe saṃnikṛṣyamāṇe na bādhito bhaviṣyati. api ca pāṭhakrame svaśabdaḥ, svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9502: mantratas tu virodhe syāt prayogarūpasāmarthyāt tasmād utpattideśaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9503: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ, āgneyasya pūrvaṃ mantrapāṭhaḥ, uttaro brāhmaṇasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9504: tatra saṃdehaḥ, katamaḥ{*4/497*} pāṭho balīyān iti. ucyate, aniyamaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9506: [547]{*4/498*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, mantrapāṭho balīyān. kutaḥ?
