GSP28msbh1-7u:9507: prayogarūpasāmarthyāt. prayogāya mantrasya rūpasāmarthyam. tad asya sāmarthyaṃ yena mantraḥ prayujyate, tasya ca prayujyamānasya kramo dṛṣṭāya bhavati{*4/499*}. nanu ca brāhmaṇapāṭhasyāpi tad eva prayojanam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9508: utpattideśaḥ saḥ, aparam api tasya prayojanaṃ karmotpattyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9513: asty adhvarakalpā nāmeṣṭiḥ, āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9514: sarasvaty ājyabhāgo syād bārhaspatyaś carur iti{*4/500*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9515: kim āgneyavikārasya bārhaspatyasya pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ kāryāḥ, codako
GSP28msbh1-7u:9516: balavattaraḥ, prayogavacanāt. utopāṃśuyājavikārasya prayogavacano balavattaraḥ, codakād iti. kiṃ prāptam? vikṛtāv asyām, yathāpradhānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9517: syāt, tadvacanāt. teṣāṃ sākṣād vacanakramo vikṛtau. tena saṃnihitānām upasaṃhārakaḥ{*4/501*} prayogavacano hi pratyakṣaḥ, taddharmāṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9518: cānumānikaḥ, codakena hi sa prāptaḥ. tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ prayogavacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:9524: mukhyāṅgakramavipratipattau vā, yathā prakṛtau, tathaiva vikṛtau bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:9525: arhatīti. kutaḥ? prakṛtyanvayāt. yādṛśāḥ prakṛtau dharmāḥ, tādṛśā eva vikṛtau bhavitum arhantīti, mukhyakrameṇa kriyamāṇā na prakṛtivat kṛtāḥ syuḥ. codako hi prayoga[548]{*4/502*}vacanād balavattaraḥ, sa hy utpādayati prāpayati ca. prāpitān abhisamīkṣya prayogavacana upasaṃharati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9526: sa prāpteṣu utpannaḥ prāptinimittaka uttarakālaṃ{*4/503*} pūrvaprāptaṃ na bādhitum arhati codakam, pratyakṣo 'pi san, bahiraṅgatvāt, yathāprāptān
GSP28msbh1-7u:9527: evopasaṃhariṣyati. tasmāt pūrvaṃ bārhaspatyasya dharmāḥ, tata ājyasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9531: cāturmāsyeṣu sākamedhas tṛtīyaṃ parva, tasyāvayavāḥ, agnaye 'nīkavate
GSP28msbh1-7u:9532: prātaraṣṭākapālaḥ, marudbhyaḥ sāṃtapanebhyo madhyaṃdine caruḥ, marudbhyo gṛhamedhibhyaḥ sarvāsāṃ dugdhe sāyamodanam iti{*4/504*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9533: kim etā dvyahakālā iṣṭayaḥ, uta sadyaskālā iti. kiṃ prāptam? vikṛtis tatkālā bhavitum arhatīti, yathāśiṣṭam, yathā prakṛtir uktā, tathā vikṛtiḥ syāt. prakṛtidharmā hi sā, tasmād yā vikṛtiḥ, sā dvyahakālā bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:9536: *{4/505: E1 (Fn.): yā yā vikṛtiḥ, sā sā dvyahakālā bhavitum arhatīti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9537: api vā kramakālasaṃyuktā sadyaḥ kriyeta tatra vidher anumānāt prakṛtidharmalopaḥ syāt//5.1.20//
GSP28msbh1-7u:9538: ahnaḥ kāleṣu ye padārthā ucyante, prātar madhyaṃdine sāyam iti, krameṇa ta ekasminn ahanīti pratīyante, yathā devadattaḥ prātar apūpaṃ bhakṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9539: madhyaṃdine vividham annam aśnāti, aparāhṇe [549]{*4/506*} modakān bhakṣayatīty ekasminn ahanīti gamyate. tasmāt sadyaskālā evaṃjātīyakā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9540: vikṛtayaḥ, dvyaihakālyaṃ hi codakaprāptam ānumānikam, pratyakṣarūpayā sadyaskālatayā bādhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9543: iti cet paśyasi, prāptaḥ sāṅgaṃ śrūyate, tathā madhyaṃdine sāyaṃ ceti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9544: utkarṣo bhaviṣyati, yathaiteṣu kāleṣu sāṅgam. na ca dvyahakālatāyā bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9545: ekasyāhnaḥ prātar anīkavantam upakraṃsyate, dvitīyasya prātar yakṣyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9546: evaṃ sāṃtapanīyā{*4/507*} pūrvedyur madhyāṃdina upakraṃsyate, aparedyur madhyaṃdine yakṣyate. tathā gṛhamedhīye sāyam upakramaṇaṃ pūrvedyuḥ, sāyaṃ yāgo 'paredyur iti. nanu vākyād ekam ahar gamyata ity uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9547: padārthasāmarthyajanito hi vākyārtho bhavati. na cātra padārthasāmarthyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:9552: naitad evam. kasmāt? tatsaṃbandhāt, ekakālasaṃbaddhāni pradhānāny aṅgaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9553: saha śrūyante. katham? sāṅgaṃ hi pradhānaṃ prātaḥkāle śrūyate, tathā madhyaṃdine sāyaṃ ca. nāṅgāni prātaḥkālādiṣu. tatrānyakāleṣv aṅgeṣv anyakāleṣu ca pradhāneṣu, na sāṅgaṃ teṣu kāleṣu kṛtaṃ syāt. tasmāt sadyaskālā evaitā vikṛtaya iti. api ca, dvy ahaṃ sākamedhair iti śrūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9558: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś carantīty utkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9559: tathāgnīṣomīye paśau, tiṣṭhantaṃ paśuṃ prayajantīty apakarṣaḥ. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9560: saṃdehaḥ, kim utkarṣe 'nuyājamātram utkṛṣyate, apakarṣe ca prayājamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9561: utotkarṣe 'nuyājādi, apakarṣe ca prayājāntam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? yāvad
GSP28msbh1-7u:9562: uktam, utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ syāt. kutaḥ? aṅgānāṃ mukhyakālatvāt. evam anyeṣāṃ pradhānakālatā bhaviṣyatīti. tatra sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:9565: tadādy utkarṣe, tadantam apakarṣe gamyeta. kutaḥ? abhisaṃbandhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9566: yad{*4/510*} anuyājānāṃ parastāt samāmnāyate, tat pradhānād antaraṃ{*4/511*} prayogavacanena prāptaṃ bādhitvā pāṭhasāmarthyād anuyājebhyaḥ parastāt kriyate, tathā yas tataḥ paraḥ, sa tataḥ parastāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9567: evam eka utkṛṣyamāṇaḥ sarvaṃ guṇakāṇḍam utkarṣati, tathāpakṛṣyamāṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9573: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate prātaranuvākakāle, pratiprasthātaḥ savanīyān [551]{*4/512*} nirvapasveti preṣyatīti savanīyānāṃ nirvāpakālaḥ. asti ca bahiṣpavamāne stute, agnīd agnīn vihara, barhi stṛṇīhi, puroḍāśān alaṃkurv iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prātaranuvākakāle savanīyān nirūpya pracaraṇīhomādayaḥ saumikāḥ padārthāḥ, uta pauroḍāśāḥ{*4/513*} prāg alaṃkaraṇād iti. kiṃ prāptam? aniyamaḥ, niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9574: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pravṛttyā kṛtakālānām, jñānakālānāṃ padārthānāṃ pravṛttyā niyamaḥ syāt, prayujyamānam eva hi pūrvapadārtham
GSP28msbh1-7u:9575: abhiniyacchati. sa tasya parastāt samāmnātaḥ, parastāt kartavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9576: saumikasya tu padārthasya pracaraṇīhomasya vacanāt kramo bādhitaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9577: alaṃkaraṇaṃ ca bahiṣpavamānasya parastāt samāmnātam, tasmāt tasya pūrvaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9578: padārtho nirvapaṇādīnām antaḥ. tata uttare saumikāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9582: śabdaś ca vipratiṣidhyate, alaṃkurv ity uktaḥ prokṣaṇādīn pratipadyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9583: asmatpakṣe tu, alaṃkurv ity ukte 'laṃkaraṇam eva pratipatsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9584: tatrālaṃkaraṇe prāptakāle prāptakālavacano loḍanto 'nugrahīṣyate. tasmād atra prāvṛttikaḥ krama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9585: asaṃyogāt tu vaikṛtaṃ tad eva pratikṛṣyeta//5.1.27//
GSP28msbh1-7u:9586: asti darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtike paśāv agnīṣomīye vaikṛtaṃ yūpakarma, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:9587: pratikṛṣyate, dīkṣāsu yūpaṃ chinattīti. tat pratikṛṣyamāṇam arvācīnāny apy agnīṣomapraṇayanādīni prati[552]{*4/514*}karṣati, uta neti saṃśaye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9589: tathā prāpte brūmaḥ, vikṛtāv abhyadhikaṃ yat, tat pratikṛṣyamāṇaṃ tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:9590: 'rvācīnāny apy agnīṣomapraṇayanādīni na pratikraṣṭum arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9591: asaṃyogāt, pāśukaṃ yūpakarma, tataḥ prācīnaṃ saumikam. na tayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. na saumikaḥ padārthaḥ, pāśukasyopakārakaḥ paśor vā. yadi hi tayor upakārakaḥ syāt, tatas tasyopakurvataḥ kramo 'py asya sāhāyyaṃ kurvan guṇabhūtaḥ syāt. na tv etad asti, tasmān naiṣāṃ paraspareṇa krame niyamaḥ. ato yūpamātraṃ pratikṛṣyate. api ca yūpamātraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9592: pratikṛsya kṛtārthe śabde saumikānāṃ svakramabādho na bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9596: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś carantīti. anuyājā utkṛṣyamāṇā dākṣiṇāgnikau homāv utkarṣanti, neti saṃśayaḥ. saṃbandhād
GSP28msbh1-7u:9598: iti prāpte ucyate, naivāv utkraṣṭum arhanti, ye{*4/516*} tayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9599: sva{*4/517*} 'nuyājāḥ, saṃbaddhās{*4/518*} te, na prayuktāḥ parakīyaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9600: teṣām artho nirvartita iti. padārthānāṃ ca kramo bhavati, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:9601: padārthaprayojanānām, yaugapadyena hi padārthā upakurvantīti vakṣyāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9602: padārthānāṃ cotpattiḥ kramavatī, pṛthakśabdatvād utpatteḥ, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:9604: 'nuyājotpatter utkarṣikāyā abhāvād dākṣiṇāgnikau homau notkṛṣyeyātām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9605: api cānuyājamātram utkṛṣya [553] kṛtārthe śabde dākṣiṇāgnikayor homayoḥ svakramabādho na bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9610: darśapūrṇamāsayor vediḥ, havir abhivāsanottarakāle samāmnātā. sāmāvāsyāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9611: pratikṛṣyate, pūrvedyur amāvāsyāyāṃ vediṃ karotīti. sā tv apakṛṣyamāṇā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9612: tato 'rvācīnān padārthān apakarṣati, neti saṃśayaḥ. ucyate, saṃbandhāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9614: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tathāpūrvam, aprakṛtir pūrvikāyām amāvāsyāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9615: vedikaraṇaṃ pūrvedyur āmnātam, ubhayor api śvobhūte havir abhivāsanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9616: abhivāsanaṃ kṛtvāmāvāsyāyāṃ vediḥ kartavyeti na śrutyādīnām
GSP28msbh1-7u:9617: anyatamat{*4/519*} kāraṇam asti. tasmān nābhivāsanāntāḥ pratikraṣṭavyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9622: cāturmādyeṣu sākamedhāvayavaḥ sāṃtapanīyā nāmeṣṭiḥ, marudbhyaḥ sāṃtapanebhyo mādhyaṃdine caruṃ nirvapatīti{*4/520*}, sā daivān mānuṣād vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9623: pratibandhād{*4/521*} utkṛṣyamāṇā agnihotram utkarṣet, na veti saṃśaye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9626: 'gnāv agnihotraṃ viguṇaṃ syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavyam, savanavat, yathā prātaḥsavanaṃ daivān mānuṣād vā pratibandhād{*4/524*} utkṛṣyamāṇaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam utkarṣatīti, evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9633: evaṃ sāṃtapanīyam agnihotreṇa na vyavahitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tatra kramo 'nugrahīṣyate. kramabhede ca doṣaḥ śrūyate, apa vā etad yajñāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:9634: chidyate{*4/525*}, yad anyasya tantre vitate 'nyasya tantraṃ pratīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9638: nāgnihotrasya sāṃtapanīyāṅgam, na sāṃtapanīyāyā vāgnihotram. tena nāsāv agnihotrasya purastāt kartavyā, ato nāgnihotram utkraṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9640: prāptaṃ cāgnihotrasya nimittam, sāyaṃ juhoti, prātar juhoti, udite juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9641: anudite juhoti, prathamāstamite juhoti, saṃdhau juhoti, nakṣatrāṇi dṛṣṭvā juhotīti{*4/526*}, tan nātikramitavyam, tasmād api notkarṣaḥ. yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9642: vaiguṇyam iti{*4/527*}, utkarṣe 'pi vaiguṇyaṃ kālānyatvāt. aṅgāprāpter jaghanyaḥ kālavidhir bādhyatām iti cet. na, kālasya nimittatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9643: [555]{*4/528*} tad apāye 'śrutam eva sarvaṃ kriyeta, nimittaṃ ca{*4/529*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:9644: anupādeyatvena śravaṇāt. saptamī hy ādhārādiṣv asaṃbhavān nimittasaptamī draṣṭavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9645: atha yad uktam - savanavad utkraṣṭavyam iti{*4/530*}. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:9652: saṃbaddhaṃ hi savanaṃ savanena, ekakratusaṃbandhāt, tad utkṛṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9654: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, ṣoḍaśinaṃ prakṛtya, taṃ parāñcam ukthyebhyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9656: pratibandhād{*4/533*} ukthyāny utkṛṣyante, kiṃ tadā ṣoḍaśy
GSP28msbh1-7u:9657: utkṛṣṭavyaḥ{*4/534*}, neti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ prāptam? notkraṣṭavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9658: kutaḥ? evaṃ stotraṃ svasmin kāle ṣoḍaśinaḥ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9659: samayādhyuṣite sūrye ṣoḍaśinastotram{*4/535*} upakarotīti. tasmād anutkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9660: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, ṣoḍaśī cotkraṣṭavyaḥ. kasmāt? ukthyasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9661: ukthyasaṃyogo hi ṣoḍaśino bhavati, taṃ parāñcam ukthyebhyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9662: vigṛhṇātīti{*4/536*}. tasmād utkraṣṭavyaḥ ṣoḍaśī. yad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9663: ṣoḍaśinastotrakālenāvarjanaṃ{*4/537*} bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, stotrakramam anurudhyamānasya pradhānakramo virudhyeta. tasmān na stotrakramo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9664: 'nuroddhavyaḥ, ubhayaṃ na śakyam anugṛhītum{*4/538*}, grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9665: camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākarotīti [556]{*4/539*} śrūyate. tasmād utkraṣṭavyaḥ ṣoḍaśīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9675: saṃnipāte pradhānānām ekaikasya guṇānāṃ sarvakarma syāt//5.2.1//
GSP28msbh1-7u:9676: vājapeye, saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhata iti{*4/540*} śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9677: agnīṣomīye ca paśau paśudharmāḥ samāmnātāś codakena prāptāḥ. teṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:9678: saṃśayaḥ, kim ekasyāder ārabhya dharmān sarvān kṛtvā, dvitīyasya punarādita upakramitavyāḥ, atha prathamas tāvat sarveṣāṃ kartavyaḥ, tato dvitīya iti. kiṃ prāptam? ekaikasya sarve 'pavarjayitavyā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9679: pradhānāsatter anugrahāya, itarathā pradhānāsattir viprakṛṣyeta. yathā bahuṣv aśveṣu pratigṛhīteṣu ye puroḍāśāḥ, teṣu naikajātīyānusamayaḥ, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:9684: ekajātīyānusamayaḥ kartavyaḥ. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati? sahatvam anugrahīṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9685: tatsahatvaṃ śrūyate, vaiśvadevīṃ kṛtvā paśubhiś carantīti, ekasmin kāle paśūnāṃ pracāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9686: nanv evaṃ sati pūrvasya padārthasyottaraḥ padārthaḥ paśvantaravyāpāreṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:9687: vyavadhīyate. naiṣa doṣaḥ, evam api kṛtam evānupūrvyam. yo 'sau paśvantare vyāpāraḥ sa evāsau, na padārthāntaram, padārthāntareṇa vyavadhānaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9690: atha yad uktam, bahuṣu puroḍāśeṣu naikajātīyānusamaya iti, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:9691: parihartavyam. atrocyate, yuktaṃ tatra, yat{*4/542*} kāraṇād abhyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9692: ekajātīyānusamaye hi kriyamāṇe sahasrasyādhiśrayaṇe kṛte prathamaḥ śuṣyet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9693: tasya ca prathamaṃ na śakyeta kartum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9698: anekasahasrāśvapratigrahe tantrānuṣṭhānam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. kāṇḍānusamayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9701: muṣṭyādiṣu saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ muṣṭinānusamayaḥ, uta caturbhir muṣṭibhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9702: kiṃ prāptam? muṣṭineti. kutaḥ? ekamuṣṭinirvāpo hy ekaḥ padārthaḥ, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:9703: caturmuṣṭinirvāpaḥ. katham? ekasmin muṣṭau nirupte yatībhāvaḥ{*4/543*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9704: paryavasyati. na śakyaṃ vaditum, na kiṃcin niruptam iti. na ca, nirupte nirvāpo na kṛtaḥ syāt, na ca muṣṭimātreṇa niruptena na prayojanam. na hy [559]{*4/544*} ekasminn anirupte catvāraḥ saṃbhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9705: muṣṭisamānādhikaraṇo hi catuḥśabdaḥ, tasmān muṣṭinānusamayaḥ kāryaḥ. evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9706: kapālānn upadadhātīti. tathā, madhyād avadyati pūrvārdhād avadyati, tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9712: catuḥsaṃkhyatvān nirvāpasya. kathaṃ catuḥsaṃkhyatā? catuḥśabdasya nirvapatinā saṃbandhāt, evaṃ saha karmaṇā, anekaguṇavidhānaṃ nyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9713: itarathā, muṣṭisaṃbandhe sati vākyabhedaḥ prasajyeta. anirvāpāṅgaṃ ca syāt. tathopadhānādiṣv api, aṣṭākapālam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:9714: nirdeśāt. dvir avadyati{*4/545*}, trir abhyaṅkte, ekaviṃśatyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9715: pāvayatīti{*4/546*} saṃkhyādīnāṃ kriyāguṇatvaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyenānusamaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9719: saṃyukte tu prakramāt tadaṅgaṃ syād itarasya tadarthatvāt//5.2.6//
GSP28msbh1-7u:9721: saṃśayaḥ, kim avadānenānusamayaḥ, utāvadānena pradānānteneti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9722: avadāneneti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ? pṛthakpadārthatvāt, pṛthak padārtho hy
GSP28msbh1-7u:9723: avadānam, yatībhāvasya paryavasānāt, avadyativacanāt. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9724: saṃyukte tu prakramāt tadaṅgaṃ syāt, itarasya tadarthatvāt. nāvadānaṃ pṛthak padārthaḥ, pradānasya sa upakramaḥ, itarathāvadyater adṛṣṭārthatā [560]{*4/548*} syāt. saṃkhyāviśeṣavidhānārthaṃ ca punarvacanam. tasmāt padārthāvayavo 'vadānam, na cāvayavasahatvaṃ prayogavacanenocyate, tasmāt pradānāntenānusamaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9728: jyotiṣṭome 'gnīṣomīyapaśau yūpasyāñjanādyāḥ padārthāḥ śrūyante, teṣu yūpaikādaśinyāṃ prāpteṣu saṃśayaḥ, kim añjanādīnām{*4/549*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9730: parivyāṇāntam añjanādi syāt. kutaḥ? vacanāt, vacanam idaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9731: añjanādi yajamāno yūpaṃ nāvamṛjed āparivyāṇād iti{*4/550*}. na ca śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9732: bahuṣv añjanādinānusamayaḥ kartum, na cānavasraṣṭum. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9739: anavasargaś ca prakṛtāv arthāt kṛtaḥ, sāhāyyaṃ yajamānenādhvaryoḥ. evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9740: dṛṣṭārthatānavasargasya, itarathādṛṣṭārthatā syāt. na ca, arthāt kṛtaṃ codakaḥ prāpayati. tasmād yūpāntareṇocchrayitavyena{*4/551*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9741: kāraṇenāvasṛjet, yathā pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīty arthāt tasya dhāraṇārthaṃ pātraṃ bhidyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9744: na vā śabdakṛtatvān nyāyamātram itarad arthāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9745: na vaitatpadārthenānusamaya iti, parivyāṇāntena padārthakāṇḍenānusamayaḥ syāt. śabdakṛtaṃ hi prakṛtāv anavasarjanam, śaknoti hy ṛte 'pi yajamānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9746: adhvaryur yūpam ucchrayitum. saukaryam iti cet. vidhiśabdo bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9747: dṛṣṭārthataivaṃ hi niyamyeta, bhojane prāṅmukhateva. ato 'saṃbhavāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9748: padārthakāṇḍenānusamayaḥ. prayogavacanasya ca nyāyamātratvam, codakas tato balīyān. pātravivṛddhis tv arthāt kartavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9752: vājapeye prājāpatyāḥ paśavaḥ. teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kim ekaikasya paśor daivatāny avadāya tataḥ sauviṣṭakṛtāni, tata aiḍāni. atha daivatair devatānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:9753: anusamayaḥ, sauviṣṭakṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭakṛtānām, aiḍair aiḍānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ekaikasya kṛtsnāny avadāya tato hotavyam, prakṛtau vacanāt, etat kṛtaṃ prājāpatyeṣv api codakenaiva prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9755: naitad evam, daivatair devatānām, sauviṣṭakṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭakṛtānām, aiḍair aiḍānām iti. kasmāt? aikakarmyāt. evaṃ sahakṛtaṃ bhavati, yac ca vacanāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9756: prakṛtau kṛtsnāvadānam iti, daivatāny [562]{*4/554*} avadāya na tāvaty eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:9757: hotavyam, sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadeyāni. sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadāya na tāvaty eva hotavyam, aiḍāny avadeyānīti prakṛtau śrūyate. tad iha daivatair
GSP28msbh1-7u:9758: daivatānām anusamayaṃ kurvan nainaṃ{*4/555*} prākṛtaṃ dharmaṃ bādheta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9759: daivatāny avadāya naiva juhoti, sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadyatīti. atha sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadāya naiva juhoti, aiḍāny avadyatīti. tasmāt padārthamātreṇānusamaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9763: evaṃ manotāmantras{*4/556*} tantraṃ bhaviṣyati, itarathā paryāyeṇaiva syāt. tasmād daivatair daivatānāṃ sauviṣṭakṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭakṛtānām, aiḍair aiḍānām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9767: asti rājasūye nānābījeṣṭiḥ, agnaye gṛhapataye sutīnām{*4/557*} aṣṭākapālaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9768: nirvapet, somāya vanaspataye śyāmākaṃ carum ityevamādi{*4/558*}. asti tu tatra prākṛto 'vahantiḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ tatraikam ulūkhalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9769: paryāyeṇa, uta yaugapadyena bahūnīti. kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ? yadi kṛṣṇājinādhastaraṇādayaḥ pṛthak padārthāḥ, tato bhedaḥ. atha kṛṣṇājināstaraṇādis taṇḍulanirvṛttyanta ekaḥ padārthaḥ, tatas tantram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9770: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ekam iti. kutaḥ? paryāyeṇa vibhavāt. ekasyopādānena siddher dvitīyasyopādānam anarthakaṃ syāt. tasmāt tantram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9775: vivṛddhir ulūkhalānāṃ syāt, niyataṃ hy ānupūrvyaṃ pāṭhakṛtaṃ sahatve saty
GSP28msbh1-7u:9776: upapadyate, padārthānāṃ cānusamayaḥ, pṛthakpadārthāś cādhastaraṇādayo yatībhāvasya paryavasānāt, adhastaraṇādibhiś{*4/560*} ca padair abhidhānāt. tasmād vivṛddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9780: ekaṃ volūkhalaṃ paryāyeṇa syāt, eko hy adhastaraṇādis taṇḍulaparyantaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9781: padārthaḥ, staraṇādir hanter upakramaḥ phalīkaraṇāntaś ca tasyaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:9782: śeṣaḥ{*4/561*}, yato hantis taṇḍulaniṣpattyarthaḥ. evaṃ staraṇādīnāṃ hanteś ca nādṛṣṭārthatā bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tantram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9786: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ, tatra śrūyate, pṛṣadājyenānuyājān
GSP28msbh1-7u:9787: yajatīti{*4/562*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prayājānuyājānām ekaṃ pātram ājyasya pṛṣadājyasya ca dhāraṇārtham, uta bhidyate? kiṃ prāptam? ekam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9788: kutaḥ? prakṛtāv ekam, prakṛtivad ihāpy ekena bhavitavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9789: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pātrabhedaḥ syāt. kutaḥ? arthabhedāt, śuddhasya prayājā arthaḥ, pṛṣato 'py anuyājāḥ, pṛṣati gṛhyamāṇe [564]{*4/563*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9790: prayājānāṃ vaiguṇyam, śuddhe 'nuyājānām. na caikasmin pātre viviktaṃ śakyaṃ kartum. maryādāyām api kriyamāṇāyāṃ pradīyamānaṃ saṃsṛjyeta. api cākārabhedād upabhṛta upabhṛttvaṃ vihanyeta. prāṇimātrapuṣkarā{*4/564*} hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:9792: athocyeta, pṛṣadājyam apy ājyam eveti na miśratvaṃ doṣāyeti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9793: prakṛtāv utpavanāvekṣaṇayoḥ prayojanam etat, yad ājyasyāpareṇa dravyeṇāsaṃsargaḥ. evaṃ ced anupapannam, yat prayājā pṛṣadājyenejyerann
GSP28msbh1-7u:9794: iti. api ca, evaṃ saty avaśyaṃ haviṣaḥ kācin mātrāpanīyate. na ca śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9796: ihāpy ekakālam eva kartavyam. tasmāt pātrabheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9800: prakṛte pūrvoktatvād apūrvam ante syān na hy acoditasya śeṣāmnānam//5.2.17//
GSP28msbh1-7u:9801: agnau{*4/565*} nakṣatreṣṭyāṃ{*4/566*} śrūyate, agnaye kṛttikābhyaḥ puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped{*4/567*}. so 'tra jūhoti, agnaye svāhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9802: kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhetyevamādi{*4/568*} homāḥ samāmnātāḥ. santi tu prakṛtau
GSP28msbh1-7u:9803: nāriṣṭahomāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ nāriṣṭahomāḥ pūrvam, utopahomā iti saṃśaye ucyate, prākṛtaṃ pūrvam, vaikṛtam ante syād iti. kutaḥ? coditasya paripūrṇasya śeṣa āmnāyate, yathā jātasya putrasya krīḍanakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9809: mukhyānantaryam ātreyas tena tulyaśrutitvād aśabdatvāt prākṛtānāṃ vyavāyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9810: ātreyo manyate sma, mukhyānantaryaṃ vaikṛtasya, paścāt tu prākṛtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9811: prayujyeta. pradhānānantaraṃ vaikṛtasya pāṭhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, tasmāt pūrvam upahomās tato nāriṣṭhahomā iti. prākṛtānāṃ vyavāyaḥ syāt, yatas te na
GSP28msbh1-7u:9814: bādarāyaṇas tv ācāryo manyate sma, ante vaikṛtānāṃ prayoga iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9816: tatpradhānaśabdagṛhītāni hi prākṛtāny aṅgāni, tasmāc ca pradhānaśabdāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9817: param etat, so 'tra juhoty agnaye svāhā kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhetyevamādi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9818: tasmāt pratyakṣād eva kramān nāriṣṭahomebhyaḥ parāṃ copahomā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9820: anyārtho 'pi caitam arthaṃ darśayati, adhvarasya pūrvam athāgner upapraity etat karma, yad agnikarmeti. paścāt samāmnātasya paścāt prayogaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9822: kṛtadeśāt tu pūrveṣāṃ sa deśaḥ syāt tena pratyakṣasaṃyogān nyāyamātram
GSP28msbh1-7u:9823: rājasūye śrūyate, akṣair dīvyati śaunaḥśeṣam{*4/570*} ākhyāpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9824: abhi[566]{*4/571*}ṣicyata iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ devanādīnām{*4/572*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9825: ante prayogaḥ, utābhiṣekāt pūrvam iti. kiṃ prāptam? ante tu bādarāyaṇa ity ante prayogaḥ kartavya iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, kṛtadeśād abhiṣekāt pūrvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9826: tu prayogaḥ, kṛtadeśo hy abhiṣekaḥ, māhendrasya stotraṃ pratyabhiṣicyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:9827: iti pratyakṣānugrahāyābhiṣekāt pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam. nyāyamātram itarat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9833: asti agniḥ, ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/573*}. tatra dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sāvitrahomāḥ, ukhāsaṃbharaṇam, iṣṭakāḥ paśuś cety etad āmnātam. kiṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ kartavyam, uta dīkṣaṇīyeti. kiṃ prāptam? vaikṛtānām ante prayogaḥ, ante tu bādarāyaṇa iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pūrvaṃ sāvitrahomāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9834: iṣṭakāḥ, paśur ukhāsaṃbharaṇaṃ ca. kutaḥ? pratyakṣapāṭhāt, punas tatra dīkṣaṇīyāmnātā, tasyāś ca purastāt sāvitrahomāḥ, iṣṭakāḥ paśur ukhāsaṃbharaṇaṃ ca. tasmāt teṣāṃ pūrvaṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9839: tasminn eva krame codakena dīkṣitasaṃskārāḥ prāptāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:9840: aniyamaḥ, uta pūrvaṃ rukmapratimocanādi, uta dīkṣitasaṃskārā iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9841: prāptam? aniyamaḥ. athavā, yathā pratyakṣapāṭhakramād dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ purata
GSP28msbh1-7u:9843: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, dīkṣitasaṃskārāḥ pūrvaṃ kartavyā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9844: dīkṣaṇīyāṃ prati yaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ, yathā ca codakaḥ, tathobhaye 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:9845: parastād dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ kāryāḥ. yas teṣāṃ parasparāpekṣaḥ kramaḥ, tatra na kaścid ukhāsaṃbharaṇasyeva pratyakṣaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ pūrvatvaṃ sādhayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9846: asti tu saṃskāraṇāṃ prakṛtau pūrvaṃ pāṭhaḥ, vikṛtau
GSP28msbh1-7u:9847: rukmapratimocanasyottaraḥ, tena yathokta eva kramaḥ syāt, ante vaikṛtam iti. atha kim arthaṃ saṃnipāta āśaṅkyate? nanv ayaṃ saṃnipāta eva vyaktaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9850: śāstrāṇi cet pramāṇaṃ syuḥ, prāptās te paramāṃ gatim// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9855: vivṛddhiḥ karmabhedāt pṛṣadājyavat tasya tasyopadiśyeta{*5/2*} // MS_5,3.1
GSP28msbh1-7u:9856: agnīṣomīye paśau śrūyate{*5/3*}, ekādaśa prayājān yajati{*5/4*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:9857: ekādaśānuyājān yajatīti{*5/5*}. cāturmāsyeṣu, nava{*5/6*} prayājān yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9858: navānuyājān yajatīti{*5/7*}. agnau śrūyate, ṣaḍ upasada iti{*5/8*}. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9859: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prati prayājam ekādaśasaṃkhyā praty anuyājaṃ ca, tathā cāturmāsyeṣu navasaṃkhyā, tathāgnau copasatsu ṣaṭsaṃkhyā, uta sarvasaṃpādyā saṃkhyeti. kiṃ prāptam? pratipradhānaṃ saṃkhyā bhidyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9860: kutaḥ? bhinnāni hi tāni karmāṇi, tāni ca pradhānāni prati, saṃkhyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9861: śrūyate. pradhānasaṃnidhau ca guṇaḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ pratidhānaṃ bhidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9862: yathā{*5/9*} pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīti pratyanuyājaṃ pṛṣattā guṇo bhidyate, evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9872: api vā sarvasaṃkhyatvād vikāraḥ pratīyeta // MS_5,3.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9873: sarvasaṃpādyā saṃkhyā kalpyeta. kutaḥ? pṛthaktvaniveśinī hi saṃkhyāsati
GSP28msbh1-7u:9874: pṛthaktve 'bhyāsena kalpyeta, yāvaty asaṃbhavo bhedasya, tāvaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:9875: evābhyasyeta{*5/10*}, yāvati saṃbhavati, tāvati pṛthaktvaniveśa eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:9876: nyāyyaḥ, tasmāt sarvasaṃpādyaiva saṃkhyā. yat tu, pṛṣadājyavad iti, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9877: pṛṣattā ekasya na saṃbhavati, nāsau pṛthaktvaniveṣinī. na ca, ekasya kriyamāṇā sarveṣāṃ tantreṇopakarotīti{*5/11*}. [569]{*5/12*} tasmād avaśyaṃ bhettavyā, tantreṇa tūpakaroti saṃkhyā. itarāpekṣā hi sā bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9878: evaṃ sati sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9883: upasatsu saṃdehaḥ. kim āvṛttir daṇḍakalitavat, uta svasthānād vivardhanta
GSP28msbh1-7u:9884: iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? āvartanīyānām arthānām eṣa dharmaḥ, yad uta daṇḍakalitavat. yo hy ucyate, trir anuvākaḥ paṭhyatām iti, sa ādita ārabhya parisamāpya punar ādita ārabhyate, tasmād daṇḍakalitavad āvṛttiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9885: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, svasthānād vivardhitum arhati. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9886: kṛtānupūrvyatvāt, kṛtam ānupūrvyam upasatsu, prathamāṃ kṛtvā madhyamā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9887: kartavyā, tata uttameti. tatra yadi daṇḍakalitavad āvṛttiḥ syāt, uttamāṃ kṛtvā punarādyāyā abhyāse kriyamāṇe 'sthāne sā vivṛddhiḥ kṛtā bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9888: svasthānavivṛddhau naiṣa doṣaḥ. tasmāt svasthāne vivṛddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9891: samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa dhāyyāḥ syur dyāvāpṛthivyor antarāle samarhaṇāt darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sāmidhenyaḥ sāmidhenīr anvāheti{*5/14*}. [570]{*5/15*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9892: tatra kāmyāḥ sāmidhenīkalpāḥ, ekaviṃśatim anubrūyāt pratiṣṭhākāmasyety{*5/16*}evamādayaḥ, tatrāgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9893: vakṣyate{*5/17*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim āgantūnām ante niveśaḥ, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:9894: samidhyamānavatīṃ{*5/18*} samiddhavatīṃ{*5/19*} cāntareṇa niveśa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ante niveśaḥ, ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ{*5/20*}, ity anena nyāyeneti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:9895: niveśa iti. kutaḥ? dyāvāpṛthivyor antarāle samarhaṇāt saṃstavād ity arthaḥ{*5/21*}. iyaṃ vai samidhyamānavatī{*5/22*}, asau
GSP28msbh1-7u:9896: samiddhavatī{*5/23*}, yad antarā, tad dhāyyā, ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:9897: antarikṣasaṃstute{*5/24*} 'sminn{*5/25*} antarāle vidhīyante. tasmān nānte syur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9905: *{5/21: E1 gibt saṃstavād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9911: atha vā yā dhāyyāśabdikāḥ, tās tatra bhavitum arhanti. tena hi śabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:9912: tatra saṃstavaḥ, saṃstavāc ca vidhānam, yathā, pṛthupājavatyau{*5/26*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9913: dhāyye, uṣṇikkakubhau dhyāyye iti. kāḥ punar etā dhāyyā iti{*5/27*} nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9914: nāsya śabdasya prasiddhim upalabhāmahe. ucyate, sāmidhenyo dhyāyyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9915: kutaḥ? evaṃ hi bhagavataḥ pāṇiner vacanam - pāyyasāṃnāyyanikāyyadhāyyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9916: mānahavirnivāsasāmidhenīṣv{*5/28*} iti, asmād vacanāc chrutim anumimīmahe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9917: katamāsu sāmidhenīṣv iti. ucyate, aviśeṣāt sarvāsvati gamyate. iha tu samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa dhyāyyāḥ syur iti. sarvāsu sāmidhenīṣu satīsu dhyāyyāvacanād viśiṣṭānāṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ dhāyyāśabda iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9918: nanu pāṇinivacanād viśeṣeṇa sarvā dhāyyāḥ. nety āha, viśiṣṭāsv api vacanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:9919: upapadyata eva. yadi viśiṣṭāḥ, tataḥ [571]{*5/29*} kā iti. ucyate, yāsu dhāyyāśabdaḥ śrūyate, tās tāvad dhāyyāḥ. tāsu ca dhāyyāsu satīṣu vacanam arthavad bhavati. arthavati ca sati vacane nānyā dhāyyāḥ, pramāṇābhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:9926: uṣṇikkakubhoḥ ca ante prayogo dṛśyate, yaj jagatyā paridadhyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:9927: antaṃ{*5/30*} yajñaṃ gacchet, atha yat triṣṭubhā paridadhāti nāntaṃ gacchatīti. nanu triṣṭub atrānte dṛśyate, noṣṇikkakubhāv iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9928: triṣṭubham evāyam uṣṇikkakumāv iti brūte. katham? triṣṭubho vīryam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:9929: evaṃ ante{*5/31*} saṃstuteḥ, triṣṭubho vā etad vīryaṃ yad uṣṇikkakubhāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:9932: *{5/30: E2 om. uṣṇikkakubhoḥ ca ante prayogo dṛśyatem yaj jagatyā paridadhyād antaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9934: stomavivṛddhau bahiṣpavamāne purastāt paryāsād āgantavaḥ syus tathā hi iṣṭaṃ dvādaśāhe // santi vivṛddhastomakāḥ kratavaḥ, ekaviṃśenātirātreṇa prajākāmaṃ yājayeyus{*5/32*} triṇavenaujaskāmaṃ trayastriṃśena pratiṣṭhākāmam
GSP28msbh1-7u:9935: iti{*5/33*}. tatrāgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇaṃ vakṣyate{*5/34*}. atha bahiṣpavamāne vaikṛteṣv ānīyamāneṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ vaikṛtānām ante
GSP28msbh1-7u:9936: niveśaḥ, uta prāk paryāsād iti. kiṃ prāptam? purastāt paryāsād āgantavaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9937: syuḥ. tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśāhe, stotrīyānurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9938: vṛṣaṇvantastṛcā bhavanti. tṛca uttamaḥ paryāsa iti, ihāpi prāk paryāsād
GSP28msbh1-7u:9945: prayāsaśabdaś cāntavacano loke dṛśyate, yathā, kṣetraparyāsaḥ, nadīparyāsa
GSP28msbh1-7u:9948: ante vaivaṃjātīyakaṃ vaikṛtaṃ syāt. uktam, ante tu bādarāyaṇa iti{*5/36*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9952: atha yad uktam{*5/37*}, tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ{*5/38*} dvādaśāha iti, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:9953: parihartavyam. atrocyate, vacanād dvādaśāhe bhavati, stotrīyānurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ vṛṣaṇvantas tṛcā bhavanti, tṛca uttamaḥ paryāsa iti. na hi vacanasyātibhāro 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9958: na cāyaṃ tadvikāraḥ, yat tato dharmān gṛhaṇīyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9960: yo 'pi tadvikāraḥ, tatrāpy anta eva niveśaḥ. kutaḥ? apūrvāt, vṛṣaṇvatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9961: tṛcānām, vṛṣaṇvanta{*5/39*} eva prākparyāsāt, yāvad vacanaṃ vācanikam, na sadṛśam upasaṃkrāmati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9966: pavamānayoḥ sāmnām āgama iti vakṣyate{*5/41*}. tatrāgamyamāneṣu sāmasu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ teṣām ante niveśaḥ, uta gāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭupsv iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9967: prāptam? anta uttarayor dadhyāt. ukto 'tra nyāyaḥ, ante bādarāyaṇa iti{*5/42*}. tasmād ante niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9972: gāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭūpsu niveśaḥ. kasmāt? vacanāt, trīṇi ha vai
GSP28msbh1-7u:9973: yajñasyodarāṇi gāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭub iti. atra hy evāvapanti, ata evodvapantīti vacanenāsty upālambhaḥ. tasmān naiṣām ante niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9975: aupānuvākye kāṇḍe grahā iṣṭakāś ca samāmnātāḥ, eṣa vai haviṣā havir
GSP28msbh1-7u:9976: yajate, yo dābhyaṃ{*5/43*} gṛhītvā somāya yajata iti{*5/44*}. tathā, parā vā etasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti yo 'śuṃ gṛhṇātīti. tatheṣṭakāś citriṇīr upadadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9978: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ graheṣṭakamaupānuvākyaṃ savanaśeṣaś citiśeṣaś ca. atha kiṃ kratuśeṣo 'gniśeṣaś ceti. [574]{*5/47*} kiṃ prāptam? savanacitiśeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9979: kutaḥ? grahaiḥ savanāny ārabhyante, iṣṭakābhiś citayaḥ, yac ca yenārabhyate tat tad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9986: kratvagniśeṣaḥ syāt. kutaḥ? coditatvāt, agniś cetavyaḥ śrūyate, ya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9987: evaṃ{*5/48*} vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*5/49*}. na citiś cetavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9988: iṣṭakācayanenāgniś cetavyaḥ śrūyate, agnim iti dvitīyānirdeśāt. tathā, yo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9989: dābhyaṃ{*5/50*} gṛhītvā somāya yajata ity adābhyasya yajatinā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9990: tathāṃśoḥ. tasmāt sakṛd yāgasaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9991: śrutaṃ saṃbandham abhinirvartya. tathā sakṛd agnisaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā kṛtī manyeta, acodanā citisavanayoḥ, na hi te kartavyatayā codyete, parārthaṃ hi tayoḥ śravaṇam. kiṃ prayojanam? savanacitiśeṣatve, pratisavanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9992: grahaṇam, praticiti ceṣṭakopadhānam. kratvagniśeṣatve sakṛd grahaṇopadhāne.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9998: aupānuvākye śrūyate, citriṇīr upadadhāti, vajriṇīr upadadhātīti{*5/51*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9999: tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim etāḥ pañcabhyāṃ citāv upadheyāḥ, uta madhyamāyām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10000: kiṃ prāptam? pañcabhyām eveṣṭakāḥ kṛtakramāḥ, anyā naitābhir vyaveṣyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10004: āvapanaṃ vottamā citiḥ. anyā iṣṭakā upadadhātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10007: naivaitāntyāyāṃ citau. kasyāṃ tarhi? madhyamāyām. kutaḥ? brāhmaṇavatya etā iṣṭakāḥ, tāsāṃ madhyamā citir āmnāyate. yāṃ vai kāṃcid brāhmaṇavatīm iṣṭakām abhijānīyāt, tāṃ madhyamāyāṃ citāv upadadhyād iti. nanu sarvā eveṣṭakā brāhmaṇavatyaḥ. nety āha, aparā liṅgakramāt samākhyānāc ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10010: aupānuvākye kāṇḍa iṣṭakāḥ samāmnātāḥ, vajriṇīr upadadhāti, citriṇīr
GSP28msbh1-7u:10012: samadhigatam, madhyamāyāṃ citāv upadheyā iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prāg lokāṃpṛṇāyāḥ, uta paścād iti{*5/55*}. kiṃ prāptam? ante tu bādarāyaṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10013: iti{*5/56*}. evaṃ prāpte, ucyate, prāg lokaṃpṛṇāyāḥ tasyāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10014: saṃpūraṇārthatvāt, saṃpūraṇārthatā tasyāḥ śrūyate, yad evāsyonam, yac
GSP28msbh1-7u:10015: chidram, tad anayā{*5/57*} pūrayati, lokaṃ pṛṇa, chidraṃ pṛṇa iti{*5/58*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10016: apūrvatvāc vārthasya{*5/59*}, vidhir evāyaṃ saṃstaveneti{*5/60*} gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10028: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ. santi ca niyatāni karmāṇi, agnihotrādīni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10029: aniyatāni caindrāgnādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ pavamāneṣṭīḥ kṛtvā karmāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10030: pratipattavyāni, utāhitamātreṣv agniṣv iti. kiṃ prāptam? āhitapātreṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10031: kutaḥ? āhitamātreṣv asāv agniṣu karmāṇi kartuṃ samartho bhavati, yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10032: āhitāgnir na klinnaṃ dārvā dadhyād iti. darśayati{*5/62*} ca, agniṃ vai sṛṣṭam agnihotreṇānudravantīty āhitamātreṣv agnihotraṃ darśayati. tasmān na pavamāneṣṭayaḥ pratīkṣitavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10033: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pavamāneṣṭibhiḥ saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu karmāṇi varteran.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10034: kutaḥ? saṃskārāṇāṃ tadarthatvāt, saṃskāraśabdā eta āhavanīyādayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10035: saṃskārasya kasyacid abhāvena, āhavanīyādiṣu pratipattiḥ syāt. tasmāt saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu karmāṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10040: yat tu, āhitāgnir na klinnaṃ dārvā dadhyād{*5/63*}ityevamādi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10041: yuktam{*5/64*}, yad āhitamātreṣu kriyate, āhitāgnes tadvratam ucyate. sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10042: ca, āhitamātreṣv āhitāgniḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. tasmād anantaraṃ vrataṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10048: atha yad uktam, āhitamātreṣv agnihotraṃ{*5/65*} darśayati, pūrvam iṣṭibhya iti, tasya kaḥ parihāra ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10052: arthavāda eṣaḥ. kutaḥ? arthasya vidyamānatvāt. vidyamāno hi tatrānya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10053: evāgnihotrahomaḥ. kathaṃ hotavyam agnihotraṃ na hotavyam iti mīmāṃsante
GSP28msbh1-7u:10054: brahmavādinaḥ. yad yajuṣā juhuyād ayathāpūrvam āhutī juhuyāt, yadi na juhuyād agniḥ parāpatet. tūṣṇīm eva hotavyam iti. tasya tūṣṇīṃ homasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10057: nyāyavipratiṣedhaś ca bhavet. yady anantaram agnihotrādayaḥ syuḥ, yaḥ pūrvokto nyāyaḥ{*5/67*}, sa vipratiṣidhyeta, na vā tāsāṃ tadarthatvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10061: saṃcite tv agnicid yuktaṃ prāpaṇān nimittasya // MS_5,3.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10062: agnicid varṣati na dhāvet, na striyam upeyāt, tasmād agnicitā pakṣiṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10063: nāśitavyā ityevamādayaḥ padārthāḥ śrūyante. teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ saṃcitamātre pratipattavyā uta kratvanta iti. kiṃ prāptam? saṃcitamātra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10064: eveti. agniṃ yaś citavān so 'gnicid iti tasya śrūyamāṇāś citavato
GSP28msbh1-7u:10065: 'nantaram eva prāpnuvanti, prāpte nimitte naimittikaṃ kartavyam. tasmād anantaram eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10068: prayogavacano hy atra tān padārthān prāpayati, yeṣāṃ kratvarthatvam. na caiṣāṃ kratvarthatvam asti, puruṣārthā hy ete. katham? pratiṣedhe puruṣaḥ śrūyate, varṣati na dhāvet, na striyam upeyād ityevamādi. na ca kratvarthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10069: ete prasaktāḥ, yena pratiṣedhaḥ krator upakuryāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10070: nanu puruṣārthā api citavataḥ śravaṇāc cayanānantaraṃ prāptāḥ. neti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10073: agnyarthaṃ cayanaṃ tat, yad agneḥ svaṃ kāryaṃ kurvataḥ sāhāyye vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10074: tat tadartham. kaś ca tasya svārthaḥ? yāgāsiddhiḥ, siddhe ca yāge
GSP28msbh1-7u:10075: cayanenopakṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt siddhe yāge 'gnicit, tena kratvanta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10078: pareṇāvedanād dīkṣitaḥ syāt sarvair dīkṣābhisaṃbandhāt // MS_5,3.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10079: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped dīkṣiṣyamāṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10080: iti{*5/70*}. tathā, daṇḍena dīkṣayati{*5/71*}, mekhalayā dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10081: kṛṣṇājinena dīkṣayatīty{*5/72*}evamādi. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ sarvair dīkṣito bhavati, atha veṣṭyante dīkṣita iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? sarvair
GSP28msbh1-7u:10082: iti. kutaḥ? dīkṣābhisaṃbandhāt, dīkṣāsaṃbandho bhavati, daṇḍena dīkṣayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10083: dīkṣām asya karotīty arthaḥ{*5/73*}. yadīṣṭyante dīkṣitaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10084: [579]{*5/74*} katham asya daṇḍena dīkṣāṃ kuryāt. teneṣṭyā na dīkṣitaḥ. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10085: ca, asyeṣṭyante dīkṣitaśabdaṃ paśyāmaḥ, āvedane tv asya dīkṣitaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10086: tasmān na tāvati dīkṣitaḥ syāt. na ca saṃbhavati sam-uccaye vikalpo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10087: nyāyyaḥ, pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt. tatra prayogavacano bādhyeta. tasmād bhinneṣv api dīkṣāsaṃbandhavākyeṣu prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatety āvedanakāle dīkṣitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10092: *{5/73: E1 gibt dīkṣām asya karotīty arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10093: iṣṭyante vā tadarthā hy aviśeṣārthasaṃbandhāt // MS_5,3.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10094: iṣṭyante vā dīkṣitaḥ syāt, tadarthā hi sā dīkṣaṇārthā{*5/75*}. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10095: dīkṣiṣyamāṇasya adīkṣitasya sā bhavati, yadi tasyā uttarakāle dīkṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10096: evaṃ sā dīkṣiṣyamāṇasya. tasmād vākyād avagamyate, bhavati tadā dīkṣita
GSP28msbh1-7u:10097: iti, dīkṣākāraṇe padārthe nirvṛtte kim iti na dīkṣitaḥ syāt? vākyaṃ hi nirapekṣaṃ dīkṣita iti jñāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10098: yat tu, dīkṣāsaṃbandho daṇḍena dīkṣayatīti. kathaṃ sa dīkṣitatve syād iti daṇḍenaivaṃ dīkṣitaṃ saṃpādayatīty{*5/76*} avagacchāmaḥ. yat tu, anantaraṃ dīkṣitaśabdo nāstīti. na śabdasyāprayogo 'rthābhāve hetuḥ. saty apy arthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:10099: tadavasarābhāvān na prayujyate śabdaḥ. anyena ca dīkṣita ity avagamyate vākyena, āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped dīkṣyamāṇa iti. yac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10100: āvedanakāle dīkṣitaśabda iti. iṣṭyante 'pi dīkṣitasyāsāv aviruddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10101: prayogavacanaś cāviruddhaḥ, yata ekaṃ dīkṣākāraṇam, anyair dīkṣitaṃ saṃpādayatīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10106: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ, iṣṭadīkṣaṇārthā, iṣṭyante ca pravṛttir iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10107: samākhyānaṃ ca tadvad iti yadvan nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ. katham? dīkṣaṇīyeti tādarthyakarī samākhyā bhavati, yathā snānīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ceti. tasmāc ca paśyāmaḥ, iṣṭir dīkṣaṇārthā, iṣṭyante ca pravṛttir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10109: iha kāmyā iṣṭaya udāharaṇam. aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped{*5/78*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10110: ityevamādayaḥ, gavādayaḥ, somāḥ, saumyādayaḥ, paśavaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yena krameṇādhītāḥ, tenaiva krameṇa prayoktavyāḥ, utāniyama iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? kratūnām ānupūrvyaṃ yat pāṭhe, tad eva prayoge bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10111: evaṃ pāṭhakramo 'nugṛhīto bhaviṣyati, itarathā pāṭhakramo bādhyeta, tan mā bhūd iti krameṇānuṣṭhātavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10115: na vā, ayaṃ{*5/79*} kramo niyamyeta. kutaḥ? asaṃbandhāt. pṛthak pṛthag eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ prayogavacanāni, tāni svapadārthānām upasaṃhārakāṇi. yo yasya nopakārakaḥ, sa tasya na krameṇa, notkramaṇa. yo yasyopakaroti kasyacit, tasyopakurvataḥ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate. na caitāni karmāṇy
GSP28msbh1-7u:10116: anyonyasyopakurvanti. tasmān naiṣāṃ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate. tasmād asaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10120: kāmyāni caitāni karmāṇi, kāmāś ca krameṇotpadyante, tena nimittasyākramatvān na kramavanta
GSP28msbh1-7u:10122: iti yad uktaṃ pūrvapakṣe, tad eva punar ucyate parihartum. evaṃ krameṇa pāṭho 'rthavān bhaviṣyatīti. etad ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10123: syād vidyārthatvād yathā pareṣu sarvasvārāt // MS_5,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10124: syād arthavān kramapāṭhaḥ, asaty api prayoge krame, vidyāgrahaṇārthatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10125: karmāvabodhanārthāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ kramaniyamādṛṣṭaṃ tadāśrayam eva bhaviṣyatīti, yathā, tvatpakṣe, pareṣu sarvasvārāt, yasyāpi kramo 'ṅgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:10126: iti pakṣaḥ, tasyāpi sarvasvārāt pareṣāṃ sarvasvāreṇa yaḥ kramas
GSP28msbh1-7u:10129: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ{*5/81*} yaj jyotiṣṭomaḥ, ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajeta gartapatyam eva taj jāyate pra vā mīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10130: tatra saṃdehaḥ, ya eteneti kasya [582] ayaṃ vāda iti praśnenaivopakramaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10131: ucyate, ya etenety agniṣṭomasya vādaḥ. kutaḥ? prakaraṇāt, tasya hi prakaraṇe bhavaty etad vacanam. prakṛtavācīni ca sarvanāmāni bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10135: liṅgam api bhavati, tatra śrūyate, yasya{*5/82*} navatiśataṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10136: stotrīyā{*5/83*} iti, agniṣṭomasya hi bhavanti navatiśataṃ stotrīyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10137: katham? trivṛd bahiṣpavamānam, pañcadaśāny ājyāni, tāni catvāri. sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10138: ekonasaptatiḥ. pañcadaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ, tena caturaśītiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10139: saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni, tāni catvāri sāṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ, caturaśītyā saha dvipañcāśac chatam. saptadaśa ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ, tena ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śataṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10140: nava ca. ekaviṃśaṃ yajñāyajñīyam iti tad etan navatiśatam agniṣṭomasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10146: athānyeneti kiṃ saṃsthānāṃ vādaḥ, atha jyotiṣṭomavikārāṇām evaikāhādīnām
GSP28msbh1-7u:10147: iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam? saṃsthānām iti. kutaḥ? saṃnidhānāt, saṃnihitās tasmin prakaraṇe saṃsthāḥ, tāsāṃ vādaḥ prakaraṇānugrahāya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10148: tatprakṛter vāpattivihārau hi na tulyeṣūpapadyete // MS_5,3.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10149: tatprakṛter vā gavāder vādaḥ syāt, āpattivihārau hi prakṛtivikāramātreṣūpapadyete, na tulyaśabdeṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:10151: jyotiṣṭomaśabdakeneti. kathaṃ tarhi? anyeneti prakṛtād itarad bravīti, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10152: sa jyotiṣṭomena viśiṣyate, na hi śabdasyārthaḥ samīpagatena kṛtaprayojanenaikadeśe 'vasthāpayitavyo bhavati, na hi vākyena śrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:10153: bādhyate. atha, jyotiṣṭomād anyenety abhisaṃbadhyate, tato natarāṃ saṃsthāvādaḥ. kathaṃ punar āpattivihārau? prajāpatir vāgniṣṭomaḥ, sa uttarān ekāhān asṛjata te sṛṣṭvā abruvan{*5/85*}, na vai svenātmanā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10154: prabhavāma iti. tebhyaḥ svātantryaṃ prāyacchat, tathā ca te prābhavan tad,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10155: yathā vā idam agner jātād adhyagnayo{*5/86*} vihriyante. evaṃ vā, etasmād yajñād anye yajñakratavo vihriyante, yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate, sa taṃ dīpayati, yaḥ pañcadaśam, sa tam, yaḥ saptadaśam, sa tam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10156: ya ekaviṃśam, sa tam ityevam āhur eko yajña iti. ete vai sarve jyotiṣṭomāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10157: bhavantīti. evaṃ vaikṛtānāṃ saṃkīrtanāt, teṣām eva vāda iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10158: katham? athānyeneti, yo 'sāv anyaḥ, tatra prākṛtān dharmān vihṛtān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10159: darśayati, ato manyāmahe, yasya yato vihṛtiḥ, tenānyeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10164: yady evaṃ na tarhi tadvikārāṇāṃ vādaḥ, tatra na vihāro nāpattiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10165: prakaraṇādibhiḥ, te dharmā jyotiṣṭomasya, yadi hi{*5/87*} gavādayo{*5/88*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10166: vihriyeran prakaraṇādīni bādhyeran. tadāpattiḥ pratyakṣaviruddhā, praśaṃsā tv eṣā, āpattivihārābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10170: vidhipratyayād vā na hy akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt // MS_5,3.42 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10171: atrocyate, yady apy āpattivihārau na vidhīyete, te{*5/90*} tathāpi codakena vidhīyete. ye prakṛtau kartavyāḥ, te codakavacanād vikṛtāv api kartavyā gamyante. tadāpattivihārāv iva yatra bhavataḥ, tenānyeneti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10172: gamyate. na hy akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt, yo 'sāv anyaḥ, sa katham anayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10177: ya etenāniṣṭvā, athānyena yajeteti śrūyate. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ samadhigataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10178: tadvikārāṇāṃ vāda iti. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate, kim ekastomakasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10179: anekastomakasya ceti. kiṃ{*5/91*} prāptam? ekastomakasya vādaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10180: kratusaṃyogāt, ekastome kratusaṃyogo bhavati, yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati, yaḥ pañcadaśaṃ{*5/92*} sa tam, yaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10181: saptadaśaṃ{*5/93*} sa tam, ya ekaviṃśaṃ{*5/94*}, sa tam. trivṛdādaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10184: *{5/91: E2: kim ekastomakasya. krator eṣa vāda
GSP28msbh1-7u:10189: sarveṣāṃ vā codanāviśeṣāt praśaṃsā stomānām // MS_5,3.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10190: sarveṣāṃ caiṣa{*5/95*} vādaḥ, ekastomakānām anekastomakānāṃ ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10191: aviśeṣavacanād anyaśabdasya. nanv ekastomakāḥ kratavaḥ saṃkīrtyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10192: satyaṃ saṃkīrtyante, praśaṃsārtham, na [585]{*5/96*} viśeṣārtham. kaḥ punaḥ praśaṃsārthaḥ? yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati, codakaprāptā dharmā abhyastāḥ prakṛtau, vikṛtau sukhaṃ pratipadyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10195: kramako yo 'rthaśabdābhyāṃ śrutiviśeṣād arthaparatvāc ca // MS_5,4.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10196: iha pāṭhakramasya śrutyarthakramābhyāṃ saha bādhāṃ prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:10197: vicāraṇam{*5/98*}. kiṃ pāṭhakramas tābhyāṃ tulyaḥ, uta bādhyata iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10198: prāptam? tulyabalāv etau, pāṭho 'pi hi kāraṇaṃ śrutyarthāv api. na ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣo 'sti, tasmād aniyama iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10199: pāṭhakramo hi bādhyate śrutyā, arthena ca. kutaḥ? śrutiviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10200: arthaparatvāc ca. śrutiviśeṣaḥ kaḥ? yatra śravaṇaṃ tatra pratyakṣaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10201: kāraṇam, pāṭhakramas tv ānumānikaḥ, pāṭhakrameṇa smaraṇam, evam abhinirvartayitavyam ity avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10202: tasyaivānuṣṭhānam{*5/99*}. śrutyā punar anuṣṭhānam eva, evaṃ bhavatīti pratyakṣād avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10203: tathārthena. kutaḥ? arthaparatvāt, arthārthaṃ hi sarvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10206: kim udāharaṇaṃ prayojanaṃ ca? śrutyām{*5/101*} āśvino daśamo gṛhyate, taṃ tṛtīyaṃ juhoti, atra pāṭhakramasya balīyastve tṛtīyasya grahaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10207: siddhānte tu daśamasya. arthe, agnihotrahomaḥ pūrvam āmnāyate, paścāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:10208: chrapaṇam. evaṃ kartavyam, yadi pāṭho balavān. siddhānte śrapaṇaṃ pūrvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10216: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatra pūrvaṃ dadhno dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ, paścād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10217: āgneyasya, pradānaṃ cāgneyasya pūrvam. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prāvṛttikena krameṇa pūrvaṃ dadhno 'vadānābhighāraṇāsādanāni, uta mukhyakrameṇa pūrvam
GSP28msbh1-7u:10218: āgneyasyeti. kiṃ prāptam? aniyama ity. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, avadānādiṣu prāvṛttikena pūrvaṃ dadhna iti. kutaḥ? evam anujñātebhyo vyavadhāyakebhyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10219: nābhyadhiko 'nyo vā vyavadhāyakaḥ kalpito bhaviṣyati, darśayati ca dadhnaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10224: yathāpradānaṃ vā kartavyāni, yasya pradānaṃ pūrvam, tasyāvadānāni pūrvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10226: pradānopakramā ete na pṛthakpadārthā ete{*5/105*} ity uktam. abhighāraṇam avadānaṃ ca tasya pradānacikīrṣayaiva kriyate. āsādanam api pradānārtham
GSP28msbh1-7u:10227: evāsann akaraṇam{*5/106*}, evaṃ dṛṣṭārthatā bhavati. tasmān mukhyakrameṇāṅgānāṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10228: yat tu, dadhnaḥ pūrvaṃ pravṛttir iti. arthāt pūrvaṃ pravṛttiḥ, na pāṭhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10229: prāvṛttikāc ca mukhyakramo balīyān, mukhyakrame gṛhyamāṇe prathama ekaḥ padārtho viprakṛṣṭakālaḥ syāt, prāvṛttike punar gṛhyamāṇe sarveṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10230: viprakarṣaḥ. tasmān mukhyakramo balīyān iti. atha yal liṅgam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10236: *{5/106: E1 gibt āsann akaraṇam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10239: liṅgam apy asminn arthe bhavati, sa vai dhruvām evāgre 'bhighārayati, tato hi prathamāv ājyabhāgau yakṣyan bhavatīti. tasmād api mukhyakrameṇa niyama
GSP28msbh1-7u:10242: iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ samānātam. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim iṣṭipūrvatvam, somapūrvatvaṃ vā vikalpaḥ{*5/109*}, athaveṣṭipūrvatvam eveti. kiṃ prāptam? iṣṭipūrvatvam eva syāt. kutaḥ? vacanāt, vacanam idaṃ bhavati, eṣa vai devaratho yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:10243: darśapūrṇamāsau, yo darśapūrṇamāsāv iṣṭvā somena yajate, rathaspaṣṭa evāvasāne vare devānām avasyatīti{*5/110*}, nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10248: somaś caikeṣām agnyādheyasyartunakṣatrātikramavacanāt tadantenānarthakaṃ hi syāt // MS_5,4.6
GSP28msbh1-7u:10249: iṣṭipūrvatvam ity etad gṛhṇīmaḥ, kiṃ tu somaś caikeṣāṃ{*5/111*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10252: ādadhīta, nartuṃ sa{*5/113*} pratīkṣen na nakṣatram iti. yaḥ somayāgaṃ kartum ādadhīt, sa na pratīkṣeta nakṣatraṃ nāpy ṛtuṃ tāvaty evādadhītety ānantaryam ucyate. itarathā, ṛtunakṣatrātikramavacanam anarthakaṃ syāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10254: tayor anādaraḥ kīrtitaḥ syāt, tasmād asti somādhānayor ānantaryam iti. api ca vispaṣṭā cādyatanī vibhaktiḥ, somena yakṣyamāṇa iti, sā ca neṣṭipūrvatvam{*5/115*} anujñāya vivakṣyate, na tadādyatanakālavivakṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10255: tatrāyaṃ śabdo vipratiṣidhyeta. tasmād ānantaryavivakṣety avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10262: itaś ca somādhānayor ānantaryam. kutaḥ? tadarthavacanāt, yaḥ somena yajeta
GSP28msbh1-7u:10263: sa agnim ādadhīteti ca. sarvair apy asau yakṣyamāṇo 'gnim ādhatte somenāgnihotrādibhiś ca, nāsati somasya viśeṣe somārthatā syāt. ayam asau viśeṣaḥ syāt, yad ānantaryaṃ somādhānayor iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10264: ayakṣyamāṇasya ca pavamānahaviṣāṃ kālanirdeśād ānantaryād viśaṅkā syāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10265: somenāyakṣyamāṇasya ca pavamānahaviṣāṃ kālo nirdiśyate, yaḥ somenāyakṣyaṃāṇo 'gnim ādadhīta, sa purā saṃvatsarād dhavīṃṣi nirvaped iti, na khalu kaścid ayakṣyamāṇaḥ, sarvasya vihitatvāt. tasmād anantaram ayakṣyamāṇa iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10267: idaṃ prayojanasūtraṃ varṇyate. kṣīṇam adhikaraṇam. kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ? iṣṭir ayakṣyamāṇasya somena nirabhisaṃdhika ādhāne. tadarthatve tu somapūrvatvam{*5/116*}, somārthatāyāṃ tv ādhānasya somapūrvatvaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10271: asty ādhānam, tatraiṣo 'rhaḥ samadhigataḥ, iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ ceti. idānīṃ saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ vā, uta brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvam eva, uta kevalā paurṇamāsy utkṛṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10272: brāhmaṇasyobhau kalpāv iti. atha vā karmāntaram idam, yad ūrdhvaṃ somāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10273: atha vaikaṃ havir utkṛṣyate, brāhmaṇasyobhāv eva kalpāv iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10274: trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ vā. kutaḥ? aviṣeśāt. na kiṃcid viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvaṃ syāt. kasmāt? utkarṣāt, utkarṣo hi śrūyate, āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatayā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10275: sa someneṣṭvāgnīsomīyo bhavati. yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ haviḥ, tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10276: hy{*5/118*} anunirvapet, tarhy ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti. kim iva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt. tasmād brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvam eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10280: yad uktam, brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvam eveti, tan na, tasyāpy ubhau kalpau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10281: kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, na hi kalpayor brāhmaṇasya kaścid viśeṣa āmnāyate. nanv idānīm evoktam, brāhmaṇasyotkarṣa iti. neti brūmaḥ, paurṇamāsīmātrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10282: tatrotkarṣaḥ. śrutisaṃyogaḥ paurṇamāsyās tatra, yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10283: havir iti, yāvad vacanaṃ vācanikam, tatra na nyāyaḥ kramate. tulyayor ekadeśa utkṛṣṭe nūnam aparo 'py ekadeśa utkṛṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10286: yad ucyate, kevalā paurṇamāsy utkṛṣyata iti. tan na, kṛtsnasya darśapūrṇamāsakarmaṇa utkarṣaḥ, evaṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ, itarathā na syāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10287: phalam. ekadeśatvāt paurṇamāsyāḥ, kevalāyām utkṛṣyamāṇāyām avaśiṣṭasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10288: pūrvatra kriyamāṇasya na phalaṃ syāt, ekadeśatvāt, aphalatvāc coktam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:10289: na kriyeta. samudāye cotkṛṣyamāṇe bhavati phalam. tasmād arthāt samudāyasyotkarṣaḥ, evaṃ kṛtsnopadeśo 'rthavān bhaviṣyatīti. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10292: naitad asti{*5/120*}, yad evaṃ samudāyasyāsati vacana utkarṣaḥ parikalpyeta, tasmād anyad evaivaṃ nāmakaṃ karma, ūrdhvaṃ somāt syāt. evam ekadeśasyāśrutaṃ phalaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati. nāmadheyaṃ tu dvayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10293: karmaṇor ekam, akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣā iti yathā. paurṇamāsadharmakaṃ vā karmāntaraṃ codyata iti karmavidhānam, śruter etad bhavati, tad vākyasya bādhakam. tasmāt karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10297: karmāntarasyaitadvācakam iti pramāṇābhāvaḥ. prakṛtasya karmaṇo vācakam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10298: pratyakṣam, yac ca sapramāṇakam, tad grāhyam, anyāyaś cānekārthatvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10299: dharmagrahaṇe lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ śrutisaṃbhave kalpyaḥ syāt. api cāsya rūpaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10300: gamyate, rūpāvacanān na karmāntaram. tasmāt prasiddhena nāmnā prakṛtasya karmaṇo grahaṇaṃ kālavidhānārthaṃ syāt. phalavattvāc ca kṛtsnasyotkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10301: brāhmaṇasya [592]{*5/121*} ca tathaiva. yat tu, śrutir vākyād balīyasīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10302: atrocyate, yatra phalaṃ na śrūyate, vākyārtho 'pi tāvat tatra gṛhyate. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10303: ca, iha phalasya śravaṇam asti. kalpyaṃ phalam iti yad ucyate, na tat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10304: phalavacanam{*5/122*} antareṇa. tatra phalavacanaḥ śabdaḥ kalpyeta, tena ca sahaikavākyatā. kālavacanena tu saha pratyakṣeṇaikavākyateti. tasmān na karmāntaram. sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam NOTES:
GSP28msbh1-7u:10308: yaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇo 'gnim ādadhīta, nartuṃ sa{*5/124*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10309: pratīkṣen{*5/125*} na nakṣatram iti. atra saṃdehaḥ, kim ādhānasyāyaṃ kālaviśeṣabādhaḥ, uta somasyeti. kiṃ prāptam? ādhānasya kālabādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10310: svakāle syāt somaḥ. kutaḥ? avipratiṣedhāt, aṅgam ādhānam, tasya kālabādho nyāyyaḥ, na pradhānasya. aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyād iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10316: apanayo vādhānāt{*5/127*} somakālasya syāt. kutaḥ? ādhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10317: sarvakālatvāt, naivādhāne kaścit kālaniyamo 'sti, yad ahar evainaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10318: śraddhopanamet{*5/128*} tad ahar ādadhīteti{*5/129*}. aprāptam eva tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:10319: ādhānasya, yat pratiṣidhyate. tasmāt somasya kālabādha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10324: paurṇamāsy ūrdhvaṃ somād brāhmaṇasya vacanāt // MS_5,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10325: sthitād uttaram. na vaitad{*5/131*} asti, kṛtsnau darśapūrṇamāsāv utkṛṣyete, ūrdhvaṃ somāt, kevalā paurṇamāsy utkṛṣyate. kutaḥ? vacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10326: vacanam idam, yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havis tat tarhy anunirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10327: nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. tasmāt paurṇamāsīmātram utkṛṣyeta. yat tu phalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10328: nāstīti, samudāyād eva phalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, vacanād evaṃ vijñānāt. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10333: ekaṃ vā havir utkṛṣyeta, na kṛtsnā paurṇamāsī. kutaḥ? śabdasāmarthyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10334: ekaṃ havir utkraṣṭuṃ śabdaḥ samarthaḥ, yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havir iti śrūyate, yāvad vacanaṃ vācanikam, tāvad vacanenotkraṣṭuṃ śakyate, nānyad
GSP28msbh1-7u:10335: api. prāk somāt kṛtsnaṃ vidhīyate. tato yad vacanenotkṛṣyate, tad ūrdhvaṃ somāt, yan notkṛṣyate, tat prāg bhavitum arhati. tasmād ekaṃ havir
GSP28msbh1-7u:10339: puroḍāśas tv anirdeśe tadyukte devatābhāvāt // MS_5,4.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10340: idaṃ śrūyate, āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatayā, sa someneṣṭvāgnīṣomīyo bhavati, yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havis tat tarhy anunirvapet, tarhy ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti. yasmāt tasmin kāle so [594]{*5/133*} 'gnīṣomīyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10341: bhavati, na prācīne kāle tasmād ado havir anunirvaped iti, agnīṣomīyatvaṃ vidhāya dvidevatākatvaṃ hetutvena nirdiśyate. tasmād agnīṣomīyaṃ havir
GSP28msbh1-7u:10342: hetumat syāt, nānyadevatākam, tadāsāv agnīṣomau yaṣṭum arhati, na prāk sāsya devateti bhavati puruṣasyāpi yaṣṭur devatābhisaṃbandhaḥ. tasmāt puroḍāśo 'gnīṣomīyo nānyad dhavir iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10345: iti cet paśyasy agnīṣomīyatvāt puroḍāśa iti, ājyam api hy agnīṣomīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10348: miśradevataṃ hy ājyam, agnīṣomīyam, prājāpatyam, vaiṣṇavam iti ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10349: puroḍāśas tv agnīṣomīya eva. na tv atra miśradevatasya vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10350: miśradevatasya hi prāg api bhāvo 'vakalpyate. yad api tadānīṃ yajamāno nāgniṣomīyas taddevatārhaḥ, tathāpy ājyaṃ haviḥ kariṣyaty eva, prajāpatiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10351: yakṣyati, viṣṇuṃ vā. tasmāt tasyordhvabhāve na eṣa hetur agnīṣomīyatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10352: nāma. yathā caturdhākaraṇaṃ miśradevatatvād aindrāgnena bhavati, tadvat tatrāgneya iti, aindrāgno na śakyate vaditum, tad dhitaḥ sākāṅkṣān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10353: notpadyata iti. evam ihāgnīṣomīyaśabdena na śakyam ājyaṃ vaditum
GSP28msbh1-7u:10354: agnīṣomīyo hi asau{*5/134*}. tasmāc chakyaṃ prāg yajamānena kartum iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10355: tasmān na tasyotkarṣe 'gnīṣomīyatā yajamānasya hetur iti, miśradevatasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10360: vikṛteḥ prakṛtikālatvāt sadyaskālottarā vikṛtis tayoḥ pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10361: iha vaikṛtāni karmāṇy udāharaṇam, aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped
GSP28msbh1-7u:10362: ityevamādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim etā vikṛtayaḥ sadyaskālāḥ, uta dvyahakālā iti. kiṃ prāptam? vikṛtiḥ prākṛtān dharmāṃś codakena gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10363: atas te dharmā ānumānikāḥ, paurṇamāsī cānyaḥ kālaḥ. sa yadi vā prakṛtyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10364: gṛhyeta, yadi vā vikṛtyā, asaṃbhave 'nyatarasyāḥ kālas tyaktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10365: tatrānumāniko vaikṛtasya tyajyatām, na pratyakṣaśrutaḥ prākṛtasyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10366: nyāyyam. tasmāt sadyaskālā etā vikṛtayo bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10368: dvaiyahakālye kriyamāṇe yathānyāyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati, tasmād dvaiyahakālyaṃ syāt. codakas tathānugṛhīto bhavati, prakṛtau hi śrūyate, pūrvedyur agniṃ gṛhṇāti, uttaram ahar devatāṃ yajatīti. tasmād dvyahakālam ekam
GSP28msbh1-7u:10371: naitad evam, dvyahakālā vikṛtayo bhaveyur iti, sadyaskālāḥ syuḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10372: vacanam idaṃ bhavati, iṣṭyā{*5/137*} paśunā somenāgrayaṇena vā yakṣyamāṇaḥ sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā yajeteti, sāṅgasyaitad vacanam. tasmāt sāṅgaṃ paurṇa[596]{*5/138*}māsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kurvīteti gamyate, tena sadyaskālā vikṛtayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10376: iha sāṃnāyyavikārāś cāgnīṣomīyavikārāś codāharaṇam, sāṃnāyyavikārās tāvad yathā, āmikṣā{*5/139*} paśur iti, agnīṣomīyam{*5/140*} ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapec chyāmākam, brāhmaṇo vasante brahmavarcaskāma
GSP28msbh1-7u:10377: ity{*5/141*}evamādyaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim ete prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca somāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10378: utordhvam iti. kiṃ prāptam? prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca, viśeṣānavagamāt. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, ūrdhvaṃ somād syur iti, prakṛtir hy eṣām ūrdhvaṃ somāt, codakena ebhir api ūrdhvaṃ somāt bhavitavyam. sānnāyyasya ūrdhvaṃ somāt, vacanena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10379: asomayājī saṃnayed iti. agnīsomīyasyāpi, āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatayā sa someneṣṭvā bhavati{*5/142*}, yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ haviḥ, tat tarhy anunirvaped iti, tarhi sa ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti, tadvikṛtir api somād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10387: somavikārā gavādaya ekāhāḥ. teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsāt prāg
GSP28msbh1-7u:10388: ūrdhvaṃ ca prayoktavyāḥ, utordhvam iti. kiṃ prāptam? aniyamaḥ, aviśeṣāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10389: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tathā [597]{*5/143*} somavikārāḥ, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvaṃ syuḥ, jyotiṣṭomo darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10390: darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeteti{*5/144*}. codakenaiṣa dharmo gavādiṣv apy ekāheṣu prāpnoti. tasmāt te 'pi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvaṃ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10394: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyevamādi samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ svargo guṇataḥ, karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:10395: pradhānataḥ, uta karma guṇataḥ, svargaḥ pradhānata iti. kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10396: iha svargakāmo 'pi nirdiśyate, yajetety api. atra svargakāmayāgayoḥ saṃbandho gamyate. tasmiṃś ca saṃbandhe kiṃ yāgaḥ sādhanatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:10398: tatra yadi svargakāmasya puruṣasya yāgaḥ kartavyatayā codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10399: svargakāmena yāgaḥ kartavya iti, svargecchāviśiṣṭasya sa sidhyatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10400: gamyate. svargecchā tatra puruṣasya yāgaṃ pratyupadiśyate, tena tasya sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10401: sidhyati nānyasyeti. yaḥ svargakāmaḥ, sa śaknoti puruṣo yāgaṃ sādhayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10402: atha svargakāmasya kāmaḥ kartavyatayā codyate, tato yāgaviśiṣṭā kartavyateti yāgaḥ sādhako 'bhyupagamyate. sa cāyam ubhayor apy artha ekasmād uccaritād vākyād gamyate{*5/146*}, yāgo vā kartavyaḥ kāmo veti. na caitad yaugapadyena saṃbhavati, yadā kāmaḥ, na tadā yāgaḥ, yadā yāgaḥ, na tadā kāmaḥ, vacanavyaktibhedāt. upapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10403: [599]{*5/147*} tathedam aparaṃ saṃdigdham. kiṃ prītiḥ svargaḥ, uta dravyam iti. yadi dravyaṃ svargaḥ, tataḥ pradhānaṃ karma, dravyaṃ guṇabhūtam. atha prītiḥ svargaḥ, tato yāgo guṇabhūtaḥ, svargaḥ pradhānam iti. kutaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10404: saṃśayaḥ? nāsty atra kāmasya guṇatvena prādhānyena vā śrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10405: saṃbandhamātraṃ tv asya yāgena gamyate, dravyasya tu karmārthatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10407: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? svargo guṇataḥ, karma pradhānata iti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10408: tāvad{*5/148*} varṇayanti, dravyaṃ svarga iti. katham avagamyate? sarveṣām eva śabdānām arthajñāne laukikaḥ prayogo 'bhyupāyaḥ, tasmiṃś ca laukike
GSP28msbh1-7u:10409: prayoge dravyavacanaḥ svargaśabdo lakṣyate, kauśikāni{*5/149*} sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi svargaḥ, candanāni svargaḥ, dvyaṣṭavarṣāḥ striyaḥ svarga iti. yad yat prītimad dravyam, tat tat svargaśabdenocyate. tena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prītimad dravyaṃ svarga iti mānyāmahe, upamānāc chabdapravṛttir iti cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10410: na hi kasmiṃścid anupamite{*5/150*} loke prasiddhaḥ, yasyaitad upamānaṃ syāt, tasmān nopamānam. ato dravyaṃ svarga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10411: netyāha, prītiḥ svarga iti, na dravyam, vyabhicārāt, tad eva hi dravyaṃ kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ na svargaśabdo 'bhidhāti. prītiṃ tu na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ na{*5/151*}, nābhidadhāti. tasmād anvayavyatirekābhyām etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:10413: naitad asti, prīter abhidhāyakaḥ svargaśabda iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10414: viśeṣaṇatvāt{*5/152*}. yad viśeṣaṇam, na tac chabdenocyate. tad yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10416: nābhidheyaḥ. evam eṣa na prītivacanaḥ prītisādhanavacanas tv eṣa svargaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10417: nanu svargaśabdo loke prasiddho viśiṣṭe deśe. yāsmin noṣṇam, na śītam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10418: kṣut, na tṛṣṇā, nāratiḥ, na glāniḥ, puṇyakṛta eva pretya tatra gacchanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10419: nānye. atrocyate, yadi tatra kecid amṛtvā gacchanti{*5/154*}, tata āgacchanty ajanitvā, na tarhi sa pratyakṣo deśa evaṃjātīyakaḥ, na tv anumānād gamyate{*5/155*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10420: nanu{*5/156*} cānye siddhāḥ kecid dṛṣṭavantaḥ, te cākhyātavanta iti cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10421: na tatra pramāṇam asti, siddhā evaṃjātīyakāḥ santi, te ca dṛṣṭvācakṣīrann
GSP28msbh1-7u:10422: iti. tasmād evaṃjātīyako deśa eva nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10423: nanu ca lokād ākhyānebhyo vedāc cāvagamyate, deśa evaṃjātīyakaḥ svarga
GSP28msbh1-7u:10424: iti. tan na, puruṣāṇām evaṃvidhena deśenāsaṃbandhād apramāṇaṃ vacaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10425: ākhyānam api puruṣapraṇītatvād anādaraṇīyam. vaidikam api svargākhyānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10426: vidhiparaṃ nāsty eva, bhavati tu vidhyantareṇaikavākyabhūtaṃ stutiparam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10427: yady api kevalasukhaśravaṇārthāpattyā tādṛśo deśaḥ syāt, tathāpy
GSP28msbh1-7u:10428: asmatpakṣasyāvirodhaḥ, prītisādhane svargaśabda iti. tena deśena vyavahārābhāvāt, kutas tasyābhidhāyakaḥ svargaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti{*5/157*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10429: yadā prītimad dravyaṃ svargaḥ, tadā brūmaḥ, dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandha iti, yāgo 'tra kartavya iti śrūyate svargakāmasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10430: tatrāvaśyaṃ svargasya yāgasya ca saṃbandhaḥ, tatra bhūtaṃ dravyam, bhavyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10431: karma. bhūtasya ca bhavyārthatā nyāyyā, dṛṣṭārthatvāt. na tu bhavyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10433: kathaṃ punar avagamyate, yāgaḥ kartavyatayā codyata iti, [601]{*5/158*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10434: yadā kāmasyāpi kartavyatāsmād vākyād avagamyate. ucyate, kāmasya kartavyatā vākyāt, yajyarthasya kartavyatā śruteḥ, śrutiś ca vākyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10435: balīyasī. tasmād ayam arthaḥ, svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād iti svargakāmasya yāgaḥ kartavya iti. kartavyaś ca sukhavān, akartavyo duḥkhavān. kartavya iti cainaṃ brūte. tasmāt sukhaphalo yāgo bhaviṣyati, sa tu yasyecchā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10436: tasya sidhyati nānyasyeti gamyate. tena svargecchā yāgasya guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10437: sarvasyāpi karmaṇo dravyecchā bhavati guṇabhūtā, tayā dravyam ānetuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10438: yatate, dṛṣṭenaiva dvāreṇa. iha tu svargasaṃjñakadravyecchaiva niyamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10439: yathaiva sā guṇabhūtā prāptā. tathaiva sati niyamyate, dṛṣṭenaiva dvāreṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10440: nādṛṣṭenopakāreṇa. tena svargechayā guṇabhūtayā svargadravyaṃ prati yatiṣyate yāgaṃ sādhayitum. athāpy adṛṣṭena, tathāpi na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10445: *{5/150: E1 (v.l.): nety āha, na hi kasmiṃścid anupamāne}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10453: tuśabdena pakṣo vyāvartyate. tata etāvat{*5/159*} tāvad varṇayanti, prītiḥ svarga iti. kutaḥ? evam uktaṃ bhavatā, prītiviśiṣṭe dravye svargaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10454: vartata iti. yady evam, pūrvaṃ tarhi prītau vartitum arhati. tāṃ hi sa na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10455: vyabhicarati. vyabhicarati punar dravyam. yasyaiva prītisādhanasya dravyasya vaktā svargaśabaḥ, tad eva yadā na prītisādhanaṃ bhavati, tadā na svargaśabdenābhidhīyate. tasmāt prītivacano 'yam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10456: yat tūktam, daṇḍiśabdavad iti, so 'pi prīte śabdād daṇḍe, daṇḍini pratyayam ādadhāti, antargatas tatra daṇḍaśabdaḥ, sa daṇḍasya vācakaḥ. iha punaḥ svargaśabdaḥ eva prīter abhidhātā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10457: prītivacanaś cet, yāgo guṇabhūtaḥ prītiḥ pradhānam. kutaḥ? tādarthyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10458: puruṣaprayatnasya, prītyarthaṃ hi puruṣo yatate, tena na [602]{*5/160*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10459: prītir yāgasādhanam iti vijñāyate. dravyaṃ hi yāgasādhanam, narte dravyād yāgo bhavati, yasmād dravyadevatākriye yajatiśabdo vartate. asatyām api prītyāṃ bhavati yāgaḥ. yadi ca yāgo na prītyartho bhavet, asādhakaṃ karma bhavet, sādhayitāraṃ nādhigacchet. yo hi prītyarthaḥ, sa śadhyate, nānyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10460: nanu kartavyatayā yāgaḥ śrūyate. ucyate, satyaṃ kartavyatayā śrūyate, kāmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10461: 'pi kartavyatayāvagamyate. āha, śrutyā yāgasya, vākyena kāmasya. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10462: cobhayoḥ, vākyabhedaḥ prasaṅgāt{*5/161*}. ucyate, yady api yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10463: śrūyate, tathāpi na kartavyaḥ, sukhadaḥ kartavyo bhavati, duḥkhado yāgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10464: tasmāt pratyakṣeṇākartavyaḥ, pratyakṣeṇa ca duḥkhadaḥ. kartavyatāvacanād anumānena sukhado bhavatīti. ucyate, anumānaṃ ca pratyakṣavirodhān na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10465: pramāṇam. tasmād akartavyo yāgaḥ, yadi na prītyarthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10468: vijñāyate. tasmād anarthako mā bhūd iti svargasya kartavyatā gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10469: puruṣaprayatnaś ca yāgaviśiṣṭa iti yāgas tasya karaṇaṃ syāt. tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ yāgo guṇabhūtaḥ, svargaḥ pradhānabhūta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10475: pratyarthaṃ cābhisaṃyogāt karmato hy abhisaṃbandhas tasmāt karmopadeśaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10476: na kevalam ānarthakyabhayād yāgasya guṇabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10477: svargasaṃjñakam arthaṃ prati karaṇatvena yāgo vidhīyate. nanu yāgaḥ kartavyatayā śrutyā vidhīyate. satyam evam, ānarthakyaṃ tu tathā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10478: svargaṃ pratyavihite yāge, svargakāmaḥ, tasmin niṣphale vidhīyamāno 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10479: niṣprayojanaḥ syāt. tatrāsya [603]{*5/164*} upadeśavaiyarthyam, dvayoś ca vidhīyamānayoḥ paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhayor vākyabhedaḥ prasaṅgaḥ{*5/165*}. ato na svargakāmapadena svārtho vidhīyate. kiṃ tarhi? uddiśyate. tatra vākyād avagatasya kāmasya kartavyatāvagamyate, yāgasya ca karaṇatā. evaṃ ca yāgakartavyatāyāṃ{*5/166*} na pratyakṣavirodho bhaviṣyati. tasmāt karmopadeśaḥ syāt, karma svargaṃ praty upadiśyate, na svargaḥ karma prati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10480: kim ato yadi svargo nopadiśyate? etad ato bhavati. na hy anupadiṣṭo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10481: 'rthaprāptaś ca guṇo bhavati. tasmāt svargaḥ pradhānataḥ, karma guṇata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10482: api ca, yasya svarga iṣṭaḥ syāt, sa yāgaṃ nirvartyed ity asaṃbaddham iva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10484: atha matam, tataḥ svargo bhavatīti saṃbandhād idaṃ gamyata{*5/168*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10485: na śabdapramāṇakāmām antareṇa śabdam avagatir nyāyyā. vākyād evāsmād imaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10486: saṃbandham avagacchāmaḥ, yathā kāṣṭhāny āhartukāmo 'raṇyaṃ gacched iti yadi brūyāt, brūyād etat, dṛṣṭaṃ tatra pramāṇāntareṇāraṇyāgamanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10488: atha manyate{*5/169*}, upadeśānarthakyaṃ mā bhūd ity arthāpattir bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, nopadeśānarthakyasyaitat sāmarthyam, yad antareṇa phalavacanam, yāgasya prītiḥ phalam avagamyeta. kāmam asyānarthakyaṃ bhavatu{*5/170*}, na jātucit sāmarthyam asya jāyate. na hi dagdhukāmasyodakopādānam asati dāhe 'narthakam iti dahanaśaktim asya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10489: janayet. atha vā, svargakāmasya yāgo vidhīyata iti pakṣāntarāvalambenāsyārthavattā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10490: nanv itarasminn api pakṣe svargakāmasya yāgo vidhīyate, na yāgāt svargaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10491: naitad evam. tasmin khalu pakṣe svargaṃ prārthayamānasyānuṣṭhānam anūdya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10492: yāgas tasyopāyatvena vidhīyata iti na [604]{*5/171*} doṣaḥ. tad anuṣṭhānaṃ svargaṃ pratīti nāsti vacanam iti cet. iṣṭam arthaṃ praty anuṣṭhānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10493: bhavati, svargakāmasya ca svarga iṣṭaḥ, tadanuṣṭhānaviśeṣagrahaṇārtham eva svargakāmaviśeṣaṇagrahaṇam iti niravadyam. tasmāt svargakāmasya yāgakarmopadeśaḥ syāt, ataḥ svargaḥ pradhānataḥ, karma guṇata iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10494: svargakāmam adhikṛtya, yajeteti vacanam. ity adhikāralakṣaṇam idaṃ siddhaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10498: *{5/166: Jha (2,969) schlägt mit einer HS evam ayāgakartavyatāyāṃ vor}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10504: idam āmnananti, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyevamādi. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yāvat kiṃcit sattvam, tat sarvam adhikṛtyaitad ucyate, uta samartham adhikṛtyeti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10505: sarvādhikāraḥ, aviśeṣāt. nanu vṛkṣādayo na kiṃcit kāmayante, katham teṣām adhikāraḥ syāt? ucyate, mā bhūd acetanānām, tiraścas tv adhikṛtya yajeteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10506: brūyāt. nanu tiryaṃco 'pi na kiṃcit kāmayante. neti brūmaḥ, kāmayante
GSP28msbh1-7u:10507: sukham, evaṃ hi dṛśyate, dharmopataptāś chāyām upasarpanti, śītena pīḍitā ātapam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10508: āha, nanu tiryaṃca āsannaṃ phalaṃ cetayante, na kālāntaraphalaṃ prārthayante, kālāntaraphalāni ca vaidikāni karmāṇi. ucyate, kālāntare 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10509: phalaṃ kāmayamānā lakṣyante, śunaś caturdaśyām upavasataḥ paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10510: śyenāṃś cāṣṭamyām. na caiṣāṃ vyādhyāśaṅkā, niyatanimittatvāt, nānāhārāṇām api tasmin kāle darśanāt, [605]{*5/172*} samānāhārāṇām apy anyasmin kāle
GSP28msbh1-7u:10511: 'darśanāt. liṅgāni ca vede bhavanti, devā vai satramāsatety{*5/173*}evamādīni devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ vanaspatīnām adhikāraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10513: nanu kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartuṃ na śaknuvantīty anadhikṛtāḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10514: yāgaṃ kartuṃ śaknuvanti kecit, tasmāt yajetetyevamādīny adhikariṣyanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10516: tatra yo 'nupadiṣṭaviṣṇukramādikaḥ sa kevalaṃ yāgaṃ kariṣyati, kas tasya doṣaḥ? dravyaparigraho 'pi devagrāmaḥ, hastigrāmaḥ, ṛṣabhasya grāma ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:10517: upacārād asty eveti. tasmād amanuṣyāṇām api śaknuvatām adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10521: kartur vā śrutisaṃyogād vidhiḥ kārtsnyena gamyate//6.1.5//
GSP28msbh1-7u:10522: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, tiryagādīnām apy adhikāra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10523: iti. kasya tarhi? yaḥ samarthaḥ kṛtsnaṃ karmābhinirvartayitum. na caite śaknuvanti tiryagādayaḥ kṛtsnaṃ karmābhinirvartayitum, tasmād eṣāṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10524: sukhasyābhyupāyaḥ karmeti. kathaṃ yo na śakyate kartum, so 'bhyupāyaḥ syād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10525: iti. na devānām, devatāntarābhāvāt, na hy ātmānam upadiśya tyāgaḥ saṃbhavati, tyāga evāsau na syāt, narṣīṇām, ārṣeyābhāvāt. na bhṛgvādayo bhṛgvādibhiḥ sagotrā bhavanti, na caiṣāṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratyakṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10526: [606]{*5/175*} api ca niryañco na kālāntaraphalenārthinaḥ, āsannaṃ hi te
GSP28msbh1-7u:10528: nanu coktam, kālāntaraphalārthinas tiraścaḥ paśyāmaḥ, śunaḥ śyenāṃś caturdaśyām aṣṭabhyāṃ copavasata iti. ucyate, na janmāntaraphalārthina upavasanti. katham avagamyate? vedādhyayanābhāvāt, ye vedam adhīyate ta etad viduḥ, idaṃ karma kṛtvā, idaṃ phalam amutra prāpnotīti. na caite vedam adhīyate, nāpi smṛtiśāstrāṇi, nāpy anyebhyo 'vagacchanti. tasmān na vidanti dharmam. avidvāṃsaḥ katham anutiṣṭheyuḥ? tasmān na dharmāyopavasantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10529: kim arthaṃ tarhy eṣām upavāsaḥ? ucyate, rogād arucir eṣām. kathaṃ punar niyate kāle rogo bhavati? ucyate, niyatakālā api rogā bhavanti, yathā tṛtīyakāś cāturthakāś ceti. tasmān manuṣyāṇām adhikāra iti. na ca tiraścāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10530: dravyaparigrahaḥ, na hy ete dravyaṃ svecchayopayuñjānā dṛśyante. tasmād anīśānā dhanasya. yat tu, devagrāmo hastigrāma iti, upacāramātraṃ tat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10531: tasmād api na tiraścām adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10532: yāni punar liṅgāni, devā vai satram āsatetyevamādīni, arthavādās te vidhiprarocanārthāḥ, vidyate hi vidhir anyas teṣu sarveṣu. na ca vidher
GSP28msbh1-7u:10533: vidhinaikavākyabhāvo bhavati, vacanavyaktibhedāt. stutis tu sā, itthaṃ nāma satrāṇy āsitavyāni, yat kṛtakṛtyā apy āsate devāḥ, āsannacetanā api tiryañcaḥ, acetanā api vanaspatayaḥ, kim aṅga punar vidvāṃso manuṣyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10534: nanu viṣṇukramādiṣv anadhikṛtāḥ kevalaṃ yāgaṃ kariṣyanti. [607]{*5/176*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10535: naivam, guṇā yāgaṃ praty upadiśyante, na kartāraṃ prati, tena yāgamātre kriyamāṇe vaiguṇyam iti na phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāt. kathaṃ punar yāgaṃ praty upadiśyanta iti cet. itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya yāgavacanasyāntikād upanipatitāḥ śaknuvanti taṃ nirākāṅkṣīkartum, itarathā hi kartṝn
GSP28msbh1-7u:10536: adhikurvatsu guṇavacaneṣv anivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ phalavacanam anarthakam eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:10537: syāt, anuṣaṅgaś{*5/177*} ca phalavacanam abhiviṣyat, tatra sākāṅkṣatvād vākyam uparotsyate. athaitad eva vākyaṃ samarthānāṃ saguṇaṃ karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:10538: vidhāsyati, asamarthānāṃ viguṇam iti. tan na, sakṛd uccāraṇa ubhayaśaktivirodhād vākyaṃ bhidyeta, sākāṅkṣaṃ hi tad itikartavyatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10539: prati. tasmāt sāṅgayāgopadeśaḥ sa iti niraṅgayāgopadeśābhāvaḥ. tasmān manuṣyāṇām evādhikāra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10540: prayojanaṃ pakṣoktam, kecid āhuḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaraṃ karma na niyogato
GSP28msbh1-7u:10541: divaseṣu kalpayitavyam, pūrvapakṣe{*5/178*} tadāyuṣāṃ devatādīnāṃ saṃbhavātīti{*5/179*}, siddhānte tatra saṃbhavad api{*5/180*} divaseṣv eva kalpayitavyam iti. tat tūpariṣṭād{*5/181*} vyākhyāsyāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10550: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ svargakāmaṃ pumāṃsam adhikṛtya yajetety eṣa śabda uccaritaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10551: atha vāniyamaḥ, striyaṃ pumāṃsaṃ ceti{*5/182*}. kiṃ prāptam? puṃliṅgam adhikṛtaṃ mene aitiśāyanaḥ. kutaḥ? liṅgaviśeṣanirdeśāt. puṃliṅgena viśeṣeṇa nirdeśo [608]{*5/183*} bhavati svargakāmo tasmāt pumān ukto yajeteti, na strī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10554: *{5/184: E1 gibt puṃliṅgena viśeṣeṇa nirdeśo bhavati svargakāmo yajeteti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10556: avijñāte garbhe hate bhrūṇahatyānuvādo bhavati, tasmād avijñātena garbheṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10557: hatena bhrūṇahā bhavatīti. bhrūṇahā pāpakṛttamaḥ, yaś cobhayor lokayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:10558: upakaroti, tasya hantā bhrūṇāhā, yajñahantā bhrūṇahā, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10559: yajñasādhanabadhakārī{*5/185*}. tasmād yajñaṃ bhrūṇaśabdenābhidadhāti. sa hi bibharti vā sarvam, bhūtiṃ vānayati. ato bhrūṇahā yajñabadhakārī{*5/186*}, sa puṃyuktatvād anuvādo 'vakalpate. avijñāte garbhe hanyamāne kadācit pumān hanyeta, tatra yajñādhikṛtasya hatatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10560: yajñabadho{*5/187*} bhrūṇahatyā syāt. itarathā, yady ubhayor adhikāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10561: tato vijñāte cāvijñāte ca yajñavadhaḥ{*5/188*} syāt. tatrāvijñātagrahaṇam atantram iti kalpyeta. tasmād vivakṣitā puṃliṅgasya vācikā vibhaktir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10562: tathā, ātreyīṃ hatvā bhrūṇahā bhavati, ātreyīm āpannagarbhām āhuḥ, atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10563: kukṣāv{*5/189*} asyā vidyata ity ātreyī. tasmād api puṃso 'dhikāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:10564: gamyate. yathā, paśum ālabheteti{*5/190*} puṃpaśur evālabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10565: liṅgaviśeṣanirdeśāt{*5/191*}. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10574: jātiṃ tu bādarāyaṇo 'viśeṣāt, tasmāt stry api pratīyeta
GSP28msbh1-7u:10575: tuśabaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti, puṃso evādhikāra iti{*5/192*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:10576: jātiṃ tu bhagavān bādarāyaṇo{*5/193*} 'dhikṛtāṃ manyate sma. āha, kim ayaṃ [609]{*5/194*} svargakāma iti jātiśabdaḥ samadhigataḥ? nety āha. kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10577: tarhi? yaugikaḥ, svargecchāyogena vartate. kena tarhi śabdena jātir uktā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10578: yādhikṛteti gamyate? naiva ca{*5/195*} vayaṃ brūmaḥ, jātivacana iha śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10579: 'dhikāraka iti. kiṃ tarhi, svargakāmaśabdenobhāv api strīpuṃsāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:10580: adhikriyete iti, ato na vivakṣitaṃ puṃliṅgam iti. kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, na hi śaknoty eṣā vibhaktiḥ svargakāmaṃ liṅgena viśeṣṭum. katham? lakṣaṇatvena
GSP28msbh1-7u:10581: śravaṇāt, svarge kāmo yasya, tam eṣa lakṣayati śabdaḥ, tena lakṣaṇenādhikṛto yajeteti śabdenocyate. tac ca lakṣaṇam aviśiṣṭaṃ striyāṃ puṃsi ca. tasmāc chabdenobhāv api strīpuṃsāv adhikṛtāv iti gamyate. tatra kenādhikāraḥ striyā nivartyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10582: vibhaktyeti cet. tan na. kasmāt? puṃvacanatvāt strīnivṛttāv aśaktiḥ. puṃso vibhaktyā punarvacanam anarthakam iti cen. na, ānarthakye 'pi strīnivṛtter
GSP28msbh1-7u:10583: abhāvaḥ, parisaṃkhyāyāṃ svārthahāniḥ parārthakalpanā prāptabādhaś ca. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10584: cānarthakyam, nirdeśārthatvāt. tasmāt stry api pratīyeta
GSP28msbh1-7u:10591: atha yad uktam, paśum ālabheteti{*5/196*} puṃpaśur ālabhyate puṃliṅgavacanasāmarthyāt, evam ihāpi puṃliṅgavacanasāmarthyāt pumān adhikriyate yāgavacaneneti. tat parihartavyam. atrocyate, nātra jātir dravyasya lakṣaṇatvena śrūyate, yadi hi lakṣaṇatvena śrūyate, tataḥ striyā api yāga ukto na puṃvacanena nivartyeta, idaṃ tu paśutvaṃ yāgasya viśeṣaṇātvena śrūyate. tatra paśutvasya yāgasya ca saṃbandho na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10592: dravyayāgayoḥ, yathā paśutvaṃ yāgasaṃbaddham, [610]{*5/197*} evaṃ puṃstvam ekatvaṃ ca, so 'yam anekaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭo yāgaḥ śrūyate. sa yathāśruty eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:10594: yac ca, doṣaśrutir avijñāte garbhe hate, ātreyāṃ ca puṃyuktatveneti, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:10595: parihartavyam. atrocyate, avijñātena garbheṇety anuvādaḥ praśaṃsārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10596: ātreyī ca na hantavyeti. itthaṃ garbho na hantavyaḥ, yad avyaktenāpy enasvī bhavati. puṃliṅgavibhaktiḥ śrūyamāṇā na śaknoti striyaṃ nivartayitum. kim aṅga punar avijñātagarbhavacanaṃ liṅgam. tathā gotrapraśaṃsārtham ātreyā abadhasaṃkīrtanam{*5/198*}. na cāpannasattvā ātreyī, gotraṃ hy etat. na hy atraśabdādayaṃ taddhita utpannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10597: samarthānāṃ hi taddhita utpadyate. na cātraśabdasya sāmarthyam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10601: dravyavattvāt tu puṃsāṃ syāt, dravyasaṃyuktam, krayavikrayābhyām adravyatvaṃ strīṇāṃ dravyaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10602: puṃsāṃ tu syād adhikāraḥ, dravyavattvāt, dravyavanto hi pumāṃso na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10603: striyaḥ, dravyasaṃyuktaṃ caitat karma, vrīhibhir yajeta, yavair
GSP28msbh1-7u:10605: krayavikrayasaṃyuktā hi striyaḥ, pitrā vikrīyante, bhartrā krīyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10606: vikrītatvāc ca pitṛdhanānām anīśiyaḥ. krītatvāc ca bhartṛdhanānām. vikrayo hi śrūyate, śatam adhirathaṃ duhitṛmate{*5/199*} dadyāt, ārṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:10607: gomithunam{*5/200*} iti. na ca, etad dṛṣṭārthe saty ānamane 'dṛṣṭārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10608: bhavitum arhati. evaṃ dravyaiḥ samānayogitvaṃ strīṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10613: yā patyā krītā saty athānyaiś caratīti krītatāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10616: āha, yad anayā bhaktotsarpaṇena vā kartanena vā dhanam upārjitam, tena yakṣyata iti. ucyate, tad apy asyā na svam, yadā hi sānyasya svabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10617: tadā yat tadīyam, tad api tasyaiva. api ca, svāminas tayā karma kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10618: na tat parityajya svakarmārhati kartum. yat tayānyena prakāreṇopārjyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10619: tat patyur eva svaṃ bhavitum arhatīti. evaṃ smarati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:10620: bhāryā dāsaś ca putraś ca nirdhanāḥ sarva eva te/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10621: yat te samadhigacchanti, yasya te tasya taddhanam iti//{*5/202*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10625: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, nirdhanā strīti, dravyavatī hi sā, phalotsāhāviśeṣāt, smṛtiprāmāṇyād asvayā tayā bhavitavyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10626: phalārthinyāpi, śrutiviśeṣāt, phalārthinyā yaṣṭavyam. yadi smṛtim anurudhyamānā paravaśā nirdhanā ca syāt, yajetety ukte sati na yajeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10627: tatra smṛtyā śrutir bādhyeta. na caitan nyāyyam. tasmāt phalārthinī satī
GSP28msbh1-7u:10628: smṛtim apramāṇīkṛtya dravyaṃ parigṛhṇīyād yajeta ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10630: arthena cāsyāḥ samavetatvaṃ bhavati. evaṃ dānakāle saṃvādaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10631: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nāticaritavyeti. yat tūcyate{*5/203*}, bhāryādayo nirdhanā iti, smaryamāṇam api nirdhanatvam anyāyyam eva, śrutivirodhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10636: yat tu krayaḥ śrūyate, dharmamātraṃ tu tat, nāsau kraya iti. krayo hi uccanīcapaṇyapaṇo{*5/205*} bhavati. niyataṃ tv idaṃ dānaṃ śatam atiratham{*5/206*}, śobhanām aśobhanāṃ ca kanyāṃ prati. smārtaṃ ca śrutiviruddhaṃ vikrayaṃ nānumanyante. tasmād avikrayo 'yam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10641: patnī vai pāriṇayyasyeṣṭe patyaiva gatam anumataṃ{*5/207*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10643: bhasadvīryā hi patnayaḥ, bhāsadā vā etāḥ paragṛhāṇām aiśvaryam avarundhata
