GSP28msbh1-7u:10651: svavantāv ubhāv api daṃpatī ity evaṃ tāvat sthitam. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ pṛthak patnī yajeta, pṛthag yajamānaḥ, uta saṃbhūya yajeyātām iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10653: upādeyatvena kartā yajeteti śrūyate{*5/212*}. tasmād ekavacanaṃ vivakṣyate, yathā na dvau puruṣau saṃbhūya yajeyātām, tathātrāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10655: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, svavatos tu vacanād aikakarmyaṃ syāt, vacanāt tayoḥ sahakriyā. evaṃ hi smaranti, dharme cārthe ca kāme ca [613]{*5/213*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10656: nāticaritavyeti, tathā sahadharmaś caritavyaḥ, sahāpatyam utpādayitavyam iti. ucyate, smṛtivacanena na śrutivacanaṃ yuktaṃ bādhitum. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10657: iha kiṃcit karma strīpuṃsakartṛkam eva, yathā darśapūrṇamāsau jyotiṣṭoma
GSP28msbh1-7u:10658: iti, yatra patnyavekṣitena yajamānāvekṣitena cājyena homa ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10660: nanu puṃso yajamānasya yajamānāvekṣitam ājyam, striyā yajamānāyāḥ patnyavekṣitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. nety āha, nāyam īkṣitṛsaṃskāraḥ, īkṣituḥ saṃskāro yadi, tadaivaṃ syāt. ājyasaṃskāraś cāyam, guṇabhūtāv īkṣitārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10661: tatrānyatarāpāye niyataṃ vaiguṇyam, sarvāṅgopasaṃhārī ca prayogavacanaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10662: tatraitat syāt, strī yajamānā pumāṃsaṃ parikreṣyaty ājyasyekṣitāram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10663: pumāṃś ca striyaṃ tv avekṣitrīm iti. tac ca na, patnīti hi yajñasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10664: svāminīty ucyate, na krītā. patnīti saṃbandhiśabdo 'yam, yajamāna iti ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:10665: svāmī, na krītaḥ. tasmāt strīpuṃsayor ekam evaṃjātīyakaṃ karmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10666: tatra śrutisāmarthyād yaḥ kaścit, yayā kayācit saha{*5/214*} saṃbhūya yajeteti prāpte, idam ucyate, yas tvayā kaścid dharmaḥ kayācit saha
GSP28msbh1-7u:10667: kartavyaḥ, so 'nayā saheti, tena na śrutivirodhaḥ smṛter iti gamyate. atha yad uktam, kevalasya puṃso 'dhikāraḥ, kevalāyāś ca striyā yajetety ekavacanasya vivakṣitatvād iti, tat parihartavyam. idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10668: praṣṭavyaḥ, yajetety ekavacane vivakṣite, kathaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir ṛtvigbhiḥ saha yāgo bhavatīti. evam ucyate, prati[614]{*5/215*}kārakaṃ kriyābhedaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10669: yajamānān eva padārthān parikrayādīn kurvan, yajata ity ucyate yajamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10670: ādhvaryavān eva kurvan adhvaryur yajatīty evam ucyate, yathā saṃbharaṇam eva kurvatī sthālī paktiṃ karotīty ucyate, yasya ca kārakasya ya ātmīyo vyāpāraḥ, sa ekavacane vivakṣita ekena kartavyo bhavatīti. evaṃ ced yāvān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10671: vyāpāro yajamānasya sa{*5/216*} tāvāt, na saṃbhūya kartavyaḥ, ekenaiko yājamāno 'pareṇāparaḥ. dvādaśo vā śata ekena ṣaṭpañcāśat, apareṇāpi ṣaṭpañcāśad iti. iha tu patnīvyāpāro 'nya eva, na tatra patnī pravartamānā yajamānasyaikatvaṃ vihanti, yathādhvaryur ādhvaryaveṣu pravartamānaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10672: avaśyaṃ ca saha patnyā yaṣṭavyam, madhyakaṃ hīdaṃ daṃpatyor dhanam, tatra yāgo 'vaśyaṃ saha patnyā kartavyaḥ, itarathānyatarānicchāyāṃ tyāga eva na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10673: saṃvarteta, tathā hi dvitīyayā patnyā vinā tyāgo naivāvakalpate, yasya dvitīyā patny asti, tatra kratvarthān ekā kariṣyati. kartṛsaṃskārārtheṣu naiva doṣaḥ, saṃbhavanti hi tāni sarvatreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10680: liṅgaṃ khalv api dṛśyate, yoktreṇa patnīṃ saṃnahyati, mekhalayā yajamānaṃ mithunatvāyeti{*5/217*}. yadi strīpuṃsāv ekatra, yoktrasya mekhalāyāś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:10681: vibhāgo vākyād gamyate, mithunasaṃstavaś ca, tad etat strīpuṃsasādhanake
GSP28msbh1-7u:10686: sthitād uttaram ucyate. tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti, yad uktaṃ svavatī strīti, krītā hi sā, dṛṣṭārthatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10687: adhirathaśatadānasya{*5/218*}, ato yad asyāḥ svāmitvam ucyate, tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:10688: bhaktyā, [615]{*5/219*} yathā pūrṇako 'smākaṃ balīvardānām īṣṭa iti, evaṃ patny api pāriṇayyasyeṣṭa
GSP28msbh1-7u:10692: naitad asti, krayo mukhyaḥ, gauṇaṃ svāmitvam iti, phalārthinī hi sā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10693: smṛtir nādariṣyate, smṛtyanurodhād asvā syāt, svavatī śrutyanurodhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10695: saṃ patnī patnyā sukṛtena gacchatāṃ yajñasya dhuryāyuktāv abhūtām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10696: saṃjānānau vijahītām arātīr divi jyotir ajaramāram etām iti{*5/220*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10697: daṃpatyoḥ phalaṃ darśayati. tasmād apy ubhāv adhikṛtāv iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10701: asty ādhānam, ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti. tatredam āmananti, kṣaume vasānāv agnim ādadhīyātām iti. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ, kiṃ dvau puruṣāv ādadhīyātām utaikaḥ puruṣa iti. kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ? ucyate, ihaitac
GSP28msbh1-7u:10702: chrūyate, vasānāv ādadhīyātām iti. tatra vacanam arthaprāptaṃ punaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10703: śrūyate, tat kiṃ puṃliṅgasaṃbandhārtham, uta kṣaumavidhyartham iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10704: ubhayor vidyamānatvād bhavati saṃśayaḥ, yadi liṅgasaṃbandhārtham, ubhau puruṣāv ādhāsyete. atha kṣaumasaṃbandhārthaṃ tata ekaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10705: kiṃ prāptam? dvyādhānaṃ tu dviyajñavat syāt, yathā, etena dvau [616]{*5/221*} rājapurohitau sāyujyakāmau yajeyātām iti dvayoḥ puruṣayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:10706: dviyajño bhavati, evaṃ dvyādhānaṃ dvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ syāt, tato 'viśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10707: vasānāv iti śravaṇād eva puruṣau gamyete. na padāntaragatena kṣaumeṇāsya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10708: saṃbandhaḥ, śrutyavagataṃ hi śravaṇād avagatam, padāntarasaṃbandhaṃ vākyād avagatam, śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. vasānaśabdagataś cārtha ādhānena
GSP28msbh1-7u:10710: āha, vasānāv iti nāyaṃ kevalaṃ puṃliṅga eva, strīpuṃsayor apy abhidhāyako
GSP28msbh1-7u:10711: bhavati, yathā kukkuṭaś ca kukkuṭī ca kukkuṭau, śūkaraś ca śūkarī ca śūkarāv iti. evaṃ vasānaś ca vasānā ca vasānau syātām iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10712: yatra nārthaḥ, prakaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣakam, vidhāyakaś ca śabdaḥ, nāsty
GSP28msbh1-7u:10713: anuvādas{*5/222*}. tatra dvau pumāṃsau gamyete, yathā dvāv ānayety uktaḥ pumāṃsāv ānayati. dve ānayeti striyau, tena striyo vācakam ekārāntaṃ dvivacanam iti gamyate, aukārāntam api dvayoḥ puṃsor vācakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10714: yatredānīṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ prayujyamānam aukārāntaṃ dṛśyate, tatra kiṃ pumān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10715: sadvitīyas tasya nimittam, uta strī sadvitīyā iti{*5/223*}. ucyate, puṃsi sadvitīye dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā brāhmaṇāv ānayeti, ihāpi pumān sadvitīyo 'rthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10717: atrāha, prayogo yadi dṛsṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ dvayoḥ puṃsor dṛṣṭaḥ, katham ekasmin syāt? atrocyate, puṃsi ca dvitve ca dṛṣṭa iti śakyate vaditum, na dvayor dravyayor iti, puṃbhāvaṃ dvitvaṃ caiṣa śabdo na vyabhicarati, dravyaṃ punar vyabhicarati. api ca yugapadadhikaraṇavacanāyā{*5/224*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10718: dvaṃdvasmṛter dvivacanabahuvacanopapatteś ca, [617]{*5/225*} pra mitrayor varuṇayor iti ca darśanāt. itaretarayoge cārthe samāsavidhānād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10719: dvandvāpavādatvāc caikaśeṣasya, yathaiva khadirau ca dhavalau{*5/226*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10720: ceti nirdarśanaṃ kriyate, evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmāt puṃsi dvitve ca vartata iti gamyate. na ca strīdvitve dṛṣṭaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10721: atrāha, nanv atraiva darśanāt, strīpuṃsayor vācaka iti gamyate. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10722: uktam etat, anyāyaś conekārthatvam iti pumān sadvitīyo 'syārtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:10723: bhaviṣyati, strīpuṃsau cety anyāyyam. athedānīṃ sadvitīyasya puṃso vidhau ko 'nyaḥ sahāya{*5/227*} iti. striyā anabhidheyatvāt, avaśyaṃ bhāvitvāc ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:10724: dvitīyasya, aparaḥ sadvitīyaḥ pumān, evam itaro 'pītareṇa sadvitīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10725: itaro 'pītareṇeti dvāv eva pumāṃsāv upādīyete. tasmād iha dvau pumāṃsāv ādhāne vidhīyeta ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:10726: nanu strīpuṃsayor vācakam aukārāntaṃ dvivacanaṃ smaranti. naiṣā smṛtir astīti brūmaḥ. āha, bhagavataḥ pāṇiner vacanāt smṛtim anumāsyāmahe, pumān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10727: striyā{*5/228*} iti. ucyate, na pāṇiner vacanam kukkuṭāv ity aukāraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10728: strīpuṃsayor vācaka iti. kathaṃ tarhi? yatra strīpuṃsayoḥ sahavacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10729: tatra sadvitīyo vā pumān iti kṛtvākārāntasyaukāraḥ prāpnoti, sadvitīyā vā strīti kṛtvaikāraḥ. puṃśabdas tatra sādhur na strīśabda iti pāṇiner
GSP28msbh1-7u:10730: vacanam. pumān śiṣyata iti ca brūte, tena sutarāṃ gamyate, puṃsor vācaka aukāra iti. tasmād dvayoḥ puṃsor adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10731: nanu kṣaumavidhānaparam etad vākyam syāt, kṣaumasaṃbandhasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10733: syāt. atrocyate, vasānāv ādadhīyātām ity asti saṃbandhaḥ, na kṣaume ādadhīyātām iti. tasmāt saṃnikṛṣṭam api na tatsaṃbaddham ādhānena. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10734: vasānaśabdena saha saṃbadhyamānam arthavad bhaviṣyati. vasānasaṃnikṛṣṭe api kṣaume na vidhīyate, vidhāyakasya śabdasyābhāvāt. na hi vasānaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10735: vidhāyakaḥ, na kṣaumaśabdaḥ, nānayoḥ samudāyaḥ. kas tarhi vidhātuṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10736: śaknoti? ādadhīyātām ity atra yā liṅ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10737: āha, sā khalu vidhāsyati? ucyate, sā svaśabdagatam ādhānaṃ śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10738: vidhātum, śravaṇāt vihitatvād ādhānasya, ānarthakye, vasānāv iti śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10739: vākyena vidhātum, bhavati hi vasānayor ādhānasaṃbandhaḥ, tatra nātyantāya svārthaḥ parityakto bhavati, kṣaumavasānasaṃbandhe tu vidhātavye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10740: ādadhīyātām ity ādhānam utsṛjya vidadhāno 'tyantāya śrutiṃ jahyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10741: ādhānasaṃnikṛṣṭe ca liṅge vidhātavye śrutir viprakṛṣṭaṃ na kṣaumavasānasaṃbandhaṃ vidhātum utsahate, arthaviprakarṣāt. api cotsṛjya śrutim, kṣaumavasānasaṃbandhe vidhīyamāne kṣaumaṃ vasānasyāṅgaṃ syān nādhānasya. tatra kṣaumābhāve 'pi nādhānaṃ viguṇam iti kṣaumābhāve 'py
GSP28msbh1-7u:10743: āha, vasānaguṇatāyāṃ tarhi ko 'rtho vivakṣyate? ucyate, na kaścit, ata evāsya pakṣasya parityāgaḥ. āha, kṣaumavasānaśravaṇam idānīṃ katham{*5/231*} iti. ucyate, na śakyata ubhayaṃ vidhātuṃ kṣaumaṃ liṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10744: ca, bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmāt akṣaumayoḥ{*5/232*} kṣaumaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10745: 'nuvādaḥ, arthaprāpte ca vasane, vasānau pumāṃsāv ity arthaḥ. te ca prāyeṇa viceṣṭamānasya maline kṣaumasadṛśe bhavataḥ, viceṣṭamānasya vā vasane śabdavatī bhavata iti. tasmād dvayoḥ puṃsor adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10756: guṇasya tu vidhānatvāt patnyā{*5/234*} dvitīyaśabdaḥ syāt//6.1.23//
GSP28msbh1-7u:10757: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti, yad uktaṃ dvau puruṣāv ādadhīyātām iti, eka evādadhīta. vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnim{*5/235*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10758: ādadhīteti{*5/236*}, ekavacanaṃ hi vivakṣitam. tasmād eka evādadhīta. nanv idaṃ vacanaṃ dvau pumāṃsāv ādadhīyātām iti. nety āha, guṇasya tu vidhānatvāt, kṣaumavidhānam asmin vākye nyāyyam, tathā hy apūrvo 'rtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:10759: vihito bhavati, gamyate hi viśeṣaniyamaḥ. itarathā kṣaumavacanam anuvādamātraṃ syāt, vādamātraṃ cānarthakam. pakṣe cānuvādaḥ, na caikapakṣavacana eṣa śabdaḥ. gauṇatve ca sādhāraṇaṃ sādṛśyam. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10761: āha, nanu pumāṃsau vidheyau, tadvidhāne ca na kṣaumavidhānam, vākyabhedo hi tathā syāt, śrutigamyau ca pumāṃsau, vākyagamyaṃ ca kṣaumaṃ bādheyātām
GSP28msbh1-7u:10762: iti. atrocyate, na pumāṃsau vidheyau, prāpta evātra sadvitīyaḥ pumān so 'nūdyate. katham? eko 'tra pumān śrūyate, tasya patnyā dvitīyaśabdaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10763: na ca, yat prāg vacanād gamyate, tad vidheyaṃ bhavati. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:10765: yad ucyate, na kṣaumasya vidhāyako 'stīti. tad ucyate, ādadhīyātām iti tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:10766: vidhāsyati. nanv etad ādhānaṃ śrutyā vidhātuṃ samartham, nānyad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10767: ucyate, śabdāntareṇa vihitatvād ādhānasya na vidhāyakam, vihitatvāc ca puṃsaḥ sa[620]{*5/238*}dvitīyasya, tasyāpi na vidhāyakam, atas tadasaṃbhavāt kṣaumasya vidhāyikā liṅ bhaviṣyati, vākyasāmarthyāt. yat tv asmin pakṣe 'tyantāya svārthaṃ jahātīti. nātyantāya hāsyati, ādhāne vāsaḥ kṣaumaṃ kuryād iti. asmin pakṣe puṃśabdaḥ strīpuṃsayor vṛtta iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10768: asti hi tatra tasya nimittaṃ pumān sadvitīyaḥ, evamādi ca dṛṣṭvā bhagavatā pāṇininā sūtraṃ praṇītam, pumān striyā{*5/239*} iti, tasya viṣayaḥ puṃśabdaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ sādhur bhavati, na strīśabda iti. tasmād ekaḥ pumān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10776: tasyā yāvad uktam āśīr brahmacaryam atulyatvāt//6.1.24//
GSP28msbh1-7u:10777: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta, jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyevamādiṣv etad uktaṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ sahādhikāra iti. athedānīṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10778: saṃdihyate, kiṃ sarvaṃ yājamānaṃ patnyā kartavyam, uta yāvad uktam āśīr brahmacaryaṃ ceti. kiṃ prāptam? sarvaṃ yājamānaṃ patnyāḥ syāt, sāpi hi yajamānā, tulyatvāt. tasmāt sarvaṃ tasyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10779: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tasyā yāvad uktaṃ syāt, vacanaprāmāṇyāt, āśīḥ brahmacaryaṃ ca syāt. kasmāt? atulyatvāt, atulyā hi strīpuṃsāḥ, yajamānaḥ pumān vidvāṃś ca, patnī strī cāvidyā ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10780: kim ataḥ? yady evaṃ hy etad{*5/240*} atulyatvam. etad ato bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10781: [621]{*5/241*} kratvartheṣu yāni yājamānāni śravaṇāni, teṣūpādeyatvena śravaṇād vivakṣitaṃ liṅgam, tena teṣu patnī na syāt, yāni ca kratvarthāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:10782: samantrakāṇi teṣv avidyatvāt patnī na syāt. tat patnyā adhyayanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10783: prayojakaṃ syād iti yady ucyeta. tan na, asaty api prayojakatve tasya nirvṛttir bhaviṣyati. asti hi tasya pumān nirvartakaḥ, yac ca kartvartham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10784: tad ekena yena kenacin nirvartayitavyam. tasmāt pratiṣiddhasya patnyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10785: adhyayanasya punaḥ prasave, na kiṃcid asti pramāṇam. atas tad api patnī na kuryāt, yās tv āśiṣaḥ, yac ca brahmacaryam, tat puruṣaṃ prati guṇabhūtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10786: na tatrānyatareṇa kṛte sidhyati, anyatarasya hi saṃskāro hīyeta. na ca tatropādeyatvena yajamānasya śravaṇam. tasmāl liṅgam apy avivakṣitam. ata āśīr brahmacaryaṃ cobhayor api syāt. yac cāhatyocyate, yathā, patnyājyam avekṣata iti. tasmād atulyatvād asamānavidhānā patnī yajamānena bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:10791: āgnihotrādīni karmāṇy udāharaṇam, teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10792: tāni bhaveyuḥ, utāpaśūdrāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10793: cāturvarṇyam adhikṛtya, yajeta, juhuyād ityevamādi śabdam uccarati vedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10794: kutaḥ? aviśeṣāt, na hi kaścid viśeṣa upādīyate. tasmāc chūdro na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10797: nirdeśād vā trayāṇāṃ syād agnyādheye hy asaṃbandhaḥ kratuṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10799: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, trayāṇām adhikāraḥ syāt. kutaḥ? agnyādheye
GSP28msbh1-7u:10800: nirdeśāt, agnyādheye trayāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati, vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīn{*5/243*} ādadhīta, grīṣme rājanyaḥ, śaradi vaiśya iti{*5/244*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:10802: nirvartayitum. tasmād agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāma ityevamādiṣu śūdrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10803: prāpikā śrutir nāsti. brāhmaṇādīn evādhikṛtya sā pravartate, te hi samarthā agnimattvāt, āhavanīyādayo na śūdrasya, avidhānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10804: saṃskāraśabdatvāc cāhavanīyādīnām. tasmād anadhikṛto 'gnihotrādiṣu śūdra ity ātreyo manyate{*5/245*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10810: yad uktam, anadhikāraḥ śūdrasyeti, tan na, sarvaṃ hy arthinam adhikṛtya yajetety ucyate, so 'sati pratiṣedhavacane śūdrān na vyāvarteta. yat tv asamartho 'gnyabhāvād iti, syād evāsyāgnir arthaprāptaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10812: atrāha, nanv agnyādheyacodanā brāhmaṇādisaṃyuktā na śūdrasyeti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10813: nimittārthena tāḥ śrutayo na prāpikāḥ. katham? nimittasvabhāvā ete śabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10814: brāhmaṇa ādadhāno vasante, rājyanyo{*5/246*} grīṣme, vaiṣyaḥ śaradīti brāhmaṇādīnāṃ vasantādibhiḥ saṃbandho gamyate, tena vasantādisaṃbandhārthā brāhmaṇādaya [623]{*5/247*} ity eva gamyate, tathā cādadhātir na vākyena śūdrād vyāvartito bhaviṣyati. tasmād bādariḥ sarvādhikāraṃ śāstraṃ manyate smeti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10818: api veti pakṣo vyāvartyate. yathāśruty eva pratīyeta, brāhmaṇādayo hy ādhāne śrūyante, tena brāhmaṇādikartṛkam ādhānam, vasantādiśravaṇāc ca vasantādikālakam. tathā ca, idaṃ śūdravarjitānām evānukramaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10819: bārhadgiraṃ brāhmaṇasya brahmasāma kuryāt, pārthuraśyaṃ rājanyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10820: rāyovājīyaṃ vaiśyasyeti, śūdrasya sāma nāmananti. tathā payovrataṃ brāhmaṇasya, yavāgū rājanyasya, āmikṣā vaiśyasyeti, tathādhāne 'ṣṭasu
GSP28msbh1-7u:10821: prakrameṣu brāhmaṇo 'gnim ādadhīta, ekādaśasu rājanyaḥ, dvādaśasu vaiśya iti. evam abrahmasāmakam avratakam aprakramakaṃ ca śūdrasya prayuktam api karma niṣphalaṃ syāt. tasmān na śūdro juhuyād yajeta vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10823: naitad evam, śūdrasyāgnyabhāvād anadhikāro 'gnihotrādiṣv iti. asti hi śūdrasyādhānam, ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti śāstraṃ sāmānyena. idam api nimittārthaṃ bhaviṣyati, tasmāt sarvādhikāraṃ śāstraṃ bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:10826: atha yad uktam{*5/248*}, abrahmasāmakam avratakam aprakramakaṃ ca śūdrasya karma prayuktam api phalaṃ na sādhayed viguṇam iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10830: sa eṣa parihāraḥ, krāmyatvāt, kāmayiṣyate śūdraḥ, abhīvartaṃ nāma brahmasāma{*5/250*}, tad dhi anārabhya kiṃcid āmnātam aviśeṣeṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10831: cakṣurvimita ādadhyād iti{*5/251*}, aniyataprakrameṣu śūdrasya niyamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10832: vrate 'pi, mastu śūdrasyeti saṃbandhadarśanād adhyavasīyate, mastv eva śūdrasya. tasmāc cāturvarṇyam adhikriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10837: vrate ca viśeṣo 'vagamyate tatprādhānyaṃ puruṣaprādhānyaṃ hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10838: vrate{*5/252*}. kim ataḥ, yat puruṣapradhānatā? etad ato bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10839: puruṣapradhānaḥ saṃskāro na śaknoty anupasaṃhriyamāṇaḥ, tasyādhikāraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10840: vyāvartayitum. tat katham iti. yajeteti hi svargakāme 'bhidhīyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:10841: tatkāmaḥ śūdro nābhihita iti kathaṃ gamyate? kiṃ hi sa yāgasya puruṣanirvartyaṃ na nirvartayati. vratam iti cet. na, sāmarthyopajananāya hi tad yasyaivocyeta, tasyaiva tena vinā na sāmarthyam, nānyasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10842: eṣa{*5/253*} eva hi vratasyāṅgabhāvo yat, kartāraṃ samarthaṃ karoti. yasya tu tena prayojanam, sa tadanapekṣyaiva yāgam abhinirvartayati. tasmād api na śūdravarjanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10844: *{5/252: E1 gibt puruṣaprādhānyaṃ hi vrate in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10847: evaṃ na prāpakāṇi śravaṇānīty uktam, śakyate tu vaktuṃ prāpakāṇīti, na ca sūtrakāreṇa tad vyapadiṣṭam. naimittikeṣv api teṣu satsu śakya eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:10848: śūdraparyudāso vaktum iti, na tadādṛtam, hetvantaraṃ vyapadiṣṭam. api veti pakṣavyāvartanam. [625]{*5/254*} evam api sati naimittike 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10849: brāhmaṇādiśravaṇe saty apaśūdrāṇām evādhikāraḥ. kutaḥ? vedanirdeśāt, vede hi trayāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati, vasante brāhmaṇam upanayīta, grīṣme rājanyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10850: śaradi vaiśyam iti, vedābhāvād asamarthaḥ śūdro yaṣṭum. tasmān
GSP28msbh1-7u:10859: ucyate, vidyāyām evaiṣā puruṣaśrutiḥ, upanayanasya saṃskārasya tadarthatvāt, vidyārtham upādhyāyasya samīpam ānīyate, nādṛṣṭārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10860: kuḍyaṃ{*5/256*} vā kartum, saiṣā{*5/257*} vidyāyāṃ puruṣaśrutiḥ. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:10861: avagamyate? ācāryakaraṇam etad abhidhīyate. kutaḥ? ātmanepadadarśanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10862: nayatir{*5/258*} ācāryakaraṇe vartate, tadarthasaṃbandhād upanayanam ācāryakaraṇaprayuktam, vedādhyāpanena cācāryo bhavati. tasmād vedādhyayane brāhmaṇādayaḥ śrutāḥ, śūdrasya na śrutaṃ vedādhyayanam, ato 'vedātvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10869: iti cet paśyasi, avaidyatvād{*5/259*} asāmarthyād anadhikṛtaḥ [626]{*5/260*} śūdra iti. naiṣa doṣaḥ, vidyānirdeśāt, vidyāṃ nirdekṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10870: anuktām apy adhyeṣyata iti, śakyate hy anuktam{*5/261*} apy adhyetum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10876: na caitad asti, śūdro 'dhyeṣyata iti, pratiṣiddham asyādhyayanam, śūdreṇa nādhyetavyam iti, adhīyānasyāpy adhyayanaṃ saphalaṃ{*5/263*} na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10877: doṣaś ca jāyate. ato 'vaidyaḥ śūdraḥ, asyābhāvaḥ karmaṇīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10878: athāpi vaidyatvena{*5/264*} sidhyet, tathāpy anagnitvād abhāvaḥ karmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:10879: syāt. atha katham anagniteti. prāpakāṇi hi brāhmaṇādīnām ādhāne vākyāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10880: nanu ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta ity ādhānasya vidhāyakam. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:10882: gamyate. atrocyate, brāhmaṇo 'gnim ādadhīteti śrutyā vidhānaṃ gamyate. ya evaṃ vidvān agnim ādhatta iti stutyā, tad ānumānikaṃ pratyakṣaśrutād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10883: durbalam. tasmāt prāpakāṇi vacanāni, ataḥ śūdrasyānadhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10890: anyārthadarśanaṃ ca bhavati, yathā na śūdrasyādhyayanam iti. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati? yadyu vā etat śmaśānam, yac chūdraḥ, tasmāc chūdrasamīpe nādhyeyam ity anadhyayanaṃ śūdrasya darśayati. tasmād apaśūdrāṇām adhikāraḥ. nanv āhavanīyād vināpi, yāgo vacanaprāmāṇyāc chūdrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10892: svargakāmasya, kiṃ tarhi svargaphalatā viśiṣṭasya yāgasya. tasmād asaṃbhavaḥ śūdrasyāgnihotrādiṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10895: agnihotrādiṣv eva saṃdehaḥ, kim adravyasyādhikāro neti. ucyate, trayāṇāṃ dravyasaṃpanno 'dhikriyeta, nādravyaḥ. kutaḥ? na hi śaknoty adravyo dravyasaṃyuktaṃ karmānuṣṭhātum. tasmād adravyasyānadhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10896: anityatvāt tu naivaṃ syād arthād dhi dravyasaṃyogaḥ//6.1.40//
GSP28msbh1-7u:10897: naivaṃ syāt, yad uktam, adravyasyānadhikāra iti. kutaḥ? anityatvāt, anityo
GSP28msbh1-7u:10898: 'dravyasaṃyogaḥ{*5/267*}, na hi kaścij jātyādravya eva puruṣaḥ. asty upāyo yena dravyavān bhavati. yaḥ śaknoti yaṣṭum, tasya yajeteti vācako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10899: yo na kathaṃcid api śaknoti yāgam abhinirvartayitum, taṃ nādhikaroti yajeta śabadaḥ{*5/268*}. yas tu kenacit prakāreṇa śaknoti, na taṃ varjayitvā pravartate. arthāc ca dravyasaṃyogo bhaviṣyati, jīviṣyati vinā dhanenety etad anupapannam. tasmād{*5/269*} arthād eva dravyasaṃyogaḥ{*5/270*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10903: *{5/269: E2: vipratiṣiddham. tad idam abhidhīyate. tasmād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10906: agnihotrādiṣv evāṅgahīnaṃ prati saṃdehaḥ, kim asāv adhikriyate, uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10907: tatrāpy adhikaraṇātideśaḥ. asamartha iti kṛtvā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, śakter vidyamānatvād uttaraḥ. tad{*5/272*} idam abhidhīyate, aṅgahīnaś ca taddharmā{*5/273*}. kiṃdharmā? adravyadharmeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10912: yasya tv apratisamādheyam aṅgavaikalyam, taṃ prati vicāraḥ, kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:10913: adhikriyate, neti, pūrvādhikaraṇenādhikriyata iti prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10914: nādhikriyata iti. kutaḥ? śaktyabhāvāt, nāsau kenacid api prakāreṇa śaknoti yaṣṭum, tasmāt tasyādhikāro na gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10915: nanu yac chaknoti, tatrādhikriyata iti, cakṣur vikalo vinājyāvekṣaṇena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10916: vinā viṣṇukramaiḥ paṅguḥ, vinā praiṣādiśravaṇena ca badhiraḥ, etān padārthān prati cakṣurvikalādīnām anadhikāra iti. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10917: nājyāvekṣaṇādi puruṣaṃ prati nirdiśyate, yadi hi taṃ prati nirdeśyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10918: tato vikalo 'py adhikriyeta, kratuṃ praty eṣām upadeśaḥ, prakaraṇāviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10919: puruṣasya cākhyātenānabhidhānād iti. uktam{*5/274*} etad vidhir vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10920: saṃyogāntarād{*5/275*} ity atra. taiś ca [629]{*5/276*} vinā viguṇaṃ karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:10921: prayuktam api na phalaṃ sādhayet. tasmāt tasyānadhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10926: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate, ārṣeyaṃ vṛṇīte, ekaṃ vṛṇīte, dvau vṛṇīte, trīn
GSP28msbh1-7u:10927: vṛṇīte, na caturo vṛṇīte, na pañcāti vṛṇīta iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim atryārṣeyasyādhikāra uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? atryārṣeyo 'py adhikriyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:10928: iti. kutaḥ? ārṣeyaṃ vṛṇīta iti sāmānyavacanam, tasmād ekaṃ variṣyati dvau
GSP28msbh1-7u:10929: vā, tac ca darśayati, ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīta iti, tathā pratiṣedhati, na caturo vṛṇīta iti{*5/277*}, na pañcāti vṛṇīta iti. na hy aprāptasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:10931: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, yo na tryārṣeyaḥ, sa nādhikriyeta. kutaḥ? trīn vṛṇīta iti viśeṣavacanāt, vidhiś cāprāptatvāt. nanv ekaṃ vṛṇīta ity api viśeṣavacanam asti. nety ucyate, vidhāyikāyā vibhakter abhāvāt. nanu stutyā vidhāsyante, yathā, trīn vṛṇīta iti. ucyate, trayāṇām eva stutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10932: sā tritvaṃ vidhāsyeti. ekaṃ vṛṇīta ity avayutyavādo{*5/279*} 'yaṃ trayāṇām
GSP28msbh1-7u:10933: eva. tatrāpi tritvam eva stūyate vidhātum. ekam ekavākyena vidhānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10934: bhaviṣyatīti. na caturo vṛṇīte, na pañcātivṛṇīta [630]{*5/280*} iti nityānuvādo bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tryārṣeyasyādhikāro nānyasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10940: ādhāne śrūyate, varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīteti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ traivarṇikānām anyatamo rathakāraḥ, āhosvid atraivarṇika iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10941: rathakārasyātraivarṇikasyādhānam etat. kutaḥ? vacanāt, na{*5/281*} hi vacanasya kiṃcid akṛtyam asti{*5/282*}, sarvaśeṣaś cātraivarṇika ādhāne,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10942: brāhmaṇarājyanyaviśām{*5/283*} uktam ādhānam, pariśeṣād atraivarṇiko rathakāra syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10944: *{5/281: E2: vacanāt. vacanam idaṃ bhavati, varṣāsu rathakāra ādadhīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10949: nyāyyo vā syāt, traivarṇiko rathakāraḥ rathakarmaṇā viśeṣeṇocyate, śūdro hy asamarthatvāt pratiṣiddhaḥ. tasmāt traivarṇiko rathakāraḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10951: nāsti traivarṇiko rathakāraḥ, pratiṣiddhaṃ hi tasya śilpopajīvitvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10952: atraivarṇikas tv asti. tasmād vacanaprāmāṇyāt sa ādhāsyate{*5/284*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10956: brāhmaṇādiṣu vasantādayo niyatāḥ, tān prati varṣā ucyamānā apy asaṃbandhād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10957: ānarthakyaṃ prāpnuyuḥ. tasmād atraivarṇiko rathakāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10959: evaṃ cet paśyasi, nāsti traivarṇiko rathakāraḥ, pratiṣiddhatvāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:10960: chilpopajīvitvasyeti. guṇārthena kaścid bhaviṣyati rathakāro vaitathyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10963: *{5/286: E2: rathakāraḥ, āpadi jīvanaṃ caitasya. vākyena tasyedam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10965: uktam, etad asmābhiḥ, na nimittārthāny etāni śravaṇānīti. kim ato yadi na
GSP28msbh1-7u:10966: nimittārthāni. etad ato bhavati, prāpakāṇīti, prāptitvāt teṣām ādhānasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10967: punaḥ prāpakam anarthakam, tena yasyāprāptam, tasya bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10968: athocyeta, etad ekaṃ nimittārthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. naitad evam avakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10969: vasantādisaṃyuktaṃ tat katham iva varṣābhiḥ saṃbadhyeta. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10970: prāpakapakṣa ādhānaṃ vidhīyate śrutyā, nimittapakṣe punar varṣā vidhātavyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:10971: vākyena, śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasīti. tasmād atraivarṇikasyedam ādhānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:10974: na tu sarva evātraivarṇiko rathakāraḥ, saudhanvanā ity eṣa [632]{*5/287*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10975: jātivacanaḥ śabdaḥ. saudhanvanā nāma jātir abhidhīyate, hīnās tu kiṃcit
GSP28msbh1-7u:10976: traivarṇikebhyaḥ, jātyantaram, na tu śūdrāḥ, na vaiśyāḥ, na kṣatriyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10977: teṣām idam ādhānam. katham avagamyate? prasiddher mantravarṇāc ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10978: mantravarṇo hi bhavati, saudhanvanā ṛbhavaḥ sūracakṣasa{*5/288*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10979: ṛbhūṇāṃ tv iti rathakārasyādhānamantraḥ. tasmāt saudhanvanā ṛbhava iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10980: ṛbhavaś ca rathakārāḥ. api ca, nemiṃ nayanty ṛbhavo yatheti{*5/289*} ye nemiṃ nayanti ta ṛbhava ity ucyante. rathakārāś ca nemiṃ nayanti. tasmād atraivarṇikānām aśūdrāṇām etad ādhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10985: vāstumadhye raudraṃ caruṃ nirvapet, yatra rudraḥ prajāḥ śamayed ity etām
GSP28msbh1-7u:10986: iṣṭiṃ prakṛtyocyate, etayā niṣādasthapatiṃ yājayed iti. niṣādasthapatiṃ prati saṃdehaḥ, kim adhikṛtānām anyatamaḥ, utānya eveti. anyatama iti brūmaḥ, sa hi samarthaḥ, vidvattvād agnimattvāc ca, anyo 'vidvattvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:10988: nanu niṣādasthapatiśabdas tatra nopapadyate. ucyate, na, nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10989: niṣādānāṃ sthapatir iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāso bhaviṣyati, śreṣṭho niṣādānām. tasmād adhikṛtādhikāram etac chāstram iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, sthapatir niṣādaḥ syāt, śabdasāmarthyāt{*5/290*}, niṣāda{*5/291*} eva sthapatir bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:10990: arhati. kasmāt? śabdasāmarthyāt, niṣādaṃ hi niṣādaśabdaḥ{*5/292*} śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:10991: vadituṃ{*5/293*} śravaṇenaiva, niṣādānāṃ tu sthapatiṃ lakṣaṇayā brūyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10992: śrutilakṣaṇā[633]{*5/294*}viśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā, na lakṣaṇā. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10993: naiṣa doṣaḥ, niṣādaśabdo niṣādavacana eva, ṣaṣṭhī saṃbandhasya vāciketi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10994: tan na, ṣaṣṭhyaśravaṇāt. nātra ṣaṣṭhīṃ śṛṇumaḥ. āha, lopasāmarthyāt ṣaṣṭhyartho 'vagamyata iti. satyam avagamyate, na tu lopena. kena tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10995: niṣadaśabdalakṣaṇayā, tasyāś ca daurbalyam ity uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10996: samānādhikaraṇasamāsas tu balīyān. tatra hi svārthe śabdau vṛttau bhavataḥ. dvitīyā ca vibhaktis tantreṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyate, tena dvitīyānirdiṣṭo niṣādo gamyate. tatra ṣaṣṭhyarthaṃ kalpayann aśrutaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10997: gṛhaṇīyāt. tasmān niṣāda eva sthapatiḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11004: liṅgaṃ dṛśyate, kūṭaṃ dakṣiṇeti{*5/295*} niṣādasya dravyaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11005: kūṭaṃ hi niṣādānām evopakārakam, nāryāṇām, evaṃ svam eva tan niṣādānām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11009: dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayet, ṛddhikāmā upeyuḥ. tathā, tatra tatraivaṃkāmāḥ satram upeyuḥ, saptadaśāvarāś caturviṃśatiparamāḥ satram
GSP28msbh1-7u:11010: āsīrann iti. teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ tasya tasya kṛtsnena phalenārthinaḥ satre
GSP28msbh1-7u:11011: 'dhikāraḥ, uta parṣado 'rthinyā adhikāra iti. āha, nanv arthino bahusaṃkhyāviśiṣṭā nirdiśyante, katham eṣām ekaśo{*5/297*} 'dhikāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:11012: bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, ṛddhikāmā ityevamādi vidhīyamānam ṛddhilakṣiteṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu ca prāptam, na śakyaṃ bahuvacanena viśeṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:11013: 'vasthāpayitum, tena taṃ tam adhikuryāt parṣadaṃ veti bhavati saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11014: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? ekaiko na samartho bahukartṛkaṃ satraṃ racayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11015: parṣadaṃ tu kartrīm arthinīm avagacchāmaḥ. na cākartuḥ phalaṃ bhavati, na caikaḥ kartocyate, tasmāt samastānāṃ phalam. ekaikasya phalāvayayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11017: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tasya tasyārthinaḥ kṛtsnaṃ phalaṃ satrān nirvartate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11018: kutaḥ? puruṣārthasyaikaikasya siddhir yato bhavati, sahakriyamāṇe sarva ekaikaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayati tantreṇa, kartṝṇāṃ phalaṃ ca bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11020: [635]{*5/298*} āha, nanv etad uktam, ekaiko na śaknoti bahukartṛkaṃ kartuṃ iti. ucyate, śaknoty ekaikasya svātantryavivakṣāyām, yadaikaikaḥ svātantryeṇa pravartate, tadānyān saṃkhyānirvṛttyarthaṃ sāmādibhiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11021: prayokṣyate. ekam ekaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayati, itara itaraś ca, tena sarve kartāraḥ savyapekṣā bhaviṣyanti. sarve cet kartāraḥ, pṛthak pṛthag eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:11025: api cotpattisaṃyogād yathā syāt sattvadarśanam, tathā bhāvo 'vibhāge{*5/299*} syāt//6.2.2//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11026: api ca, naitad viruddham, yad ekaṃ karma bahubhiḥ kriyata iti. yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:11027: ucyate, viruddham, ekena karmaṇi kṛte dvitīyaḥ kiṃ kuryād iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11028: paryāyeṇa kriyāyām evaṃ doṣaḥ, tantreṇa tu kriyāyāṃ bhavati kvacit saṃbhavaḥ, yathā syāt sattvadarśanaṃ tathā bhāvo 'vibhāge{*5/300*} syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11029: yathaikaikasya sattvasya hastino 'śvasya vā darśanam ekaikena kṛtsnam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11030: abhinirvartyate. evam eva satre tantrabhāvo bhavet, sarveṣāṃ madhyakaṃ dravyam, madhyakasyāhavanīyasyopary adhvaryur apavidhyati{*5/301*}. tatra sarve kartāras tantreṇa bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11031: na cātrotpannasaṃyogaḥ, utpattyaiva tu saṃkhyayā karma saṃyujyate. yadi hy utpannaṃ saṃyujyeta, tato 'nekasaṃbandhārtham iti vacanaṃ gamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11032: utpattisaṃyoge tv etan nāsti. tasmād ekaikasya kṛtsnena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11040: svarga[636]{*5/302*}kāmo yajeteti śrūyate. atra saṃdehaḥ, kim aniyamena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11041: eko dvau bahavo vā yajeran, athavaika eva yajeteti. nanu tṛtīya uktam{*5/303*}, śāstraphalaṃ prayoktarīti. yadā prayoktari, tadā vivakṣitam ekatvaṃ yathā, tathā vakṣyāmaḥ, iha tu tad evākṣipyate, punaś ca nirṇeṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11042: kiṃ prāptam? yathākāmī prayoge syāt. kutaḥ? puruṣaśruteḥ, puruṣaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11043: puruṣe yāgaṃ śrāvayitvā kṛtārthaḥ śabda ekasya dvayor bahūnāṃ vā yāgaṃ na vārayati. nāsau puruṣo yāge śrūyate, yāgam abhinirvartayet, yāgena vā phalam abhinirvartayed iti. kathaṃ tarhi? yāgena phalaṃ prāpnuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11044: yāgasya vā phalanirvṛtter vā nāṅgaṃ puruṣaḥ. yadi hy aṅgam abhaviṣyad yāge phalanirvṛttau vā, tadā saṃkhyā guṇabhūtā tadaṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ paricchindyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11045: atha punar aṅgabhūtaṃ puruṣaṃ{*5/304*} prakāśayan lakṣaṇatvenaiva puruṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:11046: 'bhisaṃbadhyeta{*5/305*}, na guṇavacanatayā. tatra cāvivakṣitaṃ saṃkhyāvacanam, yāvān arthī samarthaś ca tāvantaṃ sarvam adhikṛtyaitad ucyamānaṃ na śakyate ekena vacanena viśeṣayitum. kathaṃ ca puruṣaprādhānyam? na phalotpattyā kiṃcit prayojanam asti, na yāgotpattyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11047: ātmā tu phalasaṃbaddhaḥ sarvasyeṣṭaḥ, tadarthaṃ karma kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11048: itarathocyamānam api na kriyeta, tatra vacanārthakyaṃ syāt, tasmād yāthākāmyaṃ syāt, eko dvau bahavo vā yajerann iti. tathā ca darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11049: yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī{*5/306*} iti dvayor yajamānayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryād iti, ete{*5/307*} asṛgram indava{*5/308*} iti bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti dvayor bahūnāṃ ca yāgaṃ pradarśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11058: iti cet, idaṃ{*5/309*} cet paśyasi, pratyarthaṃ{*5/310*} śrutibhāvaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11059: [637]{*5/311*} yāgam abhinirvartayet, tataś ca phalaṃ prāpnuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11060: kutaḥ? etad ubhayaṃ hy etasmād avagamyate, katarad atra jahīma iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11061: nādhyavasyāmaḥ. tasmād ubhayam api pratyetavyam. āha, nanv ekārthavacanatā na nyāyyeti. ucyate, yad avagamyate tan nyāyyam, ubhayaṃ ca pratīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11062: tasmād ubhayārthavacanataiva nyāyyā. yāgaṃ prati ca guṇabhāvād vivakṣitam ekavacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11065: *{5/310: E2: ced bhavān paśyatv avivakṣitam ekatvam iti. pratyarthaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11067: naitad evam, tādarthye puruṣe pradhānabhūte sati nāṅgabhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11068: pratīyate, anukte hi nyāye na pratīmaḥ, arthāntaraṃ yato guṇabhāvāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:11069: pradhānabhāvaḥ, pradhānabhūtaś cātra kartā, vacanasyārthavattvāt. ato na guṇabhāvaḥ kartur avakalpate, codanaikatvāt. ekā hi vidhāyikā codanā, sā yadi phalotpattiṃ yāgotpattiṃ vā vidhatte, tadā kartā na svārthena, yadā punaḥ svārthena, tadā yāgaḥ phalaṃ vā tādarthyena. na caitad yaugapadyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11070: bhavati, svārtha ekaḥ, tadartha itaro vaiparītyena veti, yathobhābhyāṃ bāhubhyām iṣūn asyati devadatta iti gamyate, na ca yaugapadyena, yadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11071: dakṣiṇenāsyati, tadā savyena dhanuḥpṛṣṭhaṃ namayati, na tenāpy asyatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11072: gamyate, tatra vyāpṛtatvāt. evaṃ yadā puruṣaprādhānyam, tadā yāgasya phalasya vā guṇabhāvo gamyate. tatra vyāpṛtatvān na tayoḥ prādhānyam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:11073: gamyate. tasmān na yāge phale vā puruṣasya guṇabhāvaḥ. ato yāthākāmyaṃ syāt, eko dvau bahavo vā yajerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11075: api vā kāmasaṃyoge saṃbandhāt prayogāyopadiśyeta, pratyarthaṃ hi vidhiśrutir viṣāṇāvat{*5/313*}//6.2.6//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11076: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ, prayogāyopadiśyeta kartā, na svārthena. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11077: yajetety asyārthaḥ yāgaṃ kuryāt, yāgena vā kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11078: sattābhivyaktimātraṃ gamyate, na phalasya kartā dhātā{*5/314*} vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11079: svargakāmaśabdaś ca svargakāmamātre vartate, na viśeṣam avalambate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11080: ātmanaḥ parasya veti, śabdapramāṇakāś ca vayam īdṛśeṣv artheṣu. kathaṃ tarhi kāmasyātmasaṃbandho 'vagamyate? saṃbandhāt, phalakāmo 'nukte 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:11081: śabdena, ātmana eva phalaṃ kāmayate, na parasya. yatra tūbhāv arthau
GSP28msbh1-7u:11082: vaktavyau bhavataḥ, pratyarthaṃ tatra vidhiḥ śrūyate, yathā, kṛṣṇaviṣāṇayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11083: kaṇḍūyati, cātvāle kṛṣṇaviṣāṇāṃ prāsyatīti{*5/315*}. yatraivaṃ dve śrutī
GSP28msbh1-7u:11084: vidhātryau bhavataḥ, tatra guṇabhāvaḥ prādhānyaṃ ca gamyate. na tv atraivaṃ dve vidhāyike śrutī vidyete. guṇabhūtas tu puruṣaḥ śrūyate bhāvayed iti, tatra yajyarthaḥ karaṇaṃ, karma vā. saṃbandhāt tu puruṣaprādhānyam, na kasyacit sukhenotpannena prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11085: sukhasaṃbandhenātmanas tu kṛtyam. tasmāt saṃbandhāt puruṣaprādhānyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11086: gamyate, na śruteḥ. ato guṇabhūtasya puruṣasya saṃkhyā vivakṣiteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11092: iti ced bhavān paśyati, evaṃ sati yadi svargakāmo 'nyasyāpi svargaṃ kāmayamāno bhavati, anyasya svargaṃ kāmayamāno 'py anyo yajeta. tatra pūrvokto nyāyaḥ pratyuddhṛto bhavati, śāstraphalaṃ NOTES:
GSP28msbh1-7u:11094: na parasya svargakāma ity{*5/318*} evaṃ na yajeta, na, anyasya{*5/319*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11095: svargakāmaśabdo na vācaka iti. kathaṃ tarhi? phalam asau na prāpnotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11096: kathaṃ punaḥ phalasyāprāptiḥ? upagrahaviśeṣaśravaṇāt, yajeteti. yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11097: vādhāne, brāhmaṇo vasante 'gnim ādadhīteti, tadā tu kāmaśrutāv upagraho
GSP28msbh1-7u:11103: evaṃ ced bhavān manyate, na svargakāmaśabdo na vācaka iti, anyo na yajeta
GSP28msbh1-7u:11104: phalābhāvāt, nāsya yāga iti, sūktavākaphalārthitayā{*5/320*} tarhi yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11105: āśāste 'yaṃ yajamānaḥ āyur āśāsta iti{*5/321*} prayojayitāraṃ nirdekṣyati hotā, phalavidhiś ca sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti vidhānāt, yadi phalavidhir ayaṃ māntravarṇikaḥ, tarhi{*5/322*} sūktavākena prastaraḥ prahṛto bhavati, itarathādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. tasmād ānuṣaṅgikaphalārtham anyasya svargakāmo 'nyo yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11111: naitad asti, yasyaiva pradhānakarmaphalam, tasyaivānuṣaṅgikam api bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:11112: arhati, evaṃ svārthenādhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. na hy ādhānasya svārthatāyām asti viśeṣaḥ, pradhānaphalaṃ vānuṣaṅgikaṃ vā sarvam evādhātari samavetum
GSP28msbh1-7u:11113: arhati, nityakāmyatā ca virudhyeta, yady āyurādikāmo{*5/323*} yajeta, na tarhi nityam, yadi nityaṃ nāyurādikāmaḥ. tasmān nāvasthito nyāyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11114: pratyuddhriyeta{*5/324*}, na{*5/325*} ca puruṣaḥ pradhānabhūtaś codyate guṇabhāvāt tv asya vivakṣitam ekatvam. tasmād eka eva yajeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11120: atha yad uktam, dvayor bahūnāṃ ca yāgaṃ darśayati, yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11121: svaḥpatī{*5/327*} iti{*5/328*} dvayor yajamānayoḥ pratipadaṃ kuryāt, ete asṛgram indava iti{*5/329*} bahubhyo yajamānebhyaḥ pratipadaṃ kuryād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11122: dviyajamānake bahuyajamānake ca karmaṇi pratipad vidhāne karma tathā yuktaṃ{*5/330*} syād iti, tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11129: naitad evam, samavetaṃ hi karma vidyate dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca yajamānaiḥ, vacanena, yathāhīnāḥ, teṣu pratipad vidhānam arthavad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11132: prajākāmo yajeta, grāmakāmo yajetetyevamādi karma samāmnāyate. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11133: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ prakrāntaṃ niyogataḥ samāpanīyam utecchayā kāryaṃ heyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11134: veti. kiṃ prāptam? niyogataḥ parisamāpayitavyam iti. kutaḥ? evaṃ hi śrūyate, idaṃ kāmo yajeteti, evaṃ tasyākhyātasyārtham upadiśanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11135: upakramaprabhṛty apavargaparyantam āheti, upakramād ārabhya yāvat
GSP28msbh1-7u:11136: parisamāptir ity etāvān vyāpāraviśeṣas tasyārthaḥ, na yathā pākas tyāga
GSP28msbh1-7u:11137: iti. tatra hi pākasattāmātraṃ nirdiśyate, nārabhya parisamāpayitavyam [641]{*5/332*} iti. evaṃ cākhyātārthaṃ laukikā api pratipadyante, tatra nārambhe puruṣaprayatnaś codyata iti gamyate. yataś coditaṃ na niyogata
GSP28msbh1-7u:11138: ārabhante, niyogataḥ punaḥ parisamāpayanti, tena nobhe ārambhaparisamāptī{*5/333*} śabdārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi? parisamāptiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11139: śabdārthaḥ, parisamāptyām arthaprāptatvād ārambhasya. tasmāt parisamāptiḥ śabdārtha iti gamyate. sā cec chabdārthaḥ, sā kartavyatayā codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11140: ārambhe nāsti kartavyatāvacanam. tena na niyogata ārambhaḥ, niyogatas tu parisamāptiḥ. tenopakrānte karmaṇi yadi vīyāt phalecchā, avāpnoti vā phalam, tasyām apy avasthāyām, kartavyam evopakrāntasya parisamāpanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11141: nanv{*5/334*} arthino yo 'rthaḥ, so 'tra kartavyatayocyate. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11142: vākyārtho hi sa bhavati, yāgasya tu kartavyatā śrutyā gamyate. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:11143: grāmakāmena{*5/335*} yāga ārabdhaḥ parisamāpanīyaḥ. grāmādikāmanāvacanaṃ nimittatvena tadā bhavati, nimitte cotpanne yat kartavyam ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11144: tadvinaṣṭe 'pi nimitte kartavyam eva, upakrāntasya samāpanaṃ kartavyam, na hi tadvinaṣṭam anutpannaṃ bhavati. utpattiś ca nimittam, na bhāvaḥ. tasmād vītāyām api phalecchāyām upakrāntaṃ parisamāpayitavyam. kriyāyā hi nimittam ārambhaḥ, so 'pi parisamāpter iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11148: *{5/334: E2: kartavyam iti codyate yad iṣṭaphalam. nanv}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11151: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. aniyamo vā. kasmāt? phalārthitvāt phalārthinaḥ phalaṃ cikīrṣamāṇasyopāyo{*5/336*} 'yaṃ vidhīyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11152: kartavyatā, sā hi vidhīyamānā phalasya vā yāgasya vā syāt. phalasya na tāvad vaktavyā, na hi yo yat kāmayate tasya tat kartavyatopadeṣṭavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11154: upāyaṃ tu na veda, tam ākāṅkṣate. idam upadiśyate, yāga upāya iti, yāgena kriyata iti. na ca yāgasya kartavyatā, pratyakṣavirodhāt, pratyakṣas tu kleśo yāgaḥ, yadi yāgenānyasya kartavyatā, tadā na virodhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11155: yāgakartavyatāyāṃ phalaṃ kalpyam, na ca kalpyamānasya pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11156: kartavyopadeśaś ca śakyādiṣv artheṣu bhavati, tasmān na yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11157: phalakāmasya yad iṣṭaṃ tat kartavyam anūdya yathāprāptaṃ yāgasya sādhanatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11158: vidhīyate, tena nāvaśyaṃ samāpanīyaṃ bhavati, yathānukrāntaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11159: nāvaśyopakramitavyam, evam upakrāntaṃ nāvaśyaṃ samāpayitavyam. yat tu vākyārthaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti, yatra śrutyartho na saṃbhavati, tatra vākyārtho gṛhyata ity uktam eva. tasmād aniyamaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11161: *{5/336: E1 gibt phalaṃ cikīrṣamāṇasya in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11164: niyamo vā tannimittatvāt kartus tat kāraṇaṃ syāt//6.2.15//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11165: ārambho hi nimittaṃ samāpteḥ. katham? tat kartuḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11166: kāraṇam? satyasaṃkalpatā yo hy ārabdham evaṃjātīyakaṃ samāpayati, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11167: taṃ{*5/340*} śiṣṭā vigarhante, prākramiko 'yam asaṃvyavahārya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11168: śiṣṭavigarhaṇā ca doṣaḥ. tasmād ārabhya samāpayitavyam. āha, śiṣṭāḥ punaḥ kim arthaṃ vigarhanta iti. ucyate, vigarhante tāvat, kiṃ no viditena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11173: kenacid gṛham upakrāntaṃ bhavati śakaṭaṃ ratho vā, vītāsya phalecchā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11174: avāpnoti vā phalam. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ tena niyogataḥ parisamāpayitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11175: utecchayotsraṣṭavyam apīti. kiṃ prāptam? loke karmāṇy evaṃjātīyakāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:11176: upakramya parisamāpayitavyāni, yathaiva vaidikāni tathaiva tāni niyogataḥ parisamāpayīyāni. kutaḥ? tato 'dhipuruṣajñānam, tatas tatpuruṣajñānaṃ bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ? śāstrāt, āmnāyate hi takṣṇāṃ śāstram, tatrāpi devatāvyāpāro 'ṅgīkriyate, pūrvasyāṃ diśy etā devatā itarāsv etā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11182: teṣāṃ ca laukikānām aparādhe tais takṣabhiḥ prāyaścittaśāstram āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11183: āre bhagna indrabāhur baddhavyaḥ pāyasaṃ ca brāhmaṇo bhojayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11184: prāyaścittaṃ ca yady adṛṣṭārtham, na śāstrādṛte. atha
GSP28msbh1-7u:11185: prasaṅgaparihārārtham, tato 'py adṛtam eva tad iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11187: aśāstrā tūpasaṃprāptiḥ{*5/344*} śāstraṃ syān na prakalpakam, tasmād arthena gamyetāprāpte vā śāstram{*5/345*} arthavat//6.2.18//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11188: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. aśāstrā tv eṣām upasaṃprāptir iti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11189: smṛter asyāḥ śāstraṃ bhavatānumīyate, na śāstram antareṇa smṛtiḥ, na ca smṛtim antareṇa takṣṇāṃ grantha upapadyata iti. ata ucyate, bhavaty atra smṛtiḥ, evam idaṃ gṛhādi karma ramaṇīyaṃ bhavatīti, nāsmāt karmaṇo 'dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11190: kiṃcid iti. yā cāsau ramaṇīyatā sāntareṇāpi śāstram, śakyā jñātum, jñātvā ca smaryate. tasmāt nāsyāḥ smṛteḥ śāstraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11191: prakalpyam. yady antareṇa śāstram, na prāpyeta, tataḥ śāstram atrārthavad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11192: iti prakalpyeta. tasmān nedaṃ śāstroktam, śāstrokte ca sāmikṛte tyakte
GSP28msbh1-7u:11193: 'tyantaṃ śiṣṭā garhante, devatāśraye ca. nanv atrāpi devatāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11194: asyāṃ diśīyaṃ devatā yakṣyate 'syām iyam iti. ucyate, puruṣam anu devatāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11195: śiṣṭāḥ smaryante, na graham anu, tasmād adoṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11199: pratiṣedheṣv akarmatvāt kriyā syāt pratiṣiddhānāṃ vibhaktatvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:11200: akarmaṇām//6.2.19// idaṃ hy upadiśanti, na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayitavyam, na laśunaṃ na gṛñjanaṃ ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim evaṃjātīyakaṃ phalakāmena na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11201: bhakṣayitavyam, niṣkāmeṇādyam, atha vā niyogato varjayitavyam eveti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11202: prāptam? phalārthinā na bhakṣayitavyam, anarthino 'niyama iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11203: niyamo hy ayam ucyate, idaṃ na bhakṣayitavyam iti, evam ukte dvayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11204: āpatati, [645]{*5/346*} yadi vābhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti, yadi vā bhakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11205: na kartavyam iti, yadi nañviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam ity abhyupagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11206: tato 'bhakṣaṇaṃ śrutyā tavyo vidadhāti, nañ bhakṣayati viśeṣaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11207: tadvyāpārāc ca kartavyatayā nañ na saṃbadhyate{*5/347*}. atha nañarthaḥ kartavyaḥ, tato vākyena nidhānam, bhakṣayatiś ca nañviśeṣaṇam, śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmād abhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti gamyate, abhakṣaṇaṃ ca bhakṣaṇābhāvaḥ, na tasya kartavyatāsti. tasmād yas tatra mānaso vyāpāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11208: sa ihopadiśyate, yenopāyena nañviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ bhavati. pūrvaṃ nañbhakṣayatyoḥ saṃbandhaḥ, tato vidhānam. yathā, nodyantam ādityam īkṣetetyevamādiṣu prajāpativrateṣu kurvataḥ phalam, akurvato na phalaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11209: doṣaḥ, evam ihāpi, vibhaktatvād akarmaṇām, nātra karma pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11210: akarmamātram upadiśyate, anyad dhi karma bhakṣaṇaṃ pratiṣidhyamānam, anyad akarma mānasaḥ saṃkalpa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11212: *{5/347: Jha schlägt vor, mit MS nañ saṃbadhyate zu lesen}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11213: śāstrāṇāṃ tv arthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate tayor asamavāyitvāt tādarthye vidhyatikramaḥ//6.2.20//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11214: upavarṇanāparihāras tāvad ucyate, yuktaṃ yat prajāpativrateṣu śāstrāṇām arthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate. tatra niyamaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11215: yaś ca kartavyaḥ, sa kalyāṇodayaḥ, yo na kartavyaḥ sa pāpodayaḥ. kathaṃ punaḥ prajāpativrateṣu niyamaḥ kartavyatayā codyata iti. ucyate, tasya vratam iti prakṛtya prajāpativratāni samāmnātāni, vratam iti ca mānasaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11216: karmocyate. idaṃ na kariṣyāmīti yaḥ saṃkalpaḥ. katamat tad vratam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11217: nodyantam ādityam īkṣeteti, yathā tadīkṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tathā mānaso vyāpāraḥ kartavyaḥ, tasya ca pālanam. tatra tasmāt puruṣārtho 'stīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:11218: avagantavyam. tatra caitāny eva [646]{*5/348*} prakṛtyocyate, etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti, etāvatā kṛtenāyukta enasā bhavatīti{*5/349*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11219: atheha tayor asamavāyitvam, iha kriyā pratiṣidhyate, nākriyopadiśyate, na hi kalañjaṃ bhakṣayan pratiṣedhāvidhiṃ nātikrāmati, iha punar ādityaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11220: paśyan nātikrāmati vidhim, na hi tasya darśanaṃ pratiṣiddham. niyamas
GSP28msbh1-7u:11221: tatropadiṣṭaḥ, yas taṃ niyamaṃ karoti, sa phalena saṃbadhyate, iha tu pratiṣidhyate kalañjādi. katham avagamyate? nātra tasya, vratam iti prakṛtya vacanam asti. na ca, na bhakṣayitavyam ity asya mānaso vyāpāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:11222: 'rthaḥ, bhakṣayitavyam iti ca bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ śabdenocyate, neti tat pratiṣidhyate śrutyaiva. evaṃ prasiddho 'rtho 'nugṛhīto bhavati, itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt, śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmād iha pratiṣedhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11223: ucyate, astu pratiṣiddhaṃ{*5/350*} nāma, doṣo 'tra na śrūyate. tasmāt pratiṣiddham apy anuṣṭhātavyam iti. kalpayiṣyata iti cet, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11225: iti yady ucyeta. naitad evam, vyartho 'pi hy upadeśo 'jñānāt saṃbhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11226: tasmān na kalpyo doṣa ity. ucyate, satyaṃ na kalpanīyaḥ, kiṃ tu kḷpta eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11227: katham? anantaram evainaṃ śiṣṭā varjayeyuḥ, patitaḥ karmaphalebhya iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11228: vadantaḥ, mahāṃś caiṣa doṣaḥ, yac chiṣṭā varjayanti. tasmān niyogataḥ kalañjādi na bhakṣayitavyam iti, yathā, na sarpāyāṅguliṃ dadyāt, tatra doṣadarśanān niyogato na sarpāyāṅgulir dīyate, kaṇṭako vā na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11231: *{5/349: E1 gibt etāvatā kṛtenāyukta enasā bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11235: iha smārtāḥ padārthā udāharaṇam, pratyupasthitaniyamāś cācārāḥ, gurur anugantavyo 'bhivādayitavyaś ca, vṛddhavayāḥ pratyuttheyaḥ saṃmantavyaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:11236: ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ jātamātrāṇām ime padārthā utopanītānām iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11237: prāptam? aviśeṣopadeśāt jātamātrāṇām. kutaḥ? puruṣe te śiṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11238: jātamātraś ca puruṣo bhavati. tasmāj jātamātrāṇām ime padārthāḥ, ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11240: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. upāyena pravarteran upanayanena saha
GSP28msbh1-7u:11241: pravarteran{*5/353*}, vedatulyatvāt. vedatulyā hi smṛtiḥ, vaidikā eva padārthāḥ smaryanta ity uktam{*5/354*}. vaidikāś ca padārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11242: upanayanottarakāle samāmnātāḥ, smārtāś caite vaidikā eva, tasmād upanayanottarakālā eta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11244: *{5/353: E1 gibt upanayanena saha pravarteran in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11247: idam āmnanati, yāvājjīvam agnihotraṃ juhoti, yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti puruṣārtho 'yaṃ yāgo vidhīyate{*5/356*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:11248: nāyam abhyāsaḥ karmaśeṣa ity uktam. ihedānīṃ saṃdihyate, kiṃ sātatyena hotavyam, uta na sātatyeneti{*5/357*}. kiṃ prāptam? puruṣaṃ pratyupadiṣṭatvāt sātatyena, ayaṃ puruṣaḥ iti sātatyenānuṣṭhātavyam. nanu pradoṣam agnihotraṃ hotavyam, vyuṣṭāyāṃ prātar iti śrūyate, paurṇamāsyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11250: naiṣa sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇa prayogaḥ. ataḥ kālamātre hīne na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11257: naitad asti, yat, juhudhi juhudhīty eva hotavyam iti, yathā śaknoti, tathā juhuyād ity ucyate, na ca sātatyena śakyate, avaśyam anena āhāravihārāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11258: kartavyāḥ. tasmād arthāviruddheṣu kāleṣu satataṃ hotavyam{*5/360*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11262: na caitad asti, yad uktam, arthāviruddheṣu kaleṣu satataṃ hotavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11263: kāla eṣaḥ śrūyate, pradoṣam agnihotraṃ hotavyam, vyuṣṭāyāṃ prātar iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11265: amāvāsyayena{*5/362*} yajeteti. tasmān na [649]{*5/363*} sātatyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11266: āha, nanu viguṇasyāpi prayogān na kāla ādaraṇīya iti. atrocyate, na kālo guṇaḥ, nimittaṃ hy etad ity uktam. tasmād anyeṣu kāleṣv avihitatvāt kṛtam apy akṛtaṃ syāt. tasmād āśritakālasya yāvajjīvaṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11271: liṅgaṃ ca bhavati, apa vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvasyāṃ vātipātayed iti{*5/364*}. yadi sarvasmin kāle
GSP28msbh1-7u:11272: homaḥ, tadā kasyātipattiḥ syāt. tasmād api na satatam abhyāsaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11276: pradoṣe{*5/365*} agnihotraṃ hotavyam, vyuṣṭāyāṃ prātar iti, tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11278: āmāvāsyayena{*5/367*} yajeteti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ sakṛt pradoṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:11279: hotavyam, uta pradoṣe pradoṣa iti, tathā sakṛd vyuṣṭāyāṃ prātaḥ, uta vyuṣṭāyāṃ vyuṣṭāyām iti, tathā kiṃ sakṛt paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11280: utāgata āgate kāla iti. kiṃ prāptam? sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdaḥ, na niyamaḥ paunaḥpunye.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11281: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, āgamena pravarteta, āgata āgate kāle prayogaḥ kartavya iti. kutaḥ? teṣām autpattikatvāt, utpadyamānaṃ karma kālasaṃyuktam evotpadyate, tad uktam, nimittārthāḥ kālaśrutaya iti, nimitte ca saṃprāpte naimittiko 'rthaḥ kartavyo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11282: tasmād āgata āgate kāle prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11288: apa vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayed iti{*5/369*}, āgata āgate kāle prayogaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11291: bhinne juhoti, skanne juhotīti darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11292: sakṛd bhinne skanne ca hutvā kṛtārthaḥ, uta bhinne bhinne, skanne skanne ceti. tatrādhikaraṇātideśaḥ, yaḥ pūrvatra{*5/370*} pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, sa iha pūrvaḥ{*5/371*}, ya uttaraḥ sa ihottara iti. sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtārtha iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, nimittatvāt punaḥ prayoga ity{*5/372*} uttaraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11296: *{5/372: E2: nimittatvād āgata āgate kāla ity}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11298: gurur anugantavyo 'bhivādayitavyaś ca, vṛddhavayāḥ pratyuttheyaḥ saṃmantavyaś ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim āgata āgate gurau, vṛddhavayasi ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11299: yad uktam, tat kartavyam, uta sakṛt kṛte kṛtārtheti. ācārād gṛhyamāṇeṣu tathā syāt puruṣārthatvād ity adhikaraṇātideśaḥ. tatra yaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11300: sa iha pūrvaḥ{*5/373*}, ya uttaraḥ sa uttaraḥ, sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtārtha iti pūrvaḥ [651]{*5/374*} pakṣaḥ, nimittatvāt punaḥ prayoga ity uttaraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11304: idaṃ śrūyate, somena yajeta{*5/375*}, garbhāṣṭameṣu brāhmaṇam upanayīta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11305: prajām utpādayed iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ nityāny etāny utānityānīti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11307: iti prāpta ucyate, brāhmaṇādīnāṃ somādīni nityānīti. kutaḥ? ṛṇavākyena hi saṃyogo bhavati, jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇas tribhir ṛṇavā jāyate, yajñena devebhyo brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyaḥ{*5/376*} prajayā pitṛbhya iti, sa vai tarhy anṛṇo yadā yajvā brahmacārī prajāvān iti{*5/377*}, ṛṇasaṃstavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11309: nanu liṅgam asādhakam, nyāya ucyatām, yasyaitad dyotakam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11310: akāmasaṃyuktāny eṣāṃ pṛthag vākyāni bhavanti, vasante vasante jyotiṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11311: yajeta, yāvajjīvam agnihotraṃ juhoti, yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta. tathā, vidyām adhīyīta. tathā, prajā utpādayitavyeti. evaṃ nityatāyāḥ prāptāyā idaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11312: atha vā, ayam anyo 'rthaḥ, brāhmaṇasya tu somavidyāprajam ṛṇavākyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11314: rājanyavaiśyayor aniyatāḥ, uta sarveṣāṃ niyatā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11315: brāhmaṇasyaiva niyatā netarayor iti. kutaḥ? evaṃ śrūyate, jāyamāno ha vai
GSP28msbh1-7u:11316: brāhmaṇa iti, brāhmaṇasya niyamo dṛśyate, netarayoḥ, brāhmaṇasaṃkīrtanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11317: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, sarveṣāṃ niyamaḥ. kutaḥ? aviśeṣeṇa niyamavidhānaṃ yat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11318: tad akāmasaṃyuktaṃ vacanaṃ niyāmakam, tad aviśiṣṭaṃ sarveṣām, tasmāt sarveṣāṃ niyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11319: nanu jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇa iti brāhmaṇasya saṃkīrtanam. ucyate, bhavaty asmin vacane brāhmaṇasaṃkīrtanam, na tv{*5/379*} etan{*5/380*} niyamasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:11320: vidhāyakam, etair akāmasaṃyuktair vacanair vihitabhya niyamasyānuvādo 'yam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11321: avadānastutyarthaḥ, tasmān nātra brāhmaṇasaṃkīrtanena rājanyasya vaiśyasya vāniyamo vijñāyate. brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ tu pradarśanārtham, jāyamāno{*5/381*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11322: brāhmaṇo rājanyo vaiśyo veti{*5/382*}, tathā jāyamāno jātaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11325: *{5/376: E2 hat yajñena devebhyaḥ nach ṛṣibhyaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11332: bahvṛcabrahmaṇe śrūyate, yāvajjīvam agnihotraṃ juhoti, yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti, nityam agnihotram, nityau ca darśapūrṇamāsau. tatra yad etat kāmaśravaṇād anyad akāmaśravaṇaṃ{*5/384*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11333: dvitīyam, tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yaḥ kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11334: tasyaivādhikāraḥ, uta viguṇam api tat prayoktavyam iti. ekādaśe{*5/385*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11335: kāmasaṃyukte prathame śravaṇe cintayiṣyate sāṅge, iha nitye śravaṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:11337: kiṃ prāptam? sarvaśaktau pravṛttiḥ syāt tathābhūtopadeśāt, yaḥ kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartuṃ śaknoti, sa evānutiṣṭhet, tathābhūtopadeśāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11338: yathābhūtaṃ hi tat kāmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutam, tathābhūtam eva nityam apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:11340: darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaś ca sāṅgasyaiva vācakaḥ. katham? paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca sāṅgaṃ vidhīyate. yac ca paurṇamāsyāṃ vihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11341: [654]{*5/386*} sā ca paurṇamāsī. yad amāvāsyāyāṃ vihitam, sā cāmāvāsyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11342: sāṅgam amāvāsyāyāṃ vihitam, paurṇamāsyāṃ ca, tasmāt sāṅgaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdenocyata iti jaiminir manyate sma{*5/387*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11346: *{5/387: E2 gibt jaiminir manyate sma in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11347: api vāpy ekadeśe syāt pradhāne hy arthanivṛttir guṇamātram itarat
GSP28msbh1-7u:11348: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. apy ekadeśe 'ṅgānāṃ syād eva prayogaḥ, yataḥ sāṅgasyāpy anaṅgasyāpi prayujyamānasya pradhānād evāyam artho niṣpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11349: guṇamātraṃ sarvāṅgaprayogeṇa bhavati. ko guṇaḥ? sāṅgāt svargābhinirvṛttiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11350: pradhānamātrād idam anyat phalam. tasmāt svargaprāptyarthaṃ saṃpūrṇāṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11351: kariṣyāmīty ārabdham. yadi kānicid aṅgāni na śaknoti kartum, tathāpy asmād ekadeśāṅgaguṇayuktāt pradhānāt phalaṃ bhaviṣyati. tasmāt pradhānamātrasya prayogam āha, nāṅgānām. darśapūrṇamāśabdako 'gnihotraśabdakaś ca pradhānapadārtho 'nyāny aṅgāni tadarthānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11352: tadakarmaṇi ca doṣas tasmāt tato viśeṣaḥ syāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:11353: pradhānātikrame doṣaḥ śrūyate, apa vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayed iti{*5/388*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11354: pradhānātikrame doṣaṃ bruvaṃs tasya nityatāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11357: karmābhedaṃ tu jaiminiḥ prayogavacanaikatvāt sarveṣām upadeśaḥ syād
GSP28msbh1-7u:11358: yad uktam, nāsti bhedaḥ, imāny aṅgāni, imāni pradhānāni [655]{*5/389*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11359: iti, prayogavacanaikatvād iti jaiminir āha sma. sarveṣām upadeśakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11360: paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta, amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayā yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11362: arthasya vyapavargitvād ekasyāpi prayoge syād yathā kratvantareṣu//6.3.5//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11363: ekāṅgaprayoge 'pi syād viguṇād api phalam ity arthaḥ. kutaḥ? arthasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:11364: vyapavargitvāt. vyapavṛktam aṅgebhyaḥ pradhānam, agnihotrasaṃjñakād darśapūrṇamāsasaṃjñakāc ca phalam iha bhavati. tad dhi kartavyatayopadiśyate. yat paurṇamāsyām upadiṣṭam, sā paurṇamāsī, yad amāvāsyāyāṃ sāmāvāsyā, yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti{*5/390*}. tasmād agnaye puroḍāśo 'gnīṣomābhyāṃ ca, ājyaṃ cāgnīṣomādibhyaḥ paurṇamāsyām. āgneyasāṃnyāyyādīnām yad uktam, paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta, amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayā yajeteti sāṅgasya vidhānāt sāṅgaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdenābhidhīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11365: naitad evam, siddhe hi darśārthe pūrṇamāsārthe ca sāṅgaṃ phale vidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11366: tasmān na sāṅgam agnihotrapadavācyaṃ darśapūrṇamāsapadavācyaṃ ca{*5/392*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11367: yac cāgnihotraṃ tad iha codyate kartavyatayā, yau ca darśapūrṇamāsau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11368: tasmād viguṇam api kartavyam evāgnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau ca. yathā kratvantareṣu prakṛtivikṛtiṣu parasya dharmāḥ parasya na bhavanti, evaṃ na kāmasaṃyuktasya dharmā nityasya bhavitum arhanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11374: vidhyaparādheṣu ca samāptiṃ darśayati, tad eva yādṛk{*5/393*} tādṛg hotavyam iti{*5/394*} viguṇasya samāptiṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11379: vidhyaparādhe ca prāyaścittāni vidhīyante, nimitte karmāṅgabhūtāni, yathā bhinne juhotīti. viguṇe niṣphale sati kasyāṅgabhūtaiḥ prayojanaṃ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11380: tasmāt viguṇānām api prayogaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11382: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet prajākāmaḥ{*5/396*}, sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcaskāmaḥ{*5/397*}, vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrāhāyaṇīṃ{*5/398*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11383: nirvaped grāmakāma{*5/399*} ityevamādiṣu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ viguṇam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:11384: phalavat, utāviguṇam eva phalavad iti. kiṃ prāptam? kāmyeṣu caivaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11385: viguṇam api phalavad iti. kutaḥ? arthitvāt. yadi viguṇam api phalavad evam arthimātram adhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati, anyathā sāmānyaśabdo 'ntareṇa viśeṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11386: viśeṣe 'vasthāpito bhaviṣyati. asamarthatvān nādhikriyata iti cet. sāṅgaṃ na samarthaḥ kartum, pradhānamātraṃ tu śaknoti, pradhānamātre
GSP28msbh1-7u:11393: asaṃyogāt tu naivaṃ syād vidheḥ śabdapramāṇatvāt//6.3.9//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11394: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. naivaṃ syāt, yad uktaṃ viguṇam api phalavad iti, asaṃyogāt pradhānamātrasya phalena, sāṅgād [657]{*5/400*} dhi phalaṃ śrūyate pradhānāt, na kevalāt. tena yady api kevalam ucyate, tathāpi naivaṃjātīyakaṃ tat kuryāt, na kevalasya phalena saṃyoga iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11395: śabdapramāṇakaś cāyam artho vidhīyate. śabdaś ca sāṅgāt phalam āheti vakṣyāmaḥ{*5/401*}. tasmān na viguṇaṃ karma kartavyam evaṃjātīyakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11399: na cātra pradhānamātrasyākarmaṇi pratyavāya ucyate, yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11400: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ. tasmād api na viguṇam evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ karma prayoktavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11403: darśapūrṇamāsayāgaḥ puroḍāśenoktaḥ, sa ca puroḍāśo vrīhimayaḥ kartavya iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11404: śrūyate. tatraitac cintyate, yadi nīvāramayena puroḍāśena yāgaḥ kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11405: kiṃ sa eva yāgaḥ syāt, utānya iti. kiṃ prāptam? dravyāntare vibhāgaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11406: anyo yāgaḥ{*5/402*}. kutaḥ? āśritatvāt, āśrayabhedād dhi gamyate viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11407: ayam anyo nīvārāśrayo vrīhyāśrayād iti. āśrayabhedas tāvad vispaṣṭa eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11408: tadbhedād rūpam api bhinnaṃ gamyate. tasmād anyo yāgo dravyāntara iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11410: *{5/402: E1 gibt anyo yāgaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11411: api vāvyatirekād rūpaśabdāvibhāgāc ca gotvavad aikarmyaṃ syān nāmadheyaṃ ca sattvavat//6.3.12//
GSP28msbh1-7u:11412: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. aikakarmyaṃ syād dravyā[658]{*5/403*}ntare 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11413: yadā kriyā bhavati calanaṃ patanaṃ vā, tadāpi tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ, na ca kaścit tatra vyatirikto viśeṣo hīno vā, no khalv apy anyad eva rūpam, na ca śabdāntaraṃ vācakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11414: nanv āśrayabhedo vispaṣṭaḥ. ucyate, bhinnam eva vayam āśrayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11415: pratijānīmahe, na tu tadbhedād āśritasya bhedaḥ, anyatvat. na hi sraji
GSP28msbh1-7u:11416: vāsati vā bhinne tadbhedāt puruṣabhedo gamyate. so 'pi tasyātmā bhinna iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11417: cet. naitad evam, viśeṣam upalabhamānair evaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum. na cāsya viśeṣa upalabhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11418: nanv ayam eva viśeṣo yat, eko 'pi{*5/404*} vinaṣṭaḥ, eko 'pi{*5/405*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11419: vartate. na vinaṣṭa iti yad ucyate, tan na, prāg asyopalambhanāt, sattve pramāṇaṃ nāsti, tasmād vinaṣṭaḥ. na ca, pratyabhijñāyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:11420: taddravyātiriktaḥ, bhedānupalambhāt. kathaṃ tarhi calatīti pratyaya iti cet. ucyate, deśāntare saṃpratipattidarśanāt, tad deśāntaraṃ gacchad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11421: āgacchac ca calatīty ucyate, tatra gantāpi pratyakṣaḥ, deśānatram api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11422: tena gata iti cocyate, āgata iti cocyate. satyam, [659]{*5/406*} vinaṣṭād avinaṣṭo 'nyaḥ, yo 'pi tv asāvanyaḥ, so 'pi yajatiśabdavācya eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11423: yajatisāmānyaṃ na bhidyate, na ca śabdena nocyate. tasmād yo 'pi nīvārair yāgaṃ kuryāt, tenāpi coditam eva kṛtam, coditaṃ ca kurvata īpsitaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11424: bhavati, nāpūrvakṛtam. nāmadheyaṃ ca darśayati, darśa iti vā pūrṇamāsa iti vāsyaiva sāmānyasya, yathā sattveṣu sāmānyasya nāmadheyam{*5/407*}, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11425: vyaktīnām. kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ? uttareṇādhikaraṇenaitad vicāryate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11431: agnihotrādīni nityāni karmāṇy udāharaṇam. teṣu śrutadravyāpacāre bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:11432: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ, uta tadantaṃ karmotsraṣṭavyam iti. kiṃ prāptam? śiṣṭasyābhāve nāgamo 'nyasya, tadantam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11433: evotsraṣṭavyam. kutaḥ? aśiṣṭatvāt, yad vrīhiyavaguṇakaṃ śrutaṃ phalavat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11434: tan nīvāraguṇakaṃ kriyamāṇam aphalakaṃ bhavati. tasmāt tadantaṃ evotsraṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11436: kvacid vidhīyate, yadi{*5/408*} somaṃ na vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11437: yadi ca pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt, na vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11438: vidhīyate tu. tasmād yac ca na vidhīyate, na tatra pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11442: āgamo vā pratinidheyasya dravyasya. kutaḥ? codanārthāviśeṣāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11443: yajaticodanācodito hy artho na viśiṣyate vīhibhir nīvārair vā kriyamāṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11444: yāgaś cāvaśyakartavyo nityeṣv anityeṣu ca prārabdheṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11446: atha yad uktam, kvacid vidhānād iti{*5/410*}. ucyate, niyamārthaḥ kvacid vidhiḥ, somābhāve bahuṣu sadṛśeṣu prāpteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11447: pūtīkā{*5/411*} evābhiṣotavyā iti. tasmāt pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11452: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate, niyamārtham eva tad vacanam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11453: yataḥ prāptāḥ pūtīkāḥ. kathaṃ ca te prāptāḥ? taccikīrṣā hi, tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11454: sādṛśyacikīrṣety{*5/412*} etad vakṣyāmaḥ{*5/413*}. taccikīrṣayā ca prāptāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11455: pūtīkāḥ. tasmāt tan nityam, vacanam etan niyamāya nityam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11460: devatā āgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla{*5/414*} ityevamādyāḥ, agniḥ, yad āhavanīye juhvati tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti{*5/415*}. śabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11463: saṃdehaḥ, devatāgniśabdakriyāṇām apacāre pratinidhir upādeyaḥ, uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11464: kiṃ prāptam? pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyena pratinidhāyānyat, prayogaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11465: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, na devatāgniśabdakriyāṇām apacāre pratinidhinā bhavitavyam iti. kutaḥ? anyārthasaṃyogāt, pratinidhīyamānam anyad etebhyaḥ, anyac ca teṣām arthaṃ na śaknuyāt kartum. kaś ca teṣām arthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11466: devatā tāvad uddeśenārthaṃ sādhayati, agnim uddiśya, aṣṭākapālaḥ paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ ca tyajyate. yac cānyeṣu haviḥṣu vihitam, na tato darśapūrṇamāsau bhavataḥ. tatrānyoddiśyamānā na śrutāyā uddeśyāyā arthaṃ kuryāt. na hy anyasyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ darśapūrṇamāsau bhavataḥ. tasmān na devatā pratinidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11467: tathā, yad āhavanīye juhvatīty āvahanīyāpacāre nānyo 'gniḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11468: pratinidhātavyaḥ, anyad vā dravyam iti. kutaḥ? anyārthasaṃyogāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11469: pratinidhīyamānam āhavanīyakārye na vartate. katham? adṛṣṭam āhavanīyasya kāryam, āhavanīyasyopari tyajyamāne yad bhavati, na tad anyasyopari. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11470: hi, yajatiśabdena sāmarthyāt tad gṛhyate, yasyopari tyajyate, na hi, upari yajyamānasya deśaḥ kiṃcid upakarotīti. tasmān nāgneḥ{*5/419*} pratinidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11471: tathā, mantrāpacāre nānyo mantraḥ pratinidhīyate. mantrasya{*5/420*} hy etat prayojanam, yat, smārayati kriyāṃ sādhanaṃ vā, asati smaraṇe na kriyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11472: saṃvarteta, tad apacarite mantre yadi tasyārthe [662]{*5/421*} 'nyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11473: śabdam uccārayati pūrvaṃ pratīte 'rthe śabdam uccārayan, na śabdenārthaṃ pratīyāt. atha pratītam api punaḥ pratinidhiśabdoccāraṇena pratīyāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:11474: chabdāt pratītiṃ kuryāt{*5/422*}, evaṃ ca pratinidhiśabdoccāraṇānurodho
GSP28msbh1-7u:11475: 'narthakaḥ syāt. na hi, śabdena pratyāpayitavyam iti kiṃcit pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11476: yad asti, tad viśeṣeṇaivānena śabdena barhirādinety evam, tadabhāve śabdāntarānurodho 'narthakaḥ syāt. tasmān na śabdasya pratinidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11478: samidyajimantau darśapūrṇamāsau kartavyau, tāv anyasyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ na tadvantau bhavataḥ. tasmāt kriyāyāṃ na pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11490: devatāyām aparo viśeṣaḥ, yena na pratinidhīyate, devatā nāma, yad arthaṃ kiṃcic codyate, sā. anyā tasyāḥ sthāne pratinidhīyamānā na devatā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11491: coditā hi devatā bhavati, nācoditā, saṃbandhiśabdaś caiṣaḥ. yā yad arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11492: codyate, sā tasyaiva devatā, nānyasya. devateti saṃbandhiśabdo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11493: jātiśabdaḥ. tasmād api na devatāyāḥ pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11495: atha yat pratiṣiddham, ayajñiyā vai varakāḥ kodravāḥ, ayajñiyā vai māṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11496: iti. kiṃ tac chrutadravyāpacāre prati[663]{*5/425*}nidhātavyam, uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11497: kiṃ prāptam? pratinidheyam{*5/426*} iti, āgamo vā codanārthāviśeṣād{*5/427*} iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pratiṣiddhaṃ ca na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11498: pratinidhātavyam iti, aviśeṣeṇa hy etad ucyate, na yajñārhā māṣā varakāḥ kodravāś ceti, yajñasaṃbandha eṣāṃ pratiṣidhyate. naite yajñāṅgabhāvaṃ netavyā iti, pratinidhīyamānāś cāṅgabhāvaṃ nītāḥ syuḥ. tasmān naite pratinidhātavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11503: agnihotrādīni karmāṇy udāharaṇam. teṣu svāminy apacarati saṃdehaḥ, kim anyaḥ pratinidhātavyo neti. kiṃ prāptam? pratinidhātavya iti. kutaḥ? āgamo vā codanārthāviśeṣād{*5/428*} iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tathā svāminaḥ syāt. ko 'rthaḥ? na pratinidhiḥ. kutaḥ? phalasamavāyāt. yo 'rthī
GSP28msbh1-7u:11504: svatyāgenartvijaḥ parikrīṇīte, yaś ca svaṃ pradeyaṃ tyajati, sa svāmī.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11505: yadi sa pratinidhīyate, svāminā yat kartavyam, tat sarvaṃ kuryāt, tat sarvaṃ kurvan, svāmy eva syāt, na pratinidhiḥ. sa eva hi phalena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11506: saṃbadhyate. ya utsargaṃ karoti, sa phalavān bhavati. tad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11507: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktarīti{*5/429*}. tasmān na svāminaḥ pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11512: satrāṇy udāharaṇam, saptadaśāvarāḥ satram āsīrann iti. teṣu kasmiṃścit svāminy apacarati saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ tatrānyaḥ pratinidhātavyaḥ, uta neti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11513: prāptam? na svāminaḥ pratinidhir iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, bahūnāṃ yajamānānāṃ pravṛtte karmaṇi, apacarite kasmiṃścit svāminy anyam āgamayet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11514: kutaḥ? evam avaiguṇyaṃ bhavatīti, svāmigatā saptadaśādisaṃkhyā tatrāṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11515: tayā vinā karma viguṇam, tatsaṃpādanāyānya āgamayitavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11516: nanu svāmigatā saṃkhyā, na tv āgamyamānaḥ svāmīti vakṣyāmaḥ. tenāśakyaiva sā saṃkhyopādātum iti. ucyate, svāmigatā na hi bhaviṣyati. na hi sā śakyā kartum iti. idaṃ tu śakyaṃ kartum, ye svāmināṃ padārthāḥ, ta iha saptadaśāvaraiḥ kartavyā ity etad upapāditaṃ bhaviṣyati. tasmāt pratinidhātavyaṃ tatreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11518: tasminn āgamyamāna idānīṃ saṃdehaḥ, kim asau svāmī, uta karmakara iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11519: prāptam? sa svāmī syāt. kasmāt? tatsaṃyogāt, tena svāmitvena{*5/431*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11520: saṃyogaḥ. yo hy asāv ānīyate, sa svāmī kriyate, svāminy apacarite 'nyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11521: yadi svāmī kriyate, tataḥ sa pratinidhiḥ kṛto bhavati. tasmāt svāmīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11525: karmakaro vā sa syāt. kutaḥ? bhṛtatvat, bhṛto hy asau taiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ svāmibhiḥ prayuktaḥ, parikrīyamāṇo na svāmī bhavati. yaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11526: sa svāmī, yaḥ parasyopakāre vartate, sa karmakaraḥ, naivāsau phalaṃ prāpnoti. kutaḥ? yo hy ārabhya parisamāpayati, sa phalavān, eṣa hy ākhyātārthaḥ, sa hy upakramaprabhṛty apavargaparyantam āha. nanu te 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:11527: tatra viguṇaṃ kurvanti, saptadaśānāṃ svāminām abhāvāt. tasmāt te 'pi na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11528: svāminaḥ, no cet svāminaḥ, na phalaṃ prāpnuvanti. ucyate, na saptadaśāvarāḥ phalasamavāye bhaveyur iti śrūyate, na saṃkhyā phalaparigrahe guṇabhūtā. kiṃ tarhi? padārtheṣu, saptadaśāvarair yājamānāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti, te ca pratinihitena kriyante, aphalatve 'pi ca satyaṃ saṃkalpaṃ kartum anyam ānayanti. ānīyamānasya ca na tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11531: tasmiṃś ca diṣṭāṃ gatiṃ gate phalaṃ darśayati, yo dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyetāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:11532: tasya phalam iti. tasmāt karmakara iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11534: bahūnāṃ kasmiṃścid apacarite pratinidheyo 'nya ity etat [666]{*5/433*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11535: samadhigatam. idam idānīṃ tatra saṃdigdham, kim asau svāmidharmā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11536: utartvigdharmā? kiṃ prāptam? ṛtvigdharmā. kutaḥ? parārthaṃ hi sa yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11537: yaś ca parārthaṃ yajati, sa ṛtvig iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, sa taddharmā syāt, svāmidharmā{*5/434*}, tasya hi kārye śūyate, yaś ca yasya kāryam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11538: adhitiṣṭhati, sa taddharmaiḥ saṃbadhyate, yathā srugdharmaiḥ{*5/435*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11544: śrute dravye 'pacarati pratinidhim upādāya prayoktavyam iti sthitam. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11545: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yatkiṃcid dravyam upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ, uta sadṛśam iti. kiṃ prāptam? yatkiṃcid upādāyeti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, sāmānyaṃ yatra gṛhyate, tad upādātavyaṃ sadṛśam iti. kutaḥ? sarve hy ākṛtivacanāḥ śabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11546: ākṛtiś ca yady apy aṅgabhāvena śrūyate, tathāpi na sākṣāt tasyāḥ kriyāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvaḥ. yat tu kriyāsādhanaṃ dravyam arthād aṅgabhūtaṃ prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11547: tat paricchindatī kriyāyām aṅgabhāvaṃ yāti, vyakteś cākṛtyā viśeṣāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11548: paricchidyante, te viśeṣā aṅgabhūtāḥ. atha tasyām ākṛtāv apacaritāyām arthaprāptaṃ dravyaṃ grahītavyam eva, yasmiṃś ca sadṛśe gṛhyamāṇe teṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ kecit saṃgṛhītā bhavanti, sa tatra lābho labhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11549: tatsadṛśaṃ dravyam upādātavyaṃ bhavati. tasmād vrīhīṇām apacāre nīvārāḥ pratinidheyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11552: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agniṣomīyaḥ, yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*5/437*}, tatra śrūyate, khādire paśuṃ badhnāti pālāśe badhnāti rauhitake badhnātīti. tatra kadācit khadiraguṇake prayoga ārabdhe khadiro vinaṣṭaḥ, tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ vaikalpikasyopādānam uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:11553: khadirasadṛśasyeti. kiṃ prāptam? vaikalpikasyeti. kutaḥ? sa hi śrutaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11554: khadirasadṛśo na śrūyate, tasmād vaikalpikasyopādānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11555: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, vikalpe yat pravṛttam, tatsadṛśam upādeyam, yat pravṛttaṃ yasmin prayoge, tan nirdiṣṭam, tad aṅgabhūtam, vaikalpikam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11556: anaṅgam. āśritakhadire prayoge palāśarauhitakāv anaṅgabūtau, tau na śakyete yadā khadiraḥ, tadaiva kartum, aśakyaṃ cāśrutam. tasmād āśritakhadire prayoga itarau nopādeyau, anaṅgabhūtatvāt. khadirasya sadṛśam anveṣitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11560: iti cet paśyasi, khadirasadṛśam upādeyam iti, aśabdam evaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11562: naitad evam, anaṅgaṃ tasmin prayoge vaikalpikam. āśritakhadiro
GSP28msbh1-7u:11563: [668]{*5/438*} hi sa prayogaḥ, yo nirdiṣṭaḥ, tasya nirdeśād itarāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:11564: aśrutau. nanu nirdeśābhāve 'ṅgabhāvavirodhaḥ. tena śrutāv iti. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11565: yady evaṃ yadopāttasyābhāvaḥ, tadā śravaṇam. naitad evam, naimittikaṃ hi tathā pratijñāyeta, sati vacane nimitte, asati khadira itarau śrutāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11566: tatra ko doṣaḥ? sa evāpekṣito 'napekṣitaś ceti virodho bhavet, saṃskārāś ca khadire kartavyāḥ. khadirasadṛśe tadbuddhyā gṛhyamāṇe śrutabuddhyā kṛtā bhavanti, vaikalpikena tu śrutenāsaṃbaddhāḥ. tasmād upāttasadṛśo grāhya
GSP28msbh1-7u:11569: vacanāc cānyāyyam abhāve tatsāmānyena pratinidhir abhāvād
GSP28msbh1-7u:11570: idam āmananti, yadi na somaṃ vindet{*5/439*} pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11571: tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim ayam abhāve nimitte vidhiḥ, uta pratinidhiniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11572: kiṃ prāptam? abhāve vidhir iti. kutaḥ? vidhānāt, na hi pratinidhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:11573: vidhīyate, sādhyasiddhaye sādhanaṃ svayam evopādīyate, idaṃ tu vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11574: tat kalpāntarapekṣe 'rthavad bhavati. tasmān na pratinidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11575: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, pratinidhiḥ syāt. kutaḥ? vinaṣṭe hi sādhane
GSP28msbh1-7u:11576: sādhyasiddhyarthaṃ sādhanāntaram upādīyate, śrutasyābhāvāt. nanv anyāyyāḥ pūtīkāḥ, anyad dhi sadṛśāntaram astīti. tad ucyate, vacanāt. sadṛśe
GSP28msbh1-7u:11577: prāpte, bahuṣu vāsadṛśeṣu pūtīkā alpasadṛśā niyamyante. katham? tad dhi [669]{*5/440*} prakrāntaṃ karmāvaśyaṃ kartavyam, tasyām avasthāyām antareṇaiva vacanaṃ pratinidheyaṃ dravyāntaraṃ prāptam eva, prāpte vacanaṃ na vidhir iti gamyate. prāptasyānuvādo bhavitum arhati. kim artham anuvāda
GSP28msbh1-7u:11578: iti cet. ucyate, alpasādṛśyam aprāptam, tadvidhānārtham anuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11584: idaṃ vicāryate, śrute dravya upātte 'pacarite pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11585: prāptaḥ, yadā so 'pi vinaṣṭaḥ pratinihitaḥ, tadā kiṃ pratinidhisadṛśam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11586: upādeyam, utopāttasya vinaṣṭasyeti. kiṃ prāptam? pratinihite vinaṣṭe tatsadṛśam upādeyaṃ pūrveṇa nyāyena{*5/441*}. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11587: pratinidhau na syāt pratinidhir iti. kutaḥ? samatvāt, yathaivāsau pūrvaḥ pratinihitaḥ śrutacikīrṣayā, na pratinidhicikīrṣayā, evam ayam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:11588: śrutacikīrṣayā, na pratinidhicikīrṣayā. tasmān na pratinidhisadṛśam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11593: atha śrutilakṣaṇe katham? yathā, yadi somaṃ na vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:11594: iti, pūtīkeṣu vinaṣṭeṣu pūtīkasadṛśam upā[670]{*5/442*}deyam uta somasadṛśam iti. kiṃ prāptam? syāc chrutilakṣaṇe pratinidhau
GSP28msbh1-7u:11595: pratinidhisadṛśasyopādānaṃ kartavyam, somābhāve pūtīkavyaktayo vihitāḥ, sa cāyaṃ śrutaḥ somābhāvaḥ{*5/443*}. tasmāt pūtīkavyaktaya upādeyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11599: naitad evam, na hi pūtīkavyaktīnām īpsā, pūtīkeṣu yat somasādṛśyam, tan
GSP28msbh1-7u:11600: niyamyate, tathā hi pūtīkavidhānaṃ dṛṣṭārtham asadṛśavidhāne 'dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11601: kalpyeta. ato yasmiṃs tad apūtīkasadṛśe 'pi dravye bhavati tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11604: atha yatra vinaṣṭe śrute pratinidhim upādātuṃ prasthito mukhyam evopalabhate, tatra kiṃ pratinidhim evopādadīta, uta tam eva mukhyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11605: kiṃ tāvat prāptam? pratinidhim upādātavyaḥ iti, evaṃ saṃkalpitavān asau
GSP28msbh1-7u:11606: pratinidhim upādadāna eva satyasaṃkalpo bhavati. tasmāt pratinidhātavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, mukhyādhigame tam evopādadīta. abhāve hi śrutasya, anukalpaḥ pratinidhiḥ, śrute hi sakalā vyaktayaḥ, pratinidhau
GSP28msbh1-7u:11607: vikalāḥ. atha yad uktam, saṃkalpabhedadoṣa iti, śruteṣv asau śiṣṭavigarhaṇāyāṃ vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11610: athāgnihotrādiṣu karmasu śrutadravyāpacāre pratinidhāv upātte kṛteṣu keṣucit saṃskāreṣu yadi tad eva śrutam upalabhyeta, kiṃ śrutam upādīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11611: uta tenaiva pratinihitena samāpayitavyam iti. kiṃ prāptam? śrutam upādīyeta pravṛtte 'pi. tad uktam, āgamo hi tadabhāvād{*5/445*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11615: naitad evam, yena hi khadirābhāve kadare paśur niyukto bhavati, atha khadiram upalabhate, pravṛtte 'rthe kiṃ khadireṇa kuryāt? arthārthaṃ hi khadiropādānaṃ na khadiropādānārtham eva. tasmān na śrutam upādīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11617: pravṛtte paśukarmaṇi, yūpakāle 'sti mahat kadaraṃ dravyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11618: takṣaṇādisaṃskārakṣamam, asti khadiradravyam anevaṃjātīyakam. tatra kim upādeyam iti. saṃskārā na parilopsyanta iti kadara upādīyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11619: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, dravyasaṃskāravirodhe dravyaṃ praty ādriyeran, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11620: saṃskārān. kutaḥ? tadarthatvāt, saṃskārā hi dravyaṃ karmayogyaṃ kurvanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11621: tatra saṃskāraparilope dravyam api tāvad gṛhyate, dravyābhāve na dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11622: na saṃskārāḥ. dravyaṃ teṣāṃ dvāram, vacanaprāmā[672]{*5/446*}ṇyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11623: tadabhāve naṣṭadvāraṃ nāpūrvaṃ gaccheyuḥ. tasmāt khadiram upādadīrann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11626: asti yūpakāle khadiralatā paśor aprāgalbhye{*5/447*} na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11627: samarthāḥ{*5/448*}, kadaradravyaṃ tu tatsamartham. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim upādeyaṃ khadiradravyam, uta kadaradravyam iti. khadiradravyam ity āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11628: tad dhi śrutam, tadupādānaḥ śāstravihitaṃ karoti, pratinidhāv aśrutakārī syāt. tasmān na pratinidhātavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11629: arthadravyavirodhe 'rthaṃ praty ādartavyam, tadarthaṃ hi dravyopādānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11630: niyojanāt, aprāgalabhyaṃ paśor bhaviṣyatīti, na dravyam evopādīyeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11631: kadaram upādadāno dravyaśrutiṃ bādhate. arthaṃ tv anugṛhṇāti, khadiralatām upādadāna ubhayaṃ bādhate. tasmāt kadaradravyam upādeyam, dravyābhāve hi tadutpattiḥ, pratinidher utpattir{*5/449*} uktā, dravyāṇy arthaṃ prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:11636: *{5/449: E1 gibt pratinidher utpattir in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11638: santi vrīhayaḥ, yāvanto dvyavadānamātraṃ nirvartayanti, tathā santi nīvārāḥ śeṣakāryāṇām api paryāptāḥ, tatra kim upādeyam iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:11639: apy ekadeśe dvyava[673]{*5/450*}dānamātre 'pi nirvartyamāne pratinidhir upādeyaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam? śeṣakāryāṇāṃ saṃpattir bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11641: api vārthasya śakyatvād ekadeśena{*5/451*} nirvartetārthānām avibhaktatvād guṇamātram itarat
GSP28msbh1-7u:11642: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. ekadeśena vrīhīṇāṃ pradhānamātraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11643: nirvartayitavyam. kutaḥ? arthasya śakyatvāt, yo 'trārthaḥ, yena kāryaṃ tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:11644: tāvat nirvartyate, śeṣakāryāṇi yadi na śakyāni, nāṅgānurodhena pradhānasya guṇo bādhitavyaḥ. tad dhy aṅgam, yat pradhānasyopakaroti, na yad apakāre
GSP28msbh1-7u:11645: vartate. tatra ca śeṣakāryāṇi kriyamāṇāni pradhāne vrīhitvaṃ guṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11646: vihanyuḥ. vrīhitvaṃ ca pradhāne sākṣād aṅgabhūtaṃ śrūyate, vrīhibhir
GSP28msbh1-7u:11647: yajeteti. tasmān na teṣv anurodhaḥ kāryaḥ, asati hy aṅgapradhānavibhāga{*5/452*} etad evaṃ syāt, asti hy asau. tasmān na pratinidhir iti. tathā cānyārthadarśanam api bhavati, tad eva yādṛk tādṛg hotavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11655: vācuyato{*6/2*} bhavati{*6/3*} iti. tatra yadi dvyavadānamātram uddhṛtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11656: vyāpadyate, kiṃ śeṣāt punar avadeyam, neti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11657: dvyavadānanāśe, śeṣāt punar avadeyam. kutaḥ? tadarthatvāt, agnyarthaṃ hi tad dhaviḥ, agnaye yāgo nirvartayitavya iti, tadavadāne vinaṣṭe yāgaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11658: kartavya{*6/4*} evāvatiṣṭhate, prayojanaṃ ca yāgena. sa cāgneyena kriyamāṇaḥ śruta evābhinirvartito bhavatīti kim iti na kriyeta. tasmāc cheṣād avadātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11664: atha vānyad dhavir āgamayen na śeṣād avadātavyam. kutaḥ. nirdeśāt, nirdeśo hi bhavati, madhyāt pūrvārdhād avadeyam iti, dvyavadānaṃ ca homasaṃbaddham{*6/5*}, dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti. tatrānyac chiṣṭaṃ madhyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:11665: pūrvārdhasya viśeṣaṇārtham. yac ca tad dhomasaṃyuktaṃ tadvinaṣṭam, tac cheṣeṇa kriyamāṇam amadhyenāpūrvārdhena ca kṛtaṃ syāt. nanv avatte yac
