GSP28msbh1-7u:11666: chiṣṭaṃ tato madhyāt pūrvārdhāc ca grahīṣyate. ucyate, kṛtsnasya yat madhyaṃ pūrvārdhaṃ ca tac coditam, na itarasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11667: atha vā nirdeśād iti, vinaṣṭe hy anyad dravyaṃ nirdiśyate, yasya sarvāṇi havīṃṣi naśyeyur duṣyeyur vāpahareyur vā[675]{*6/6*}ājyena tā devatāḥ parisaṃkhyāya yajerann iti, haviṣo nāśa ājyaṃ prāptam. tena na śeṣād
GSP28msbh1-7u:11669: apara āha, śeṣanirdeśād iti, nirdiśyate hi tac chiṣṭam aparebhyaḥ śeṣakāryebhya iti. tan nopapadyate, na hi tāni śeṣakāryāṇi havīṃṣi prayojayanti, na cānivṛttaprayojanaṃ havir anyatra pratipādyam. tasmān nāyam arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11672: api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syād viśiṣṭakāraṇatvāt // MS_6,4.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11673: atha sviṣṭakṛd artham avattaṃ yadi vinaśyati, tatra kiṃ śeṣād avadeyam uta neti. kiṃ prāptam? punaḥ śeṣād avadeyam iti. kutaḥ? nātra kṛtsnasyottarārdhād avadīyate{*6/7*}. kasya tarhi? saṃnihitasya, sati hi prayojane saṃnihitasyāvadeyam iti, tasmād{*6/8*} avadīyamāne śrutaṃ kṛtaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11675: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, śeṣabhājāṃ syāl lopaḥ. kutaḥ? viśiṣṭakāraṇāt, viśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ tasyāvadāne, kathaṃ pratipādyeteti. pratipattiś ca viviktakaraṇenopakaroti, tasya viviktakaraṇāya pratipādyamānasya niyamo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11676: 'yaṃ sviṣṭakṛd dhomena pratipādayitavyaḥ. tathā hi sa pratipādito bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11677: sa yadi homāyoddhṛto vipadyeta, kṛte viveke na punar grahaṇaṃ prayojayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11678: pratipādyamānaś ca sviṣṭakṛd dhomena pratipādayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11679: pratipādyamānābhāvāl lopa eva sviṣṭakṛtaḥ syāt, pradhāne kṛte śiṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11687: prāśitracaturdhākaraṇaśaṃyuvākakālāḥ. teṣu saṃdehaḥ, kim anya eva teṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11688: bhakṣayitāraḥ, uta prakaraṇagatā iti{*6/11*}. kiṃ prāptam? śeṣabhakṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11689: 'nyair aprakaraṇasthaiḥ kartavyaḥ. kutaḥ? nirdeśāt, nirdiśyante{*6/12*} hy adhvaryādaya iḍābhakṣe, yajamānapañcamā iḍāṃ bhakṣayantīti. sarveṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:11690: bhakṣayitṛṣu{*6/13*} prāpteṣu parisaṃkhyānārtho nirdeśaḥ kriyate. iḍām evaite bhakṣayeyur iti, yathāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla{*6/14*} iti sarvasminn avayavini yāgāniyame prāpte dvyavadānamātraṃ śrūyate, vidhir vā na{*6/15*}, prāptatvāt, nānuvādo 'narthakatvāt, parisaṃkhyā tv arthavattāya, evam eṣāṃ parisaṃkhyeti. api ca yadi prakṛtā eva bhakṣayeyuḥ, aśvamedhe doṣaḥ syāt, bahutvād bhakṣāṇām, bhakṣayanto
GSP28msbh1-7u:11700: sarvair vā prakṛtair eva bhakṣyeta. tad dhi bhakṣaṇaṃ puruṣasaṃskārārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11701: puruṣāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ pracariṣyantīti. teṣu vinigamanāyā abhāvād yāvantaḥ prakaraṇe samavetāḥ, te sarve bhakṣayeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11703: atha yad uktam, nirdeśād{*6/16*} iti, guṇārthaḥ saḥ, anye
GSP28msbh1-7u:11704: karma[677]{*6/17*}karatvād eva prāptāḥ, tatra yajamānas teṣāṃ pañcamo vacanāt nirdiśyate. tatprāptyarthaṃ cedaṃ vacanam. tato na parisaṃkhyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11708: yat tu dvyavadānamātraṃ pradhāne nirdiśyate, tad vacanaprāmāṇyāt parisaṃkhyānārtham. na hi tatra kasyacid apūrvasya vidhiḥ, iha yajamāno vidhīyate, vidhiparisaṃkhyāsaṃśaye vidhir jyāyān. tatra svārthe śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11709: parisaṃkhyāyāṃ trayo doṣāḥ, svārthahānam, asvārthaparigrahaḥ, prāptabādhaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:11710: ceti. tasmāt prākṛtā eva bhakṣayeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11712: atha yad uktam, aśvamedhe virodhaḥ syāt, bahutvād bhakṣāṇām{*6/18*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11717: aśvamedhe na sarvaṃ bakṣayiṣyanti, arthāt sarvaṃ bhakṣayanto 'śvamedhaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:11718: samāpayeyuḥ. tatrāśvamedhaśrutiḥ pratyakṣā, sā virudhyamānā codakaprāptaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11719: sarvabhakṣaṇaṃ bādhate. prakṛtau tu na virodhaḥ. tasmāt sarvaṃ prakṛtā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11722: sto darśapūrṇamāsau, tatrāmananti, bhinne juhoti, skanne juhotīti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11723: saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ kṛtsne bhinne skanne ca [678]{*6/19*} prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11724: utaikadeśe 'pi bhinne skanne ceti. kiṃ punaḥ sarvabhinnam, kim ekadeśabhinnam iti, cūrṇīkṛtam ayogyaṃ prayojanāya, kṛtsnabhinnam{*6/20*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11725: yac chakale vigate 'pi prayojanasamartham, tad ekadeśabhinnam iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11726: prāptam. ekadeśabhinne 'pi prāyaścittam. kasmāt. arthasamavāyāt, samavetaṃ tatra bhedanam, ekadeśabhinnam api bhinnam iti, evaṃ prāpte nimitte
GSP28msbh1-7u:11730: na tv aśeṣe vaiguṇyāt tadarthaṃ hi // MS_6,4.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11731: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. nāśeṣe bhinne{*6/21*} prāyaścittaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11732: vinaṣṭasaṃskārārthaṃ hi prāyaścittam. kutaḥ. etad bhedanavatā prayojanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11733: asti, na homena, tena saṃskṛtena{*6/22*} prayogaḥ kariṣyanta iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11734: prāyaścittaṃ kriyate. na ca, tena cūrṇīkṛtena prayogaḥ śakyate kartum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11735: tasmāt prāyaścittam anarthakam. ekadeśabhinnena tu saṃskṛtena śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:11736: prayogaḥ, tasmād ekadeśabhinne prāyaścittaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11740: syād vā prāptanimittatvād ataddharmo nityasaṃyogān na hi tasya guṇārthenānityatvāt // MS_6,4.12
GSP28msbh1-7u:11741: syād vā prāyaścittam, kṛtsnabhinne 'pi. kutaḥ. prāptanimittatvāt, prāptaṃ hi nimittaṃ bhedanam, prāpte ca nimitte naimittikaṃ kartavyam. yac ca uktam, vyāpannasaṃskārārthaṃ prāyaścittam iti, nāyaṃ tasya dharmaḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11742: nityasaṃyogāt, nityavad dhomaḥ. anityaṃ hi bhedanam, na hi nityam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11743: anityasyopakartuṃ codyate. yadi nityaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor aṅgaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11744: nānityasyopakārāya. kutaḥ. kadācid anityaṃ naiva syāt, tatra kathaṃ tasyopakārakaṃ bhavet. tatra ko doṣaḥ. na śakyaṃ [679]{*6/23*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11745: nityenopakartum{*6/24*}, tena nityam upakuryād iti vacanaṃ pralāpa eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11746: atha naimittikam, na doṣo bhavati. tasmād asmatpakṣa eva. asmin pakṣe yadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11747: bhinnam, tadā homaḥ. yadā na bhinnam, tadā naiva homo vidhīyate. bhavadīye pakṣe bhavati doṣaḥ, nityānityayor nāsti saṃbandha iti. tasmāt bhinnamātre prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11750: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād vacanād{*6/25*} vyapāśrayaḥ syāt // MS_6,4.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11751: asti vacane na guṇo guṇārtho bhavitum arhati{*6/26*}, prakaraṇataḥ sarvaṃ pradhānārtham. bhinnam api homo 'pi, na ca bhinnam ādhārabhāvenopadiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11752: bhinnasyādhārabhāve hi na homāntaraṃ vidhīyeta. pradhānasyaiva hi tadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11753: bhinno guṇa iti gamyate. tatrāhavanīyasaṃyogo bādhyeta. vacanād vikalpa iti cet. na, nimittatvena saṃbhavāt, homasya ca śrutyā vihitatvāt. yadā homo vidhīyate, tadā śrutyā, yadā bhinno guṇaḥ, tadā vākyena. tasmān nādhāro bhinnaḥ. yady ucyeta, nimittapakṣe 'pi na homāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11754: prakṛtasyaiva homasya nimittaṃ vidhīyeteti. tan na, anupādīyamānaṃ hi nimittam ity ucyate. yadi hi vidhīyeta, nimittam eva tan na syāt. yadi ca yasyāpi nimittaṃ so 'py uddiśyeta, tatra dvayor uddiśyamānayoḥ saṃbandha eva na syāt. na cātra bhedanaṃ kuryād iti vidhīyate. bhedane nirvṛtte yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11758: *{6/26: E2 (v.l.): na guṇā guṇārthā bhavitum arhanti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11760: athocyate, evam upāyaṃ tatkapālaṃ saṃdhīyate. gāyatryā [680]{*6/27*} tvā śatākṣarayā saṃdadhīteti{*6/28*} tatkapālaṃ saṃdadhyām{*6/29*} iti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11765: na bhedanasya śeṣabhūtaṃ yujyate, na tat saṃdhātuṃ śakyate homena mantreṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:11768: *{6/30: E2: nāśeṣabhūtatvāt; E2 verzeichnet in der Fußnote ferner die
GSP28msbh1-7u:11771: sarvanāśe ca śrūyate, bhinnaṃ kapālam apsu pravahantīti{*6/31*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:11772: tatrānarthakaḥ saṃskāraḥ. nanu tata uddhṛtyopadhāyiṣyate. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11773: anyad upadadhātīti hy āmananti. tasān naimittikaṃ karmāṅgaṃ bhinne
GSP28msbh1-7u:11777: kṣāme tu sarvadāhe syād ekadeśasyāvarjanīyatvāt // MS_6,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11778: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate, atha yasya puroḍāśau kṣāyatas taṃ yajñaṃ varuṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11779: gṛhṇāti. yadā tad dhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta, atha tad eva havir nirvapet. yajño hi yajñasya prāyaścittir iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ sarvakṣāme prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11780: utaikadeśakṣāma iti. kiṃ prāptam. prāptanimittatvāt kṛtsne vaikadeśe vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11781: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, kṣāme tu sarvadāhe syād iti. tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, kṣāme sarvadāhe prāyaścittaṃ syāt. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11783: varjayitum. niyatam agnisaṃyoge dāhyasya sūkṣmā{*6/34*} avayavāḥ kṣīyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11784: tapteṣu ca [681]{*6/35*} kapāleṣv adhaḥ pākārthaṃ puroḍāśo 'dhiśrīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11785: upari cāṅgārā abhyuhyante, tad avarjanīyam. nimittatvenāpi śrūyamāṇaṃ nityam eva syāt. tatra yasyeti nimittaśravaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt. tasmāt sarvakṣāme prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11791: na caitad asti, sarvadāhe prāyaścittam iti, ekadeśe kṣāyati bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:11792: arhati. nimittaṃ hy upasaṃprāptaṃ{*6/36*} kṣāṇaṃ nāma. ekadeśakṣāṇam api kṣāṇam eva. yadi tatra na kriyate, śrutaṃ na kriyeta. na caitad yuktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11793: api ca darśayati, yadā tad dhaviḥ saṃtiṣtheta{*6/37*}, athaitad{*6/38*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11794: eva havir nirvaped iti, tenaiva haviṣā saṃsthānaṃ darśayati. tat sarvakṣāṇe nāvakalpate. tasmād ekadeśa eva kṣāyati prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11799: anyena vaitac chāstrād dhi kāraṇaprāptiḥ // MS_6,4.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11800: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, yad uktam, ekadeśe 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:11801: kṣāyati{*6/39*} prāyaścittam iti, kiṃ tarhi. kṛtsnakṣāma eva prāyaścittam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11802: upasaṃprāptaṃ hi nimittam, yac chāstroktaṃ puroḍāśau kṣāyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11804: tasyāvarjanīyatvāt. atha yad uktam, kṣāmeṇa haviṣā samāptir dṛśyate, yadā tad dhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti. ucyate, saṃsthāne nimitte prāyaścittam. yadāpy anyenāpi haviṣā tat saṃsthāpyate, tadāpi prāyaścittam iti na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11809: evaṃ ced ucyate, anyena haviṣā yadā saṃsthāpyata iti. naivam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11810: taddhaviḥśabdāt, taddhaviḥśabdo 'tra bhavati. yadā taddhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti. atrānyena haviṣā saṃsthāpyamāne taddhaviḥśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11812: syād anyāyatvād{*6/42*} ijyāgāmī haviḥśabdas talliṅgasaṃyogāt // MS_6,4.21
GSP28msbh1-7u:11813: syād ijyāgāmī{*6/43*} haviḥśabdaḥ. taddhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta taddhaviṣka karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:11814: saṃtiṣṭheteti{*6/44*}. nanu mukhyābhāve gauṇo gṛhyate, nānyatheti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11815: mukhyābhāva evāyam. katham. yadā saṃtiṣṭheta, tat karma tena haviṣeti vākyaṃ bhidyeta. avācakaṃ ca syāt. karmaiva hi saṃtiṣṭhate, na haviḥ, tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11816: nimittam{*6/45*}. tad dhavir ity anuvādaḥ. anuvādaś ced anyahaviṣke 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:11817: karmaṇi saṃsthite prāyaścittam iti gamyate. kathaṃ punar haviḥśabdaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11818: karmaṇi vartata iti. talliṅgasaṃyogāt, haviḥsaṃbaddhaṃ karma haviḥśabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11819: haviḥsaṃbandhād{*6/46*} avagamyate, yathā prasahyakāritayā devadattasaṃbaddhayā{*6/47*} lakṣyate siṃhaḥ. evaṃ haviṣāpi karma
GSP28msbh1-7u:11824: *{6/44: E1 hat taddhaviṣka karma santiṣṭheta in Klammern gesetzt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11829: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti śrūyate, tatra [683]{*6/48*} idam asti vacanam, yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcched aindraṃ pañcaśarāvamodanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11830: nirvaped{*6/49*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kim ubhayasminn{*6/50*} ārte pañcaśarāvo nirvaptavyaḥ, utānyatarasminn iti. kiṃ prāptam. iti cet paśyasi, evaṃjātīyaka ekasminn{*6/51*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11831: tatra brūmaḥ, ubhayor iti. kutaḥ. yathāśruti bhavitum arhati, yad yac chrūyate, tad avagamyate. ubhayoś cārtau śrūyate, śrūyamāṇaṃ ca vivakṣituṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11832: nyāyyam, itarathā yāvad eva havir iti tāvad evobhayaṃ havir iti syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11837: *{6/51: E1 (v.l.): evaṃjātīyake kasyārtyām; E2: evaṃjātīyaka ekasyārtyām}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11838: na tallakṣaṇatvād upapāto hi kāraṇam // MS_6,4.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11839: naitad evam. upapāto hy ārtisaṃbaddhaṃ dravyam, tatkāraṇam. tasya lakṣaṇaṃ havir ārtiḥ, tad vyastaṃ samastaṃ ca nimittam. na hy ubhayaśabdena śakyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11840: viśiṣṭum, viśiṣyamāṇe{*6/52*} hi vākyam bhidyeta, haviṣa ārtau pañcaśarāvaḥ. sa cobhayasya haviṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11841: āha, yadi viśeṣaṇaṃ na mṛṣyate, haviṣāpi te viśeṣaṇaṃ na prāpnoti. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11842: abhidhīyate, mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇam, aviśeṣyamāṇe 'narthakaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11843: yasyārtim ārcched ity aviśeṣe yatkiṃcid iti gamyate{*6/53*}. tatra sarvasyaiva kiṃcid ārtim ṛcchati, antataś caritaṃ nimiṣitaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11844: cintitam{*6/54*} iti. tatra yasyeti nimittavacanaṃ nityam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11845: anupapannaṃ{*6/55*} gamyate. tasmād avaśyam ārtir viśeṣṭavyā. sā ca haviṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11846: viśiṣyate, tathā haviḥ [684]{*6/56*} ārtisaṃbandhanirvṛttir animittaṃ pañcaśarāvasya. śaknoti hi śrutyā taṃ saṃbandhaṃ vaktum. havir ubhayasaṃbandhaṃ tu vākyena brūyāt, durbalaṃ ca vākyaṃ śruteḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11847: nanu havir ārtisaṃbandho 'pi vākyenaiva. ucyate, ārtinirvṛttir api tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11848: gamyate. sā ca śrutyā, havir ubhayasaṃbandhe 'tyantaṃ śrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:11849: avahīyate{*6/57*}. tasmān na tatsaṃbandho nirvartyamāno nirdiśyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11850: kathaṃ tarhy ubhayaśabdaḥ. ubhayam iti nityānuvādaḥ, ekasminn apy ārte
GSP28msbh1-7u:11851: 'parasminn api. tasmād uktaṃ yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcched iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11852: atha kasmān na padadvayaviśiṣṭārtir nimittaṃ pratīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11853: yasyobhayaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ havir ārtim ārcched iti. atrocyate, kathaṃ tāvad bhavān manyate, viśiṣṭenārthena viśiṣṭārtir nimittam iti. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11854: viśiṣṭārthasya saṃnidhānād viśiṣṭo 'rtha ārtisaṃnihitaḥ. kiṃ punaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11855: yady evaṃ bhavet. tata ubhayaviśiṣṭārtir{*6/58*} nimittam iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11856: atrocyate, idaṃ tāvad devānāṃpriyaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ. yasyāpi hi viśiṣṭārtha
GSP28msbh1-7u:11857: ārtisaṃnihito bhavati. kiṃ tasyāviśiṣṭo daṇḍaiḥ parāṇudyate. kim ato yan
GSP28msbh1-7u:11858: na parāṇudyate. etad ato bhavati, aviśiṣṭagatāpy{*6/59*} ārtir
GSP28msbh1-7u:11859: nimittaṃ{*6/60*} pañcaśarāvasya bhavati. nanūbhayaśabdo havir viśekṣyati{*6/61*}. na, haviḥśabdenāsaṃbadhyamānas tan na śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11860: viśeṣṭum. ānantaryāt saṃbhantsyate, tarhi tathāpi na samarthaḥ. na hy asau
GSP28msbh1-7u:11862: āha, viśeṣavacanatvāt tannirvartako bhaviṣyati, yathā śuklā gaurānīyatām
GSP28msbh1-7u:11863: iti. na, evam abhihite kṛṣṇām{*6/63*} ānayanti. śuklaśabda enāṃ gāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11865: ucyate, viṣama upanyāsaḥ, na tatra gavākṛtyā dravyaṃ lakṣayitvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11866: tasyānayanam ucyate, tatrāpi ced evam abhaviṣyat, naiva enāṃ [685]{*6/64*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11868: pradhānam ucyate. iha punar ārtihaviṣṭvalakṣite dravye
GSP28msbh1-7u:11869: pañcaśarāvaḥ{*6/66*}. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam. pradhānabhūta ākhyātārthe saṃhatya viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, parārthe punar viyujyeti{*6/67*}. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11870: pradhānabhūta ākṛtir guṇo vā tatsaṃbandhārtham ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11871: tatrobhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa{*6/68*} ekasmād vākyād avagamyate. tad viśiṣṭaṃ ca kṛtvā kṛtī bhavati. anyataraviśiṣṭaṃ kurvann aśrutaṃ kuryāt. yatra punar ākṛtilakṣite dravya ākhyātārthaḥ kīrtyate, tatra sarveṣv eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:11872: tajjātīyeṣūkto bhavati. na tatraikasmin nirvṛtte kṛtaṃ{*6/69*} manyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11873: aparasminn api hy ākṛtilakṣite tad uktam eva. tatroktam apratiṣiddhaṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:11874: kim iti na kriyeta. ākhyātārthe punaḥ pradhāne na tasyākṛtilakṣitena saṃbandhaḥ. tatra tadākṛtikāntare 'nupasaṃhriyamāṇe 'pi kṛtam eva pradhānam, saguṇaṃ ca pradhānaṃ bhavati. na ca kiṃcic chrutaṃ hīyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11875: tasmāt tatra viśeṣaṇaṃ yuktam, na tv iha tathā. iha hi havir ākṛtikasya dravyasyārtau pañcaśarāva ity uktam. tan na śakyaṃ viśeṣavacanena pratiṣedhāvācakena nivartayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11876: api cobhayaśabde haviṣā saṃbadhyamāne 'pi naivobhayaviśiṣṭārtiḥ pratīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11877: kiṃ kāraṇam. haviṣobhayaśabdaḥ saṃbadhyate. nārtim ārcched ity anena
GSP28msbh1-7u:11878: padena. tatra saṃnihite 'py ubhayaśabde haviḥśabdasya yāvānarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11879: tāvataivārtiḥ saṃbadhyate. aviśiṣṭaś ca tatrārthaḥ{*6/70*}. tasmān nobhayaviśiṣṭārtir nimittam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11881: tan na, vibhaktisaṃyogo hi havir viśeṣaṇam ubhayaśabdaṃ śaknuyāt kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11882: samabhivyāhārāt, nārtiviśeṣaṇam. na hy asyārtyā havir viśiṣṭasya samabhivyāhāro 'sti. [686]{*6/71*} athocyate, asaty api samabhivyāhāra
GSP28msbh1-7u:11883: ārtiśabdasaṃnidhānāt tadviśiṣṭaivārthiḥ pratyeṣyata iti. tan na, asatyāṃ hy ākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnidhānam akāraṇaṃ bhavati, yathā bhāryā rajñaḥ, puruṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11884: devadattasyeti. ekavākyagatatvāt tadviśiṣṭaṃ gamyata iti cet. naitad evam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11885: ekasminn api vākye tadavayavabhūtasyānapekṣitasya naiva bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:11886: saṃbandhaḥ, yathā, aśvena vrajati, śvetena paṭenāvṛta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11888: athocyate, ārtiviśiṣṭena haviṣobhayasya{*6/72*} saṃbandha iti. tad api nopapadyate. na hy ārtim ārcched iti havir viśeṣaṇatvenopādīyate. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11889: tarhi. pañcaśarāvasya nimittatvena, havir ārter ubhayapañcaśarāvasaṃbandhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:11891: atha havir ākṛtilakṣitena saṃbaddhaṃ ārcched iti punar havir viśiṣṭenobhayaśabdena saṃbadhyeta. tathāpi vākyaṃ bhidyeta. tasmān nobhayaviśiṣṭārtir nimittam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11892: āha, yathaivākhyātārthaprādhānya ubhayaviśiṣtocyata iti nānyataraviśiṣṭā nimittam gamyate. evam itarasminn api pakṣe ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭā sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11893: ucyate, iti yady api svena ātmanāviśiṣṭāviśiṣṭā, tathāpy anyataraviśiṣṭā bhavantī na nimittaṃ bhavitum arhatīti. ko viśeṣa{*6/73*} iti. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11895: punarlakṣaṇatvena. āha, kim ataḥ, yal lakṣaṇatvena. ucyate{*6/74*}, etad ato bhavati. havirākṛtyā lakṣyate dravyam, tasya kiṃcid vaktavyam iti. tad alakṣitam ucyamānaṃ na vijñāyeta kasya syād iti. athavā sarvasyaiva dravyasyeti gamyeta. tasminn ubhayasminn apy aviśiṣṭe{*6/75*} sati tasyāśrayaṃ lakṣayituṃ havirākṛtir ucyate. [687]{*6/76*} tatra dvayam āpatati. yad dhavirākṛtikaṃ tadārtam iti, yad vā yad dhavirākṛtikam, tad ubhayam iti. yadi tāvad yad dhavirākṛtikaṃ tadārtam ity apekṣyate. tato havirākṛtikam ubhayam anubhayaṃ vārtaṃ nimittaṃ gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11896: atha yad dhavirākṛtikaṃ tad ubhayam iti tato nārtir haviṣā viśeṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11897: haviṣāviśiṣyamāṇāyam{*6/77*} artāv ubhayaśabdo havir viśekṣyatīti, naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:11898: avakalpate. katham iti. evaṃ kila viśeṣyeta, yad dhavirākṛtikam ubhayam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11899: iti, tatra punar vaktavyam, yad dhavirākṛtikam ubhayam, tac ced ārtam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11900: kathaṃ tena viśiṣṭenārtiḥ saṃbadhyeteti, na{*6/78*} punar ubhayahaviḥśabdau cārtiviśeṣaṇārtham{*6/79*} uccāryeyātām. atha punaruccāraṇaṃ na kriyate, tathā yady api haviḥśabdas
GSP28msbh1-7u:11902: ārter lakṣaṇaṃ syāt, aviśiṣṭam ubhayasya. viśiṣṭe iṣṭe punaruccāraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11904: evam ubhayaśabdo yady ārcchatinā saṃbadhyeta, na havirviśiṣṭaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11905: tatrāviśiṣṭasya haviṣa ārtir nimittam syāt. atha haviḥśabdena saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11906: punarārtisaṃbandhārthaṃ haviḥśabdasahitam uccāryeta, tac caitad iti vā sarvanāmnā nirdiśyeta, tatra sa eva vākyabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11907: upādeyatve punar nānyonyaviśeṣaṇatvena prayojanam. dvayam apy ārtiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11908: viśeṣṭum uccāryeta. tatra nānyataraviśiṣṭārtir nimittaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11909: lakṣaṇatve tv anyataraviśiṣṭā bhavatīty eṣa viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11910: api ca, sarvasvaiva padasya padāntarasaṃbandhe sati ca, śabdād ṛte tṛtīyena padena satyāṃ gatau saṃnihitenāpi saṃbandho na yuktaḥ, na hi bhavati, bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣo devadattasyety atra rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11911: asatyāṃ tu gatāv upādeyasyānekasyāpi pradhānena saṃbandho 'vakalpate
GSP28msbh1-7u:11912: vyavahitenāpi. vyava[688]{*6/82*}dhānād artho balīyān iti, lakṣaṇatve tu lakṣaṇadvayasaṃnipāte 'vaśyaṃ heye 'nyatam asmin{*6/83*} vyavahito guṇo vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:11917: *{6/54: E1 (fn.): Einige HSS haben: cintitam nicht}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11925: *{6/63: E1,6; E2: evam abhihite na kṛṣṇām}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11943: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, havirdhāne grāvabhir abhiṣutyāhavanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ paretya sadasi bhakṣān{*6/84*} bhakṣayantīti. tatrānyena vacanenābhiṣava uktaḥ, yajatinā homaḥ. tau tāvan na vidhīyate, na ca tayoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11944: kramaḥ. arthād eva hi sa prāptaḥ. tasmād ekakartṛkaṃ homābhiṣavābhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11945: bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate. abhiṣave kṛte home ca tatkartṛbhiḥ bhakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11946: kartavyam iti. tatraiṣa saṃdehaḥ. kim ubhayaṃ yaḥ karyāt sa eva bhakṣayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11947: utānyatareṇāpi bhakṣaṇam iti. kim prāptam. homābhiṣavabhakṣaṇaṃ ca tadvat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11948: tadvad eva syāt, yadvad dhaviṣa ārtiḥ. katham. naitad evaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11949: abhiṣutya tato hutvā tato bhakṣayed iti. nānenābhiṣavasya homasya ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:11950: kramaḥ kīrtyate, abhiṣutya ye juhvati, te bhakṣayantīti. vākyaṃ hy evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11952: tasmād dhomābhiṣavayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandho nāstīty ekenāpi bhakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11953: saṃbadhyeta. apareṇāpi, abhiṣutya bhakṣayantīti{*6/85*}. tasmād anyatareṇa nimittena bhakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11957: ubhābhyāṃ vā na hi tayor dharmaśāstram // MS_6,4.25 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11958: ubhābhyāṃ vā nimittābhyāṃ bhakṣayet. na bhakṣaṇaṃ homābhiṣavayo[689]{*6/86*}r dharmo vidhīyate. kiṃ hi syād yadi tayor dharmo vidhīyeta. homābhiṣavau{*6/87*} pradhānam iti bhakṣaṇaṃ guṇaḥ pratipradhānaṃ bhidyeta. atha punar ubhābhyāṃ nimittābhyāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate. tasmin vihita eko 'rtho vihito bhavati. tenaikaṃ vākyam, tad etāvati paryavasitaṃ bhavati, abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣayantīti. tatraitad avāntaraṃ vākyam, hutvā bhakṣayantīti. na ca mahāvākye saty avāntaravākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati, padāntarasya bādhanāt, yathā, nodyantam ādityam īkṣeteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:11959: pratiṣedho gamyate mahāvākyāt, avāntaravākyād īkṣaṇavidhānam. tasmād anyataranimittaṃ bhakṣaṇam aśrutam. mahāvākyād idam avagamyate dve nimitte bhakṣaṇasyeti. bhakṣaṇaṃ cānyathā kurvañ chrutaṃ parityajet. tasmād ubhābhyāṃ bhakṣaṇam{*6/88*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11964: agnihotre śrūyate, yasyobhāv anugatāv agnī{*6/89*} abhinimlocet, yasya vābhyudiyāt punarādheyam eva tasya prāyaścittir iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kim anyatarānugamane punarādheyam, utobhayānugamana iti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11966: bhavati. evaṃ punarādheyam anyatarānugamane bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11967: vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti, yatheha yakṣye, iha sukṛtaṃ kariṣyāmīty evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:11972: *{6/91: E1 (v.l.): ity evainam eva tat samindhata}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:11974: dravye vinaṣṭe tasyaiva dravyasyotpattir atra prāyaścittam. tasya{*6/94*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:11975: dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam, kathaṃ dravyaṃ bhaved iti punarādhānaṃ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11976: tatraiṣa dharmaḥ, dvāv agnī sahotpadyete, na pṛthaktvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11977: tatrānyatarānugamane na śakyata eka evādhātum. viguṇaṃ syāt{*6/95*}. atha dvitīyam apy ādadhīta. sa yadi tāvad āhavanīyaḥ. tatrāhavanīyo 'nyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:11978: homārtho vidyata eveti na sa homāya syāt. yaś ca homārtham utpādyate sa āhavanīyaḥ, yata eṣa saṃskāraśabdaḥ{*6/96*}, saṃskāraśabdaś caikenāpi saṃskāreṇa vinā na bhavati. eṣo 'pi ca saṃskāraḥ, yad dhomārthatā, yad āhavanīye juhotīti{*6/97*} śrūyate{*6/98*}, tad ekasminn anugate, ekasminn ādhīyamāne vaiguṇyam, dvayor api hi{*6/99*} vaiguṇyam eva. tasmān naikasminn anugate punarādheyam aśakyatvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11987: pañcaśarāvas tu dravyaśruteḥ pratinidhiḥ syāt // MS_6,4.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:11988: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate, yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcched aindraṃ pañcaśarāvamodanaṃ nirvaped{*6/100*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ haviṣy ārte
GSP28msbh1-7u:11989: pañcaśarāvaḥ pratinidhiḥ, uta nimitte karmāntaram iti. kathaṃ pratinidhiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:11990: kathaṃ karmāntaram iti. yady evam abhisaṃbandho bhavati, pañcaśarāvaṃ nirvapet kuyād{*6/101*} iti, [691]{*6/102*} tataḥ sāṃnyāyasya kārye
GSP28msbh1-7u:11991: pañcaśarāvaḥ pratinidhir iti. atha na pañcaśarāvo nirvapatinā{*6/103*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:11992: kiṃ tu devatayā saṃbadhyate{*6/104*} pañcaśarāvam aindraṃ kuryād iti, tato nimitte yajatir vidhīyate. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. pañcaśarāvas tu dravyaśruteḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:11993: pratinidhiḥ syāt. pañcaśarāvaḥ sāṃnyāyyasya{*6/105*} pratinidhiḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11995: kutaḥ. evaṃ nirvāpavidhir bhaviṣyati, tatra śrutir vidhāyikā, itarathā dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe vākyaṃ syāt, tac ca{*6/107*} durbalaṃ śruteḥ. tasmāt pratinidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:11998: *{6/101: E1 setzt kuyād (kuryād?) in Klammern; E2,6: nirvapet kuryād iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12000: *{6/104: E1 (v.l.): pañcaśarāvo devatayā saṃbadhyate; pañcaśarāvo na nirvapatinā saṃbadhyate}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12004: codanā vā dravyadevatāvidhir{*6/108*} avācye hi // MS_6,4.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12006: dravyadevatam iha śrūyate, pañcaśarāvam aindraṃ kuryād iti. itarathā hy aindram iti pramādapāṭho 'vagamyeta. aindramāhendrayor vāyathārthānuvāda aindram iti syāt. avācye hi te devate, aindraśabdenendro mahendraś ca na śakyo 'nuvaditum. viśeṣaṇatve vākyabhedaḥ. nanu śrutir balīyasīty uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12007: satyam evam, kiṃ tv itarasmin pakṣe bādhyatetarāṃ śrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12011: *{6/109: E1,6,E2 (v.l.); E2: nimitte vāṅgabhūtaṃ karmānataraṃ yajatiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12014: sa eṣa naimittiko yāgaḥ, kim amāvāsyāṃ pratyāmanet, [692]{*6/110*} neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12015: kiṃ prāptam. sa pratyāmanet, sthānāt, sa eṣa yāgo 'māvāsyāṃ pratyāmnātum
GSP28msbh1-7u:12016: arhati. kutaḥ. sthānāt, yāge vinaṣṭe yāga eṣa śrūyamāṇo yadi na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12019: arhati, viguṇaṃ ca niṣprayojanam eva, vinaṣṭam āmāvāsyam iti pratyakṣam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12020: idam api kartavyam iti śābdam, yad vinaṣṭam, tan niṣphalam iti na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12021: kartavyam. idaṃ ca kartavyam iti pratyāmnāyo 'vagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12025: aṅgaṃ vaitad vidhīyate. haviṣy ārtau nimitte yāgaḥ śrūyate, tatra trayam āpatati. yad vā nimitte svatantraṃ kalpyaṃ phalam, yad vāmāvāsyāyā yat
GSP28msbh1-7u:12026: kāryaṃ tad asya, yad vā tasyāṅgam iti. svapradhānaṃ tāvan na{*6/112*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12027: kalpyatvāt phalasya. nāmāvāsyāyāḥ kārye. kiṃ kāraṇam. aśravaṇāt, naivaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12028: śrūyate, tasyāḥ kārye vartata iti, kartavyopadeśenāpi nānyatamādhyavasānaṃ triṣv eṣu pakṣeṣu, teṣu ca pakṣeṣu vivakṣiteṣu{*6/113*} kartavyopadeśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12030: nanv evam abhisaṃbandho bhaviṣyati, yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcchet sa etena yāgena sādhayet, yat sādhayitukāmaḥ. kiṃ cāsau sādhayitukāmaḥ, yad amāvāsyāyāḥ phalam iti. atrocyate, phalapadena saṃbandhābhāvāt saṃbandhasya vidhāyakaṃ vākyam. śrutyā ca yāgakartavyatā vidhīyate, sā ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmān na tatkārye vartata iti. kiṃ{*6/114*} tarhi
GSP28msbh1-7u:12031: prayojanam. tasyā amāvāsyāyā aṅgam. nanv etad api nāsti tasyā aṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12033: gṛhyate, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ phalaṃ [693]{*6/117*} sādhayet sarvair aṅgaiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12034: saha. asyāṃ cārtāv eṣa yāga itikartavyateti. tasmād evam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12035: vinaṣṭe haviṣy āmāvāsyaṃ yan na śaknoti svakāryaṃ kartum, tad anayetikartavyatayā sahitaṃ śaknotīti. tasmān nimitte karmāṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12038: *{6/113: E1,6,E2 (v.l.); E2: triṣv api pakṣeṣu vivakṣiteṣu}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12043: etad āmnāyate, sarvābhyo vā eṣa devatābhyaḥ, sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12044: ātmānam āgurate, yaḥ sarvatrāyāgurate, viśvajitātirātreṇa sarvapṛṣṭhena sarvavedasadakṣiṇena yajeta, sarvābhya eṣa devatābhyaḥ, sarvebhyaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12045: pṛṣṭhebhyaḥ, ātmānaṃ niṣkrīṇīta iti. sarvatrāgoraṇe{*6/119*} nimitte viśvajic chrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ sarvatrāgūrya yaḥ sarvatraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12046: prayuṅkte, tasya viśvajit, uta yo na prayuṅkte tasyeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12047: yaś ca prayuṅkte, yaś ca nety aviśeṣāt. athavā prayuñjānasya{*6/120*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12048: kutaḥ. nimitte karmāṅgam evaṃjātīyakam ity uktam. tad aprayujyamānasya katham aṅgaṃ syād
GSP28msbh1-7u:12049: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, viśvajit tv apravṛtte bhavet, sarvasya kriyāyā abhāve
GSP28msbh1-7u:12050: viśvajit. kiṃ kāraṇam. evaṃ hi śrūyate, yaḥ satrāyāgurate, sa viśvajitātirātreṇa yajeteti. yaḥ satraṃ kariṣyāmīty evam āgurate, sa viśvajitā yāgena sādhayed iti. yad artham asau satraṃ kartum icchati, tad artham iti gamyate. katham. ya āgurate, sa tena yajeta, yāgena nirvartayed iti vākyārtho gamyate, na yāgaṃ nirvartayed iti. kutaḥ. yāgasya guṇatvena śravaṇāt. kathaṃ tasya guṇatvam. [694]{*6/121*} tṛtīyānirdeśāt, prādhānye hi phalaṃ kalpyeta. itarasmiṃs tu pakṣe pratyakṣād vākyāt phalāvagamaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12056: evaṃ tatra śrūyate, sarvābhyo vā eṣa devatābhyaḥ, sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhya yad{*6/122*} ātmānaṃ niṣkrīṇīta iti. niṣkrayadvāreṇa ca saṃstavaḥ pravṛtte na yujyate. tasmād apravṛtte viśvajid iti. atha kasmān naivam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12057: abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate. āgūrya satrāya viśvajitā yajeteti. viśvajitaḥ satrasya ca saṃbandho vijñāyeta{*6/123*}, āgoraṇavelāyām{*6/124*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12059: vyavahitakalpanā syāt. śrutiś ca puruṣeṇa viśvajitaṃ saṃbandhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12060: viśvajitā yajeta puruṣa iti, na satreṇa. satrasya viśvajid yāga iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12061: āgūryeti ca. evaṃ śravaṇam arthavad bhavati. satrāṅgatve tv arthaprāptaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12062: na vaktavyam. na ca, āgūrya yajetety āgoraṇānantaryaṃ{*6/126*} śakyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12063: vidhātum. aśabdārtho hi tadāśrīyeta, samānakartṛkatā hi śabdavatī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12064: pūrvakālabhāvasya cārthaprāptatvān na vaktavyatā. tasmād āgūryety atraiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:12065: viśvajitaḥ saṃbandhaḥ{*6/127*}. sa cet, āgūrya{*6/128*} na satreṇa yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12076: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate, barhiṣā vai paurṇamāse vratam upayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12078: vatsasādhanakaṃ vrataṃ vidhīyate, uta vratasya kāla iti. atha vatso vratāṅgam iti. kiṃ prāptam. vatsasādhanakaṃ vrataṃ vidhīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12079: amānāsyāyāṃ vatsair vrataṃ kuryād iti, vatsavratasaṃyogo 'pūrvaḥ. sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:12080: vidhīyate, tasmiṃś ca vidhīyamāna ubhayam api vihitaṃ bhavati, vatso vrataṃ ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12084: yathoktasya vacanāntareṇa prāptasya{*6/131*} kālo 'yaṃ vidhīyate. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12086: amāṣamamāṃsaṃ bahusarpiṣkaṃ vrataṃ vratayantīti vihitaṃ pūrvaṃ vratam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12087: aprajñātaś ca kālaḥ. tasmāt kālavidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12089: *{6/131: E1 setzt vacanāntareṇa prāptasya in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12091: na ca śakyo{*6/132*} 'trārthaḥ parimātum, vatsena vratam upayantīti kiṃ vatso 'tra vratayitavya evaṃ vatsena vratam upagataṃ bhavati{*6/133*}, kiṃ vatsena hastasthānīyena vratayitavyam ity evaṃ tad upetaṃ bhavati{*6/134*}, uta vatsaṃ saṃnidhāya tad upeyād{*6/135*} iti. naiva vyavatiṣṭhate śāstrārthaḥ. karaṇaṃ hy etan nirdiṣṭam, netikartavyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12092: etāvad uktam, vatsasādhanaṃ vrataṃ kuryāt. katham ity etad aviśeṣākāṅkṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12093: evāvatiṣṭheta. naivārthaḥ paricchidyate, vrate kiṃ vatsena kriyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12094: athavā yad vā tad veti. tathā vatso vratena saṃbadhyamāna iṣṭaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12095: aparārthatām āpadyeta, parārthatāṃ cāsya dyotayati vibhaktis tṛtīyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12096: sādhakatame hi sā bhavati. tasmād api kālārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12098: *{6/132: E2 (v.l.): na ca satyam etat, śakyo}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12099: *{6/133: E1 hat evaṃ vatsena vratam upagataṃ bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12100: *{6/134: E1 hat evaṃ tad upetaṃ bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12101: *{6/135: E1,6; E2: saṃniḥdhāyān yad etam upeyād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12102: vatsas tu śrutisaṃyogāt tadaṅgaṃ syāt // MS_6,4.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12103: yad uktam, vihitatvād vratasyānuvāda iti, satyam etat{*6/136*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12104: [696]{*6/137*} yad{*6/138*} uktam, kālavidhānārtha iti. tan na, vatsas tadaṅgatvena vidhīyate. kutaḥ. śrutisaṃyogāt, vatse 'ṅge vidhīyamāne śrutir nimittam, kāle lakṣaṇaśabdaḥ{*6/139*} syāt. śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā. tasmād aṅgaṃ vatsya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12110: kālas tv eṣa nirdiśyate, na vatso 'ṅgaṃ vidhīyate. naiṣa codanā, barhiṣā vai paurṇamāse vratam upayanti. vatsenāmāvāsyāyām{*6/140*} iti. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:12111: avagamyate. vidhinaikavākyatvāt, parastāc ca vidhiḥ samāmnāyate, purā vatsānām upākartor daṃpatī aśrīyatām{*6/141*} iti. yady eṣo 'pi vidhiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12112: syāt, vākyam bhidyeta. anuvādaś ca tathābhūtasyārthasya bhavati. na ca vatsāṅgatā aprāptā{*6/142*}, aprāptas{*6/143*} tu kālaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12119: na ca śakyo vatso 'tra vratayitum, karmasaṃyoge vatsena nārthaḥ śakyate kaścit kartum. tasmād api na vatso 'ṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12121: na caitad ucyate, viśvasya{*6/144*} śrapitaṃ vatsaṃ vratayiṣyata iti. na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12122: ca, asyārthasya svaśabdaḥ śrūyate. vatsa ity ākṛtiśabdo māṃse na vartate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12127: kālārthaḥ saṃyoga ity etat samadhigatam, idānīṃ saṃdehaḥ. [697]{*6/145*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12128: kiṃ saṃnayatpakṣa eva kālaḥ, utāsaṃnayato 'pīti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12129: saṃnayatpakṣe. kutaḥ. evaṃ śrūyate, purā vatsānām apākartor iti. na cāsaṃnayato vatsāpākaraṇam asti. tasmāt saṃnayatpakṣa eṣa kālaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12133: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati, na saṃnayatpakṣa eva, asaṃnayato 'py eṣa kālaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. kālārthatvāt, na vatsāpākaraṇena vrate kiṃcit prayojanam asti. kālena tu prayojanam, yena ca tatra prayojanam, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:12134: lakṣyate. kathaṃ punar vatsāpākaraṇaṃ kālārtham iti, parārthatvāt. payase hi te 'pākriyante, tathā hi dṛṣṭārthatā bhavati, itarathādṛṣṭārthatā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12135: tasmān nopādeyatvena vatsāpākaraṇaṃ śrūyata iti. yat tūktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12136: talliṅgasaṃyogāt saṃnayatpakṣa eveti. tan na, asaṃnayato 'pi kālāhānāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12137: yasyāpi na sāṃnāyyam, tasyāpi vatsāpākaraṇam eva na syāt, na tu vatsāpākaraṇakālo 'pi, kālena ca naḥ prayojanam, na vatsāpākaraṇena. yathā śaṅkhavelāyām āgantavyam iti. yasminn api grāme śaṅkho nādhmāyate tasminn
GSP28msbh1-7u:12138: api sa tathākālo{*6/147*} 'stīti, nāgamanaṃ parihāsyate. evam ihāpy asaty
GSP28msbh1-7u:12139: api vatsāpākaraṇe tatkāle bhidyamāne vratam, tasmin kāle na parihāsyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:12145: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeteti. tatra śrūyate, saha śākhayā prastaraṃ praharatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ śākhā [698]{*6/148*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12146: prastarasyāṅgabhūtā, aṅgaprayojanasaṃbandhas tayoḥ. atha kālārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ, prastarapraharaṇakāle śākhā prahartavyeti. kiṃ prāptam. prastare śākhā śrayaṇavat. prastarasyāṅgabhūtā śākhā. kutaḥ. saha śākhayā prastaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12147: praharatīti. sahayukte 'pradhāne tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati. sā ca śākhāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12148: tṛtīyā. tasmāt prastarasya śākhā guṇabhūtā, prastare ca dvitīyā, sahayoge ca tṛtīyā{*6/149*}, tṛtīyā guṇataḥ, dvitīyā pradhānataḥ. nanu na śākhayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12149: prastarasya kaścid upakāraḥ kriyate. satyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kriyate, kiṃ tv adṛṣṭaṃ kriyate, śrayaṇavat, yathā payasā maitrāvaruṇaṃ śrīṇātīti dvitīyātṛtīyāsaṃyogād adṛṣṭaś copakāro gamyate. evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12153: kālavidhir vā syāt. kutaḥ. ubhayor vidyamānatvāt. prastaras tāvat srugdhāraṇārthaḥ prāpto vidyate, tasya praharaṇam api viśiṣṭe kāle vākyāntareṇa vihitam. tataḥ śākhāyāḥ pratipādanārtham, tasyaitat
GSP28msbh1-7u:12154: punarvacanam. ucyate, bhavatu prastarasya punarvacanam, śākhā tv atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:12155: vidhīyata iti. ucyate, ubhayor api vidyamānatvāt, śākhā pūrvaṃ{*6/150*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12156: vihitā vatsāpākaraṇārthā, idānīṃ punaḥ kiṃ guṇabhūtā codyate, uta pratipādyata iti. pratipādyamānāyāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam, deśaviyogāt pracaritum avakāśaḥ syād yā yāvatī ca mātrā, deśāntarasaṃyogasya na dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12157: kiṃcid asti. tasmāt praharaṇaṃ pratipattis tasyāḥ, tasmāt parataḥ prayojanābhāvāt kālaniyamaḥ{*6/151*} kriyate{*6/152*}. nanu tṛtīyā 'pradhāno bhavati, sā ca śākhāyām. atrocyate, yāsau [699]{*6/153*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12158: śākhāyāṃ tṛtīyā, sā dvitīyārthe. yā ca prastare dvitīyā, sā tṛtīyārthe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12159: katham avagamyate. sahayoge ekasmin{*6/154*} kāla ubhayam api prahartavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12160: iti. atra yasya nirjñātaḥ kālaḥ, tasyānuvādaḥ, yasya tv anirjñātaḥ, tasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12161: vidhiḥ. śākhāyāś cānirjñātaḥ, prastarasya nirjñātaḥ, tasya punaruccāraṇam anirjñātārtham, tad apradhānam. itarasyoccāraṇaṃ pradhānam, prādhānyaṃ ca dvitīyārthaḥ, tatra tṛtīyā. pārārthyam api tṛtīyārthaḥ, tatra dvitīyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12169: na ca, śākhayā prastarasyopakāro dṛṣṭaḥ kriyate. kāṣṭaṃ dahyamānasya tṛṇasya nopakāre vartate. tṛṇaṃ tu kāṣṭhasyopakuryāt. tasmān na śākhā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12172: kiṃ bhavati prayojanam, yadi prastarasya guṇabhūtā, tathāpi prastaraprahārakāle śākhā pratipādyata{*6/155*} iti. ucyate, yadi prastarasya prahriyamāṇasyāṅgabhūtā śākhā, tato vinā{*6/156*} prastareṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12173: na prahartavyā bhavati. athāṅgabhūtā vināpi prastareṇa prahartavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12174: asmābhir uktaṃ prastarakāle prahartavyeti, tasmāc ca viprayoge syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12175: tasmād eva kāraṇāt prastaraviprayoge 'pi śākhāyāḥ praharaṇaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12180: yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ, tathā sati, sāṃnyāyye saty asati ca śākhā [700]{*6/157*} vidyata ity upaveṣo sati cāsati{*6/158*} ca syāt. yathā tu siddhāntaḥ, tathā sāṃnyāyyapakṣe śākhā satī hi pratipādyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12184: abhyudaye kālāparādhād ijyācodanā syāt yathā pañcaśarāve // MS_6,5.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12185: idam āmananti, vi vā enaṃ prajayā paśubhir ardhayati, vardhayaty asya bhrātṛvyam, yasya havir niruptaṃ purastāc candramā abhyudeti{*6/160*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12186: tredhā{*6/161*} taṇḍulān vibhajet, ye madhyamāḥ syuḥ, tān agnaye dātre
GSP28msbh1-7u:12187: puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet, ye sthaviṣṭhās tān indrāya pradātre dadhaṃś carum, ye kṣodiṣṭāḥ, tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum{*6/162*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12188: iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ kālāparādhe yāgāntaram idaṃ codyate, uta teṣv eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:12190: kiṃ prāptam. abhyudaye, yaḥ kālāparādhaḥ, tatrejyācodanā syāt. katham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12191: puroḍāśam agnaye dātre madhyamān kurvate{*6/163*}, ye sthaviṣṭhās tān
GSP28msbh1-7u:12192: indrāya pradātre dadhani caruṃ kuryāt, kṣodiṣṭhān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12194: gamyate. yathā pañcaśarāve dravyadevatāsaṃbandhena karmāntaraṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12195: yathā paśukāmeṣṭyām, yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syāt, so 'māvāsyāyām iṣṭvā vatsān apākuryāt, ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ, tān agnaye sanimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet, ye
GSP28msbh1-7u:12196: madhyamāḥ, tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāḥ, tān indrāya pradātre dadhaṃś carum iti. evam ihāpīti. api ca na prakṛte dravye devatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12197: [702]{*6/167*} śrūyte, śṛte carum iti hi tatra bhavati vacanam. na cābhyudayakāle śrapaṇaṃ kṛtam asti, tasmāt karmāntaram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12203: *{6/164: E1,6; E2: śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum iti. yajatis}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12207: devatāpanayo vā. kutaḥ. vidyamānatvāt, vidyante hi karmāṇi prakṛtāni, teṣu vidyamāneṣu punar devatāsaṃbandho haviṣo nopapadyate. yasyānupapattyā yāgaḥ kalpyeta. tasmān na yāgāntaram, teṣv eva haviḥṣu devatāntarāṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:12210: devatāpanayasarūpāś cāmī śabdā bhavanti, ye madhyamāḥ, teṣāṃ devatāntaraṃ vidhīyate. tatra dravyaṃ prāptam, aprāptā devatā vidhīyate. kathaṃ punar devatāvidhānārthe nānekaguṇvidhānadoṣo jāyeteti. ucyate, naivātrāneko guṇo vidhīyate kasmiṃścid vākye. taṇḍulān{*6/168*} vibhajed ity atra tāvad vibhāgamātraṃ vidhīyate. anyat sarvam anūdyate, tasmād adoṣaḥ. ye
GSP28msbh1-7u:12211: madhyamāḥ, teṣām agnir devatā vidhīyate, anyat puroḍāśādy anūdyate. ye
GSP28msbh1-7u:12212: sthaviṣṭhāḥ, teṣāṃ dadhisahitānām indro devatāsmin vākye vidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12213: tatrārthaprāpte{*6/169*} śrapaṇe sati carutā, saha saptamyarthenārthaprāptenaivāsmin vākye 'nūdyate. ye kṣodiṣṭhāḥ, teṣāṃ śṛtasahitānāṃ viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭo devatā vidhīyate, anyat sarvam anūdyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12219: ātañcanābhyāsaṃ ca darśayati. katham. evaṃ śrūyate, yadi [703]{*6/170*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12220: bibhīyād abhimodeṣyatīti mahārātre havīṃṣi nirvapet. phalīkṛtais taṇḍulair upāsīta, ardhaṃ dadhi havir ātañcanārthaṃ nidadhyāt, ardhaṃ na. yady abhyudiyād anenātacya{*6/171*} pracaret, yady u na{*6/172*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12221: brāhmaṇaṃ{*6/173*} bhojayed iti. yadi karmāntaram, upādeyatvena tadā taṇḍulā dadhi śṛtaṃ ca. tasmāl laukikāny upādeyāni, na hy eṣa tadā prakṛtānāṃ vyāpāraḥ, tatrāvinaṣṭe dadhani, aparedyur āmāvāsye kriyamāṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:12222: vidyate dadhīti nātañcanam āvarteta. tasyām evābhyuditeṣṭau dadhi vidyata iti nātañcanaṃ syāt. atha nimitte devatāpanayaḥ, tatas tasmin dadhani
GSP28msbh1-7u:12223: caruḥ kṛta iti, punar āmāvāsye dohe ātañcanena kāryam, evam ātañcanābhyāsasya darśanaṃ devatāvidhāne yujyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12229: atha yad uktam, yathā paśukāmeṣṭyāṃ karmāntaram, yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syāt, so
GSP28msbh1-7u:12230: 'māvāsyām iṣṭvā vatsān apākuryād iti. tat parihartavyam. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12231: yuktaṃ yat tatra karmāntaravidhānam. kutaḥ. apūrvatvāt, na tatra kaścit
GSP28msbh1-7u:12232: pūrvaprāpto yāgo vidyate, so 'māvāsyām iṣṭveti hi parisamāpte tasminn idam ārabhyate. tatra dravyadevatāsaṃyukto nirvapatiśabdo nāntareṇotsargam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12233: dravyadevatayoḥ saṃbandho vidyata{*6/174*} iti yajatiṃ gamayati. na tv ihaivam, iha hi yāgaḥ prakṛto gamyate, tasminn eva vidyamānasya dravyasya devatāsaṃbandhamātraṃ vidhīyata iti na doṣo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12237: atha yad upavarṇitam, yathā pañcaśarāve karmāntaraṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12238: [704]{*6/175*} evam ihāpīti, tat parihartavyam iti. atrocyate, yuktaṃ pañcaśarāve karmāntaram. duṣṭaṃ hi tatra dravyam, yasya devatā vidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12239: tatrāvaśyaṃ dravyam upādeyatvena codayitavyam, tasminn upādīyamāne devatāntare cāpūrvaḥ saṃbandho vidhīyate, tad yāgāntaraṃ bhavatīti. itarad iha dravyam aduṣṭam, tad anūdya, prakṛte yāge devatā vidhīyata ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12243: evaṃ cet paśyasi, sāṃnyāyye 'pi doṣaḥ. tad api hy abhyudaye tatkālāpabhraṃśād duṣṭam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12244: na tasyāduṣṭatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_6,5.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12245: naitad evam, pañcaśarāve hi duṣṭaṃ dravyam, iha tādṛśam evāvatiṣthate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12246: nanu kālāpabhraṃśena duṣṭam. na duṣyati, aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam. abhyudaye prāyaścittavidhānaṃ duṣṭe 'py upapadyate, kālāparādhe 'duṣṭe{*6/176*} 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:12247: tat. akāle hy abhipravṛttasya śakyate devatāvidhānam, na tu vinaṣṭasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12251: atha yad uktam, na prakṛte dravye devatā śrūyate, śṛte carum iti tatra bhavati vacanam, na cābhyudayakāle śrapaṇaṃ kṛtam astīti, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:12257: tasminn evābhyudaye saṃśayaḥ. kim upāṃśuyāge 'pi devatāpanayo bhaven neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12258: kiṃ prāptam. upāṃśuyājo yathāprakṛti syāt. kasmāt. avacanāt, yathāmīṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:12259: vacanam, madhyamānām agnaye dātre puroḍāśāḥ{*6/179*} sthaviṣṭhānām indrāya pradātre dadhani caruḥ, kṣodiṣṭhānāṃ viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caru iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12260: naitad upāṃśuyāje 'sti. tasmāt sa yathādevataṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12264: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. upāṃśuyājasyāpanayaḥ. kena kāraṇena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12265: pravṛttyā, akāle tantrapravṛttir devatāpanayasya kāraṇam. kutḥ. na hy atrābhyudaye sati taṇḍulā vibhāgārtham upādīyante. kiṃ tarhi. abhyuditasya haviṣo vibhāga ucyate, abhyudayenāparāhnasyeti{*6/180*}. katham
GSP28msbh1-7u:12266: avagamyate. yasyābhyudiyād ityaviśeṣaśravaṇāt, sarvasyaiva hy aparādhenābhyudeti, aparādhaś cākāle tantrapravṛttiḥ. evaṃ ca sati na tad dhavis taṇḍulaiḥ śakyaṃ viśeṣṭum. tasmād upāṃśuyāgasyāpi{*6/181*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12267: vibhāgaḥ. tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed iti hy anena vākyena devatāpanayaḥ kriyate, vidhir hy atra vibhajed iti. vibhāgaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ{*6/182*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12268: katham iti. vibhāge viśeṣaparāṇy uttarāṇi vākyāni. idam idaṃ ca dravyam asyai devatāyai, idam idaṃ cāsyā iti. yasya dravyasya viśeṣavibhāgo nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12269: tasyāpi vibhajed iti sāmānyavibhāgaḥ. tasmād yathaivetareṣāṃ vibhāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12270: evam upāṃśuyājasyāpīti. athavā, upāṃśuyājadravyāt [706]{*6/183*} pūrveṇa vākyenāpanītā devatā. na tad apareṇa vākyena devatāntare{*6/184*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12275: *{6/182: E1 hat vibhāgaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12278: asminn evodāharaṇe saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ yadi nirupte 'bhyudayo 'vagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12280: 'bhyuditeṣṭiḥ syāt. kutaḥ. tatsaṃyogāt, nirvāpasaṃyogo hi bhavati, yasya havir niruptam iti. tasmād anirupte naitad vidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12282: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. akāle tantrapravṛttimātre syād etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:12283: vidhānam. prāptaṃ hi tāvaty eva nimittam, yasya havir abhyudetīti havir grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇatvena. yasya havir abhyudetīti havir lakṣita udayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12284: nimittam, pravṛttaṃ havir lakṣayati, nodāsīnam. tasmāt, havir abhyudetīty ucyamāne pravṛttaṃ havir abhyudetīti gamyate. na hi tan niruptam ity etena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12285: śakyaṃ viśeṣayitum. bhidyeta hi tadā vākyam. yasya havir niruptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12286: nāniruptam{*6/185*} ity evam apekṣyaṃāṇe havir abhyudetīti na śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:12292: atha yad uktam, niruptasaṃyogo bhavati, yasya havir niruptam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12293: lakṣaṇamātram etan niruptam iti. kasmiṃścit padārthe tasya pravṛtta ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12295: anyārtho 'pi caitam arthaṃ darśayati, sa yady agṛhītaṃ havir abhyudiyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12296: prajñātam eva. tadaiṣā vratacaryā, yat pūrvedyur dugdhaṃ dadhi havir ātañcanaṃ tat kurvanti, pratimuñcanti vatsān, tān eva tat punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:12297: apākurvanti, tān aparāhṇe parṇaśākhayāpākaroti. tad yathaivādeḥ prajñātam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12298: āmāvāsyaṃ havir evam eva tad yady u vratacaryāṃ vā nodāśaṃseta, gṛhītaṃ vā havir abhyudiyād itarathā tarhi kuryāt, etān eva taṇḍulān
GSP28msbh1-7u:12299: sakṛtphalīkṛtān{*6/187*} iti, agṛhīte haviṣy anyaṃ vidhiṃ bruvan gṛhīte
GSP28msbh1-7u:12303: anirupte 'bhyudite prākṛtībhyo nirvaped ity āśmarathyas taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayāt // MS_6,5.16
GSP28msbh1-7u:12304: pravṛttamātraṃ nimittam iti sthitam. naimittikas tu devatāpanayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12305: devatāntarasaṃyogaś ca, kiṃ nirvāpottarakālaṃ taṇḍulāvasthe haviṣi kartavyo nirvāpas tu prākṛtībhya eva syāt, jñāte 'bhyudaye, uta vaikṛtībhya eveti saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. [708]{*6/188*} anirupte
GSP28msbh1-7u:12306: 'bhyudite prākṛtībhyo nirvaped ity āśmarathya ācāryo manyate sma. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12307: taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayāt. taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayaḥ śrūyate, yasya havir niruptaṃ purastāc candramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed ity abhyudayāvagamād anantaraṃ taṇḍulavibhāgam āha. so 'taṇḍulabhūteṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:12308: nāvakalpate. tasmād anirupte taṇḍulābhāvād anapanītā devatāḥ prākṛtya iti prākṛtībhya eva nirvaped iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12310: vyūrdhvabhāgbhyas tv ālekhanas tatkāritvād devatāpanayasya // MS_6,5.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12311: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. vyūrdhvaṃ yā bhajante karma, tābhyo nirvaped ity ālekhana ācāryo manyate sma. kutaḥ. tatkāritvād devatāpanayasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12312: yasmād akāle tantrapravṛttikārito devatāpanayaḥ, tasmād apanītā devateti
GSP28msbh1-7u:12314: vinirupte na muṣṭīnām apanayas tadguṇatvāt // MS_6,5.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12315: atha prārabdhe caturmuṣṭirnirvāpe 'parisamāpte bhavati saṃśayaḥ, yan niruptaṃ tan niruptam eva, avaśiṣṭaṃ kiṃ prākṛtībhyo nirvaptavyam, kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12316: vaikṛtībhyaḥ, uta tūṣṇīm eveti. kiṃ prāptam. vinirupte sāminirupta ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:12317: arthaḥ{*6/189*}. na tatra devatāpanayaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. tadguṇatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12318: nirvāpasya guṇo devatā, na muṣṭīnām, [709]{*6/190*} sa ca nirvāpas tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:12319: devatākaḥ. kutaḥ. catuḥsaṃkhyāpūraṇārthatvād abhyāsamātraṃ kartavyam. tac cābhyāsamātraṃ punaḥ kriyate, pūrvam eva kṛte tasmin nirvāpe na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12320: devatāpanītā. sa evāyaṃ punaḥ kriyate, punar api kriyamānasyānapanītaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:12321: devatā bhavitum arhatīti prākṛtībhya eva nirvaptavyam. na cottaro muṣṭiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12322: pṛthak padārthaḥ, yena devatāpanayo bhavet. kṛtasya nirvāpasya saṃkhyāpūraṇam etat kriyate. tasmād anapanaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12324: *{6/189: E1 hat sāminirupta ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12326: na prākṛtībhyo nirvaptavyam. kābhyas tarhi. vaikṛtībhyaḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12327: aprākṛtena devatāviśeṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate, nādhikṛtena, tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed iti prākṛtībhya ācchidya vaikṛtībhyo nirvaptavyo vidhīyate, tā idānīṃ tatsthānīyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12328: tasmād vinirupte nivṛttā devatā anyāḥ, anyāś copajātāḥ. tasmād vaikṛtīnāṃ saṃyogena nirvāpaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12330: abhāvād itarasyārdhasya devatāsaṃyuktasya, na nirvāpo bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:12332: anyasyai devatāyai, naiva nirvāpa itaradevatāko vetaradevatāko
GSP28msbh1-7u:12333: vā{*6/192*}. tasmāt tūṣṇīm eva nirvaptavyam, avaśyam anyataratra saṃkalpabhedo bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12336: *{6/192: E1,6; E2: itaradevatākaḥ prākṛta itaradevatāko vā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12338: abhyuhiteṣṭir{*6/194*} evodāharaṇam. tatra śrūyate, dadhani caruṃ, śṛte carum iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ saṃnayato bhavaty abhyudaye prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12339: utāviśeṣeṇeti. kiṃ prāptam. saṃnayato 'bhyudaye prāyaścittam. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12340: sāṃnāyyasaṃyogāt, saṃnyāyyasaṃyogo hi bhavati, śṛte carum, dadhani carum iti, śṛtādyabhāvāt, nāsaṃnayato bhavitum arhati, vaiguṇyaṃ hi tathā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12344: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. ubhayor api syāt, na kevalasya saṃnayataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12345: auṣadhasaṃyogāt{*6/195*}, ye madhyamā ye sthaviṣṭhā ye kṣodiṣṭhā iti bhavaty auṣadhasaṃyogaḥ, sa ca śakyo 'saṃnayatāpīti. tasmān nāsati kāraṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:12346: 'saṃnayato nivarteta. ubhayor{*6/196*} api pakṣayoḥ prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12351: iti yad uktam, asaṃnayato dadhnaḥ śṛtasya cābhāvāt tadadhikaraṇatā nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12352: tasmād vaiguṇyaṃ tasmin pakṣa iti, tat parihartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12353: naitad evam. na hi dadhyadhikaraṇa caroḥ śrapaṇe śrūyate. kiṃ tu yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12354: sthaviṣṭhā indrāya pradātre, evaṃ dadhy api devatāsaṃbandhārthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12355: [711]{*6/197*} vidhīyate, na carusaṃbandhārtham iti. bhidyeta hi tathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12356: vākyam, sthaviṣṭhā devatāyai, dadhani ca te kartavyā iti. saptamīsaṃyogas tu prāpte 'rthe 'nuvādaḥ. tasmād avivakṣitaṃ teṣāṃ sāhityam, lakṣaṇatvena hi te śrūyanta iti, na hi payo dadhi ca nāstīti sthaviṣṭhānāṃ na devatāpanayo bhavati. asaṃnayato 'py arthād apsu śrapayiṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12359: idam āmananti, yadi satrāya dīkṣitā atha{*6/198*} sāmyut tiṣṭheran, somam apabhajya viśvajitā atirātreṇa sarvastomena sarvapṛṣṭhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12360: sarvavedasadakṣiṇena yajerann iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ krītarājakasyotthāne viśvajit, uta pravṛttamātrasyeti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12361: sāmyutthāne viśvajit krīte syāt. kutaḥ. vibhāgasaṃyogāt, somam apabhajya viśvajitā yajerann iti. ye hy akrīte rājany uttiṣṭanti, teṣāṃ somavibhāgābhāvād vaiguṇyaṃ syāt. tasmāt krītarājakā uttiṣṭhanto
GSP28msbh1-7u:12364: *{6/198: E2: dīkṣitānāṃ; E2 (v.l.), E1,6: dīkṣitā atha}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12366: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. pravṛttamātrasyotthāne syāt. kutaḥ. prāpaṇān
GSP28msbh1-7u:12367: nimittasya, sāmyutthānaṃ nimittaṃ viśvajitaḥ, [712]{*6/199*} tac ca prāptam, na ca tac chakyaṃ viśeṣayitum, krīte some{*6/200*} sāmyutthānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12372: atha yad uktam, akrīte rājany uttiṣṭhanto vibhāgābhāvād viguṇaṃ kuryur
GSP28msbh1-7u:12373: iti. tat pratihartavyam. atrocayate, na vibhāgo vidhīyate. bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. sāmyutthāne viśvajitā yajeran, somasya tv apabhāgaṃ{*6/201*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12374: kṛtveti. tenāpabhajyety anuvādaḥ. katham prāptir iti cet. arthād uttiṣṭhatāṃ vibhāgo bhavati dhanasya. so 'yaṃ sarvadravyāṇāṃ vibhāgaḥ somavibhāgena lakṣyate, somaṃ vibhajyānyāni ca dravyāṇīty ādeśārthetarā śrutir bhavati. tasmāt krīte cākrīte ca rājany uttiṣṭhatāṃ viśvajid iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12378: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate, ekā dīkṣā, tisra upasadaḥ, pañcamīṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12379: prasuta{*6/202*} iti. tisro dīkṣāḥ, dvādaśa dīkṣā iti bahūni dīkṣāparimāṇāny āmnātāni. teṣu saṃdehaḥ. kim aniyamaḥ, yad vā tad vā parimāṇam upādeyam, uta dvādaśa dīkṣā iti. kiṃ prāptam. dīkṣāparimāṇe yathākāmī syāt. nāsti niyamaḥ. kutaḥ. aviśeṣāt, na kaścana [713]{*6/203*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12380: viśeṣa upādīyate. tasmād yatkiṃcit parimāṇam upādeyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12384: dvādaśāha eva parimāṇam upādīyeta. kutaḥ. liṅgāt sāmarthyād ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:12385: arthaḥ{*6/204*}. kiṃ sāmarthyam. dvādaśa rātrīr dīkṣito bhṛtiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12386: vanvīteti{*6/205*} nityavad āmnāyate, na pākṣikam. tad eva nityaṃ kurvan,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12387: na śaknoty anyat parimāṇam upādātum. tasmād dvādaśāha eva parimāṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12388: niyamyeta, anyāni parimāṇāni vikṛtau bhaviṣyatīti naiṣām ānarthakyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12390: *{6/204: E1 hat sāmarthyād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12393: gavāmayane śrūyate, purastāt paurṇamāsyāś caturahe dīkṣerann iti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:12394: saṃdehaḥ. kasyāḥ paurṇamāsyā iti. kiṃ prāptam. paurṇamāsyām aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12395: kutaḥ. aviśeṣāt, nātra kaścid viśeṣavacanaḥ śabda upādīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12397: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitat, aniyama iti, caitrī, paurṇamāsī tu bhavet. kutaḥ. ānantaryāt, paurṇamāsīm uktvānantaraṃ vākyaśeṣe caitrī
GSP28msbh1-7u:12398: saṃkīrtyate, purasāt paurṇamāsyāś caturahe dīkṣeran. ṛtumukhaṃ vaiṣā paurṇamāsī saṃvatsa[714]{*6/206*}rasya, yā caitrī paurṇamāsīti. atra saṃdigdheṣu vākyaśeṣād{*6/207*} iti caitrī niyamyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12402: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti caitrīti. kiṃ tarhi. māghīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12403: kutaḥ. ekāṣṭakāśruteḥ, kraye hy ekāṣṭakāśrutir bhavati. teṣām ekāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpadyata iti. tasmān māghyāḥ purastāc caturahe dīkṣitasyaikāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ śakyate kartum, na caityāḥ. tad etat sāmarthyaṃ nāma liṅgam, tat vākyasya bādhakaṃ bhavati. tasmān māghī paurṇamāsīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12405: iti cet paśyasi, māghī paurṇamāsī, evam ekāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpatsyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:12406: iti. tan na, asarvā aṣṭamya{*6/208*} ekāṣṭakāḥ, dvādaśaikāṣṭakā iti, tena na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12409: na bhaktitvād eṣā hi loke // MS_6,5.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12410: naitad evam, bhākto hy anyāsv aṣṭamīṣv ekāṣṭakāśabdaḥ. eṣā hi mukhyā, yā māghyāṃ vṛttāyām{*6/209*}, mukhyagauṇayoś ca mukhye saṃpratyayaḥ. tasmān māghy eva paurṇamāsīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12414: ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣeran, eṣā vai saṃvatsarasya patnī, yad ekāṣṭakā{*6/210*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:12415: ity uktvā punaḥ, caturahe purastāt paurṇamāsyā dīkṣāṃ vidhāya, teṣām ekāṣṭakāyāṃ krayaḥ saṃpadyate, tenaikāṣṭakāṃ [715]{*6/211*} na chaṃvaṭ kurvantīti, dīkṣātaḥ pracyutām ekāṣṭakāṃ krayeṇa tu gṛhṇan māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā adhikāraṃ darśayati. asyāṃ ca māghyām aṣṭamyām abhījyamānāyāṃ bhavati mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12416: yāṃ janāḥ pratinandanti rātrīṃ dhenum ivāyatīm/
GSP28msbh1-7u:12417: saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā no astu sumaṅgalī//
GSP28msbh1-7u:12418: ity{*6/212*} aṣṭakāyai surādhase svāheti, yāsau māghy aṣṭamī, tām ekāṣṭakāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12423: utthāne cānuprarohaṃ darśayati. tān uttiṣṭhata auṣadhayo vanaspatayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12424: 'nuttiṣṭhantīti{*6/213*}, vasanta utthānaṃ darśayati. tasminn oṣadhayo vanaspatayaś cottiṣṭhanti. tasmād api sā niyamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12428: ārtaṃ vā ete saṃvatsarasyābhidīkṣante, ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣanta{*6/214*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12429: iti. ārtā yasmin kāle bhavanti, sa ārtaḥ kālaḥ. śītena cārtā bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12430: tasmān māghy aṣṭamy ekāṣṭaketi. tathā, vyastaṃ vā ete
GSP28msbh1-7u:12431: saṃvatsarasyābhidīkṣante, ya ekāṣṭakāyāṃ dīkṣanta iti. ayanaparivṛttir
GSP28msbh1-7u:12432: vyastaśabdenocyate. tathā, apo nābhinandanto 'vabhṛtham abhyavayantīti caitryāṃ dīkṣitā abhinandanto 'bhyaveyuḥ. tasmād api māghī paurṇamāsīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12435: dīkṣākālasya śiṣṭatvād atikrame niyatānām anutkarṣaḥ prāptakālatvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12436: idaṃ śrūyate, tasmād dīkṣito na dadāti, na pacati, na juhotīti, jyotiṣṭome
GSP28msbh1-7u:12437: samāmananti. yadi{*6/216*} tu daivān mānuṣād vā pratibalād dīkṣitākāla
GSP28msbh1-7u:12438: utkṛṣyate, tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ dānahomapākānām utkarṣaḥ, uta neti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12439: prāptam. anutkarṣaḥ, niyatā hi dānahomapākāḥ, yāvaj jīvam, agnihotraṃ juhotītyevamādibhiḥ śrutibhis teṣām apavādaḥ, yeṣv ahaḥsu sāṅgo jyotiṣṭomo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12440: vihitaḥ, tāvanty ahāni muktvānyeṣv ahaḥsu kartavyāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12441: jyotiṣṭomavidhānakālāt parato 'pratiṣiddhāḥ. tasmāt kartavyāḥ, prāpto hi teṣāṃ kāla iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12443: *{6/216: E1,6; E2: samāmananti, tiṣṭo dīkṣā ityevamādi. yadi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12444: utkarṣo vā dīkṣitatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_6,5.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12445: vāśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. yad uktam, naiṣam utkarṣa iti, naitad evam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12446: utkṛṣṭavyāḥ{*6/217*}. kutaḥ. dīkṣitatvāt, dīkṣitasya te pratiṣiddhāḥ, na dīkṣito yasmin kāle. lakṣaṇā hi evaṃ syāt, yathā tu vayaṃ brūmaḥ, tathā śrutiḥ kāraṇam. prāk cāvabhṛthāt, ayaṃ dīkṣita eva. aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12447: yad eva jyotiṣṭomavidhānakāle, tad evātikrānte 'pi. ubhayatra hi dīkṣitatvaṃ hi kāraṇam. tasmāt teṣām utkarṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12450: tatra pratihomo na vidyate, yathā pūrveṣām // MS_6,5.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12451: tatrotkṛṣyamāṇe jyotiṣṭome{*6/219*}, akṛteṣu homeṣu kiṃ parisaṃkhyāya homāḥ kartavyāḥ, uta neti. kiṃ prāptam. parisaṃkhyāya homāḥ kriyeran. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12452: kāraṇam. avaśyakartavyatayā hi te vihitā homāḥ. atipannā api kartavyā eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12453: tathā hy eṣām avaśyakartavyatā anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati. pradhānamātraṃ tu niyatam, nātra kālānurodhaḥ kartavyaḥ, nadīvegasthānīyatvāt. yady apy atikrāntāḥ kālāḥ, atikrāntānāṃ parisaṃkhyāya pradhānamātrāṇi kartavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12454: yathāvaśyakartavyaṃ bhuktibhṛtakadānādi, yad atikrāntaṃ bhavati, tat parisaṃkhyāya kriyate, evam idam apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12455: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tatra pratihomo na vidyate, yathā pūrveṣām, kartavyam akṛtvā kuryāt, nākartavyam. akartavyāś caite, pratiṣiddhatvāt, yathā pūrveṣām asati kālātikrame 'kṛtānāṃ na pratihomaḥ, evam eṣām apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12459: kālaprādhānyaṃ ca bhavati, nimittatvena tasya śrutatvāt. tadabhāve vihitam eva na bhavati. pradhānamātraṃ yady api niyamyeta, tathāpi nimitte kāle.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12460: sa ca nadīvegasthānīyaḥ kāle 'tikrāntaḥ, ato na pratihomaḥ kartavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12463: ūrdhvam avabhṛthād ā udavasānīyāyā iṣṭer ye homāḥ, teṣv atipanneṣu daivena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12464: mānuṣeṇa vā pratibalena bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ pratihomaḥ kartavyaḥ, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:12465: neti. kiṃ prāptam. kartavya iti, unmuktadīkṣo hi sa tadā bhavati, dīkṣāṇām unmocanārtho hy avabhṛthaḥ. tasmāt kartavyāḥ, te na kṛtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12466: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, ūrdhvam avabhṛthāt, ā udavasānīyāyā iṣṭeḥ, atipannānāṃ na pratihomaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. pratiṣedhāt, pratiṣedho hi bhavati, etayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12468: udavasānīyāyāḥ, homasya pratiṣedhaḥ. yāvad udavasānīyotkṛṣyate, tāvat
GSP28msbh1-7u:12469: pratiṣedhaḥ. evaṃ śrutiḥ, itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt. tasmād akartavyāḥ, te na kṛtā iti, na syāt pratihoma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12473: pratihomaś cet sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīni hūyeran // MS_6,5.43 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12474: eteṣv evodāharaṇeṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ pratihome sāyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12476: nanu nāsty eva pratihoma iti sthitam. ucyate, astīti kṛtvā cintayāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12477: kṛtvā cinteyam, anyeṣu sadṛśanyāyeṣūdāharaṇeṣv asyāḥ prayojanam asti [719]{*6/224*} iti cintyate. kiṃ prāptam. aniyamaḥ, arthakṛtatvāt. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, yadi pratihomaḥ kriyate, sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīni hūyeran.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12482: *{6/225: E2 om. sāyam agnihotraprabhṛtīni hūyeran. kutaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12484: ṣoḍaśisaṃsthe somo 'tipanneṣu{*6/226*} homeṣu saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ sāyam agnihotreṇeti, uta prātar iti{*6/227*}. kiṃ prāptam. sāyam agnihotreṇeti pūrvasminn adhikaraṇa uktam, utsargeṇa sarvatraivam iti prāptam. tathā prāpta ucyate, prātas tu ṣoḍaśini, ṣoḍaśisaṃsthe prātaragnihotrādīny atipannānīti prātaragnihotrād eva samārabhyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12487: *{6/227: E2: agnihotreṇa pratihotavyam uta prātar agnihotreṇeti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12489: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate, bhinne juhoti skanne juhotīti. tatra kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor evaitat, bhinne skanne ca prāyaścittam uta yatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:12490: bhidyate skandati ceti. kiṃ prāptam. [720]{*6/228*} prakaraṇe yat prāyaścittam evaṃjātīykaṃ kiṃcid utpannam, tat sarvatra yatra yatra bhidyate skandati vā, tatra tatra syāt. kasmāt. doṣasāmānyāt, samānaṃ nimittaṃ skandanaṃ bhedanaṃ vā. sa evātra doṣa ity abhipretam. prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prāyaścittam, vākyād anyatrāpi, prakaraṇāc ca vākyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12491: balīyaḥ. tasmāt sarvatra skanne bhinne ca prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12494: prakaraṇa eva bhinne skanne vā prāyaścittam. kutaḥ. śabdahetutvāt, tena prākṛtenārthena sahaikavākyatā, eṣāṃ homānām. tato homavato yāgasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12495: pratyāyane prakṛto yajeteti śabdo hetuḥ. evaṃ cet tadupakāreṇārthavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:12496: bhaviṣyatīti, itarathā vinā vākyena, phalaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ syāt. tasmāt vākyaṃ phalābhāvenaiva bādhitam iti kṛtvā prakaraṇam anugṛhītavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12498: na ca, atadvikāro 'gnihotraṃ jyotiṣṭomo vā. na darśapūrṇamāsavikāraḥ. yadi tadvikāro bhavet, tatrāpi skanne bhinne vā prāyaścittaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12499: vyāpannasyāpsu gatau yad abhojyam āryāṇāṃ tat pratīyeta // MS_6,5.48 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12500: vyāpannam apsu praharatīti śrūyate. kiṃ vyāpannam ity ucyata iti tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:12501: abhidhīyate, vyāpannam, dūṣitaṃ yena kāryena [721]{*6/229*} kriyate. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12502: tat. yad abhojyam āryāṇām, keśakīṭāv apannam{*6/230*} anyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12505: *{6/230: E1,6; E2: abhidhīyate, keśakīṭāv apannam, anyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12507: vibhāgaśruteḥ prāyaścittaṃ yaugapadye na vidyate // MS_6,5.49 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12509: kiṃ tatra prāyaścittaṃ syāt, neti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12510: prāyaścittaṃ yaugapadye na vidyate. kutaḥ. vibhāgaśruteḥ, vibhakte
GSP28msbh1-7u:12511: 'pacchede prāyaścittam āmananti. apacchedaś cāyaṃ vibhāgaḥ, sa ubhābhyāṃ sādhyate, iha caikena sādhyamāne śrūyate prāyaścittam, udgātrā pratihartrā vā. na ca yad apareṇa saha kriyate, tat kevalena kṛtaṃ bhavati. yadi hi kevalena kṛtaṃ syāt, tena kṛtam{*6/233*}, aparaḥ kiṃ kuryāt. tasmān na yugapad apacchinnayoḥ prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12516: syād vā prāptanimittatvāt kālamātram ekam // MS_6,5.50 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12517: syād vā prāyaścittaṃ yaugapadye 'pi. prāptaṃ hi nimittam apaccheda udgātuḥ pratihataś{*6/234*} ca. yatra hi dvayor apacchedaḥ, tatra dvāv apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:12518: apacchinnau, eko 'py aparo 'pi. saṃyuktasya hi pṛthagbhāvo 'pacchedaḥ, sa cobhayastho 'pi. ekenāpi tatrāpacchedaḥ kriyate 'napekṣyāparam, apareṇāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12519: kālamātraṃ tu tatraikam, na ca [722]{*6/235*} kālaikyād apacchedayor aikyaṃ bhavati. tasmāt prāyaścittaṃ yugapad apacchede 'pi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12523: yady udgātṛpratihartroḥ yugapad apacchedo bhavati, tatra saṃdehaḥ. kim
GSP28msbh1-7u:12524: adākṣiṇyam, sarvasvaṃ vā vikalpaḥ{*6/236*}, uta samuccaya iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12525: prāptam. tatra vipratiṣedhād vikalpaḥ syāt. viruddhau hy etau kalpau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12526: sarvasvam adākṣiṇyaṃ ca. tasmād vikalpo bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12530: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, vikalpa iti, ubhayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:12531: vidhānāt. sarvāṅgopasaṃhārī prayogavacana evam upapadyate. vikalpe hi pakṣe bādhaḥ, tasmāt samuccayaḥ. atha yad uktam, virodhād vikalpa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12532: ucyate, prayogāntare vobhayānugrahaḥ syāt, tena punar yajetety ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12533: dvis tasya prayogaḥ. tatraikasmin prayoge, ekaḥ kalpaḥ. anyasminn aparo bhaviṣyati. evam avirodhaḥ, tasmād ubhayaṃ prāyaścittam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12535: na caitad evam. kutaḥ. ekasaṃyogāt, sa eva yāgaḥ punaḥ kriyeta. yady anyatareṇa vinā vaiguṇyam ity avadhāryeta, sarvasve kriyamāṇe 'dakṣiṇyābhāvād viguṇaḥ syāt. nānyasmin prayoge kriyamāṇe 'nyaḥ prayogo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12537: guṇavatā prayogeṇa karma saṃbandhayitavyam. tasmād vikalpaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12540: yatrānupūrveṇa bhavaty apacchedaḥ, tatra kiṃ pūrvanimittaṃ prāyaścittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12541: utottaranimittam iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ prāptam. pūrvasya balīyastvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12542: pūrvāpacchede yan naimittikaṃ prāptam, tasmin sati tadviruddhaṃ na śakyaṃ kartum. na cāśakyam upadeśārhaṃ bhavati, pūrvavijñānaṃ prāptam iti na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12543: saṃśayaḥ. tasmāt tadavirodhenānyat kāryaṃ na viruddham. kva tarhi tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:12544: syāt. yatra kevalaṃ nimittam. tasmāt pūrvavijñānaṃ balavat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12545: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ syāt. kutaḥ. ākhyātena hi yo 'rthaḥ kartavya ity ucyate, tatraitad anubuddhaṃ yathā śakyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12546: tatheti. tat pūrvavijñānabādhena{*6/238*} śakyate, nānyathā. tena pūrvavijñānaṃ bādhitvedaṃ kartavyam iti bhavati śabdārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12547: nanu pūrvavijñāna idaṃ upapadyate, yad anyad virodhakaṃ vijñānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12548: bhaviṣyati, tan mithyeti. abhūtaṃ hi tan na{*6/239*} śakyam āśrayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12549: idaṃ nāma tad iti. na ca, apratiṣiddhe tasmin na pūrvavijñānaṃ saṃbhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12550: tasmād apratiṣiddhaṃ bhaviṣyat{*6/240*}, yadā tu tad bhavati, tadā pūrvavijñānaṃ bādhamānam evotpadyate. tad idānīṃ bādhitaṃ na śaknoty uttaraṃ bādhitum iti, prakṛtivat. yad dhi prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12551: tatrāpy etad eva kāraṇam. nābādhitvā pūrvavijñānaṃ vaikṛtaṃ saṃbhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12552: prākṛtaṃ ca pūrvam, yato vikṛtau tad apekṣā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12553: pratyakṣatvād vaikṛtam ānumānikaṃ prākṛtaṃ bādhata iti [724]{*6/241*} cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12554: pratyakṣatve 'pi sati naiva bādheta, yadi yathāvarṇito 'yam ākhyātārtho na bhavet. sati pūrvavijñāne 'śakyatvāt prākṛtaṃ{*6/242*} bādhetaiva. tasmāt parabalīyastvaṃ nyāyyam eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12560: yady udgātā jaghanyaḥ syāt punaryajñe sarvavedasaṃ dadyād yathetarasmin //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12561: yadā pratihartuḥ pūrvam apacchedaḥ tata udgātuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12562: tatrādakṣiṇeneṣṭvā{*6/243*} punar yaṣṭavyam. tatra saṃdehaḥ. punar yāge kiṃ dvādaśaśataṃ dātavyam uta sarvasvam iti. kiṃ prāptam. dvādaśaśatam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12563: kutaḥ. evaṃ hy āmnāyate, tatra tad dadyāt, yat pūrvasmin dāsyan{*6/244*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12564: syāt{*6/245*}. pūrvasmiṃś ca prayoge jyotiṣṭomadakṣiṇaiva prāptā. tasmād dvādaśaśatam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12565: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tatra punaryajñe sarvaṃ{*6/246*} dadyāt, yathetarasmin pūrvasminn ahani sarvasvam{*6/247*}. kathaṃ tatra sarvasvam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:12566: cet{*6/248*}. pratihartur apacchedāt. pratihartary apacchinne dvādaśaśataṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12568: nanu pūrvasminn ahani dvādaśaśatam apy asau dāsyann āsīt. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12569: sarvasvadānena ta ubhayaṃ{*6/250*} pradattaṃ bhavati. tasmāt tad deyaṃ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12570: nanv arvāg api dvādaśaśatāt sarvasvam. naitad evam, adhikṛte{*6/251*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12571: dvādaśaśate sarvasvam apy adhikaṃ bhavati. api ca pūrvasminn ahani naiva dvādaśaśataṃ dāsyan{*6/252*} bhavatīti{*6/253*}. etāvad dāsyann{*6/254*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12572: ity ucyate, yasyottarakāle tāvad dānaṃ{*6/255*} bhavati. na ca, pūrvasminn ahani dvādaśaśataṃ dīyate, tasmān na tad dāsyann{*6/256*} ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12574: [725]{*6/257*} nanu ca sarvasvam api pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati, tad apy asau na dāsyann iti, sāpy asya mithyābuddhiḥ. nety āha, sābhyāsasya jyotiṣṭomasya prayogaḥ. tatra prathamaprayoge 'dākṣiṇyavirodhāt sarvasvaṃ bādhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12575: dvitīyaprayoge taddānaṃ codyate. tatra virodho nāsti, tasyaiva yajñasya sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:12576: eva prayogaḥ. pratihartā ca tasminn apacchinna iti dvādaśaśataṃ bādhitvā sarvasvam eva dāsyan{*6/258*} bhavati. tasmāt sarvasvaṃ tatra deyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12582: *{6/247: E1 hat pūrvasminn ahani sarvasvam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12593: ahargaṇe yasminn apacchedas tad āvarteta karmapṛthaktvāt // MS_6,5.56 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12594: ahargaṇe yadā bhavati kasmiṃścid ahany udgātur apacchedaḥ, tadā saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12595: kiṃ kṛtsno 'hargaṇa āvartate, uta tad evāhar iti. kiṃ prāptam. kṛtsno
GSP28msbh1-7u:12596: 'hargaṇaḥ. kutaḥ. aparair ahobhir vinā, tadā{*6/259*} viguṇaṃ{*6/260*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12597: bhavati, tasmād gaṇa{*6/261*} evāvarteteti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, yasminn
GSP28msbh1-7u:12598: apacchedaḥ, tad evāvarteta. kutaḥ. karmapṛthaktvāt, pṛthag etāni karmāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12599: nānyad ahar anyasya guṇabhūtam, iṣṭveti ca yāgaṃ parisamāpyeti gamyate, na sāṅgam iti. yāny aharantarāṇi sāhāyyenopakariṣyanti, vidyanta eva tāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12600: ataḥ{*6/262*} sāhāyyaṃ kariṣyantīti. tasmāt tad evāvarteta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12608: satrāṇy udāharaṇam, saptadaśāvarāḥ satram āsīran, ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satram upayantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ samānakalpānām bhinnakalpānāṃ ca sahādhikāra uta samānakalpānām eveti. ke punaḥ samānakalpāḥ. rājanyātribadhryaśvavasiṣṭhavainyaśunakānāṃ kaṇvakaśyapasaṃkṛtīnāṃ nārāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayājaḥ, tanūnapād itareṣām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12609: evaṃ kecin nārāśaṃsakalpāḥ, kecit tanūnapātkalpāḥ. tatra kiṃ tāvat
GSP28msbh1-7u:12610: prāptam. saṃnipāte bahūnāṃ yajamānānāṃ ya eva tulyakalpāḥ{*6/264*}, ta eva saha satram āsīran. kutaḥ. avaiguṇyāt, itarathā yasya kalpo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12611: nopasaṃhriyeta, tasya vaiguṇyaṃ syāt. yathā prakṛtāv eva vinā sādguṇyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12616: vāśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. na caitad asti, bhinnakalpānām anadhikāra iti, te 'py adhikriyeran. kutaḥ. aviśeṣeṇa{*6/265*} sarveṣāṃ yajamānānāṃ prāptiḥ. na ca bhinnakalpānāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ. nanu vaiguṇyaṃ bhinnakalpānām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12618: gṛhītāḥ. tatra śirovad bhādhaḥ syāt, yathā, puruṣaśīrṣam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12620: smṛtivipratiṣiddham api kriyate, evam ihāpi. athavā, āśiravat, yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12621: ṛtapeye ghṛtavrato bhavatīti vacanād vrataduhi nivṛttāyām anyāmāśire gāṃ kalpayanti. evam etad api vacanād bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12626: naitad asti, yad uktam, bhinnakalpānām apy adhikāra iti, samānakalpā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12627: evādhikriyeran. kutaḥ. avaiguṇyāt. atha yad uktam, vacanād
GSP28msbh1-7u:12628: vaiguṇyenāpi{*6/268*} setsyatīti. tan na, anārabhyavādatvāt, tad dhi vacanāt prakalpyate, yasminn akalpyamāne vacanam anarthakaṃ bhavati. yadi hy ārabhya bhinnakalpān, etad ucyeta, tato vacanam anarthakaṃ bhavatīti bhinnakalpānām api satram abhyupagamyeta, na tv ārabhya bhinnakalpān etad ucyate. samānakalpeṣv arthavattāsya vacanasya bhaviṣyati. tasmān na bhinnakalpānām adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12632: syād vā bhinnakalpānām adhikāraḥ. kutaḥ. yajñārthatvāt kalpasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12633: vasiṣṭhādīnāṃ nārāśaṃsakalpo yajñasya sādhakaḥ. sa ca yajñaḥ sarveṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12634: sādhāraṇaḥ, parakalpenāpi siddhaḥ siddho{*6/269*} bhavati. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12636: parimāṇena siddho yajño 'nyeṣām api siddho bhavati. ucyate, nanu prayājasya vākyena puruṣasaṃbandhaḥ. sa ca prakaraṇaprāptāṃ yāgārthatāṃ bādhiṣyata iti. neti brūmaḥ. phalaṃ [728]{*6/271*} hi tadā kalpayitavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12637: nanv itarathāpy adṛṣṭam avaśyaṃ kalpanīyam. tatrocyate, satyaṃ kalpanīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12638: pramāṇena tu prayogavacanaikavākyena, dvitīye tu pakṣe kalpayitvā śabdam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12639: tenaikavākyatā syāt. athocyeta, kvacit samāmnātena sahaikavākyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12640: bhaviṣyati. tathāpy aprakṛtena vyavahitena ca kalpyamānā prakṛtakalpanāyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12646: naitad evam, tatpradhānatvāt. puruṣārtho hy eṣa kalpaḥ. katham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12647: vasiṣṭhādīnāṃ{*6/272*} nārāśaṃso yajñāṅgam iti. yac ca yasya yajñāṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12648: tena saha phaladaṃ karma tasya bhavati. tenaivam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12649: vasiṣṭhānāṃ{*6/273*} nārāśaṃsena sahitaṃ karma phaladaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12654: atha yad upavarṇitam, yathaudumbarī tatheheti. pārārthyam{*6/274*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12655: audumbaryāḥ, yajamāno guṇatvena śrūyate. nanu tatrāpi prayogavacanaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12656: puruṣaprādhānyaṃ kuryāt. naiṣa doṣaḥ, ekenāpi yajamānena saṃmitā ceyaṃ sarveṣāṃ yajamānasaṃmitā bhavati. na tv ihaikasya saṃgṛhīte{*6/275*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12657: sarveṣāṃ saṃgṛhītaḥ. tasmād{*6/276*} audumbaryāḥ pārārthyam, kapālavat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12658: yathā, puroḍāśakapālena tuṣā upavapantīti{*6/277*} parārthakapālena tuṣā upavaptavyā ity upādīyate, evam etad apīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12665: evaṃ ced bhavān paśyati, yajamānena saṃmānam, tat prayo[729]{*6/278*}janaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12666: svenānyena{*6/279*} vā yajamāneneti. tathā prayogāntare yo yajamānas tenāpi saṃmānaṃ prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12668: *{6/279: E1,6; E2: na svenānyena; E2 (v.l.): tatsvenānyena}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12669: naikatvāt tasya cānadhikārāc chabdasya cāvibhaktatvāt // MS_6,6.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12670: atrocyate, na prayogāntarasya yajamānaḥ prasajyate. na tu yajamānaśabde
GSP28msbh1-7u:12671: kaścid viśeṣaḥ, yato yajamānaśabdād vyavasthā syāt. kiṃ tarhi. ekatvasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12672: vivakṣitatvāt, na dvābhyāṃ yājamānāni kartavyānīti nānya ānīyate. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12673: anya eva tarhi sarvayājamāneṣu bhavatu. naivam, kāminaṃ hy adhikṛtya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12674: sāṅgasya yāgasya vacanam. yajamānaśabdaś cāvibhakta ihaudumbaryāḥ saṃmāne.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12676: saṃnipātāt tu nimittavighātaḥ syād bṛhadrathantaravad vibhaktaśiṣṭatvād vasiṣṭhanirvartye tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. bahuṣu yajamāneṣu saṃnipātān nimittavighātaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12677: syāt. kutaḥ. vibhaktiśiṣṭatvāt, vasiṣṭhanirvartye prayoge nārāśaṃso
GSP28msbh1-7u:12678: naimittikaḥ. anyasmiṃs tanūnapān naimittikaḥ. yatredānīm ubhaye kartāraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12679: samahāyena, tatra nirvṛttir na kevalena. tasmān na kevalaḥ kartā. na ced vāsiṣṭhaḥ kevalaḥ kartā, tasmāt tannimittaṃ tatra na kartavyam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12680: cetaranimittam, ubhayor apy anyonyena vighātaḥ, bṛhadrathantaravat, tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:12681: yathā, bṛhadrathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavatīti na bṛhadsādhanakam, na rathantarasādhanakam iti, naiva tatra bṛhan nimittaṃ bhavati, na rathantaraṃ vā. evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12683: api vā kṛtsnasaṃyogād avighātaḥ pratīyeta{*6/281*} svāmitvenābhisaṃbandhāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:12684: api veti pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. kṛtsnaṃ prati kevalasya kartṛtvena saṃyogo bhavati, tasmād avighātaḥ naimittikānām. kathaṃ punaḥ kārtsnyena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12686: kevalānāṃ vasiṣṭhādīnām abhisaṃbandho bhavati, karma puruṣāṇam upakārakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12687: tad dhy ekaikasya śaknoti phalaṃ nirvartayitum. tasmād ekaikaḥ kṛtsnasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12688: karteti tan naimittikaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti. yathā tuṇḍamātre dīyatām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12689: yady api sā tuṇḍaḍapitthayor mātā, tathāpi tasyai dīyate. kārtsnena hi tasya sā mātā bhavati. na hi vyāsajyate mātṛtvam. tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12694: sāmnoḥ karmavṛddhyaikadeśena saṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhas tasmāt tatra vighātaḥ syāt // atha yad uktam, bṛhadrathantaravad iti, tat pariharaṇīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12696: tatra hy ubhayoḥ sādhakatvam naikasya. stotraikadeśena tu tatra sāmnoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12697: saṃbandhaḥ, na kṛtsnena stotreṇa. guṇatvena hi tatra sāma śrūyate, stotraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12699: vacanāt tu dvisaṃyogas tasmād ekasya pāṇitvam // MS_6,6.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12701: yajeyātām iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ rājño dvau purohitau yajeyātām, uta rājā ca purohitaś ceti. kiṃ prāptam. rājño dvau purohitāv iti. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12702: purohitaśabdāt paraṃ dvivacanaṃ śrūyate, tacchabdavācyasya dvitvaṃ śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:12703: vaditum. purohitaś ca tacchabdavācyaḥ śrutyā, na rājā. purohitavacanaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12704: purohitaśabdaḥ. lakṣaṇayā yugapad adhikaraṇavacanatāyāṃ hi tad bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12705: nanv ekasya dvau purohitau na staḥ. purohitaṃ vṛṇīta iti hy upādīyamānasya vivakṣitam ekatvam iti. ucyate, vacanād etad bhaviṣyati. kiṃ hi vacanaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12706: kalpayet. etenaiva kāraṇena dvau bhaviṣyataḥ, yathā vacanenāñjalinā juhotīty ekasyaiva dvau pāṇī bhavataḥ, yady api savyo prāptas{*6/284*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12711: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate{*6/285*}. naivaṃ syāt, dvau purohitāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12712: kutaḥ. arthābhāvāt, naivāyam artho 'sti, dvau purohitāv iti. ekasya rājña eka eva purohita upādeyatvena hi śrūyate, purohitaṃ karotīti, ekatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12713: vivakṣitam. nanu vacanād ity uktam. ucyate, na tu vacanād etac chakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12714: saṃskāranimittatvāt purohitaśabdasya. kriyamāṇo 'pi na purohitaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12717: arthānaṃ ca vibhaktatvān na tacchrutena saṃbandhaḥ // MS_6,6.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12718: arthānāṃ ca vibhaktatvaṃ śrūyate, tejaḥsaṃstavo brāhmaṇasya, vīryasaṃstavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12719: rājanyasya. tābhyāṃ varṇābhyāṃ tena tena phalena saṃbandho 'nūdyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12720: tasmād api na dvau purohitāv iti{*6/286*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12722: *{6/286: E1,6; E2: purohitāv ekasya rājña iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12724: atha yad uktam, etasmād eva kāraṇād ekasyaiva puruṣasya dvau pāṇī bhavata iti. yuktaṃ tatra, pāṇeḥ pratyaṅgabhūtatvāt, añjaliṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12725: pratyaṅgabhūto{*6/288*} dakṣiṇasya pāṇeḥ svayaḥ pāṇiḥ. tena vināñjalir eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:12726: na bhavati. na hi dvābhyāṃ dakṣiṇābhyām añjalir ity ucyate. tasmād rājā ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:12727: purohitaś ca syāt. nanu tatra rājapurohitaś ca rājapurohitaś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:12728: rājapurohitau yajeyātām iti. ucyate, na tau sāyujyakāmau bhavataḥ. sa rājā purohitena sahaikakāryo bhavati, na tu purohitaḥ purohitena. ubhāv api tau
GSP28msbh1-7u:12729: hi rājānam abhicarantau purohitāv ity ucyete, na hi tāv{*6/289*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12730: icchantau, saṃskāraśabdo hi purohita iti. nanu lakṣaṇā bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:12731: bhavatpakṣe. ucyate, śrutyabhāve lakṣaṇayāpi vyavahāro bhavati, yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12732: agnau tiṣṭhati, avaṭe tiṣṭhatīti. tasmād rājā ca purohitaś ca rājapurohitāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12734: *{6/288: E1,6; E1 (v.l.): añjalau pratyaṅgabhūtau; E2: añjalau
GSP28msbh1-7u:12738: iha satrāṇy udāharaṇam. ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate, ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12739: satram upayantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ satrāṇi trayāṇām api varṇānām, uta brāhmaṇānām eveti. kiṃ prāptam. satrāṇi sarvavarṇānāṃ bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12740: [733]{*6/290*} kasmāt. aviśeṣāt, na hi kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyate. amīṣāṃ varṇānāṃ satrāṇi bhavanti, amīṣāṃ neti. tasmāt trayāṇām api varṇānām adhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12743: itaś ca paśyāmaḥ, trayāṇāṃ satrāṇīti. kutaḥ. liṅgadarśanāt. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. evam āha, bārhadgiraṃ brāhmaṇasya brahmasāma kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12744: pārthuraśyaṃ{*6/291*} rājanyasya rāyovājīyaṃ vaiśyasyeti dvādaśāhe bhavati vacanaṃ brāhmasāmavidhānaparam, tasmin rājanyavaiśyānāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12749: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, trayāṇām api varṇānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:12750: iti{*6/293*}. kiṃ tarhi. brāhmaṇānām eva syāt. kutaḥ. itarayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:12751: ārtvijyābhāvāt. itarayor hi varṇayo rājanyavaiśyayor ārtvijyaṃ pratiṣiddham. svayam evārtvijyena ca vinā viguṇatvam. tasmād brāhmaṇānām eva syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12756: iti cet paśyasi, rājanyavaiśyayor vaiguṇyam āpadyata iti. vacanād yajamānāḥ santa ṛtvijo bhaviṣyanti, ye yajamānās ta ṛtvija iti. ke punar yajamānāḥ. ye tatra phalaṃ{*6/294*} kāmayamānāḥ satrakarmaṇi pravṛttās te rājanyā api vaiśyā api. teṣām ṛtvikkarma vidhīyate. tatraitat syāt, yeṣām ārtvijyaṃ śakyaṃ kartum, teṣām eva tad brāhmaṇānām{*6/295*}. pratiṣiddhaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12757: [734]{*6/296*} hi rājanyavaiśyānām, na teṣām idam ārtvijyavidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12758: naitad evam, yathaiva brāhmaṇānāṃ yajamānānām aprāptaṃ vacanavidhānād bhavati, evam abrāhmaṇānāṃ api yajamānānāṃ vacanaprāmāṇyād eva bhavitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:12759: arhatīti. tasmād ārtvijyasaṃskṛtā rājanyavaiśyā api satram āsīrann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12764: naitad evam. svāmitvam anena vacanena vidhīyate, evaṃkāmāḥ satram āsīrann
GSP28msbh1-7u:12765: iti vidhīyate, nārtvijyam. atha ye yajamānās ta ṛtvija ity anena vacanena vihitam ārtvijyam iti. ucyate, tad api na. katham. nātraiṣā vacanavyaktiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12766: ye yajamānā ity uddeśapadam{*6/297*}, ṛtvija iti vidheyapadam. tathā hi sati, ārtvijyam aṅgaṃ yajamānasaṃskārakaṃ vidhīyeta, na yajamānā ārtvijyasyāṅgam. tatra prākṛtārthatā naiṣām ārtvijyānāṃ syāt, saṃskāraś cādṛṣṭaḥ kalpyeta. sa ca yajamānaviṣaya iti, punar adṛṣṭam. tasmān na yajamānānāṃ satām ārtvijyāḥ padārthā vidhīyante. kiṃ tarhi. ārtvijānāṃ padārthānām ananyakartṛkatā. eṣā ca vacanavyaktiḥ, ṛtvija ity uddeśapadam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12767: ta iti vidhīyate, ye yajamānās ta evartvijo bhavanti, nānya iti, ārtvijeṣu padārtheṣu yajamānāḥ kartāro vidhīyante, pratyāmnānāt. anye nivartante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12768: evaṃ sati prākṛtaprayojanā evārtvijāh padārthāḥ. na yajamānasaṃskāro 'dṛṣṭo vidhīyata iti. yajamānakartṛkalpanāyām apy eṣām adṛṣṭam iti yadi
GSP28msbh1-7u:12769: kalpyeta. tatra brūmaḥ, itarasminn api pakṣe yajamānaviṣayaḥ so 'dṛṣṭaḥ
