GSP28msbh1-7u:12770: saṃskāra iti [735]{*6/298*} avaśyaṃ kalpanīyam. yaś cobhayoḥ pakṣayor doṣo na tam ekaś codyo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12774: gārhapate{*6/300*} padārthe rājanyavaiśyau bhaviṣyataḥ, na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12780: na caitad asti, gārhapate vā padārthe rājanyavaiśyāv iti. kalpavirodho hi syāt, yajamānacamasaḥ somamaya ekeṣām, phalamayacamasa{*6/301*} ekeṣām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12781: tathā, brahmasāma bārhadgiraṃ brāhmaṇānām, pārthuraśmaṃ rājanyānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12782: rāyovājīyaṃ vaiśyānām. tasmād gārhapate niveśa ity etad api nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12786: atha yad uktam, liṅgadarśanād iti. tat parihartavyam. atrocyate, ahīnam eva satraśabdena vakṣyati, yataḥ svāmitvam ṛtvijāṃ vidhīyate. ata ṛtvijāṃ svāmitvād rājanyavaiśyānāṃ satraṃ nāvakalpata iti. tasmād ahīne liṅgadarśanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12788: etat samadhigataṃ brāhmaṇānām eva satram, na rājanyavaiśyānām [736]{*6/302*} iti. athedānīm idaṃ saṃdigdham, kiṃ sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12789: uta vāsiṣṭhānāṃ sa, uta bhṛguśunakavasiṣṭhān varjayitvānyeṣām iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12790: prāptam. sarveṣām aviśeṣāt. na hi kaścid viśeṣa āśrīyate 'mīṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12791: brāhmaṇānāṃ satram amīṣāṃ neti. tasmāt sarveṣām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12792: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, vāsiṣṭhānāṃ brahmatvasya niyamāt, vāsiṣṭhānāṃ satraṃ syāt, nānyeṣām. kutaḥ. brahmatvasya niyamo bhavati, vāsiṣṭho brahmā bhavatīti, ato vāsiṣṭhānām, tat samānakalpānāṃ ca satraṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12795: sarveṣāṃ vā satraṃ syāt, aviśeṣāt. nanu vāsiṣṭho brahmety ucyate. nety
GSP28msbh1-7u:12796: āha. punaḥ pratisūyate, ya eva kaścana stomabhāgam adhīyīta sa eva brahmā bhaved iti. vāsiṣṭhopadeśa idānīṃ kim artha iti cet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12797: stomabhāgapraśaṃsārthaḥ, stomabhāgān adhīyāno 'vāsiṣṭho 'pi vāsiṣṭhakāryaṃ samarthaḥ kartum
GSP28msbh1-7u:12799: bhṛgvādīnām anadhikāraḥ syāt. kutaḥ. vaiśvāmitrasya hautraṃ niyamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12800: viśvāmitro hotā bhavatīti. tasmād vaiśvāmitrāṇām, taiś ca samānakalpānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:12803: vihārasya prabhutvād anagnīnām api syāt // MS_6,6.27 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12804: satrāṇy evodāharaṇam, ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate, ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12805: satram upayantīti. teṣu saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ sāgnīnām angnīnāṃ ca tāni bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12806: uta sāgnīnām eveti. kiṃ prāptam. sāgnīnām anagnīnāṃ ca. kutaḥ. vihārasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12807: prabhutvāt. prabhavati hi parakīyo 'pi vihāraḥ sarveṣām upakartum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12808: kartavyo{*6/304*} hi tena sidhyatīti, sa yadīyena tadīyena vā siddhim upaiti. tasmād anagnīnām api bhavitum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12812: sārasvate ca satre bhavati darśanam. pararathair vā ete svargaṃ lokaṃ yanti, ye 'nāhitāgnayaḥ satram āsata iti. anāhitāgnīnāṃ satraṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12815: prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate, agnaye vivicaye 'ṣṭākapālaṃ puroḍāśaṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12816: yasyāhitāgner anyair agnibhir agnayaḥ saṃsṛjyerann iti, saṃsarge 'gnīnāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12817: prāyaścittaṃ darśayati. sa evaṃ syād anāhitaiḥ, nānyathā. tasmād apy anagnīnāṃ satrāṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12819: sāgnīnāṃ vā satrāṇi, nānagnīnām. kasmāt. iṣṭipūrvatvāt, iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somānām āmnātam, darśapūrṇamāsāv iṣṭvā somena yajeteti
GSP28msbh1-7u:12820: jyotiṣṭomasyeṣṭipūrvatvam. tac co[738]{*6/305*}dakaparamparayā satrāṇi prati prāptam. tasmād anagnīnāṃ tāni bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12823: svārthena cāgnayaḥ prayuktāḥ. katham. upagrahaviśeṣāt, upagrahaviśeṣo hi bhavati, agnīn ādadhīteti. tasmād anyasyāgnibhir anyasya na siddhiḥ, yady api kratvarthā agnaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12825: sāvitrāṇi hoṣyantaḥ saṃnivaperann iti, tenāpi sāgnayaḥ satrāṇy upāsata iti gamyate. evaṃ liṅgaparihārāv aśiṣṭe 'dhikaraṇe 'nyac cintyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12826: juhvādīnām aprayuktatvāt saṃdehe yathākāmī pratīyeta // MS_6,6.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12827: kiṃ juhvādīni pātrāṇi kasyacid eva yajamānasya, upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ, utānyāni sādhāraṇāni kartavyāni. kiṃ{*6/306*} prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12828: yasya{*6/307*} kasyacid eva yajamānasyopādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12829: na hi svaṃ pātraṃ yajamānaḥ prayuṅkte. svena pātreṇa prayogaḥ kartavya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12830: iti. tasmāt parakīyapātrair anye yajerann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12832: *{6/306: E1,6; E2: kartavyānīti. asmin saṃśaye, ucyate. kiṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12833: *{6/307: E1,6; E2: prāptam juhvādiṣu yathākāmī bhavet. yasya}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12834: api vānyāni pātrāṇi sādhāraṇāni kurvīran vipratiṣedhāc chāstrakṛtatvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12835: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. naitad evam, anyāni hi pātrāṇi sādhāraṇāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:12836: kartavyāni. kasmāt. vipratiṣedhāt, vipratiṣedho bhavati{*6/308*}. kadācit tāni pātrāṇy upāttāni bhaveyuḥ. atha maraṇaṃ kasyacid yajamānasyāpadyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12837: tatra vipratiṣedhaḥ syāt, āhitāgnim agnibhir dahanti yajñapātraiś ceti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12838: yadi taṃ tair daheyuḥ, itareṣāṃ yajño virudhyeta. atha tair yajñaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12840: anyeṣu punaḥ sādhāraṇeṣūpādīyamāneṣu na kiṃcid api virudhyeta. tasmāt tathā kāryam{*6/311*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12844: *{6/310: E2: śarīrasaṃskāraḥ parilupyeta; E2 (v.l.), E1,6: śarīrasaṃskārāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12848: athedānīṃ pūrvoktasya liṅgasya parihāra ucyate. prāyaścittam asmatpakṣe parikalpiṣyate. katham. araṇye kāntāre gacchatāṃ sthitānāṃ vā dasyubhayāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:12849: śvāpadabhayād vā trāse jāte dāvāgninā vā saṃsṛjyeran, mitho vā sa viṣayaḥ prāyaścittasya bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12851: puruṣakalpena vā vikṛtau kartṛniyamaḥ syād yajñasya tadguṇatvād abhāvād itarān pratyekasminn adhikāraḥ syāt // MS_6,6.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12853: karmāṇi, yeṣu saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ, teṣu saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ trayāṇām api
GSP28msbh1-7u:12854: varṇānām ebhiḥ karmabhir adhikāraḥ, uta vaiśyasyaiveti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12855: etasyāṃ vikṛtau puruṣakalpena kartā niyamyeta. kutaḥ. yajño{*6/314*} 'yam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12856: adhvarakalpādiḥ, etat saṃkhyāguṇakaḥ. iyaṃ ca saṃkhyā vaiśyasyoktā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12857: tena{*6/315*} vaiśya eva etat karma kṛtsnaṃ kartuṃ samarthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12858: saptadaśaguṇakam etat karma, tac ca sāptadaśyam avaiśyena kriyamāṇam asādhu. itarān prati hi tan na codyate. tena yajetety asāmarthyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:12862: *{6/314: E1,6; E2: kutaḥ. yajñasya tadguṇatvāt. yajño}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12863: *{6/315: E1,6; E2: vaiśyasyoktā, saptadaśānubrūyād vaiśyasyeti. tena}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12865: liṅgaṃ ca bhavati, yathā vaiśyasya sāptadaśyam iti, saptadaśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12866: vaiśya{*6/316*} iti. tena vaiśyasya{*6/317*} sāptadaśyam. ato vaiśyasyaivaṃjātīyakāni karmāṇi, yathejyāviśeṣo vaiśyasya bhavati, vaiśyo vaiśyastomena yajeteti, vaiśyasaṃbandhāt. evaṃ sāptadaśyaṃ tasyaiveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12870: na vā saṃyogapṛthaktvād guṇasyejyāpradhānatvād asaṃyuktā hi codanā //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12871: na caitad asti. pṛthag etau saṃyogau, ekaṃ vākyaṃ saptadaśa vaiśyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12872: [741]{*6/318*} anubrūyād iti. vākyāntaram adhvarakalpādiṣu saptadaśānubrūyād iti, sa ca guṇa ijyāpradhāno bhavati, nejyā guṇārthā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12873: kim ataḥ. yady evaṃ yatrejyā, tatra tadguṇena bhavitavyam. na yatra guṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12874: tatrejyayā, vaiśyasya guṇānurodhenejyāpi. trayāṇāṃ varṇānām ijyā. sā tatra guṇam ākāṅkṣatīti{*6/319*}. api cejyāguṇabhūtasyāparā codanā{*6/320*}, na sā vaiśyasaṃyuktā. sā tv avaiśyakaṃ guṇaṃ pratyāyayati. prathamaṃ savaiśyakam iti cet. na, vaiśyasya pradhānatvāt. pradhānabhūtas tatra vaiśyaḥ śrūyate. tasmāt sarvādhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12877: *{6/320: E2 (v.l.): api ca yā guṇasyāparā codanā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12879: atha yad uktam, vaiśyastome yathā, tathehāpīti. yuktaṃ tatra, ijyā vaiśyasya śrūyate. tatra vācanikenaiva viśeṣeṇa niyamyeta. tasmāt tatrādoṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12882: idam āmananti viśvajiti, sarvasvaṃ dadātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ yāvat kiṃcit svaśabdenocyate, yathā mātā pitetyevamādy api sarvaṃ{*6/322*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12883: deyam, uta yatra prabhutvayogena svaśabdas tad eva deyam iti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12884: aviśeṣāt, mātā pitetyevamādy api dātavyam. nanu dānam ity ucyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:12885: svatvanivṛttiḥ, parasvatvāpādanaṃ ca. tatra pitrādīnām aśakyaṃ svatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12886: nivartayitum. na hi kathaṃcit pitā na pitā bhavati. ucyate, satyaṃ nāsau na pitā bhavati. śakyate tu paravidheyaḥ kartum, parasvatvāpādanaṃ ca dānam. arthāc{*6/323*} ca svatvatyāgaḥ. tasmāt sarvaṃ deyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12889: *{6/323: E1,6,E2 (v.l.); E2: dānaṃ dadāter arthaḥ. arthāc}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12890: yasya vā prabhuḥ syād itarasyāśakyatvāt // MS_6,7.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12891: vāśabdena pakṣo viparivartate. yasya prabhutvayogena svatvam, tad eva deyaṃ netarat. kasmāt. prabhutvayoginaḥ śakyatvāt, itarasya cāśakyatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12892: na hi pitrādīnāṃ śakyate svatvaṃ parityaktum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12893: nanu coktaṃ paravidheyīkaraṇaṃ tasya śakyam iti. ucyate, prabhutvayoginaḥ svasyātra dīyamānasya sarvatvam ucyate. nāprabhutvayoginaḥ svasya dānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12894: na caitan nyāyyam, yat pitrādīnāṃ paricārakatvam. yasya caitan nyāyyam api
GSP28msbh1-7u:12895: bhavet, sa dadyād api. [743]{*6/324*} atrāha, nanu yatra svaśabdo vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12896: tad deyam ity ukte pitrādayo dātavyā gamyante. tasmāt tān prati
GSP28msbh1-7u:12898: atrocyate, svaśabdo 'yam ātmīyadhanajñātīnāṃ pratyekaṃ vācako na
GSP28msbh1-7u:12899: samudāyasya. tatrātmīye sarvatāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ kṛte śāstrārthe, nāśakyeṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:12900: jñātiṣu{*6/325*} sarvatā kalpanīyā, nāpi smṛtir bādhitavyā. api ca gavādīnām ātmīyānāṃ codakena prāptau satyām avaśyam ātmīyagatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12901: sarvatopadeyā. tasyāṃ copāttāyāṃ kṛtaḥ śāstārtha iti jñātīnām upādāne na kiṃcit kāraṇam asti, tasmān na pitrādayo{*6/326*} deyāḥ. tasmād yatraiva prabhutvayogena svatvam, tad eva deyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12905: na bhūmiḥ syāt sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭatvāt // MS_6,7.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12906: atraiva sarvadāne saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ bhūmir deyā, neti. kā punar bhūmir
GSP28msbh1-7u:12907: atrābhipretā. yad etan mṛdārabdhaṃ dravyānatraṃ pṛthivīgolakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12908: na{*6/327*} kṣetramātraṃ mṛttikā vā. tatra kiṃ prāptam. aviśeṣād deyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12909: prabhutvasaṃbandhena hi tatra svaśabdo vartate, śakyate ca mānasena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12910: vyāpāreṇa svasya svatā{*6/328*} nivartayitum iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, na bhūmir deyeti. kutaḥ. kṣetrāṇām īśitāro manuṣyā dṛśyante, na kṛtsnasya pṛthivīgolakasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12911: āha, ya idānīṃ sārvabhaumaḥ, sa tarhi dāsyati. so 'pi neti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12912: yāvatā bhogena{*6/329*} sārvabhaumo bhūmer īṣṭe, tāvatānyo 'pi. na tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ, sārvabhaumatve 'sya{*6/330*} tv etad adhikam, yad asau pṛthivyāṃ saṃbhūtānāṃ vrīhyādīnāṃ rakṣaṇena [744]{*6/331*} nirviṣṭasya kasyacid bhāgasyeṣṭe, na bhūmeḥ. tannirviṣṭāś ca ye manuṣyāḥ, tair anyat sarvaprāṇināṃ dhāraṇavikramaṇādi{*6/332*} yad bhūmikṛtam, tatreśitvaṃ prati na kaścid viśeṣaḥ. tasmān na bhūmir deyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12919: akāryatvāc ca tataḥ punar viśeṣaḥ syāt // MS_6,7.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12920: viśvajity eva saṃdehaḥ. kim aśvādayo deyāḥ, neti. kiṃ prāptam. sarvasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12921: vihitatvāt, deyā aśvā iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, yasya ca dānam akāryam, tac ca na deyam, yathāśvānām. teṣāṃ hi dānam akāryam. eṣa hi viśeṣo 'śvānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12922: anyebhyo dravyebhyaḥ, yad eṣāṃ dānaṃ pratiṣidhyate, na kesariṇo dadāti
GSP28msbh1-7u:12923: nobhayatodataḥ pratigṛhṇātīti viśvajity eva samāmnāyate. tasmān nāśvā deyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:12926: viśvajity eva saṃdehaḥ sarvasvaṃ dadātīti, kim arjayitvopakaraṇāni yāvanti
GSP28msbh1-7u:12927: manuṣyasya, yāvanti ca śaknoty upārjayitum, sarvāṇi tāni dadyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:12928: kṛtabhāṇḍādīni{*6/333*}, uta yāny evāsya vidyante, tāni sarvāṇi deyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12929: nāvidyamānāni kartavyānīti. kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ. ubhayathā vacanavyakteḥ saṃbhavāt, [745]{*6/334*} yadi vaivaṃ vacanaṃ vyajyate, yāni sarvāṇi svāni, kāni tāni, yāni puruṣasyopakārakāṇi śayanādīni, tāni sarvāṇi dadyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:12930: iti vidhīyate. yad vā yāni svāni puruṣasya dāne śakyāni, tāni sarvāṇīti sarvatvaṃ vidhīyate. yadi dānaṃ vidhīyate, tato 'prāptadānānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12931: kṛtabhāṇḍakānām api dānam. atha sarvatā{*6/335*} vidhīyate, tato vidyamānānām eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12932: kiṃ tāvat prāptam. kṛtabhāṇḍakāni deyānīti, tathā dānavidhāne śrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:12933: anugṛhyate, itarathā vākyam. tayoś ca śrutir balīyasī. tasmāt kṛtabhāṇḍakāni deyānīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12934: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, nityatvāc cānityair nāsti saṃbandhaḥ, caśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:12935: 'nvādeśe. nāśvā dātavyā ity uktam, kṛtabhāṇḍakāni ca na deyānīti. nityaṃ hi viśvajiti dānaṃ codakena prāptam anūdyate. anityāni ca kṛtabhāṇḍakāni{*6/336*}, na śakyāni sarvāṇi viśvajiti kriyamāṇa upasaṃhartum. tatra kṛtabhāṇḍakānāṃ syāt, na{*6/337*} nityam, nityavac ca tac codakena vidhīyate, na nimittasaṃyogena. tasmād avaśyam etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:12936: abhyupagantavyam, sākalpyaṃ deyānāṃ prāptānāṃ vidhīyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12937: śrutyasaṃbhave ca vākyārtho gṛhītavya eva bhavati, tasmān na kṛtabhāṇḍakāni dātavyāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12942: *{6/337: E1,6; E2: viśvajiti dānaṃ pratīkṣeta. naimittikaṃ tasmān na}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12944: viśvajity eva saṃdihyate, kiṃ paricārakaḥ śūdro deyaḥ, neti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12945: sarvasya svasya{*6/338*} vihitatvād deya iti. [746]{*6/339*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, śūdraś ca na deya ity anvādeśaḥ. kutaḥ. dharmaśāstratvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12947: traivarṇikāyopanata idaṃ śuśrūṣamāṇo dharmeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. so
GSP28msbh1-7u:12948: 'nyasmai dīyamāṇo necched api. na cānicchatas tasya sa prabhavati, na ca balāt svīkartavyaḥ. yas tv anyāyena svīkuryāt, sa dadyād api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12953: dakṣiṇākāle yat svaṃ tat pratīyeta tad dānasaṃyogāt // MS_6,7.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12954: viśvajity eva saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ prāg dakṣiṇākālāt, vidyamānaṃ niyogato dakṣiṇākāle nidhātavyam{*6/341*}, ūrdhvaṃ ca dakṣiṇākālād bhaviṣyad anāgatam api dakṣiṇākāle deyam, uta yad eva dakṣiṇākāle vidyate, tad eva deyam iti. kiṃ prāptam. yasyāpi prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca svatā, tad api deyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12955: svamātrasya dānavidhānat. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, dakṣiṇākāle yat svaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12956: vidyate, tad eva deyam, na yat prāg ūrdhvam ca. kutaḥ. svasyātra dānam anūdya sākalyaṃ vidhīyate. tac ca dānaṃ dakṣiṇākāle prāptatvāt tasminn eva kāle 'nūdyate. tasmād dakṣiṇākāla eva vidyamānaṃ deyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12960: tasminn eva viśvajiti saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ dakṣiṇākāla eva viśvajid{*6/345*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:12961: utsraṣṭavyaḥ, uta na sarvaṃ{*6/346*} dātavyam, parisamāpanīya iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12962: prāptam. utsraṣṭavya iti. kutaḥ. aśeṣatvāt. katham aśeṣatā. viśvajiti sarvasvaṃ dadātīti, na ca śakyam antareṇa dravyam, parisamāpayitum. tasmāt tadantaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12966: *{6/345: E1,6; E2: eva sarvasvaṃ dattvā viśvajid}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:12968: api vā śeṣakarma syāt kratoḥ pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt // MS_6,7.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12969: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. śeṣakarma syāt, na sarvasvaṃ dakṣiṇākāle deyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12970: yāvatā tatkarma parisamāpyate, tāvac cheṣayitavyam. kutaḥ. kratoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:12971: pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt. kratoḥ parisamāptiḥ pratyakṣaśiṣṭā, viśvajitā yajeteti viśvajitam upakramya, parisamāpayed ity arthaḥ. parisamāpayatā yac chakyate dātum, tāvat sarvam ity arthaḥ. tasmān na tadantam utsraṣṭavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:12974: evaṃ ca kṛtvānyārthadarśanam upapadyate, avabhṛthād udetya vatsatvacamāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:12976: aśeṣaṃ tu samañjasādānena śeṣakarma syāt // MS_6,7.11 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12977: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. etat samañjasābhūtam, yad aśeṣaṃ [748]{*6/347*} pratīyata iti, evaṃ sarvasvaṃ dadātīit śabda upapanno bhavatīti. yat tu pratyakṣā samāptir iti. tatra brūmaḥ, ādānena śeṣakarma bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12980: ādānaṃ tv anuityam, nityaṃ ca śeṣakarma. na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'vakalpate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12982: dīkṣāsu tu vinirdeśād akratvarthena saṃyogas tasmād avirodhaḥ syāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12983: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti, kiṃcic cheṣayitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12984: dīkṣāsu tu vinirdeśo bhavati, prakṛtāv eva jyotiṣṭome. sa iha codakena
GSP28msbh1-7u:12985: prāptaḥ, idaṃ kratvartham{*6/348*}, idaṃ bhakṣyārtham, idam ānamanāyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12986: tad iha yad ānamanāya dātavyam, tasyāyaṃ vikāraḥ sarvatā nāma. kuta etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12987: yataḥ svaṃ dadātīty anūdyate, sarvataiva{*6/349*} vidhīyate. tena nādātavyasya dānaṃ vidhīyate, na ca bhakṣyārthaṃ{*6/350*} kratvarthaṃ ca dātavyam. tasmād avirodho bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:12992: ahargaṇe ca taddharmā syat sarveṣām aviśeṣāt // MS_6,7.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:12993: asty ahargaṇo 'ṣṭarātraḥ, athaitasyāṣṭarātrasya viśvajid abhijitāv ekāhāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:12994: abhitaḥ, ubhayato jyotir madhye ṣaḍahaḥ, paśukāmo hy etena yajeteti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:12995: saṃdehaḥ. kim ahargaṇasthasyāpi sarvasvam eva dakṣiṇā{*6/351*} syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:12996: āho{*6/352*} dvādaśaṃ śatam iti. kiṃ prāptam. sarvasvam. kutaḥ. sarveṣāṃ viśvajitām aviśeṣāt. ya eva prakṛtau viśvajito dharmaḥ, sa eva cāsya
GSP28msbh1-7u:12997: codakena bhaviṣyati. tasmāt sarvasvaṃ deyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13002: dvādaśaśātaṃ vā deyam iti. prakṛtivat kartavyam. jyotiṣṭomaś ca prakṛtiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13003: tatra dharmā vihitāḥ, na viśvajiti kṛtsnāḥ pratīyante. tasmād dvādaśaśatam atra deyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13005: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naivaṃ bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13006: naiva{*6/353*} yato viśvajito guṇo dvādaśaśatam. nāmadheyena hy atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:13007: dharmagrahaṇam. tasmād viśvajito bhaviṣyati{*6/354*}, na jyotiṣṭomād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13012: liṅgaṃ khalv api darśayati. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavatīti. evam āha, hīyate vā eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:13013: paśubhir yo viśvajiti sarvaṃ{*6/355*} na dadātīti niyataṃ sarvasvadānaṃ darśayaty ahargaṇe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13017: viśvajiti sarvasvaṃ dadātīti. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ, kiṃ yasya dvādaśaśatam adhikam, ūnaṃ vā vidyate, tasyāpi viśvajitādhikāraḥ{*6/357*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13018: uta yasya sakalam adhikaṃ vā tasyaiveti. kiṃ prāptam. vikāraḥ sann ubhayato 'viśeṣāt. na viśeṣaḥ kaścid āśrīyate. yasya dvādaśaśatam adhikam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13019: ūnaṃ vāstīti. tasmāt sarvasya viśvajitādhikāra{*6/358*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13024: na caitad asti, sarvasya viśvajitādhikāra{*6/359*} iti. kasya tarhi. yasya dvādaśaśatam asti, adhikaṃ veti. kutaḥ. pratiprasavāt. pratiprasavo hi jyotiṣṭome sarvasvasyocyate. dvādaśaśataṃ vidhāyāha, etāvatā vāva ṛtvija
GSP28msbh1-7u:13025: āneyā api vā sarvasveneti. yadi etāvatā neccheyuḥ, sarvasvenāpy ānamayitavyā iti. tad yadi dvādaśena śatena necchanti{*6/360*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13026: necchantitarāṃ tato nyūnena. tasmād dvādaśaśataṃ jyotiṣṭome. yad vā sarvasvam, tad ihobhayam api prāptam. tatraikaḥ pakṣo niyamyate, sarvasvaṃ deyam iti. sa eṣa na vidhiḥ, prāptatvāt. aniyataprāptas tu niyamyate. sa cen niyamyate, yādṛśas tatra, tādṛśa eveha. tatra ca dvādaśaśatam adhikaṃ vā sarvasvam. ihāpi tadvad eva. tasmān na nyūnadhanasyādhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13031: caśabdenānvācayaḥ. itaś cādhikaṃ sarvasvam, adhike hi [751]{*6/361*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13032: dīyamāne tadantargatatvād dvādaśaśatam api dattaṃ bhavati, pādavat, yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13033: kārṣāpaṇe dīyamāne pādo 'pi datto bhavati, evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13035: aparimite śiṣṭasya saṃkhyāpratiṣedhas tac chrutitvāt // MS_6,7.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13036: ādhāne śrūyate, ekā deyā, ṣaḍ deyāḥ, dvādaśa deyāḥ, caturviṃśatir deyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13037: śataṃ deyam, sahasraṃ deyam, aparimitaṃ deyam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yat parimitam ekā deyetyevamādi, tan na dātavyam iti pratiṣedho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13038: utāparimitaṃ nāma kiṃcit, tasya dānaṃ vidhīyata iti. kiṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13039: aparimite śrūyamāne brūmaḥ, śiṣṭasyaikādeḥ saṃkhyeyasya yā saṃkhyā, sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040: pratiṣidhyate. kutaḥ. tacchrutitvāt, parimitaśabdaśravaṇād gaṇitam avagamyate. tac caikādikam, tasya naśabdena pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate. tatra śruto 'rthaḥ kṛto bhavati, itarathāparimitaśabde prasiddhis tyajyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13041: lakṣaṇayā bahutvam asyārthaḥ kalpyeta. tasmāt aprimitasya pratiṣedha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13043: kalpāntaraṃ vā syāt. aparo dānakalpo vidhīyate, yathaikā deyeti dānavidhikalpaḥ. evam eṣo 'pi dānavidhikalpa eva syāt. tena{*6/362*} hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:13044: pūrveṇa, tulyam evedaṃ prasaṃkhyāyate. kāsya pūrveṇa tulyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13045: pratijñātasyārthasyāvagamikā [752]{*6/363*} śrutir astīti. pūrvatra hi deyaśabdaśrutyā dānaṃ vidhīyata iti, ihāpi deyaśadaśrutiḥ. sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13046: śrūyamāṇā{*6/364*} śaknoti dānaṃ vidhātum. pratiṣedhe hi vidhīyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:13047: vākyasya{*6/365*} vyāpāraḥ. tac ca durbalaṃ śrutiṃ prati{*6/366*}. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13048: kalpāntaram. yac cāparimitaśabde prasiddhir bādhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13050: nanu nātra prasiddhiḥ, lakṣaṇeyam. yad bahu, tan na śakyaṃ parimātum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13051: tasmād aparimitatvena lakṣyate bahutvam iti. tac ca na, anekasminn aśakyaparimāṇe sati bahuṣu rūḍhaḥ. aparimitam asya dhanam, bahv iti gamyate. yathā, kuśalaḥ, pravīṇa iti. bahuṣu kuśānāṃ lāturguṇeṣu satsu nipuṇatāyām eva kuśalaśabdo rohād rūḍhiśabda{*6/367*} eva bhavati. bahuṣu ca vīṇāv ādasya guṇeṣu satsu nipuṇa eva pravīṇaśabdo vartamāno rūḍha ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:13052: ucyate. tasmāt saty api lakṣaṇātve śrutisāmarthyād rohatiśabdaḥ. tasmāt samudāyaprasiddhyāparimitaśabde 'vayavaprasiddhir bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13055: *{6/362: E1,6; E2: syāt, tulyavat prasaṃkhyānāt. tena}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13061: aparimite kalpānataram iti samadhigatam. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate{*6/368*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13062: kiṃ sahasrād ūnam aparimitam, uta sahasrād adhikam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13063: aniyamo 'viśeṣāt. na kaścid iha bahutve viśeṣa{*6/369*} āsrīyate, sahasrād ūnam adhikaṃ veti. anāśrīyamāṇe yathākṛtaṃ tathā sādhu{*6/370*}. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13069: adhikaṃ vā syād bahvarthatvād itareṣāṃ{*6/372*} saṃnidhānāt // MS_6,7.24
GSP28msbh1-7u:13070: veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. naitad asti, adhikam ūnaṃ vā sahasrād iti. kiṃ tarhi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13071: adhikam eveti. kutaḥ. bahvarthatvād aparimitaśabdasya, bahuṣu hīmaṃ śabdam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13072: upacarantīty etad uktam. bahutvaṃ cāpekṣikam, kiṃcid apekṣya tato 'dhikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13073: bahv ity ucyate. asatyām apekṣāyām apraripūrṇam etat, yathā, putra iti kiṃcid apekṣya bhavati, nānyathā. tatra prakṛtaṃ saṃnihitaṃ cāpekṣya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13074: nirṇayaḥ, sahasraṃ ca saṃnihitam. tasmāt tato 'dhikam aparimitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13078: katham evam. tatrotkṛṣṭaṃ vai aparimitam iti tadūnatāṃ sahasrasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13080: parakṛtipurākalpaṃ ca manuṣyadharmaḥ syād arthāya hy anukīrtanam //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13081: iha parakṛtayaḥ purākalpāś codāharaṇam. yathā, iti ha smāha bakurvāṣṇir māṣān me pacata, na vā eteṣāṃ havir gṛhṇantīti. purākalpaḥ, ulmukair ha sma pūrve samājamustān ha asurā rakṣāṃsi nirjaghnur ityevamādayaḥ. teṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:13082: saṃdehaḥ. kim ete manuṣyadharmā vidhayaḥ, uta tadgotrāṇām. athavā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13083: [754]{*6/373*} arthavādā iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. manuṣyadhamā vidhaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13085: kartṛmanuṣyasaṃbandhakīrtanena kriyā praśastā bhavati. praśastaṃ ca pratipādyam. sa eṣa vidhir eva, anena prakāreṇa. ataḥ parair api manuṣyaiḥ kartavya iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13088: evaṃjātīyakasya vidheḥ pratiṣedho bhavati, tad u{*6/374*} tathā na kuryād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13089: iti, prasaktasya ca pratiṣedho nyāyyaḥ. tasmād api vidhaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13092: nirdeśād vā taddharmaḥ syāt pañcāvattavat // MS_6,7.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13093: manuṣyadharmo 'yaṃ vidhir evaṃjātīyaka iti gṛhyate. tatra tu viśiṣṭagotrāṇāṃ nirdeśāt teṣām eva dharma iti gamyate. stutyā hy ayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13094: kartavya iti jñāyate, sa ca viśiṣṭagotrāṇāṃ śrūyate, tasmāt tadgotrāṇām eva kartavyaḥ, pañcāvattavat, yathā, pañcāvattaṃ jamadagnīnām{*6/375*} iti tadgotrāṇām eva bhavati, evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13097: vidhau tu vedasaṃyogād upadeśaḥ syāt // MS_6,7.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13098: tuśabdād eṣo 'pi pakṣo vyāvartate{*6/376*}. vidhāv eteṣām upadeśaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13099: vidhau vedena stutinirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ, na vidhyāśraye puruṣe. puruṣagrahaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13100: vidhipraśaṃsārtham. vidhir iti kriyāmāha. etasyāḥ [755]{*6/377*} kriyāyā bhāvo yasmād anena puruṣeṇa kriyate, tasmāt sādhur iti. na tv atra puruṣaḥ kriyāsaṃbandhena nirdiśyate, kiṃ tu stotavyatvena. kuta etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13101: stutipadasyānyasyābhāvāt. api ca kriyānirdeśe śrutyā vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13102: kriyāpuruṣasaṃbandhanirdeśe vākyena, ataś ca{*6/378*} durbalam. tasmāt puruṣamātrasya vidhānaṃ prāpnoti, na tadgotrāṇām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13106: arthavādo vā vidhiśeṣatvāt tasmān{*6/379*} nityānuvādaḥ syāt // MS_6,7.30
GSP28msbh1-7u:13107: eṣo 'pi pakṣo vāśabdād vinivṛttaḥ{*6/380*}. nāyaṃ tadgotrāṇāṃ vidhiḥ. na manuṣyamātrasya vā vidhiḥ, vidhir eva veti, ayam arthavādas{*6/381*} tu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13108: kutaḥ. vidhiśeṣatvāt, anyaṃ tv atra vidhim āmananti, parakṛtyudāharaṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:13109: tāvat, tasmād āraṇyam evāśnīyād iti, purākalpodāharaṇe, gṛhapater evāgriṣu nirmathya nirvaperann iti. na ca dvayor vidhyor ekavākyabhāvo 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13110: vidhinā hi saṃbadhyamānayoḥ parakṛtipurākalpavacanayor anyā vacanavyaktiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13111: anyā tu stutyarthapravṛttayoḥ. na cobhayaṃ yaugapadyena saṃbhavati. tasmād arthavāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13118: pañcapañcāśataḥ pañcadaśāḥ, pañcapañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ, pañcapañcāśata ekaviṃśā viśvasṛjāmayanaṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram iti. tatra [756]{*6/383*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13119: saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ ye sahasrāyuṣas teṣām anena adhikāraḥ, uta manuṣyāṇām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13120: yadāpi manuṣyāṇām, tadāpi bahavo vikalpā vakṣyamānāḥ{*6/384*}, athavā divaseṣu saṃvatsaraśabda iti. kiṃ prāptam. sahasrāyuṣāṃ bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13121: kutaḥ. asaṃbhavān manuṣyeṣu, na manuṣyāṇām etāvad āyur vidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13122: gandharvādayas tv etāvad āyuṣa iti bhavati smṛtiḥ. upacāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:13123: 'nyārthadarśanaṃ ca. prajāpatiṃ vai prajāḥ sṛjamānaṃ pāpmā mṛtyur
GSP28msbh1-7u:13124: abhijaghāna, sa tapo 'tapyata sahasrasaṃvatsarān pāpmānaṃ vijihāsann iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13125: vispaṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaram. tasmān na manuṣyāṇām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13129: *{6/384: E1 hat yadāpi manuṣyāṇām, tadāpi bahavo vikalpā vakṣyamānāḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13130: api vā tadadhikārān manuṣyadharmaḥ syāt // MS_6,7.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13131: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. na gandharvādīnām, manuṣyāṇām evādhikāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13132: kutaḥ. tadadhikārāt, manuṣyādhikāraṃ śāstraṃ samadhigatam iti. te hi śaknuvanti kārtsnyena yathoditaṃ vidhim upasaṃhartum iti. āha, nanu naitāvad āyuṣo manuṣyāḥ. ucyate, rasāyanair āyur dīrghaṃ prāpsyantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13134: na rasāyanānām etat{*6/385*} sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam, yena sahasrasaṃvatsaraṃ jīveyuḥ. etāni hy agner vardhakāni, balīpalitasya nāśakāni{*6/386*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13135: svaravarṇaprasādakāni, meghājananāni. naitāvad āyuṣo dātṝṇi dṛśyante. nanu svaravarṇaprasādādidarśanād eva jyogjīvanam{*6/387*} apy anumāsyate. neti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13136: brūmaḥ. kutaḥ. śatāyur vai puruṣa [757]{*6/388*} ity anuvādaḥ. sa{*6/389*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13137: evaṃ jyogjīve{*6/390*} nāvakalpate. atrocyate, śatāny āyur asyeti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13138: vigrahīṣyāmaḥ. naivaṃ saṃkhyāśabdānāṃ samāsa iṣyate. na ca gamakāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:13143: *{6/387: E1: jyogjīvanaṃ cirakālaṃ jīvanam (Glosse einer HS)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13147: na hy etāvad āyuṣā rasāyanānāṃ saṃbandho dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ, na ca saṃbandhādarśane 'numānam asti. nanu sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati. dṛśyante tāvad alpasya sthirabhāvasya kārakāṇi. evam abhyasyamānāni vīryavattamāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:13148: sthiraśarīratām utpādayiṣyanti. śatāyuḥ puruṣa iti saty api vacane,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13149: adhikaṃ jīvanaṃ dṛśyata eveti. atrocyate, nāyam ekāntaḥ, kadācidyām ca yāvantīṃ ca śarīrasthiratām utpādayeyuḥ, na prāg apy adṛṣṭakālām, yathā prakrāmanto 'bhyāsāt prakramāṇāṃ vṛddher yāṃ ca yāvantīṃ ca mātrāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13150: prāpnuvanti, na tv abhyasyantaḥ puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi yojanamātraṃ prakrameyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13151: evam ihāpi saṃbandhābhāvāt sahasrāyuṣṭvaṃ prāpnuyur na veti saṃdigdham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13152: saṃdigdhaṃ cet, sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ na pramāṇam, na cādṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ pramāṇam antreṇa śakyo 'bhyupagantum. tasmād asaṃśayaṃ naitāvad āyuṣaḥ santīti puruṣavacanenoktam. kathaṃ tarhīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13153: sa kulakalpaḥ syād iti kārṣṇājinir ekasminn asaṃbhavāt // MS_6,7.35 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13154: sa manuṣyādhikārapakṣe kulakalpo bhaviṣyatīty evaṃ kārṣṇājinir ācāryo manyate sma. kutaḥ. ekasminn asaṃbhavāt, puruṣāṇām idam anuśāsanam, na caitad ekaḥ śaknoti pārayitum. yathā śakyate, tathā pārayitavyam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13155: gamyamāne, bahavaḥ śaknuvantaḥ pravarteran. anye 'pi tatkulīnā anyenārabdhaṃ samāpayeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13156: api vā kṛtsnasaṃyogād ekasyaiva prayogaḥ syāt // MS_6,7.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13157: śāstraphalaṃ hi prayoktari{*6/391*} samadhigataṃ{*6/392*}, yaś ca kārtsnyena vidhiṃ upasaṃhartuṃ samarthaḥ. sa evādhikriyata iti. tasmān na kulakalpo 'vakalpyate. kathaṃ tarhi. saṃpradāyamātreṇa dharma ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:13158: adhyavasīyate. evaṃ śrūyate, svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya iti. evaṃ tarhy etad
GSP28msbh1-7u:13159: adhyavaseyam, vacanaprāmāṇyād etat karma kurvatām āyur varddhata iti. tac ca na, pramāṇābhāvāt. na hy etasminn arthe vākyam anyad vā pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13160: nanv arthāpattiḥ, anyathānarthakyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, nānarthakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13161: adhyayanād eva hy adṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati. tathā hi sāmānyenādṛṣṭaṃ kalpayitum
GSP28msbh1-7u:13162: laghīyaḥ, na tu karmaṇāyur vardhata iti viśeṣādṛṣṭakalpanā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13164: athocyeta, ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni dīkṣiṣyante, catubhir varṣaiḥ samāpyanta{*6/394*} iti. evam api niyataparimāṇaṃ hīyeta{*6/395*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13165: caturviṃśatiparamāḥ saptadaśāvarāḥ satram āsīrann iti. vacanasya tv ānarthakyaparihārāya parimāṇaṃ hāpayiṣyata iti cet. tad ayuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13166: adhyayanāt phalam asti. tasmān naiṣā kalpaneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13174: vipratiṣedhāt tu guṇyanyataraḥ{*6/397*} syād iti lāvukāyanaḥ // MS_6,7.37
GSP28msbh1-7u:13175: anyataro 'tra gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ syāt. yadi vāsaṃvatsare saṃvatsaraśabdaḥ, yadi vā pañcapañcāśata iti śabdo gauṇa iti. kuta etat. vipratiṣedhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13176: vipratiṣedho hi bhavati, ubhayasmin vihite. katham. vākyaṃ hi bhidyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13177: yadi pañcapañcāśatas trivṛtaḥ, na saṃvatsarāḥ. atha saṃvatsarās trivṛtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13178: na pañcapañcāśataḥ. tasmād virodhād anyatarad vacanaṃ gauṇam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13179: lāvukāyana ācāryo manyate sma. ācāryagrahaṇaṃ pūjārtham, nātmanaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13184: etad uktam, anyatarad gauṇam{*6/399*} iti. tad avadhārayitvayam. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:13185: ucyate, saṃvatsaravacanaṃ gauṇam iti. kutaḥ. vicālitvāt, vicālī hi saṃvatsaraśabdaḥ sāvano 'pi gaṇitadivasakaḥ, śītoṣṇavarṣālakṣaṇo 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13187: pañcapañcāśata ity ayaṃ tu vyaktaparimāṇasyārthasya{*6/400*} vācakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13193: gavāmayane māsāḥ prakṛtāḥ, māseṣu ca saṃvatsaraśabda uktaḥ, yo vai māsaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13194: saṃvatsara iti. tasmāt pañcapañcāśato māsā iti. nanv etasmin pakṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:13195: sahasrasaṃvatsaraśabdo nāvakalpate. ucyate, nāmadheyam etat sahasrasaṃvatsaraśabda [760]{*6/401*} iti, na guṇavidhiḥ. nāmadheyaṃ ca na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13196: vidhīyate, avidhīyamānaṃ ca yena kenacid guṇenāvakalpyate{*6/402*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13197: naiṣo 'pi pakṣo yujyate, atrāpi hi sa eva doṣaḥ, na tāvaj jīvanam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13199: tenaitasmiṃś ca kriyamāṇe 'parisamāpta evāyuḥ{*6/404*} paryupayuktaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13200: tathā cādhyayanād evādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. evaṃ tarhi, dvādaśāhaḥ prakṛtir iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13201: pañcapañcāśato dvādaśāhā bhaviṣyantīti. tathā ca dṛśyate dvādaśa vai rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarasya pratimā iti. tatra sa doṣo na bhaviṣyati. naivam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13202: tatra saṃvatsaraśabdasya sākṣāt pratimāśabdena saṃyogāt{*6/405*}. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13203: pañcapañcāśatas trivṛta ity uktam, trivṛc chabdaś ca dvādaśāhe divase dṛṣṭaḥ, na dvādaśarātre. tasmān naivam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13208: *{6/405: E1 (v.l.): na hy atra saṃvatsaraśabdaḥ sākṣāt, pratimāśabdena
GSP28msbh1-7u:13209: saṃyogāt; naivam, na hy atra rātriśabdaḥ saṃvatsaraśabdasyāpekṣyaḥ pratimāśabdena saṃyogāt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13211: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. na caitad asti, pañcapañcāśato dvādaśarātrā iti. ahāny eva trivṛc chabdenākhyāyante. tasmād ahaḥsu saṃvatsaraśabda
GSP28msbh1-7u:13212: iti. athavā, vāśabdaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ{*6/406*} vyāvartayati, na pañcapañcāśāto māsāḥ. kiṃ tarhi divasāḥ. dvādaśāhe trivṛdahaḥ prakṛtam. tatra saṃvatsaraśabdo dṛśyate. ādityo vā sarva ṛtavaḥ, sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:13213: yadaivodityatha{*6/407*} vasantaḥ, yadā saṃgavo 'tha grīṣmaḥ, yadā madhyaṃdino 'tha varṣā, yadāparāhno 'tha śarat, yadāstamety atha hemantaśiśirāv iti, sarvān ṛtūn ahani saṃpādayati. sarve cartavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ. tasmād āhaḥ [761]{*6/408*} saṃvatsaraśabdenocyate. api ca pañcapañcāśatas trivṛta iti trivṛtāṃ pañcapañcāśattvam. na ca dvādaśarātras trivṛt, ekaṃ hi dvādaśāhe trivṛdahaḥ, na tatra trivṛt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13214: saṃkhyāyā dvādaśarātreṇa mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇyam. trivṛdahaḥ saṃbandhalakṣaṇayā syāt. abhisaṃkhyaṃ trivṛdahaḥ, tena śrutyaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyam, śrutiś ca lakṣaṇāyā jyāyasī. tasmāt pañcapañcāśad ahāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:13219: iṣṭipūrvatvād akratuśeṣo homaḥ saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu syād apūrvo apy ādhānasya sarvaśeṣatvāt // iha caturhotṛṣv āmnāyate, prajākāmaṃ caturhotrā yājayec caturgṛhītam ājyaṃ gṛhītvā caturhotāraṃ vyācakṣīta pūrveṇa graheṇārdhaṃ juhuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13220: taduttareṇārdham{*6/410*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ pavamāneṣṭisaṃskṛteṣu agniṣv evamādayaḥ, uta asaṃskṛteṣv api{*6/411*}. tathā pakṣāntarāśrayaṇam api vakṣyamānaṃ vicārayiṣyate. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. saṃskṛteṣv agniṣv evaṃjātīyako 'kratuśeṣo 'pi homaḥ syāt. yady apy apūrvā darvihomā na kutaścid dharmān ākāṅkṣanti, tathāpy āhavanīyādayo homādīn
GSP28msbh1-7u:13221: ākāṅkṣanti{*6/412*}, yad āhavanīye juhoti, tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatītyevamādibhiḥ śrutibhiḥ. evam iṣṭipūrvatvāt sarvahomānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13228: iṣṭitvena tu saṃstavaś caturhotṝn asaṃskṛteṣu darśayati // MS_6,8.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13229: tuśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. caturhotṛhomā asaṃskṛteṣv agniṣu bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13230: tathā hi darśayati, eṣā vānāhitāgne[763]r{*6/414*} iṣṭir yac caturhotāra
GSP28msbh1-7u:13231: iti, anāhitāgner iṣṭayo na vidyante. ye tv ete caturhotārāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13232: tasyaiṣaiveṣṭir iti, anāhitāgner evaṃjātīyakān homān darśayati. tasmād asaṃskṛteṣu bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13233: nanu liṅgam asādhakam, prāptir vaktavyeti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13236: evaṃ tarhi, akratuśeṣāṇāṃ vidhir eṣā{*6/415*} bhaviṣyati, eṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13237: anāhitāgneḥ{*6/416*} kriyeti. evam arthavadvacanaṃ bhaviṣyati. vādamātram anarthakaṃ bhavati, asya cāsti vidhisāmarthyam. tasmād vidhir asaṃskṛteṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:13243: āha, etad gṛhyate vidhir iti. yat tu, akratuśeṣāṇām iti, tan na, sarveṣāṃ kratuśeṣāṇām akratuśeṣāṇāṃ ca caturhotṛhomānām. kutaḥ. aviśeṣāt, na kratuśeṣāṇām evāyaṃ dharma{*6/417*} ucyate, nākratuśeṣāṇām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13246: *{6/417: E1,6,E2 (v.l.); E2: aviśeṣāt. caturhotṝṇām ayaṃ dharma}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13247: *{6/418: E1,6; E2: na viśeṣaḥ kratuśeṣāṇām akratuśeṣāṇāṃ ceti. tasmāt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13248: api vā kratvabhāvād anāhitāgner aśeṣabhūtanirdeśaḥ // MS_6,8.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13249: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. akratuśeṣāṇām evāyaṃ dharmo na kratuśeṣāṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13250: kutaḥ. anāhitāgneḥ kratvabhāvāt. na hy anāhitāgneḥ kratavaḥ santi. na ca kratvaṅgaṃ kevalaṃ prayujyamānaṃ kasmaicit prayojanāya syāt. na cāsyānyat phalaṃ prakalpyeta{*6/419*}, pramāṇābhāvāt. vacanasya hy anyad api prayojanam asti. na cānena vacanena śakyate 'nāhitāgneḥ kratuḥ kalpayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13255: vāśabdāt pakṣo viparivartate. nāsaṃskṛteṣv agniṣv evaṃjātīyakā homḥāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13256: syuḥ. kutaḥ. ādhānasya sarvaśeṣatvāt{*6/421*}. nanu vacanam idam, eṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13257: anāhitāgner{*6/422*} iṣṭir iti. neti brūmaḥ, japārthavada eṣa bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13258: ye japarūpās teṣām arthavādaḥ{*6/423*}, na sarveṣāṃ caturhotṝṇām, evaṃ yadāhavanīye johotītyevamādīnāṃ vacanānām arthavattā bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13262: *{6/423: E2 (v.l.): ye japas teṣām ayam anuvādaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13263: iṣṭitvena tu saṃstute homaḥ syād anārabhyāgnisaṃyogād itareṣām avācyatvāt // MS_6,8.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13264: yad uktam, eṣā vānāhitatāgneḥ kriyā iṣṭitulyeti japānām eṣa vāda iti. tan
GSP28msbh1-7u:13266: vacanavyaktiḥ. yaiṣānāhitāgneḥ kriyā, seṣṭitulyeti. kiṃ kāraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13267: sādṛśyamātrānuvādo 'narthakaḥ syāt. itarasmin pakṣe vidhir arthavān. yeyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13268: iṣṭiḥ, eṣānāhitāgner iti, tadiṣṭisaṃstavād dhomānām eva vādaḥ. katham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13269: iṣṭir yāgaḥ, sa evāsecanādhiko homaḥ. yad uktam, sarvahomārtha āhavanīya iti. tan na, caturhotṝn evādhikṛtyocyate. kiṃ tv aviśeṣeṇa homān. sa caturhotṛṣv asaṃbhavād anyeṣu bhaviṣyati. caturhotṛṣu cānāhitāgner ucyamāneṣv āhavanīyo nāṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13273: naitad asti, anāhitāgner eva caturhotāra iti. ubhayoḥ syuḥ, pitryajñavat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13274: yathā pitṛyajña āhitāgner anāhitāgneś ca, [765]{*6/425*} evaṃ caturhotāro 'pi. katham avagamyate. varṇitam etat. yadānuvādapakṣaḥ, tadāhitāgneḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13275: yadā vidhipakṣaḥ, tadānāhitāgneḥ. ubhayathā vacanavyaktiḥ pratīyate. na ca pratīyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyate 'pahnotum. tasmād ubhayoś caturhotāra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13278: na caitad asti, ubhayoś{*6/426*} caturhotāro bhaveyur iti. katham. eṣa hy anāhitāgninirdeśaḥ. eṣā veṣṭir anāhitāgner iti vacanenādhikṛtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13279: nāhitāgniḥ, nirdeśasāmarthyāt. arthavāde copakṣīṇaṃ tatraiva na virudhyata iti. yadāhavanīye juhotīti vacanaṃ na caturhotṝn evādhikṛtyocyata ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:13284: atha yad uktam, pitṛyajñavad iti, yuktaṃ pitṛyajñe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13285: tatrāhitāgnisaṃyuktasya punar etadvacanaṃ bhavati, apy anāhitāgninā kārya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13286: iti. etadvacanam anāhitāgner apīty anāhitāgnāv anvāhāryakaṃ karoti{*6/427*}, iha tathā nāsti vacanam. niyogata eko nirdeśaḥ, eṣā vānāhitāgner iti. nātrāpiśabdo 'sti. tasmāt pitṛyajñenātulyam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13290: idam āmananti, upanayaṃs tisṛbhir juhuyād iti. tatra [766]{*6/428*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13291: saṃdehaḥ. kim ayaṃ homa ādhānasaṃskṛteṣv agniṣu, utāsaṃskṛteṣv iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13292: prāptam. uapanayann ādadhīteti. kutaḥ{*6/429*}. homasaṃyogād āhavanīyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13293: yad āhavanīye juhoti, tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti. tasmād ādhānottarakālā ete homā iti sthitiḥ{*6/430*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13295: *{6/429: E1,6; E2: ādadhīteti. saṃskṛteṣv iti. kutaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13298: na caitad asti, ādhāyaivaṃjātīyakaṃ hotavyam iti. kiṃ tarhi. laukika eva pravarteteti. kutaḥ. vidyākarmānupūrvatvāt. vidyāgrahaṇārthā ime homāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13299: vidyāvataś cādhānenādhikāraḥ{*6/431*}, sāmarthyāt. ata ādhānottarakālatā naiṣām avakalpate, yathā sthapatīṣṭyām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13303: ādhānaṃ ca bhāryāsaṃyuktaṃ śrūyate. vidyāgrahaṇottarakālaś ca dārasaṃgrahaḥ. tasmād api nāvakalpate pūrvakālatādhānasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13304: akarma cordhvam ādhānāt tatsamavāyo hi karmabhiḥ // MS_6,8.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13305: tatrāha, yā pūrvam ādhānād dārakriyā, sā karmārthā bhaviṣyati, vacanāc cordhvam ādhānāt, apatyārthā. dvayor api kālayoḥ, piṇḍapitṛyajñavan naiṣa doṣo bhaviṣyatīti. atrocyate, akarma ca dārakriyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13307: bhavati, svārthaṇ ca [767]{*6/433*} agnaya ādhātavyā iti niyamaḥ. tasmād ubhayasminn api kāle dārasaṃgraha ity etat nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13311: naivam, śrutivipratiṣedho hi bhavati, evaṃ kriyamāṇe dārakarmaṇi
GSP28msbh1-7u:13312: vidyāgrahaṇottarakālaṃ śrūyamāṇam, pūrvaṃ kriyata iti vipratiṣiddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13313: arthād anyad evedam iti cet. na, arthaprāptasyaiva kālaniyama eṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13314: upanayanaṃ ca karmārtham. tad dvitīyasyāṃ vipratiṣidhyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13315: sarvārthatvāc ca putrārtho na prayojayet // MS_6,8.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13316: athocyate, prāgādhānāc ca, karmārthaiva, ūrdhvaṃ cāpatyārthaivāsya bhaviṣyati. tenaivaṃ saty asya na kiṃcid virotsyata iti. ucyate, naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:13317: evam. svārthā hi sā, na kevalam apatyārthatām eṣyati. tad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13318: phalotsāhāviśeṣād iti. tasmād api na dvir dārasaṃgrahaḥ. api caivaṃ smaryate, dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nāticaritavyeti. evaṃ saty aticaritā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13319: syāt. ato na{*6/434*} dvir dārasaṃgrahaḥ. ekaiva bhāryā karmārthāpatyārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13320: ca. tasyāś ca vidyāgrahaṇottarakālatā. ato nādhānasaṃskṛteṣv ete homā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13323: somapānāt tu prāpaṇaṃ dvitīyasya tasmād upayacchet{*6/436*} // MS_6,8.18
GSP28msbh1-7u:13324: gṛhyata etat, prāgupanayanān nāsti patnīti. yad uktam ekaiva patnīti. tan na mṛṣyate, yathaiva smṛtiḥ, dharme cārthe ca kāme ca nāticaritavyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13325: dharmaprajāsaṃpanne dāre nānyāṃ kurvīteti ca. evam idam api smaryata eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13326: anyatarāpāye 'nyāṃ kurvīteti. tasmād yasya na dharmasaṃpannā, na prajāsaṃpannā vā patnī, so 'nyāṃ kurvīteti. somapānād iti cārthavādaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13327: vyapadiśati sma. somapo na dvitīyāṃ jāyām abhyaṣūyata iti dvitīyām api jāyāṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13330: pitṛyajñe tu darśanāt prāgādhānāt pratīyeta // MS_6,8.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13331: atha kathaṃ pitṛyajñasya dvau kālāv iti. ucyate, vacanaṃ hi tatra dṛśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13332: apyanāhitāgninā kāry iti. tasmāt prāgādhānāt pitṛyajña iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13333: sthapatīṣṭiḥ prayājavad agnyādheyaṃ prayojayet tādarthyāc cāpavṛjyeta //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13334: asti sthapatīṣṭiḥ, etayā niṣādasthapitaṃ yājayeteti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kim ādhānasaṃskṛteṣv agniṣu syāt, uta laukikeṣv iti. kiṃ prāptam. saṃskṛteṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:13335: iti. katham. [769]{*6/437*} yadāhavanīye juhotītyevamādivacanāt. nanu śūdrasyāhavanīyābhāvān nāsti tasya śrutir iti. ucyate, sā hy āhavanīyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13336: prayojayet, yathā prayājān aśrutān prayojayati. evaṃ codakasāmarthyād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13337: tādarthyāc cāpavṛjyeta. sthapatīṣṭyarthaṃ cāhitā agnayaḥ. tasyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:13338: apavṛktāyām{*6/438*} apavṛjyeran. dhāraṇaṃ hi teṣāṃ dṛṣṭakāryam āmnātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13342: api vā laukike 'gnau syād ādhānasyāsarvaśeṣatvāt // MS_6,8.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13343: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. laukikeṣv agniṣu syān na saṃskṛteṣu. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13344: ādhānasyāsarvaśeṣatvāt. sarvakarmaśeṣabhūtā agnayaḥ, tadaṅgam ādhānam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13345: karmāṅgam. śrutyādīnām abhāvān na karmaprayuktādhānasya, vākyasāmarthyāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:13346: cāgniprayuktatvam. yac ca darśapūrṇamāsaprayuktam, tac codakena prāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13347: na dravyaprayuktam. tasmāl laukikeṣv agniṣu sthapatīṣṭir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13349: asty avakīrṇipaśuḥ, brahmacāryavakīrṇī nairṛtaṃ gardabham ālabheteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13350: tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ tadartham ādhānaṃ kartavyam, uta laukikeṣv agniṣu tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:13351: varteteti. avakīrṇipaśuś ca [770]{*6/439*} tadvad ity adhikaraṇātideśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13352: pūrvasyādhikaraṇasya yaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ{*6/440*}, so 'tra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13353: yaḥ siddhāntaḥ, sa siddhāntaḥ. sarvārtham ādhānam, tasmād āhitāgniṣv iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13354: pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. ādhānasyāprāptakālatvād iti siddhāntaḥ. aprāpto 'yam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13355: ādhānasya kāla ity etad uktam. tasmād idam api karma laukikeṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13359: daivāni karmāṇy udāharaṇam upanayanaprabhṛtīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kim aniyate kāle daivāni kartavyāni, utodagayanapūrvapakṣāhaḥ puṇyāheṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13360: aniyata iti prāpte, udagayanādiṣv ity ucyate. kutaḥ. evaṃ smaranti, teṣu kāleṣu daivānīti. rūpārthavādaś ca. etad vai{*6/441*} devānāṃ rūpam, yad
GSP28msbh1-7u:13361: udagayanam, pūrvapakṣo 'ha iti{*6/442*}. na ca vayaṃ devādīnāṃ rūpam vidmaḥ. atha tv eṣu kāleṣu daivāni kriyante, tata etena{*6/443*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13362: saṃbandhena rūpavacanam avakalpate. anyārthaṃ ca vākyam etad darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13363: pūrvāhno vai devānām, madhyaṃdino manuṣyāṇām, aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13364: tasmād eteṣu kāleṣu daivāni syur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13370: ahani ca viśeṣaḥ, sakalaṃ karmāhany eva śakyate kartum iti, na rātrau kariṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13377: idaṃ samāmnāyate jyotiṣṭome, dvādaśa rātrīr dīkṣito bhṛtiṃ vanvīteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13378: tathā somaṃ krīṇātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yasya na vidyate bhṛtiḥ, tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:13379: vanitavyā, yasya ca na vidyate somaḥ, tena kretavyaḥ, utobhathāpi{*6/446*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13380: sati cāsati ca. kiṃ prāptam. yāñcākrayaṇam avidyamāne bhṛtidhane some ca syāt. kasmāt. dravyasadbhāvārthaṃ{*6/447*} yāñcākrayaṇam, tad{*6/448*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13381: vidyamāne 'narthakam. anarthakaṃ coktam api na kartavyam. tasmād avidyamāne bhavet, lokavat. yathā{*6/449*} yasya loke nāsti dravyam, sa yācate krīṇāti ca. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13383: *{6/446: E1,6; E2: utobhayathāpi; E2 (v.l.): utobhayam api}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13385: *{6/448: E1,6; E2: yāñcākrayaṇam arthavad bhaviṣyati. tad}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13388: niyataṃ vā yāñcākrayaṇam, tad vidyamāne 'vidyamāne ca dravye syāt. evaṃ yāñcākrayaṇam arthavad bhavati{*6/450*}. jyotiṣṭomaprayuktaṃ hi tac
GSP28msbh1-7u:13389: chrūyate, na dravyaprayuktam. tac ca nityaṃ jyotiṣṭomasya. naivaṃ vacanaṃ bhavati, yadā dravyaṃ nāsti, tadā kartavyam iti. [772]{*6/451*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13390: jyotiṣṭomasya ca nityam aṅgam uktam, dravyābhāvo nimittam uktam iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13391: parikalpyeta, kalpanāyāṃ śabdo bādhyeta. ato yāñcākrayaṇasaṃskṛtaṃ dravyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13392: ihopayoktavyam, anyathā vaiguṇyaṃ bhavati. tasmāt sati cāsati ca dravye yāñcākrayaṇam anuṣṭātavyam iti. atha yad uktam, lokavad iti. loke karma arthalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati, na śabdalakṣaṇam, yathārthaḥ, tathā kriyate. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13393: yathā śabdaḥ. vede tu śabdenaivārtho 'vagamyate, tathaivānuṣṭheyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13398: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, payo vrataṃ brāhmaṇasya yavāgū rājanyasya, āmikṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13399: vaiśyasyeti. tathā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ praiṣaḥ, prokṣaṇīr āsādaya, idhmaṃ bahir upasādaya srucaḥ saṃmṛḍḍhi{*6/452*} patnīṃ saṃnahyājyenodehīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13400: tathā vājapeye śrūyate, darbhamayaṃ vāso bhavatīti. paśau saṃjñaptahomaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13401: yat paśur māyum akṛtoro{*6/453*} vā padbhir āhata agnir mā tasmād enaso viśvān muñcatvaṃ hasa iti. tathā, yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13403: teṣu saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yasyāparaṃ bhojanaṃ na vidyate, sa payo vratayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13404: yavāgūm āmikṣāṃ vā, uta{*6/454*} vidyamāne 'pīti. tathā yo preṣitaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13405: praiṣārthaṃ na pratipadyate, sa preṣitavyaḥ, uta pratipadyamāno 'pīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13406: tathā, yasya sūtramayaṃ vāso nāsti, sa darbhamayaṃ paridadhīta, uta vidyamāne 'pīti. tathā, yasya paśur māyum kuryāt, uro vā pādau vā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13407: hanyāt{*6/455*}, sa etena mantreṇa juhuyāt, utānyo 'pīti. tathā, yo dveṣṭi kiṃcit, [773]{*6/456*} anyena ca dviṣyate, sa eva mantraṃ brūyāt, yo 'smān
GSP28msbh1-7u:13409: tatrādhikaraṇātideśo 'yam. tatra yaḥ pūrvasminn adhikaraṇe pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13410: sa iha pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yas tatra siddhāntaḥ, sa iha siddhāntaḥ. avidyamāne kuryād iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. niyataṃ vārthavattvād{*6/457*} ity uttaraḥ. sa evātra nyāyaḥ, yaḥ pūrvatra{*6/458*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13412: *{6/452: E1,6; E2: sruvaṃ ca srūvaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13414: *{6/454: E1,6; E2: vratayet, sa preṣitavyaḥ, uta}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13419: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, madhyaṃdine 'pararātre vā{*6/459*} vrataṃ vratayatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13420: tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ niyatam apararātre vratam, utāniyatam iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13421: prāptam. niyataṃ cārthavattvāt{*6/460*} syād iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13422: anarthakaṃ tv anityaṃ syāt. yadaivam manyeta, asmin kāle vrataṃ me
GSP28msbh1-7u:13423: jariṣyatīti, tadā vratayet. yadā tu khalu manyeta, na samyag jariṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13424: tadā tadvrataṃ kriyamāṇam anarthakaṃ syāt. yadi hy ajīrṇena yajamāno
GSP28msbh1-7u:13425: mriyeta, tadā tantralopaḥ, tantralope ca sarvalopaḥ. tasmād{*6/461*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13426: aniyataṃ{*6/462*} tasmin kāle vrataṃ vratayitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13430: *{6/461: E1,2,E2 (v.l.); E2: tadā sarvatantralopaḥ syāt. tasmād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13433: jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ, yo{*6/463*} dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ yaḥ kaścit paśur
GSP28msbh1-7u:13434: ā[774]{*6/464*}lambhīyaḥ, uta chāga iti. vakṣyamāṇenābhiprāyeṇa bhavati saṃśayaḥ. nanv ekeṣām āmnāyate, ajo 'gnīṣomīya iti. sarvaśākhāpratyayaṃ caikaṃ karmeti. atrocyate, pratiśākhaṃ bhinnāni karmāṇīti kṛtvā cintā. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. paśucodanāyām aniyamaḥ. utsarge kartavye dravyaṃ śakyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:13435: utsraṣṭum, na paśutvam. dravyaṃ hi sādhakam. ato 'tra dravyam antreṇotsargo na saṃbhavatīti dravyam upādīyate. tasminn upādīyamāne 'niyamaḥ, yatkiṃcid utsraṣṭavyam iti. kuta etat. aviśeṣāt. na hi paśutvasaṃbaddheṣu kaścid viśeṣa upalabhyate. tasmād yaḥ kaścit paśur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13439: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad asti. yatra kvacana dravye paśutvam upādeyam iti. asty utsraṣṭavyasya niyamakāraṇaṃ mantravarṇaḥ. agnaye chāgasya vayāyā{*6/465*} medaso 'nubrūhīti, chāgaprakāśanasamartho mantravarṇaḥ samāmnāyate. yadi chāgo nopādeyaḥ, tatas tatprakāśanasamarthasyopādānam anarthavat. tenāvagamyate, chāgam adhikṛtyotsargaṃ vidadhātīti. māntravarṇiko dravyaniyamavidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13441: *{6/465: E1; E2: mantravarṇaḥ. chāgasya vapāyā; E6: mantravarṇaḥ. agnaye chāgasya vapāyā}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13443: naitad evam. na śaknoti mantravarṇaś codanāyāṃ pratyarthinyāṃ dravyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13444: niyantum. yatra hi dravyasya prakāśakaṃ na śrūyate, tatrāprakāśitam eva tat kartavyam iti. tasmān na mantravarṇāt prakāśyaniyamavidhiḥ kalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13445: evam atra prakāśyaṃ prakāśayitavyam iti. [775]{*6/466*} atra punaḥ śabdenāvagamyate, paśutvena prakāśayitavyam iti. tasmān na mantravarṇas
GSP28msbh1-7u:13447: prayogavacanaśrutiḥ{*6/467*}. iha kḷptā prayogavacanenopasaṃhartavyā. anya eva paśuśabdasyārthaḥ paśutvam. anyo mantravarṇena niyamyate chāgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13448: tasmān na mantravarṇaś codanāvirodhena niyantum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13452: iti cet paśyasi, na paśutvam anyebhyaḥ paśubhya ācchetavyam iti. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13453: ārṣeyaṃ vṛṇīte, trīn vṛṇīta iti, sāmānyaśrutis triṣv evāvatiṣṭhata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13454: tritvaṃ viśeṣo{*6/468*} vivakṣito nānye vivakṣitā iti. evam ihāpi paśutvam, chāgaṃ prakalpayitum vivakṣitam, nānyān viśeṣān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13458: naitad evam. tatra hy acoditaṃ dravyam utsraṣṭavyam, mantravarṇe. varaṇe punaś coditam. tatra tritvasaṃkhyāsaṃbandhasya varaṇe coditatvāt, nānyā saṃkhyā kriyate. ārṣeyaśabdād api nānārṣeyam. triśabdasya hi tatsāmarthyam, yenārṣeyaśabdo viśiṣṭasaṃkhyāviṣayo niyamyate. iha na mantrasya sāmarthyam. tasmād aniyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13459: niyamo vaikāryaṃ hy arthabhedād bhedaḥ pṛthaktvenābhidhānāt // MS_6,8.35
GSP28msbh1-7u:13460: niyamo vā. aikārthyaṃ hi paśuchāgaśabdayoḥ, sāmānyaṃ paśur iti, chāgādayo viśeṣā ucyante. katham. taiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt, paśuś chāgaḥ, paśur
GSP28msbh1-7u:13461: uṣṭraḥ, paśur meṣaḥ, paśur usra iti. evaṃ sati na mantravarṇaḥ paśuśabdena virudhyate. tena chāgo [776]{*6/469*} 'py ālabdhavyaś coditaḥ. mantravarṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:13462: upādīyamāne, idam avagamyate. chāgaṃ vivakṣitvāyaṃ paśuśabda uccarita iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13463: nānyān viśeṣān iti. chāgopakaraṇam asyopadaṃśitam. yad upadaṃśane paśuśabdaś chāgābhiprāya iti gamyate, yathā yugavaratra upadaṃśite{*6/470*}, īṣācakrādisaṃnidhāne ced{*6/471*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13464: akṣamānayety{*6/472*} ucyate{*6/473*}, tadā, yānākṣam adhikṛtya brūta iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13465: gamyate, na tu videvanākṣam iti. yadi hy arthabhedo bhavet
GSP28msbh1-7u:13466: paśuchāgaśabdayoḥ, pṛthaktvenābhidhānam, tato bhedaḥ syāt, na chāga eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:13467: niyamyeta. avihitaś chāgārtha ity aśvopādānam. api ca chāgapakṣe taṃ mantravarṇaḥ prakāśayet. chāgārthābhidhāne punaḥ paśuśabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13468: chāgaprāptāv anyeṣām aprāptir ity anyasmin prāpte liṅgena niyamaḥ kriyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:13476: aniyamo vā. yaḥ kaścit paśur upādeyaḥ, arthāntaratvāt. arthāntaraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13477: paśutvam, arthāntaraṃ chāgatvam, arthayor atra sāmānādhikaraṇyam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13478: śabdayoḥ. kathaṃ punar arthāntaraṃ gamyate. vyatirekāc chabdabhedāc ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13479: vyatireko{*6/474*} hi bhavati, kaścit paśur na chāgaḥ. tathā chāgaḥ paśur
GSP28msbh1-7u:13480: iti śabdabhedaḥ. śabdabhedād evārthabhedo nyāyyaḥ. ekasmin vākye samavāyāt, paśuṃ chāgam ānayeti. itarathā, anyatareṇa kṛtārthatvād anyataro vākye na samaveyāt, samavaiti ca. tasmād anyat paśutvam, anyac
GSP28msbh1-7u:13481: chāgatvam. tasmād aniyamaḥ, yaḥ kaścit paśur upādeya iti{*6/475*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13482: tatrotsūtrikā{*6/476*} pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ, anyatve 'pi sati niyama eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13483: [777]{*6/477*} kutaḥ. mantrasya prayogavacanena gṛhītatvāt. mantrasādhanaṃ hi karmeti gamyate. yadi chāgam upādāsyāmahe, saguṇaṃ karma śakṣāmaḥ{*6/478*} kartum, mantram upādadānāḥ, mantrasyāpākṣikatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13484: athānyam upādāsyāmahe, mantrasya viṣayābhāvān mantram apajahato na saguṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13485: karma nirvartayema, ato{*6/479*} na ca śrutiṃ bādhāmahe, anyasmin paśuśabdo vartata iti. na cānyam{*6/480*} upādāsyāmahe, vaiguṇyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13487: nanv aśvam upādadānā{*6/481*} naiva mantravarṇam apahāsyāmaḥ. sa evāśvaś chāgo bhaviṣyati. yaś chinnagamano 'śvaḥ, sa chāgaḥ, chider gameś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:13491: *{6/475: E2 läßt hier MS 6.8.37 folgen, die Zählung verschiebt sich gegenüber E1/6 demnach um eine Nummer. MS 6.8.37 (nach E2): na vā prayogasamavāyitvāt}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13499: kvacin{*6/484*} muṣkarā bhaviśyantīti śrūyate. yady antareṇa vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13500: amuṣkarās tadedam upapadyate. tasmāc chinnagamano 'śvo 'pi chāga iti karmākhyā bhaviṣyati{*6/485*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13505: chāge karmākhyā rūpaliṅgābhyāṃ nāvakalpate. na hi chāgaśabdaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:13506: chinnagamanavacanaḥ, samudāyo hy asau pṛthag arthāntare prasiddhaḥ, nāsāv avayavaprasiddhyā bādhitavyaḥ. tasmān nāśvaś chāgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13509: idam anyapadottaraṃ{*6/488*} sūtram. atha kasmān na vayovacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:13510: [778]{*6/489*} bhavati vayovacanā hy ete śabdāḥ, chāgaś chāgalo vatsa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13511: tenāśvo 'pi vayovacano bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate, naitad evam, satyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13512: vayovacanaḥ. ajāpatigataṃ{*6/490*} tu vayo vaditum śaknoti, yathā śoṇa iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13513: varṇavacano 'śvajātigataṃ varṇaṃ vadati, nānyam. tasmād rūpānyatvān na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13514: vayomātravacanaḥ, kiṃ tu jātiśabdaḥ syāt. jātyāśrayaṃ vayo vadet. ataś chāga eva niyamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13519: idam api padottaram. ihāśvādīnāṃ vikāraś chāgaśabdaḥ. kiṃcid atrāśvādīnām uccāryate, na{*6/493*} kiṃcid anyad eva. tasmād āśvo 'pi chāga iti. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13520: utpattikatvāt{*6/494*}. autpattiko hi nāmināmnoḥ saṃbandha ity uktam{*6/495*}, nākhyāvikāraḥ saṃbhavatīti. tasmān nāśvaś chāgaḥ. ataś chāga evopādātvaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13529: padottaram evedaṃ sūtram. atha kasmān na chidranimittaś chāgaśabdo bhavati. evaṃ śrūyate, śuṣiro{*6/497*} vā etarhi paśuḥ. yarhi vapām utkhadantīti{*6/498*}. nety ucyate, chidratvasya guṇasya paśor
GSP28msbh1-7u:13530: acoditatvāt. avyaṅgaṃ paśum ālabheteti hi codyate. tasmād acchidraḥ paśuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13531: na cāvayavaprasiddhyā samudāyaprasiddhir bādhyata ity uktam eva. tasmāc chāga evopādeyo nāśvādaya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13537: bādhyate. tasmāj jāter eva chāgaśabdo vācakaḥ. evaṃ samudāyasyārthavattānugṛhītā bhaviṣyatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13538: upapadyate. viśveṣāṃ devānām usrāṇāṃ chāgānāṃ meṣāṇāṃ vapānāṃ medaso
GSP28msbh1-7u:13539: 'nubrūhīti jātiprāye vacanam upapadyate. prāyeṇāpi hi niyamaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13540: yathā, agryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvāgnyo 'yam iti buddhir bhavati. tasmāc chāga evopādātavya iti. kṛtvācintāyāṃ prayojanaṃ na vaktavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13544: śrutipramāṇatvāc cheṣāṇāṃ mukhyabhede yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13545: pūrveṇādhyāyaṣaṭkena pratyakṣavihitadharmaṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ darśapūrṇamāsādīnām itikartavyatā cintitā. uttareṇedānīm avihitetikartavyatākeṣv aindrāgnādiṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:13546: cintayitum iṣyate. tatra yadi darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ prakaraṇe ye vihitā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13547: dharmāḥ, te sarvakarmasu vihitā bhavanti, tatas tair eva dharmair aindrāgnādayo 'pi dharmavanta uktāḥ, tathā kartavyāś ceti. nārtha uttareṇa ṣaṭkena. atha ye yasya prakaraṇa ucyante, te tatraivoktā bhavanti, tato
GSP28msbh1-7u:13548: 'dharmakāṇy aindrāgnīdīni. teṣu{*7/1*} cintā bhavati, kim eṣāṃ dharmāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13549: santi, uta neti. yadā ca santi, tadā ke kiyanto vā kathaṃ cānuṣṭātavyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13550: iti. tad artham uttaraḥ ṣaṭkaḥ pravartanīyaḥ{*7/2*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13551: tatra saptamena tāvat santi dharmā ity ucyate. aṣṭamena ceme 'syeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13552: itthaṃ prayoktavyā iti navamena. daśam aikādaśadvādaśair etāvantaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13554: tatredaṃ vicāryate, kiṃ yajiprayuktā ete dharmāḥ, kathaṃ yajir guṇavān
GSP28msbh1-7u:13555: syād ity evam artham āmnāyante, āhosvid apūrvaprayuktāḥ. katham apūrvaṃ syād iti. yadi yajiprayuktāḥ, [2]{*7/3*} tataḥ sarvārthāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13556: athāpūrvaprayuktāḥ, tato yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhante. kiṃ punar atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:13557: yuktam. apūrvaprayuktā iti. apūrvaṃ hi phalavat. aphalo yajiḥ. phalavati ca prayāso vidhīyamāno 'rthavān bhavati. tasmād apūrvaprayuktā dharmāḥ{*7/4*}. ataḥ paramācāryasya sūtropanyāsaḥ, śrutipramāṇatvāc cheṣāṇāṃ mukhyabhede yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syād iti. mukhyāny apūrvāṇi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13558: tāni hi phalavattvāt pradhānāni, pradhāne ca mukhyaśabdaḥ. teṣāṃ bheda uktaḥ śabdāntarādibhir hetubhiḥ. tasmin mukhyabhede sati yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt, śeṣāṇām. ye yasyāpūrvasyādhikāre prakaraṇe{*7/5*} śiṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13559: te tasyaiva bhaveyuḥ. śrutipramāṇatvād ayam asyāpūrvasya śeṣaḥ, ayam asyety atra śrutir eva pramāṇaṃ kramate. na pratyakṣādīnām anyatamat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13560: śrutyā ca ye yasya prakaraṇe śrūyante, te tasyaiva bhavitum arhanti. na cānyasyokto 'rtho 'nyasya bhavati. na hi yad devadattasya grāmāc chādanādikam, tad yajñadattasya bhavati. tasmād yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavasthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13568: atha vā, naitad evam, yathāprakaraṇaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthā iti. kiṃ tarhi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13569: aikadharmyaṃ syād iti, samānadharmatā. sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthāḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13570: utpattyarthāvibhāgāt. utpattir iti yajiṃ brūmaḥ, apūrvasyotpādanāt. artha ity apūrvaṃ brūmaḥ, yajiprayojanatvāt. tayor avibhāgaḥ. sarvāṇy apūrvāṇi yajimanti. yajisaṃyogena dharmāḥ śiṣyante, yajetety uktvoktāḥ. te yajau na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13571: saṃbhavanti, tasyāphalatvāt. [3]{*7/7*} tatrāsaṃbhavantas tatsaṃbaddheṣv apūrveṣu vijñāyante. sa ca yajisaṃbandhaḥ sarveṣām apūrvāṇāṃ tulyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13573: satvadharmāḥ{*7/9*}, gaur na padā praṣṭavya{*7/10*} iti gotvasaṃbandhena śrūyamāṇās tatrāsaṃbhavantas tatsaṃbaddheṣu piṇḍeṣu vijñāyante, tasya ca gotvasaṃbandhasyāviśeṣāt sarvagavīṣu śuklanīlakapilakapotikāsu bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13575: ucyate, viṣama upanyāsaḥ. tatra gosāmānyasaṃbandhena dharmā vidhīyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13576: gaur na padā praṣṭavya{*7/11*} iti. iha punar yajiviśeṣasaṃbandhena dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13578: viśiṣṭayajisaṃbaddha evāpūrve bhavitum arhanti, na sarvatreti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:13579: brūmaḥ, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajetettham iti{*7/13*}. yadi yajir vidhīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13580: na dharmaiḥ saṃbadhyeta. na hi dvayor vidhīyamānayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandho
GSP28msbh1-7u:13581: bhavati. anuvādaś ca sann aviśeṣāt sarvayāgānuvādaḥ. tasmāt sarvathā dharmāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13582: nanu darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo viśeṣako bhaviṣyati. na darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaḥ śaknoti yāgaṃ viśeṣṭum. ayaṃ hi vidhir vā syād anuvādo vā. yadānuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13583: tadā dharmasaṃbandhārthaḥ. sa ca dharmasaṃbandho yāgānuvādenaiva tayoḥ siddhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13584: nanu nivṛttikaro bhaviṣyati, darśapūrṇamāsāv evetthaṃ kuryān nānyān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13585: naivaṃ śakyam. yat kāraṇam, na tasyānyanivṛttiḥ arthaḥ. nanu parisaṃkhyayā kariṣyati. nātra parisaṃkhyā yujyate. yady anyena vākyena yāgamātre dharmaprasaṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ{*7/14*} syāt, tata etat punarvacanaṃ parisaṃkhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13586: kuryāt. atha punar asati prasaṅge 'nenaiva prasaṅgo 'nenaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:13587: nivṛttir{*7/15*} ity atibhāra ekasyaiva vākyasya bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13588: [4]{*7/16*} evaṃ tarhi, nātra yajeteti śabdo dharmavidhibhiḥ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13589: yajetettham iti. kena tarhi. darśapūrṇamāsaśabdena. pratyakṣo hi tenāsya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13590: saṃyogaḥ, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti, parokṣo dharmavidhibhiḥ. kas tadā vākyārthaḥ. darśapūrṇamāsau kuryād iti. naivaṃ śakyam. evaṃ sati dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13591: asaṃbaddhāḥ pāriplavā bhavanti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. yeyam ākhyātikī vibhaktiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13592: yajeteti, sā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kartavyatāṃ vidadhāti. tatra kathaṃ yāgamātreṇa yāgaviśeṣeṇa vā dharmasaṃbandhaḥ syāt. vidhāyikā vibhaktir nāstīty asaṃbaddhā dharmā bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13593: naiṣa doṣaḥ. na vayaṃ vākyena dharmāṇāṃ saṃbandhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ. kena tarhi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13594: prakaraṇena. katham. kartavyatāyāṃ coditāyām itikartavyatākāṅkṣā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13595: kathaṃ kuryād iti. prakaraṇena dharmāḥ saṃbadhyanta itthaṃ kuryād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13596: naivaṃ śakyam. yadā hi darśapūrṇamāsau kartavyatayā codyate{*7/17*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13598: asatyāṃ cetikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ prakaraṇam eva nāsti. evaṃ hy uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13600: evaṃ tarhi, naivātra yāge dharmā vidhīyante. nāpi darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kartavyatocyate. kiṃ tarhi. darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti padadvayena
GSP28msbh1-7u:13601: viśiṣṭaṃ yāgam anūdyātra dharmā vidhīyante, darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajetettham iti. evam api darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity anuvādo na yujyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13602: tṛtīyārthasyāsiddhatvāt. pūrvān anuvādo bhavati, apūrvaś ca tṛtīyārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13603: so 'vaśyaṃ vidhātavyaḥ. tasmiṃś ca vidhīyamāne 'nyad evāsaṃbaddham
GSP28msbh1-7u:13604: āpadyate, darśapūrṇamāsau yajeḥ karaṇam iti. tasmāt sa eva prathamaḥ pakṣo 'stu, yāgānuvādena dharmāṇāṃ vidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13605: nanu tatrāpi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity etan na saṃbadhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13606: [5]{*7/20*} nanu saṃbhantsyate. kālavacanaḥ san prāyiko nityānuvādo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13607: bhaviṣyati. prāyeṇa yāgānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsakālatvāt. tṛtīyā ca kālasyārthakṛtaṃ guṇabhāvam ālocyopapadyate. tathā cet sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthāḥ bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13615: *{7/13: E2 und E6 lesen: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajetety atra na śakyante yāgaviśeṣe dharmā vidhātum. kiṃ kāraṇam. yadā yajau dharmā vidhīyante tadā yajir anūdyate. yajetettham iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13621: codanāśeṣabhāvād vā tadbhedād vyavatiṣṭherann utpatter guṇabhūtatvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13622: karmacodanāyāḥ śeṣabhūto dharmasamāmnāya ekadeśabhūta ity arthaḥ{*7/21*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:13623: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta, anayāgnyavādhānādikayetikartavyatayeti. tasyāṃ codanāyāṃ yajer guṇabhāvaḥ śrūyate, darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13624: yajivacanaḥ{*7/22*}. karaṇabhāvo 'tra yajeḥ śrūyate. darśapūrṇamāsākhyena yāgasamudāyenānyat kuryād iti. yat tato 'nyat, tatkartavyatayā codyate, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13626: nanu phalam atra vākye śrūyate, svargakāmo yateta{*7/23*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13627: tatkartavyaṃ syāt. satyaṃ śrūyate, na tu tadyajinā kriyate. vinaṣṭe yajau tad bhavati. apūrvaṃ tu tena kriyate. tasmāt tasya kartavyatā ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13628: yasya kartavyatā, tad itikartavyatayā saṃbadhyate. tasmād apūrvārthā dharmāḥ. teṣāṃ cāpūrvāṇāṃ bhedaḥ{*7/24*}. atas tadbhedād yathāprakaraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13630: athaitasmin pakṣe kathaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdena yāgo viśeṣyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13632: apūrvabhāvanaivobhayapadaviśiṣṭocyate{*7/25*}. yathāruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇāti{*7/26*} iti. viṣama upanyāsaḥ. tatra hy anyad dravyam, anyo guṇaḥ. tena tatrobhayaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ iha punar yāgaḥ eva tau darśapūrṇamāsau. tenehobhayaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ{*7/28*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13633: [6]{*7/29*} na yujyate. ucyate, ihāpi yajeteti sāmānyam, darśapūrṇamāsāv iti viśeṣaḥ, anyac ca sāmānyam anyo viśeṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13634: evam api śrutyā sāmānyena{*7/30*} bhāvanā, vākyād viśeṣeṇa{*7/31*}. na caitad yugapad bhavatīti. evaṃ tarhi, naivātra śrutyarthe parigṛhyate. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13635: tarhi. vākyārthaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam. śrutyarthe parigṛhyamāṇe darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo 'narthako bhavati. yajatiś cānuvādaḥ. yajaty ātmakatvād darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ. yajatisāmānādhikaraṇyāc ca darśapūrṇamāsaśabdasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13637: *{7/21: E1 hat ekadeśabhūta ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13638: *{7/22: E2: śrūyate, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti. darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo hi yajivacanaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13648: yat tu satvavad{*7/33*} iti. atra gavākṛtau dharmaḥ śrūyate. ākṛteḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13649: padārthatvāt. na ca tatra saṃbhavati. ato 'sāv ākṛtiḥ sahacāripiṇḍalakṣaṇārthā vijñāyate, yathā gaṅgāyāṃ gāva{*7/34*} iti. tac ca sāhacaryam, sarvapiṇḍānām aviśiṣṭam iti, sarvapiṇḍeṣu vihitaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13650: tasmāt tat sārvatrikaṃ pratīyeta. iha tu yajer guṇabhavena śravaṇān naiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:13651: yajau dharmāḥ śrūyante. kiṃ{*7/35*} tarhi. apūrva ity. evam apadiṣṭo hetuḥ. tasmād anupanyāsaḥ satvavad{*7/36*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13659: atha tuśabdaḥ pakṣavyāvṛttau. naitad evam, apūrvaprayuktā dharmā [7]{*7/37*} iti. yajiprayuktā eva. kutaḥ. avibhāgāt. yajināvibhāgo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13660: dharmāṇām, pratyakṣaṃ kecid dravye śrūyante, kecid devatāyām, kecin
GSP28msbh1-7u:13661: mantreṣu. eṣa ca yajiḥ, yad dravyaṃ devatām uddiśya mantreṇa tyajyate. sa eṣa pratyakṣo yajinā saṃbandho dharmāṇām. apūrveṇa tv ānumānikaḥ. phale
GSP28msbh1-7u:13662: 'pi yajeḥ pratyakṣaśruto guṇabhāvaḥ, svargakāmo yajeteti. ānumāniko
GSP28msbh1-7u:13663: 'pūrveṇa. anumānāc ca pratyakṣaṃ balīyaḥ. tasmād yajyarthāḥ dharmāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13664: nanu yajir bhaṅgitvāt kālāntare phalaṃ dātum asamarthaḥ. tatra kṛtā dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13665: asamarthā eva bhavatīty uktam. atra sthitasya nyāyasyākṣepeṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:13666: pratyavasthānaṃ kriyate. tailapānavad etad bhaviṣyati. yathā tailapānaṃ ghṛtapānaṃ vā bhaṅgitve 'pi sati kālāntare medhāsmṛtibalapuṣṭyādīni
GSP28msbh1-7u:13667: phalāni karoti. evaṃ yajir api kariṣyati, kiṃ no 'dṛṣṭāśrutenāpūrveṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:13671: evaṃ ca sati sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthā bhavanti. tathā caindrāgnādiṣu prayājādayaḥ santi. tatra saurye karmaṇi prayājānāṃ darśanam upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13672: prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhoti{*7/38*} iti. itarathā prayājāś ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:13673: vidhātavyāḥ. prayājeṣu ca kṛṣṇalahomaḥ. tathā ca dvyarthaṃ tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:13674: syāt{*7/39*}. dvyarthatvaṃ ca vipratiṣiddham. tasmād yajiprayuktā dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13679: utpattau vidhyabhāvād vā codanāyāṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt tataś ca karmabhedaḥ syāt // MS_7,1.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13680: naitad evam, yajiprayuktā dharmā iti. codanāyāṃ pravṛttiḥ [8]{*7/40*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13681: syāt. codanety apūrvaṃ brūmaḥ, codanārthatvād apūrvārthatvād apūrvaprayuktā dharmāḥ. phalavattvād ity ukto hetuḥ. yat tu prayakṣo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13682: yajisaṃbandho dharmāṇām iti. atra brūmaḥ, utpattau vidhyabhāvāt. utpattir iti yajiṃ brūmaḥ. utpattau yajau nāsti vidhiḥ. yajyarthā dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13683: kevalaṃ yajau śrūyante, kriyante ca. naitāvatā tadarthā bhavanti. yathā vāsasi rāgaḥ śrūyate, vāso rañjayatīti, vāsasi ca kriyate. na cāsau tadarthaḥ. stryarthaḥ puruṣārtho vā bhavati. evam ihāpi yajau śrūyamāṇāḥ kriyamāṇāś cāpūrvārthā bhaveyur arthavattvāya. tataś ca karmabhedaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13684: yato 'pūrvārthā iti. yat tu yajeḥ pratyakṣam{*7/41*}, phale guṇabhāva iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13685: na kṛtvāpūrvaṃ{*7/42*} bhavatīti, prāṇāliko vijñāyate. praṇāḍyāpi ca yena
GSP28msbh1-7u:13686: kriyate, tat kāraṇaṃ bhavati. yathā gomayaiḥ pacati, tuṣapakvā bhavantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13687: yat tu, tailapānavad yajitaḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti. atra brūmaḥ, tailapānasyāpi na kālāntare phalaṃ bhavati. dhātusāmyaṃ tasya phalam. tac ca tatkālam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13688: eva. yac ca phalaṃ balapuṣṭyādi, tat samyag āhārapariṇāmād bhavati. tasmād viṣama upanyāsaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13692: yadi vāpy abhidhānavat sāmānyāt sarvadharmaḥ syāt // MS_7,1.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13693: yady apy apūrvaṃ prayojakaṃ dharmāṇām, tathāpi sarvadharmaḥ syāt, sa sa padārthaḥ, abhidhānavat sāmānyāt. abhidhānaṃ tāvad eteṣāṃ samānam. apūrvam ity abhidhānavad dharmeṇāpy asya samānena bhavitavyam, vāhīkavat. yathā vāhīko 'tithir āgataḥ, yavānnam asmai prakriyatām ity ukte, yo yo vāhīkas
GSP28msbh1-7u:13694: tasya tasya yavānnaṃ kriyate. yathā vā, akṣyāmaye mudgaudano bhoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13695: udarāmaye payaḥ [9]{*7/43*} pātavyam iti. sarvatra ca hy akṣyāmaye mudgaudano bhujyate, udarāmaye 'pi payaḥ pīyate. evam ihāpy ekasyāpūrvasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13696: ye dharmāḥ śrutās te sarvāpūrvāṇāṃ bhavitum arhanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13697: api ca, aruṇaparāśarā nāma śākhinaḥ. teṣāṃ paricareṣu smṛtirūpaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13698: bhavati. ye darśapūrṇamāsayor dharmāḥ, te sarveṣṭīnām agnīṣomīyasya cety
GSP28msbh1-7u:13699: ārabhya, yāvat sarvāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayo 'nuktāntā iti. tac cānukramaṇam etam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13700: eva nyāyaṃ sūcayati. tasmād apūrvaprayuktatve 'pi sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13703: arthasya tv avibhaktatvāt tathā syād abhidhāneṣu pūrvavattvāt prayogasya karmaṇaḥ śabdabhāvyatvād vibhāgāc cheṣāṇām apravṛttiḥ syāt // MS_7,1.9 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13704: upavarṇanāparihāras tāvad ucyate. yad uktam, vāhīkavad iti, atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13705: arthasya tv avibhaktatvāt, tathā syād abhidhāneṣu. artho vāhīkatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13706: taddeśasaṃbandhaḥ, so 'vibhaktaḥ. sarvavāhīkeṣv anugata ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13707: tannimittaś ca prītiviśeṣo na puruṣanimittaḥ. kathaṃ jñāyate. pūrvavattvāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13708: prayogasya. pūrvavān atra prayogaḥ, bahuśo vāhīkāś cāvāhīkāś ca bhojitāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13709: tatrānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñatam etat, deśanimitteyaṃ yavānn apriyatā, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13710: puruṣanimittatā. tasmāt tathā syād vāhīkādiṣv abhidhāneṣu. atheha karmaṇaḥ śabdabhāvyatvam. nānyataḥ{*7/44*} śakyam etaj jñātum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13711: kasyāpūrvasya{*7/45*} dharmā iti. śabdena ca vyavasthitā vijñātā dharmāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13712: apūrvāṇāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ, ataḥ śeṣāṇām anyatra vihitānām anyatrāpravṛttiḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13717: atha yad uktam, smṛtir iti. tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13719: pūrvavatī hīyaṃ smṛtiḥ. codakaṃ dharmagrāhakaṃ vakyati, vidhyanto vā prakṛtivad iti. tena prāpitānāṃ dharmāṇām ayam anuvādaḥ. etan
GSP28msbh1-7u:13720: nyāyapūrvikā, nāprāptānāṃ vidhāyikā. yat kāraṇaṃ vyavasthā dharmāṇām etena nyāyena bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13721: arthasya śabdabhāvyatvāt prakaraṇanibandhanāc chabdād evānyatra bhāvaḥ syāt // MS_7,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13722: idaṃ nigamanasūtram. nigamanaṃ ca pratijñāyā hetoś ca punarvacanam. tad idam ucyate, yasmād evam, tasmād arthasyāgnyanvādhānādeḥ śabdabhāvyatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13723: pratiprakaraṇaṃ ca nibandhanāc chabdād evānyatra bhāvaḥ syāt. yathā gandharvāpsaraso vā, etam unmādayanti, ya unmādyaty etā vai gandharvāpsaraso yadrāṣṭrabhṛtam. tasmai svāhā tābhyaḥ svāheti juhotīty agniprakaraṇe utpannānāṃ rāṣṭrabhṛtām udvāhe upadeśaḥ. eteṣāṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoty abhyātānāṃ juhotīti. asty etasmin vacane yathādhikāraṃ vyavatiṣṭheran dharmā iti. evaṃ ca saty adharmakāṇy aindrāgnādīṇi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13725: tatra saptam ena tāvad aindrāgnādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ dharmāḥ santīty ucyate. te
GSP28msbh1-7u:13726: cātideśeneti. atideśo nāma ye paratra vihitā dharmās tam atītyānyatra teṣāṃ deśaḥ. yathā devadattasya bhojanavidhiṃ kṛtvā, śālisūpamāṃsāpūpair devadatto bhojayitavya [11]{*7/47*} iti. tam eva vidhiṃ yajñadatte
GSP28msbh1-7u:13727: 'tidiśati, devadattavad yajñadatto bhojayitavya iti. ślokam api udāharanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13729: dharmapradeśo yena syāt so 'tideśa iti sthitiḥ// iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13730: sa ca nāmnā vacanena vā. tatra nāma trividham atideśakam, karmanām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13731: saṃskāranām, yaugikam iti. vacanaṃ punar dvividham, pratyakṣaśrutam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13732: ānumānikaṃ ca. tayor ānumānikam upariṣṭād vakṣyate. pratyakṣaśrutaṃ tv idānīm eva cintyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13733: astīṣunām aikāhaḥ, aparaḥ śyenaḥ. tau dvāv apy ābhicārikau. tatreṣau kāṃścid dharmān vidhāyāha, samānam itarac chyeneneti. etac cintyate. kim ayam anuvādaḥ, vidhir iti. yadi vidhiḥ, tato 'tideśaḥ. śyenadhamān iṣāv atidiśati. athānuvādaḥ, tato neti. tatra kiṃ prāptam. tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:13737: samānam itarac chyeneneti. atrotpannādhikāraḥ syāt. anuvāda ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13738: kutaḥ. pūrvavattvāt. ayam iṣuḥ pūrvavān, jyotiṣṭomapūrvakaḥ. jyautiṣṭomiko
GSP28msbh1-7u:13739: 'tra vidhyanta ity arthaḥ{*7/48*}. atra codakenotpannā jyautiṣṭomikā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13740: dharmāḥ santi. śyeno 'pi jyotiṣṭomapūrvakaḥ. tatrāpi te santi. ye iṣau śyene [12]{*7/49*} ca samānā bhanti, tān adhikṛtyāyaṃ vādo yujyate. tasmād utpannādhikāratvād anuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13741: kiṃ cetarad iti cābhāve nopapadyate. itaraśabdaś cāsannihite 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13742: sannihita eva bhavati. yathā, itara ādhāro{*7/50*} dīyatām. itaraḥ kambalo dīyatām iti sannihito dīyate, na prāvāramātraṃ kambalamātraṃ vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13743: jyautiṣṭomikāś ca sannihitāḥ. tasmāt teṣāṃ vādaḥ. teṣāṃ cedam anuvādaḥ.{*7/51*} vihitā hi te codakeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13749: iti cet paśyasi, jyautiṣṭomikānām anuvāda iti. naivam. śyenasya vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ lohitoṣṇīṣādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vidhiḥ{*7/52*}. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13750: śyenagrahaṇasāmarthyāt. evaṃ śyenagrahaṇam arthavat bhaviṣyati, dharmān
GSP28msbh1-7u:13751: viśeṣayat. itarathānarthakaṃ syāt. sarveṣāṃ hy ekāhāhīnasatrāṇāṃ te
GSP28msbh1-7u:13752: samānāḥ. tatra yāvad uktaṃ syāt, samānam itarad iti, tāvad eva samānam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13757: nāyaṃ śyenavaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vādo yujyate. kasmāt. asannidhānāt. ayam itaraśabdaḥ sannihite bhavati, na ca śyenaśabdena vaiśeṣikā iṣau sannihitāḥ{*7/53*}. yat tu śyenaśabdo vaiśeṣiko bhavatīti, vidhipakṣe
GSP28msbh1-7u:13758: 'vaiśeṣikatvaṃ doṣaḥ syāt. anuvādapakṣe tu naiva kaścid vidhīyate, kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13759: viśeṣyati. jyautiṣṭomikās tu sarvasādhāraṇāḥ santaḥ śyenasyāpi bhavantīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:13763: api vā yady apūrvatvād itarad adhikārthe jyautiṣṭomikād vidhes tadvācakaṃ samānaṃ syāt // api veti pakṣāntaraparigrahe. vidhir ayaṃ śyenavaiśeṣikāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13764: jyautiṣṭomikānām{*7/55*} anuvādaḥ. kutaḥ. apūrvatvāt. evam apūrvam arthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13765: vidhāsyati. tathā pravṛttiviśeṣakaro bhaviṣyati. anuvādaḥ sann apravṛttiviśeṣakaro 'narthakaḥ syāt. nanv itaraśabdo 'yaṃ sannihite
GSP28msbh1-7u:13766: bhvati. ucyate, itarad adhikārthe, samānam itarat, samānam adhikam ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:13768: nanu sannihitavacano 'yaṃ nādhikārtha iti{*7/56*}. ucyate, na kevalam ayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13769: sannihitavacana eva. pūrvoktasadṛśam asannihitam api brūte. avaśiṣṭaṃ ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13770: yadā hi vastrāṇy anukramyetaraśabdaḥ prayujyate, devadattāya kambalo dīyatām, viṣṇumitrāya kauśeyam, yajñadattāya kṣaumam, itarac caitrāyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13771: tadā vastram eva pradīyate, na hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ vā. iha jyautiṣṭomikebhyo 'dhikān dharmān{*7/57*} anukramyetaraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ. tenātrāpy adhikān eva vaktum arhati. tathādhikavacano bhvati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13772: atha jyautiṣṭomikān brūte, tathā sannihitavacanaḥ. tatrāvaśyam anyatarad dheyam. yady adhikārthatāṃ hitvā sannihitārthatāśrīyate, anuvādamātram anarthakaṃ bhavati. śyenaśabdaś cāvivakṣitārthaḥ. atha sannihitārthatāṃ hitvādhikārthatā gṛhyate, na kaścid doṣo bhavati. tasmāt sūtrakāra āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13773: itarad adhikārtha iti. ato jyautiṣṭomikād vidher adhikāḥ śyenavaiśeṣikā ye, ta ihātidiśyante. tadvācakaṃ [14]{*7/58*} samānaṃ syāt. samānaśabdaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. bhavati śyenaśabdaś ca vivakṣitaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13774: cāturmāsyānāṃ vaiśvadeva āgneyādīni{*7/59*} havīṃṣi sārthavādavākyair vihitāni. dharmāś ca teṣām uktāḥ. varuṇapraghāseṣu kevalāni havīṃṣy
GSP28msbh1-7u:13775: āmnāya, yad vaiśvadevikānāṃ brāhmaṇam, tat teṣām atidiśyate, etad brāhmaṇāny eva pañca havīṃṣi, yad brāhmaṇānītarāṇi{*7/60*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13776: tatra{*7/61*} kim arthavādamātrasyāyam atideśaḥ, uta sārthavādakasya savidhikasya kāṇḍasyeti{*7/62*}. kathaṃ punar arthavādamātrasyātideśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13777: bhavati. yathā pampākulāyapratimāś ca vṛkṣā iti. ke punar vidhayaḥ, ke
GSP28msbh1-7u:13778: arthavādāḥ. tredhā sannaddhaṃ barhir bhavati{*7/63*}, tredhā sannaddha idhmaḥ{*7/64*}, nava prayājā nava anuyājā ityevamādayo vidhayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13779: vārtaghnāni vaitāni havīṃṣīty arthavādāḥ. tatredam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13791: pañcatāni havīṃṣi sarvaparvasu saṃcarantīti pañcasaṃcarāṇīty ucyante. teṣu pañcasaṃcareṣv arthavādamātrasyātideśa iti. kutaḥ. sannidhānād dhaviṣāṃ sannihitā arthavādāḥ. vidhibhir{*7/65*} ekavākyasaṃbaddhatvāt, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13792: dharmavidhayaḥ. kim ataḥ. ata etad bhavati, yat pūrveṣāṃ brāhmaṇam iti vyapadeśo yujyate. [15]{*7/66*} tad dhi teṣāṃ brāhmaṇam, yena vidhīyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13793: ko 'nyo haviṣāṃ brāhmaṇasya ca saṃbandho 'nyatra vidheyavidhāyakabhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13794: arthavādaiś caitāni vidhīyante, na dharmavidhibhiḥ. dharmavidhibhis tu yāni vidhīyante, na tāni havīṃṣi. tasmād arthavādānām atideśo na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13796: api ca varuṇapraghāseṣv api kecid vaiśvadevikā dharmā vidhīyante. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13797: agniṃ mathnanti prasuvo bhavantīti. teṣām atideśena vihitānāṃ punar āmnānam anarthakaṃ syāt, yadi vidhayo 'tidiśyeran. tasmād arthavādātideśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13801: naitad evam, arthavādamātrasyātideśa iti. savidhikasya sārthavādakasya kāṇḍasyātideśa{*7/67*} iti. kutaḥ. aikaśabdyāt. samānaśabdatvād ity arthaḥ. samāno 'yaṃ brāhmaṇam iti śabdo vidhīnām arthavādānāṃ ca. sa yathārthavādān gṛhṇāti, evaṃ{*7/68*} vidhīn api gṛhṇāti cet, tān apy atidiśati. yat tu vidhīnāṃ havirbhiḥ saṃbandho nāstīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13802: vidheyavidhāyakasaṃbandho nāsti, upakāralakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho bhaviṣyati. ka
GSP28msbh1-7u:13803: upakāraḥ. yas eṣām aṅgāni vidadhāti. asti cet saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13809: liṅgaṃ ca vidhīnām atideśaṃ darśayati. kiṃ liṅgam. varuṇapraghāseṣu triṃśadāhutayo vājino{*7/69*} yajanty āhutīnāṃ saṃpattyai
GSP28msbh1-7u:13810: triṃśattvāya{*7/70*} iti varuṇapraghāse{*7/71*} triṃśatam āhutīr darśayati. yadi vidhayo nātidiśyeran, tā na syuḥ. tasmād atidiśyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13812: *{7/69: E2: varuṇapraghāseṣu śrūyate, triṃśadāhutayo hūyeran. vājino}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13816: vihitāmnānād iti yad uktam, tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ. ābhāṣāntaṃ{*7/73*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13819: *{7/74: E1 hat ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13821: atrocyate, vidhyatideśe 'pi sati nāgnimanthanādīnām āmnānam anarthakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13823: tasmān naitaj jñāpakam, vidhīnām anatideśasya bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13827: vaiśvadeve ekakapāla āmnātaḥ, dyāvāpṛthivīya ekakapāla iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13828: varuṇapraghāseṣv api kāya ekakapāla iti. tatrāparaḥ, aindrāgno dvādaśakapālo mārutyāmikṣā{*7/76*} iti. tathā sākamedheṣv apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:13829: ekakapālaindrāgnāv āmnātau, aindrāgna ekādaśakapāla indrāya vṛtraghne caruḥ vaiśvakarmaṇa ekakapāla iti. tatredam āmnātam. etad brāhmaṇa aindrāgnaḥ, etad brāhmaṇa ekakapālaḥ{*7/77*}, yad brāhmaṇa itara itaraś
GSP28msbh1-7u:13830: ceti. tatredam ucyate, ekakapālaindrāgnau ca tadvat, yadvat
GSP28msbh1-7u:13836: ekakapālānāṃ vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtir āgrayaṇe sarvahomāparivṛttidarśanād avabhṛthe ca sakṛd dvyavadānasya vacanāt // MS_7,1.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13837: sākamedhe śrūyate, etad brāhmaṇa{*7/79*} ekakapāla iti. tatra cintyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13839: prāptam. vaiśvadevikasyeti brūmaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam. tasya vihitā dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13840: alaṃkṛtyābhipūryopāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ, āviḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kārya{*7/80*} ityevamādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13841: vāruṇaprāghāsikas tv adharmakaḥ. yasya vihitā dharmāḥ, tatraitad yujyate vaktum, tadvad idaṃ kartavyam iti. tasmād vaiśvadevikasya grahaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13842: nanv aindrāgnasamuccāraṇād ekakapālo 'pi vāruṇaprāghāsika eva syāt. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13843: avaśyam ekaparvaṇor eva samuccāraṇena bhavitavyam, nānāparvaṇor api samuccāraṇam aviruddham. tasmād vaiśvadevikasya grahaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13844: iti prāpte ucyate, vāruṇaprāghāsikasyaikakapālasya grahaṇam iti. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13845: tata{*7/81*} ekakapālānāṃ vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtiḥ. kathaṃ jñāyate. āgrayaṇe
