GSP28msbh1-7u:13846: sarvahomāparivṛttidarśanāt. āgrayaṇe dyāvāpṛthivīyasyaikakapālasya sarvahomam aparyāvṛttiṃ{*7/82*} ca darśayati. yat sarvahutaṃ karoti, sā tv ekā paricakṣā, huto hutaḥ{*7/83*} paryāvartate, sā dvitīyā. ājyasyaiva dyāvāpṛthivyau yajeti{*7/84*} iti, ājyayāgavidhipare vākya ekakapālasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:13847: sarvahomam aparyāvṛttiṃ ca prāptāṃ darśayati. etasmād darśanād avabhṛthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:13848: ca sakṛd dvyavadānasya vacanāt. avabhṛte cāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati, idam evaikakapālasya dvir avadyatīti. tena jñāyate, nūnam anyatra na dvir avadānam iti. tac caitat sarvaṃ vaiśvadevika ekakapāle vihitam. tasmād ekakapālānāṃ vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtiḥ. kim ataḥ. sākamedhike 'py ekakapāle vaiśvadevikā dharmāḥ prāptāḥ, teṣām atideśo 'narthakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13849: vāruṇaprāghāsikasya ye dharmāḥ vaiśeṣikā aprāptāḥ, teṣām atideśo 'rthavān.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13850: tasmād vāruṇaprāghāsikasyaikakapālasyedaṃ grahaṇam iti. ucyate, liṅgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:13851: etat. kutaḥ prāptir iti. prāptim uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13852: svarasāmaikakapālāmikṣaṃ cety atra. ke punas te dharmāḥ. hiraṇyamayaḥ sruvaḥ śamīmayo{*7/85*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13862: idaṃ śrūyate, rathantaram uttarayor gāyati{*7/87*}, kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyati{*7/88*} ityevamādīni samāmnāyante. tatra cintā, kim ihātidiśyate iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13863: nanu yad rathantarādibhiḥ śabdair ucyate, tad atidiśyate. bāḍham. tad eva tu na jñāyate kim ebhiḥ śabdair ucyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13864: nanu siddham etat, gīteṣu sāmākhyā{*7/89*} iti. tathā siddhasyākṣepaḥ kariṣyate. sa eva tu nirṇayo bhaviṣyati. yadio sa eva nirṇayaḥ, kim arthaḥ ākṣepaḥ. dārḍhyārthaḥ, sthūṇānikhananavat. tatra kiṃ prāptam. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13865: sa stobhasvarakālābhyāsavikārāyāṃ hiṅkārapraṇavaprastāvodgīthapratihāropadravanidhanavatyām ṛci gītau{*7/90*} sāmaśabdo 'bhiyuktair upacaryate{*7/91*}. tasmāt saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13866: ucyate, nanu gītau satyāṃ bhāvād nānākhyasya saṃskārakarmaṇo vācakā ete śabdā ity uktam. tad evedam uktam ākṣipyate. neme saṃskārasya vācakāḥ. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13867: kāraṇam. akarmakāle prayogāt. akarmakāle sāma prayujyate. na ca saṃskārakarmaṇi prokṣaṇāvakṣepaṇaparyagnikaraṇādīny
GSP28msbh1-7u:13868: prayujyante. prayojanābhāvāt. atha nu [20]{*7/92*} mantrā ete, tato 'nv
GSP28msbh1-7u:13869: ahaṃ svādhyo 'dhyetavya iti niyamād akarmakāle prayogo yujyate. tasmād ṛcāṃ nāmāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13870: kiṃ ca, saṃjñābhedāt. saṃjñābhedaś ca bhavati, rathantaraṃ bṛhad ityevamādiḥ. sa ekatvāt saṃskārakarmaṇo anarthakaḥ. ekenaiva hi tadā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13871: paryāptam. yathā gītir iti. atharcāṃ nāmāni, tatas tāsāṃ bhedāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13873: api ca. yadi gānaṃ rathantaraṃ gānaṃ ca bṛhat, idaṃ rathantaram idaṃ bṛhad iti pṛthaktvena saṃjñāniveśo nopapadyate. ṛṅnāmatve tūpapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13874: kiṃ ca, vikārapṛthaktvāt tu. pratisāma ca vikārapṛthaktvāt. pratisāma ca vikārapṛthaktvaṃ dṛśyate. tad ekatvād gānasya, anupapannam. saṃskārabhede hi vikārapṛthaktvaṃ dṛṣṭam. tad yathā, avahantes taṇḍulībhāvaḥ, piṣeś
GSP28msbh1-7u:13875: cūrṇam. na tv ekasya taṇḍulībhāvaś cūrṇanaṃ ca. atharṅnāmāny etāni. tata ṛcāṃ bhedād vikārapṛthaktvaṃ yujyate. tasmād ṛṅnāmānīti. tata uttaraṃ paṭhati, sāmno 'bhidhānaśabdena pravṛttiḥ syād yathāśiṣṭam iti. sāmno
GSP28msbh1-7u:13876: 'bhidhānaśabdena yathāśiṣṭam pravṛttiḥ syāt. yac chiṣṭaṃ pravaktṛbhiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13877: śiṣyebhyaḥ. kiṃ ca śiṣṭam. stomādiviśiṣṭā ṛk sāma, sā pravarteta. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13885: śabdais tv arthavidhitvād arthāntare 'pravṛttiḥ syāt pṛthagbhāvāt kriyāyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:13887: tuśabdaḥ pakṣanivṛttau. na tv evaṃ syāt, ṛcaḥ pravṛttir iti. katham. iha kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyatīti kavatīnāṃ vā kārye 'bhivatyo{*7/93*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13889: ādhāryādheyabhāvena{*7/96*}. tatra kārye tāvad atideśo na ghaṭate. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13890: śabdair arthavidhitvāt. śabdānām arthavidhānaṃ kāryam. na ca, kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyatīti kavatībhir yo 'rtho 'bhidhīyate, tam abhivatyaḥ śaknuvanti vaktum. tasmān na karyātideśaḥ. ādheyatve 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13891: pṛthagbhāvāt. na hi śabdaḥ śabde samavaiti, pṛthag evāvatiṣṭhate. abhi
GSP28msbh1-7u:13892: tvā, kayā na iti{*7/97*}. kriyāyā hi gānakriyāyāḥ{*7/98*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13893: śabdenābhisaṃbandho bhavet, na śabdasya. tasmād ādheyatvenāpi nātideśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13901: svārthe vā syāt prayojanaṃ kriyāyās tadaṅgabhāvenopadiśyeran // MS_7,2.3
GSP28msbh1-7u:13902: svārtha vā pravartamānā abhivatyaḥ kavatīnām aṅgabhāvenopadiśyeran. kathaṃ punaḥ kavatīṣu gāyatīty aṅgabhāvaḥ śakya upadeṣṭum. śakyo yathā, yena karmaṇertset tatra jayān juhuyād{*7/99*} iti. kiṃ punaḥ prayojanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13903: kavatīnām abhivatyo nirvartayantīti. ucyate, prayojanam adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13904: kutaḥ. kriyāyāḥ. yasmāt kriyā śrūyate, kavatīṣu rathanataraṃ gāyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13906: ucyate, ayam evāsmin pakṣe doṣaḥ, yat prayojanaṃ kriyāyāḥ kalpayitavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13911: iti cet paśyasi, kavatyaṅgabhāvenābhivatīnām upadeśo duḥśliṣṭa iti, tena tarhi śabdamātraṃ pradiśyatām. ratha[22]{*7/100*}ntaraśabdaṃ kavatīṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:13912: prayuñjīta. kavatīḥ rathantaraśabdenābhilaped iti. kiṃ kāranam. śabda
GSP28msbh1-7u:13913: uccarite. tatra tāvan mukhyā pratipattiḥ. śabde kāryasyāsaṃbhavāt, arthe kāryaṃ vijñāyate, yathā gām ānayeti. iha tu śabda eva kāryaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13917: pūrvasmād eṣa vādaḥ pāpīyān. kasmāt. autpattikatvāt. autpattiko hi nāmināmnoḥ saṃbandhaḥ. yaḥ śabdo yasmin artha autpattikena saṃbandhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:13918: prasiddhaḥ. na sa tato 'nyaṃ pratyāyayituṃ śaknoti. na hi gośabdenāśvo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13921: evaṃ ca saty atideśaśāstram anarthakaṃ syāt, aśakyārthatvāt. tasmān na śabdasyāpi pradeśo yuktaḥ. vṛttikāras tu mene, gānaśāstram aukthikyam anarthakaṃ syād iti. tasyābhiprāyaḥ, satyāṃ gatau naitāvān prayāsaḥ śiṣṭānām aphalo 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13923: iti cet paśyasi, nāmno 'tideśo 'yukta iti. tena [23]{*7/101*} tarhi svarasyātideśo bhavatu. svaraḥ sāmaśabdena loke 'bhidhīyate. susāmā devadatta iti. susvaro devadatta iti. svaro ghoṣo nāda{*7/102*} iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13924: samānārthāḥ. sa sāmaśabdenocyate, sāma ca rathantaram. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13929: naitad evam, svarasyātideśa iti. kutaḥ. arthābhāvād arthasyābhāvat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13930: arthasyābhivatīsvarasya kavatīṣv abhāvāt. nanv asann evāsāv atideśena
GSP28msbh1-7u:13931: bhāvyate. ucyate, bhāvayitum api na śakyate. na hy abhivatyakṣarāṇām
GSP28msbh1-7u:13932: abhivyañjako nādaḥ kavatīṣu bhāvayituṃ śakyaḥ. yadi bhāvyeta, na kavatyo bhaveyuḥ. na ced bhāvyate, na bhūtaḥ. kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyatīty
GSP28msbh1-7u:13933: etasyāḥ śruteḥ padāntareṇābhisaṃbandho{*7/103*} na syāt. tasmān na svarasyātideśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13937: tuśabdaḥ pakṣāntaraparigrahe. yady abhivatīsvarasya kavatīṣu pradeśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13938: nopapadyate, anuvādo bhavatu, kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyatīti. katham. tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:13939: ucyate, iha kavatīṣu rathanatraṃ gāyatīty asya vākyasya dve vacanavyaktī bhavataḥ. kavatīṣu yad rathantaram, tad gāyatīty ekā. rathantaraṃ yat, tat kavatīṣu gāyatīty aparā. tayor yaiṣā dvitīyā, rathantaraṃ yat tat kavatīṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:13940: gāyatīti. sā svarasya sāmatve na saṃbhavatīty uktam. na hy abhivatīsvaraḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13941: kavatīṣu samāveśayituṃ śakya iti. pūrvā tu saṃbhavati. kavatīṣu yad rathantaram, tad gāyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13942: nanu sāpi na saṃbhavati. na hi kavatīṣu rathantaram asti. [24]{*7/104*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13943: ataḥ param ucyate, svaras tūtpattiṣu syāt. svaras tv abhivatīsvaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13944: kavatīnām utpattiṣūccāraṇeṣu syāt. katham. mātrāvarṇāvibhaktatvāt. bahavo mātrāvarṇāś cābhivatīnāṃ kavatīnāṃ cāvibhaktā abhibhavatīṣv api vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13945: kavatīṣv api. so 'sāv abhivatīsvaraḥ kavatīṣu sādhāraṇavarṇasamaveto
GSP28msbh1-7u:13946: vidyate, tasyānuvādo 'yaṃ ghaṭate, kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyatīti. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13950: liṅgaṃ ca dṛśyata etasminn arthe. asti rathantaram uttarayor{*7/105*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13951: kiṃ talliṅgaṃ bhavati. evam āha, rathantaram uttarayor na paśyāmi{*7/106*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13952: iti viśvāmitras tapas tepe, bṛhad uttarayor na paśyāmīti vasiṣṭha iti. yac ca vidyamānaṃ na dṛśyate, taddarśanāya yatnaḥ. kriyate, yathā ghaṭaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:13953: paśyāmīti pradīpaṃ karoti, na śaśaviṣāṇaṃ na paśyāmīti. tasmād asty uttarayo rathantaraṃ bṛhac ca. tayor anuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13958: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. naitad evam, svarasyānuvāda iti. kutaḥ. evaṃ saty uttarāsu vikāro na kaścic chruto bhavati. tadottarā yathāśrutāḥ prayoktavyāḥ. yathā svādhyāyakāle śrutāḥ. tatra rathantaram uttarayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:13959: gāyatīty etad anuvādamātram apravṛttiviśeṣakaram anarthakam evāpavadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13963: rathantarādīnāṃ ca sāmaśabdānām asāmañjasyaṃ syāt. rathantaram uttarayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13964: bṛhad uttarayor iti. katham. tad ucyate, ayaṃ rathantaraśabdo bṛhacchabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13965: vā svarasya sāmaśabdatve svarasamudāya ānupūrvyā vyavasthite{*7/108*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13966: svaraviśeṣe prayuktaḥ. sa ekadeśe bhinnānupūrvye vāsamañjaso{*7/109*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13967: bhavati. tasmāt naitad yuktam. svarasya sāmaśabdaḥ, tasya cānuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13968: atrāha, evaṃ bhavatā sarve pakṣā niruddhāḥ. tataḥ kim apravṛttir eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13969: ucyate, ṛca eva pradeśo bhavatu. nanūktam, na śakyā ṛca ṛgantare pradeṣṭum iti. bāḍham, deśalakṣaṇā bhaviṣyati. kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyatīty ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13970: na ca śakyate kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gātum. tatra deśalakṣaṇā bhavati
GSP28msbh1-7u:13971: kavatīdeśa iti. yathā, agnau tiṣṭhati, kūpe tiṣṭhatīti. dharmalakṣaṇā vā syāt. rathantaradharmā vā kavatīṣu rathantaraśabdenātidiśyante. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13972: rathantare prastūyamāne pṛthivīṃ manasā dhyāyed{*7/110*} ityevamādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13973: yathācārye proṣite, ācāryānī bhavatām ācārya{*7/111*} ity ācāryaśuśruṣācāryānyām atidiśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13979: api tu karmaśabdaḥ syād bhāvo 'rthaḥ prasiddhagrahaṇatvād vikāro hy
GSP28msbh1-7u:13981: api tu naivaṃ syāt, ṛcaḥ sāmaśabdaḥ. tasyāś ca pradeśa iti. tathā deśalakṣaṇā dharmalakṣaṇā vāśrayaṇīyā. agatiś caiṣā yallakṣaṇāparigrahaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13982: kiṃ tarhi. karmaśabdaḥ syāt. rathantarādir gānākhyasya saṃskārakarmaṇo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13983: vācakaḥ. kutaḥ. ukto nyāyo gītiṣu sāmākhyā{*7/112*} ity atra. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:13984: gīti[26]{*7/113*}viśiṣṭāyām ṛci, eṣa śabdo dṛṣṭaḥ. na cāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhir utpadyate. tasmād viśeṣaṇaṃ tāvad abhidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13985: viśeṣaṇapratyayāc ca sahacarite viśiṣṭe pratyayaḥ. ato nāsty ṛcaḥ śabdena saṃsparśa iti. tenaiva nyāyena gītināmadheyam iti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13986: kiṃ ca prasiddhagrahaṇatvāt. ayaṃ ca gāyatīti śabdo gānakriyāyāṃ prasiddhaḥ. kā punar asau śabdasyoccāraṇaviśeṣaḥ. gāyati gānaṃ karotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13987: tadgrahaṇaś ca rathantarādiśabdaḥ. tadvacana ity arthaḥ. tena samuccāraṇād dvitīyāsāmarthyāc ca. yathā, āsāritakaṃ gāyatīti, vardhamānakaṃ gāyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13988: nanu śabdavacanenāpi samuccāraṇaṃ bhavati, gāthāṃ gāyati, ṛcaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:13990: satyam, vipariṇamya tu śabdam, gānena ṛcaṃ saṃskarotīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:13991: yathānipatitenārthena na saṃbadhyate gānaṃ karotīty ṛcam iti. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:13993: itaś ca gītivacanaḥ. kutaḥ. vikāro hy aviśiṣṭo 'nyaiḥ. vikāraś cātrargdravyasya dṛśyate. hrasvānām akṣarāṇāṃ dīrghatā, dīrghāṇāṃ ca hrasvatvam. vivṛtānāṃ saṃvṛtatvam, saṃvṛtānāṃ vivṛtatvam. so 'viśiṣṭo
GSP28msbh1-7u:13994: 'nyaiḥ saṃskārakarmabhiḥ. yathāvahantinā vrīhīṇāṃ taṇḍulībhāvaḥ, piṣiṇā taṇḍulānāṃ piṣṭībhāvaḥ. tasmāc chabdānāṃ saṃskāro gānākhyo rathantarādibhiḥ śabdair ucyate. tasyāyaṃ pradeśaḥ, rathantaram uttarayor gāyatītyevamādiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13999: api cādravyaṃ sāma dṛśyate. dravyaśabdaś chandogair ṛkṣv ācaritaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14000: adravyam anṛcam ity arthaḥ. anṛcaṃ sāma dṛśyate, prajāpater hṛdayam anṛcaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14001: gāyati{*7/115*} iti. prajāpatihṛdayaṃ [27]{*7/116*} nāma sāma. tad anṛcy utpannam. yady ṛci sāmaśabdaḥ, kathaṃ prajāpatihṛdayam anṛcaṃ syāt. atha
GSP28msbh1-7u:14002: gīteḥ{*7/117*} sāmaśabdaḥ, tato vināpy ṛcā gītir bhavati. tatraitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:14003: upapadyate, prajāpater hṛdayam anṛcaṃ gāyatīti. tasmād api gītiḥ sāma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14009: tasya ca kriyā grahaṇārthā nānārtheṣu virūpitvād artho hy āsāmalaukiko vidhānāt // MS_7,2.15
GSP28msbh1-7u:14010: tasya kriyākarmakāle grahaṇārthā śikṣitum abhyasitum ca. nānārtheṣu nānābhūteṣv artheṣu bhinneṣv ity arthaḥ{*7/118*} virūpitvāt, āśrayabhedād vividharūpaṃ tadgānaṃ bhavati. tat praty ṛcaṃ śikṣitavyam abhyasitavyaṃ ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:14011: prayogaprāśubhāvāya. bhūmirathikavat, tad yathā, bhūmirathiko bhūmau ratham ālikhya yogyāṃ karoti. sā tasya yogyā{*7/119*} prayogakāle saukaryam utpādayati. artho hy āsāṃ rathantarādisaṃjñānāṃ na laukike
GSP28msbh1-7u:14012: vyavahāre siddhaḥ, yathāvahantyādīnām. kutaḥ. vidhānād. vidhīyate hy asau
GSP28msbh1-7u:14013: śiṣyopādhyāyasaṃbandhena, evaṃrūpaṃ rathantaraṃ bhavatīti. na laukiko vijñāyate. tasmān na paricodanaiṣā, akarmakāle prayogād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14014: atha yad uktam, saṃjñāpṛthaktvād iti. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14016: *{7/118: E1 hat ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14019: tasminn ekasminn api gānākhye saṃskāre saṃjñāviśeṣā bhaveyuḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14021: gānaviśeṣāc ca saṃjñāpṛthaktvam. yathā, āsāritakam, vardhamānakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:14028: yoniśas yāś ca tulyavad itarābhirvidhīyante // MS_7,2.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14029: yoniś cāsau śasyā ca yoniśasyā. yoniśasyāś carcas tulyavad itarābhir ayoniśasyābhir vidhīyante. yāmyāḥ śaṃsati, śipiviṣṭavantīḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14030: śaṃsati{*7/123*}, rathantarasya yonim anuśaṃsati, bṛhato yonim anuśaṃsati{*7/124*} iti. kā tatra tulyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14033: apragīteṣu śaṃsatiśabdaḥ, yathā, praügaṃ śaṃsati, niṣkevalyaṃ{*7/126*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14034: śaṃsatīti. ājyaiḥ stuvate, pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvanta iti. ataḥ śaṃsatiśabdena vidhānād apragītām ṛcaṃ rathantarasya yoniṃ darśayati. yadi ca gītiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14035: rathantaram, tatas tasyāpragītā ṛgyoniḥ. anyathāyaṃ vyapadeśo nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14036: rathantarasya yonim iti. tasmād gītiṣu sāmākhyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14043: ayonau ca sāma dṛśyate. sthālyāṃ saktv avadhīyata ity āhur yad bṛhad gāyatrīṣu kriyate 'pi caināṃ rujati. na cāsyāṃ saṃbhavatīti, bṛhato bṛhatī yoniḥ. tasya gāyatrīṣu prāptir nāsti, [29]{*7/127*} yady ṛcaḥ sāmaśabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14044: atha nu gīteḥ, tataḥ sā bṛhadgītir gāyatrīṣu vacanāt prāptā, tasyā ayam anuvādo ghaṭate, yad bṛhad gāyatrīṣu kriyata iti. atathāyoni ca sāma
GSP28msbh1-7u:14045: darśayati. yādṛśī yasya yoniḥ, tato 'nyādṛśe, yo vai vicchandasi sāmohati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14046: sa ṛcaṃ saṃśṛṇāti, sāma vā viliśati, sāma saṃśṛṇāti, ṛcaṃ viliśatīti yatarad varṣīyaḥ, tasya saṃśaraḥ{*7/128*}, tac ca gītāv eva sāmni yujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14047: narci. ūhatiśadaś ca gītāv eva samarthaḥ, narci. ṛk cet, saiva yathāmnāyaṃ padyate. tatra nāsty ūhaprasaṅgaḥ. tasmād api gītau sāmaśabdaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14049: *{7/128: E2: tasya vileśaḥ. yatarad varṣīyas tasya saṃśaraḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14050: ekārthye nāsti vairūpyam iti cet // MS_7,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14051: yad uktam, tasya kriyā grahaṇārtheti. tatra paricodyate. aikārthye nāsti vairūpyam iti. rathantaragīter bṛhadgītir arthāntaram. tena rathantaragītau gṛhītāyāṃ bṛhadgītir agṛhītā bhavatīti yukto rathantare gṛhīte bṛhataḥ śikṣārtham akarmakāle prayogaḥ. rathantaragītes tv eka
GSP28msbh1-7u:14052: evārthaḥ. tasya yonyāṃ prayoge śikṣite punar uttarāsu na śikṣitavyam. tāsv akarmakāle prayogaḥ saṃskārakarmatve na yukto bhavati. tasmān na saṃskārasya sāmaśabda iti sthitāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ sūtreṇa paricodayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14053: syād arthāntareṣu aniṣpatter yathā pāke // MS_7,2.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14054: syād vairūpyam. kuta etat. arthānatreṣv aniṣpatteḥ. ṛgantareṣv
GSP28msbh1-7u:14055: āśrayabhedāt. yathā{*7/129*} pāke, yathaika evāyam arthaḥ [30]{*7/130*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14056: pāko nāma. tasyārthāntare vairūpyaṃ bhavati. anyathālakṣaṇa odanasya pākaḥ, anyathālakṣaṇo guḍasya, yenaudanapāko gṛhītaḥ, nāsāv aśikṣitvā guḍaṃ paktuṃ jānāti. tasmāt tasyāpy akarmakāle prayoga upapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14060: evaṃ ca sāmaśabdānām ṛkśabdānāṃ ca sāmañjasyaṃ bhavati. kavatīṣu rathantaraṃ gāyati{*7/131*} iti kavatīśabda ṛca eva{*7/132*} vakṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14061: rathantaraśabdaś ca sāma. itarathā kavatīśabde vā deśalakṣaṇā syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14062: rathantaraśabde vā dharmalakṣaṇā. tasmād gītau sāmaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14066: uktaṃ kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra dharmapradeśāḥ syāt // MS_7,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14067: nāmnā dharmapradeśaṃ vakṣyāma ity ādau pratijñātam, so 'yam ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14068: kuṇḍapāyināmayane śrūyate, māsam agnihotraṃ juhoti{*7/133*} iti. tatraitat
GSP28msbh1-7u:14069: samadhigatam, naiyamikād agnihotrāt karmāntaram etad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14070: adhunāgnihotraśabaś cintyate, katham ayaṃ prayukta iti. tadartham
GSP28msbh1-7u:14071: ārabhyate, uktam kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra vidhipradeśaḥ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14072: uktam ādau, kriyābhidhānaṃ karmanāmadheyam agnihotraśabda iti tatprakhyaṃ cānyaśāstram ity atra. tasyānyatra śrutau kauṇḍapāyinām ayanīye juhotau vidhipradeśaḥ syāt dharmapradeśaḥ{*7/134*}. naiyamikasyāgnihotrasya ye dharmās te 'sminn anena nāmnātidiśyeran. kiṃ kāraṇam. ucyate, paraśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:14073: 'yaṃ paratra vṛttaḥ, paraśabdasya paratra vṛttau tadvadbhāvo gamyate. sa yatra vijñāto bhavati tatrānūdyate. yathā siṃho devadatta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14074: yatrāvijñātas tatra vidhīyate. yathā amī piṣṭapiṇḍāḥ siṃhāḥ kriyantām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14075: iha cāvijñāto 'sya juhoter agnihotravadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt sa vidhīyate. māsam agnihotraṃ juhotīti, agnihotravaj juhotīti. kathaṃ punar asati
GSP28msbh1-7u:14078: tatsahacaritadohanādidharmavattāṃ lakṣaṇayā śaknoti gamayitum. śaknoti ced gamayitum, pradeṣṭum api śaknoti{*7/136*}. evam anatreṇāpi vatim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14085: vāpīti viparyāsena prayukte. api vety arthaḥ. api vāpūrve ete ubhe api karmaṇī syātām, na kauṇḍapāyinām ayanīyo juhotir naiyamikapūrvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14086: sādhāraṇaṃ ca nāmadheyam ubhayoḥ. kutaḥ. bhāgitvāt. ayam api juhotir bhāgī etasya nāmadheyasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14087: yathaiva tatrāgnihotraṃ juhotīti samuccāraṇam, evam ihāpi, tatra tulye samuccāraṇe tasyaivaitan nāmadheyam, nāsyety atra viśeṣahetur nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14088: tasmād ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇaṃ nāmeti, nāsti dharmapradeśaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14091: autpattiko hi nāmināmnoḥ sambandhaḥ. yan nāma yasminn artha autpattikena saṃbandhena prasiddham, tasminn eva sadā vijñeyam, nānyatra ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14092: tathāvyavasthāyāṃ śabdārthe viśvāso na syāt. uktam, anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. yadā ca nobhayārthaḥ, tadā naiyamikaṃ tāvad āha.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14093: tatsādṛśyavidhānārthaṃ cetaratrāpi prayoga upapadyata iti nāstītarābhidhānatve hetuḥ. tasmād vidhipradeśaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14095: pratyakṣād guṇasaṃyogāt kriyābhidhānaṃ syāt tadabhāve 'prasiddhaṃ syāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14096: naiyamike 'gnihotre pratyakṣo guṇasaṃyogaḥ. pratyakṣavihitā dharmāḥ santi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14097: itthaṃ dogdhītthaṃ śrapayati, catur unnayati{*7/138*}, khādiry agnihotrasamid bhavati{*7/139*}, itthaṃ juhoti, evaṃ pratyakṣād{*7/140*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14098: guṇasaṃyogāt, naiyamikasya tan nāmadheyam iha prayujyamānam, dohanādi kriyābhidhānaṃ syāt, dharmapradeśakam ity arthaḥ. asya punar juhoter na kecid dharmāḥ santi. tadabhāve teṣāṃ dharmāṇām abhāve, aprasiddhaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14099: na prajñāyeta, kim artham ayam agnihotraśabda iha prayukta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14100: evaṃ vā. pratyakṣo guṇāsaṃyogo, naiyamikasya dravyadevatāsaṃyogaḥ. dadhnā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14101: juhoti{*7/141*}, payasā juhoti{*7/142*}, agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti{*7/143*} iti. etasmāt pratyakṣād guṇasaṃyogāt kriyābhidhānaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14102: karmanāmadheyam, itthaṃrūpo juhotir agnihotrākhya iti. athetarajuhoteḥ rūpaṃ nāsti. tadabhāve 'prasiddhaṃ syāt, na jñāyet, kīdṛśaṃ tadagnihotram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14103: nanu māso 'sya rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati. na, māsaḥ karmāṅgam, kartṛdharmaḥ saḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14104: api ca, agnihotraṃ tu māse vidhīyate, na māsenāgnihotraṃ rūpyate. tasmān naiyamikasyaitan nāmadheyam, itaratra tadvad atideśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14105: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ, sarvaṃ karmanāma, anyatra śrūyamāṇaṃ dharmāṇāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14106: grāhakam iti. evaṃ khalu prāptam. evaṃ prāpta idam ārabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14110: *{7/140: E2: juhoti, etasmin kāle juhotīty evaṃ pratyakṣād}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14114: api vā satrakarmaṇi guṇārthaiṣā śrutiḥ syāt // MS_7,3.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14115: gavāmayane śrūyate, vaiśvānaro jyotiṣṭomaḥ, prāyaṇīyam ahar bhavati{*7/145*} iti. asti tu dvādaśāhe prathamam ahaḥ prāyaṇīyam nāma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14116: prāyaṇīyo 'tirātra{*7/146*} iti. tayor nānātvaṃ tenaiva nyāyena siddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14118: tatrāyaṃ prāyaṇīyaśabdaḥ paratrāpi śrūyamāṇo na dharmāṇāṃ grāhakaḥ, kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14119: tarhi. guṇārthaiṣā śrutiḥ. katham. lakṣaṇayā nāmadheyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ grāhakam
GSP28msbh1-7u:14120: uktam. asati ca śrutyarthe lakṣaṇārtho grāhyaḥ. iha tu śrutyartha eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:14121: saṃbhavati. guṇārtha eṣa{*7/148*} śabdaḥ. guṇena kriyāyogena. tasmin karmaṇi śrutyaiva prayujyate. prayanty aneneti prāyaṇīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14122: pravartate{*7/149*} 'nena satram iti. vākyaśeṣaś cāsyaitam evārtham āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14123: jyotir eva purastād dadhāti{*7/150*} iti. yena jyotiḥ prāyaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14124: tena jyotiḥ purastāt kriyata ity arthaḥ, jyotir eva purastād dadhātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14133: viśvajiti sarvapṛṣṭhe tatpūrvakatvāj jyautiṣṭomikāni pṛṣṭhāny asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ // MS_7,3.6
GSP28msbh1-7u:14134: viśvajit sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati{*7/151*} iti śrūyate. tatra vicāryate, kim ayam anuvādaḥ, vidhir iti{*7/152*}. kiṃ prāptam. anuvāda iti. kutaḥ. yo hy asarvapṛṣṭhaḥ, tasya sarvapṛṣṭhatā vidheyā. yas tu sarvapṛṣṭha eva, tasya tayā kiṃ vihitayā. ayaṃ ca [35]{*7/153*} sarvapṛṣṭha eva. katham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14135: tatpūrvakatvāj jyotiṣṭomapūrvakatvāt{*7/154*}. jyautiṣṭomikāni stotrāṇy atra prāpyante. teṣu māhendrastotrādīni catvāri santi. tāni sarvāṇy asya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14136: tair ayaṃ sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati. nanu na tāni pṛṣṭhāni. ucyate, asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ. teṣv asti pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ, saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhānīti. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:14142: ṣaḍahād vā, tatra hi codanāḥ // MS_7,3.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14143: nāyam anuvādaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. vidhiḥ. anuvādo 'pravṛttiviśeṣakaro
GSP28msbh1-7u:14144: 'rthakaḥ{*7/155*} syāt. api ca jyotiṣṭome na pṛṣṭhabahutvam asti, yasyāyam anuvādaḥ syāt. ṣaḍahe tu tad asti. tatra hi codanāḥ, pṛṣṭhānāṃ rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati{*7/156*} ityevamādyāḥ. tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām atideśako{*7/157*} vidhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14150: liṅgaṃ caitam arthaṃ darśayati. pavamāne rathantaraṃ karoty ārbhāve bṛhat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14151: madhya itarāṇi, vairūpaṃ hotuḥ sāma, vairājaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya, raivataṃ brāhmaṇāc chaṃsinaḥ, śākvaramac chāvākasyeti viniveśapare vākye ṣāḍahikāni pṛṣṭhāni{*7/158*} darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14155: atha yad uktam, asti ca pṛṣṭhaśabda iti. tatra brūmaḥ, na tu eṣa
GSP28msbh1-7u:14156: autpattikaḥ pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ, utpannānāṃ stotrāṇām asāv adhikāraḥ, yāny etāni pṛṣṭhānīti. jñāte ca teṣāṃ pṛṣṭhatve tad upapadyate. na ca tatra jñātaṃ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14158: liṅgasamavāyāt. ekaṃ tatra pṛṣṭhaṃ{*7/160*} māhendrastotram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14159: ṣāḍahikānāṃ punaḥ pṛṣṭhatvaṃ jñātam. katham. tatra hi codanety uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14160: teṣāṃ vāde, śrautaḥ pṛṣṭhaśabdasyārthaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati. itarathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14165: iti cet paśyasi, ṣāḍahikānāṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ vidhir iti. naitad yuktam. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14166: kāraṇam. dvikara evaṃ sarvapṛṣṭhaśabdo 'bhyupagamyate{*7/161*}, pṛṣṭhāni ca vidadhāti. teṣāṃ ca sarvatvam. astu, ko doṣaḥ. asaṃbhava ity āha. yadi pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ pṛṣṭhāni vidadhāti, sarvaśabdena na śakyate viśeṣayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14167: athānuvadati, tathā śakyate. pṛṣṭhāni tv avihitāni bhavanti. teṣv asatsu kasya idaṃ sarvatvaṃ vidhīyate. ubhayakriyāyāś cāsaṃbhavaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14168: athātra bṛhadrathantarayor vikalpena prāptayoḥ sāmastyaṃ kevalaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14169: vidhīyate, sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati{*7/162*} iti. ubhe api bṛhadrathantare
GSP28msbh1-7u:14170: bhavataḥ{*7/163*}, naikam iti. tato 'yaṃ doṣo na bhavati. tasmād dvayor adhikāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14173: *{7/162: E1 hat sarvapṛṣṭho bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14176: naivam etat. kutaḥ. vyarthatvāt sarvaśabdasya. evaṃ sati sarvaśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:14177: vyartho bhavaty arthaśūnyaḥ{*7/164*}. ayaṃ hi bahuviṣayo dvayor na yujyate. ṣāḍahikānāṃ tu vidhāne naiṣa doṣaḥ. nanu ca tatrāpi dvikaraḥ śabdo bhaviṣyati. ucyate, na bhaviṣyati. sarvatvaṃ kevalaṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14178: vidhāsyati{*7/165*}, na pṛṣṭhāni. nanūktam, pṛṣṭheṣv asatsu kasyedaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14179: srvatvaṃ vidhīyata iti. ucyate, pṛṣṭhānāṃ sarvatvaṃ hi vihitam, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:14180: saṃpādayitavyam. na ca pṛṣṭhāny akurvatā, tat saṃpādayituṃ śakyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14181: tatrārthāt pṛṣṭhāni kariṣyati. evaṃ na [37]{*7/166*} dvyarthaḥ śabdo bhaviṣyati. sarvaśabdaś ca samarthitaḥ. tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām atideśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14186: varuṇapraghāseṣu śrūyate, vāruṇyā niṣkāsena tuṣaiś cāvabhṛthaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14187: yanti{*7/167*} iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ, kiṃ dārśapūrṇamāsike 'pāṃ vyutseke tuṣaniṣkāsaṃ vidhīyate, uta saumikād avabhṛthād dharmātideśa iti. kiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14189: sannihito hy asau codakena prāpitaḥ. nanu nāsāv avabhṛthaḥ. ucyate, asti tatrāvabhṛthaśabda iti. eṣa vai darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛtha{*7/168*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14190: evaṃ prāpta idam āha, tathāvabhṛthaḥ somāt, yathā ṣaḍahāt pṛṣṭhānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:14191: atideśaḥ. evaṃ saumikād avabhṛthād iha dharmātideśaḥ. kutaḥ. abhihito
GSP28msbh1-7u:14192: nyāyaḥ, uktaṃ kriyābhidhānaṃ tacchrutāv anyatra vidhipradeśaḥ syād{*7/169*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14198: atha yad uktam, dārśapaurṇamāsike 'vabhṛthe guṇavidhir bhavatv iti, tasya kaḥ parihāra ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14200: naitad yuktam. kutaḥ. yato nāsti darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛthaḥ. nanu, eṣa vai darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛtha{*7/170*} iti śrūyate. [38]{*7/171*} satyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14201: śrūyate, na tv evam avabhṛthatvam asya bhavati. katham. ucyate, eṣa vai darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛtha ity etasya vākyasya dvayī vacanavyaktiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14203: ucyate, yathā devadatto yajñadattasya putra iti nirjñātaputratvasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14205: vānirjñātāvabhṛthatvasyāvabhṛthatvam, yathā, ayam āmro yajñadattasya putra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14206: iti, nirjñātayajñadattasaṃbandhasyāmrasya putratvam ucyate. tad asyāpāṃ vyutsekasya darśapūrṇamānasaṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇān nirjñātaḥ, nāvabhṛthatvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14208: nanv ayam apy avabhṛtho bhavatu. naitad yuktam. anyāyo hy anekārthatvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14209: kathaṃ tarhi śabdaprayogaḥ. sādṛśyāt. kiṃ sādṛśyam. apsu saṃbandhaḥ. sa eṣa bhaktyā praśaṃsāvādo 'pāṃ vyutsekasya, avabhṛtha ivāyam iti, yathāmre
GSP28msbh1-7u:14210: putravādaḥ. tasmān nāsti darśapūrṇamāsayor avabhṛthaḥ. ato nātra guṇavidhiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14216: liṅgaṃ caitam arthaṃ darśayati. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. evam āha, nāyurdāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14217: juhoti, na sāma gāyati, na vā gamanamantraṃ japati{*7/173*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14222: dravyādeśe taddravyaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt puroḍāśas tv anādeśe tatprakṛtitvāt //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14223: vāruṇaprāghāsiko 'vabhṛthaḥ, saumikād avabhṛthād dharmāṇāṃ grāhaka ity yuktam. tatredaṃ cintyate, kiṃ puroḍāśadravyako 'sau, uta tuṣaniṣkāsadravyaka iti. kiṃ prāptam. puroḍāśadravyaka iti. kutaḥ. nāmnā puroḍāśaḥ prāpyate. nanu pratyakṣaśrutaṃ tuṣaniṣkāsam. satyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14224: pratyakṣaśrutam, na tu śakyate vidhātum. avabhṛtho 'tra vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14225: avabhṛthaṃ yantīti. yadi tuṣaniṣkāsam aparaṃ vidhīyeta, tato vākyaṃ bhidyeta. avabhṛthaṃ yanti, tac ca tuṣaniṣkāseneti. tuṣaniṣkāsaśravaṇam idānīṃ kim artham. anarthakam, saṃbandhābhāvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14226: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, dravyādeśe taddravyaḥ. dravyādeśa etasmin,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14227: tuṣaniṣkāsenāvabhṛtaṃ yantīti. taddravyaḥ syāt, tuṣaniṣkāsadravyaḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14228: śrutisaṃyogāt, tuṣaniṣkāsaṃ pratyakṣaśrutam, puroḍāśas tv ānumānikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14230: nanu puroḍāśo 'pi pratyakṣaśruto nāmnā. yady api pratyakṣaśrutaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14231: sāmānyena tu prāpyate, tuṣaniṣkāsaṃ tu viśeṣeṇa. bādhyate ca sāmānyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14232: viśeṣeṇa. api ca lakṣaṇayā puroḍāśo gamyate, śrutyā tuṣaniṣkāsam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14233: śrutilakṣaṇayoś ca śrutir nyāyyā. tasmāt tuṣaniṣkāsadravyaka iti. atha yad uktam, na saṃbadhyate 'vabhṛthena tuṣaniṣkāsam, vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14234: tatra brūmaḥ, yady avabhṛthaṃ vihāya tuṣaniṣkāsaṃ vidhīyate, tato vākyabhedaḥ syāt. tuṣaniṣkāsadravyako 'pūrvo 'vabhṛthaś codyate. tathā saguṇakarmavidhānam aviruddham. avidhīyamāne ca tuṣaniṣkāse tadgrahaṇam anarthakam eva syāt. tasmāt tuṣaniṣkāsadravyakaḥ. puroḍāśas tv anādeśe
GSP28msbh1-7u:14235: [40]{*7/175*} tatprakṛtitvāt. yady atra pratyakṣaśrutaṃ na dravyaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14236: tataḥ puroḍāśas tuṣaprakṛtitvāt syāt. atra tu pratyakṣaśrutaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14238: ātithye śrūyate, vaiṣṇavo navakapālo bhavati{*7/176*} iti. tathā rājasūye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14239: pūrvasmiṃs trisaṃyukte vaiṣṇvas trikapāla iti. tatra vicāraḥ, yo 'yaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14240: trisaṃyukte vaiṣṇavas trikapāla iti vaiṣṇavaśabdaḥ, ayam ātithyadharmāṇāṃ grāhakaḥ, neti. kiṃ yuktam. grāhaka iti. kutaḥ. vihitadharmake karmaṇi dṛṣṭaḥ śabdo 'nyasminn avihite{*7/177*} śrūyamāṇo grāhaka{*7/178*} ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:14241: uktam, uktaṃ kriyābhidhānam{*7/179*} iti{*7/180*}. tatrāyam api vihitadharmaka ātithye dṛṣṭaḥ. idānīm avihitadharmake trisaṃyukte dṛśyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14242: tasmād dharmāṇāṃ grāhaka iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14249: guṇavidhis tu na gṛhṇīyāt samatvāt // MS_7,3.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14250: guṇavidhir ayam. ātithyasya guṇaṃ viṣṇudevatāsaṃyogaṃ vidadhāti. sa eṣa dharmān grahītuṃ na śaknoti. kutaḥ. samatvāt. samo hy ayam ātithye trisaṃyukte ca. yathā tatra viṣṇuṃ devatāṃ{*7/181*} vidadhāti, evam
GSP28msbh1-7u:14251: atrāpi. śrutyarthāsaṃbhavāc ca lakṣaṇayā dharmāṇāṃ grāhakaḥ kalpyate. iha ca pratyakṣaśrutyartha eva saṃbhavati devatāvidhiḥ. tasmān nāyaṃ grāhaka
GSP28msbh1-7u:14256: paśāv agnīṣomīye dharmavān nirmanthyo 'gnir āmnātaḥ. sādhyā [41]{*7/182*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14257: vai devā{*7/183*} ity ārabhyāgnau śrūyate, nirmanthyeneṣṭakāḥ pacantīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14258: tathā, darśapūrṇamāsayor barhirājye dharmavatī{*7/184*}. paśau śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14259: barhiṣā yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇātīti, ājyena yūpam anakti{*7/185*} iti. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14260: saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ nirmanthyādayaḥ śabdāḥ dharmāṇāṃ grāhakāḥ, neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14261: tatrādhikaraṇātideśaḥ kriyate. nirmanthyādiṣu caivam, yathā vaiṣṇavaśabde.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14262: atrāpy ayaṃ yaugiko nirmanthyaśabdaḥ sadyonirmathitam agnim āha. tathā barhir ājyam iti dravyaśabdau. te trayo 'pi svārthaṃ vidhāya kṛtārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14263: bhavanti, dharmān grahītuṃ na śaknuvanti. tasmān na grāhakāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14264: cāturmāsyeṣu śrūyate, dvayoḥ praṇayanti, tasmād dvābhyām eti{*7/186*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14265: asti tu some praṇayanaṃ dharmavat, tathā darśapūrṇamāsayor adharmakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14266: tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ saumikam etat praṇayam, uta dārśapaurṇamāsikam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14273: praṇayanaṃ tu saumikam avācyaṃ{*7/187*} hītarat // MS_7,3.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14274: saumikam etat praṇayanam. kiṃ kāraṇam. avācyaṃ hītarad dārśapaurṇamāsikam{*7/188*}, codakena prāptatvāt. kathaṃ punar ayaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14275: praṇayatiśabdaḥ, praṇayanamātravacanaḥ san saumikaṃ praṇayanaviśeṣaṃ śaknoti vaktum. lakṣaṇayeti brūmaḥ, tīrthaśabavat, tad yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14276: tīrthaśabdaḥ, tīrthamātravacanaḥ san tīrthaviśeṣaṃ dharmasādhanaṃ kadācid brūte, tīrthayātrāṃ gata iti. [42]{*7/189*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14281: na vaiśvadeva uttaravedim upavayanti na sunāsīrīya{*7/190*} iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14282: prāptipūrvako hi pratiṣedho bhavati. saumike ca praṇayana uttaravedir na dārśapaurṇamāsike.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14286: prākṛtaṃ vaitat{*7/191*} praṇayanam, dārśapaurṇamāsikaṃ. kutaḥ. anāmatvat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14287: praṇayanaśabdaḥ saumikasya praṇayanasya na nāmadheyam. naitat tasya vācakam ity arthaḥ. yady ayaṃ tasya vācakaḥ syāt, tatas tad iha brūyat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14288: idaṃ tu padārthanāmadheyam, padārthasya prāṅnayanasya vācakam. yasya vācakaṃ tad iha śaknoty agneḥ prācīnaṃ nayanaṃ vaktum. tac cehāsty eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14289: tasmāt tasya vācakaḥ. evaṃ{*7/192*} sannihitapratyo na bādhito bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14290: atha yad uktam, tīrthaśabavad bhaviṣyatīti. atra brūmaḥ, tīrthaśabdo 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:14291: tīrthamātram eva brūte. tīrthayātrāṃ gata iti tv uktvā kānicit tīrthāny
GSP28msbh1-7u:14292: anukrāntāni. yato 'sau tadviśiṣṭārtho vijñāyate. yatra tu kevalaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14293: prayujyate, tatra tīrthamātram eva brūte. yathā, tīrthe snāti, tīrtham eva hi samānānāṃ bhavatīti. api ca saṃbhavati śrutyarthe, lakṣaṇārtho
GSP28msbh1-7u:14294: 'grāhyaḥ. saṃbhavati cātra śrutyarthaḥ. tasmān na lakṣaṇārtho grāhya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14298: parisaṅkhyārthaṃ śravaṇaṃ guṇārtham arthavādo vā // MS_7,3.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14299: tatrāha, yad uktam avācyaṃ hītarad{*7/193*} iti, tasya kaḥ [43]{*7/194*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14300: parihāraḥ. ucyate, parisaṅkhyārthaṃ vā syāt. dvayoḥ praṇayanti, na caturṣv iti. guṇārtham arthavādārthaṃ vā. tasmād dvābhyām etīti. tatra parisaṅkhyāyāṃ tāvat trayo doṣāḥ. guṇo 'pi na kaścid vidhīyate, pariśeṣād
GSP28msbh1-7u:14301: arthavādārtham. nanv arthavādo 'pi niṣprayojanaḥ, praṇayanasya prāptatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14302: arthavādasya prayojanam, uttarasminn adhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ, madhyamayor vā gatyarthavādād
GSP28msbh1-7u:14306: dvayoḥ praṇayantīti śrūyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ. katarayor dvayor iti. aniyame
GSP28msbh1-7u:14307: prāpte, ucyate, prathamottamayoḥ praṇayanam. kutaḥ. uttaravedipratiṣedhāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14308: tatrottaravediḥ pratiṣidhyate, na vaiśvadeva uttaravedim upavayantīti, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:14309: sunāsīrīya{*7/195*} iti. asmin praṇayane uttaravedyām agninidhānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14310: vihitam. ato yatra praṇayanam, tatrottaravediprāptiḥ. prāptau ca satyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14311: pratiṣedhaḥ, prathamottarayoś cāsau. tasmāt tayoḥ praṇayanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14315: madhyamayor vā parvaṇoḥ praṇayanam. kutaḥ. gatyarthavādāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14316: gatyarthavādenaitad dvayoḥ praṇayanam ucyate. tasmād dvābhyām etīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14317: ūrusaṃstute vaite{*7/196*} parvaṇī, ūru vaitau yajñasya, yad varuṇapraghāsāś ca{*7/197*} sākamedhāś ca{*7/198*} iti. ūru ca gamanasādhane, tatraivaṃ stutisaṃbandho vijñāyate. ūru yajñasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14318: varuṇapraghāsāś ca sāka[44]{*7/199*}medhāś ceti, tayor dvayoḥ praṇayanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14319: tasmād dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ yajñaḥ samāptiṃ yānti. praṇayanena hi tau
GSP28msbh1-7u:14320: balavantau bhavataḥ, aṅgabhūyastvād iti. etat tadarthavādasya prayojanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14321: atha yad uktam, uttaravedipratiṣedhād iti. tatra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14327: anārabhya kiṃcit parvaviśeṣam, cāturmāsyeṣūttaravedir āmnātā, upātra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14329: nanu varuṇapraghāsānāṃ guṇavākyaprāptāv evāyaṃ teṣām eva, atreti vādaḥ syāt. naitad evam, prakaraṇāc cāturmāsyānām eva. yadi varuṇapraghāsānāṃ vādaḥ syāt, tatra pratiṣedhe trīṇy api parvāṇy utkīrtayet. athocyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14330: dvayoḥ parvaṇor vādo bhavatv iti. atra brūmaḥ, na dvayoḥ parvaṇoḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14331: prakaraṇam, cāturbhāsyānāṃ vā prakaraṇam{*7/202*}, varuṇapraghāsānāṃ vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14332: varuṇapraghāsānāṃ dvayoḥ prakaraṇe parvaṇor utkīrtanaṃ pratiṣedhe na syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14334: nanu evam apy arthavādenaitaj jñātam, madhyamayoḥ praṇayanam iti. kim arthaṃ prāptasya praṇayanasya punaḥśravaṇam iti. atra prayojanaṃ noktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14335: asati prayojane 'nyasmin parisaṅkhyārtham eva bhavati. tatra doṣā uktāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14337: nanu nāsti kaścid guṇaḥ. ucyate, guṇaḥ śrūyate, uttaravedyām agninidhānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14344: gavāmayane śrūyate, abhito divākīrtyam ahastrayaḥ svarasāmāno
GSP28msbh1-7u:14345: bhavanti{*7/204*} iti. teṣāṃ viśeṣadharmā āmnātāḥ, yathā, saptadaśā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14347: punar anyatra śrūyate, pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho dvau svarasāmānāv iti. tathā vaiśvadeve śrūyate, dyāvāpṛthivya ekakapāla iti. tatrāmnātā viśeṣadharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14348: sarvahutaṃ juhoty{*7/207*} aparyāvartayañ juhoti{*7/208*} iti. punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:14349: aparatra, kāya ekakapāla iti. tatraiva śrūyate, vaiśvadevyābhikṣeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14350: tatrāpi viśeṣadharmāḥ kecid āmnātāḥ. punar anyatra, maitrāvaruṇy āmikṣeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14351: tatra saṃdehaḥ. kiṃ svarasāmaśabdo 'nyatra śrūyamāṇo gavāmayanikebhyaḥ svarasāmabhyo dharmāṇāṃ grāhakaḥ, uta neti. evam ekakapālāmikṣāśabdāv api.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14352: tatra guṇavidhis tu na gṛhṇīyāt samatvād{*7/209*} ity agrahaṇe prāpte.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14353: idam ucyate, svarasāmaikakapālāmikṣaṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ grāhakam. kiṃ kāraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14354: liṅgadarśanāt. liṅgaṃ tatra tādṛśaṃ dṛśyate. yena jñāyate, sarva ete dharmāṇāṃ grāhakā iti. svarasāmasu tāvat pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍaho dvau svarasamānāv{*7/210*} ity uktvāha. tatra yat tṛtīyaṃ saptadaśam ahas tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:14355: trayastriṃśasya sthānam abhiparyāharanti, sa uttarāṇāṃ stomānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:14357: iti. yady etau svarasāmānau, gavāmāyanikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ grāhakau, tatraitāv api saptadaśau. tathātra trayaḥ saptadaśā anūcīnā bhavanti. tatraitad vacanaṃ yujyate, trayāṇāṃ saptadaśānām anūcīnatāyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14358: tathāgrayaṇe, dyāv āpṛthivyam ekakapālaṃ vidhāyāha, yat sarvahutaṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14359: sā tv ekā paricakṣā, huto hutaḥ{*7/213*} paryāvartate, sā dvitīyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14360: ājyasyaiva dyāv āpṛthivyau yajeta{*7/214*} iti, ājyavidhipare vākye sarvahomam aparyāvṛttiṃ ca vaiśvadevikau dharmau prāptau darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14361: tathā maitrāvaruṇyām āmikṣāyām, na vājinena pracaranti{*7/215*} iti vājinejyāṃ vaiśvadevikaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣedhaṃs tato dharmaprāptiṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14362: darśayati. etebhyo liṅgebhyo etaj jñāyate, yathāsvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ grāhakā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14363: iti. pratipattyarthakarma vājinejyāṃ sviṣṭakṛttulyāṃ matvaitad uktam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14364: liṅgam apadiṣṭam, kutaḥ prāptir iti. ucyate, lakṣaṇayā prāptir, liṅgāt tu lakṣaṇāparigrahaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14378: svarasāmatvasāmāyāt, ekakapālatvasāmānyāt, āmikṣāsāmānyād vā. yasya liṅgam arthasaṃyogād{*7/216*} ity anena prāptir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14379: kvacic chrūyate, vāso dadāti{*7/217*}, ano dadātīti. tatra vicāryate, kim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14380: vāsasaḥ, anasaś ca kriyā prāpyate, uta neti. tatrāha, evaṃ tāvan naḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14381: parīkṣyam. kim karmanimittāv etau [47]{*7/218*} śabdau, utākṛtinimittāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:14382: iti. yadi karmanimittau, tataḥ prāpyate. athākṛtinimittau, tato neti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. karmanimittāv iti. kutaḥ. karmāgame taddarśanāt. yadā tasmin dravye dāruṇi sūtre vā dārukāreṇa tantuvāyena vā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati, tadaitau śabdau pravartete, na prāk. ato vijñāyate, karmanimittāv
GSP28msbh1-7u:14383: iti. yadā karmanimittau, tad etad ārabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14388: karmaja etasmin vāsa, ādau dravye śrūyaṃāṇe, karma prāpyate. katham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14389: yūpavat, yathā yūpaśabdo joṣaṇādikriyānimittaḥ, sa yatra śrūyate, tatra joṣaṇādyāḥ kriyāḥ prāpyante, evam ihāpīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14391: atrocyate, naitau karmanimittau. kiṃ kāraṇam. ye naimittikāḥ śabdāḥ, te nimittam upalabhya prayujyante, yathā daṇḍī chatrīti. imau tv anupalabhya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14392: kriyām, ākṛtimātre prayujyete. tasmān naitau kriyānimittāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14393: atrocyate{*7/219*}, ākṛtyā kriyām anumāya tataḥ śabdaṃ prayuṅkta iti. atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14394: brūmaḥ, pratyakṣāṃ nimittatāṃ{*7/220*} gamyamānām utsṛjya, adṛṣṭāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ nimittatvakalpanāyāṃ hetur nāstīti. yat tūktam, kriyottarakālaṃ pravṛttidarśanād iti. atra brūmaḥ, prāk kriyāyā ākṛtir anabhivyaktā, sā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14396: ākṛtinimittau. yadaivam{*7/221*}, tadā siddhaṃ rūpaṃ deyam. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14398: śabdasyābhāvāt. yūpe tu pratyakṣavihitā joṣaṇādyāḥ kriyāḥ. tasmād yūpavad ity atulyopanyāsaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14404: gargatrirātra ājyadohāni sāmāni prakṛtya śrūyate, agnim upanidhāya stuvata{*7/223*} iti. tatra{*7/224*} viśayaḥ, kiṃ laukiko 'gnir
GSP28msbh1-7u:14405: upanidheyaḥ{*7/225*}, uta vaidika iti. kiṃ prāptam. vaidika iti. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14406: sarvakarmārtha utpanno 'sau. yāny ahaṃ karmāṇi kariṣye yaiś cāsmy adhikṛta
GSP28msbh1-7u:14407: iti, ato vaidika upanidheya iti. evaṃ prāpte ucyate, viśaye laukikaḥ syāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:14408: sarvārthatvāt. etasmin viśaye laukikaṃ vaidikam iti, laukikaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14409: atha yad uktam{*7/226*}, vaidikaṃ sarvakarmārtham utpannam, tasmāt tadupanidheyam iti. atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14414: *{7/226: E2: laukikaḥ syāt. kutaḥ sarvārthatvāt. laukikaḥ sarvārthaḥ. na tasya kāryaṃ kiṃcin nirdiṣṭam. ato yad yad agninā kartavyaṃ dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā tat tad upādīyamānam aviruddham. tasmāl laukikaḥ syāt. atha yad uktam}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14416: na vaidikam agnidravyaṃ śāstreṇotpāditam. tasya śāstreṇaiva kāryaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14417: nirdiṣṭam, yadāhavanīye juhotītīy ārabhya. tasmin sarvārthe kalpyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:14418: nirdeśo 'narthakaḥ syāt. tasmāl laukiko 'gnir upanidheyaḥ. sarvārthatvaṃ caiṣāṃ sve sve kārye vartamānānāṃ bhaviṣyati. evam ubhayam aviruddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14420: atha dhaiṣṇā agnayaḥ kasmān nopanidhīyante. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14422: itareṣām apy agnīnāṃ dhaiṣṇyānāṃ tathotpattiḥ, na sarvārtha [49]{*7/227*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14423: ity arthaḥ. kutaḥ. samatvāt. ete 'pītarair agnibhiḥ samāḥ. eteṣām api nirdiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ, prāg āsīno dhiṣṇyān āghārayati{*7/228*} iti. atas te nopanidheyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14427: ekādaśinyāṃ śrūyte, upaśayo yūpo bhavatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ. kim etad upaśayadravyaṃ saṃskṛtam, joṣaṇādayaḥ saṃskārā atra kartavyāḥ, uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14428: kiṃ yuktam. saṃskṛtaṃ syat. kartavyā atra joṣaṇādayaḥ saṃskārāḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14429: tacchabdatvāt. ayaṃ yūpaśabdaḥ saṃskāranimittaḥ. sa eṣo 'satsu saṃskāreṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:14432: na vā kartavyāḥ. kutaḥ. ayajñaśeṣatvād. ete saṃskārā asmin kāṣṭhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:14433: kriyante. etena dvāreṇa yajatinā saṃbhatsyante. itthaṃ saṃskṛte kāṣṭhe
GSP28msbh1-7u:14434: niyuktena paśunā yajiḥ kriyamāṇo 'pūrvaṃ nirvartayati{*7/229*}. asmiṃś copaśaye na paśur niyujyate, tatra kṛtāḥ saṃskārā anarthakāḥ syuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14435: nanu vacanasāmarthyād adṛṣṭārthā bhaviṣyanti. ucyate, nātra vacanam, yūpaḥ kartavya iti. vartamānāpadeśo
GSP28msbh1-7u:14436: nanu vartamānāpadeśo 'pi na ghaṭate, saṃskārāṇām abhāve. ucyate, bhaktyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14437: bhaviṣyati. yathā, yaja[50]{*7/230*}māno vai yūpa iti. āha, tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14438: sādṛśyāt. iha punaḥ katham iti. ucyate, guṇānām abhidhānatvāt. yūpaguṇānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14439: yūpasaṃskārāṇām{*7/231*} abhidhānatvād yūpasaṃskārāḥ. tatra kecid arthaprāptāś chedanādayas tūṣṇīṃkṛtāḥ santi. tair ayam abhidhīyate, yūpa ity ayūpaḥ san. yathā snātā kanyānalaṃkṛtā mālāguṇenāpy alaṃkṛteti. evam ekadeśenāpi saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃskṛta iti stutyābhidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14440: agnau śrūyate, pṛṣṭhair upatiṣṭhanta{*7/232*} iti. tatra cintyate, kiṃ pṛṣṭhadharmāḥ kartavyāḥ, uta neti. ke punas te. sāmānyadharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14441: hiṃkārādayaḥ, viśeṣadharmāḥ, rathantare prastūyamāne pṛthivīṃ manasā dhyāyed bṛhati samudram ityevamādayaḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam. tata āha, etat tāvan naḥ parīkṣyam. kim ayaṃ pṣṭhaśabdaḥ karmaṇo vācakaḥ, uta
GSP28msbh1-7u:14443: nanu siddham etat karmanāmadheyaṃ pṛṣṭhaśabda iti, yasmin guṇopadeśaḥ pradhānato 'bhisaṃbandha ity atra. tāsv eva codanāsv etad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14444: saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni, vairūpaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ{*7/233*} vairājaṃ pṛṣṭham{*7/234*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14445: iti. idānīm, pṛṣṭhair upatiṣṭhanta{*7/235*} ity asyāṃ cintyate. kiṃ punar atra yuktam. tata āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14455: [51]{*7/237*} tathābhūtaḥ{*7/238*} sann{*7/239*} upadeśaḥ, yatrāyaṃ pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ karmanāmādhigataḥ{*7/240*}. tathābhūto 'yam api. kim asya tathātvam. pṛṣṭhaśabdasāmānyam. pṛṣṭhaśabdas tatra karmavacano 'dhigataḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14456: sa evāyam. tasmād ihāpi tadvacana evāvagantavyaḥ viśeṣābhāvāt. yady
GSP28msbh1-7u:14457: anyārthaḥ{*7/241*} kalpyate, ekaḥ śabdo 'nekārthaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14458: śabda uccarite saṃśayaḥ syāt, nārthapratyayaḥ. tatra vyavahāro na sidhyet.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14459: vyavahārārthaś ca śabdaprayogaḥ. kāraṇāntaraṃ ca prakaraṇādyapekṣyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14460: ekārthatve tu nirapekṣo 'rthapratyayaḥ. tasmād anekārthatvam anyāyyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14461: tasmāt karmanāma pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ. yadā karmanāma, tadā yadi tāvat tāni
GSP28msbh1-7u:14462: karmāṇīhopadiśyante, tatrotpattir eṣām anarthikā. atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa ity etad upasthānaṃ tatra vijñāyate. tata idaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bādhyeta. tasmāt sādṛśyavidhir ayam. pṛṣṭher upatiṣṭhante{*7/242*}, pṛṣṭhasadṛśaiḥ karmabhir upatiṣṭhanta{*7/243*} iti, tatsādṛśyaṃ ca dharmair bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14468: *{7/240: Hierzu und zum Folgenden vgl. ad MS 1.4.3}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14472: abhidhānopadeśād vā vipratiṣedhād dravyeṣu pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ syāt // MS_7,3.36
GSP28msbh1-7u:14473: na caitad evam, karmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭhaśabda iti. kiṃ tarhi. dravyeṣu pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ syāt. ṛgdravyeṣv abhitvā śūra nonuma ityevamādīnām ṛcāṃ vācakaḥ. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14475: pṛṣṭhair abhidadhātīty arthaḥ. katham punar ayam upasthānavacano
GSP28msbh1-7u:14477: mantrakaraṇa upatiṣṭhater ātmanepadaṃ bhavati. mantras tv abhidhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14478: karaṇam, nopa[52]{*7/246*}sthānasya. upasthānaṃ śarīreṇa kriyate, manasā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14479: vā. tasmād abhidhānārthaḥ. sa eṣa vipratiṣedhaḥ. yadi pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ karmasu
GSP28msbh1-7u:14480: kalpyate, ātmanepadaṃ bādhyate. na hi tadā mantraḥ karaṇaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14482: tadābhidhānārthatāpatati. tatrātmanepadānurodho nyāyyaḥ. pṛṣṭhaśabdo hi lakṣaṇayā pṛṣṭhasādhanaṃ mantraṃ bruvann arthavān bhavati{*7/247*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14483: ātmanepadaṃ tu mantrakaraṇenaivopapadyate. ataḥ pṛṣṭhasādhaneṣu mantreṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:14485: āha, naitad yuktam. upasthānārthatā hi śrutyopatiṣṭhateḥ. ātmanepadāl liṅgād abhidhātārthatā. na ca liṅgena śrutir bādhitavyā. ucyate, naivātra śrutir bādhyate. svārtham evopatiṣṭhatir āha samīpasthānam. tat tv abhidhānāya, abhidhānaṃ nirvartayitum agnisamīpe tiṣṭhed iti tiṣṭhatir
GSP28msbh1-7u:14487: āha, evam apy abhidhānasya mantraḥ karaṇam, nopatiṣṭhateḥ. tatrāsaṃbandha evopasthānasya mantreṇa. tathā, pṛṣṭhair upatiṣṭhanta{*7/248*} iti samuccāraṇam anarthakaṃ syāt. ucyate, abhidhānam abhinirvartayan mantra
GSP28msbh1-7u:14488: upasthānasya karaṇaṃ bhavati. yato 'sya prayojanaṃ nirvartayati. na hi niṣprayojanam anuṣṭhīyate. tasmān mantreṣv eva pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ. mantreṣu cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14489: nāsti dharmāṇāṃ prāptiḥ. na hi mantrāṇāṃ dharmāḥ, adharmakās ta iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14496: anārabhya kiṃcic chrūyate, sauryaṃ caruṃ{*7/250*} nirvaped
GSP28msbh1-7u:14498: codyata{*7/252*} iti, yajatis tu dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogād eṣāṃ{*7/253*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14499: karmasaṃbandhād{*7/254*} iti. tathedam apy uktam, karmaphalayoḥ saṃbandhe karma guṇataḥ, phalaṃ pradhānata iti, pratyarthaṃ cābhisaṃyogāt karmato hy
GSP28msbh1-7u:14500: abhisaṃbandhaḥ, tasmāt karmopadeśaḥ syād iti. idam api coktam, yajir apūrvaṃ sādhayati. tataś cāpūrvāt kālāntare phalaṃ bhavatīti, codanā punar ārambha ity atra. evam etasmin sati sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped
GSP28msbh1-7u:14501: brahmavarcasakāma{*7/255*} ity atra sauryayāgenāpūrvaṃ kṛtvā brahmavarcasaṃ sādhayed brahmavarcasakāma ity evaṃ vijñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14502: āha, yatra tṛtīyāyukto yajiḥ, tatra yukto guṇabhāvābhyupagamaḥ. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14503: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeti{*7/256*} iti. iha tv asatyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ kathaṃ tṛtīyārtho gamyata iti. ucyate, kim atra tṛtīyānirdiṣṭena yajinā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14504: kāryam. yadā svabhāvasiddhaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ prati guṇabhāvaḥ. yatrāpy asau śrutaḥ, tatrāpy akiṃcitkara eva, gatārthatvāt. tathā, yatrāpi dvitīyā śrutiḥ, yathāgnihotraṃ juhuyād iti, tatrāpi vibhaktivyatyayo vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14505: īpsitatvasya{*7/257*} vāvivakṣā kāmaṃ vānarthakyaṃ syāt. na tu kathaṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:14506: api karmaṇaḥ prati guṇabhāvaḥ śakyo 'pahnotum. tasmād yāgenāpūrvasādhanam atrocyate. tatra yāgo vijñāyate. [54]{*7/258*} laukiko 'sau padārthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14507: tena tu katham apūrvaṃ sādhyata ity etan na vijñāyate. iha tu yāgenāpūrvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14508: sādhayed ity etāvad evoktam. kathaṃ sādhayed itītikartavyatā noktā. yeṣāṃ cārthānāṃ jñāyata evetikartavyatā, teṣāṃ kartavyatvamātram upadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14509: yathā, odanaṃ paced iti. yeṣāṃ tu na jñāyate, te
GSP28msbh1-7u:14510: sahetikartavyatayaivopadiśyante. yathā darśapūrṇamāsau. evaṃ cen nūnaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14511: jñāyate, yāgenāpūrvanirvṛttāv itikartavyatā yasmād uktā{*7/259*} tasmān nūnam asāv astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14512: āha, yady asti loke, tato jñāyetaiva. atha nāsty eva, kathaṃ śakyā jñātum
GSP28msbh1-7u:14514: ucyate, bāḍham asti, laukikī vaidikī ca. laukikī tāvat pārvaṇasthālīpākādiṣu, vaidikī darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu. yadi tatpūrvā etāś
GSP28msbh1-7u:14516: yathājñātayetikartavyatayeti, tato yukta itikartavyatāyā avidhiḥ. na ca vidhīyate. ata itikartavyatāyā avidher yajateḥ pūrvavattvaṃ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14518: atha ya āhuḥ, yajeta yāgaṃ kuryād iti. juhuyād homaṃ kuryād iti. teṣāṃ kiṃ naiva dharmākāṅkṣā bhavati. bhavatīti brūmaḥ. yady api prajñātetikartavyato{*7/260*} yajir dravyaṃ devatāṃ pratyutsṛjyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14519: tathāpi yadā phalārthaḥ kriyate, tadā dharmān ākāṅkṣati. na hy adharmāt{*7/261*} phalaṃ bhavati. kathaṃ jñāyate. yo hy amedhyaṃ dravyam ucchiṣṭaḥ śayāno vā prauḍhapādo vāmena hastena vā pādena
GSP28msbh1-7u:14520: yathākathaṃcid{*7/262*} devatāyai{*7/263*} utsṛjati, tasya phalaṃ na
GSP28msbh1-7u:14521: bhavatīti śiṣṭāḥ smaranti. yas tu medhyaṃ dravyaṃ śucau deśe prayataḥ prāṅmukho dakṣiṇena hastena samāhitamanā [55]{*7/264*} mantravan niyamavac ca devatāyai{*7/265*} utsṛjati, tasya phalaṃ bhavatīti smaranti. tasmād yāvān yajatiḥ phalāyāmnāyate, sa sarvo dharmān ākāṅkṣati. atas teṣām apy
GSP28msbh1-7u:14522: asti dharmākāṅkṣā. satyām ākāṅkṣāyāṃ sannihitair dharmair avipratiṣiddhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prakṛtau, vikṛtau{*7/266*} tv ānumānikaiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14540: adhunaivaṃ cintyate, kim aniyamo laukikī vaidikī vetikartavyatā, uta laukiky eva, āhosvid vaidikīti{*7/267*}. atra viśeṣābhāvād aniyame prāpte.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14541: ucyate, sa laukikaḥ syāt. sa khalu kartavyatopāyo laukikaḥ syāt. kutaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14542: dṛṣṭapravṛttitvāt. dṛṣṭā hy asya tatra tatra pravṛttiḥ, yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14543: pārvaṇasthālīpāke, aṣṭakācarau, āgrahāyaṇīyakarmaṇi{*7/268*}, ity evaṃ yatra yatra yāgenāpūrvaṃ sādhyate, tatra tatrāsya pravṛttir dṛṣṭā. ato
GSP28msbh1-7u:14544: 'nvayād vijñāyate, yāgasyāpūrvaṃ sādhayato 'yam abhyupāya iti. ayaṃ cāpi yāgaḥ. tasmād asyāpi sa evābhyupāyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14549: āha, kim eṣa evotsargaḥ, sarvatra lokikītikartavyateti. evaṃ khalu prāptam. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, vacanāt tu tato 'nyatvam iti. yatra pratyakṣaṃ vacanaṃ vaidikyāḥ, tatra na laukikī syāt, vacanasāmarthyād vaidikī eva syāt, yathopasatsu gṛhamedhīye ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14551: liṅgena vā niyamyeta liṅgasya tadguṇatvāt // MS_7,4.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14552: liṅgena vetikartavyatā niyamyeta. katarā. yasyā liṅgam, vaidikyāś ca liṅgam. tasmād vaidikī. kiṃ punar liṅgam. saurye tāvac carau śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14553: prayāje{*7/270*} kṛṣṇalaṃ juhoti{*7/271*} iti. tathā, aindrabārhaspatye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14554: ardhaṃ barhiṣo lunāti, ardhaṃ na svayaṃ ditam ardhaṃ vedyāṃ karoty ardhaṃ na{*7/272*} iti. tathā pitṛyajñena hotāraṃ{*7/273*} vṛṇīte nārṣeyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14555: etair liṅgair jñāyate vaidikītikartavyateti. katham. tadguṇatvāt{*7/274*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14556: ete hi prayājādayo vaidikasyāpūrvasya guṇāḥ. yadi ca tadīyetikartavyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14557: pravartitā, tata eteṣu karmasv ete santi. tatraitāni vacanāny upapadyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14558: prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotītyevamādīni. tasmād vaidikītikartavyatā niyamyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14565: api vānyāyapūrvatvād yatra nityānuvādavacanāni syuḥ // MS_7,4.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14566: api vā naivaṃ syāt, vaidikītikartavyateti. yat kāraṇam etair liṅgair na śakyate vaidikī niyantum. kutaḥ. anyāyapūrvatvāt. nyāyapūrvakaṃ hi vacanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14567: tatsādhakaṃ bhavati. na caitāni nyāyapūrvāṇi. na hi vaidikyāḥ pravṛttir
GSP28msbh1-7u:14568: yuktā, nibaddhā hi sā prakaraṇādibhiḥ kāraṇair darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu. kathaṃ tarhy etāni liṅgāni. ucyate, yatra nityānuvādavacanāni syuḥ. iha tāvad ardhaṃ barhiṣo lunāty ardhaṃ neti, barhir yatraiva{*7/275*} bhavaiṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14569: yat kāraṇam, sato barhiṣa ucyate{*7/276*}. na cehāsti barhiḥ. na hotāraṃ vṛṇīte nārṣeyam iti nityānuvādo bhaviṣyati. [57]{*7/277*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14570: nanu nityānuvādaḥ sann anarthako bhavati. kiṃ kriyatām, yasyārtho nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14571: prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotītivacanaṃ prayājānāṃ bhaviṣyati. kathaṃ punar atra prayājāś ca kṛṣṇalahomaś ca śakyo vaktum{*7/278*}. bhidyate hi tathā vākyam. evaṃ tarhi na prayājān vakṣyati. prayāje kṛṣṇalahomaṃ vidhāsyati. na cāsatsu prayājeṣu kṛṣṇalahomaḥ śakyate kartum ity arthāt prāyājān kariṣyati. tasmān na liṅgena vaidikyā niyamaḥ. yathoktena nyāyena laukikītikartavyateti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14576: mitho vipratiṣedhāc ca guṇānāṃ yathārthakalpanā syāt // MS_7,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14577: tatrāha, atha kasmān nobhe apītikartavyate saha pravartete iti. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati. evaṃ tulyāpekṣā karmaṇām anyatarato na bādhitā bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14578: ucyate, sahapravṛttāv ekayā cet karma nirapekṣaṃ kṛtam, dvitīyasyāḥ pravṛttir vipratiṣiddhā. ato mithaḥ pravṛtter vipratiṣedhād yathārthakalpanā syāt. ekasyāḥ pravṛttiḥ syād iti arthaḥ. katham ekasyāḥ pravṛtter dharmāṇāṃ yathārthakalpanā bhavati. ye dharmā yeṣu kāryeṣu pravṛttāv utpannāḥ, ta ihāpi teṣv eva bhavanti. itarathā dvitīyasyā dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14579: ayathārthā bhaveyuḥ pūrvair dharmaiḥ, teṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ nirvartitatvāt. evam ekasyāḥ pravṛtter yathārthakalpanā bhavati. ato yathārthakalpanā syād ity anenaikasyāḥ pravṛttir ity uktaṃ bhavet. ekasyāḥ pravṛttau yathoktenaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:14582: bhāgitvāt tu niyamyeta guṇānām abhidhānatvāt, saṃbandhād abhidhānavad yathā dhenuḥ kiśoreṇa tuśabdaḥ pakṣanivṛttau. na tv evaṃ syāt, laukikītikartavyateti. kiṃ tarhi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14583: vaidikī niyamyeta. kutaḥ. bhāgitvāt. vaidiky api bhāginī pravṛtteḥ. sāpi hy apūrvasyetikartavyatā. samāne ca bhāgitva ubhayor vaidiky eva syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14584: guṇānām abhidhānatvāt. guṇā ete prayājādayaḥ sauryādiṣu dṛśyamānā abhidhāyakā bhavanty etasyārthasya. yathā vaidiky atretikartavyateti
GSP28msbh1-7u:14586: kasmāt. saṃbandhāt. ete hi tayetikartavyatayā saṃbaddhāḥ. ataḥ sāhacaryāt tāṃ gamayanti. abhidhānavat. yathā kauṇḍapāyināmayana agnihotram ity abhidhānaṃ karmaṇo vācakam, tatkarmasahacaritān dharmān ānayati, teṣv asatsv etad abhidhānam iha na yujyata iti teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatra bhāvo
GSP28msbh1-7u:14587: vijñāyate. evam ihāpi prayājādīnāṃ darśanam asatyaṃ vaidikyāṃ na yujyata iti, tasyā apīha bhāvo vijñāsyate. nanv asati nyāye liṅgam akāraṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14588: satyam evam, uktas tu nyāyo bhāgitvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14589: yat tu dṛṣṭapravṛttir laukikīti. tatra brūmaḥ, yady api dṛṣṭapravṛttiḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14590: syāt, tathāpi vaidiky eva niyamyeta. katham. yathā dhenuḥ kiśoreṇa, tad
GSP28msbh1-7u:14591: yathā, kṛṣṇakiśorā dhenur{*7/281*} iti. yady api dhenuśabdo godhenvāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14592: dṛṣṭapravṛttiḥ, tathāpy abhidhānasāmānyād aśvadhenvām api bhāgīti kiśoreṇa
GSP28msbh1-7u:14593: liṅgenāśvadhenvāṃ vijñāyate. evam ihāpi yady api laukikī dṛṣṭapravṛttiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14596: *{7/280: E2 liest vor MS7.4.7 noch: tarhi na prayājāv anvayati. prayājeṣu kṛṣṇalahomaṃ vidhāsyati. na cāsatsu prayājeṣu kṛṣṇalahomaḥ śakyaḥ kartum
GSP28msbh1-7u:14599: utpattīnāṃ samatvād vā yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt // MS_7,4.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14600: atha vā naiva liṅgena niyama iti. kutaḥ. utpattīnāṃ samatvāt. dharmāṇāṃ prayājādīnām utpattayaḥ samāḥ sarveṣām āgneyādyaṅgabhāvena, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:14601: parasparāṅgatvena. kim ataḥ. yadi prayājādīnām anuyājādayo 'ṅgāni syuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14603: yadā tu samapradhānā ete, tadā prayājadarśanena kāmaṃ prayājā anumīyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14604: prayājadharmā vā. na tv anuyājādayaḥ. tasmāl liṅgam aniyāmakam. yat tv abhidhānavad iti. atra brūmaḥ, yuktaṃ tatra. tatra{*7/283*} hi paraśabdaḥ paratra prayuktaḥ san dharmān{*7/284*} atidiśatīty uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14605: api ca, vidhir asau. agnihotravad dhotavyam iti. ayaṃ punar anuvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14606: tenātra prayājādīnām eva nāsti prāptiḥ, kuto 'nuyājādīnām. tasmād viṣama upanyāsaḥ, abhidhānavad iti. ato yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt. ye dharmā yasyāpūrvasyādhikāra āmnātās te tatraiva bhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14607: evaṃ tarhi, sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped{*7/285*} ity anenākhyātena pradhānasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14608: vidhānotpattiḥ, śeṣāṇāṃ ca vacanaṃ bhavatu. kathaṃ kṛtvā. nānaṅgaṃ pradhānam ucyamānaṃ kasmaicit prayojanāya kalpata iti. tena ca prāpitānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:14609: aṅgānām etebhyo liṅgebhyo viśeṣāvadhāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati. tatredam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14615: ekasmiñ śabde pradhānasyotpattir aṅgānāṃ ca vacanaṃ na [60]{*7/286*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14616: saṃbhavati. kiṃ kāraṇam. utpannaṃ hi pradhānam aṅgān apekṣate. apekṣayā ca tāni gṛhyante. tasmān naitad api yuktam. yadi ca nirvaped ity anena śabdenāṅgāny api vidhīyeran, tatas teṣām api phalasaṃbandhaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14617: tathāṅgatvam eva vyāhanyeta. tato 'yam api vādo na ghaṭate. tasmād yathokto laukika evābhyupāyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14619: vidhyanto vā prakṛtivac codanāyāṃ pravarteta, tathā hi liṅgadarśanam //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14620: vidhyanto vā sauryādikāyāṃ codanāyāṃ pravarteta, na dharmā laukikāḥ. kaḥ punar ayaṃ vidhyanto nāma. vidher anto vidhyantaḥ. atha vidhiḥ kaḥ. yad vākyam upalabhya puruṣaḥ kasmiṃścid arthe pravartate, kutaścid vā nivartate, sa vidhiḥ. vidhīyate hy anenārthaḥ. yathā loke devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām{*7/287*} iti, tasyābhyājetyādiḥ{*7/288*}. itaro 'ntaḥ. vede
GSP28msbh1-7u:14622: pradhānavidhivarjitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ pauroḍāśikaṃ brāhmaṇam. tena sameto 'yaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14623: vidhyādir viśiṣṭāpūrvanirvṛttiṃ prati puruṣaṃ pravartayati. tasmāt so 'syāntaḥ. tathā somena yajeta{*7/289*} iti vidhyādiḥ. saumikam api brāhmaṇaṃ vidhyantaḥ. eṣa vidhyanto nāma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14624: eteṣu ca sauryādiṣu vidhyādir asti, vidhyanto nāsti. eteṣv api sa
GSP28msbh1-7u:14625: vidhyantaḥ kalpyeta. kathaṃ kṛtvā. aparipūrṇaṃ yad vākyam, tad adhyāhāreṇa vā pūryeta, vyavahitakalpanayā vā. tatrādhyāhārād vyavahitakalpanā jyāyasī. adhyāhāre hy aśrutaḥ kalpyeta{*7/290*}. itaratra śrutena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmād vyavahito brāhmaṇāvayavo 'sya paripūrakaḥ kalpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14626: yathā vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate{*7/291*}, grīṣmāya kalaviṅkān ālabhata{*7/292*} iti. tena vaidikītikartavyatā prāpyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14627: yadi{*7/293*} tad brāhmaṇam asyāntaḥ kalpyate, tatra na bhavati. tad etanmayūranṛtyam āpadyate. tad yathā, mayūrasya nṛtyato 'nyadapāvriyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:14628: 'nyat saṃvriyate. evam ihāpīdaṃ saṃvriyate tadapāvriyate. naiṣa doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14629: pratyakṣas tasya tatra bhāvaḥ. iha punar ānumānikaḥ. na cānumānikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bādhate. iha tarhi na prāpnoti, pratyakṣavirodhāt. syād evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14630: yadi virodhaḥ syāt. na tv asti virodhaḥ. tatrāpi bhaviṣyati, ihāpi tad etad uktam, vidhyanto vā prakṛtivac codanāyāṃ pravarteteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14631: ucyate, prakṛtivad iti kim. āha, aṣṭame prakṛtiniyamaṃ kariṣyati. iyam asya prakṛtir iti. tad ucyate, vidhyanto vā prakṛter iva pravarteta. yā yā tasya karmaṇaḥ{*7/294*} prakṛtir iti yasyāgneyaḥ prakṛtiḥ, tasyāgneyād
GSP28msbh1-7u:14632: eva. yasyāgnīṣomīyaḥ, tasyāgnīṣomīyād ity evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14633: atha kasmān na laukiko vidhyantaḥ kalpyate. ucyate, laukikasya vidher abhāvād vidhyanta eva nāsti. kutas tat kalpaneti. āha, laukikītikartavyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14634: prāpyatām, kiṃ vidhyantakalpanayeti. ucyate, vaidikī hy atretikartavyatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14635: na laukikī. kasmāt. tathā hi liṅgadarśanaṃ prayājādi samarthitaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14646: yadi liṅgād vaidiko 'bhyupāyo bhavati, tena tarhy aliṅge laukikaṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14647: yatra karmaṇi kiṃcil liṅgaṃ nāsti, tatra laukikaṃ syād vidhānam. yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14648: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet, yasya sajātāvīyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14650: liṅgasya pūrvavattvāc codanāśabdasāmānyād ekenāpi nirūpyeta yathā sthālīpulokena // MS_7,4.12
GSP28msbh1-7u:14651: atrocyate, syād evam, yadi liṅgahetuko vaidika upāyaḥ syāt. na tv asau
GSP28msbh1-7u:14652: liṅgahetukaḥ. kiṃhetukas tu. vidhyantahetukaḥ. vidhyanto 'pi nyāyapūrvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14653: sa ca nyāyas tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vaikṛtānāṃ liṅgavatām{*7/296*} ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14654: kutaḥ. codanāśabdasāmānyāt. karmacodanāyāṃ śābdaḥ samānaḥ. sarvatra vidhyādir asti, na vidhyantaḥ. tulyaś cāpekṣayānyatra śrutena vidhyantena
GSP28msbh1-7u:14655: saṃbandhaḥ. tad etan nyāyapūrvakaṃ liṅgam ekatrāpi dṛśyamānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14656: tulyanyāyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmavattāṃ jñāpayati. yathā sthālyāṃ tulyapākānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14657: pulākānām ekam upamṛdyāny eṣām api siddhatāṃ jānāti, tulyo hetur asya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14658: cānyeṣāṃ ca siddhatvasyeti. tasmāt sarvatra vaidikītikartavyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14659: atha yad uktam, dṛṣṭapravṛttir laukikītikartavyateti. atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14660: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam etad upadiśyate. sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca yad avyabhicāri, tat
GSP28msbh1-7u:14661: pramāṇam. savyabhicāraṃ caitat. dṛṣṭā hi gaṇayāgādayo
GSP28msbh1-7u:14663: yat tu vaidikyā bhāgitvāt tatpūrvakāṇi liṅgāni bhaviṣyantīti. atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14665: tasyāḥ śabdapūrvaḥ. śabdena ca darśapūrṇamāsayor asau vijñāyate{*7/298*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14666: na sarvatreti. tasmān na bhāgitvam. ato vidhyantenaivetikartavyatā prāpyate, nānyathā. atha kasmād etāni vaikṛtāni vākyāni nyūnāny eva
GSP28msbh1-7u:14667: nānumanyante, kim ebhiḥ pūritaiḥ. nyūnāny anarthakāni bhavanti. bhavantu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14668: ko [63]{*7/299*} doṣaḥ. śiṣṭair eṣāṃ saṃparigraho na yujyate. pramādād
GSP28msbh1-7u:14669: bhaviṣyatīti. nāsty akṣare mātrāyāṃ vā pramādaḥ. kuto etāvati granthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:14670: bhaviṣyati. katham. tulyaṃ ca sāṃpradāyikam{*7/300*} ity uktam. vyāmoho
GSP28msbh1-7u:14671: 'pi viduṣāṃ yugasahasrāṇi bahūni nānuvarteta. yujyate caiṣām apekṣayā
GSP28msbh1-7u:14672: pūraṇam. tasmād ūnāni nānumanyante. ato vaidikītikartavyateti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14678: dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvād aikāhikam adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavat // MS_7,4.13
GSP28msbh1-7u:14679: prajākāmā gavāmayanam upeyur{*7/301*} iti satraṃ vidhāyāmnāyate, jyotir gaur āyur{*7/302*} iti, gavāmayane dvādaśāhiko vidhyanta iti
GSP28msbh1-7u:14680: vakṣyati{*7/303*}, gaṇeṣu dvādaśāhasya{*7/304*} iti. tatra codakena dvādaśāhikā dharmāḥ prāpyante. ekāhānām api yathā svaṃ nāmabhiḥ prātisvikāḥ. ye tatra dvādaśāhikā aikāhikair aviruddhāḥ, te yathāprāptaṃ kriyante. viruddheṣu saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ dvādaśāhiko dharmaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14681: utaikāhika iti. kiṃ prāptam. tatra sūtreṇaivopakramaḥ. dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvāt. dvādaśāhaprakṛtitvād vidhyantenaiva prāpyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14682: nanv evaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bādhyate. na bādhiṣyate nāmadheyaṃ jyotir ādi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14684: tadāgamāt, ekāhavat. yathā tasminn eva jyotiṣy ekāhe jyotiḥśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:14687: virodho 'sti. tasmād dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmajātaṃ viruddhaṃ kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14688: adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavad ity etasyāparā vyākhyā. ye dvādaśāhe 'dhikā aikāhikebhyaḥ kecid dharmā ucyante. abhiplavo 'nvahaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14689: bhavati{*7/306*}, gorivītam{*7/307*} anvahaṃ bhavatīti. teṣām adhikānām āgamāt tadākhyaṃ syāt. etad dvādaśāhikam aharjyotirākhyam āyurākhyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14690: vā{*7/308*}. katham. ekāhavat. yathā tasminn evaikāhe 'yaṃ jyotirādiśabdo jyautiṣṭaumikebhyo 'dhikeṣu vaiśeṣikeṣu dharmeṣv āgateṣu bhavati, evam ihāpy adhikāgamasāmānyād gauṇo bhaviṣyati. yathā ṣāḍahikānāṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14691: bhāvād ekāho viśvajit ṣaḍaha{*7/309*} ity uktam. tam ekāhaṃ ṣaḍaha ity
GSP28msbh1-7u:14692: ācakṣata{*7/310*} iti. evam ihāpi. gauṇaś cen na prāpakaḥ. tasmān nāsti nāmadheyād dharmaprāptir
GSP28msbh1-7u:14704: liṅgāc caitaj jñāyate, yathā dvādaśāhikaṃ kartavyam iti. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. dvābhyāṃ lomāvadyati dvābhyāṃ tvacaṃ dvābhyām asṛg dvābhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14705: māṃsam{*7/311*} iti. evaṃ ṣaḍdvikān anukramyāha, yad dvādaśopasado bhavanti, ātmānam etan nirvadyata iti dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14706: dvādaśopasattvaṃ darśayati. tad upapadyate, yadi dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmajātaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14708: syāt{*7/313*}. tasmāt paśyāmaḥ, dvādaśāhikaṃ kartavyam iti. tathedam aparaṃ liṅgam. yasyātiriktam ekādaśinyām ālabheran na priyaṃ{*7/314*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:14709: bhrātṛvyam atiricyeta. atha yad dvau paśū samasyeyuḥ, kanīya āyuḥ kurvīran{*7/315*}. yady ete brāhmaṇavantaḥ paśava ālambhante nāpriyaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14710: bhrātṛvyam atyatiricyate [65]{*7/316*} na kanīya āyuḥ kurvīteti{*7/317*},
GSP28msbh1-7u:14711: ekādaśinyāṃ vihāraṃ dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmaṃ darśayati. katham. vihāre saty atirekaḥ paśūnām āpadyate. atirekabhayāc ca dvayor dvayoḥ samāsaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14712: ekāhadharmaprāptau vihāro na syāt. tatraitaddarśanaṃ na yujyate. tasmād dvādaśāhikaṃ kāryam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14720: na vā kratvabhidhānād adhikānām aśabdatvam // MS_7,4.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14721: na vā dvādaśāhikaṃ kāryam. kiṃ tarhi. ekāhikam. kiṃ kāraṇam. codakena dvādaśāhikaṃ prāpnoti, nāmadheyenaikāhikam. nāmadheyaṃ ca codakād balīyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14722: kutaḥ. pratyakṣatvāt. pratyakṣaṃ nāmadheyam, codakaṃ tv ānumānikam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14723: nanu vidhyanto 'pi pratyakṣaḥ. satyaṃ prakṛtau pratyakṣo vidhyantaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14724: vikṛtau tv ānumānikaḥ, nāmadheyaṃ punar vikṛtāv api pratyakṣam, pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ, tasmād aikāhikaṃ kāryam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14725: nanv adhikāryaṃ nāmadheyam ity uktam. atrocyate, adhikānām aśabdatvam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14726: adhikānāṃ śabdo nāsti. ime jyotirādayaḥ śabdāḥ karmanāmadheyānīty uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14727: api vā nāmadheyaṃ syād yad utpattāv apūrvam avidhāyakatvād{*7/318*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14728: yat tu, adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād iti. tatra brūmaḥ, vacanād adhikāgamo na nāmadheyena. yat tu, teṣv asatsu śabdasyābhāvād iti. naite kadācid āyurādiṣu na santi. kathaṃ teṣām abhāve śabdasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14729: jyotiṣṭome nāsti jyotirādiḥ śabda iti. karmāntaratvāt. jyotiṣṭoma āyurādiḥ śabdo nāsti, na dharmābhāvāt. tasmād aikāhikaṃ viruddhaṃ dharmajātaṃ kartavyam iti. adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syāt. ekāhavad ity etasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14731: syāt. tasmāt pūrvoktena nyāyena nāmadheyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prāpakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14734: liṅgaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ syāt tadarthāpatter dravyavat // MS_7,4.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14735: atha yal liṅgam upadiṣṭam, dvādaśopasattvadarśanam, tasya parihāra ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14736: liṅgaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ syāt. liṅgam etatsaṃghātadharmaḥ syāt. dvādaśāho
GSP28msbh1-7u:14737: 'haḥsaṃghātaḥ. sa phalāya codyate. dvādaśāham ṛddhikāmā upeyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14738: gavāmayanam api ahaḥsaṃghātāntaram. tasminn eva kārye phalasiddhau
GSP28msbh1-7u:14739: vidhīyate. tasya tatkāryāpattyā dvādaśāhadharmān gṛhṇāti, na codakena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14740: dravyavat. yathā dravye vrīhau dharmāḥ śrutās te tatkāryāpanneṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:14745: naitad yuktam. kutaḥ. arthadharmatvāt. apūrvadharmatvād ity arthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14746: apūrvadharmo dvādaśopasattvaṃ na saṃghātadharmaḥ. kasmāt. saṃghātasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:14747: guṇatvāt. ahāny atra pradhānāni. dvādaśāheneti dvādaśatvaṃ{*7/321*} teṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14748: guṇaḥ. viśeṣaṇam ity arthaḥ. viśiṣya eva kāryaṃ pratīyate, na viśeṣaṇe.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14749: yathā rājapuruṣa ānīyatām ity ukte puruṣa ānīyate, na rājā. yathā ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14750: mṛṣṭaṃ bhuṅkte devadatta ity ukte, na śākaṃ sūpo vā pratīyate. yad eva pradhānaṃ tat pratīyate. kim ataḥ. ato 'hāni phalavanti, na saṃghātaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14751: phalavataś ca dharmāḥ. tasmān na dvādaśopasattvaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ. evaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14752: [67]{*7/322*} cen na gavāmayane kāryāpattito dharmāḥ prāpyante. ato
GSP28msbh1-7u:14757: yad uktam{*7/323*}, dravyavad iti. yuktaṃ dravyeṣu. tatra hi vrīhikāryāpannā nīvārāḥ kāryāpattitas taddharmāṃl labhante. iha punar dvādaśopasattvaṃ naiva saṃghātadharma ity apadiṣṭo hetuḥ. tasmād adṛṣṭānto dravyavad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14758: āha, kathaṃ tarhi idaṃ liṅgadarśanam. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14762: gavāmayane dvādaśāhikaṃ prathamam ahaḥ, prāyaṇīyo 'tirātraḥ. tasya dharmo dvādaśopasattvam. tadupādāne mukhyasyānugrahaḥ. ṣaḍupasattvopādāne jaghanyānāṃ jyotirādīnām, mukhyasya prāptakālam anugraham atikramitum kiṃcit kāryaṃ{*7/324*} nāsti. atas tadanugrahārthaṃ dvādaśopasattvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:14763: bhavati. tathā mukhyayā{*7/325*} pravṛttyā niyatasyaitaddarśanam, na
GSP28msbh1-7u:14764: codakaprāptyā. yasmāc codako nāmadheyād abalaḥ. vakṣyati ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14767: atha yad dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanam uktam, ekādaśinyāṃ vihāradarśanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14776: syuḥ. tathā{*7/330*} tān evānūcīnān aharahar ālabheran, āgneyam eva prathame 'hany ālabheran, sārasvatīṃ meṣīṃ dvitīye, saumyaṃ babhruṃ tṛtīye, vāruṇam antataḥ. atha punaḥ paryāvarteṣv{*7/331*} āgneyam eva prathame 'hany ālabheran, sārasvatīṃ meṣīṃ dvitīye, saumyaṃ babhruṃ tṛtīye, vāruṇam antata iti. tad anārabhyavādānāṃ prakṛtyarthatvāj
GSP28msbh1-7u:14777: jyotiṣṭomaṃ praviṣṭam. tatrāhnāṃ bahutvasyābhāvād asaṃbhavād aparāṃ prakṛtiṃ dvādaśāham āgatam. tatrāpi punar jyotirādīnāṃ paryāvarteṣv ity etan na yujyata iti tṛtīyāṃ prakṛtiṃ gavāmayane praviṣṭam{*7/332*}. evam āgatasyaitad darśanam iti.
